column2: Niil neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq khi mail Daqbhil nee mail ge khal leevq-a nail, Yeiqsul Khali nail aqceevq ngaol.
Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaq neq, Ilcav ngaol.
Ilcav nail yaq neq,
Yaqkov ngaol.
Yaqkov nail yaq neq,
Yuldav khi mail
aivq nail mailnail juq ngaol.
Yuldav nail yaq neq,
aivq nail ildaoq
Daqmaq ovq nee
doevq lee-a nail Phaqyail
khi mail Seiqlal ngaol.
Phaqyail nail yaq neq,
Heiqyaqloq ngaol.
Heiqyaqloq nail yaq neq,
Aqlaq ngaol.
Aqlaq nail yaq neq,
Aqmiqnaqdal ngaol.
Aqmiqnaqdal nail yaq neq,
Naqsoq ngaol.
Naqsoq nail yaq neq,
Saqlaqmaq ngaol.
Saqlaqmaq nail yaq neq,
aivq nail ildaoq Laqhal
ovq nee doevq lee-a nail
Bhaolyav ngaol.
Bhaolyav nail yaq neq,
aivq nail ildaoq Lultha
ovq nee doevq lee-a nail
Aolbhail ngaol.
Aolbhail nail yaq neq,
Yeiqsail ngaol.
Yeiqsail nail yaq neq,
heeqphaq Daqbhil ngaol.
Daqbhil nail yaq neq,
Saollavmoq ngaol.
Saollavmoq nail aqma neq,
Ullilya bhai teevq aol
hal ail-a nail ngaol.
Saollavmoq nail yaq neq,
Leiqhaolbhanq ngaol.
Leiqhaolbhanq nail yaq neq,
Aqbhilyav ngaol.
Aqbhilyav nail yaq neq,
Aqsaq ngaol.
Aqsaq nail yaq neq,
Yeiqhaolsaqphal ngaol.
Yeiqhaolsaqphal nail
yaq neq, Yaollanq ngaol.
Yaollanq nail yaq neq,
Aolsil ngaol.
Aolsil nail yaq neq,
Yaoldaq ngaol.
Yaoldaq nail yaq neq,
Aqgav ngaol.
Aqgav nail yaq neq,
Heiqsaqgil ngaol.
Heiqsaqgil nail yaq neq,
Maqnaqseiq ngaol.
Maqnaqseiq nail yaq neq,
Aqmoq ngaol.
Aqmoq nail yaq neq,
Yaolsiv ngaol.
Yaolsiv nail yaq neq,
Yeiqkhaolnil khi mail,
aivq nail mailnail juq ngaol.
Niil neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq Bhaqbhulloq milkhaoq bhai bhi nieil-aivq-a nail yanq bhai kev dai, ge khal leevq-a nail aqceevq ngaol.
Bhaqbhulloq milkhaoq bhai bhi nieil-aivq khi pultavq ge khal leevq-a nail aqceevq neq, niailhai ngaol.
Yeiqkhaolnil nail yaq neq,
Saqlaqdeiqlal ngaol.
Saqlaqdeiqlal nail yaq neq,
Seiqlulbheiqlal ngaol.
Seiqlulbheiqlal nail
yaq neq, Aqbhil-ov ngaol.
Aqbhil-ov nail yaq neq,
Illilyakhin ngaol.
Illilyakhin nail yaq neq,
Aqjaoq ngaol.
Aqjaoq nail yaq neq,
Saqdol ngaol.
Saqdol nail yaq neq,
Aqkhin ngaol.
Aqkhin nail yaq neq,
Illiqov ngaol.
Illiqov nail yaq neq,
Illaqsaq ngaol.
Illaqsaq nail yaq neq,
Maqthaq ngaol.
Maqthaq nail yaq neq,
Yaqkov ngaol.
Yaqkov nail yaq neq,
Maqlil nail yovjil
Yaolsai ngaol.
Maqlil neq, Khali dai khul nail Yeiqsul bhai tsiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail Daqbhil bhai kev dai, tsel liq yeel ngaol. Daqbhil nail yeel nee mail Bhaqbhulloq milkhaoq bhai bhi nieil-aivq-u kev dai, tsel liq yeel ngaol. Bhaqbhulloq milkhaoq bhai bhi nieil-aivq-u nee mail Yeiqsul nail yeel bhai kev dai, tsel liq yeel ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali doevq lee-a nail neq, niailhai ngaol. Aivq nail aqma Maqlil neq, Yaolsai bhai maol ail nail dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu nvq gaq maq hevq maq maol pheeljaq-u nee mail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee, Maqlil yaq ceiv lai-a nail ngaol.

Maqlil-i mail ge ceiv-ai thaq nail Yaolsai neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aivq Maqlil nail maivphaoq maq bhi cov-ail movq nail ngel-i mail, yu bhai maq bhi heeq nia dai, khaonq ha naol dai, noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaolsai alhai noeq thailthaiq-u phao, aivq nvmav mav nail lavqkhoel Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq dov lee khi ge nail: “Daqbhil nail yaq Yaolsai-ol, naoq-i mail hevq naol dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail Maqlil bhai hevq nail haqbhoil thaq geesil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee, aivq yaq ceiv lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq yaqyov teevq gaq tsiq nail ngaol. Naol yaqyov al gaq bhai Yeiqsul
Al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal-a nail neq, Heeqphaq Miqyail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq bhai juq khi, ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhi bhee lal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Heldaiq dei-eiq. Yaqmai-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq yaq ceiv lai khi, yaqyov teevq gaq ya tsiq nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq bhai Eilmaqnoeqlal dai, mil naol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Eilmaqnoeqlal dai ge nail neq, Miqyail ngadao nee mail jaol nail ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yaolsai iqnoeq noeq lal khi, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, Maqlil bhai hevq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqyov al gaq maq doevq lee-u kev dai, aivq Maqlil nee maq iqthaiq tavq-al. Yaqyov al gaq doevq lee khi, aivq bhai Yeiqsul dai, mil bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Heiqlol uvthaiq nail yanq bhai, Yuldav milkhaoq Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai Yeiqsul doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq juq nlma dov khoeq phao nee mail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lal kev-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Doevq lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq al gaq khaq bha jaol nail-aiq. Nlma dov khoeq phao aivq nail aqgil dov lal nail bhai nvjuq ya moel khi, aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq lal-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Heiqlol ganl al ganl ya gaiq-u phao, aivq khi mail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl mail, suqsaq nail lavqkhoel neema maq sal-ai bhiq ail.

Heiqlol neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nail Philma khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail khul jil khi, “Khali khaq bhai doevq lee nail dai, gevq-ai thaq nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Yuldav milkhaoq Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai doevq lee nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail, niailhai jiav nail ngaol.
‘Yuldav milkhaoq
bhai jiav nail
Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq-ol.
Yuldav milkhaoq khe
heeqphaq juq uvthaiq nail
meenq lavqkhoel bhai
naol neq, yu nee maqtsil
theq nail meenq
maq ngel-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a
pevq nail Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai,
hevqdaiq bhiq nail
Heeqphaq neq,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
dov lal nail ngaol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.”
Aq-u phao, Heiqlol neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai aqtsi tsu dai khul khi, aqgil al heeq dov lal-a nail yanq bhai naldaiq duq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Heiqlol aqyu juq bhai, “Nuljuq yaq al gaq bhai laijai khi halpov ail yaoq. Halpov moel gaq haq neq, ngal iqsanl ail khi aivq bhai uqhuq ya thaoq dai, ngaq bhai ge gaiq lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq khi, Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai bhi ail-a nail ngaol.

Heiqlol aqyu juq bhai alhai ge bhiq gaq-u phao, aqyu juq sivtavq phao gaoq ail-a nail ngaol. Nlma dov khoeq phao nee aqyu juq-i mail ya moel-a nail aqgil al heeq, aqyu juq nail sivtavq phao ail thailthaiq khi, doevq lee-a nail yaqyov al gaq jaol nail ilkhaol kovtavq bhai teevq daol naq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aqgil al heeq bhai ya moel-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u phao, yaqyov khi mail aivq nail aqma Maqlil bhai ya moel khi, peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq-i mail oil lavq-a nail aqphoiq kav nail kovpavq juq thunq nee bheq dov khi, yaqyov bhai danq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail oil lavq-a nail kovpavq juq neq, heel, laolbhaqoq dai khul nail huqbhiq nil nail aqthail khi mail mullaq dai khul nail huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel, niil juq ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Heeqphaq Heiqlol jaol nail phao thaq kovq ail” dai, nvmav mav nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq gailkhaol yaoq khaol yaoq nee aqyu juq nail milkhaoq bhai kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Neenoeq neekha aol nail juq kovq ail jel gaq-u phao, Yaolsai nvmav mav nail lavqkhoel, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq Yaolsai bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Thul yaoq. Aqyu nvq mayaq hevq khi Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai tsaol-aivq yaoq. Ngal naoq bhai maq ge tsaoq lee-u kev dai, a bhai jaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Heiqlol yaqyov thoil gaq bhai heivq nail dai khi, halpov nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao Yaolsai thul khi, hul-iq tsilma aqyu nvq mayaq hevq khi, Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Heiqlol sil-u kev dai, aqyu phaqyaq a bhai jaol-a nail ngaol. Ganl al neq, Miqyail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq bhai juq khi niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“ ‘Iljiltuv milkhaoq nee
dov lal yaoq’ dai,
ngaq nail Yaqyov bhai
ngal khul naol” dai,
aivq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhee lal dai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi kovq ail jel thaq nail niil dai, heeq nia-u phao, Heiqlol neema phail deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq-i mail neenoeq neekha aol nail juq bhai naldaiq duq-ai thaq nail yanq bhai saol-nvq daiq khi, Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq khi mail al nail aqjail bhai khal jaol nail, nvq kovq nee mail pul-nvq khe yaqyov juq iqsanl mail heivq ail yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai nl-a nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Yeiqlaqmil-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq aq-u n-gaol bhee lal-a nail ngaol:
Aivq ge nail:
“Laqmal dai khul nail
jaol duq bhai
nioilkhaoq khaoq nail
aqthel khi mail
noeq dee noeq deel
khi nioil nail aqthel
ya gaiq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail yaq juq
bhaqda nee,
Laqkheiqlal
nioil nail ngaol.
Aivq nail yaq
maq jaol-aoq nail
ngel-i mail,
yu aivq bhai neema
maq bhi sal lal nia-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Heiqlol sil jel-u phao, Yaolsai Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai nvmav mav nail lavqkhoel, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq Yaolsai bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Thul yaoq. Aqyu nvq mayaq hevq khi, Ilsaqleiqlal milkhaoq bhai kovq lai yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaqyov thoil gaq bhai heivq nail dai khi, halpov nail juq sil-aoq nail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yaolsai thul khi, aqyu nvq mayaq hevq khi, Ilsaqleiqlal milkhaoq bhai kovq lai-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Heiqlol nail jiqdan aivq nail yaqyov Aqgeiqlal gaq Yuldav milkhaoq nail heeqphaq jiovq-nq thaq nail ganl, Yaolsai ya gaiq-u phao, aivq a bhai maq kovq lai tseq-ail. Aq-u phao, nvmav mav nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq lee khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Naqsaqlail meenq bhai jaol ail-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali bhai Naqsaqlail meenq yaq dai khul nail ngaol dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhee lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqn aqyanq al lavqkhoel, ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq dai, khul nail teevq gaq dov lal khi, Yuldav milkhaoq haqtsoiq haqyal bhai daoq cavq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail: “Oeqbal noeq pov yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq kev lee-aiq nail ngaol” dai, gul nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq neq, Yaolhaq bhai ge movq nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail:
“Tsaol-aq teevq gaq
haqtsoiq haqyal bhai
jaol khi mailma-ail gul nail:
‘Heeqphaq lee nail
haqbhoil
gailkhaol lav daol khi,
aivq nail gailkhaol
daolcoev dai,
lav daol yaoq’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.”

Yaolhaq neq, laolthao nail aqmevq-i mail yavq-ai thaq nail aqgaq aqdoi doi khi, aqjiovq bhai jaiqyaq bavkov nail jiovqpavq pavq-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, noelbhoel khi mail bhaiqtsil bhaiqeel jaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq juq maqkhaiq, Yuldav milkhaoq doi dai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq maqkhaiq, Yaoldaq laoljaol aqjail doi dai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq maqkhaiq, aivq jaol nail bha maodai lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq yovqgavq nail oeqbal yovqgavq ge dov bhiq khi, Yaoldaq laoljaol bhai Yaolhaq-i mail ulcuvq bhi saol-a nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq khi mail Saqduqgail juq iqsanl, aivq-i mail ulcuvq bhi saol nail dai khi, lee nail bhai Yaolhaq ya moel-u phao, aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Haqeiv nail eellel khe-ai dul nail yaq juq-ol, yaqhao kev lee nail Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhai ya jel-ail dai, nuljuq bhai khaq sil gaq ge lavq-a nail-aiq.
Nuljuq oeqbal noeq pov-aoq thaq nail dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal dai, doevq yaoq jaol yaoq.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq neq, nvjuq nail aqbhu ngaol dai, ge haq neq, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhai ya jel-ail naol dai, nuljuq thaq noeq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Lovmav niil juq iqsanl, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaq pevq gil lal dai, Miqyail nl nia nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il iqsanl, Miqyail neq, aqbhaol daoqthaoq bhai hailjaol bavq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqheeq aqmeeq maq heeq lee nail aqbhaol yaoq bhaol yaoq-ao nee bhai thul ha khi miqjaq lavqkhoel bhai bavq poiv nail ngaol.

Nuljuq oeqbal noeq pov-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ulcuvq lavqkhoel-ai ulcuvq saol bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail haoqnao lee thailthaiq nail gaq neq, ngaq-ai nee maqtsil bhaqaoq eeq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, aivq nail saiqnaov neeqtsaq bhai pheel nail iqsanl maq geel-nvq-ail. Aivq neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, miqjaq

Aivq nail aqlavq bhai, gov bhoehaol nail tsalbhoe nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail gov bhoi bhai bhoehaol khi, gov aqmal juq bhai neq, govjil lavqkhoel bhai phi bhoel nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gov koevq juq bhai neq, teevq thal-iq maq miv lai nia nail miqjaq-i mail kheq ha nail ngaol” dai, Yaolhaq ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ulcuvq saol nail dai khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq nee mail, Yaoldaq laoljaol bhai Yaolhaq jaol nail bha lee-a nail ngaol.

Yaolhaq Yeiqsul bhai lav tsoiq khi ge nail: “Ngal neq, naoq-i mail ulcuvq bhi saol heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ulcuvq bhi saol nail dai, khi mail naol lee-a nail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Niil aq-il nl lavq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail neenoeq bhee lal dai, ngadao nl nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq aivq bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ulcuvq saol gaq khi, ulcuvq lavqkhoel nee dov lal-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, nqtavq phao lal khi, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal khaoqkhoiq khe-ai aivq nail kovtavq bhai, deivq lee-a nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai neekhaol sil deedee naol” dai, nqtavq nee aqthel meel dov-aivq leevq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, neivq heeqphaq jalmul mul nail bhai Yeiqsul ya daq dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail aivq bhai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai, hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, liq tsel n liq tsel kivq khul iqsanl maq jaq dai, jaol-u phao, aoq moevq lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, neivq heeqphaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lee khi ge nail: “Naol Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngel haq neq, lovmav niil juq bhai, khaqmul pevq lal yaoq dai, daoq bivq-ai thoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Jaq nail phaq bhaqda nee taivq-ail, tsaol-aq yaq ya doevq nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee mail dov lee-a nail daoq juq bhaqda nee iqsanl ya doevq nail ngaol’ ” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, neivq heeqphaq neq, Yeiqsul bhai meeq nail haol nail meenq pevq nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha hel-aivq khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khaolpoiv bha hevq dal laivq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Naol Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngel haq neq, niilniai nee tev kha ail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
‘Naoq bhai bhi heldaiq
phail nail dai khi,
Miqyail aivq nail
nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai
aivq daoq bivq-ai
thaq nail ngaol.
Naoq nail aqkhil
lovmav bhai
maq ya ga yao-ail dai,
aqyu juq naoq bhai
tsiq nail ngaol’ ” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “ ‘Naol naoq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai jalmul thaq mul’ dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, neivq heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai moe deedee nail gaoqjaoq teevq jaoq nail kovtavq bhai gaoq hevq dal laivq khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jaol khal jiav nail milkhaoq iqsanl khi mail, milkhaoq al juq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail iqsanl, aivq bhai cavq naq bhiq khi, bhi moel-a nail ngaol.
Neivq heeqphaq ge nail: “Naol ngaq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi, uqhuq thaoq lavq haq neq, niil juq iqsanl mail naoq bhai bivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Neivq Saqdaq-ol, dov ail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ‘Naol naoq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai taivq-ail uqhuq ya thaoq khi, aivq nail ganl taivq-ail ya nl nail ngaol’ dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, neivq heeqphaq aivq jaol nail nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai bhi jaq bhi daol khi tsaojao-ai bhiq lee-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq bhai bhi nieivq-a nail ganl Yeiqsul ya gaiq-u phao, aivq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bha ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq Naqsaqlail meenq nee dov ail khi, Gaqliqlail nail ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai jiav nail Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai jaol ail-a nail ngaol. Gaqliqlail nail ngaqkha neq, Seiqbhulloq khi mail Naqtaqlil nail jeq-e nail jaol duq
Ganl al ganl neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq niil daoq bhee lal-a nail ngaol.
“Seiqbhulloq nail
jeq-e nail jaol duq
khi mail Naqtaqlil
jeq-e nail jaol duq bhai
jaol nail juq,
ngaqkha daol jail nail
gailkhaol bhai
jaol nail juq khi mail
Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao
lelkhel bhai jaol nail juq,
yu nail jeq-e jaq-a
jaol nail Gaqliqlail
milkhaoq bhai
jaol nail juq,
nuljuq iqsanl mail
naldaiq yaoq.
Aqnav nail
lavqkhoel bhai
jaol nail tsaol-aq,
kav deedee nail
aqbhaq bhai
ya moel nail ngaol.
Sil nail milkhaoq
khi mail
sil nail aqhaiq
lavqkhoel bhai
jaol nail
tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil,
aqbhaq bhaq
dov lee-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yanq al yanq nee mail dan khi Yeiqsul neq, “Nqtavq Milkhaoq kev lee-aiq nail ngel-i mail, oeqbal noeq pov yaoq” dai, daoq cavq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Gaqliqlail ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai ail thailthaiq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv dai khul nail Silmoq khi aivq nail jaqbheq Aqdaiqlaiq aqyu nvq mail ngaqkha lavqkhoel bhai ovjeel joe thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq mail neq, delgil nieivq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
“Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq. Ngal nul-nq nvq mail delgil nieivq nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq bhai halpov kovq nail tsaol-aq bhi jiovq naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq mail bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq mail teevq pov taivq-ail ovjeel khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul iqmoeq phao gaoq ail-u phao, Seiqbheiqdail nail yaqyov Yaqkov khi aivq nail jaqbheq Yaolhaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq mail neq, aqyu nvq mail nail aqbhu Seiqbheiqdail nee mail, laovq lavqkhoel bhai ovjeel bhuq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul aqyu nvq mail bhai iqsanl, khul-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq mail iqsanl teevq pov taivq-ail laovq khi mail aqyu nvq mail nail aqbhu bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul Gaqliqlail milkhaoq doi dai tsao tsao-ail, aqyu juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq khi, nalgoel mee nia phaq nal nail tsaol-aq juq bhai iqsanl, bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail ganl Sulliv milkhaoq khaoq lao gaiq doi ail-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nalgoel mee nia phaq nal nail juq bhai aivq jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Neivq aol nail tsaol-aq, bhi bhaoq ga nail tsaol-aq, khil sil lavq sil sil nail tsaol-aq, nal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai aqyu juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bhai hel lavq khi, aivq aqyu juq bhai bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq, Deiqgaqbhaollil milkhaoq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq, Yuldav milkhaoq khi mail, Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel nee lal-a nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq gaoqjaoq uqhuq bhai dav lai khi jaoldeel-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail yaqlaol juq iqsanl, aivq jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai niailhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol:
“Aqhaqlal phao haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Noeq haq noeq aoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq bhai bhi noeqsal lal nail ngaol.
Neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, milkhaoq iqsanl mail, aqyu juq bhai ovq nail jaiqbhoil juq pevq nail ngaol.
Tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai, moevq nail sivq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai ya jaq bov ya daol bov nail ngaol.
Gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai ya nail ngaol.
Neema lavqkhoel bhai aqhaol haol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq Miqyail bhai ya moel nail ngaol.
Tsaq lai jil lai dai, nl nail hal nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yu aqyu juq bhai, Miqyail nail yaq dai khul nail ngaol.

Tsaq nail daol nail phaq nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Ngal bhaqda nee yu nuljuq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge lal, khoeq lal jiovq lal, goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi nuljuq nail ganl bhai ge doil lal-u phao, nuljuq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.

Lavqkhiq tsail deedee yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail nuljuq nail kovpavq eeq deedee nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail iqmoeq nee doevq lee-a nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq iqsanl, alhai khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq neq, miltsaq nail cavqdevq pevq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, cavqdevq niail nail phaq deq-ail haq neq, khalhai khi gaoq bhi niail lal nia nail-aiq. Cavqdevq al neq, ganl maq tsoiq nail ngel-i mail, yu hoel ha khi tsaol-aq naoqthaiq naoqthaiq-ail tsao nail taivq-ail ganl tsoiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq neq, miltsaq nail aqbhaq pevq nail ngaol. Gaoqjaoq uqhuq-ai jiav nail meenq bhai maq doeqkhaiq nia-ail.
Al ovqtavq, phalmanq tovq khi, pheeqdeel-i mail movq tsaoq nail aol maq jiav-ail. Phaqyaq mayaq iqsanl mail moel nia dai, daqmoe bha tsiq dav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, nuljuq iqsanl aqbhaq bhaq bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nuljuq-i mail nl nail aqmeeq phaq bhai yu ya moel khi, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu bhai tsiq eeq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail daoq bhai ngal lav cov lee thaq nail dai, thaq noeq. Lav cov lee-a nail maq ngel. Nl bhee lee-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nqtavq khi mail miltsaq khal ivq-u kev dai maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai khal aol nail iqsanl maq bhee lal-u kev dai maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel khe gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq aqgevq gevq yaq teevq gevq iqsanl maq peivq maq boev-ail nia-ail.

Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq niil juq nail lavqkhoel khe, micil cil deel teevq daoq ganav bhai maq tsaothe nail nee ovqtavq, nuljuq bhai iqsanl thaq tsaothe dai, yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai yu nee maqtsil nil jaiq nail gaq ya pevq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, aivq tsaothe nail nee ovqtavq, ‘Nuljuq bhai iqsanl tsaothe yaoq’ dai, yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai, eeq jaiq nail gaq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq nee maqtsil nuljuq tsaq nail daol nail phaq maq aol jaiq haq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ya aol lai-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aq-u khe tsaol-aq juq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail daoq nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. ‘Naol tsaol-aq bhai thaq heivq. Tsaol-aq bhai heivq nail tsaol-aq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.’

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai neema phail nail tsaol-aq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai daq geel-nvq nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail tsaol-aq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maoqbhaoq nl nail munl nail sivtavq bhai, yalkhaq dal nail bhai daq geel-nvq nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai ‘Maq geel-ail’ dai, khaq nail tsaol-aq neq, daqovq laoma bhai daq geel-nvq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naol laol duq kovtavq bhai teevq phaq ganav laol bhiq nail dai khi-u phao, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq teevq gaq ganav naoq bhai oeqbal thaq nail ganl teevq phaq ganav bhai noeq dov lal haq neq,

laol bhiq nail phaq al, laol duq nail sivtavq bhai bhi jiav-ail ceevq khi, kovq ail yaoq. Aqivq jaqbheq al gaq nee iqmoeq lav sav tsaq-ail gaq khi pultavq, kovq lal khi laol bhiq nail phaq al gaoq laol bhiq lal yaoq.

Naoq bhai yalkhaq ge lal nail gaq nee mail, yalkhaq dal nail ilkhaol bhai lai thailthaiq-u phao, nul-nq nvq gaq nail gaiqlaq bhai lavqtsail mail lav tsaq yaoq. Lavqtsail mail maq lav tsaq gaq haq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq naoq bhai, yalkhaq dal nail gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol. Yalkhaq dal nail gaq iqsanl, thaonq bhai heldaiq nail gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi naoq bhai thaonq lavqkhoel bhai laol lavq nail ngaol.
Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Maq khaoq gil mail phul teevq bhaiq khal jail-u kev dai, naol thaonq bhai maldil ya aol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yu nail khaqma bhai thaq bheeq thaq leel dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yaqmai-aq bhai heldaiq khi, bheeq movq leel movq nail neema aol nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel nee yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai bheeq gaq leel gaq-ao nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq nail maivneev lavqmal phao neev naoq bhai bhi heldaiq laiq lavq haq neq, maivneev al neev kevq dov pivq yaoq. Aqmaol maol lao-ail daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq puvq lavq nail nee maqtsil, alsail teevq sail theq-ail nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, naoq nail aqlavq lavqmal lavq naoq bhai bhi nl laiq lavq haq neq, aqlavq al lavq bhai iqsanl, dev ceiv pivq yaoq. Aqmaol maol lao-ail daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq puvq lavq nail nee maqtsil, alsail teevq sail theq-ail nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail khaqma kovq haq neq, kovq nail haoqgavq teevq keiv yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai ya bivq nail ngaol dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai iqsanl, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yu nee mail bheeq-a leel-a nail maq ngel nail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq nail ganl nee, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai kovq haq neq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai yovqgavq-i mail bhi bheeq bhi leel-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Yu nail miqkovq hevq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl yu nail khaqma bhai bheeq-a leel-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Naol maq ngel nail phaq thaq khanq. Naoq-i mail Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai khanq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, naol nl bhee yaoq dai, aq-u khe tsaol-aq juq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai iqsanl, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Teevq peivq-ail thaq khanq. Nqtavq bha juq khi thaq khanq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nqtavq neq, Miqyail nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma pevq nail ngaol.

Miltsaq bhai juq khi thaq khanq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq neq, Miqyail nail aqkhil tsaoq thaq duq pevq nail ngaol. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha juq khi thaq khanq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, meenq al meenq neq, eeq deedee nail heeqphaq nail meenq pevq nail ngaol.
Naoq nail uqhuq bhai juq khi thaq khanq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, uqhuq tsailkheel teevq deeq phul lal dai maqkhaiq, nav-ail dai maqkhaiq, naol maq nl nia-ail.

Naoq nail daoq neq, ngel haq neq, ngel naol. Maq ngel haq neq, maq ngel-ail dai taivq-ail, ge yaoq. A bhai nee pultavq ge jaiq thail jaiq nail daoq neq, haqeiv nail gaq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail daoq pevq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “ ‘Yu nuljuq nail maivneev teevq neev lav cov lavq haq neq, aivq nail maivneev teevq neev lav cov kovq bhiq yaoq’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq khi mail, ‘Yu nuljuq nail aqhaoq teevq haoq deeq ga lavq haq neq, aivq nail aqhaoq teevq haoq gaoq deeq ga bhiq yaoq’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhai nuljuq ya gaiq daiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq bhai aqdoil phaq nl lal-u phao, aqdoil phaq thaq nl kovq bhiq. Yu naoq nail lavqmal phao khe bhaqbha bhai teiv lal haq neq, lavqtsel phao iqsanl tsiq daq bhiq yaoq.
Yu naoq bhai yalkhaq ge khi, naoq nail phailkhaoq lavqkhoel khe keiv oil movq-ai bhiq haq neq, lavqniil phao khe phailkhaoq heelma al keiv iqsanl bivq yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav naoq bhai kav jaq khi, teevq lal eq nail gailkhaol bhai kev dai, bhi tsaothel leevq movq-ai bhiq haq neq, aivq nee mail nvq lal eq nail gailkhaol bha kev dai, al jaiq tsaothel-aivq bhiq yaoq.
Hal nail tsaol-aq bhai bivq yaoq. Phal movq ngaq movq-ail bhiq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl thaq khaonq ha bhiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “ ‘Yovqgavq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a khi, yovqgavq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai neejiav jiav yaoq’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhai, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a khi, nuljuq bhai khoeq lal jiovq lal nail juq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal tsao bhiq yaoq.

Nuljuq alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq khe jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu nail yaq pevq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol meeq tsaol doil nail kovtavq bhai aivq nlma bhi dov lal khi, tsaq nail daol nail juq khi mail maq tsaq maq daol nail tsaol-aq juq nail kovtavq bhai iqsanl aivq maoq-aol bhi aol lee-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai taivq-ail nuljuq gaiq-a haq neq, khul nail geeqlaoq gaoq ya nail-aiq. Khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, alhai gaiq-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai taivq-ail nuljuq aqtsaoq tsaoq khi, daoq ge tsaoq-ail teevq-eel ngel haq neq, yu nee maqtsil nuljuq aqmeeq khul phaq nl jaiq-a nail-aiq. Laolkivq yaq juq iqsanl alhai nl thailthaiq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Alheel ngel-i mail nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu bhee lovq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl bhi bhee lovq lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq aqmeeq phaq nl-u phao, tsaol-aq bhi moel naol dai taivq-ail noeq khi, aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai nl nail phaq thaq bhi pevq. Alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu nail geeqlaoq bhai nuljuq maq ya-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naol haq yaq aoq yaq bhai bivq-u phao, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai thaq nl. Aqyu juq neq, yu bhi tsiqphoiq nail dai khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai maqkhaiq, gailphail lail ma bhai maqkhaiq, yu bhai gul gaiq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq al juq neq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail bivq-a nail geeqlaoq taivq-ail ya nail ngaol.
Naol haq yaq aoq yaq bhai bivq-u phao, yu maq bhi moel dai, lavqmal lavq nl nail, lavqtsel lavq bhai thaq bhi heeq nia.

Naol alhai nl-u phao, yu teevq gaq iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaq maq moel nia nail bhai moel nia nail naoq nail Aqbhu Miqyail naoq bhai geeqlaoq bivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-u phao, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai thaq nl. Aqyu juq neq, yu bhi moel dai, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai maqkhaiq, gailkhaol gail tsil bhai maqkhaiq, thulphaol khi geeqlaoq hal movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq al juq neq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail bivq-a nail geeqlaoq taivq-ail ya nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol geeqlaoq hal-u phao, sunq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi, lolgov pheeqthaiq khi, maq moel lal nail naoq nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Tsaol-aq yaq maq heeq maq moel nia khi ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee heeq nia moel nia nail naoq nail Aqbhu Miqyail naoq bhai geeqlaoq bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-u phao, laolkivq yaq juq neivq thaol thaol nail khe-ai thaq nl. Aqyu juq neq, ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq maodai thaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq daoq maodai thaol nail bhaqda nee, ‘Nvjuq-i mail thaol nail khe-ai ya naol’ dai, noeq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq khe-ai thaq nl. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq loq nail phaq nuljuq maq hal-u nee mail nuljuq nail Aqbhu Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq geeqlaoq niailhai hal yaoq:
‘Nqtavq kovtavq
bhai jaol nail
nvjuq nail Aqbhu-ol.
Naoq nail aqmil bhai
bhi ev dei-eiq.
Naol heeqphaq jiovq khi
uvthaiq nail milkhaoq
bhi kev lee yaoq.
Nqtavq kovtavq bhai
naol neema
tsaq nail phaq
bhee nail khe-ai,
miltsaq kovtavq
bhai iqsanl
bhi bhee lee yaoq.
Yanqgaol loq nail
jaq nail daol nail phaq
yanqgaol nvjuq bhai
bivq lavq yaoq.
Yu nvjuq bhai
nl bheeq lav bheeq
lavq-a nail oeqbal bhai
nvjuq phaiq
bhiq-a nail khe-ai,
nvjuq nail
oeqbal bhai iqsanl
naol phaiq lavq yaoq.
Oeqbal jalmul
mul nail haoqnao
nvjuq bhai
thaq bhi ail lavq.
Haqeiv nail
lavqkhoel nee
nvjuq bhai
bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq.
[Uvthaiq nail phaq,
bhaqaoq khi mail
seiqleiq khaoqsail
iqsanl mail,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
naoq nail ngaol.
Aqmiq]’ ” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yu nuljuq bhai nl bheeq lav bheeq lavq-a nail oeqbal bhai nuljuq phaiq bhiq haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu iqsanl nuljuq-i mail nl bheeq lav bheeq-a nail oeqbal juq bhai phaiq lavq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu-i mail nl bheeq-a nail oeqbal bhai, nuljuq maq phaiq bhiq haq neq, nuljuq nail Aqbhu Miqyail iqsanl nuljuq-i mail nl bheeq-a nail oeqbal bhai maq phaiq lavq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq maq jaq nail aol lav sav-u phao, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai maivphaoq niaq laq khel dai, thaq jaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqyu juq aoq maq jaq dai, jeeq thailthaiq nail ganl, yu bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail dai khi, maivphaoq iqsanl aqjiivq aqcavq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Aqyu juq neq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail bivq-a nail geeqlaoq taivq-ail ya nail ngaol.
Nuljuq maq jaq nail aol lav sav-u phao, maiv puvq puvq haol khi, uqkeiv keiv yaoq.

Alhai nl haq neq, nuljuq maq jaq nail aol nl thailthaiq nail bhai, yu maq heeq nia-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaq maq moel nia nail bhai jaol nail, naoq nail Aqbhu Miqyail moel nia nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, tsaol-aq yaq maq moel nia nail bhai moel nia nail naoq nail Aqbhu Miqyail nuljuq bhai geeqlaoq bivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq yovqgavq nail haqbhoil miltsaq kovtavq bhai phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq thaq halpov jil-ai thaq. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai halpov jil-ai thaq haq neq, haol jaq lai nia, bhoiq jaq lai nia, khoiqbhaoq iqsanl bhaoq lai nia nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq kovtavq bha nuljuq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq halpov jil-ai thaq yaoq. A bhai neq, haol iqsanl maq jaq lai nia, bhoiq iqsanl maq jaq lai nia, khoiqbhaoq iqsanl maq bhaoq lai nia-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq khal halpov jil-ai thaq nail bhai, naoq nail neema jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Maivneev neq, aqmaol nail phalmanq pevq nail ngaol. Maivneev moel nia haq neq, naoq nail aqmaol maol lao-ail, aqbhaq aqmeeq-ai ya nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naoq nail maivneev maq moel nia haq neq, naoq nail aqmaol maol lao-ail navtsee dai, pevq ail nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail aqbhaq al navtsee dai pevq-ail haq neq, aqnav al neq nav deedee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, heeqphaq nvq gaq nail yaqkav maq jiovq nia-ail. Teevq gaq bhai neejiav jiav haq neq, teevq gaq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq bhai ev haq neq, teevq gaq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq Heeqphaq Miqyail nail yaqkav khi mail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq nail yaqkav teevq pov nee, maq jiovq kivq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Khalhai ya jaq ya daol heeq meeq dai, nuljuq aqdoevq doevq nail haqbhoil khaoq thaq laol. Khalhai ya gaq ya doi heeq meeq dai, nuljuq nail aqmaol nail haqbhoil iqsanl khaoq thaq laol. Aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq, jaqjaq daoldaol nee maqtsil phoiq khi, aqmaol iqsanl aqgaq aqdoi nee maqtsil phoiq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Nqtavq phao bhail nail keivq-avq bhai heldaiq yaoq. Keivq-avq al juq neq, gov maq kha, gov maq gaiq, govjil bhai iqsanl gov maq phi bhoel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu keivq-avq al juq bhai bhi jaq bhi daol nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, keivq-avq al juq nee maqtsil phoiq jaiq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khul gaq maqkhaiq, khaoqlaol nail bhaqda nee yovqgavq nail yeel yovqgavq teevq cav heel lal dai, khaq sil gaq nl nia nail-aiq.

Khul khi mail aqgaq aqdoi nail ganl nee nuljuq khaoqlaol nail-aiq. Haqtsoiq bhai doevq nail aqeiv khalhai eeq lal nail ganl bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Aqeiv aqbhaol al juq neq, ganl maq nl-ail. Haqlaq iqsanl maq gaol-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail heeqphaq Saollavmoq-i mail doi nail phoiq deedee nail aqgaq aqdoi neq, aqeiv al teevq eiv dai iqsanl maq heldaiq meeq-ail.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, yanqgaol doevq khi, niaohao miqjaq nail lavqkhoel bhai liv poiv nia nail pavqkhuq lovkhuq bhai Miqyail aqdai dai-ail lav sav meeq bhi haq neq, a dai nee maqtsil nuljuq bhai bhiq gaq bhiq doi lavq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Alheel ngel-i mail, khalhai ya jaq ya daol nail ganl khi mail, khalhai ya gaq ya doi nail ganl bhai khaoq thaq laol.
Laolkivq yaq juq neq, al juq iqsanl bhai halpov nail ngaol. Nuljuq al juq iqsanl bhai loq nail ngaol dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu heeq nia nail ngaol.
Miqyail Milkhaoq khi mail aivq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai iqmoeq halpov yaoq. Alhai halpov haq neq, al juq iqsanl mail aivq nuljuq bhai bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, niaohao nail haqbhoil yanqgaol khaoq thaq laol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niaohao nail haqbhoil niaohao khaoqlaol nail phaq jiav nail ngaol. Khaoqlaol nail phaq neq, teevq n nail haqbhoil teevq n lovq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq thaq. Maq thaq haq neq, nuljuq iqsanl, oeqbal thaq nail bhai maq ya daq-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl oeqbal thaq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Nuljuq yu bhai phaiq bhiq hav bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai iqsanl phaiq kovq hav kovq lavq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail maivneev lavqkhoel bhai aol nail thaiq bhai maq saol-nvq mail, khul khi mail nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq nail maivneev lavqkhoel bhai aol nail maivpeivq bhai heldaiq nail-aiq.

Yovqgavq nail maivneev lavqkhoel bhai thaiq aol khi ngaol-aoq, ‘Naoq nail maivneev lavqkhoel khe aol nail maivpeivq koev dov lavq bhel’ dai, khul khi mail naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai ge bhiq nail-aiq.

Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, naoq nail maivneev lavqkhoel khe aol nail thaiq bhai iqmoeq bavq dov yaoq. Alhai bavq dov gaq haq neq, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq nail maivneev lavqkhoel khe aol nail maivpeivq bhai khalhai ya koev dov bhiq nail-aiq dai, naoq bhai aqmeeq-ai moel lal nail ngaol.

Meeq nail haol nail phaq kheeq bhai thaq bivq. Bivq haq neq, kheeq naoq bhai keivq lal nail ngaol. Laoqpav laolpav nail sainl wavq nail sivtavq bhai thaq liv ha-ai thaq. Liv ha-ai thaq haq neq, wavq sainl al bhai, naoqthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Hal yaoq. Hal haq neq, ya nail ngaol. Halpov yaoq. Halpov haq neq, moel nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai kov yaoq. Kov haq neq, phao lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, hal nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee ya nail ngaol. Halpov nail tsaol-aq iqsanl moel nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai kov nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, lolgov phao lavq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail yaq khaqmul hal nail bhai, lovmav gov bhiq nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq.
Delgil hal nail bhai, eellel nieivq bhiq nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq.

Nuljuq haqeiv nail tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq nail yaq bhai yalkav aqmeeq phaq bivq nail ngaol. A dai nee maqtsil, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu pevq nail Miqyail bhai khal hal nail tsaol-aq bhai aivq aqmeeq phaq bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Yu nuljuq bhai bhi nl lavq movq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl yu bhai alhai nl bhiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, alhai nl haq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl bhee lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Govkhoiq khoiq yaq bhai aol lai yaoq. Luq-ail seil-ail nail gailkhaol nail govkhoiq neq, eeq deedee khi, gailkhaol iqsanl sal laiv dai daol nail ngel-i mail, a bhai aol lai nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mao nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail bhai aol lai nail gailkhaol khi govkhoiq neq, althaiq thaiq deedee nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, halpov moel khi aol lai nail tsaol-aq neq, micil teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail juq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Aqyu juq neq, lavqkhoel phao mao-ail haqeiv nail oelnel pevq khi ngaol-aoq, lavqniil phao neq, yaol yaq nail bavkov doi khi nuljuq jaol nail bha lal nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq-i mail nl nail hal nail bhai heldaiq haq neq, aqyu juq nail neema bhai heeq lal nail ngaol. Aqgoe jiavbuv bhai, aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq ya koevq daiq-a naol laiq. Aqgoe aqbhaol bhai heeqguq aqheeq ya koevq daiq-a naol laiq.
Aqbhaol aqmeeq ngel haq neq, aqheeq aqmeeq heeq lee nail ngaol. Aqbhaol maq meeq haq neq, maq meeq nail aqheeq heeq lee nail ngaol.
Aqbhaol aqmeeq ngel haq neq, maq meeq nail aqheeq maq heeq lee nia-ail. Alhai dul dai, aqbhaol maq meeq haq neq, aqheeq aqmeeq maq heeq lee nia-ail.
Aqheeq aqmeeq maq heeq lee nail aqbhaol yaoq bhaol yaoq-ao nee thul ha khi, miqjaq lavqkhoel bhai bavq poiv nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail juq bhai aqyu juq nl dol hal dol lavq nail bhai heldaiq haq neq, aqyu juq nail neema bhai heeq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngaq bhai, ‘Heeqphaq-ol, Heeqphaq-ol’ dai, khal khul nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail Nqtavq Milkhaoq bhai ya aol lai nail maq ngel-ail. Nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu neema tsaq dai, khal nl nail tsaol-aq juq taivq-ail ya aol lai nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal nail aqn kev lal-u phao, ‘Heeqphaq-ol, Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq naoq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail khi, naol nail haqbhoil gedan nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Naoq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail neivq bhai iqsanl the dov khi, bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail mee nia phaq nl-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq’ dai, tsaol-aq maodai gaq ngaq bhai ge lal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq alhai ge lal-u phao, ‘Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq peivq-ail maq heeq kivq. Haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, ngaq-ai nee pav ail yaoq’ dai, ngal aqyu juq bhai daolcoev dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.”

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal cavq nail cov nail daoq gaiq-u phao, naldaiq khi tsaothe nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, khaqduq aqnavq navq dai duq khi, lovmav kovtavq bhai ilkhaol cov nail, neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Maoq-aol aol lee khi ulcuvq eeq lee-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, ilkhaol al il bhai tsiq thaoq tsiq tuv lal khi ngaol-aoq, ivqdao dai cov-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, ilkhaol al il maq tsuq-ail nia-ail.
Ngal cavq nail cov nail daoq gaiq-u phao, maq naldaiq maq tsaothe nail tsaol-aq neq, tsalhail kovtavq bhai ilkhaol cov nail neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Maoq-aol aol lee khi, ulcuvq eeq lee-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, ilkhaol al il bhai tsiq thaoq tsiq tuv lal-u phao, ilkhaol al il tsuq-ail nail ngaol. Tsuq-ail nail al neq, tsuq peiv tsuq leiv gil-ail nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq-u phao, aivq cavq nail cov nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq deedee ail-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neq, aqyu juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khe-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Bhaqaoq aol nail lavqkhoel nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoqjaoq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, niaoqbhaoq daol nail teevq gaq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, maivphaoq miltsaq bhai gaolbeiv khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, naol nl movq haq neq, ngal haol lal dai, naol nl nia nail ngaol” dai, hal hal-ail khi ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqlavq gaoltsaoq khi, aivq nail kovtavq bhai bavq dav khi, “Ngal nl movq naol. Haol lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail niaoqbhaoq daol nail al peivq-ail gil khi haol lal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul neq aivq bhai, “Ganl niil teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq. Philyaq juq jaol nail bha naoq nail aqmaol bhi heldaiq ail yaoq. Naol haol lal-aoq nail ganl aqyu juq ya heeq nia dai, Molseiq-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, laol bhiq nail phaq laol ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq khi, bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai aol lai-u phao, genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq teevq gaq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, hal hal-ail ge nail:
“Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail yaqkav teevq gaq nal kav khoeq deedee-ai bhiq nail ngel-i mail, maq luv maq lav nia dai, ilkhaol bhai iqthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal lav meeq lee bhiq naol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, genl dev nail aqivq al gaq, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol neq, eeq deedee nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai bhi aol lee nail maq geel-nvq ail. Naol daoq teevq daoq taivq-ail ge khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail yaqkav meeq lai nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal yu nail pul-nvq bhai jaol nail khe-ai, ngaq nail pul-nvq bhai iqsanl, genl dev nail juq jaol nail ngaol. ‘Ail yaoq’ dai, teevq gaq bhai khoel haq neq, aivq ail nail ngaol. ‘Lal yaoq’ dai, teevq gaq bhai khul haq neq, aivq lal nail ngaol. ‘Niil phaq nl yaoq’ dai ngaq nail yaqkav bhai ge bhiq haq neq, aivq nl nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq ail khi, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngal Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl niidai dai-ail neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq maq moel daiq haq-al.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nlma dov khoeq ga khoeq phao jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai jil lal khi, Aqbhaqlaqhaq, Ilcav, Yaqkov nee mail jaoldeel khi, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai, jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, milkhaoq al khaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai ya jaol lai naol dai, noeq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, lavqniil phao navtsee deel jaol duq bhai the ha nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. A bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee nioil khi, haoqgil keivq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, genl dev nail aqivq al gaq bhai: “Naol kovq ail yaoq. Naol neema thaqtsaol nail khe-ai, naoq nail haqbhoil pevq lal dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail yaqkav al gaq meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Bheiqtuvluv nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv nail khoeq-oel aqma coevq sil nail ngel-i mail, iqthaiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq-u phao, aivq coevq sil nail al meeq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, thul khi Yeiqsul bhai aoqbhaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nlma ga bhoel-ail khi nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq maodai yu Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq daoq bivq khi, neivq al juq bhai the dov-a nail nee ovqtavq, nal nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl bhai, bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai nl-a nail neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai bhee lal dai nl-a nail ngaol. Ilsaqyal ge nail:
“Aivq neq,
ngadao nail haqaoq
nalgoel juq bhai oil khi,
ngadao nail nal nail
goel nail juq bhai
phi-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aivq jaol nail teevq jaoq jaoljaoq-ai thaq nail bhai Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, “Ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha ceiv ail bhel” dai, aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq gaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Saqlaq-ol, naol khaq bha ail khi ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq nail haoqnao tsaothel leevq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Kheeqsiv neq, aivq nail aqkhaol bhao nail ngaol. Nqtavq phao bhail nail keivq-avq iqsanl aivq nail aqkheel bhao nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, uqhuq bavq thaq duq maq jiav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol yaoq gaq yaoq gaoq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail aqbhu bhai iqmoeq bhi duq pheeq-ail lavq yaoq” dai, hal nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq. Sil-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai, aqyu juq duq pheeq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul laovq jeeq khi ail-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq iqsanl aivq nee mail laovq jeeq khi ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ngaqkha bhai lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, ulcuvq eelkhaol thaoq deedee nail ngel-i mail, laovq ga nevq-ail heeq phaq-ail pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq aivq bhai lav noeq-ail khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq bhai hevqkovq lavq yaoq. Nvjuq ga nevq heivq gil nail kev lal-aivq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq khul khi mail thoi dai dai-ail geesil nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq thul khi, lilmoel khi mail ulcuvq eelkhaol bhai khaq-u phao, aqtsi tsu dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq neq, khalheel nail tsaol-aq ngel-ail. Lilmoel khi mail eelkhaol iqsanl aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail niil” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai, ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.

Ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha jiav nail Gaqdaqlal milkhaoq bhai ail kev-u phao, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq luqdaol nee dov lee khi mail Yeiqsul bhai hav laq lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq al jaiq-ail haqeiv nail ngel-i mail, gailkhaol al khaol bhai teevq gaq iqsanl maq tsao ceiv tseq-ail.

Aqyu nvq gaq gul gul-ail, “Miqyail nail Yaqyov-ol, naol nv-nvq gaq bhai khalhai tavq nail-aiq. Aqyanq maq kev lal khi ngaol-aoq, nv-nvq gaq bhai khoeq lee jiovq lee-a nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq jaol nail nee mao-ail maq eq nail bhai, wavq mao-ail mao nail teevq munl gavjaq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
“Naol nvjuq bhai the ha lavq nail dai ngal-aq neq, wavq al munl nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi aol ail lavq-o” dai, tsaol-aq al nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail neivq juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.

“Dov ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul neivq al juq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, neivq al juq dov ail khi, wavq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, wavq al juq beivkhaiq bhai tsaoq khal-aivq khi, ngaqkha bhai ga puvq heivq gil-a nail ngaol.

Wavq bhai lovq nail juq neq, meenq lavqkhoel bhai tsaoq kol-aivq khi, khal pevq lal-a nail ganl iqsanl khi mail, neivq aol daiq-a nail tsaol-aq al nvq gaq nail ganl iqsanl ge gaiq bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, meenq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Yeiqsul bhai ya moel dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, “Nvjuq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee mail dov ail lavq yaoq” dai, hal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aivq nail laovq al laovq bhai gaoq jeeq khi, aivq jaol nail meenq bhai kovq ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, iqjial bhai iqthaiq nail khil sil lavq sil sil nail teevq gaq bhai, yu aivq jaol nail bha bal lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq a dai dai-ail neema thaqtsaol nail bhai Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, khil sil lavq sil sil nail al gaq bhai, “Yaqyov-ol, neema ivqdao dai, aol yaoq. Naoq nail oeqbal phaiq gaq-ao nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge nail bhai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq pav ganav juq neq, “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail niil” dai, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai saol-nvq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai saol-nvq thailthaiq nail bhai Yeiqsul heeq nia khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Khul khi mail nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai maq meeq nail phaq noeq thailthaiq nail-aiq.

Daoq khul daoq ge bhiq nail ngaq-aiq jaiq nail-aiq. ‘Naoq nail oeqbal phaiq gaq-ao nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq nail, ngaq-aiq jaiq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, ‘Thul khi tsaol-aivq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq nail, ngaq-aiq jaiq nail laiq.”

Aq-u phao, “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, miltsaq niil nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal phaiq nail bhaqaoq jiav nail ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai bhi heeq bhiq moel nail haqbhoil nl naol” dai, ge khi, khil sil lavq sil sil nail al gaq bhai: “Thul yaoq. Naoq nail iqjial bavq khi, ilkhaol bha kovq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq tsaoq thul khi ilkhaol bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq ganl al bhai ya moel-u phao, geesil lal bhiq khi, tsaol-aq yaq bhai eeq nail bhaqaoq bivq-a nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul a bhai nee iqmoeq phao gaoq ail-u phao, khaon tavq nail ilkhaol bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail Maqthaiq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, aivq tsaoq thul khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul Maqthaiq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai aoq jaoq jaoq khi jaq thailthaiq-u phao, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail, oeqbal yaq maodai lal khi, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail aoq jaoq jaoq khi aoq jaq-a nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq al bhai ya moel-u phao, “Khul khi mail naoq nail saqlaq neq, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail, oeqbal yaq juq nee mail jaol khi jaq tavq daol tavq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Jaol hal dov nail tsaol-aq juq neq, jagaq coev nail saqlaq maq loq-ail. Nal nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail loq nail ngaol.

‘Laol nail sail nail phaq bhai ngal oil movq nail maq ngel. Gaoq haq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai ngal oil movq nail ngaol’ dai, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq nail daoqceevq bhai nuljuq aqmeeq-ai saol duq ail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhai khul nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail maq ngel. Oeqbal yaq bhai khul nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Nvjuq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq neq, maq jaq nail aol nl khi ngaol-aoq, naoq nail yaqlaol juq neq, khul khi mail maq lav sav nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Khaqma hevq nail gaq

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aqgaq aqdoi aqkhail bhai haqphal aqsivq-i mail phaltsaol maq dovq-ail. Dovq haq neq, dovq thaq nail phaltsaol al tsaol, aqgaq aqdoi aqkhail bhai bhi pav-ail nail ngaol. Pav-ail nail al neq, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil pav jaiq-ail nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl haqkov eelpheeq aqlil bhai aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqsivq

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ganl al juq ge bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq nail aqivq teevq gaq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq khi, “Niil aq-il bhai ngaq nail yaqmiq sil-aoq nail ngaol. Naol ngaq nail yaqmiq bhai aqlavq bavq dav lee lavq haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul thul khi, aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail tsaol-aq al gaq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsel-nvq kovq bhee dai, aqsivq dov dov-ail nal thailthaiq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnaol phao ail khi, aivq nail phailkhaoq phail daoq bhai thoiqtsi ail-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Ngal aivq nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai taivq-ail ya thoiqtsi khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail nalgoel niil meeq lai naol” dai, aivq bhai aivq ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq-u phao, aivq bhai moel khi, “Yaqmiq-ol, neema ivqdao dai, aol yaoq. Naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u nee mail aivq meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq nail aqivq gaq nail ilkhaol bhai ail kev-u phao, bhaoqlao jiiv nail tsaol-aq khi mail, tsaol-aq maodai suqsaq thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Dov ail yaoq. Yaqmiq niil gaq sil-a nail maq ngel-ail. Iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai helsil nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al juq bhai bhi dov ail gil khi, Yeiqsul aol lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq yaqmiq al gaq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq-u phao, yaqmiq al gaq thul lal-a nail ngaol.
Ganl al milkhaoq khaoq lao gaiq doi ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul jaol duq al dao nee iqmoeq phao gaoq ail-u phao, maivpeivq nvq gaq aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov-ol. Nv-nvq gaq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a lavq yaoq” dai, mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u phao, maivpeivq al nvq gaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. “Nul-nq nvq gaq bhai ngal lav meeq bhiq nia nail ngaol dai, nul-nq nvq gaq neema thaqtsaol naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Neema thaqtsaol naol, Heeqphaq-ol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq nail maivneev bhai thoiqtsi khi, “Nul-nq nvq gaq neema thaqtsaol nail khe-ai, nul-nq nvq gaq nail haqbhoil pevq lal dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu nvq gaq maivneev moel nia lal-a nail ngaol. “Ganl niil teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq bhi heeq nia dai yaolphaol yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai daoq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu nvq gaq dov ail khi, aqyu nvq gaq bhaqda nee, Yeiqsul nail ganl, milkhaoq khaoq lao gaiq doi ail-a nail ngaol.
Maivneev moel nia lal-a nail al nvq gaq dov ail teevq thaiq, neivq aol nail yaqjaoq teevq gaq bhai, yu Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neivq al maol bhai the dov bhiq gaq-u phao, yaqjaoq al gaq teevq pov taivq-ail daoq ge nia lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, “Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel niailhai nl nia nail phaq teevq thal-iq maq moel daiq haq-al” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Yeiqsul neq, neivq heeqphaq nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail niil” dai, Phaqliqsail juq ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, meenq doi julgu doi dai, Yeiqsul ail khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq bhai daoq cavq daoq cov cov ail-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq khi, nal nail goel nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ya moel-u phao, aqyu juq bhai gaoqhaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq neq, heldaiq phail nail gaq maq jaol nail yaol khe-ai, khaoqlaol nail lavqkhoel nee gaq bhaq deedee nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Gov gaiq mao lal thaq nail maodai jiav khi ngaol-aoq, gaiq nail tsaol-aq micil teevq-eel ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ‘Naoq nail gov govyal bhai gov gaiq nail tsaol-aq maodai bhi lee yaoq’ dai, gov nail ilheel gaq bhai geeqlaoq hal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq bhai khul khi, neivq aqcavq juq bhai the dov nia dai maqkhaiq, nal nail goel nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail lav meeq bhiq nia dai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq bhai bhaqaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nail aqmil neq, niailhai ngaol: Iqmoeq ilmoeq khe gaq neq, Bheiqtuvluv dai khul nail Silmoq khi mail, aivq nail jaqbheq Aqdaiqlaiq, Seiqbheiqdail nail yaqyov Yaqkov khi mail aivq nail jaqbheq Yaolhaq,
Pillilpuv khi mail Bhaqthaollaqmail, Tholmav khi mail khaon tavq nail Maqthaiq, Aqlaqphail nail yaqyov Yaqkov khi mail Taqdail,
Khaqnaqnil nail munl
Yeiqsul gaqkhoel al tsel-nvq gaq bhai daoq niailhai bivq khi, khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol:
“Nuljuq yu nail jeq-e jaq-a jaol nail bha thaq ail. Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq nail meenq juq bhai iqsanl thaq ail.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel khe peivq ail-a nail yaol juq jaol nail bha ail yaoq.
Nuljuq ail thailthaiq-u phao, ‘Nqtavq Milkhaoq kev lee-aiq nail ngaol’ dai, cavq bhiq yaoq.

Nal nail tsaol-aq bhai lav meeq bhiq yaoq. Sil-a nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal yaoq. Niaoqbhaoq daol nail tsaol-aq bhai, bhi meeq bhi haol lal yaoq. Neivq aol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai the dov bhiq yaoq. Nuljuq aqnieivq-ail ya-a nail khe-ai, yu bhai iqsanl aqnieivq-ail bivq yaoq.
Nuljuq nail jiovqpavq bhai, phul heel khi mail giqheel thaq oil bhoel-aivq.

Gailphail nail haqbhoil phalthaoq thaq hal-aivq. Phailkhaoq teevq keiv, saiqnaov teevq gu khi mail joiqniovq teevq khaoq taivq-ail bal-aivq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ganl nl nail tsaol-aq juq neq, jaqjaq daoldaol ya nail geel-nvq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq meenq teevq meenq ganav bhai ail kev-u phao maqkhaiq, julgu teevq gu ganav bhai ail kev-u phao maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhai hav bhoel movq nail tsaol-aq bhai halpov moel khi, a bhai khal jaol-u kev dai, tsaol-aq al gaq nail ilkhaol bhai jaol yaoq.
Ilkhaol teevq il bhai nuljuq aol lai-u phao, ‘Neesal-ovq dei-eiq’ dai, geeqlaoq bivq yaoq.

Ilkhaol al il geel-nvq haq neq, nuljuq nail neesal-ovq nail phaq a bhai bhi jiav-ail ceevq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maq geel-nvq haq neq, nuljuq nail neesal-ovq nail phaq, nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi kovq lee nail ngaol.

A bhai khe jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, nuljuq bhai maq hav-ail, nuljuq nail daoq maq naldaiq haq neq, ilkhaol al il nee maqkhaiq, meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq nuljuq dov ail-u phao, aqkhil pavq-uvq khe khaqlail naoq khal-ail ceevq yaoq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, meenq al meenq neq, Saoldoq meenq khi mail Gaolmaollav meenq nee maqtsil ya daq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Heldaiq dei-eiq. Oelnel nail munl lavqkhoel yaol bhai phaiq bhoel gai-aivq nail khe-ai, ngal nuljuq bhai miltsaq yaq nail lavqkhoel bhai khoel gai-aivq naol. Alheel ngel-i mail, eellel khe-ai aqgeel geel khi, khaoqkhoiq khe-ai, yu bhai maq thoiq maq tsi dai, jaol yaoq.

Aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq bhai pheethaiq khi, yalkhaq dal duq bhai hel-aivq lavq nail tsaol-aq jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq bhai deeq lavq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq ngal bhaqda nee, uvthaiq nail juq khi mail heeqphaq juq nail sivtavq bhai yu hel-aivq lavq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai khi yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail sivtavq bhai nuljuq ngaq nail ganl salkhil ya khanq bhiq nail ngaol.

Yu nuljuq bhai yalkhaq bhi dal nail dai khi, av bhiq-u phao, nuljuq khalhai ya ge ya thail nail meeq dai, khaoq thaq laol. Yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq khalhai ya ge ya thail nail dai, ge lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq-i mail ya ge ya thail nail daoq juq neq, nuljuq nail daoq maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq nail Aqbhu nail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, ge nail daoq pevq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yovqgavq nail mailnail nail gaiqlaq bhai teevq gaq nee teevq gaq sil dai, av bhiq nail ngaol. Aqbhu juq iqsanl yovqgavq nail yaq sil dai, av bhiq nail ngaol. Yaqmiq yaqyov juq iqsanl yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai pheeq khi bhi deeq heivq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aqmil bhaqda nee, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoq loi loi lai-u kev dai, ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Meenq teevq meenq nail lavqkhoel yu nuljuq bhai khoeq lal jiovq lal haq neq, yaoq meenq yaoq bhai tsaol-aivq yaoq. Nuljuq Ilsaqleiqlal nail meenq bhai maq tsao doi-u nee mail, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov lee kev nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol neq, yovqgavq nail saqlaq nee maqtsil maq eeq ail. Yaqkav iqsanl, yovqgavq nail ilheel nee maqtsil maq eeq ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yaqlaol neq, yovqgavq nail saqlaq khe-ai eeq kev lai nia haq neq, neekhaol sil nail tsaq nail ngaol. Yaqkav iqsanl yovqgavq nail ilheel khe-ai eeq kev lai haq neq, neekhaol sil nail, tsaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ilheel gaq bhai neivq heeqphaq Bheiqsaqbhullav dai khul haq neq, aivq nail miqsaol yaq juq bhai neq, a dai nee maqtsil gaoq khul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai thaq geesil. Khal deeq pheeq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol. Khal oil-uvq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai iqsanl heeq kivq duq lal nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq juq, aqbhaq bhaq nail bhai ge bhiq yaoq. Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai khoiq thail bhiq-a nail daoq juq, khaolpoiv bha dav lai khi mailma-ail gul gaiq bhiq yaoq.

Aqmaol bhai heivq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aqhaqlal bhai maq heivq nia nail tsaol-aq juq bhai thaq geesil. Aqhaqlal bhai iqsanl aqmaol bhai iqsanl, daqovq laoma eeltsul nail lavqkhoel bhai lav cov nia nail Miqyail bhai geesil yaoq.
Jaltsil nvq maol bhai phul teevq bhaiq nee gaoq nail maq ngel laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail Aqbhu Miqyail neema maq tsaq haq neq, teevq maol iqsanl miltsaq bhai maq ga heivq lee-ail.
Aivq nuljuq nail uqhuq tsailkheel iqsanl bhai gedaiq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, thaq geesil. Nuljuq neq, jaltsil maodai mao nee maqtsil phoiq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “ ‘Ngal Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol ngaol’ dai, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai ge dov nail khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq, ‘Thoil gaq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol ngaol’ dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu nail sivtavq bhai ngal ge dov naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ‘Ngal Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol maq ngel’ dai, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai jil ha nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, ‘Thoil gaq ngaq nail yaqlaol maq ngel-ail’ dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail, ngaq nail Aqbhu nail sivtavq bhai, ngal jil ha naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lee thaq nail niil dai, thaq noeq. Bhi tsaq bhi jil lai nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail maq ngel. Ngal thaoma bavq khi lee-a nail ngaol.
Aqbhu khi mail yaqyov, yaqmiq khi mail aqma, khiqma khi mail aqma, teevq gaq teevq dao bhi gaoq bhi gail nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail ngaol.
Yovqgavq nail ildaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, yovqgavq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail nee maqtsil yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai gaiq-a jaiq nail gaq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol jiovq nail maq geel-nvq-ail. Ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail nee maqtsil yovqgavq nail yaqmiq yaqyov bhai gaiq-a jaiq nail gaq iqsanl, ngaq nail yaqlaol jiovq nail maq geel-nvq-ail.
Yovqgavq nail lavqyavq yovqgavq bavq khi ngaq nail haoqnao maq tsaothel lavq nail gaq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol jiovq nail maq geel-nvq-ail.

Yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq ya dai halpov nail gaq neq, doevq nail phaq sunq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhi sunq-ail nail gaq neq, doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq bhai khal hav nail tsaol-aq ngaq bhai hav-a nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai hav-a nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai hav-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, yu aivq bhai hav haq neq, hav-a nail gaq iqsanl, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq khe-ai, geeqlaoq ya nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq tsaq nail daol nail ngel-i mail, yu aivq bhai hav haq neq, hav-a nail gaq iqsanl, tsaq nail daol nail al gaq khe-ai, geeqlaoq ya nail ngaol.

Yu nee maqtsil theq jaiq nail, ngaq nail yaqlaol bhai ulcuvq eelcoevq teevq khaoqanq taivq-ail bhi daol-a nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq al gaq nail geeqlaoq teevq thal-iq maq peivq-ail nia ail dai, ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq-u phao, aqjail bhai jiav nail meenq juq bhai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi daoq cavq cavq ail nail haqbhoil a bhai nee dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Khali nl thail hal thailthaiq nail ganl juq bhai, thaonq bhai aol nail ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq ya gaiq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai Khali jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq Yeiqsul bhai: “Lee naol dai, ge nail gaq naol ngaol laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, nvjuq yaoq gaq yaoq bhai ya noeqthunq-ai haq nail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq-i mail khal ya gaiq khal ya moel thailthaiq nail juq, Yaolhaq bhai ge bhiq ail yaoq.

Maivpeivq juq maivneev moel nia lal-a nail ngaol. Aqkhil khil khoi juq tsao nia lal-a nail ngaol. Niaoqbhaoq daol nail juq meeq lal haol lal-a nail ngaol. Naqthaoq juq gaiq nia lal-a nail ngaol. Sil-a nail juq gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Haq nail aoq nail juq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal bhaqda nee neema maq cov nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolhaq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail juq kovq ail jel-u phao, Yeiqsul Yaolhaq nail ganl, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq khul bhai heldaiq ail nail dai khi mail, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai ail-a nail-aiq. Lilmoel bhoe nail ngel-i mail, dao thailthaiq nail lunl aqkhaoq bhai heldaiq ail-a nail laiq.

Maq ngel haq neq, khul bhai heldaiq ail-a nail-aiq. Mao-ail meeq nail aqgaq aqdoi doi-nq thaq nail gaq bhai heldaiq ail-a nail laiq. Maq ngel. Mao-ail meeq nail aqgaq aqdoi doi-nq thaq nail gaq neq, heeqphaq nail jaol duq bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Maq ngel haq neq, khul bhai heldaiq ail-a nail-aiq. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq bhai laiq. Ngel naol. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq bhai heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail gaq ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel.
‘Naoq nail iqmoeq nee
naoq nail haqbhoil
gailkhaol bhi lav
daol-ail nail dai khi,
ngaq nail gaqkhoel
naoq nail iqmoeq nee mail
ngal khoel gai-aivq naol’ dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail al gaq neq, Yaolhaq bhai ge nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaqmai-aq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel nee khal doevq lee-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq teevq gaq iqsanl maq jaol-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail lavqkhoel nil jaiq nail gaq neq, aivq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq dov lee-a nail yanq nee mail yanqgaol kev dai, Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, aqdoil nl bhiq-a nail mee nia phaq bhai daq jel lavq-a nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq milkhaoq al khaoq bhai genl dev gaq nail dai khi, laijai nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq iqsanl maqkhaiq, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Yaolhaq nail yeel bhai kev dai, Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail ganl ge khal thail khal leevq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq naldaiq movq haq neq, lee naol dai, ge-ai thaq nail Eillilya neq, Yaolhaq ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq juq naldaiq yaoq.

Niil yeel khe tsaol-aq juq neq, khul phaq nee tsiq ceiv daiq heeq meeq. Aqyu juq neq, julgu leivkeiv bhai aoltavq tavq nail yaqnoil juq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gul tsaoq pheeljaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
‘Nuljuq nail haqbhoil nvjuq laiqgaiq jiiv khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq bhoeloe maq nioi-ail. Nvjuq nioilkhaoq khaoq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq nioil-ail’ dai, yaqnoil juq gul tsaoq pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, Yaolhaq lee-u phao, aoq maq jaq nail nee ovqtavq, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul maq daol nail ngel-i mail, ‘Aivq neq, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq niil’ dai, nuljuq ge nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov lee-u phao neq, jaq nail daol nail ngel-i mail, ‘Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, al jaiq jaq jel nail tsaol-aq, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul al jaiq-ail daol jel nail tsaol-aq, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khi mail oeqbal yaq juq nee mail aqtsaoq tsaoq nail tsaol-aq niil’ dai, nuljuq ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail neenoeq neekha neq, tsaq nail daol nail ngaol dai, aivq nail ganl bhaqda nee yu ya heeq ya moel nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq-i mail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail ganl nl daiq bhiq-a nail meenq juq, yovqgavq nail oeqbal yovqgavq maq noeq pov nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai niailhai khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Khaollaqseiq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Bheiqjeildaq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq iqsanl geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai nl-a hal-a nail, bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail juq, Dullu meenq khi mail Sildoq meenq lavqkhoel bhai nl-a nail kheel nul neq, aqyu juq aq-u nee mail daqiq doi khi, civqbhaol bhai jaoldeel khi civqbhaol laltsal haiq dav haiq dav-ail, oeqbal noeq pov nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, nuljuq Dullu meenq khi mail Sildoq meenq nee maqtsil ya daq nail ngaol.

Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai nqtavq bha tsiqdav kev lavq naol dai, noeq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq bhai sil nail milkhaoq nail daoqthaoq bha liv bhoel lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai nl-a hal-a nail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail juq Saoldoq meenq lavqkhoel bhai nl-a nail kheel nul neq, meenq al meenq yanqgaol kev dai maq cov-ail dai, jiav nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, nuljuq Saoldoq meenq nee maqtsil ya daq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nqtavq khi mail miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail Aqbhu-ol. Neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq khi aqgeel geel nail tsaol-aq bhai naol ganl niil juq oil tsail-ai thaq khi, yaqnoil khe-ai neema thaq nia nail juq bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai tsiqeeq naol.
Aqbhu-ol, alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai naol neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ngaq nail Aqbhu ngaq bhai av gil lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail maq ngel nail neq, Yaqyov bhai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail. Yaqyov khi mail Yaqyov-i mail phaodaiq bhiq movq nail tsaol-aq maq ngel nail neq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yalkav aqliq phi khi gaq doil doil nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ngal jaol nail bha lal yaoq. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaqnaq bhi naq naol.
Ngaq nail kavbavq bavq khi ngaq bhai saol oil yaoq. Ngal neq, neema thaqtheq nail lavqkhoel neenuq neebeiv aol khi, nuljuq bhai neesal bhi ya naol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail kavbavq neq, bavq meeq khi, ngaq nail yalkav iqsanl aqphai ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul jaol n n-gaol gov gov yal bhai ail pav-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail yaqlaol juq aoq moevq lal bhiq khi, gov gov nail cev
Phaqliqsail juq al bhai ya moel-u phao, “Heldaiq, jaol n n-gaol maq nl khaoq nail phaq naoq nail yaqlaol juq nl thailthaiq-il thoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Daqbhil khi mail aivq nail aqtsaoq juq aoq moevq lal-u phao, khalhai khi-a nail bhai, nuljuq maq ge daiq haq-al laiq.

Aivq Miqyail nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, Philma Philyaq juq maq ngel nail neq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq jaq khaoq nail Miqyail bhai laol bhiq-ai thaq nail khaqmul oil jaq khi, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq bhai iqsanl bhi jaq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Philma juq jaol n n-gaol uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl khi jaol n nail aol nl laiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal maq kev lee-a nail bhai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ge daiq haq-al laiq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq, niai jaol nail ngaol.

‘Ngal laol bhiq nail phaq bhai oil movq nail maq ngel. Ngal gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai oil movq nail ngaol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai nuljuq heeq nia lao-aol kheel nul neq, oeqbal maq aol nail tsaol-aq bhai, nuljuq oeqbal maq thaq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, jaol n n-gaol bhai iqsanl uvthaiq nail Heeqphaq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail khi, al nail aqjail bhai jiav nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.

A bhai aqlavq teevq phao sil thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Phaqliqsail juq Yeiqsul nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq movq-ai bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, “Jaol n n-gaol yu nail nalgoel bhai lav meeq bhiq nail tsaq naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav aivq yaol teevq maol jaol n n-gaol khaqduq bhai ga bhoel-ail haq neq, maq nieivq dov bhiq nail khaq sil gaq jaol nail-aiq.
Tsaol-aq neq, yaol nee maqtsil phoiq jaiq nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, jaol n n-gaol aqmeeq phaq nl nail neq, nl khaoq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, “Naoq nail aqlavq gaoltsaoq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq gaoltsaoq-u phao, aqlavq yaoq phao yaoq khe-ai, meeq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail juq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol nee dov ail khi, khalhai khi Yeiqsul bhai ya heivq heeq dai, maoqbhaoq nl pheeljaq ail-a nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq aivq bhai heivq nail dai, maoqbhaoq nl nail ganl bhai Yeiqsul heeq nia-u phao, jaol duq al dao nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq maodai aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq khi, Yeiqsul aqyu juq iqsanl nail nalgoel bhai bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Ngaq nail ganl yu bhai thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Ganl niil neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhi bhee lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Miqyail ge nail:
‘Ngaq-i mail
tsel dov-ai thaq nail
yaqkav bhai heldaiq yaoq.
Ngal aivq bhai
neekhaol sil khi gaiq-a
deedee nail ngaol.
Ngal ngaq nail Aqhaqlal
aivq nee bhi jaol lee khi,
tsaq nail daol nail
tsaol-aq khalhai khi
pevq lal nail ganl
jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai,
aivq ge daiq
bhiq nail ngaol.
Aivq neq,
khaq pheeljaq nail
phaq maqkhaiq,
gul gul-ail ge nail
phaq maqkhaiq,
maq nl-ail.
Gailphail lail ma bhai
aivq aqthel gul khi
ge nail daoq bhai
teevq gaq iqsanl
maq ya gaiq daiq-ail.
Tsaq nail daol nail phaq
maq gaq lai-u kev dai,
maq khoi ceiv-ail dai,
ga tseq nail
lunl aqkhaoq bhai
aivq maq ngaoq
khoi bhiq-ail.
Miqkhoiq taivq-ail
doi thailthaiq nail
phalmanq bhai
aivq maq lav miv-ail.
Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail
aivq bhai noeqthunq
