deedee nail ngaol’ dai,
ge-ai thaq ngaol” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, neivq aol lai-a nail ngel-i mail, daoq maq ge nia dai, maivpeivq peivq ail-a nail teevq gaq bhai, yu Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai lav meeq bhiq-u phao, daoq ge nia lal khi maivneev moel nia lal-a nail ngaol.
Alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, Daqbhil nail Yaqyov ngel lao thaq nail meeq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Phaqliqsail juq ya gaiq-u phao, “Aivq neq, neivq heeqphaq Bheiqsaqbhullav nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail neenoeq bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Milkhaoq khul khaoq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail gaiqlaq bhai munl bhoilpav khi, maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol. Meenq maqkhaiq, ildaoq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail gaiqlaq bhai munl bhoilpav khi, maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, maodai maq ivq-ail.
Alhai dul dai, neivq Saqdaq neq, aivq uvthaiq nail neivq juq bhai the dov haq neq, aivq bhai aivq lav pav nail ngaol. Alhai nl haq neq, aivq uvthaiq nail milkhaoq khalhai khi ivq nia nail-aiq.

Ngal Bheiqsaqbhullav nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail ngel haq neq, nuljuq nail tsaol-aq juq khaq sil gaq nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail-aiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq ge nail maq tsaq-ail dai, aqyu juq yalkhaq dal lal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail ngel haq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.

Gaq mao-ail kav nail gaq bhai iqmoeq maq pheethaiq haq neq, teevq gaq iqsanl aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, aivq nail yalkav maq oil lai nia-ail. Gaq mao-ail kav nail al gaq bhai iqmoeq pheethaiq haq neq, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, aivq nail yalkav oil lai kivq nail ngaol.
Ngal jaol nail phao maq jaol nail tsaol-aq neq, ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail phao jaol nail ngaol. Ngaq-ai nee maq gov jil nail tsaol-aq neq, gov ha nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail nl bheeq-a nail oeqbal iqsanl khi mail, khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail oeqbal phaiq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail phaq bhai oeqbal maq phaiq lavq-ail.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail khul gaq nail oeqbal bhai maqkhaiq, phaiq bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail khul gaq nail oeqbal bhai maqkhaiq, yeel niil yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, yaqhao khe yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, maq phaiq bhiq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aqbhaol aqmeeq ngel haq neq, aqheeq iqsanl aqmeeq ngaol. Aqbhaol maq meeq haq neq, aqheeq iqsanl maq meeq-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqheeq bhai heldaiq haq neq, aqbhaol bhai heeq lal nail ngaol.

Mao-ail haqeiv nail eellel khe-ai dul nail yaq juq-ol, nuljuq haqeiv nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, daoq aqmeeq khalhai khi ge nia heeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, neema lavqkhoel bhai teevq bhee aol nail khe-ai, moeqthaoq ge dol lavq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq aqmeeq neq, yovqgavq nail aqmeeq phaq oil bhoel nail aqduq nee mail, aqmeeq phaq oil dol lavq nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq neq, yovqgavq nail haqeiv nail phaq oil bhoel nail aqduq nee mail haqeiv nail phaq oil dol lavq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq-i mail ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq khal ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol Miqyail bhai ya ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, naol oeqbal aol nail laiq, maq aol nail laiq dai neq, naoq nail daoq bhai heldaiq khi yalkhaq dal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq, “Saqlaq-ol, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nvjuq bhai nl daiq lavq-ai thoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Mao-ail haqeiv nail bheeq nail leel nail yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq hal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Yaolnav nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq maq ngel nail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq ngal nuljuq bhai maq nl daiq bhiq-ail.
Yaolnav delgil maol ma nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai hail n hail kivq ya jaol-a nail khe-ai, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov iqsanl miltsaq lavqkhoel bhai hail n hail kivq ya jaol nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, Nilnaqbheiq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq nee mail thul lal khi, yeel niil yeel nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yaolnav-i mail daoq cavq daoq cov cov bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq oeqbal noeq pov-a nail ngaol. Niilniai, Yaolnav nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail gaq jaol nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, pul-nvq phao jiav nail milkhaoq khe heeqphaqma niil yeel khe tsaol-aq nee mail thul lal khi, yeel niil yeel nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neenoeq neekha mao-ail eeq nail heeqphaq Saollavmoq nail daoq naldaiq lal nail dai khi mail, nqjail miljail nee mail aivq lal thaq nail ngaol. Niilniai, Saollavmoq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail gaq jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Neivq aqcavq teevq maol tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, geelee deldeel jaol duq bhai gaqnaq naq duq halpov ail-u phao, maq halpov moel-al.

Aq-u phao, ‘Ngaq-i mail dov lee-a nail ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai kovq lai naol’ dai, ge khi kovq lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq kovq kev lai-u phao, ilkhaol al il aqmeeq-ai lav sav-ai thaq nail nee ovqtavq, yavphail-ai thaq khi aqnieivq-ail jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nee maqtsil haqeiv jaiq nail neivq sivq maol bhai khul ail khi, jaol lai-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq nail haqbhoil iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil haoqnao khe pov neq, khoeq jaiq nail ngaol. Mao-ail haqeiv nail yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl alhai pevq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, aivq nail aqma khi aivq nail jaqbheq juq aivq bhai daoq ge tsaoq movq nail ngel-i mail, lavq niil phao thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail aqma khi mail naoq nail jaqbheq juq naoq bhai daoq ge tsaoq movq nail ngel-i mail, lavqniil phao thulphaol thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq Yeiqsul bhai ge gaiq bhiq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Ngaq nail aqma khi mail ngaq nail jaqbheq juq neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, aivq bhai ge gaiq lai bhiq-a nail al gaq bhai Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai lavqnoil tsiqtsoe khi ge nail: “Ngaq nail aqma khi mail ngaq nail jaqbheq juq bhai heldaiq yaoq.
Nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu neema tsaq dai, khal nl nail tsaol-aq ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq khi ngaq nail aqma ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol, Yeiqsul ilkhaol nee dov ail khi, ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai jaoldeel ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha maodai jil lal-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq laovq lavqkhoel bhai jaoldeel ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq neq, ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail ganl mee nia phaq aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail: “Aq-u phao, aqiq haiq nail teevq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n kev lee-u phao, aivq aqiq haiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq haiq-u phao, aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, gailkhaol kovtavq bhai ga ail-a nail ngel-i mail, keivq-avq lee khi aqiq al juq bhai gov jaq gil-a nail ngaol.
Aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, miltsaq bhaq nail lovmav lovyal bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq aqbhaq ngel-i mail, lavqtsail mail aqjiiv jiiv dol lavq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoqtsail maq kha navq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, nlma dov lal-u phao, nltsal mailma-ail kav nail bhaqda nee khuq-ail kov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, aqgoe goeyal bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. Aqgoe jiavbuv eeq lal khi, aqjiiv al bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, miltsaq mil meeq bhai ga ail khi aqheeq heeq lee-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, teevq yal bhoil, teevq pav ganav juq neq, kovq tsel bhoil, teevq pav ganav juq neq, hail tsel bhoil dai, heeq lee-a nail ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Naol khul khi mail tsaol-aq al juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq yuq yuq-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail ganl oiltsail-ai thaq nail juq bhai nuljuq heeq nia lal-aoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neq, maq heeq nia lal haq-al.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bivq laoq khi, gaoq jiav jaiq lal nail ngaol. Maq jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, aqyu juq-i mail khal jiav nail juq bhai, oil dov gil nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq heldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, maq heldaiq moel nia, naldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, maq gaiq nia nail nee ovqtavq, maq gov heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq yuq yuq-ail, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail:
‘Nuljuq ya gaiq
khi ngaol-aoq,
maq gov heeq nia-ail.
Ya moel khi ngaol-aoq,
maq heeq nia-ail.
Khul khi mail
dai ngal-aq,
tsaol-aq niil jeq-e
niil jaq-a neq,
neema aqgaol gaol
lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq maq
naldaiq movq-ail.
Maivneev iqsanl
maiv khul-ai
thaq nail ngaol.
Alhai maq ngel-ail
nul neq, aqyu juq
ngal jaol nail bha
kovq lal nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq bhai
bhi meeq lai nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao,
aqyu juq maivneev
moel nia lal khi,
naqkhaol gaiq nia
lal nail ngaol.
Neema lavqkhoel
bhai iqsanl,
noeq heeq nia
lal nail ngaol’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq nuljuq neq, maivneev moel nia khi, naqkhaol gaiq nia nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail juq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq khi mail aq-u khe Miqyail nail tsaol-aq maodai moel movq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya moel-al. Nuljuq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail phaq gaiq movq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya gaiq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aqiq haiq nail ganl daoqma uqhuq daoq nail daoqceevq bhai naldaiq yaoq.

Gailkhaol kovtavq bhai ga-ai thaq nail aqiq dai ge nail neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl ya gaiq khi maq gov heeq nia haq neq, haqeiv nail gaq lal khi aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai haiq-ai thaq nail aqiq bhai gov ha gil nail bhai ge movq nail ngaol.
Lovmav lovyal bhai ga ail-a nail aqiq dai, ge nail neq, Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail lavqkhiq tsail nail lavqkhoel nee hav bhoel-a nail tsaol-aq bhai ge movq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoqtsail maq kha ivq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, teevq yanq maq ngel nail neq, maq doevq nia-ail. Daoq al daoq bhaqda nee, haq nail aoq nail phaq khi mail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq kev lee-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail khaonq ha gai-aivq nail ngaol.

Aqgoe goeyal bhai ga ail-a nail aqiq dai ge nail neq, Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, khaoqlaol nail phaq khi mail, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq neq, daoq al daoq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aqheeq maq heeq lee nia nail tsaol-aq bhai, ge movq nail ngaol.

Miltsaq mil meeq bhai ga ail-a nail aqiq dai ge nail neq, Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq-u phao, gov heeq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai ge nail ngaol. Alheel nail tsaol-aq neq, aqheeq maldil heeq lee nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, teevq yal bhoil, teevq pav ganav juq neq, kovq tsel bhoil, teevq pav ganav juq neq, hail tsel bhoil dai, heeq lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq yaoq daoq yaoq nee mail Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail ganl niailhai gaoq cavq gaoq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail gov gov yal bhai gov gov iq aqmeeq haiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqthaiq nail yanq bhai aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail gaq lal khi, gov haiq-ai thaq nail bhai hubhil haiq khoiq-ail ceevq khi kovq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Gov meeq lal khi gov bhoiq gov dov dov lal-u phao, hubhil iqsanl doevq lal thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ilheel gaq nail yaqkav juq ilheel gaq bhai niailhai ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol: ‘Naoq nail gov gov yal bhai aqiq aqmeeq haiq-a nail maq ngel laiq. Khul khi mail hubhil doevq lal-a nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

‘Ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail gaq-i mail haiq khoiq lal thaq nail niil’ dai, ilheel gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. ‘Nvjuq bhai hubhil al juq bhai bhi gaol ha-ail movq-ail laiq’ dai, yaqkav al juq gaoq naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Alhai thaq khi-ail. Nuljuq hubhil gaol ha-u phao, gov iqsanl gaol ha nail bhao nail ngaol.

Gov gaiq nail yanq kev lal-u phao kev dai, nvq phaq nvq phaq-ail bhi eeq lal yaoq. Gov gaiq nail yanq kev lal haq neq, hubhil bhai iqmoeq gaiq khi miqjaq bhai bavq poiv kivq dai, aqjeeq jeeq thaq-ai yaoq. Gov bhai neq, ngaq nail govjil bhai phi bhoel thaq-ai yaoq dai, gov gaiq nail juq bhai ge bhiq naol’ dai, ilheel gaq ge nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq yaoq daoq yaoq nee gaoq cavq gaoq cov bhiq-a nail: “Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail yalgaol bhai haiq-ai thaq nail gaoqpavq aqneev khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Gaoqpavq aqneev al neq, aqneev iqsanl nee maqtsil nil khi ngaol-aoq, eeq lal-u phao, heeqlaoq gaoqjal iqsanl nee maqtsil eeq lal khi, aqbhaol bhaol ma ma lal nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nqtavq phao bhail nail keivq-avq juq lavqmeiv bhai deivq lee khi aqkheel kheel lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq yaoq daoq yaoq nee gaoq cavq gaoq cov bhiq-a nail: “Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, deqtsiq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq deqtsiq oil khi, khaqmul lav sav nail tsoelthoel hail deel bhai oil kheq khi mail, iqsanl bhai bhi bhaonq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl al juq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq yuq yuq-ail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Daoqma uqhuq daoq nee maq ngel nail neq, aivq aqyu juq bhai maq cavq maq cov bhiq-al.
Aivq alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhi bhee lal-a nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq,
“Ngal moeqthaoq
gaolpav khi,
daoqma uqhuq daoq
ge daiq bhiq naol.
Miltsaq maq
teivq-u nee mail,
oil tsail-ai
thaq nail phaq
ngal phaodaiq
bhiq naol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma jaol nail nee dov ail khi ilkhaol bha aol lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Gov gov yal bhai haiq khoiq-a nail hubhil nail ganl daoqma uqhuq daoq nail daoqceevq ge lavq-o” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Gov gov iq aqmeeq haiq-a nail gaq neq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai ge nail ngaol.

Gov gov yal neq, miltsaq niil heeq ngaol. Gov gov iq aqmeeq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ge nail ngaol. Hubhil neq, haqeiv nail gaq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ge nail ngaol.

Hubhil haiq khoiq-a nail neejiav jiav nail al gaq neq, neivq heeqphaq ngaol. Gov gaiq nail aqn neq, miltsaq niil haoqnao naosaq khe yanq bhai ge nail ngaol. Gov gaiq nail juq neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel juq ngaol.
Hubhil bhai gaiq khi miqjaq-i mail kheq ha nail khe-ai, miltsaq niil haoqnao naosaq nail yanq bhai, alhai pevq lal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq bhai khoel-ai leevq khi, yu bhai bhi nl bheeq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee khi mail, haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai aivq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee, bhi hevq dov nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq bhai miqjaq jaibhoil lavqkhoel bhai bavq poiv nail ngaol. A bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel, nioil khi haoqgil keivq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqyu juq nail Aqbhu Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai, nlma khe-ai aqbhaq bhaq nail ngaol. Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, daiyal bhai duq pheeq-ai thaq nail aqphoiq mao-ail kav nail phul phul duq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Phul phul duq bhai moel-a nail gaq gaoq duq pheeq-ail ceevq khi lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail lavqkhoel, aivq khal jiav nail iqsanl gaoq ha khi, daiyal al khoeq bhai ul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Al ovqtavq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, mailma-ail meeq nail laoqpav laolpav nail sainl bhai halpov thailthaiq nail jaiqgaiq gaiq nail teevq gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aivq mao-ail phoiq nail laoqpav laolpav nail sainl teevq heeq bhai halpov moel-u phao, kovq ail khi aivq khal jiav nail phaq iqsanl mail gaoq ha gil khi, sainl al heeq bhai ul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Al ovqtavq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, iqyaq iqma bhai joe puvq gai-aivq-u phao, delgil yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai phee lai nail ovjeel khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Delgil maodai joe ya-u phao, delgil nieivq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, ovjeel bhai iqyaq iqma daolbhaq bhai he dol lavq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, jaoldeel khi delgil aqmeeq juq bhai neq, pheeqdeel lavqkhoel bhai tsel bhoel khi ganl maq tsoiq nail delgil juq bhai neq, tsel ha nail ngaol.
Miltsaq niil haoqnao naosaq nail yanq, alhai pevq lal nail ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel juq dov lee khi, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq khi haqeiv nail tsaol-aq bhai tselpav nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, haqeiv nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, miqjaq jaibhoil lavqkhoel bhai bavq poiv nail ngaol. A bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nioil khi haoqgil keivq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ganl niil juq iqsanl mail nuljuq gov heeq-ao naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq-u phao, “Gov heeq-ao naol” dai, yaqlaol juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Alheel ngel-i mail, Nqtavq Milkhaoq khe yaqlaol pevq lal-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, ilheel gaq aivq nail nlmaoq oil thaq duq nee mail, nlmaoq aqsivq khi mail aqlil oil dov nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq al daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq-u phao, a bhai nee dov ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail jaolkhaoq jaollaoq bha kovq ail khi, aqyu juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail khi ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq niilheel nail neenoeq neekha khi mail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail juq khaq bha khe ya thaq nail ngel-aiq.

Aivq neq, aqbhaol thoiq nia nail al gaq nail yaqyov maq ngel-ail laiq. Aivq nail aqma neq, Maqlil dai khul nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Yaqkov, Yaolsai, Silmoq khi mail Yuldav neq, aivq nail jaqbheq juq maq ngel-ail laiq.
Aivq nail nailma juq iqsanl, ngadao juq nee jaol nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai phal-iq, tsaol-aq niil gaq niilheel nail bhaqaoq khaq bha khe ya thaq nail meeq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhaqda nee, neema cov nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq bhai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail thaqeeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail jaolkhaoq jaollaoq khi mail ilkhaol khe juq neq, aivq bhai maq thaqeeq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, a bhai neq, bhaqaoq eeq nail phaq micil taivq-ail nl bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yanq al yanq bhai, Yeiqsul nail aqmil dov nail ganl Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai uvthaiq nail heeqphaq Heiqlol Aqgilpav ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nial. Aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal thaq nail ngel-i mail, bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail al juq nl dol lavq nia nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl al neq, niailhai ngaol. Jel lal-u phao, Heiqlol neq, yovqgavq nail jaqbheq Pillilpuv nail khaqma Heiqloldil bhai hevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq bhaqda nee, aivq Yaolhaq bhai bhi nieivq-ail khi thaonq bhai bhi laol-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, “Naol yaqmai-aq thoil gaq bhai hevq nail neq, maq tsaq-ail” dai, Yaolhaq Heiqlol bhai mee nia pov ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Heiqlol Yaolhaq bhai heivq movq khi ngaol-aoq, milkhaoq yaq juq bhai geesil nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yaolhaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol dai, milkhaoq yaq juq saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Teevq n neq, Heiqlol doevq lee-a nail aqn bhai noeq kev khi bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, Heiqloldil nail yaqmiq tsaol-aq a dai nail sivtavq bhai bhoeloe nioi daiq bhiq-a nail bhai Heiqlol neekhaol sil deedee nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Naol khal hal nail khe-ai, ngal naoq bhai bivq naol” dai, Heiqlol yaqmiq al gaq bhai khanq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmiq al gaq neq, aivq nail aqma-i mail ge bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, “Ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nail uqhuq, thailphail phail ma bhai oil bhoel khi niil aq-il bhi tsil lavq yaoq” dai, hal-a nail ngaol.

Heiqlol noeqhaq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail khanq-ai thaq nail daoq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, aivq nee mail jaol khi jaq thailthaiq nail daq-i juq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, “Yaqmiq thoil gaq hal nail khe-ai nl bhiq yaoq” dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq yu bhai khoel gai-aivq khi, thaonq bhai aol nail Yaolhaq nail uqhuq bhi dev ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.
Uqhuq al, thailphail phail ma bhai oil bhoel khi, yaqmiq al gaq bhai tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmiq al gaq iqsanl, aivq nail aqma bhai tsiq bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol juq lal khi, aivq nail aqmaol bhai duqpheeq ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, ganl al Yeiqsul bhai ge gaiq lai bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Yaolhaq nail ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, jaol duq al dao nee laovq jeeq khi, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail bha ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ail-a nail ganl tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq heeq nia-u phao, aqkhil tsao tsao-ail meenq nee mail dov ail khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul laovq nee mail dov lal-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq aqyu juq bhai gaoqhaq khi, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe nal nail tsaol-aq juq bhai lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Kivq hail hail lee-u phao, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Niilniai neq, haqtsoiq haqyal niil, nqkivq iqsanl kivq lee-aiq nial. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma niil juq bhai phaiq kovq bhiq khi, julgu doi dai jaqjaq daoldaol bhi ul jaq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Aqyu juq ail nail maq loq-ail. Nuljuq aqyu juq bhai bhi jaq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nvjuq neq, khaqmul ngaq heeq khi mail delgil nvq maol aol-ail teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Al juq ngal jaol nail bha oil lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Daikhaoq aqsal nail bhai jaoldeel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul khaqmul al ngaq heeq khi mail delgil al nvq maol oil khi aivq nqtavq phao gaollel khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al ngaoqpav khi, yaqlaol juq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq iqsanl tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail teevq bov jaq gaq khi, maq jaq gil-ail jaiq lal-a nail juq bhai yaqlaol juq gov kovq daiq-u phao, pheeqdeel nee mail tsel-nvq deel bhee nail ngaol.
Jaq-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yaqmai-aq khi mail yaq juq maq saol-nvq dai, ngaq hinl gaq niidai bhee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai: “Nuljuq laovq jeeq khi, ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha ngaq nail iqmoeq nee ceiv ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai bhi kovq ail gil gaq-u phao, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail geeqlaoq hal nail dai khi, gaoqjaoq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol. Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail, a bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yaqlaol juq-i mail jeeq-nq thaq nail laovq al laovq iqsanl, ngaqkha gaoltsi bhai ail kev khi, lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal-a nail ngel-i mail, ulcuvq eelkhaol laovq bhai tsiq thaoq tsiq tuv deedee nail ngaol.
Yavphoil doil thao phao naqli hail lavq niidai jel ail-u phao, Yeiqsul ulcuvq kovtavq bhai gailkhaol tsao tsao-ail, yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ulcuvq kovtavq bhai gailkhaol tsao tsao-ail lee nail bhai yaqlaol juq ya moel-u phao, geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Teevq phaq ganav nail aqheel khul-il” dai, noeq khi, geesil nail lavqkhoel nee gul deedee nail ngaol.
“Neema ivqdao dai, jaol yaoq. Ngal ngaol. Nuljuq thaq geesil” dai, teevq pov taivq-ail Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, naol ngel haq neq, ngaq bhai ulcuvq kovtavq bhai tsao tsao-ail naol jaol nail bha bhi lal lavq yaoq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, “Lal-aiq thoil” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv laovq nee mail dov ail khi, ulcuvq kovtavq bhai tsao tsao-ail, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lai-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal nail bhai Bheiqtuvluv ya moel-u phao, geesil nail neema aol lal bhiq khi, ulcuvq bhai ga nevq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq bhai hevqkovq lavq yaoq” dai, aivq mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.

Teevq pov taivq-ail, Yeiqsul aqlavq gaoltsaoq khi, aivq bhai he dov bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Neema thaqtsaol nail phao, gaq bhaq nail gaq-ol. Khul khi mail naol pov pov lav lav-ail noeq nail-aiq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq laovq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u phao, lilmoel maq bhoe dai, naq lai-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, laovq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail yaqlaol juq, Yeiqsul bhai uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail, “Naol neq, maldil Miqyail nail Yaqyov nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bhai ceiv ail khi, Geiqneiqsaqlail dai khul nail dao bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.
A bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, Yeiqsul niil dai, heldaiq heeq nia-u phao, milkhaoq doi dai khoel gai-aivq khi, nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha bhi hel lavq-a nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai taivq-ail ngaol-aoq, bhi thoiqtsi lavq yaoq” dai, nal nail tsaol-aq al juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol. Khal thoiqtsi-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lee khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Khul khi mail naoq nail yaqlaol juq, aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq bhai maq naldaiq dai, nl bheeq-a nail-aiq. Aqyu juq aolsaolkovq jiav nail khe-ai aqlavq maq tsiq mail, aoq jaq il thoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail nuljuq yovqgavq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq bhai thaoq kivq dai, Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai nl bheeq nail-aiq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail neq, ‘Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev yaoq. Yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai iqkhail yavq nail gaq neq, heivq nail bhai ya daq naol’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq niailhai cavq nail cov nail ngaol: Khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai, ‘Ngaq-i mail khal jiav nail, naoq bhai bivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq, Miqyail bhai danq bhiq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge gaq haq neq,

yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev nail maq loq-ail dai, nuljuq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail lavqkhoel nee, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail aolsaolkovq bhai thaoq nia dai, Miqyail nail daoq bhai aqdeq bhi deq ail-a nail ngaol.
Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Ilsaqyal-i mail nuljuq nail ganl Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan-ai thaq nail neq, tsaq deedee-ail nial. Aivq ge nail:
‘Tsaol-aq niil jeq-e
niil jaq-a neq,
moeqthaoq ngaq bhai
ev khi ngaol-aoq,
neema neq,
ngaq-ai nee eqyal yal
deedee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ngal bhai
uqhuq thaoq nail neq,
khul teevq phaq-ail
ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
tsaol-aq-i mail
thaoq khal
leevq thaq nail
aolsaolkovq bhai,
ngaq nail daoq dai,
saol-nvq khi,
cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail
ngel-i mail ngaol’ dai,
Ilsaqyal ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.”
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai gaoq khul jil khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq iqsanl mail aqmeeq-ai naldaiq khi, niilniai heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee aol ail nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail maq ngel-ail. Moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Naoq-i mail ge-a nail daoq al juq Phaqliqsail juq ya gaiq-u phao, neema phail nail bhai, naol heeq kivq naol laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu-i mail maq kha-ai thaq nail aqbhaol yaoq bhaol yaoq-ao nee mail, gaol ha nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq nail haqbhoil khaoq thaq laol. Aqyu juq neq, maivpeivq peivq khi ngaol-aoq, gailkhaol hevq daiq bhiq nail tsaol-aq jiovq nail ngaol. Maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq-i mail maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq bhai gailkhaol hevq daiq bhiq haq neq, nvq gaq nvq gaq-ail khaqduq bhai ga bhoel-ail nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv neq, “Daoqma uqhuq daoq al daoq nail daoqceevq nvjuq bhai ge lavq-o” dai, hal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Niil aq-il kev dai, nuljuq maq gov heeq haq-al laiq.
Moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee khal aol ail nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai aol kev ail khi, lavqniil dov ha gil nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail phaq neq, neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail ngaol. Al juq neq, tsaol-aq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail phaq ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, haqeiv nail phaq saol-nvq nail, tsaol-aq bhai heivq nail, yu nail miqyaq yovyaq bhai bheeq nail, khaqmiq sev nail, yu nail yalkav bhai khoiq nail, maq tsaq nail salkhil khanq nail khi mail yu bhai ge doil nail niil juq neq, neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail ngaol.

Niil juq neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail phaq ngaol. Aqlavq maq tsiq dai aoq jaq nail neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail phaq maq ngel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail khi, Dullu meenq khi Sildoq meenq phao ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, milkhaoq al khaoq bhai jaol nail, Khaqnaq nail jeq-e jaq-a yaqmai-aq teevq gaq dov lal khi, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq. Ngaq nail yaqmiq neivq aol lai khi ya daq deedee nail ngaol” dai, mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul daoq teevq daoq iqsanl maq ge kovq bhiq-al.
Aivq nail yaqlaol juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Yaqmai-aq al gaq, ngadao nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail gul thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai bhi kovq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel khe peivq ail-a nail yaol juq jaol nail bha taivq-ail, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq lal khi, aivq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail, “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, “Yaq nail aoq tsiq khi, kheeq bhai bhi jaq nail maq tsaq-ail” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Heeqphaq-ol, naol ge nail tsaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, kheeq neq, ilheel gaq-i mail kovqkhail kov-uvq bhai jaq khal-ai thaq nail juq bhai, mevq jaq nail ngaol” dai, yaqmai-aq al gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, “Yaqmiq-ol, naol neema thaqtsaol deedee-ail nial. Naol bhi pevq lal movq nail khe-ai, naoq nail haqbhoil pevq lal dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail aivq nail yaqmiq meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul jaol duq al dao nee dov ail khi, Gaqliqlail ngaqkha bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq gaoqjaoq bha dav lai khi, jaoldeel-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq lal-u phao, khil khoi lavq khoi khoi nail tsaol-aq, aqkhil maq meeq nail tsaol-aq, maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq, yaqjaoq juq khi mail, nal nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq bhai iqsanl, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai hevq thaq, bavq thaq, lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yaqjaoq juq daoq ge nia lal-a nail ngaol. Aqkhil maq meeq nail juq, meeq lai-a nail ngaol. Khil khoi lavq khoi khoi nail juq, gailkhaol tsao nia lal-a nail ngaol. Maivpeivq juq maivneev moel nia lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq al bhai ya moel-u phao, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov dai pevq ail khi, Ilsaqleiqlal nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq niil juq bhai ngal gaoqhaq-ail nial. Aqyu juq ngaq-ai nee mail jaol-a nail hail n bhee lal khi, khul teevq phaq iqsanl jaq nail maq jiav-aoq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq bhi jaq dai, ngal maq bhi kovq ail movq-il. Bhi kovq ail haq neq, gailphail lail ma bhai aqyu juq gaq juq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Niilniai neq, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail haqtsoiq haqyal ngaol. Tsaol-aq niidai mao nail bhai bhi jaq bhi daol nail haqbhoil jaqjaq daoldaol khaq bha halpov ya ail heeq” dai, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq khaqmul khadai heeq aol nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq-u phao, “Khaqmul sivq heeq khi mail delgil micil aol naol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Miltsaq bhai jaoldeel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq khaqmul al sivq heeq khi mail delgil al oil khi Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq gaq al nee ngal-aq, ngaoqpav khi yaqlaol juq bhai tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq iqsanl, tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq bhai bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail teevq bov jaq-a nail nee ovqtavq, jaiq lal-a nail juq bhai gov kovq daiq-u phao, pheeqdeel nee mail sivq deel bhee nail ngaol.
Jaq-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yaqmai-aq khi mail yaqnoil juq maq saol-nvq mail liq hinl gaq bhee nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai bhi kovq ail khi, aivq neq, laovq jeeq khi Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail juq khi mail Saqduqgail juq Yeiqsul bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, “Nqtavq kovtavq khe bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl daiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, nqtavq aqnel nel haq neq, niaohao nqtavq aqmeeq nial dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nqhao phao, nqtavq aqnel nel khi, nqtavq navtsee dai jiav haq neq, yanqgaol neq, nqjaiq lil pov pov lal khi, maoq-aol aol lee nail nial dai, nuljuq ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq nqtavq bha heldaiq khi maoq-aol aol lee nail, nltsal covq lal nail dai, heeq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yanq yaqlao bhai tavq nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq bhai nuljuq maq tselpav nia maq heeq nia-il.
Mao-ail haqeiv nail bheeq nail leel nail yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq hal daiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yaolnav nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq
Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq nee mail ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bhai ail kev-u phao, khaqmul nioilpeivq-ail ceevq-a nail bhai yaqlaol juq noeq dov lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Phaqliqsail juq khi mail Saqduqgail juq nail deqtsiq bhai yaolphaol yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol juq neq, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai khaqmul maq oil leevq thaq nail ganl taivq-ail, ge nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq alhai ge thailthaiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul heeq nia khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Neema thaqtsaol nail phao, gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, khul khi mail khaqmul maq oil leevq thaq nail ganl nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge thailthaiq nail-aiq.

Niil aq-il kev dai nuljuq maq noeq dov haq-al laiq. Khaqmul ngaq heeq bhai tsaol-aq ngaq hinl gaq jaq bov khi, nuljuq jaiq lal-a nail pheeqdeel nee mail khadai deel gov bhee-a nail bhai nioilpeivq-ail lavq-ao nail laiq.
Al ovqtavq, khaqmul sivq heeq bhai tsaol-aq liq hinl gaq jaq bov khi, nuljuq jaiq lal-a nail pheeqdeel nee mail khadai deel gov bhee-a nail bhai iqsanl, nioilpeivq-ail lavq-ao nail laiq.

Ngal khaqmul nail ganl nuljuq bhai ge thailthaiq nail maq ngel-ail dai, khul khi mail nuljuq maq gov heeq kivq nail-aiq. Phaqliqsail juq khi mail Saqduqgail juq nail deqtsiq bhai yaolphaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, khaqmul bhai goe nail deqtsiq bhai yaolphaol yaoq dai, Yeiqsul ge nail maq ngel-il. Phaqliqsail juq khi mail Saqduqgail juq cavq nail cov nail daoq bhai yaolphaol yaoq dai, ge nail niil dai, yaqlaol juq heeq nia lal-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Pillilpuv-i

“Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, naoq bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq niil dai ge nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, Eillilya niil dai ge khi, teevq pav ganav juq neq, Yeiqlaqmil, maq ngel haq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq ganav niil dai, ge nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq thoil, ngaq bhai khaq sil gaq niil dai, ge heeq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Naol neq, Khali dai khul nail, doevq nail Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol” dai, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaolnav nail yaqyov Silmoq-ol, naol geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ganl niil tsaol-aq yaq naoq bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu naoq bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal naoq bhai ge lavq bhel. Bheiqtuvluv naol neq, lovmav ngaol. Lovmav niil nail kovtavq bhai ngaq nail munl ngal kaovq naol. Sil nail phaq nail bhaqaoq, munl niil munl bhai maq gaq lai nia-ail.

Nqtavq Milkhaoq khe lolgov nail taovq taovqphoil ngal naoq bhai bivq naol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai naoq-i mail maq khal bhi nl nail juq bhai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai iqsanl maq bhi nl nail juq dai saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai naoq-i mail khal bhi nl nail juq bhai nqtavq kovtavq bhai iqsanl bhi nl nail juq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Ngal Khali pevq nail ganl teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ya lai khi, aqivq aqtsu juq, Philma juq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai maodai phaq ya daq deedee nail ngaol” dai, aq-u n-gaol nee dan khi, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Ngal ya bhi heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n bhee lal haq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal naol” dai iqsanl, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv Yeiqsul bhai hevq dol-aivq khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, Miqyail alhai maq bhi pevq lal khaoq-ail. Alheel nail ganl naoq nail kovtavq bhai teevq thal-iq maq kev lee-ail” dai, Yeiqsul bhai khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq khi, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Neivq Saqdaq-ol, gailkhaol phaol yaoq. Naol neq, ngaq bhai phaqthiq bhi thiq nail gaq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq nail neenoeq neq, Miqyail nail neenoeq maq ngel-ail, Tsaol-aq yaq nail neenoeq teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq movq haq neq, yovqgavq nail neekhaol ya khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, yovqgavq nail lavqyavq yovqgavq bavq khi mail ngaq nail haoqnao ya tsaothel lavq nail ngaol.

Khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq, yovqgavq bhi jel-ail movq haq neq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq sunq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhi sunq-ail haq neq, doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, miltsaq niil teevq heeq heeq lao ya gil khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail doevq nail phaq sunq-ail haq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail doevq nail phaq bhai khul nee mail ul kovq nia nail-aiq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, aivq nail Aqbhu nail seiqleiq khaoqsail lavqkhoel, aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq nee mail yavq kha lee nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq yaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq-i mail khal nl khal hal-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aivq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai bivq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Niilniai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov Heeqphaq jiovq khi uvthaiq lee nail bhai maq ya moel-u kev dai, maq ya sil-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Kovq n jel ail-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, Bheiqtuvluv, Yaqkov khi mail Yaqkov nail jaqbheq Yaolhaq bhai taivq-ail hevq khi, gaoqjaoq daqmoe teevq jaoq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail sivtavq nee aqmaol phal lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail maivphaoq nlma khe-ai aqbhaq bhaq khi, aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi iqsanl phulleq dai, nl jeel coev lal nail ngaol.
Thaiqphuq dai, Molseiq khi Eillilya iqsanl aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai dov lee khi, Yeiqsul bhai daoq ge tsaoq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, ngadao niai jaol nail neq, aqmeeq nial. Naol neema tsaq haq neq, ngal niilniai yavqtsoel hail tsoel cov naol. Naoq nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel, Molseiq nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel khi mail Eillilya nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel cov naol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq daoq ge thailthaiq-u phao, aqbhaq bhaq nail nqdil aqyu juq bhai uvthaiq lee-a nail ngaol. “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai neekhaol sil deedee nail ngaol. Aivq nail daoq naldaiq yaoq” dai, nqdil al nail lavqkhoel nee aqthel meel dov-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol al juq aqthel al thel bhai ya gaiq-u phao, geesil deedee lal bhiq khi, miltsaq bhai kovq movq phaq-ail gaolbeiv-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq jaol nail bha lal khi, aqyu juq bhai thoiqtsi khi, “Thul yaoq. Thaq geesil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq gaollel daiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai maq ngel nail neq, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq moel-al.

Aqyu juq gaoqjaoq al jaoq nee mail yavq kha lee thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov maq doevq kovq lal-u phao kev dai, nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail ganl niil, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, Eillilya iqmoeq lee nail ngaol dai, khul khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq ge nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaq naol, Eillilya iqmoeq lee khi iqsanl bhai aqmeeq-ai lav sav thaq-ai lee nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Eillilya lee khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq aivq bhai maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, khal nl movq nail khe-ai nl bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov iqsanl aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai ya daq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nail ganl ge thailthaiq nail niil dai, heeq nia lal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail yaqlaol al hail gaq tsaol-aq munl munl ma jaol nail bha kovq kev lal-u phao, yaqyov-aq teevq gaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, aivq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi niailhai ge nail ngaol:

“Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail yaqyov bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq. Aivq bhi bhaoqga deedee khi ya daq deedee nail lavqkhoel teevq yanq ngal-aq teevq pov, miqjaq bhai maqkhaiq, ulcuvq bhai maqkhaiq tsuq pul-aivq nail ngaol.
Naoq nail yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha ngaq nail yaqyov bhai hel lavq bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq aivq bhai maq bhi meeq lai nia-il” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Niil yeel nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail neema maq aol nail nee ovqtavq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai iqsanl lav pov lav phal-il. Ngal nuljuq nee mail khaq mao kev dai, ya jaol-aiq haq nail-aiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai khaq mao kev dai, ya ol-ai haq nail-aiq. Yaqyov al gaq ngal jaol nail bha hel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neivq al maol bhai khaq-u phao, neivq al maol yaqyov al gaq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, yaqyov al gaq teevq pov taivq-ail meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Haoqnao Yeiqsul teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol-u phao, yaqlaol juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Khul khi mail nvjuq neivq al maol bhai maq the dov kivq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phao gaq bhaq nail ngel-i mail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaoqpavq aqneev dai eeq haq neq, gaoqjaoq niil jaoq bhai, a phao jiav ail yaoq dai, ge bhiq-u phao, jiav ail nail ngaol. Nuljuq maq nl nia nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
[“Geeqlaoq hal khi, maq jaq nail aol nl nail bhaqda nee taivq-ail neivq al phaq bhai bhi dov ail nia nail ngaol” dai, iqsanl ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.]

Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq teevq gaq khe-ai, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jaol-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aivq bhai tavq heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n bhee lal haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, yaqlaol juq noeqhaq deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai kovq kev lal-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail haqbhoil khaon tavq nail juq Bheiqtuvluv jaol nail bha lal khi, “Nuljuq nail saqlaq neq, khaon maq dov-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Dov naol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Bheiqtuvluv ilkhaol bhai aol lai-u phao, Yeiqsul daoq iqmoeq ge tsaoq khi ge nail: “Silmoq-ol, naol khalhai noeq nail-aiq, miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail heeqphaq juq neq, khaq sil gaq bhai khaon tavq nail-aiq. Yovqgavq nail yaq bhai tavq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail khi yu bhai tavq nail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Yu bhai tavq nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge kovq bhiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq, aivq nail yaq juq neq, ya jel-ail nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao bhaqda nee yu maq bhi noeq bheeq dai, maiqkovq teevq khaoq oil khi, ngaqkha bhai kha puvq ail yaoq. Iqmoeq ilmoeq kha mi-a nail delgil al maol nail moeqthaoq ngaoqpav daiq-u phao, phul teevq bavq aol nail bhai naol ya moel nail ngaol. Phul al bavq oil khi, ngadao nvq gaq nail haqbhoil khaon dov ail yaoq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yanq al yanq bhai, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai khul gaq neq, yu nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul yaqnoil teevq gaq bhai khul khi aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai bhi thulphaol khi ge bhiq-a nail:
“Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq neema phal khi, yaqnoil khe-ai maq pevq lal haq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ya aol lai-ail.
Yaqnoil niil gaq khe-ai neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail tsaol-aq neq, nqtavq milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai yu nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee, niilheel nail yaqnoil teevq gaq bhai hav-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai hav-a nail kheel ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail yaqnoil teevq gaq ganav bhai bhi nl laiq haq neq, aivq nail leelkhaol bhai lovmav heeq ma pheethaiq khi, iqyaq iqma khal navq nail dao bhai bavq puvq ail nail neq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi laiq-ail dai, nl nail phaq maodai jiav nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq-u phao, khadai geesil lal nail kheel ngel ail-aiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, alhai bhi nl laiq nail phaq jiav lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu bhai bhi nl laiq nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol.

Naoq nail aqlavq teevq lavq maqkhaiq, naoq nail aqkhil teevq khaoq maqkhaiq, naoq bhai bhi nl laiq lavq haq neq, dev ha pivq yaoq. Nvq khil nvq lavq covq khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel tovq nail miqjaq lavqkhoel bhai bavq poiv lavq nail nee maqtsil, alsail maq bhee dai, aqdoevq ya doevq nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Naoq nail maivneev teevq neev heldaiq khi naoq bhai bhi nl laiq lavq haq neq, kevq dov ha yaoq. Maivneev nvq neev nvq neev-ail covq khi, daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq bhoel lavq nail bhai ya daq nail nee maqtsil, maivneev teevq neev taivq-ail covq khi aqdoevq ya doevq nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq yaqnoil niil juq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq heldaiq theq bhiq dei-eiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aqyu juq bhai heldaiq phail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu nail sivtavq bhai khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail ngaol.
[Peivq ail-a nail tsaol-aq bhai hevqkovq nail dai khi, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov lee-a nail ngaol.]

Nuljuq khalhai noeq nail-aiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq yaol teevq yal maol jaol nail lavqkhoel nee, teevq maol peivq-ail haq neq, al goiq tsel goiq maol bhai gaoqjaoq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq khi, peivq ail-a nail yaol al maol bhai halpov ail nail, maq ngel laiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Aivq peivq ail-a nail yaol al maol bhai moel haq neq, maq peivq ail-a nail yaol goiq tsel goiq maol bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail nee maqtsil, halpov moel-a nail yaol al maol bhai lavqkhiq tsail jaiq nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, yaqnoil niil juq nail lavqkhoel teevq gaq ganav luq-ail seil-ail nail bhai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu neema maq tsaq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq naoq bhai nl laiq lavq haq neq, aivq jaol nail bha ail khi, nul-nq nvq gaq taivq-ail jaol-u phao, aivq-i mail nl laiq-a nail ganl bhai ge bhiq yaoq. Aivq naoq nail daoq naldaiq lavq haq neq, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai ya kovq-a nail kheel ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naoq-i mail ge nail daoq bhai aivq maq naldaiq lavq haq neq, naoq-i mail ge nail daoq yaoq daoq yaoq-ao nee, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, salkhil khanq nia dai, naoq-ai nee teevq gaq nvq gaq hevq khi lai yaoq.

Aivq aqyu nvq gaq nail daoq maq naldaiq haq neq, Khali yaq munl bhai ge bhiq yaoq. Khali yaq munl nail daoq iqsanl maq naldaiq haq neq, aivq bhai laolkivq yaq khi mail khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai saol-nvq bhiq yaoq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai nuljuq-i mail maq khal bhi nl nail juq bhai nqtavq kovtavq bhai iqsanl maq bhiq nl nail juq dai saol-nvq khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai nuljuq-i mail khal bhi nl nail juq bhai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai iqsanl bhi nl nail juq dai saol-nvq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai nuljuq nail lavqkhoel, tsaol-aq nvq gaq neema tavq khi geeqlaoq hal haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu aqyu nvq gaq-i mail hal nail khe-ai nl bhiq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq nvq gaq hail gaq, ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq khi jil lai haq neq, ngal a bhai aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai jaol naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq ngaq bhai nl laiq lavq haq neq, ngal aivq nail oeqbal bhai khadai pov kev dai, ya phaiq bhiq nail-aiq. Sivq pov kev dai laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Sivq pov kev dai taivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Sivq tsel dai, sivq pov kev dai, ya phaiq bhiq nail ngaol dai, ngal naoq bhai ge lavq bhel.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, niailhai dul nail ngaol. Teevq pov neq, heeqphaq teevq gaq aivq nail yaqkav juq nee mail gailjiov saol-nvq tsaq naol dai, noeqceiv-a nail ngaol.
Aivq gailjiov iqmoeq ilmoeq saol-nvq-u phao, aivq bhai gailjiov maodai lanv bavq nail teevq gaq bhai aivq jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq khul teevq phaq iqsanl khaoq kovq bhiq nail maq jiav nail ngel-i mail, heeqphaq al gaq neq, aivq nail aqmaol iqsanl, aivq nail miqyaq khaqma khi mail aivq-i mail khal jiav nail yalkav iqsanl, gaoq gil khi bhi khaoq kovq lal yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yaqkav al gaq aivq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, ‘Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq bhai teevq yanq ol lavq yaoq. Ngaq nail gailjiov iqsanl mail khaoq kovq gil naol’ dai, aivq bhai hal hal-ail, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, heeqphaq yaqkav al gaq aivq bhai gaoqhaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai phaiq bhiq khi aivq nail gailjiov bhai iqsanl khaonq ha gil bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, kovq ail-u phao, aivq bhai phul teevq yal bavq taivq-ail bavq nail aivq nail aqtsaoq yaqkav teevq gaq bhai thaoqphuq-a nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail aqtsaoq al gaq nail leelkhaol bhai nieivq thaiq khi, ‘Ngaq nail gailjiov khaoq kovq lavq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail aqtsaoq yaqkav al gaq peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, ‘Ngaq bhai teevq yanq ol lavq yaoq. Ngal naoq bhai khaoq kovq bhiq naol’ dai, hal hal-ail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq maq naldaiq dai, gailjiov al maq khaoq gil-u kev dai, yaqkav al gaq bhai thaonq bhai laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai nl bhiq nail bhai, yaqkav yaoq juq yaoq ya moel-u phao, neema teevq peivq-ail maq sal dai, aqyu juq nail heeqphaq jaol nail bha lai khi, ganl al juq iqsanl mail, ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, heeqphaq yaqkav al gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Mailma-ail haqeiv nail yaqkav-ol. Naol ngaq bhai hal nail ngel-i mail, ngal naoq nail gailjiov iqsanl bhai khaonq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal naoq bhai gaoqhaq bhiq-a nail khe-ai, naol iqsanl naoq nail aqtsaoq yaqkav al gaq bhai gaoqhaq bhiq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq al gaq aivq bhai neema gaoq phail lal bhiq khi, gailjiov maq khaoq ceiv gil-u kev dai, bhi khoeq bhi jiovq nail dai khi, thaonq nail aqivq gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-i mail nl laiq lavq-a nail phaq bhai neema lavqkhoel nee oeqbal maq phaiq bhiq haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaq nail Aqbhu iqsanl, heeqphaq al gaq khe-ai, nuljuq bhai nl lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ganl al juq cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq al nee ngal-aq, aivq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq nee mail dov ail khi, Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel ceiv ail khi, al nail lao tsao ail kha khi, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq khi, aivq aqyu juq nail nalgoel bhai lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Yovjil neq, khul nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai kovq khaoq naol laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Iqsanl bhai teivq-a nail Miqyail neq, iqmoeq-u nee mail yaqyov-aq khi mail yaqmai-aq bhai teivq-a nail ganl, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq maq ge daiq al laiq.
‘Alheel ngel-i mail, yaqyov-aq neq, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma nee gaoq ail khi, yovqgavq nail khaqma nee mail jaol ail nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq teevq gaq taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol.’
Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq neq, nvq gaq maq ngel yaoq-aol. Teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol. Miqyail-i mail oil jil-ai thaq nail bhai tsaol-aq yaq maq ya lav pav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Thailhai phal-iq neq, ‘Kovq nail haoqgavq teevq keiv gevq bhiq gaq haq neq, kovq kivq naol’ dai, khul khi mail Molseiq daoq bivq-ai thaq nail-aiq” dai, Phaqliqsail juq Yeiqsul bhai gaoq naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq neema gaol nail ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail khaqma kovq kivq naol dai, Molseiq aqkhaoqanq bivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maldil dai, nq teivq mil teivq teivq-u phao neq, alhai maq ngel-ail.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yu nee mail bheeq nail leel nail phaq maq ngel nail neq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai kovq khi, yaoq gaq yaoq bhai hevq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai nl bheeq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Hevq pheel maol pheeljaq nail phaq, a dai maldil haq nail ngel haq neq, maq hevq mail jaol nail neq, meeq jaiq ail nial” dai, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl mail daoq al daoq bhai maq khanqtsaol-ail. Aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail juq taivq-ail khanqtsaol nail ngaol.

Khaqma hevq nail ganl neq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maq dul-ail. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, doevq lee-u nee mail maq hevq dai jaol nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail nl-a nail bhaqda nee, maq hevq dai jaol nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq nail haqbhoil ganl nl nia dai, khaqma maq hevq dai jaol nail ngaol. Niil juq bhai khanq tsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, khanq dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul yaqnoil juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi geeqlaoq bhi bivq nail dai khi, yu yaqnoil juq bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol juq neq, yaqnoil hevq khi lal-a nail juq bhai khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Yaqnoil juq ngal jaol nail bha bhi lal yaoq. Aqyu juq bhai thaq lav tsoiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, aqyu juq kheel yaqnoil juq bhai ovq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul yaqnoil al juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi geeqlaoq bivq gaq al nee ngal-aq, a bhai nee dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqyov-aq teevq gaq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Saqlaq-ol, ngal nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya dai, ganl aqmeeq khul phaq ya nl nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Naol khul khi mail ngaq bhai aqmeeq phaq nail ganl naldaiq nail-aiq. Aqmeeq neq, Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Naol doevq nail phaq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai movq haq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai naldaiq khi, tsaothe yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Aoldaoq kovqdaoq khul daoq bhai ya tsaothe nail-aiq” dai, aivq gaoq naldaiq bhiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “ ‘Yu bhai thaq lav heivq. Yu nail khaqma nee thaq bheeq thaq leel. Yu nail nlmaoq thaq khoiq. Yu bhai maq tsaq nail salkhil thaq khanq.

Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev yaoq. Naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq’ dai, ge nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq niil juq bhai tsaothe yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal aoldaoq kovqdaoq al juq iqsanl mail naldaiq gil-aoq nail ngaol. Ngal khul phaq gaoq loq-ai haq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai gaoq naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol khul ge duq maq jiav dai, nl bhee movq haq neq, kovq ail khi naoq nail ildaoq maoqgaiq iqsanl mail gaoq ha-ail khi, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bhoil bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai mao-ail phoiq nail naoq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq jiav lal naol. Aq-u phao, naol kovq lal khi, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqyov-aq al gaq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq neq, ildaoq maoqgaiq maodai jiav nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Hulmeeq hulbhao juq, Nqtavq Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail neq, haq deedee nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai gaoq ge lavq bhel. Laolthao geevqjieivq geeq naq bhai aol lai nail neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail nee maqtsil ngaq-aiq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, “Thailhai phal-iq neq, khaq sil gaq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nia heeq” dai, naldaiq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai heldaiq khi ge nail: “Niil neq, tsaol-aq yaq nl nia nail phaq maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nia nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heldaiq yaoq. Nvjuq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, naoq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq khul ya nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Iqsanl mail aqsivq sivq dai pov lal phal lal khi, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav nail doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-u phao, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail nuljuq iqsanl, doiqbev bev ma tsel-nvq bev bhai jaoldeel khi, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e tsel-nvq jeq-e bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol.

Ngal bhaqda nee, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol, aqivq jaqbheq, aqbhu aqma, yaqmiq yaqyov khi mail daiyal, niil juq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, a dai nee maqtsil teevq yal bhoil ya nail nee ovqtavq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il yu nail iqmoeq jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai yu nail haoqnao ya jaol nail ngaol. Niil aq-il yu nail haoqnao jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai, yu nail iqmoeq ya jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nqtavq Milkhaoq neq, niailhai dul nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl bhi nl nail tsaol-aq halpov ail nail dai khi, nqhao navqmav-ail dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Ganl nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, teevq n nail yalgaq aqphoiq neq, teevq bavq bivq naol dai, ge tsaq khi, aqyu juq bhai aivq nail aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl bhi nl ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqhao phao naqli goiq lavq niidai bhai, aivq gaoq dov ail-u phao neq, ganl maq jiav dai, leiv bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

‘Nuljuq iqsanl ngaq nail aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl nl ail yaoq. Nuljuq bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai yalgaq aqphoiq bivq naol’ dai, aqheel gaq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl nl ail-a nail ngaol.

N-gaol gaol kav phao teevq pov khi mail, kivq hail phao naqli hail lavq bhai teevq pov aivq gaoq dov ail khi, aivq nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl bhi nl nail haqbhoil tsaol-aq gaoq khul bhoel ail-a nail ngaol.

Kivq hail lail ma phao naqli ngaq lavq bhai aivq gaoq dov ail khi, tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq a bhai thulphaol nail bhai ya moel khi, ‘Nuljuq khul khi mail teevq n n lao-ail niilniai aqnieivq-ail thulphaol nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

‘Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, nvjuq bhai maq khoel lee nail ngel-i mail, thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol’ dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. ‘Thailhai phal-iq neq, nuljuq iqsanl, ngaq nail aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl nl ail yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, gaoqkhail aqheel gaq neq, ‘Ganl nl nail juq bhai khul kovq khi, haoqnao naosaq nl ail-a nail juq nee mail iqmoeq ilmoeq nl ail-a nail juq bhai kev dai, aqphoiq bivq yaoq’ dai, aivq nail gaoqkhail bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, kivq hail phao, naqli ngaq lavq bhai ganl nl lee-a nail juq lal khi, teevq gaq bhai teevq bavq ya-a nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq ilmoeq nl-a nail juq lal kev-u phao, ‘Nvjuq neq, ya jaiq naol’ dai, aqyu juq noeq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq bhai teevq bavq ya-al teevq-eel ngaol.
Aqyu juq yalgaq aqphoiq ya gaq-u phao, aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail khe ilheel gaq bhai ge doil-a nail ngaol:

‘Haoqnao naosaq lee khi nl lee-a nail juq neq, naqli teevq lavq ya nl-a nail teevq-eel ngaol. Nvjuq neq, teevq n n lao nltsal leivq leivq-ail nl-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol yalgaq aqphoiq bivq lavq-u phao neq, teevq gaq khe-ai taivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail niil’ dai, ilheel gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ilheel gaq aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail teevq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Aqtsaoq-ol. Ngal naoq bhai maq tsaq nail phaq nl bhiq-a nail maq ngel. Ngal naoq bhai teevq n yalgaq aqphoiq teevq bavq bivq naol dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Naoq nail yalgaq aqphoiq phul oil khi kovq ail yaoq. Naoq bhai bivq-a nail khe-ai haoqnao naosaq nl lee-a nail juq bhai iqsanl ngal bivq movq-ail nial.
Ngal ngaq nail phul bhai khal nl movq nail khe-ai maq nl kivq ail laiq. Ngal yu bhai maodai bivq movq nail neema aol nail bhai nuljuq neekhaol maq sil tsaol-ail laiq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, yu nail haoqnao jaol nail tsaol-aq yu nail iqmoeq ya jaol nail ngaol. Yu nail iqmoeq jaol nail tsaol-aq, yu nail haoqnao ya jaol nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai thailthaiq-u phao, yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq bhai taivq-ail iqmoeq phao hel laivq khi, aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Ngadao juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai thailthaiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, a bhai Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai, yu-i mail av bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Aivq ya sil dai, aqyu juq yalkhaq dal nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, yu nail jeq-e nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi, aivq bhai khal nl movq-ail bhi nl khi, neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq gaq haq neq, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai bhi tavq heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n bhee lal haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Seiqbheiqdail nail khaqma neq, aivq nail yaqyov nvq gaq hevq khi, aqyu nvq mail nail haqbhoil teevq phaq hal nail dai khi, Yeiqsul nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq lai-a nail ngaol.

“Naol khul hal movq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-u phao, “Naoq nail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel, naol joiqjaq doiqbev kovtavq bhai naol jaoldeel-u phao, ngaq nail yaqyov niil nvq gaq bhai, naoq nail lavqmal phao teevq gaq, lavqtsel phao teevq gaq dai, bhi jaoldeel lavq yaoq” dai, yaqmai-aq al gaq hal-a nail ngaol.

“Nuljuq hal nail phaq bhai nuljuq maq heeq nia-ail. Nuljuq ngal ya daol nail haq dee aoq deedee nail khaoqanq bhai daol tsaol naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-u phao, “Daol tsaol naol” dai, aqyu nvq mail ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Nul-nq nvq mail, ngaq nail khaoqanq bhai ya daol naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail lavqmal phao lavqtsel phao ya jaoldeel dai neq, ngal maq nl kivq-ail. Jaol duq al neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq mail bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq nail aqtsaoq yaqlaol tsel gaq ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu nvq mail bhai neema phail lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq iqsanl bhai khul jil khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Yu nail jeq-e nail heeqphaq heeq ma juq neq, milkhaoq yaq juq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq jiav khi, aqivq aqtsu jiovq khi uvthaiq nail juq iqsanl yovqgavq khal noeq nail khe-ai, uvthaiq nia nail bhaqaoq jiav nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq alhai maq ya khi-ail. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel yu nee maqtsil eeq movq heel movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail yaqkav ya jiovq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel aqivq jiovq movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail yaqkav ya jiovq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, yu aivq nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail dai khi, lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq yu nail yaqkav jiovq lee khi, tsaol-aq maodai bhai ul kovq lee nail dai khi, sildan lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqlilkhol meenq nee dov ail-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aqyu juq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, maivpeivq peivq nail nvq gaq gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq nail aqjail bhai lee thailthaiq nail aqthel ya gaiq khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, Daqbhil nail Yaqyov-ol, nv-nvq gaq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a lavq yaoq” dai, gul-a nail ngaol.

“Aqtsi tsu dai jaol yaoq” dai, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aqyu nvq gaq bhai khaq khi ngaol-aoq, “Heeqphaq-ol, Daqbhil nail Yaqyov-ol, nv-nvq gaq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a lavq yaoq” dai, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil gaoq gul kav lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul naq lai khi, aqyu nvq gaq bhai khul khi, “Ngal nul-nq nvq gaq nail haqbhoil khul bhi nl bhiq movq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, nv-nvq gaq nail maivneev bhi moel lal lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai gaoqhaq khi, aqyu nvq gaq nail maivneev bhai thoiqtsi bhiq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq nail maivneev teevq pov taivq-ail moel nia lal khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq aqjail bhai tsao kel lavq khi, Saqloq gaoqjaoq aqjail bhai jiav nail Bheilphaqjeiq julgu bhai lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol nvq gaq bhai iqmoeq phao khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq yaqlaol al nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq iqmoeq phao jiav nail julgu bhai lai yaoq. A bhai moeqphaq laljieiv aqma teevq maol khi aqyaq teevq maol pheethaiq-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel nail ngaol. Cevpheel khi ngal jaol nail bha tseel leevq yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nul-nq nvq gaq bhai teevq phaq ganav ge lal haq neq, ‘Heeqphaq loq nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq dei-eiq. Alhai ge bhiq haq neq, teevq pov taivq-ail aivq nul-nq nvq gaq bhai bhi tseel-aivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq nail daoq bhi bhee lal nail dai khi, alhai pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail:
“Yeel-ovq nail yaqmiq
niailhai ge bhiq yaoq.
‘Heldaiq dei-eiq.
Naoq nail Heeqphaq
neenuq neebeiv
aol nail lavqkhoel nee,
moeqphaq laljieiv
aqma teevq maol
khi mail aqyaq teevq maol
bhai jeeq khi,
naol jaol nail bha lee
thailthaiq nail ngaol’ ” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai khoel nail khe-ai, yaqlaol al nvq gaq nl ail-a nail ngaol.

Moeqphaq laljieiv al nvq maol Yeiqsul jaol nail bha tseel-aivq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, al nvq maol nail kovtavq bhai, aqyu juq nail aqgaq aqdoi kheq dav bhiq khi, Yeiqsul bhai bhi jeeq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi yovqgavq gailkhaol bhai kheq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, yaljail bhai bhuq tsil khi, gailkhaol bhai kheq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail iqmoeq khi mail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq neq,
“Hoqsaqnaq,
Daqbhil nail Yaqyov
bhai tsiq eeq bhel.
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
aqmil kov-uvq nee
lee nail gaq
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq.
Hoqsaqnaq!
Nqtavq kovtavq
bhai iqsanl,
aivq bhai
tsiq eeq dei-eiq” dai,
mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha aol lai thailthaiq-u phao, meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail suqsaq lal khi, “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Niil gaq neq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Naqsaqlail meenq yaq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi a bhai yalkav gaoq yalkav ul nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai the ha khi, phul dovq phal bhiq thailthaiq nail juq nail kovqkhail bhai maqkhaiq, khaoqkhoiq gaoq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq juq nail doiqbev bhai maqkhaiq ngaoq ha-a nail ngaol.
“ ‘Ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai
geeqlaoq hal nail ilkhaol dai,
ya khul nail ngaol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ilkhaol niil il bhai khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel nail ilkhaol bhi pevq lal thaq nail niil” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq khi mail aqkhil maq meeq nail tsaol-aq juq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq aqyu juq bhai, bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Philma juq khi mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, aivq-i mail nl nail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov Hoqsaqnaq bhi kev lee dei-eiq” dai, yaqnoil juq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai mailma-ail gul nail bhai iqsanl, aqyu juq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, neema phail deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaq niil juq khul dai gul thailthaiq nail-aiq dai, naoq bhai maq gaiq lal-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq bhai gaiq lal-ail nial.
‘Yaqnoil juq khi mail
aqtsil cuvq yaq juq nail
moeqthaoq
lavqkhoel nee mail
tsiqeeq nail daoq
Miqyail bhi
dov lal nail ngaol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail bhai nuljuq teevq thal iqsanl maq ge daiq haq-al laiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq aqyu juq jaol nail nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai yavq lai-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, nqbhaq bhaq lal khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha aol lai thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aoq moevq lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai doevq nail heeqguq aqbhaol teevq bhaol bhai ya moel khi heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqheeq maq heeq dai, aqpavq taivq-ail maodai covq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, “Yanqgaol nee ngal-aq, naol aqheeq thaq gaoq heeq lee dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqbhaol al bhaol bhai ge bhiq-u phao, aqbhaol al bhaol teevq pov taivq-ail khuq-ail kov ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq al bhai ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, “Khul khi mail aqbhaol niil bhaol teevq pov taivq-ail bhagul gul ail-a nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol khi, neema pov pov lav lav dai, maq pevq haq neq, heeqguq aqbhaol niil bhaol bhai, ngaq-i mail nl bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl nl nia nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, gaoqjaoq niil jaoq bhai, ‘Naoq nail jaol duq nee dov ail khi, iqyaq iqma bhai ga puvq ail yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-u phao, nuljuq-i mail khal ge nail khe-ai, pevq lal nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee, geeqlaoq hal haq neq, khal hal nail phaq iqsanl mail ya nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai khi cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, Philma juq khi mail Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Naol khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi thailhai nl thailthaiq nail-aiq. Khaq sil gaq naoq bhai alyaq bivq lavq-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq daoq naldaiq la dei-eiq. Nuljuq ge kovq lavq haq neq, ngal khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi niil juq nl thailthaiq nail ganl, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq naol.

Yaolhaq khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail-aiq. Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai niailhai ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol: “Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao ge haq neq, ‘Thailhai phal-iq, nuljuq khul khi mail Yaolhaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail-aiq’ dai, Yeiqsul ge lal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao ge haq neq, tsaol-aq niidai bhai geesil duq jiav nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yaolhaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Nvjuq maq heeq kivq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Alhai dul dai, khaq sil gaq-i mail ngaq bhai alyaq bivq lavq khi ganl niil juq nl thailthaiq nail bhai, nuljuq bhai ngal maq ge bhiq-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq khalhai noeq nail-aiq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq yaqyov nvq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqbhu gaq yaqyov aqivq gaq jaol nail bha lai khi, ‘Yaqyov-ol, yanqgaol naol aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail bhai ganl nl ail dei-eiq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, ‘Ngal maq ail’ dai, yaqyov al gaq ge kovq bhiq thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq gaoq noeq pov lal bhiq khi ganl nl ail thaq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqyov jaqbheq gaq jaol nail bha ail khi, aqivq gaq bhai khoel bhiq-u khe-ai, aivq bhai iqsanl khoel bhiq-u phao, ‘Aqbhu-ol, ngal ail naol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq maq ail-al.
Yaqyov al nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel khul gaq neq, aqbhu nail neema tsaq dai nl-a nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq-u phao,
“Aqivq gaq nial” dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khi mail maimaqlal juq nuljuq nail iqmoeq nee Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai ya aol lai nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yaolhaq nuljuq jaol nail bha lee khi, tsaq nail daol nail gailkhaol bhai khalhai ya doevq nail ganl cavq naq lee khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aivq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khi mail maimaqlal juq neq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq alhai ya moel khi ngaol-aoq, oeqbal maq noeq pov-al. Aivq bhai iqsanl neema maq thaqtsaol-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Daoqma uqhuq daoq yaoq daoq yaoq bhai gaoq naldaiq yaoq. Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n neq, aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiiv kha khi, gaoqkhail aqmeeq-ai nl tsoiq-a nail ngaol. Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq lav sav khi, gaoqkhail bhai lovq nail ilkhaol daqmoe teevq il iqsanl cov-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq bhai ngaq bhiq-ail ceevq khi, aivq neq, yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq mi lal khi koevq nail yanq tsaq lal-u phao, gaoqkhail al khail khe aqheeq tsilju aqheeq aivq bhai ovq nail juq ya dai, gaoqkhail nl nail juq jaol nail bha aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai bhi lai-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq aivq nail yaqkav al juq bhai nieivq thaiq khi teevq gaq bhai deeq-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq bhai deeq heivq-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq bhai neq, lovmav-i mail liv bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq pov yaoq, iqmoeq-u pov nee maqtsil aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai gaoq bhi lai-a nail ngaol. Gaoqkhail nl nail juq iqmoeq-u phao khe-ai, aqyu juq bhai iqsanl nl bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ilheel gaq ge nail: ‘Aqyu juq ngaq nail yaqyov bhai neq, ev naol’ dai, ge khi, haoqnao naosaq khe pov neq, aivq nail yaqyov bhai bhi lai-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq, yaqyov al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, ‘Aivq neq, jaiqbhoil ovq nail gaq ngaol. Yaoq. Aivq bhai heivq khi, ngadao juq aivq nail jaiqbhoil bhoilpav jaq bhel’ dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq aivq bhai nieivq khi, gaoqkhail lavqniil phao he dol-aivq khi, heivq-a nail ngaol.
Gaoqkhail nail ilheel gaq kovq kev lal-u phao, gaoqkhail nl nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai khalhai nl bhiq nail-aiq dai, nuljuq bhai noeq lal-ail” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai aivq heivq nail aqduq bhao nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq mi lal-u phao, aivq bhai ovq nail juq aqmeeq-ai bivq kovq lavq nia nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq-ao bhai, aivq gaoq ngaq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
