Tsaol-aq maodai jil lal-a nail ngel-i mail, ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai maq dail lai nail nee ovqtavq, lavqniil phao iqsanl jaol duq maq jiav-ail. Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al juq bhai Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq liq gaq, khil sil lavq sil sil thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha bal lavq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq bhee jaol nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bhai maq aol lai nia-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul jaol nail teevq daol bhai, khaolpoiv bheq pav khi, bheq pav-a nail al dao nee, aqyu juq khil sil lavq sil sil nail al gaq bhai iqjial bheebhaoq nee mail phaiq kha gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq a dai dai-ail neema thaqtsaol nail bhai Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, khil sil lavq sil sil nail al gaq bhai, “Yaqyov-ol, naoq nail oeqbal phaiq gaq-ao nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, a bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail teevq pav ganav juq neq, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai niailhai saol-nvq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

“Tsaol-aq thoil gaq, khalhai khi thailhai ge tseq nail meeq. Thoil neq, Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Miqyail maq ngel nail neq, khaq sil gaq oeqbal phaiq nia nail-aiq” dai, noeq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq alhai saol-nvq thailthaiq nail ganl bhai, Yeiqsul teevq pov taivq-ail heeq nia khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai khul khi mail, thailhai saol-nvq thailthaiq nail-aiq.

Khil sil lavq sil sil-a nail tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai khalhai ge bhiq nail, ngaq-aiq jaiq nail-aiq. ‘Naoq nail oeqbal phaiq gaq-ao nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq nail ngaq-aiq jaiq nail laiq. ‘Thul khi, naoq nail iqjial bavq khi tsaol-aivq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq nail, ngaq-aiq jaiq nail laiq.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, miltsaq niil nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal phaiq nail bhaqaoq jiav nail ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai bhi heeq bhiq moel nail haqbhoil nl naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khil sil lavq sil sil nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, ge bhiq-a nail:
“Thul khi, naoq nail iqjial bavq khi, ilkhaol bha kovq ail yaoq dai, ngal naoq bhai ge lavq bhel” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq iqsanl mail heldaiq thailthaiq-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq thul lal khi, aivq nail iqjial lavqtsail mail bavq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl mail, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail lavqkhoel nee ge nail: “Niilheel teevq thal-iq maq moel daiq-al” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Gaqliqlail ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai teevq pov gaoq ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma aivq jaol nail bha jil lal khi, aivq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq iqmoeq phao gaoq ail-u phao, khaon tavq nail ilkhaol bhai, Aqlaqphail nail yaqyov Leiqbhil jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, aivq tsaoq thul khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Leiqbhil nail ilkhaol bhai Yeiqsul khi aivq nail yaqlaol juq aoq jaoq jaoq khi, aoq jaq thailthaiq-u phao, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail oeqbal yaq maodai iqsanl, aqyu juq nee mail jaol khi, jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq maodai Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul oeqbal yaq khi khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq nee jaol khi aoq jaq nail bhai, Phaqliqsail nail munl bhai tavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq ya moel-u phao, “Khul khi mail thoil gaq khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khi oeqbal yaq nee mail, jaq tavq daol tavq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Jaol hal dov nail tsaol-aq, jagaq coev nail saqlaq maq loq-ail. Nal nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail loq nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhai khul nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail maq ngel. Oeqbal yaq bhai khul nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol juq khi Phaqliqsail juq maq jaq nail aol nl nail ngaol. Yu Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol juq khi Phaqliqsail juq nail yaqlaol neq, maq jaq nail aol nl khi ngaol-aoq, naoq nail yaqlaol juq neq, khul khi mail maq nl nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Khaqma hevq nail gaq, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq nee jaol-u phao, aqyu juq maq jaq nail aol nl naol laiq. Aivq aqyu juq nee khal jaol-u kev dai, maq jaq nail aol maq nl nia-ail.
Khaqma hevq nail gaq bhai aivq nail aqtsaoq juq nee mail hevq pal-aivq nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol kev lee haq neq, aqyu juq maq jaq nail aol nl nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aqgaq aqdoi aqkhail bhai haqphal aqsivq-i mail phaltsaol maq dovq-ail. Dovq haq neq, dovq thaq nail phaltsaol al tsaol, aqgaq aqdoi aqkhail bhai bhi pav-ail nail ngaol. Pav-ail nail al neq, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil pav jaiq-ail nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl bavkov eelpheeq aqlil bhai aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqsivq maq hoel bhoel daiq haq-al. Hoel bhoel haq neq, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul al, bavkov eelpheeq bhai bhi pav-ail nail ngel-i mail, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul khal-ail khi, bavkov eelpheeq iqsanl cov-ail nail ngaol. Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqsivq neq, bavkov eelpheeq aqsivq bhai ya hoel bhoel nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Jaol n n-gaol, Yeiqsul gov gov yal
Phaqliqsail juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Heldaiq. Jaol n n-gaol maq nl khaoq nail phaq, khul khi mail aqyu juq nl nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Daqbhil khi aivq nail aqtsaoq juq aoq moevq lal bhiq khi, khul teevq phaq iqsanl jaq nail maq aol-u phao, khalhai khi-a nail bhai, nuljuq teevq pov iqsanl maq ge daiq haq-al laiq.

Daqbhil Miqyail nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, Philma Philyaq juq maq ngel nail neq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq jaq khaoq nail Miqyail bhai laol bhiq-ai thaq nail khaqmul oil jaq khi, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq bhai iqsanl bhi jaq-a nail ngaol. Ganl niil neq, Aqbhaqtaq Philma jiovq-u phao, pevq lal-a nail ganl ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Jaol n neq, tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq bhai neq, jaol n nail haqbhoil teivq-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, jaol n n-gaol bhai iqsanl uvthaiq nail Heeqphaq ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bha lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqlavq teevq phao sil thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, a bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Jaol n n-gaol tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, Yeiqsul lav meeq bhiq-ail laiq dai, Yeiqsul nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq kivq dai, heldaiq cov-ai thaq nail Phaqliqsail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl, a bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqlavq teevq phao sil thaq nail al gaq bhai, “Gaoltsi bhai thulphaol lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Jaol n n-gaol aqmeeq phaq nl khaoq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, maq meeq nail phaq nl khaoq nail laiq. Yu bhai lav doevq bhiq khaoq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, lav heivq bhiq khaoq nail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Phaqliqsail al juq daoq maq ge dai, jaol nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neema phail phail-ail, aqyu juq bhai heldaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neema gaol nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul noeqhaq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, “Naoq nail aqlavq gaoltsaoq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq gaoltsaoq-u phao, meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail juq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol nee dov ail khi, heeqphaq Heiqlol bhai tsaojao-ai nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail thaoqphuq-ail khi, khalhai khi Yeiqsul bhai ya heivq heeq dai, maoqbhaoq nl pheeljaq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail ngaqkha jiav nail phao gaoq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma aivq jaol nail bha jil lee-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq neq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq khi mail Yuldav milkhaoq nee lee-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq, Ildulmail milkhaoq, Yaoldaq laoljaol nlma dov khoeq phao khe milkhaoq nee lee-a nail, Dullu meenq khi mail Sildoq meenq nee lee-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul-i mail nl thailthaiq nail ganl ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, munl munl ma ma khi, aivq jaol nail bha lee-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq munl munl ma ngaq bhai maq ya thaoqthaiq lal dai, laovq teevq laovq lainq-ai thaq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq maodai gaq bhai lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail aivq bhai ya thoiqtsi dai, aivq jaol nail bha thaoq thaoq-ail lee thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Neivq aqcavq aol nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai khal ya moel-u phao, aivq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, “Naol neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol” dai, gul gul-ail ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq khaq sil gaq pevq nail ganl, yu bhai maq bhi ge bhiq nail haqbhoil, neivq aqcavq al juq bhai Yeiqsul aqkav kav dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul gaoqjaoq bha dav lai khi, aivq neema khal tsaq nail juq bhai khul-u phao, aqyu juq aivq jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nee mail bhi jaol khi, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhi cavq ail nail haqbhoil, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe, tsaol-aq tsel-nvq gaq bhai tsel dov khi, gaqkhoel dai, kha bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Neivq bhai the dov nia nail bhaqaoq iqsanl, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul-i mail tsel dov-a nail tsaol-aq al tsel-nvq gaq neq, niil juq ngaol: Aivq-i mail Bheiqtuvluv dai mil bhiq-a nail Silmoq,

Seiqbheiqdail nail yaqyov Yaqkov, Yaqkov nail jaqbheq Yaolhaq (Aqyu nvq mail bhai, Bhaolneiqgail dai iqsanl, yu khul nail ngaol. Daoqceevq neq, nqjaiq jaiq nail khe-ai dul nail yaq dai, ge nail ngaol.)
Aqdaiqlaiq, Pillilpuv, Bhaqthaollaqmail, Maqthaiq, Tholmav, Aqlaqphail nail yaqyov Yaqkov, Taqdail, Khaqnaqnil
Yeiqsul bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail Yuldav Ilsaqgaqliqoq, niil juq ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul ilkhaol bhai kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma gaoq jil lal-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aoq jaq nail iqsanl, maq dan-ail.

Yeiqsul nail aqma khi aivq nail jaqbheq juq ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai hevqkovq ail nail dai khi, ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul naiquq uq ail-aoq thaq nail niil dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol.

Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee lee-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aivq neq, neivq heeqphaq Bheiqsaqbhullav aol nail tsaol-aq niil. Aivq neivq heeqphaq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai khul khi, daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail niailhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Neivq Saqdaq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq khalhai the dov nail-aiq.
Milkhaoq teevq khaoq neq, yovqgavq nail gaiqlaq bhai munl bhoilpav khi, maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, khalhai khi ivq nia nail-aiq.
Ildaoq teevq daoq iqsanl, aivq bhai aivq maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, ildaoq al daoq maq ivq nia-ail.
Alhai dul dai, neivq Saqdaq neq, aivq bhai aivq pheeq khi, maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, aivq iqsanl maq ivq-ail. Aivq luq-ail seil-ail khi peivq-ail boev-ail nail ngaol.

Gaq mao-ail kav nail gaq bhai iqmoeq maq pheethaiq haq neq, teevq gaq iqsanl, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, aivq nail yalkav maq oil lai nia-ail. Gaq mao-ail kav nail al gaq bhai iqmoeq pheethaiq haq neq, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, aivq nail yalkav oil lai kivq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail nl-a nail oeqbal iqsanl khi mail, khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail oeqbal phaiq bhiq nia nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail tsaol-aq khul gaq nail oeqbal bhai maqkhaiq, teevq thal-iq oeqbal maq phaiq bhiq-ail. Tsaol-aq al gaq nqmaq maqluv halyeel oeqbal aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, aivq bhai neivq aqcavq aol nail tsaol-aq niil dai, ge nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai alhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail aqma khi aivq nail jaqbheq juq lee kev-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq lavqniil phao thulphaol khi, Yeiqsul bhai bhi khul dov lai-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, aivq jaol nail teevq jaoq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naoq nail aqma khi naoq nail jaqbheq juq naoq bhai halpov halpov-ail lavqniil phao jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngaq nail aqma khi mail ngaq nail jaqbheq juq neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq jaol nail teevq jaoq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, aivq heldaiq heldaiq-ail khi ge nail: “Niil juq neq, ngaq nail aqma khi mail ngaq nail jaqbheq juq ngaol.
Miqyail neema tsaq dai, khal nl nail tsaol-aq ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq khi mail ngaq nail aqma ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai teevq pov gaoq cavq gaoq cov bhiq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma jil lal-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq ngaqkha lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail laovq bhai jaoldeel ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq neq, ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail ganl mee nia phaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq cavq thail cov thailthaiq-u phao, niailhai ge nail ngaol:
“Aq-u phao, aqiq haiq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n kev lee-u phao, aivq aqiq haiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq aqiq haiq-u phao, aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, gailkhaol kovtavq bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, keivq-avq lee khi, aqiq al juq bhai gov jaq gil-a nail ngaol.
Aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, miltsaq bhaq nail lovmav lovyal bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq aqbhaq ngel-i mail, lavqtsail mail aqjiiv jiiv dol lavq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoqtsail maq kha navq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, nlma dov lal-u phao, nltsal mailma-ail kav nail bhaqda nee, khuq-ail kov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, aqgoe goeyal bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. Aqgoe jiavbuv eeq lal khi, aqjiiv al bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aqheeq maq heeq lee-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqiq teevq pav ganav juq neq, miltsaq mil meeq bhai ga ail-a nail ngaol. Aqjiiv jiiv lal meeq lal khi, aqheeq maodai heeq lee-a nail ngaol. Aqheeq hail tsel bhoil, kovq tsel bhoil khi, teevq yal bhoil mao lal-a nail ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq kovq lai gil-u phao, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail tsaol-aq juq khi yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq, daoqma uqhuq daoq al juq nail ganl Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl oiltsail-ai thaq nail juq bhai, nuljuq heeq nia lal-aoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu bhai neq, daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail ya cavq ya cov bhiq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
‘Aqyu juq heldaiq
khi ngaol-aoq,
maq heldaiq moel nia-ail,
naldaiq khi ngaol-aoq,
maq gaiq nia nail
nee ovqtavq,
maq gov heeq nia-ail.
Alheel maq ngel-ail
nul neq,
aqyu juq ngal jaol nail
bha kovq lal khi,
ngal aqyu juq nail
oeqbal phaiq bhiq naol’ ” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq bhai maq gov heeq kivq ail laiq. Maq gov heeq kivq haq neq, daoqma uqhuq daoq yaoq juq yaoq bhai khalhai khi gov heeq kivq nail-aiq.
Aqiq haiq nail gaq neq, Miqyail nail daoq haiq-a nail ngaol.

Gailkhaol kovtavq bhai haiq-a nail neq, niailhai ngaol. Miqyail nail daoq yaq gaiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail neivq Saqdaq lal khi, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel-ai haiq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai gov ha nail bhai ge nail ngaol.
Lovmav lovyal bhai ga ail-a nail neq, niailhai ngaol. Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail lavqkhiq tsail nail lavqkhoel nee hav bhoel-a nail tsaol-aq bhai ge movq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq daoqtsail maq kha ivq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, teevq yanq maq ngel nail neq, maq doevq nia-ail. Daoq al daoq bhaqda nee, haq nail aoq nail phaq khi mail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq kev lee-u phao, aqyu juq teevq pov taivq-ail khaonq ha gai-aivq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, aqgoe goeyal bhai ga ail-a nail aqiq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq-a nail juq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, khaoqlaol nail phaq, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq khi, yaoq juq yaoq bhai neekhaol jiav nail phaq neq, daoq al daoq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aqheeq maq heeq lee nia nail bhai, ge movq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, miltsaq mil meeq bhai ga ail-a nail aqiq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq khi hav bhoel-a nail ngel-i mail, aqheeq hail tsel bhoil, kovq tsel bhoil, teevq yal bhoil heeq lee-a nail tsaol-aq bhai ge nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Phalmanq tovq khi pheeqdeel-i mail movq tsaoq-ai naol laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, jiovtsiq iqgovq bhai tsiq thaq-ai naol laiq. Phalmanq tovq khi, daqmoe bha tsiq thaq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Khal oil tsail-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nail ngaol. Yu bhai maq bhi heeq kivq nail phaq iqsanl, phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq-i mail khal ya gaiq nail phaq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Nuljuq yu bhai phaiq bhiq hav bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai iqsanl phaiq kovq hav kovq lavq nail nee ovqtavq, al jaiq iqsanl bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bivq laoq nail ngaol. Maq jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai, aqyu juq-i mail khal jiav nail juq bhai, oil dov gil nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul niailhai gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, niailhai dul nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq daiyal bhai aqiq haiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvq kivq kivq lee haq neq, iqthaiq, bhaq lal haq neq, thul thul-ail jaol-u phao, aqiq al aqjiiv jiiv lal eeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqiq al khalhai khi aqjiiv jiiv lal eeq lal nail bhai aivq maq heeq nia-ail.
Miltsaq bhaqda nee, gov meeq lal nail ngaol. Iqmoeq gov bhoiq gov dov dov lal khi, gov nail nail lee gaq-u phao, gov nail mal lal khi, ga govq-ail nail ngaol.
Gov mi lal-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq gaiqaoq oil khi, gov gaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, gov gaiq nail yanq tsaq lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai khul phaq nee tsiqceiv daiq heeq meeq. Daoqma uqhuq daoq khul phaq bhai juq khi, ge daiq bhiq heeq.

Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, gaoqpavq nail aqneev khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Gaoqpavq aqneev al bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai haiq-u phao, aqiq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel nee yu nee maqtsil nil nail phaq, pevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, doevq lal khi moe lal-u phao, heeqlaoq gaoqjal iqsanl nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol. Lavqmeiv meiv lee khi eeq lal-u phao, nqtavq phao bhail nail keivq-avq juq aqhaiq bhai aqkheel kheel lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq gov heeq nia nail khe-ai taivq-ail, Yeiqsul alheel nail daoqma uqhuq daoq maodai yuq yuq-ail, aqyu juq bhai Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoqma uqhuq daoq nee maq ngel nail neq, aivq aqyu juq bhai maq cavq maq cov bhiq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail yaqlaol juq taivq-ail jaol-u phao, ganl al iqsanl mail aqyu juq bhai ge daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol, nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, “Ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha ceiv ail bhel” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma nee pav-ail khi, aivq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail laovq al laovq nee mail yaqlaol juq aivq bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Laovq yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl, aqyu juq nee mail ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, ulcuvq eelkhaol thaoq deedee nail ngel-i mail, laovq lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq bhee lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, laovq nail daoqthaoq phao oiqgoiq goiq khi iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq aivq bhai lav noeq khi, ge bhiq-a nail: “Saqlaq-ol, nvjuq ga nevq heivq gil nail kev lal-aivq nail ngaol. Naoq bhai neq, khaoq maq laol-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul thul lal khi, lilmoel bhai “Aqtsi tsu dai jaol yaoq” dai, khaq khi, eelkhaol bhai naq lai yaoq dai, ge bhiq-u phao, lilmoel lil ma bhoe nail naq lai khi, aqtsi tsu dai pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail nuljuq thoiq dai dai-ail geesil nail-aiq. Neema thaqtsaol nail neema maq aol-ail laiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq geesil deedee lal bhiq khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq khalheel nail tsaol-aq ngel-ail. Lilmoel khi eelkhaol iqsanl aivq nail daoq naldaiq-il” dai, ge nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha jiav nail Gaqdaqlal milkhaoq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul laovq nee mail dov lal-u phao, neivq aqcavq aol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq teevq pov taivq-ail luqdaol nee dov lee khi, Yeiqsul bhai thaoqphuq lee-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq luqdaol bhai taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aivq bhai maq pheethaiq nia-ail. Hailcav-i mail pheethaiq khi ngaol-aoq, maq pheethaiq nia-ail.

Yu aivq bhai hailcav oil khi aqkhil aqlavq bhai mee nia pov pheethaiq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqlavq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail hailcav he ceiv khi, aivq nail aqkhil bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail hailcav iqsanl ngaoq keivq nail ngaol. Aivq gaq kav deedee khi, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl aivq bhai maq lav goil nia-ail.
Nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, luqdaol bhai khi mail gaoqjaoq doi dai gul gul-ail tsao khi, lovmav-i mail aivq nail aqmaol bhai khaoq pav khaoq sav nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul eqyal bha lal thailthaiq nail bhai, tsaol-aq al gaq ya moel-u phao, Yeiqsul nail sivtavq bhai tsaol-aivq khi, uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq mailma-ail gul gul-ail: “Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai eeq jaiq heel jaiq nail Miqyail nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul-ol, naol ngaq bhai khalhai tavq nail-aiq. Naol ngaq bhai thaq khoeq thaq jiovq lavq dei-eiq dai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai ngal naoq bhai hal naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail alhai ge nail dai ngal-aq neq, neivq aqcavq al, aivq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail yaoq dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Naol khul dai mil-ai thaq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Nvjuq mao-ail mao nail ngel-i mail, mao-ail mao nail genl dev nail munl munl ma dai, khul nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Milkhaoq niil khaoq nail lavqkhoel nee nvjuq bhai thaq the dov lavq dei-eiq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai hal deedee nail ngaol.
Gaoqjaoq al jaoq nail beivkhaiq bhai wavq mao deedee nail teevq munl gavjaq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
“Wavq al juq nail lavqkhoel, nvjuq bhai bhi aol ail lavq yaoq” dai, neivq aqcavq al juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul neivq al juq bhai bhi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Neivq aqcavq al juq dov ail khi, wavq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. Wavq al juq beivkhaiq bhai tsao khal-aivq khi, ngaqkha bhai ga puvq heivq gil ail-a nail ngaol. Wavq al juq neq, nvq hinl maol niidai bhee nail ngaol.

Wavq bhai lovq nail juq neq, tsaoq kol-aivq khi, meenq juq, julgu juq bhai ganl al ge gaiq bhiq lai-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, pevq lal-a nail ganl al bhai heldaiq duq nail dai khi, tsaol-aq maodai lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal kev-u phao, neivq aol daiq-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq, aqgaq aqdoi doi khi jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neema aqlil khe-ai pevq kovq lal-a nail bhai iqsanl, ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u nee ganl al bhai khal ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq juq, neivq aol daiq-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq khalhai pevq lal-a nail ganl khi mail, wavq al juq khalhai pevq ail-a nail ganl, yu bhai ge daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nvjuq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee mail dov ail lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul laovq bhai aol ail-u phao, neivq aol daiq-a nail al gaq, “Naoq-ai nee mail bhi jaol lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai hal deedee-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai maq bhi jaol dai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naoq nail ilkhaol bha kovq ail khi, Heeqphaq Miqyail naoq bhai khadai gaoqhaq lavq-a nail ganl naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai ge bhiq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq kovq ail khi, Yeiqsul aivq bhai khadai tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail ganl, Deiqgaqbhaollil milkhaoq doi dai ge bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul laovq jeeq khi nia phao lelkhel bhai gaoq ceiv lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai jaol-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma aivq jaol nail bha jil lal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yaqillu dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq nail aqivq teevq gaq ngaol. Aivq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq nail yaqmiq sil-aiq nail ngaol. Aivq meeq lai khi ya doevq dai, naol aivq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav lee lavq yaoq” dai, hal deedee nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yaqillu nail haoqnao Yeiqsul tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail tsaol-aq mao deedee nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail teevq jaoq tsaol-aq maq thaoq pav tsaol dai, tsao jaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsel-nvq kovq bhee dai, aqsivq dov dov-ail nal thailthaiq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol.

Jagaq coev nail saqlaq maodai gaq-i mail bhi lav sav daiq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq khal jiav nail phaq iqsanl mail gaoq jaq khi lav sav khi ngaol-aoq, maq meeq lai bhiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, gaoq nal jaiq lal bhiq thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq Yeiqsul nail ganl ya gaiq daiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail gaoltsi bhai aivq aol ail khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnaol phao nee, Yeiqsul nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai thoiqtsi ail-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai taivq-ail ngal ya thoiqtsi khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail nalgoel niil meeq lai naol” dai, yaqmai-aq al gaq, aivq bhai aivq ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai thoiqtsi-a ngal-aq, teevq pov taivq-ail, aivq aqsivq dov dov-ail nal thailthaiq nail nalgoel al teevq pov taivq-ail tsil lai khi, “Ngal meeq lai-aoq nial” dai, aivq bhai aivq heeq nia-a nail ngaol.

“Ngaq nail lavqkhoel khe bhaqaoq dov ail-aoq nial” dai, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aivq tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq khi, “Ngaq nail phailkhaoq bhai khaq sil gaq thoiqtsi-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, naoq bhai thaoq gaiq thaoq tsi thailthaiq khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai khaq sil gaq thaoq tsi-a nail-aiq dai, naol naldaiq nail laiq” dai, aivq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail phailkhaoq bhai thoiqtsi-a nail gaq bhai ya moel dai, Yeiqsul neq, jaoqlaol jaoqlaol dai, heldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq aivq nail aqmaol khalhai pevq lal-a nail bhai heeq nia-a nail ngel-i mail, geesil khi aqjuq juq juq-ail aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal khi, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, ganl iqsanl mail daolcoev dai, ge dov bhiq gil-a nail ngaol.

“Yaqmiq-ol, naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol. Neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel nee kovq ail yaoq. Naoq nail nalgoel meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, Yaqillu nail ilkhaol nee tsaol-aq teevq juq lal khi, “Naoq nail yaqmiq sil-aoq nail ngaol. Saqlaq bhai thaq gaoq lav suqsaq” dai, Yaqillu bhai ge gaiq bhiq lal-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq alhai ge khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, Yaqillu bhai: “Khaoq thaq laol. Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Bheiqtuvluv, Yaqkov, Yaqkov nail jaqbheq Yaolhaq, aqyu juq maq ngel nail neq, yu teevq gaq bhai iqsanl aivq nail haoqnao maq bhi tsaothel lavq dai, bhi jaol ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq nail aqivq gaq pevq nail Yaqillu nail ilkhaol bhai ail kev-u phao, nioilkhaoq khaoq khaoq-ail suqsaq thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq khul khi mail nioilkhaoq khaoq khaoq-ail suqsaq thailthaiq nail-aiq. Yaq niil gaq sil-a nail maq ngel-ail. Iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai helsil nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai the dov khi, yaq al gaq nail aqbhu aqma khi aivq-i mail hel laivq-a nail al hail gaq bhai hevq khi, yaq al gaq bavq thaq-ai thaq nail bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul yaqmiq al gaq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi, “Daqlil daq gulmil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Daoqceevq neq, “Yaqmiq-ol, thul yaoq” dai, ge movq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqmiq al gaq teevq pov taivq-ail thul lal khi gailkhaol tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqkovq neq, tsel-nvq kovq bhee nail ngaol. Alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai ya moel-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq deedee ail-a nail ngaol.

“Ganl niil teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoq aqkav kav dai bivq-a nail nee ovqtavq, “Yaqmiq niil gaq bhai aoq bhi jaq yaoq” dai iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail khi, aivq nail jaolkhaoq jaollaoq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail yaqlaol juq iqsanl, aivq nee mail lai-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n n-gaol kev lal-u phao, aivq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq niil heel phaq, khaq bha khe ya thaq nail meeq. Aivq-i mail ya-ai thaq nail neenoeq neekha neq, khalheel nail neenoeq neekha meeq. Niidai dai-ail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail phaq khalhai khi nl dol lavq nia nail meeq.

Aivq neq, Maqlil nail yaqyov aqbhaol thoiq nia nail al gaq maq ngel-ail laiq. Yaqkov, Yaolsai, Yuldav khi mail Silmoq aqyu juq mailnail nail aqivq ivqsaq gaq maq ngel-ail laiq. Aivq nail nailma juq iqsanl, ngadao juq nee mail jaol nail maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge ge-ail aivq bhaqda nee, neema cov nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq bhai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail thaqeeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail jaolkhaoq jaollaoq, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq khi mail, aivq nail ilkhaol khe jaol nail juq neq, aivq bhai maq thaqeeq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq mee nia gaq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi bhi meeq lai-a nail maq ngel nail neq, a bhai neq, bhaqaoq eeq nail phaq teevq phaq-ail maq nl nia-al.
Aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq teevq gu nee teevq gu doi dai ail khi, cavq bhiq cov bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq bhai khul khi, nvq gaq teevq phao, nvq gaq teevq phao dai, khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Neivq aqcavq bhai the dov nia nail bhaqaoq iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoq niailhai bivq-a nail ngaol: “Gailphail nail haqbhoil, joiqniovq teevq khaoq maq ngel haq neq, teevq phaq iqsanl thaq oil-aivq. Phalthaoq iqsanl, khaqmul iqsanl, thaq oil-aivq. Jiovqpavq bhai phul thaq oil bhoel-aivq.
Saiqnaov tsaoq khi, phailkhaoq teevq keiv taivq-ail doil-aivq dei-eiq” dai, ge bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq ilkhaol teevq il bhai il dav dav-ail gaq haq neq, jaol duq al dao bhai khal jaol-u kev dai, a bhai jaol yaoq.

Khaq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhai maq hav dai, nuljuq nail daoq maq naldaiq haq neq, nuljuq a bhai nee dov ail-u phao, aqyu juq nail laiq nail tsa nail phaq bhi dov lal khi salkhil pevq dai, nuljuq nail aqkhil pavq-uvq khe khaqlail naoq khal-ail ceevq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq dov ail khi, “Nuljuq yovqgavq nail oeqbal yovqgavq noeq pov yaoq” dai, daoq cavq daoq cov cov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neivq maodai bhai the dov khi, nal nail tsaol-aq maodai bhai, aqtseel leivq bhiq khi lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail ganl gaiq doi-ail thailthaiq nail bhai Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai uvthaiq nail heeqphaq Heiqlol Aqgilpav ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq gaoq doevq kovq lal-aoq thaq nail niil. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail al juq nl dol lavq nia nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Teevq pav ganav juq neq, aivq bhai, “Eillilya niil” dai, ge khi, teevq pav gaq nav juq neq: “Aivq neq, aq-u Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq khe-ai dul nail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail ganl al, Heiqlol ya gaiq-u phao, “Aivq neq, ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq al gaq nial. Aivq nail uqhuq, ngaq-i mail bhi tsilceiv khi ngaol-aoq, gaoq doevq kovq lal thaq nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl al neq, niailhai ngaol. Jel lal-u phao, Heiqlol neq, yovqgavq nail jaqbheq Pillilpuv nail khaqma Heiqloldil bhai hevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq bhaqda nee, Yaolhaq bhai bhi nieivq-ail khi thaonq bhai bhi laol nail dai khi, Heiqlol daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Naol naoq nail jaqbheq nail khaqma bhai hevq nail neq, maq tsaq-ail” dai, Yaolhaq Heiqlol bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Heiqloldil Yaolhaq bhai neejiav jiav deedee khi, heivq movq-ail bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maq heivq nia haq-al.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yaolhaq neq, tsaq nail daol nail khi mail meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Heiqlol heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, Yaolhaq bhai geesil nail lavqkhoel nee aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail bhiq-a nail ngaol. Heiqlol neq, Yaolhaq cavq nail cov nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, neema maq sal khi ngaol-aoq, naldaiq movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.

Daoq loi loi lal-u phao, Heiqloldil Yaolhaq bhai heivq nail eivq lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Al neq, Heiqlol doevq lee-a nail aqn bhai noeq kev khi bhaoqaiq lav sav nail aqn bhai ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol, aivq nail kov-uvq khe jaol nail eeq nail heel nail juq, genl dev yaq teevq hinl gaq bhai uvthaiq nail juq khi mail, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq lavqkhoel khe jaol nail maivphaoq nal moel jiav nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai, Heiqlol aoqbhaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heiqloldil nail yaqmiq aol lal khi, bhoeloe nioi daiq bhiq-a nail bhai, Heiqlol khi mail aivq nail daq-i al juq iqsanl neekhaol sil deedee nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Heiqlol yaqmiq al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol khal hal movq nail phaq hal yaoq. Ngal naoq bhai bivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, “Naol khal hal nail khe-ai, ngaq nail milkhaoq teevq pav hal khi ngaol-aoq, naoq bhai bivq naol” dai, khanq khanq-ail, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqmiq al gaq dov ail khi, “Ngal khul phaq hal heeq” dai, aivq nail aqma bhai naldaiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqma gaq neq, “Ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nail uqhuq hal yaoq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmiq al gaq Heiqlol jaol nail bha lavqtsail mail gaoq tsaoq kol leevq khi ge nail: “Ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nail uqhuq, thailphail phail ma bhai oil bhoel khi, niil aq-il lavqtsail mail tsil lavq nail bhai, oil movq-ail nial” dai, hal-a nail ngaol.

Heiqlol noeqhaq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail khanq-ai thaq nail daoq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, aivq nee mail jaol khi jaq thailthaiq nail daq-i juq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, yaqmiq al gaq khal ge nail khe-ai maq nl bhiq-ail, khul maq khi nia-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, a bhai lovq nail genl dev nail teevq gaq bhai, lavqtsail mail khoel gai-aivq khi, Yaolhaq nail uqhuq bhi oil ail nail haqbhoil daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Genl dev nail al gaq thaonq bhai aol ail khi Yaolhaq nail uqhuq dev ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, uqhuq al thailphail phail ma bhai oil bhoel khi, yaqmiq al gaq bhai tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmiq al gaq iqsanl, aivq nail aqma bhai tsiq bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol juq ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu juq lal khi, Yaolhaq nail aqmaol bhai luqdaol bha bavq duq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul-i mail khoel gai-aivq-a nail gaqkhoel al juq neq, aivq jaol nail bha kovq jil lal khi, aqyu juq-i mail khal nl khal hal, khal cavq khal cov-a nail iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul bhai ge daiq bhiq gil-a nail ngaol.

“Nuljuq lal yaoq. Tsaol-aq maq jaol nail bha, gaqnaq naq ail bhel” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq maodai ail thail lal thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aoq jaq nail iqsanl, maq dan-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq taivq-ail laovq jeeq khi, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail bha ail-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq dov ail nail bhai tsaol-aq maodai ya moel khi, aqyu juq bhai heldaiq duq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, meenq yaoq meenq yaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, aqyu juq nail iqmoeq daoltavq phao nee tsaoq khi, Yeiqsul khi mail gaqkhoel juq nail iqmoeq tsaoq kel laivq khi jaol-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul laovq nee mail dov lal-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, heldaiq phail nail gaq maq jaol nail yaol khe-ai dul nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoqhaq nail lavqkhoel nee, ganl mee nia phaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Kivq hail hail lee-u phao, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi ge nail: “Niilniai neq, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail haqtsoiq haqyal niil. Nqkivq iqsanl, kivq lee-aiq nial.
Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq niil juq bhai phaiq kovq bhiq khi, aqjail bhai jiav nail julgu juq bhai, jaqjaq daoldaol bhi halpov jaq ail nail maq tsaq-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Nuljuq aqyu juq bhai bhi jaq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Nvjuq khaqmul nvq yal bavq nail aqphoiq ul ail khi, aqyu juq bhai ya bhi jaq nail laiq” dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq khaqmul khadai heeq aol nail-aiq. Heldaiq ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq heldaiq ail khi, “Khaqmul ngaq heeq khi delgil nvq maol aol-ail nial” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl bhai daikhaoq aqsal bhai teevq munl teevq munl dai, bhi jaoldeel nail haqbhoil, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq teevq yal gaq teevq munl ngaq tsel gaq teevq munl dai, alhai munl munl khi jaoldeel-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al ngaq heeq khi mail delgil al nvq maol bhai, Yeiqsul oil khi, nqtavq phao gaollel khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. Aivq khaqmul al ngaoqpav khi yaqlaol juq bhai bivq khi, tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai bhi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol. Delgil al nvq maol iqsanl, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai bhi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail teevq bov ya jaq-a nail ngaol.
Maq jaq gil-ail jaiq lal-a nail khaqmul khi mail delgil al juq bhai yaqlaol juq gov kovq daiq-u phao, pheeqdeel nee mail tsel-nvq deel bhee nail ngaol.
Jaq-a nail tsaol-aq juq yaqyov-aq taivq-ail ngaq hinl gaq niidai bhee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai: “Nuljuq laovq jeeq khi, ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha jiav nail Bheiqjeildaq meenq bhai ngaq nail iqmoeq nee ceiv ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq tsaol-aq munl munl ma nee pav ail gaq khi, gaoqjaoq bha geeqlaoq hal lai nail dai, lai-a nail ngaol.
Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, laovq al laovq ngaqkha nail gaoltsi bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul neq, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail yaqlaol juq lilmoel bhai tsiqdaq khi, laovq ya e nail bhaqda nee gaq doil doil deedee nail bhai, aivq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yavphoil doil thao naqli hail lavq jaiq ail-u phao, Yeiqsul ulcuvq kovtavq bhai gailkhaol tsao tsao-ail, aqyu juq jaol nail bha lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai, aivq ail jel nail khi mail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Yeiqsul ulcuvq kovtavq bhai tsao nail bhai ya moel-u phao, teevq phaq ganav nail aqheel khul-il dai, noeq khi, gul deedee-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, aivq bhai moel khi geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Neema ivqdao dai, jaol yaoq. Ngal ngaol. Nuljuq thaq geesil” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai teevq pov taivq-ail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq aqyu juq jeeq-nq thaq nail laovq bhai aol ail-u phao, lilmoel maq bhoe dai naq lai-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq teevq peivq-ail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq ngaq hinl gaq bhai bhi jaq-a nail ganl al iqsanl, aqyu juq maq noeq heeq maq noeq moel nia-ail. Aqyu juq neema aqgaol ngel-i mail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bhai ceiv ail khi, Geiqneiqsaqlail milkhaoq bhai ail kev-u phao, laovq pheethaiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq laovq nee mail dov ail-u phao, Yeiqsul niil dai, a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq al juq, teevq pov taivq-ail heldaiq heeq nia-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq milkhaoq al khaoq doi dai, tsaol-aivq khi, Yeiqsul jaol naol dai, khal ge nail dao bhai nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, iqjial bheebhaoq nee bal lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq khal ail nail julgu bhai maqkhaiq, meenq bhai maqkhaiq, yalkhaoq yallaoq bhai maqkhaiq, yu jil lal duq bhai nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai bavq thaq lal-a nail ngaol. “Naoq nail phailkhaoq phaildaoq bhai taivq-ail ngaol-aoq, bhi thoiqtsi lavq yaoq” dai, nal nail tsaol-aq al juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol. Khal thoiqtsi-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee lee-a nail Phaqliqsail juq khi aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq pav ganav juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha jil lee-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail yaqlaol teevq pav ganav juq aqlavq maq haol-ail aoq jaq nail bhai, aqyu juq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqlavq maq haol nail dai, ge nail neq, aol jiav nail khe-ai, aqlavq maq tsiq nail bhai ge nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail juq khi Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq thaoq thaoq-ail, aqlavq maq tsiq haq neq, aoq maq jaq-ail.

Leiv jiivq-ail khi kovq lal-u phao, aqlavq maq tsiq-u phao neq, aoq maq jaq-ail. Al ovqtavq, maiqgaoq kovqlaol iqlaoq haqbhaoq juq bhai tsiq nail aolsaolkovq khi, aol yaoq juq yaoq maodai aqyu juq thaoq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail juq khi aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail naoq nail yaqlaol juq aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq maq thaoq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail, aqlavq maq haol-ail aoq jaq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Ilsaqyal-i mail nuljuq nail ganl Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan-ai thaq nail neq, tsaq deedee-ail nial. Aivq ge nail,
‘Tsaol-aq niil jeq-e
niil jaq-a neq,
moeqthaoq ngaq bhai
ev khi ngaol-aoq,
neema neq,
ngaq-ai nee eqyal yal
deedee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ngal bhai
uqhuq thaoq nail neq,
khul teevq phaq-ail
ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
tsaol-aq-i mail
thaoq khal
leevq thaq nail
aolsaolkovq bhai,
ngaq nail daoq dai
saol-nvq khi,
cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail
ngel-i mail ngaol’ dai,
Ilsaqyal ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq bhai neq, nuljuq ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq bhai nuljuq alhai nieivq thaiq nia dai, nuljuq neegeel yuq nail ngaol.

Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel-ai, ‘Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ya ev naol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq khi, ‘Yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai iqkhail yavq nail tsaol-aq, heivq nail bhai ya daq naol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq niailhai cavq nail cov nail ngaol: ‘Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai, ngaq-i khal jiav nail naoq bhai bivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq, Miqyail bhai danq bhiq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge gaq haq neq,
yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai maq heldaiq bhiq mail khaonq kivq naol dai, nuljuq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol.

Alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail lavqkhoel nee, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail aolsaolkovq bhai thaoq nia dai, Miqyail nail daoq bhai aqdeq bhi deq ail-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul nail maodai phaq iqsanl, nuljuq nl nail hal nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai gaoq khul jil khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq iqsanl mail aqmeeq-ai naldaiq khi niilniai heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Lavqniil phaoq khe juq neq, tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lal khi bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nia nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jiav-ail. Tsaol-aq nail neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail juq neq, tsaol-aq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nail ngaol.
[Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.]
Aivq tsaol-aq munl munl ma nee pav ail khi, ilkhaol bha aol lai-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq aivq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq al daoq nail ganl, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq iqsanl maq gov heeq kivq-ail laiq. Lavqniil phao nee tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bha khal aol ail nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, tsaol-aq bhai maq bhi jiivq maq bhiq cavq lal nia-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neema lavqkhoel bhai maq aol ail. Ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai kev ail khi, lavqniil dov ha gil nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ge nail neq, jaq nail phaq iqsanl mail aqhaol ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, aivq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq nail neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail juq neq, tsaol-aq bhai bhiq jiivq bhiq cavq lal nia nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq nail neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail juq neq, niil juq naol: Haqeiv nail phaq saol-nvq nail, khaqmiq sev nail, yu nail yalkav khoiq nail, tsaol-aq bhai heivq nail,

yu nail miqyaq yovyaq bhai bheeq nail, neekhaol jiav nail, haqeiv nail phaq nl nail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail, yu nail uqhuq bhai jaq nail, yu bhai ge doil nail, neema eeq nail heel nail, yaqjaoq jaoq nail, niil heel juq ngaol.
Maq meeq maq jaq nail niil juq iqsanl mail, tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail phaq pevq khi, tsaol-aq bhai bhi jiivq bhi cavq lal nia nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail khi, Dullu meenq khi Sildoq meenq phao ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq ilkhaol teevq il bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq a bhai jaol nail bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq bhiq heeq kivq movq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq maq jaol uvq nia-ail.

Neivq aqcavq aol nail yaqmiq teevq gaq nail aqma Yeiqsul nail ganl ya gaiq khi, teevq pov taivq-ail lal khi mail, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngaq nail yaqmiq bhai aol lai thaq nail neivq bhai the dov lee lavq yaoq” dai, aivq Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Sulliv milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Iqmoeq yaq juq bhai teevq bov ya bhi jaq nail ngaol. Yaq nail aoq tsiq khi, kheeq bhai bhi jaq nail maq tsaq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol ge nail tsaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, kheeq neq, yaq juq-i mail kovqkhail kov-uvq bhai jaq khal-ai thaq nail juq bhai mevq jaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol thailhai ge nail ngel-i mail, kovq ail yaoq. Naoq nail yaqmiq bhai aol nail neivq dov ail-aoq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq aivq nail ilkhaol bha kovq kev ail-u phao, aivq nail yaqmiq bhai aol daiq-a nail neivq al maol dov ail khi, aivq nail yaqmiq iqjial bhai iqthaiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul Dullu meenq aqjail nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq Sildoq meenq khi Deiqgaqbhaollil milkhaoq nee ail pav khi, Gaqliqlail ngaqkha bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, naqthaoq thaoq khi daoq aqmeeq-ai maq ge nia nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai, yu Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. “Aivq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bhaq dav bhiq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel nee hevq dol-ai khi, yu maq moel nail bha hel-aivq a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq nail naqkhaol bhai lavqnoil tsaoq bhoel-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, thaiqkhaq thaiq khi aivq nail moeqlal bhai thoiq leivq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul nqtavq phao gaollel khi, aqhaq haq ma gaol kha nail lavqkhoel nee, “Ilphaqdaq” dai, ge nail ngaol. Daoqceevq neq, phao lal yaoq dai, ge nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq naqkhaol gaiq nia lal khi, daoq aqmeeq-ai ge nia lal-a nail ngaol.

“Ganl niil teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq aqyu juq bhai daoq nia-al bivq haq neq, niaq-al gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov-ail pevq-ail khi ge nail: “Aivq khul phaq nl khi ngaol-aoq, aqmeeq phaq teevq-eel ngaol. Naqthaoq thaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq nia lal dai, nl bhiq khi, daoq maq ge nia nail tsaol-aq bhai daoq ge nia lal dai iqsanl, nl bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aqn aqyanq mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, tsaol-aq munl teevq munl gaoq jil lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq jaq nail teevq phaq-ail maq jiav-ail pevq lal-u phao, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai khul khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:
“Tsaol-aq niil juq bhai ngal gaoqhaq-ail nial. Aqyu juq ngaq-ai nee mail jaol-a nail hail n bhee lal khi, jaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-aoq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq bhi jaq dai, bhi kovq ail haq neq, gailphail lail ma bhai kovq ail thailthaiq-u phao, gaq juq lal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, eqyal nee lal-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niidai mao nail bhai bhi jaq bhi daol nail haqbhoil, niilheel nail tsaol-aq maq jaol nail haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaqjaq daoldaol khaq sil gaq halpov dov-ail nia heeq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq khaqmul khadai heeq aol nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq-u phao, “Khaqmul sivq heeq aol nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Miltsaq bhai jaoldeel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al sivq heeq oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq gaq khi ngaoqpav-a nail ngaol. “Tsaol-aq niil juq nail sivtavq bhai tsiq thaq bhiq-ail yaoq” dai, ge khi, aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail sivtavq bhai tsiq thaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq delgil maol yaq mee nia maol gaoq aol nail ngaol. Al nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai Yeiqsul gaoq tsiqeeq khi, tsaol-aq munl al juq bhai, delgil al gaoq bhi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq teevq bov jaq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, jaiq lal-a nail juq bhai yaqlaol juq gaoq gov kovq daiq-u phao, pheeqdeel nee mail sivq deel bhee nail ngaol.
Jaq-a nail tsaol-aq juq, liq hinl gaq niidai bhee nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al juq bhai bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail teevq pov taivq-ail laovq lavqkhoel bhai aol ail khi, Daqmaqnuldaq milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail teevq gaq ganav juq Yeiqsul nee jil pheel jil lul jaq lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai laonqdaiq movq nail ngel-i mail, “Nqtavq kovtavq khe bhiq heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl daiq lavq yaoq” dai, hal nail ngaol.

Aivq aqhaq haq ma gaol kha khi ge nail: “Yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq neq, khul khi mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq hal daiq nail ngel-ail. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq bhai, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl daiq bhiq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nee mail pav ail khi, laovq jeeq khi mail, ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq khaqmul nioilpeivq-ail ceevq-a nail ngel-i mail, laovq lavqkhoel bhai khaqmul teevq heeq taivq-ail aol nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Phaqliqsail juq nail deqtsiq khi mail heeqphaq Heiqlol nail deqtsiq bhai, nuljuq aqmeeq-ai heldaiq khi yaolphaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol juq neq, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai khaqmul maq oil leevq thaq nail ganl taivq-ail, ge nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq alhai ge thailthaiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul heeq nia khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Khul khi mail, khaqmul maq oil leevq thaq nail ganl taivq-ail, nuljuq ge thailthaiq nail-aiq. Niil aq-il kev dai, nuljuq maq gov heeq dai, jaol nail laiq. Nuljuq thoi dai dai-ail neema gaol nail laiq.
Nuljuq maivneev covq nail, maq moel nia dai, naqkhaol covq nail, maq gaiq lal-ail laiq. Maq noeq dai, nioilpeivq gil-aoq nail laiq.

Ngal khaqmul ngaq heeq ngaoqpav khi tsaol-aq ngaq hinl gaq bhai bhi jaq-u phao, nuljuq jaiq lal-a nail khadai deel gov bhee-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, “Tsel-nvq deel gov bhee-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngal khaqmul sivq heeq ngaoqpav khi tsaol-aq liq hinl gaq bhai bhi jaq-u phao, nuljuq jaiq lal-a nail khadai deel gov bhee-a nail-aiq” dai, gaoq naldaiq-u phao, “Sivq deel gov bhee-a naol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il kev dai, nuljuq maq noeq heeq haq-al laiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Bheiqjeildaq meenq bhai aqyu juq ail kev-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha maivpeivq teevq gaq hel lavq khi, teevq pov bhi thoiqtsi nail haqbhoil, Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul maivpeivq peivq nail al gaq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi, meenq meenq jail bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail maivneev bhai thaiqkhaq thaiqbav bhiq khi, aivq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav bhiq khi mail: “Naoq bhai teevq phaq ganav moel lal-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq bavq lel daiq khi ge nail: “Ngal tsaol-aq bhai moel lal-aoq naol. Aqyu juq neq, aqbhaol khe-ai dul khi ngaol-aoq, gailkhaol tsao-il” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail maivneev bhai teevq pov gaoq thoiqtsi bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq aqmeeq-ai teevq pov gaoq heldaiq-u phao, maivneev moel haol nia lal khi, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail, moel haol nia lal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, “Meenq lavqkhoel bhai thaq aol lai dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq khi, ilkhaol bhai bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Pillilpuv-i

Yaqlaol juq aivq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq naoq bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq niil dai, ge nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, Eillilya niil dai, ge khi, teevq pav ganav juq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav niil dai, ge nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq thoil, ngaq bhai khaq sil gaq niil dai ge heeq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Naol neq, Khali nial” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngaq nail ganl teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai niailhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, maodai phaq ya daq deedee nail ngaol. Aqivq aqtsu juq, Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq-i mail khaonq ha nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Yu-i mail bhi heivq nail bhai kev dai, ya daq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n kev lal haq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ganl al iqsanl mail aivq bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ge daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai hevq dol-aivq khi, khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq jaol nail phao haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq khi, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Neivq Saqdaq-ol, gailkhaol phaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq nail neenoeq neq, Miqyail nail neenoeq maq ngel-ail. Tsaol-aq nail neenoeq teevq-eel ngaol” dai, khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai khul jil khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq movq haq neq, yovqgavq nail neekhaol ya khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, yovqgavq nail lavqyavq yovqgavq bavq khi, ngaq nail haoqnao ya tsaothel lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq yovqgavq bhi jel-ail movq haq neq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq sunq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail haqbhoil khi mail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail haqbhoil, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhi sunq-ail haq neq, doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav miltsaq niil teevq heeq heeq lao ya gil khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail doevq nail phaq sunq-ail haq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq.
Tsaol-aq al gaq, aivq nail doevq nail phaq bhai khul-i mail ul kovq nia nail-aiq.

Khaqmiq sev nail phaq khi oeqbal mao deedee nail yeel niil yeel nail lavqkhoel, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, ngaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail daoq bhai maqkhaiq, haqsil haq neq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov iqsanl, aivq nail Aqbhu nail seiqleiq khaoqsail doi khi meeq nail haol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq nee mail yavq kha lee-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai haqsil naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Niilniai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail bhaqaoq teevq bhee kev lee nail bhai maq ya moel-u kev dai, maq ya sil-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Kovq n jel ail-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, Bheiqtuvluv, Yaqkov khi Yaolhaq bhai taivq-ail hevq khi, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail gaoqjaoq daqmoe teevq jaoq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail sivtavq nee aqmaol phal lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi phulleq dai, pevq lal khi aqbhaq bhaq deedee nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqgaq aqdoi laiqtsiq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, aqdai dai-ail maq laiqtsiq haol nia-ail.
Eillilya khi Molseiq iqsanl aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai dov lee khi, Yeiqsul bhai daoq ge tsaoq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, ngadao niai jaol nail neq, aqmeeq nial. Nvjuq yavqtsoel hail tsoel cov naol. Naoq nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel, Molseiq nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel khi, Eillilya nail haqbhoil teevq tsoel cov naol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq geesil deedee nail ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv maq noeq maq mav-ail ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqdil aqyu juq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol. Aivq nail daoq naldaiq yaoq” dai, nqdil al nail lavqkhoel nee aqthel meel dov-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq teevq pov taivq-ail jaoq jaoq-ai heldaiq-u phao, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq moel-al. Yeiqsul taivq-ail aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq gaoqjaoq al jaoq nee mail yavq kha lee thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov maq doevq kovq lal-u phao kev dai, nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail ganl niil, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai noeq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Gaoq doevq kovq lal nail dai, ge nail neq, khul bhai ge movq nail meeq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Eillilya neq, Khali nail iqmoeq lee nail ngaol dai, khul khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq ge nail-aiq” dai, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaq naol. Eillilya iqmoeq lee khi, iqsanl bhai aqmeeq-ai lav sav thaq-ai lee nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, mee nia phaq bhai ya daq khi thaqtheq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai, khul khi mail gevq-ai thaq nail-aiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Eillilya lee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail ganl Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq yaq juq aivq bhai khal nl movq nail khe-ai, nl bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail yaqlaol al hail gaq, yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha kovq kev lee-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma yaqlaol al juq bhai jaoljaoq-ai thaq khi, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, yaqlaol juq nee mail jil pheeljaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl munl lao-ail Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, tsaol-aivq khi hav-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq aqyu juq nee mail khul nail ganl nee jil pheeljaq thailthaiq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Saqlaq-ol, ngaq nail yaqyov naol jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqjaoq bhi jaoq-ail nail neivq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.

Neivq al maol aivq bhai khal nieivq-u phao, miltsaq bhai nieivq thaoq nieivq tuv bhiq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, moeqthaoq nee khaqmevq bhulmevq dov lal khi, haoqgil keivq keivq-ail, aqmaol gaol li cevq dai, pevq-ail nail ngaol. Neivq al maol the dov lavq yaoq dai, naoq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ngal hal khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq maq the dov nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Niil yeel nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail neema maq aol-il. Ngal nuljuq nee mail khaq mao kev dai ya jaol-ai haq nail-aiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai khaq mao kev dai, ya ol-ai haq nail-aiq. Yaqyov al gaq, ngal jaol nail bha hel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq yaqyov al gaq bhai, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Neivq al maol Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, yaqyov al gaq bhai bhi bhaoq bhi ga-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq miltsaq bhai ga tsuq-ail khi, moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee khaqmevq bhulmevq laiv laiv dai, tev nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail yaqyov niailhai pevq lal-a nail, khaq mao nee ngel-aoq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqbhu gaq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao nee niailhai pevq nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Aivq bhai bhi sil nail dai khi, miqjaq bhai maqkhaiq, ulcuvq bhai maqkhaiq, neivq aivq bhai mee nia pov doeq puvq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Naol teevq phaq ganav nl kivq haq neq, nv-nvq phaqyaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, aqbhu gaq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nl kivq haq neq dai, naol ge nail laiq. Neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl kivq nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqbhu al gaq nioil nioil-ail khi ge nail: “Ngal neema thaqtsaol naol. Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aol lal dai, tsaojao-ai lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma aqyu juq jaol nail bha tsaol lavq thailthaiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, neivq aqcavq al maol bhai khaq khaq-ail, “Yaqjaoq bhi jaoq-ail khi naqthaoq bhiq thaoq-ail nail neivq-ol, aivq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail yaoq. Yaqhao teevq pov iqsanl, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai thaq gaoq aol lal dai, ngal naoq bhai daoq bivq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, neivq al maol aqthel mailma-ail gul gul-ail, yaqyov al gaq bhai bhi bhao bhi ga deedee khi mail, dov ail-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq sil-aoq thaq nail khe-ai dul nail ngel-i mail, “Aivq sil-aoq thaq nial” dai, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi he thul bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq thul lal-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ilkhaol bha aol lai khi, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq neq, “Khul khi mail nvjuq neivq al maol bhai maq the dov kivq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Geeqlaoq hal nail phaq maq ngel nail neq, neivq al phaq bhai maq the dov kivq-ail” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq a bhai nee dov ail khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq phao ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ail thailthaiq nail ganl, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq bhi heeq kivq movq-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq yaqlaol juq bhai niailhai cavq bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq bhai tavq heivq nail ngaol. Tavq heivq khi hail n kev lal haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai maq gov heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai maq naldaiq tseq-ai bhiq-ail.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, “Nuljuq gailphail bhai lee-u phao khul nail ganl nee jil pheeljaq lao nail-aiq” dai, aivq yaqlaol juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq aqtsi tsu dai, jaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Ngadao juq nail lavqkhoel bhai khul gaq eeq jaiq nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq gailphail lail ma bhai teevq gaq nee teevq gaq jil pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul jaoldeel khi, yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Yu nail iqmoeq bhai jaol movq nail tsaol-aq neq, yu nail haoqnao ya jaol khi, iqsanl nail yaqkav iqmoeq ya jiovq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai aivq yaqnoil teevq gaq hevq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaq al gaq bhai aivq tsiq khi, aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Ngaq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee, niilheel nail yaqnoil teevq gaq bhai hav-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai hav-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai hav-a nail tsaol-aq neq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai iqsanl hav-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, tsaol-aq teevq gaq naoq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail bhai, nvjuq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngadao juq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai maq aol nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq aivq bhai lav tsoiq-a nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aivq bhai thaq lav tsoiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq khi bhaqaoq eeq nail phaq nl daiq bhiq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai lavqtsail mail, maq ge doil-ail.
Ngadao bhai neejiav jiav nail phao maq jaol nail tsaol-aq, ngadao phao jaol nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq Khali nail tsaol-aq niil dai, heeq nia khi, nuljuq bhai ulcuvq teevq khaoqanq khal bhi daol lavq-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq al gaq nail geeqlaoq teevq thal-iq maq peivq-ail nia ail dai” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail yaqnoil teevq gaq bhai bhi nl laiq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, aivq nail leelkhaol bhai lovmav heeq ma pheethaiq khi, iqyaq iqma bhai bavq puvq-ail nail neq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Naoq nail aqlavq teevq lavq naoq bhai bhi nl laiq lavq haq neq, dev ha pivq yaoq. Aqlavq nvq lavq nvq lavq-ail covq khi, maq miv-ail dai miqjaq tovq nail daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai ya daq nail nee maqtsil, aqlavq teevq lavq maq covq dai aqdoevq doevq nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
[Daqovq laoma eeltsul lavqkhoel bhai neq, aqyu juq bhai keivq nail lovthaoq teevq thal-iq maq sil nail nee ovqtavq, miqjaq iqsanl teevq thal-iq maq miv lai-ail.]

Naoq nail aqkhil teevq khaoq naoq bhai bhi tsao laiq lavq haq neq, devq ceiv pivq yaoq. Aqkhil nvq khaoq nvq khaoq-ail covq khi, daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq poiv lavq nail bhai ya daq nail nee maqtsil, aqkhil teevq khaoq devq ceiv khi aqdoevq ya doevq nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
[Daqovq laoma eeltsul lavqkhoel bhai neq, aqyu juq bhai keivq nail lovthaoq teevq thal-iq maq sil nail nee ovqtavq, miqjaq iqsanl teevq thal-iq maq miv lai-ail.]

Naoq nail maivneev teevq neev heldaiq khi naoq bhai bhi nl laiq lavq haq neq, kevq dov ha yaoq. Maivneev nvq neev nvq neev-ail covq khi, daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq bhoel lavq nail bhai ya daq nail nee maqtsil, maivneev teevq neev taivq-ail covq khi Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai ya aol lai nail neq, naoq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
Daqovq laoma eeltsul lavqkhoel bhai neq, aqyu juq bhai keivq nail lovthaoq teevq thal-iq maq sil nail nee ovqtavq, miqjaq iqsanl teevq thal-iq maq miv lai-ail.
Laol bhiq nail phaq bhai cavqdevq hoeldav khi, bhi haol lal nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai miqjaq-i mail laonqdaiq khi, bhi haol lal nail ngaol.

Cavqdevq neq, ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, cavqdevq niail nail phaq deq-ail haq neq, khalhai khi gaoq bhi niail lal nia nail-aiq. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai cavqdevq bhi aol khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaq lai jil lai khi jaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul jaol duq al dao nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel ceiv ail khi, al nail lao tsao ail kha khi, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma aivq jaol nail bha jil lee khi, aivq khaq mao iqsanl cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi, “Yovjil neq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai kovq khaoq naol laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Molseiq nuljuq bhai, daoq khalhai bivq-ai thaq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Kovq nail haoqgavq teevq keiv gevq bhiq gaq haq neq, kovq kivq naol dai, Molseiq daoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq neema gaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail haqbhoil daoq al daoq gevq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nqtavq miltsaq teivq-u phao, yaqyov-aq khi mail yaqmai-aq bhai teivq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, yaqyov-aq neq, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma nee gaoq ail khi, yovqgavq nail khaqma nee mail jaol ail nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq teevq gaq taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq neq, nvq gaq maq ngel yaoq-aol. Teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail oil jil-ai thaq nail bhai, tsaol-aq yaq maq ya lav pav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ilkhaol bhai kovq kev ail-u phao, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai, ganl al naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq yovqgavq nail khaqma kovq khi yaoq gaq yaoq bhai hevq haq neq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai nl bheeq nail phaq nl-aoq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, khaqma teevq gaq yovqgavq nail yovjil bhai kovq khi, yaoq gaq yaoq bhai maol ail haq neq, yovqgavq nail yovjil bhai nl bheeq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Yeiqsul-i mail bhi thoiqtsi nail haqbhoil, yaqnoil juq bhai hevq khi, aivq jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqnoil hevq ha lal-a nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai, yaqlaol juq-i mail khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai khaq bhiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, neema phail lal bhiq khi yaqlaol juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Yaqnoil juq ngal jaol nail bha bhi lal yaoq. Aqyu juq bhai thaq lav tsoiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, aqyu juq kheel yaqnoil juq bhai ovq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaqnoil khe-ai Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai maq hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, a bhai maq ya aol lai-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqnoil al juq bhai aivq tsiq khi, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi geeqlaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gailkhaol dov ail nail khi-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq tsaol leevq khi, aivq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi ge nail: “Meeq nail saqlaq-ol, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya kivq dai, ngal khul phaq ya nl nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Khul khi mail naol ngaq bhai meeq nail saqlaq dai, khul nail-aiq. Miqyail maq ngel nail neq, meeq nail teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail.

Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq heeq nia nail ngaol. Yu bhai thaq lav heivq. Yu nail khaqma nee thaq bheeq thaq leel. Yu nail nlmaoq thaq khoiq. Yu bhai maq tsaq nail salkhil thaq khanq. Yu bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi thaq geel jaq. Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Saqlaq-ol, ngal yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao nee, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al juq iqsanl mail, naldaiq gil-aoq nail ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq al gaq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai heldaiq khi aivq bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol teevq phaq loq-ai haq nail niil. Naol kovq ail khi naoq nail ildaoq maoqgaiq iqsanl mail gaoq ha khi, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bhoil bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai mao-ail phoiq nail naoq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq jiav lal naol. Aq-u phao, naol kovq lal khi, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, maivphaoq niaq laq khel dai pevq ail khi, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, ildaoq maoqgaiq maodai jiav nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq jaol nail phao tsiq phaoq khi, “Hulmeeq hulbhao juq, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail neq, khadai haq nail ngel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al daoq bhai yaqlaol juq ya gaiq-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai aol lai nail neq, khadai haq nail ngel-ail.
Laolthao geevqjieivq geeq naq bhai aol lai nail neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail nee maqtsil ngaq-aiq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, gaoq pevq deedee-ail khi, “Thailhai phal-iq neq, khaq sil gaq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nia nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai naldaiq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai heldaiq khi ge nail: “Niil neq, tsaol-aq yaq nl nia nail phaq maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nl nia nail ngaol. Miqyail maq nl nia nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heldaiq yaoq. Nvjuq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, naoq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq nail haqbhoil khi mail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail haqbhoil, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol, aqivq jaqbheq, aqbhu aqma, yaqmiq yaqyov khi daiyal, niil juq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq,

yeel niil yeel nail lavqkhoel ilkhaol, aqivq jaqbheq, aqma, yaqmiq yaqyov, daiyal, niil juq teevq yal bhoil ya kovq nail ngaol. Alheel nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq iqsanl ya daq nail ngaol. Yaqhao khe yeel lavqkhoel bhai neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq iqsanl ya nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il yu nail iqmoeq jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai yu nail haoqnao ya jaol nail ngaol. Niil aq-il yu nail haoqnao jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai yu nail iqmoeq ya jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai-a nail ngaol. Gailphail bhai lai thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail iqmoeq lai-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq noeq-u maq dov-ail pevq-ail khi, haoqnao phao tsaothe jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geesil nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq bhai khul khi, aivq khalhai ya daq nail ganl iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Naldaiq yaoq. Ngadao juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai thailthaiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, a bhai Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai, yu-i mail av bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Aivq ya sil dai, aqyu juq yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, yu nail jeq-e nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aivq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl nail ngaol. Thaiqkhaq iqsanl thaiqbav khi, aivq bhai neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq gaq haq neq, heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n kev lal haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Seiqbheiqdail nail yaqyov Yaqkov khi mail Yaolhaq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Saqlaq-ol, nv-nvq mail-i mail hal nail khe-ai nv-nvq mail bhai, bhi nl lavq movq-ail nial” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nul-nq nvq mail nail haqbhoil ngal khul bhi nl bhiq movq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq mail bhai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq mail ge nail: “Seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel, naoq nail joiqjaq doiqbev kovtavq bhai naol jaoldeel-u phao, nv-nvq mail bhai lavqmal phao teevq gaq, lavqtsel phao teevq gaq dai, bhi jaoldeel lavq yaoq” dai, hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nul-nq nvq mail hal nail phaq bhai nul-nq nvq mail maq heeq nia-ail. Nul-nq nvq mail ngal ya daol nail khaoqanq daol tsaol naol laiq. Nul-nq nvq mail ngal ya daq nail khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail phaq, daq tsaol naol laiq” dai, aqyu nvq mail bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Daq tsaol daol tsaol naol” dai, aqyu nvq mail ge kovq bhiq-u phao, Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nul-nq nvq mail ngal ya daol nail khaoqanq ya daol naol. Al ovqtavq, nul-nq nvq mail ngal ya daq nail khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail phaq ya daq naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail lavqmal phao lavqtsel phao bhi jaoldeel dai, ngal maq nl kivq-ail. Jaol duq al neq, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu nvq mail bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq nail aqtsaoq yaqlaol tsel gaq ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, Yaqkov khi mail Yaolhaq aqyu nvq mail bhai neema phail lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq iqsanl bhai khul jil khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Yu nail jeq-e nail heeqphaq heeq ma juq neq, milkhaoq yaq juq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq jiav khi, aqivq aqtsu jiovq khi uvthaiq nail juq iqsanl yovqgavq khal noeq nail khe-ai uvthaiq nia nail bhaqaoq jiav nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq alhai maq ya khi-ail. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel yu nee maqtsil eeq movq heel movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail yaqkav ya jiovq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel aqivq jiovq movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail yaqkav ya jiovq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, yu aivq nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail dai khi, lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq yu nail yaqkav jiovq lee khi, tsaol-aq maodai bhai ul kovq lee nail dai khi, sildan lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqlilkhol meenq bhai ail kev khi pultavq, aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq nee mail, Yeiqlilkhol meenq nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Thilmail nail yaqyov Bhaqthilmail dai mil-ai thaq nail maivpeivq peivq nail teevq gaq, gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, hal jaq hal daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

A bhai ail thailthaiq nail al gaq, Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul ngaol dai, Bhaqthilmail ya gaiq-u phao, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, aivq bhai aqkav kav dai, gul bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yu maodai aivq bhai khaq bhiq khi, “Aqtsi tsu dai jaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq maq naldaiq dai, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil gul kav lal khi, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, gul bhiq-a nail ngaol.
