Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul naq lai khi, “Aivq bhai khul lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq maivpeivq al gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq lai-a nail: “Gaq maq bhaq dai, thul yaoq. Aivq naoq bhai khul thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq aivq nail phailkhaoq heelma loev ha-ail ceevq khi, tsaoq thul khi mail, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol.
“Naoq nail haqbhoil ngal khul bhi nl bhiq movq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Saqlaq-ol, ngaq nail maivneev moel lal dai, bhi nl lavq movq-ail nial” dai, hal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Kovq ail yaoq. Naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq teevq pov taivq-ail maivneev moel lal khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai kev nail aqjail jail lal khi, Saqloq gaoqjaoq nail aqjail bhai jiav nail Bheilphaqjeiq julgu khi mail Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol nvq gaq bhai iqmoeq phao, khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq yaqlaol al nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq iqmoeq phao jiav nail julgu bhai lai yaoq. Nul-nq nvq gaq julgu bhai aol lai teevq thaiq tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl maq jeeq daiq-a nail moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq teevq maol pheethaiq-ai thaq khi jaol nail bhai, ya moel naol. Cevpheel khi niilniai tseel leevq yaoq.

‘Khul khi mail thailhai nl nail-aiq’ dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav naldaiq lal haq neq, ‘Heeqphaq loq nail ngaol. Lavqtsail mail gaoq bhi tseel kol leevq naol’ dai, ge bhiq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq lai thailthaiq-u phao, gailkhaol gailbhaq khe ilkhaol teevq il nail lolgov bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq teevq maol moel khi, neeqtsaq cevpheel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, a bhai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq juq: “Nul-nq nvq gaq moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq nail neeqtsaq pheel khi, khul khi nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aqyu nvq gaq ge kovq bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq maq lav tsoiq dai, bhi tseel laivq-a nail ngaol.
Moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq al maol bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha tseel lavq khi, aqyu juq nail aqgaq aqdoi kheq dav bhiq khi, Yeiqsul bhai bhi jeeq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq maodai yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi yovqgavq gailkhaol bhai kheq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq neq, yaljail bhai bhuq tsil khi, gailkhaol bhai kheq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail iqmoeq khi haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail juq niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Hoqsaqnaq,
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
aqmil kov-uvq nee
lee nail gaq
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq.
Kev lee thailthaiq nail
ngadao nail aqbhal
heeqphaq Daqbhil
nail milkhaoq
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq.
Hoqsaqnaq,
nqtavq kovtavq
bhai iqsanl,
aivq bhai
tsiq eeq dei-eiq” dai,
mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha aol lai khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail heldaiq doi gaq-u phao, nqkivq kivq lee-a nail ngel-i mail, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq hevq khi, Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai lai-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, aqyu juq Bheiqtaqnil julgu nee mail dov ail-u phao, Yeiqsul aoq moevq lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq eqyal bhai lee thailthaiq-u phao nee, aqpavq maodai covq nail heeqguq aqbhaol teevq bhaol ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqbhaol al bhaol aqheeq heeq-ail laiq dai, heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq aqjail bhai ail kev-u phao, heeqguq aqheeq heeq nail yanq maq tsaq nail ngel-i mail, aqpavq taivq-ail covq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

“Yanqgaol nee ngal-aq, naoq nail aqheeq bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl thaq ya jaq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul heeqguq aqbhaol al bhaol bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ge nail bhai aivq nail yaqlaol juq gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi, a bhai yalkav gaoq yalkav ul nail tsaol-aq juq bhai the ha khi, phul dovq phal bhiq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq juq nail kovqkhail khi mail, khaoqkhoiq gaoq thailthaiq nail juq nail doiqbev bhai maqkhaiq, ngaoq ha-a nail ngaol.
Yalkav teevq phaq ganav phi phi-ail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel nee, maq ya ail pav ail dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai lav tsoiq-a nail ngaol.
“ ‘Ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai,
jeq-e jaq-a
iqsanl nail haqbhoil
geeqlaoq hal nail ilkhaol dai,
ya khul naol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ilkhaol niil il bhai khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel nail ilkhaol bhi pevq lal thaq nail niil” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai heivq nail haqbhoil gailkhaol halpov-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq munl juq iqsanl mail, aivq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail bhai noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq Yeiqsul bhai geesil nail ngaol.
Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq meenq nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq nqhao navqmav-ail, gailkhaol al khaol bhai aqyu juq gaoq lee-u phao, heeqguq aqbhaol al bhaol daoqtsail bhai kev dai, bhagul gul-ai thaq khi jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv noeq dov lal khi, “Saqlaq-ol heldaiq. Naoq-i mail iqkhail yavq-a nail aqbhaol al bhaol, bhagul gul ail-aoq thaq nial” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, neema pov pov lav lav dai maq pevq mail, yovqgavq-i mail khal ge-a nail khe-ai pevq lal naol dai, neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel, gaoqjaoq niil jaoq bhai, ‘Naoq nail jaol duq nee dov ail khi, iqyaq iqma bhai ga puvq ail yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-u phao, aivq-i mail khal ge nail khe-ai pevq lal nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq teevq phaq ganav ya dai, geeqlaoq hal-u phao, ya naol dai, neema thaqtsaol khi hal haq neq, nuljuq-i mail khal hal nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Nuljuq thul khi geeqlaoq hal-u phao, naol tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq thailthaiq nail ngel haq neq, oeqbal al phaiq bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu iqsanl, nuljuq-i mail nl bheeq lav bheeq-a nail phaq bhai oeqbal phaiq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
[Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq yu bhai oeqbal maq phaiq bhiq haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq khe jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu iqsanl nuljuq-i mail nl bheeq lav bheeq-a nail phaq bhai oeqbal maq phaiq lavq-ail.]

Aqyu juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha teevq pov gaoq lai kev-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai tsao thailthaiq-u phao, Philma juq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq aivq jaol nail bha lal khi ge nail:
“Naol khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi niil juq nl thailthaiq nail-aiq. Khaq sil gaq naoq bhai alyaq bivq lavq-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq daoq naldaiq la dei-eiq. Nuljuq ge kovq lavq haq neq, ngal khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi niil juq nl thailthaiq nail ganl, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq naol.
Yaolhaq ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail al, Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq. Ngaq bhai ge lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai niailhai ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol: “Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao ge haq neq, ‘Thailhai phal-iq neq, nuljuq khul khi mail Yaolhaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail-aiq’ dai, Yeiqsul ge lal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol dai, ge heeq laiq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai maoqbhaoq nl pheeljaq-a nail ngaol. Yaolhaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl al juq bhai geesil nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, “Nvjuq maq heeq kivq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Alhai dul dai, khaq sil gaq-i mail ngaq bhai alyaq bivq lavq khi ganl niil juq nl thailthaiq nail bhai, nuljuq bhai maq ge bhiq-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n neq, aivq aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiiv kha khi, gaoqkhail aqmeeq-ai nl tsoiq khi, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq lav sav khi, gaoqkhail bhai lovq nail ilkhaol daqmoe teevq il cov-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq bhai ngaq bhiq-ail ceevq khi, yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq mi lal khi koevq nail yanq tsaq lal-u phao, gaoqkhail al khail khe aqheeq tsilju aqheeq aivq bhai ovq nail juq ya dai, gaoqkhail nl nail juq jaol nail bha aivq nail yaqkav teevq gaq bhi lai-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq yaqkav al gaq bhai, nieivq thaiq khi deeq khi aqnieivq-ail bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq pov yaoq, yaqkav yaoq gaq yaoq bhai aqyu juq jaol nail bha gaoq bhi lai-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq yaqkav al gaq nail uqhuq deeq pav khi, khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq pov yaoq, yaqkav yaoq gaq yaoq bhai aqyu juq jaol nail bha gaoq bhi lai-u phao, aqyu juq aivq bhai deeq heivq-a nail ngaol. Yaqkav yaoq juq yaoq mee nia gaq bhai gaoq bhi lai-u phao, aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq bhai deeq khi, teevq pav ganav juq bhai, deeq heivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aivq nail yaqyov teevq gaq taivq-ail jail lal-a nail ngaol. ‘Aqyu juq ngaq nail yaqyov bhai ev-ail jaol-aq’ dai, ge khi, haoqnao naosaq khe pov neq, aivq nail yaqyov bhai bhi lai-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq ge nail: ‘Aivq neq, jaiqbhoil ovq nail gaq ngaol. Yaoq. Aivq bhai heivq bhel. Alhai nl haq neq, aivq nail jaiqbhoil ngadao juq ya nail ngaol’ dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq aivq bhai nieivq khi, heivq khi, gaoqkhail lavqniil phao he ha ail-a nail ngaol.

Gaoqkhail nail ilheel gaq gaoqkhail nl nail juq bhai khalhai nl bhiq nail dai, nuljuq noeq nail-aiq. Aivq kovq lal khi, aqyu juq bhai heivq khi, gaoqkhail al khail yaoq juq yaoq bhai, gaoq ngaq bhiq nail ngaol.
‘Ilkhaol cov nail
tsaol-aq-i mail
bavq ha-a nail
lovmav al heeq,
jioivqloiv daoqthaoq bhai
kaovq-a nail
lovmav heeq ma
pevq lal nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Miqyail-i mail
alhai nl-ai thaq al neq,
ngadao nail sivtavq bhai
noeq-u maq dov nail phaq
pevq nail ngaol’ dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail bhai nuljuq maq ge daiq al laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq ngadao juq bhai ge movq nail niil” dai, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai maq nieivq dai, dov ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, khalhai khi mail Yeiqsul daoq ya ge bheeq dai, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq khi mail Heiqlol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq lal khi ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naol neq, maldil tsaq nail daoq taivq-ail ge nail ngaol. Naol teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq geesil-ail dai, nvjuq heeq kivq naol. Naol maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel dai, Miqyail nail gailkhaol daolcoev dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Gailsaq bhai khaon dov bhiq nail tsaq naol laiq. Maq tsaq-ail laiq. Ngadao juq khaon ya dov bhiq naol laiq. Maq ya dov bhiq-ail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq moeqthaoq teevq phaq ge khi, neema teevq phaq aol nail bhai Yeiqsul heeq nia khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail nuljuq ngaq bhai laonqdaiq nail-aiq. Ngal ya moel dai, phul teevq bavq oil lavq daiq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq iqsanl oil lavq-a nail ngaol. “Khaq sil gaq nail maolkhoel, khaq sil gaq nail aqmil aol nail ngel-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Heeqphaq Gailsaq nail niil” dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Gailsaq bhai tavq nail phaq neq, Gailsaq bhai bivq yaoq. Miqyail bhai tavq nail phaq neq, Miqyail bhai bivq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq aivq bhai noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq maq doevq kovq lal nia-ail dai, ge nail Saqduqgail teevq pav ganav juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, niailhai naldaiq lal-a nail ngaol:

“Saqlaq-ol, Molseiq ngadao nail haqbhoil niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail algao, yaq maq jaol lee-u nee sil haq neq, algao gaq nail jeq-e jaq-a maq ya peivq-ail dai, jaqbheq gaq aivq nail aqtsu bhai ya hevq nail ngaol dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Jel lal-u phao, mailnail sivq gaq jaol-a nail ngaol. Aqivq ivqsaq gaq khaqma hevq khi, yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail, sil-a nail ngaol.
Nvq gaq teevq gaq iqsanl yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai hevq khi, yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail sil-a nail ngaol. Hail gaq teevq gaq iqsanl alhai sil-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, mailnail sivq gaq sivq gaq-ail yaq maq jaol lee-al. Mailnail al juq sil gil-a ngal neq, yaqmai-aq al gaq iqsanl sil-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal-u n-gaol, yaqmai-aq al gaq khaq sil gaq nail khaqma pevq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq mailnail sivq gaq sivq gaq-ail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai hevq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq neq, Jalliq bhai iqsanl, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhai iqsanl maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail noeq bheeq-ai thaq nail niil.
Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal-u n-gaol, hevq pheel maol pheeljaq nail phaq maq bhao-ail. Nqtavq gaqkhoel khe-ai pevq lal nail ngaol.

Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ganl ge lavq bhel. Miqyail Molseiq bhai ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, Molseiq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel-ai nuljuq maq ge daiq al laiq. Jiavbuv nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail al dao bhai, niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail Miqyail, Ilcav nail Miqyail khi mail Yaqkov nail Miqyail ngaol’ dai, Miqyail Molseiq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq nail Miqyail maq ngel-ail. Aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq nail Miqyail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq noeq bheeq deedee-ai thaq nail niil. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq gaq, aqyu juq jil pheeljaq nail bhai ya gaiq khi, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai aqmeeq-ai ge kovq bhiq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai, khul daoq eeq jaiq nail-aiq” dai, aivq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Eeq jaiq nail daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, naldaiq yaoq. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Miqyail neq, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail Heeqphaq ngaol.
Naoq nail neema iqsanl, naoq nail aqhaqlal iqsanl, naoq nail neenoeq needul iqsanl khi, naoq nail gaq iqsanl mail naoq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai gaiq-a yaoq.

Nvq daoq teevq daoq neq, ‘Naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq.’ Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq niil nvq daoq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail daoq, maq jiav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail al gaq ge nail: “Tsaq naol. Saqlaq-ol, Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol khi, aivq maq ngel haq neq, Miqyail yaoq gaq yaoq maq jaol-ail dai, naol ge nail neq, tsaq deedee-ail nial.

Al ovqtavq, neema iqsanl, neenoeq needul iqsanl khi, gaq iqsanl aivq bhai gaiq-a khi, naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a nail neq, miqjaq bhai bavq poiv khi laol bhiq nail iqsanl dai khi, laol bhiq nail yaoq juq yaoq nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq saol-nvq-ail, ge kovq nail bhai Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, “Naol neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai mao-ail maq eq-aoq thaq nial” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, Yeiqsul bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq naldaiq tseq dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Khali bhai Daqbhil nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, khul khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq ge nail-aiq.
Daqbhil neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq juq-ail ge nail:
‘Heeqphaq Miqyail
ngaq nail Heeqphaq bhai
ge bhiq-a nail:
Naoq bhai neejiav
jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai
naoq nail aqkhil
kov-uvq bhai
ngal bhi jaol-u
n-gaol kev dai,
ngaq nail lavqmal phao
jaoldeel yaoq’ dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Daqbhil Khali bhai Heeqphaq dai, khul nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, aivq khalhai khi Daqbhil nail yaqyov pevq nia nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl munl ma al munl, aivq nail daoq bhai naldaiq movq-ail bhiq nail ngaol.

Aivq cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, phailkhaoq heelma doi doi-ail tsao movq nail ngaol. Leiv lavqkhoel bhai tsao-u phao, yu aqyu juq bhai bhi ev movq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai sivtavq phao jiav nail khaoqsail eeq nail doiqbev bhai jaoldeel movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, khaoqsail eeq nail jaol duq bhai, jaoldeel movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, miqtsiq miqma juq nail ilkhaol khi ildaoq maoqgaiq iqsanl bhai khoeq jaq kav jaq khi, yu ya moel dai, geeqlaoq heelma ma dai hal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yu nee maqtsil yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul phul danq duq nail sivtavq phao jaoldeel khi, tsaol-aq maodai phul danq lal nail bhai heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Hulmeeq hulbhao maodai gaq phul maodai oil bhoel lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, haq nail aoq nail miqtsiq miqma teevq gaq lal khi, giqheel meivbhaiq nvq bhaiq oil bhoel-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai khul khi, ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Niai khe phul danq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel nee, haq nail aoq nail miqtsiq miqma niil gaq neq, yu nee maqtsil danq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq al juq neq, maodai jiav nail lavqkhoel nee oil dov khi, danq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqmai-aq niil gaq neq, mao-ail haq nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq aqdoevq doevq nail haqbhoil khal jiav nail iqsanl mail oil dov khi danq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nee dov ail thailthaiq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol teevq gaq, “Saqlaq-ol, heldaiq. Lovmav niil juq khi mail ilkhaol niil juq khadai eeq nail ngel-ail” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol eeq deedee nail ilkhaol niil juq bhai moel thailthaiq-ail nial. Niilniai lovmav teevq heeq nail kovtavq bhai teevq heeq maq jiav nia-u kev dai, peiv-ail leiv-ail gil naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail a phao bal-nvq phao jiav nail Saqloq gaoqjaoq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv, Yaqkov, Yaolhaq khi mail Aqdaiqlaiq, aqyu juq taivq-ail lal khi ge nail:
“Al juq khaq mao pevq lal nail-aiq. Al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal nail aqjail jail lal-u phao, nvjuq khalhai ya heeq kivq nail-aiq. Ge lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl nuljuq bhai maq ya hevq bheel-aivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq maodai ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, ‘Ngal neq, Khali ngaol’ dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq ge ge-ail, tsaol-aq maodai bhai hevq bheel-aivq nail ngaol.

Aqjail bhai genl dev thailthaiq nail aqthel bhai maqkhaiq, eqyal bha genl dev nail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq ya gaiq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, thaq geesil dei-eiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, al juq ya pevq lal nail ngaol. Al juq pevq lal khi ngaol-aoq, daoq loi loi lai nail yanq maq kev lal haq-al.

Jeq-e teevq jeq-e khi mail teevq jeq-e, milkhaoq teevq khaoq khi mail teevq khaoq genl dev pheeljaq lal nail ngaol. Teevq dao nee teevq dao milluv luv lal nail ngaol. Moevq nail sivq nail phaq iqsanl kev lee nail ngaol. Al juq pevq lal nail neq, haq dee aoq deedee nail iqmoeq khe teevq-eel ngel-ai haq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol khi aqdoevq doevq yaoq. Nuljuq bhai yu pheethaiq khi, yalkhaq dal duq bhai hel-aivq lavq naol. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai yu nuljuq bhai neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngal bhaqda nee, uvthaiq nail juq khi mail heeqphaq juq nail sivtavq bhai ya thulphaol lai khi, salkhil ya khanq lai naol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai iqmoeq ya cavq ail bhiq nail ngaol.

Yu nuljuq bhai hel-aivq lavq khi aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-u phao, nuljuq khalhai ya ge ya thail nail meeq dai, khaoq thaq laol. Aqyanq al lavqkhoel Miqyail nuljuq bhai bhi ge bhi thail lavq nail khe-ai, ge yaoq thail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, daoq ge nail gaq neq, nuljuq maq ngel-ail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yovqgavq nail mailnail nail gaiqlaq bhai teevq gaq nee teevq gaq sil dai, yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol. Aqbhu juq iqsanl yovqgavq nail yaq sil dai, av bhiq nail ngaol. Yaqmiq yaqyov juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma bhai pheeq khi bhi deeq heivq nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqmil bhaqda nee tsaol-aq iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoq loi loi lai-u kev dai, ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Daqyeiqlal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, luq-ail seil-ail nail aqjiivq aqcavq phaq al, maq bhi jiav khaoq nail jaol duq bhai jiav lal thaq nail bhai nuljuq ya moel-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq gaoqjaoq phao tsaoq dal laivq yaoq. (Haoqgavq niilniai khal ge nail tsaol-aq juq neq, gov heeq nia dei-eiq.)
Khaolpoiv bhai dav nail juq yavq kha lee-u phao, tsaoq yaoq. Yalkav oil ail nail dai khi, ilkhaol bhai thaq aol ail.
Yalgaol bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, tsaoq yaoq. Ilkhaol bha kovq ail khi, yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi thaq he ail.
Aqn aqyanq al kev lee-u phao, aqhaq aqmaol liq nail yaqmai-aq juq khi mail, aqtsil cuvq yaq jaol nail aqma juq neq, gaoqhaq khal haq-ail ya noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol.
Nuljuq ya tsaoq nail yanq al yanq coevqjieiv jieiv nail yanq bhai maq ya tsaq dai, geeqlaoq hal yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail-i mail miltsaq teivq-u n-gaol nee yanqgaol kev dai, maq pevq lal daiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, yaqhao iqsanl maq pevq lal nail, haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel bhai kev lee nail ngaol.

Miqyail yanq al yanq bhai maq lav nil lavq haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl maq jel-ail nia-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil Miqyail yanq al yanq lav nil bhi nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, ‘Heldaiq lal yaoq. Khali niilniai jaol-ail nial. A bhai jaol-ail nail ngaol’ dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nuljuq bhai ge lal khi ngaol-aoq, neema thaq thaqtsaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maldil Khali maq ngel nail juq dov lal naol. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail juq iqsanl dov lal nail ngaol. Khi kivq haq neq, tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl hevq bheeq nail dai, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov nail phaq khi mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq, nl daiq lavq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq yaolphaol yaoq. Maq pevq lal-u nee mail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Haq dee aoq deedee nail al jel ail-u phao, nlma navtsee dai pevq ail khi, bhala iqsanl aqbhaq maq bhaq dai, pevq ail nail ngaol.
Aqgil juq nqtavq nee ga kha lee khi, nqtavq khe bhaqaoq juq iqsanl luv luv dai, dao lal nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail khi mail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee nqdil jeeq khi yavq kha lee nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel nail ngaol.

Miqyail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq bhai mil ma liq phaoq liq khoel bhai khoel gai-aivq khi, nqjail miljail a phao nee nia phao dov dai jaol nail, aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bhi hevq jil lavq nail ngaol.
Heeqguq aqbhaol bhai heldaiq khi, ganl niil bhai noeq thaq yaoq. Aqbhaol al lavqmeiv meiv lal khi, bhoenaiq naiq lal haq neq, jaolla yanq dov lee-aiq nial dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq ganl al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-u phao, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov kovq kha lee nail yanq aqjail jail lal-aoq thaq nial dai, heeq kivq-ai thaq yaoq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yeel niil yeel maq gil-u nee mail, al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal nail ngaol.
Nqtavq khi miltsaq peivq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail daoq neq, maq peivq-ail dei-eiq.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl aqn aqyanq al maq heeq nia-ail. Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail. Aqbhu Miqyail taivq-ail heeq nia nail ngaol.
Aqyanq al yanq khaq mao kev lee nail dai, nuljuq maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq hal nail lavqkhoel nee yaolphaol yaolphaol-ail daonq yaoq.

Aqyanq al neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq bhai ail-a nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Aivq ail nail khi-u phao, aivq nail yaqkav teevq gaq gil-aq teevq gaq bhai ganl bhoil bhiq ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai lovq nail gaq bhai iqsanl, aqmeeq-ai lovq dei-eiq dai, daoq bivq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ilheel gaq kovq lal nail neq, nqkiv maq heeq, hul-iq tsilma maq heeq, yavphoil doil lal-u phao maq heeq, nqhao phao maq heeq, khaq mao kovq kev lal nail dai, nuljuq maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aqgeel geel dai, jaol yaoq.
Alhai maq ngel haq neq, aivq thaiqphuq dai kovq kev lal-u phao, nuljuq iqthaiq thailthaiq nail bhai, aivq ya moel nail ngaol.
‘Aqgeel geel dai jaol yaoq’ dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq thailthaiq nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai gail ge bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvq n jel-ail haq neq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq khi deqtsiq maq goe dai, khaqmul lav sav nail bhaoqaiq kev lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khalhai khi mail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail lavqkhoel nee Yeiqsul bhai nieivq khi ya heivq dai, naoqjaoq nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq niidai nail maq ya suqsaq lal dai, bhaoqaiq niil lav sav-u phao, thaq nieivq haq lao-oq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

Niaoqbhaoq daol daiq-a nail Silmoq dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq, Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai jaol nail ngaol. Yeiqsul aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aoq jaoq jaoq khi aoq jaq thailthaiq-u phao, yaqmai-aq teevq gaq aol lal-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq, mao-ail phoiq nail huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel deq nail phulleq deel lovmav malcavq teevq cavq tsil lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq malcavq al cavq deeq pav khi, huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel al Yeiqsul nail uqhuq bhai hoel dav bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neema phail phail-ail khi ge nail: “Khul khi mail ganl maq tsoiq nail bhai, huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel thoil yuq ha nail-aiq.
Huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel thoil gaoq haq neq, hail yal bavq jaiq dai, ya-ail nial
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aivq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl thaq gaoq ge. Khul khi mail, nuljuq aivq bhai lav tsoiq nail-aiq. Aivq ngaq bhai aqmeeq phaq nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Haq nail aoq nail juq neq, nuljuq nee khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhiq movq haq neq, khul yanq bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq bhai aqmeeq phaq nl bhiq kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, nuljuq nee mail khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail maq ngel-ail.
Yaqmai-aq niil gaq aivq khal khi kivq nail khe-ai nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai duqpheeq nail haqbhoil, maq duqpheeq-u nee, aivq huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq hoeldav lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil miltsaq doi dai, cavq bhiq ail-u phao, yu aivq bhai noeq kev dai, yaqmai-aq niil gaq-i mail nl-a nail ganl niil iqsanl ya cavq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail Yuldav Ilsaqgaqliqoq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq, Yeiqsul bhai aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail haqbhoil, Philma juq jaol nail bha lai-a nail ngaol.

Philma aqivq juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail deedee khi, “Naoq bhai phul bivq naol” dai, ge ceiv-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul bhai Philma juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail khaq mao eivq lal-ail dai, Yuldav halpov-a nail ngaol.

Deqtsiq maq goe dai, khaqmul lav sav nail bhaoqaiq iqmoeq-u n-gaol, Bhaqsaqkhaq yaol yaol yaq laol bhiq nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol, aivq nail yaqlaol juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq kivq dai, naoq nail haqbhoil khul dao bhai bhi lav sav thaq-ail movq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq meenq lavqkhoel bhai aol ail yaoq. A bhai meldel bavq-nvq thaq nail yaqyov-aq teevq gaq bhai ya thaoqphuq nail ngaol. Aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq yaoq.

Aivq khul il bhai aol ail khi ngaol-aoq, nul-nq nvq gaq ilheel gaq bhai niailhai ge bhiq yaoq: ‘Saqlaq ge nail: Ngal ngaq nail yaqlaol juq nee Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq kivq dai, ngaq nail haqbhoil lav sav-ai thaq nail daq-i naq duq, khaq bha jiav nail geiq’ dai, naldaiq ail dei-eiq.

Aq-u phao, pultavq teiv-nvq bhai jiav nail aqmeeq-ai lav sav-ai thaq nail daq-i naq duq teevq dao, aivq nul-nq nvq gaq bhai hevqdaiq lavq nail ngaol. A bhai ngadao juq nail haqbhoil lav sav thaq ail yaoq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq khi khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol al nvq gaq dov ail khi, meenq bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq Yeiqsul-i mail ge nail khe-ai ya moel khi, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq nail haqbhoil lav sav ail-a nail ngaol.
Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, Yeiqsul yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq nee mail lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aoq kivq jaq thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe, ngaq-ai nee teevq dao bhai taivq-ail jaq nail gaq, ngaq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq noeqhaq lal bhiq khi, “Ngal laiq, ngal laiq” dai, teevq gaq khai-aq teevq gaq, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe, ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaoq bhai taivq-ail jaq nail gaq ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, aivq nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ya sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq maq doevq lee-a nail kheel nul neq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aoq kivq jaq thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul khaqmul oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al ngaoqpav khi, “Oil jaq yaoq. Niil neq, ngaq nail aqmaol ngaol” dai, ge khi, yaqlaol juq bhai tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail khaoqanq tsiq khi, Miqyail bhai gaoq tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq aqyu juq bhai tsiq bhiq khi, aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee daol-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq ge nail: “Niil neq, daoqma saljial aqsivq bhai tavq nail, ngaq nail aqsivq ngaol. Aqsivq niil, tsaol-aq maodai nail haqbhoil bhi il lee nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqsivq ngal maq ya daol-u n-gaol kev dai, ngal aqheeq tsilju nail ullul maq daol yaoq-aol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq tsiqeeq nail daoqsel gul nail daoq gul khi, Saqloq gaoqjaoq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq iqsanl mail ngaq bhai khaonq ha ail ceevq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
‘Yaol lovq nail gaq bhai
ngal deeq heivq khi,
yaol juq peiv-ail
leiv-ail nail ngaol’ dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal doevq kovq lal gaq haq neq, nuljuq nail iqmoeq nee Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Yu iqsanl neema cov khi ngaol-aoq, ngal neema maq cov-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yanq-nl kiv yavphoil nvq pov maq doil lal nail gaiqlaq bhai, naol ngaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai, hail pov kev dai, jil nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngal naoq-ai nee teevq gaq khe-ai ya sil khi ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai, maq jil-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv Yeiqsul bhai mailma-ail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl mail, alhai ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Geiqseiqmaqnil dai, khul nail dao bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. “Ngal geeqlaoq hal-ail thailthaiq-u phao, nuljuq niai daonq dei-eiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq Bheiqtuvluv, Yaqkov, Yaolhaq aqyu juq bhai taivq-ail hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq geesil deedee khi, neema lavqkhoel bhai haq aoq nl deedee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq hail gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal noeqhaq nail sil lee-aiq nial. Niilniai aqgeel geel dai, daonq dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq sivtavq phao micil jiiv ail khi, miltsaq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, “Aqyanq niil ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail kivq haq neq, bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Aqbhu-ol, ngaq nail Aqbhu-ol, naol yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nia nail ngaol. Haq dee aoq deedee nail khaoqanq niil ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neema tsaq nail khe-ai, thaq bhi pevq. Naol neema tsaq nail khe-ai, bhi pevq yaoq” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq kovq lal-u phao, aqyu juq iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel khi, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Silmoq-ol, naol iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail laiq. Naqli teevq lavq taivq-ail iqsanl aqgeel geel dai, maq jaol tsaol-ail laiq.

Nuljuq jalmul mul nail haoqnao maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai, aqgeel geel dai, jaol khi geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Nuljuq nl movq nail neema aol khi ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil phao gaq bhaq nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq gaoq ail khi, iqmoeq khe pov hal-a nail khe-ai, geeqlaoq gaoq hal ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq gaoq kovq lal-u phao, aqyu juq iqthaiq nul deedee nail ngel-i mail, iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail bhai, gaoq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai khalhai ya ge kovq bhiq heeq dai, maq heeq nia-ail.

Hail pov teevq pov aivq kovq lal khi ge nail: “Nuljuq iqthaiq iqthaiq-ail gaqnaq naq-ai haq nail laiq. Gaq-ao naol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai haqeiv nail tsaol-aq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail aqyanq kev lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Thul yaoq. Lai bhel. Thoiq, ngaq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail gaq aqjail bhai kev lee-aoq thaq nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail, Yuldav dai mil-ai thaq nail al gaq lee-a nail ngaol. Thaoma khi doiqthoi bavq-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq iqsanl, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail ngaol. Philma juq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi, aqivq aqtsu juq-i mail, aqyu juq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail al gaq, aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol: “Nuljuq aivq bhai heeq nia dai, ngal aivq bhai moeqsaol saol naol. Aq-u phao, aivq bhai nieivq khi, aqmeeq-ai tseel-aivq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq kev lee-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lee khi, “Saqlaq-ol” dai, ge khi mail, moeqsaol saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqjail bhai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq, aivq nail thaoma gaol dov khi, Philma nail yaqkav bhai tsil gai-aivq khi, naqkov teevq phao bal-nvq ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq tsaolpheel bhai nieivq nail khe-ai, thaoma khi doiqthoi bavq khi, ngaq bhai nieivq lee-a nail laiq.

Ngal yaoq n yaoq-ao nee uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, nuljuq jaol khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq nieivq-ail. Niailhai pevq lal-a nail neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai bhee lal dai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol” dai, aivq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqlaol juq iqsanl mail, aivq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, tsaoq gil-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqyov-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq, haoltaiv deel haqphal-i mail yavq-ai thaq nail bheeyaq teevq keiv lee jeeq khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq bhai nieivq nail khi-u phao,
aivq bheeyaq al keiv loev ha-ail ceevq khi, maoldeq laqnel-ail, tsaoq jel-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq, Yeiqsul bhai Philma jaol nail bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Philma juq, aqivq aqtsu juq khi mail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq iqsanl, a bhai jil lal-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv neq, Philma nail ilkhaol nail khainl lavqkhoel phao kev dai, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao al jaiq-ail maq eq nail bhai, tsaothe jaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Philma nail yaqkav juq nee jaoldeel lai khi, aqcoevq loil thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Philma juq khi maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl lao-ail, Yeiqsul bhai ya deeq heivq dai, aivq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel-al.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq aivq nail ganl maq tsaq nail salkhil khanq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail khanq nail salkhil al maq dul lai-ail.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq thul lal khi, Yeiqsul nail ganl maq tsaq nail phaq salkhil niailhai khanq nail ngaol:

“ ‘Aqlavq-i mail cov-ai thaq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma niilniai ngal peiv ha khi, aqlavq-i mail maq cov-a nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma yaoq il yaoq, hail n nail lavqkhoel cov phal naol’ dai, aivq ge nail bhai, nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq salkhil alhai khanq khi ngaol-aoq, khanq nail salkhil al maq dul lai-ail.

Aq-u phao, Philma aqivq gaq aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai thul lal khi, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq niil juq naoq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq thaq-ail, salkhil khanq nail bhai, naol khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge kovq bhiq-ail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge kovq bhiq dai, aqtsi tsu dai jaol nail ngaol.
“Naol neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail Miqyail nail Yaqyov Khali dai, khul nail al gaq ngaol laiq” dai, Philma aqivq gaq aivq bhai gaoq naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal neq, al gaq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai maqkhaiq, nqdil jeeq khi yavq kha lee nail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq ya moel nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Philma aqivq gaq aivq nail phailkhaoq aivq he pav khi ge nail: “Ngadao juq khul nail salkhil gaoq loq nail-aiq.

Aivq Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail bhai, nvjuq ya gaiq-ao nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khalhai noeq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, “Aivq sil nail tsaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq iqsanl mail neema tsaq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Yeiqsul bhai thaiqkhaq thaiqbav-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail maivphaoq bhai maivpheeq pheeq khi, aivq bhai deeq deeq-ail khi ge nail: “Naoq bhai khaq sil gaq deeq nail-aiq dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq khe-ai, nvjuq bhai ge daiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Philma nail yaqkav jiovq nail juq iqsanl, aivq nail bhaqbha bhai teiv-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqtuvluv ilkhaol nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, Philma nail yaqkav yaqmai-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq lee-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq, Bheiqtuvluv aqcoevq loil thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq khi, “Naol iqsanl, Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul nee mail jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol ge nail daoq bhai, ngal maq heeq kivq-ail. Gov iqsanl maq gov heeq kivq-il” dai, Bheiqtuvluv jil-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, lolgov jiav nail phao Bheiqtuvluv aol ail-a nail ngaol. Yaqkav jiovq nail yaqmai-aq yaqnoil al gaq Bheiqtuvluv bhai gaoq moel khi, “Thoil gaq aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai aol nail teevq gaq ngaol” dai, aqjail bhai thulphaol nail juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Maq ngel-ail” dai, aivq teevq pov gaoq jil-a nail ngaol.

Teevq yanq gaoq khi al ngal-aq neq, a bhai thulphaol nail juq ge nail: “Naol neq, maldil aqyu juq nee mail tavq nail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq nail aqthel neq, Gaqliqlail tsaol-aq nail aqthel niil” dai, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai aivq iqkhail yavq yavq-ail, “Nuljuq-i mail ge nail gaq bhai, ngal maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, khanq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq pov taivq-ail yavphoil nvq pov teevq pov gaoq doil dov lal-a nail ngaol. “Yavphoil nvq pov maq doil lal-u phao, naol ngaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai, hail pov kev dai, jil nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul-i mail aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq al daoq bhai, Bheiqtuvluv noeq dov lal bhiq khi nioil deedee-a nail ngaol.

Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u phao, Philma juq, aqivq aqtsu juq, Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail maoqbhaoq nl nail bhai aol nail munl munl lao-ail maoqbhaoq nl-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul bhai pheethaiq khi, heeqphaq Phillav jaol nail bha hel-aivq khi aivq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Phillav Yeiqsul bhai “Naol Yuldav tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq ngaol laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Naol ge nail khe-ai, ngel naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Philma juq neq, Yeiqsul nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal mee nia phaq thaq nail ngaol.
“Naol teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge kovq bhiq laiq. Aqyu juq naoq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal khadai thaq thailthaiq nail ngel-ail” dai, Phillav Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul daoq teevq daoq iqsanl maq gaoq ge kovq bhiq-a nail bhaqda nee, Phillav noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav thailthaiq-u phao, thaonq bhai aol nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel khe, milkhaoq yaq neema tsaq khi hal dov nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai, Phillav ya phaiq dov bhiq nail aol jiav nail ngaol.

Yanq al yanq lavqkhoel, milkhaoq bhai suqsaq lal dai nl nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq bhai heivq-a nail ngel-i mail, thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq munl jaol nail ngaol. Bhaqlaqbhal dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq iqsanl aqyu juq nail munl bhai aol khi thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma Phillav jaol nail bha lal khi, “Yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee mail, naol nl lavq nail khe-ai, nl lavq yaoq” dai, hal lai-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq nail haqbhoil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq bhi phaiq movq-ail laiq” dai, Phillav aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Philma juq Yeiqsul bhai neekhaol maq sil-ai bhiq nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai av lavq thaq nail niil” dai, Phillav heeq nia nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Yeiqsul bhai maq phaiq-ail, Bhaqlaqbhal bhai phaiq yaoq dai, ge dei-eiq” dai, Philma juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai gaq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Thailhai phal-iq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq dai nuljuq khul nail gaq bhai ngal khalhai ya khi bhiq nail-aiq” dai, Phillav aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-u phao,
“Aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.

“Khul khi mail bhi tavq heivq movq nail-aiq, aivq haqeiv nail phaq khul nl-a nail-aiq” dai, Phillav aqyu juq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, “Aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil gul kav lal-a nail ngaol.

Phillav tsaol-aq munl munl ma neema tsaq dai, nl movq nail ngel-i mail, Bhaqlaqbhal bhai phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Yeiqsul bhai neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq khi lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq” dai, daoq bivq khi, genl dev nail juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Genl dev nail juq-i mail Yeiqsul bhai genl dev nail aqivq juq jaol nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai hevq bhoel-aivq khi genl dev teevq munl munl lao-ail, a bhai bhi jil lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nel nav nav nail heeqphaq nail phailkhaoq heelma bhi doi-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqgoe aqjiav oil khi, heel uqtsaoq khe-ai jievq khi, aivq bhai nieivq tsaoq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai ev nail khe-ai tavq khi, “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq-ol, naol geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq” dai, meelnaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq lunl aqkhaoq-i mail aivq nail uqhuq bhai deeq deedee-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai thaiqkhaq thaiqbav bhiq khi, peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi mail, aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aivq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq gaq-al nee ngal-aq neq, aivq-i mail doi-nq thaq nail nel nav nav nail phailkhaoq heelma nieivq loev khi, aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi gaoq bhi doi-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq nail dai khi, aivq bhai hevq dol-aivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Khulleiqniq meenq bhai jaol nail Silmoq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq, yalgaol nee kovq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Aqleiqsaqdul khi mail, Lulphul nail aqbhu ngaol. Genl dev nail juq aivq bhai nieivq khi, Yeiqsul nail lavqyavq bhi bavq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Gaollaqgaoldav dai khul nail dao, Yeiqsul bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aqmil al mil neq, uqcov bhai khul nail ngaol.
Mullaq dai khul nail huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel kheq-ai thaq nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqyu juq aivq bhai bhi daol khi ngaol-aoq, aivq maq daol-al.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq gaq khi mail, aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi khul gaq khul keiv ya nail dai, eellaoq bheq khi bhoilpav khi oil-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-a nail yanq neq, nqhao laoma phao naqli goiq lavq bhai ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq ngaol dai, aivq bhai oeqbal thaq nail haoqgavq gevq khi, aivq nail kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, khoiqbhaoq nvq gaq bhai iqsanl, lavqmal phao teevq gaq, lavqtsel phao teevq gaq dai, tavq thaiq-a nail ngaol.
[“Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail aivq bhai saol-nvq bhoel-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail Jalliq daoq al daoq bhee lal-a nail ngaol.]

Khal ail khal lal nail tsaol-aq juq, uqhuq jiivq jiivq-ail, aivq bhai meelnaq meelnaq-ail khi ge nail: “Al lal naol neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai peiv ha khi hail n nail lavqkhoel bhai cov phal kivq naol dai, ge lao nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Naol naoq nail aqmaol bhai bhi jel-ail khi lavqyavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee yaoq thoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, Philma juq khi mail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai meelnaq bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aivq aqyu juq bhai hevqkovq kivq naol geiq. Aivq nail aqmaol bhai neq, aivq maq hevq kovq nia-il laq.

Ilsaqleiqlal jeq-e nail heeqphaq pevq nail Khali thoil gaq, niil aq-il lavqyavq kovtavq nee, yavq kha lee nail bhai ya moel ail nul neq, ngadao juq aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol naol laq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol. Yeiqsul nee mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail al nvq gaq iqsanl, aivq bhai meelnaq meelnaq-ail, ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, n-gaol gaolkav kav nail yanq nee mail, kivq hail lail ma phao naqli hail lavq bhai kev dai, miltsaq heeq lao lao-ail navtsee dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Kivq hail lail ma phao naqli hail lavq bhee lal-u phao, Yeiqsul aqthel aqkav kav dai, niailhai gul-a nail ngaol: “Eilohi, Eilohi, laqmaq saqbhaq taqnil” dai, gul-a nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq, “Ngaq nail Miqyail-ol, ngaq nail Miqyail-ol, khul khi mail naol ngaq bhai khaonq ha lavq nail-aiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Aqjail bhai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, “Aivq Eillilya bhai khul nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq lavqtsail mail, iqyaq iqma khe mullul khe-ai dul nail niaqpeovq teevq khai cev-ail khi, aqtsel tsel nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul bhai oil deev-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, lunl aqkhaoq bhai soiq tsaoq khi, Yeiqsul bhai bhi siv daol-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq ge nail: “Thaq tsal lao. Eillilya aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq nee bhi jel-ail meeq. Daonq daiq bhel” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aqthel aqkav kav dai, teevq pov gaoq gul khi, aqhaq ceiv-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel khe thao pav-ai thaq nail haqphal phal ma, uqhuq nee mail daoqthaoq bhai dov dai, nvq pav pav ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai aqhaq ceiv-a nail bhai aivq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol nail genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq teevq gaq ya moel-u phao, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, maldil Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngel lao thaq nial” dai, ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee al jaiq-ail maq eq nail bhai, yaqmai-aq teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl jaol khi heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil, Yaqkov yaqnoil gaq khi mail Yaolseiq nail aqma Maqlil khi mail, Saqloqmeiq aqyu juq jaol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, Yeiqsul Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jaol-u phao, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail, tsaojao-ai bhiq-a nail juq ngaol. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha aivq nee mail dav lal-a nail yaqmai-aq maodai gaq iqsanl, a bhai jaol khi heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol neq, jaol n n-gaol nail iqmoeq phao khe n pevq nail lainq nail aqn ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, kivq hail hail lee-u phao,

Aqlilmaqthaiq meenq bhai jaol nail, Yaolsai dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl lavqkhoel bhai yu ev nail teevq gaq pevq nail ngaol. Aivq iqsanl, Miqyail Milkhaoq kev lee nail bhai noeqthunq nail ngaol. Aivq maq geesil dai, Phillav jaol nail bhai Yeiqsul nail aqmaol hal lai-a nail ngaol.

Yanq a dai kev lal-a teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul sil-a nail ngel-i mail, Phillav noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul sil-u phao khe jaol nail genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq al gaq bhai khul khi, “Aivq maldil sil-aoq nail ngaol laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Sil-aoq nail ngaol” dai, genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq aivq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, “Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai bal-aivq kivq naol” dai, Phillav Yaolsai bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngal.

Yaolsai neq, haqphal phal phul ul-aivq khi, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai bavq kha gaq-u phao, maoltoev toev khi mail, lovmav-i mail tavq-ai thaq nail luqdaol bhai bavq duq ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, luqdaol nail moeqkhoeq bhai lovmav heeq ma teevq heeq ngaoq tsoiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil khi mail Yaolseiq nail aqma Maqlil Yeiqsul bhai bavq duq-a nail dao bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Jaol n jel-ail khi
Yaoq n yaoq, nqhao navqmav-ail nl ma dov lal-u phao, aqyu juq luqdaol bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
“Ngadao juq nail haqbhoil luqdaol moeqkhoeq bhai ngaoq tsoiq-ai thaq nail lovmav al heeq bhai, khaq sil gaq bhi ngaoq phao heeq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao neq, lovmav al heeq ngaoq ha-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Lovmav al heeq neq, eeq deedee nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq luqdaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u phao, phulleq dai phailkhaoq heelma doi-nq thaq nail yaqyov-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai ya moel khi, geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Thaq geesil. Lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail, Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul bhai nuljuq heldaiq lee thaq nail nial. Aivq doevq kovq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq niilniai maq jaol yaoq-aol. Aivq bhai bavq thaq-a nail aqduq bhai heldaiq lee yaoq.

Nuljuq kovq lai khi, aivq nail yaqlaol khi mail Bheiqtuvluv bhai niailhai ge bhiq lai yaoq: ‘Aivq nuljuq nail iqmoeq nee Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq bhai ge thaq-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, a bhai nuljuq aivq bhai ya moel naol’ dai, ge bhiq lai dei-eiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqmai-aq al juq luqdaol nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq geesil khi aqjuq juq deedee nail nee ovqtavq, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, tsaoq kol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq geesil deedee nail ngel-i mail, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq ge bhiq-al.

[Yeiqsul neq, jaol n jel-ail khi iqmoeq-u n-gaol, nqhao navqmav-ail doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail aqmaol Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil bhai iqmoeq bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq neq, jel lal-u phao, neivq sivq maol aol nail bhai, Yeiqsul-i mail the dov bhiq-a nail al gaq ngaol.
Yeiqsul nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai jaol-a nail juq, noeqhaq nail lavqkhoel nioil thailthaiq-u phao, Maqlil ganl al aqyu juq bhai ge gaiq lai bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Yeiqsul aqdoevq doevq-ai haq nail ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol” dai, Maqlil aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neq, “Maq pevq lal nia-ail” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe nvq gaq julgu bhai kovq ail thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail aqmaol micil bhi phal-ail khi aqyu nvq gaq bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq kovq lal khi jaol-ail ceevq-a nail juq bhai ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqlaol tsel teevq gaq jaoljaoq khi aoq jaq thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail aqmaol aqyu juq bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol nail nee ovqtavq, neema gaol nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai khaq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail bhai ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq nail daoq bhai, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miltsaq doi dai ail khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq ail yaoq.
Neema thaqtsaol khi ulcuvq saol nail tsaol-aq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq niil juq nl nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail ngaol. Aqyu juq mee nia phaq nail daoq ge nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq eellel bhai nieivq nia nail ngaol. Aqyu juq jaldovq jaq khi daol khi ngaol-aoq, khul maq pevq lal-ail. Nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq meeq lai nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai alhai ge bhiq gaq-u phao, aivq bhai nqtavq kovtavq bha tsiqdal laivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq a bhai Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq iqsanl dov ail khi, yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee mail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq ail-a nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aqyu juq nee mail ganl tsao nl nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail cavq nail geeqlaoq daoq al duq jaiq lal dai Yeiqsul bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl dov bhiq-a nail ngaol.]

Eeqnail heelnail Thaolphilluv-ol, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel bhai pevq lal-a nail, Yeiqsul-i mail ganl nl-a nail juq bhai, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq khal khi kivq nail khe-ai, ganl al juq bhai haoqgavq gevq dov gaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail ganl al juq bhai, iqmoeq-u phao nee ya moel thaq nail juq khi geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail juq-i mail, khal ge lavq-a nail khe-ai, aqyu juq gevq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngal iqsanl iqmoeq-u phao nee Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail ganl al juq bhai aqmeeq-ai tsaotsel duq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq-i mail ya saol-a nail juq neq, maldil tsaq-ail nial dai, naol iqsanl heeq nia dai, Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail ganl al juq teevq phaq gil-aq teevq phaq naoq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.

Yuldav milkhaoq bhai heeqphaq Heiqlol uvthaiq thaq-u phao, Aqbhilyav nail munl lavqkhoel bhai Saqkhaqlil dai khul nail Philma teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq nail khaqma neq, Eillilsaqbhail dai, khul nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq maolyaq neq, Aqloq nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq maolyaq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai daolcoev dai doevq khi, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi mail aolsaolkovq iqsanl bhai tsaothe nail ngaol.
Eillilsaqbhail neq, maq bhao aqma pevq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq maolyaq yaq maq jaol-ail, nvq gaq nvq gaq-ail joiqmaoq maoq lai-aoq nail ngaol.
Teevq n kev lee-al ngal-aq neq, Philma nail ganl nl nail haqbhoil, Saqkhaqlil nail munl bhai dol lee-a nail ngel-i mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail ngaol.

Philma juq nail aol jiav nail khe-ai, ganl bhoil-u phao, Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai khi, huqbhiq nil nail phaq tovq khi danq nail ganl al, Saqkhaqlil bhai tsaq lai-a nail ngaol.
Saqkhaqlil huqbhiq nil nail phaq tovq khi danq thailthaiq-u phao, lavqniil phao jaol-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq iqsanl mail, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq, Saqkhaqlil nail sivtavq bhai dov lee khi, huqbhiq nil nail phaq tovq khi danq duq nail lavqmal phao, thulphaol lee-a nail ngaol.
Saqkhaqlil nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, neema lavqkhoel bhai bhaq dai-ail khi, deel-nq deedee ail-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqkhaqlil-ol, thaq geesil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq nail geeqlaoq hal daoq bhai Miqyail gaiq-ao nail ngaol. Naoq nail khaqma Eillilsaqbhail naoq nail haqbhoil, yaqyov teevq gaq tsiq nail ngaol. Naol yaqyov al gaq bhai Yaolhaq dai ya mil bhiq nail ngaol.
Yaq al gaq doevq lee-a nail ngel-i mail, naol lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq maodai iqsanl, lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai eeq nail heel nail gaq pevq lal nail ngaol. Aivq neq, jilpheeq khi mail bov lal nail phaq teevq peivq-ail maq daol-ail. Aqma nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai aol-u phao nee mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maodai bhai, aqyu juq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail jaol nail phao, aivq hevqkol lavq nail ngaol.

Yaolhaq neq, Eillilya nail neema khi bhaqaoq aol nail lavqkhoel, Heeqphaq nail iqmoeq ail nail ngaol. Aqbhu khi yaq tsaq lai jil lai dai maqkhaiq, naqlaiq laiq nail tsaol-aq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq nail neenoeq neekha nail haoqnao tsaothe dai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil lainq-ai thaq nail jeq-e teevq jeq-e pevq lal dai maqkhaiq, Yaolhaq nl nail ngaol” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Saqkhaqlil ge nail: “Alhai pevq lal naol dai, ngal khalhai khi ya heeq kivq nail-aiq. Ngal maoq lee-aoq nail ngaol. Ngaq nail khaqma iqsanl maoq lee-aoq nail ngaol” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq gaoq ge nail: “Ngal neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol khi, Miqyail nail khillavq Gaqbheiqlal ngaol. Lavqkhiq tsail nail daoq niil daoq cavq gaiq ail yaoq dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Naol ngaq nail daoq bhai, ‘maq pevq lal nia-ail’ dai, neema lavqkhoel bhai noeq nail ngel-i mail, naoq nail yaqyov maq doevq lee-u kev dai, naol daoq maq ge nia mail, aqtsi tsu dai, ya jaol nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ge nail daoq niil daoq, aqyanq tsaq lal haq neq, pevq lal nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq lavqniil-ai Saqkhaqlil bhai daonq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai tsaq dai maq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq dov lee-u phao, aqyu juq bhai daoq maq ge tsaoq bhiq nia dai, pevq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai phaodaiq bhiq thaq nail teevq phaq ganav bhai, ya moel thaq nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia-a nail ngaol. Aivq daoq maq ge nia-ail pevq-ail khi, aqyu juq bhai aqlavq-i mail dao bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nail ganl nl nail aqyanq jel ail-u phao, Saqkhaqlil ilkhaol bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail khaqma Eillilsaqbhail neq, yaq ceiv lai khi, bhala ngaq heeq bhee dai, khaq bha iqsanl maq dov ail dai, ilkhaol bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Eillilsaqbhail ge nail: “Miqyail ngaq bhai heldaiq lavq khi geeqlaoq bhiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Niai nee pultavq neq, tsaol-aq yaq ngaq bhai ge doil lavq nail phaq bhai, aivq oil ha lavq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Eillilsaqbhail aqhaq aqmaol liq lai-a nail bhala kovq heeq bhee lal-u phao, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq Naqsaqlail meenq bhai jaol nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq jaol nail bhai, Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel Gaqbheiqlal bhai khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a Yaolsai dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq bhai maol ail naol dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail, haoltaiv deel yaqmai-aq yaqnoil ngaol. Aivq nail aqmil neq, Maqlil ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, aivq jaol nail bha lee khi ge nail: “Geeqlaoq eeljaol ya-a nail yaqmiq-ol, naol geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq. Heeqphaq Miqyail naoq-ai nee mail jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil neq, daoq al daoq bhaqda nee, neema lavqkhoel bhai suqsaq lal khi, “Daoq ge tsaoq lavq-a nail niil khalhai ge movq nail meeq” dai, saol-nvq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Maqlil-ol, thaq geesil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail naoq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq nail dai khi, tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Heldaiq dei-eiq. Naol yaq ceiv lai khi, yaqyov teevq gaq ya tsiq nail ngaol. Aivq bhai, naol Yeiqsul dai, ya mil bhiq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov al gaq eeq dee heel deedee khi, eeq nail heel nail gaq nail Yaqyov dai, yu khul nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Miqyail Yaqyov al gaq bhai heeqphaq Daqbhil nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai, bhi jaoldeel nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, Yaqkov nail jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai Heeqphaq jiovq khi, aivq uvthaiq nail milkhaoq al neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel loi lai nail maq bhao-ail” dai, Maqlil bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal yovjil maq bhao, naol ge nail khe-ai khalhai khi pevq lal nia nail-aiq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel Maqlil bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal naoq nail kovtavq bhai yavq kha lee khi, eeq dee heel deedee nail Miqyail nail bhaqaoq, naoq bhai uvthaiq lee nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, doevq lee nail meeq nail haol nail yaqyov al gaq bhai, Miqyail nail Yaqyov dai, yu khul nail ngaol.
Maq bhao aqma dai saol-nvq-ai thaq nail, naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a Eillilsaqbhail bhai heldaiq. Joiqmaoq maoq lai khi ngaol-aoq, yaq ceiv lai-a nail bhala kovq heeq bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Miqyail maq nl nia nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail” dai, Maqlil bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Maqlil ge nail: “Ngal neq, Miqyail nail yaqkav ngaol. Naoq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai kev lee dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq jaol nail nee dov ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Maqlil dov ail khi, Yuldav milkhaoq daoltavq phao jiav nail meenq teevq meenq bhai, lavqtsail mail lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Saqkhaqlil nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, Eillilsaqbhail bhai daoq tsaoq phuq-a nail ngaol.

Eillilsaqbhail Maqlil-i mail daoq tsaoq phuq nail daoq ya gaiq-u phao, aivq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel khe yaq, luv luv dai tev lal-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Eillilsaqbhail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhee lal khi,
aivq mailma-ail ge nail: “Naol neq, yaqmai-aq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai neq, geeqlaoq eeq deedee nail gaq ngaol. Naoq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel khe yaq iqsanl, geeqlaoq eeq deedee nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail Heeqphaq nail aqma, ngal jaol nail bha lal-a nail geeqlaoq, khul khi mail ngal ya-a nail ngel-ail.
Heldaiq daiq. Naol daoq thaoqphuq nail daoq bhai ngal ya gaiq-u phao, ngaq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel khe yaq lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngel-i mail, luv luv-ai tev lal-a nail ngaol.

Naol neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail yaqmai-aq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq maldil bhee lal naol dai, neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao Maqlil ge nail:
“Ngaq nail neema
lavqkhoel nee
Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai
tsiq eeq tsiq heel naol.
Ngaq nail aqhaqlal iqsanl,
ngaq bhai hevqkovq
lavq-a nail Miqyail
bhaqda nee
lavqkhiq tsail
deedee-ail nial.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
teevq peivq-ail
khaoqsail maq jiav nail
aivq nail yaqkav bhai
aivq gaoqhaq lavq khi,
heldaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Niai nee pultavq neq,
teevq yeel nee teevq yeel,
ngaq bhai geeqlaoq
eeq nail yaqmai-aq dai,
yu khul nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
bhaqaoq eeq nail
Miqyail neq,
ngaq bhai eeq dee
meeq deedee nail phaq
nl lavq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, meeq dee
haol deedee nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai ev nail
tsaol-aq bhai,
aivq gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail
teevq yeel nee
teevq yeel jiav nail ngaol.
Miqyail aivq nail
aqlavq-i mail
bhaqaoq eeq nail juq
nl nail ngaol.
Yovqgavq nail neekhaol
taivq-ail nl khi,
neema eeq nail
heel nail tsaol-aq bhai,
aivq lav luq
lav seil bhiq nail ngaol.
Aivq heeqphaq juq bhai
aqyu juq-i mail
jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail
doiqbev bev ma
nee tsiqkha khi,
khaoqsail maq jiav nail
neema thaqtheq nail phaq
aol nail tsaol-aq bhai,
thaqeeq thaqheel
bhiq nail ngaol.
Aivq moevq nail
sivq nail tsaol-aq bhai
aqmeeq phaq
teevq bov bhi jaq khi,
hulmeeq hulbhao
juq bhai neq,
aqnieivq-ail
bhi dov ail nail ngaol.
Aivq ngadao nail
aqphiq aqbhal juq bhai
ge bhiq-ai
thaq nail khe-ai,
‘Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail,
aivq nail aqjievq
lilheel bhai kev dai,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
maq nioilpeivq mail,
gaoqhaq naol’ dai, ge khi,
aivq aivq nail yaqkav
Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e bhai heldaiq
bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil neq, Eillilsaqbhail nee mail bhala hail heeq bhee dai jaol khi, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Eillilsaqbhail yaq bhao nail yanq tsaq lal khi, bhao-a nail ngaol. Yaq al gaq neq, yaqyov ngaol.

Miqyail aivq bhai eeq dee meeq deedee nail geeqlaoq nl bhiq-a nail ganl al, aqjail bhai jaol nail juq khi mail aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl teevq gaq khe-ai, lavqkhiq tsao tsail nail ngaol.

Eivq n bhee lal-u phao, yaq al gaq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq nail dai khi, aqyu juq bhoi lal jil lal-a nail ngaol. Yaq al gaq bhai aivq nail aqbhu nail aqmil khe-ai, Saqkhaqlil dai mil bhiq nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqma gaq ge nail: “Maq ngel-ail. Aivq bhai Yaolhaq dai, ya mil bhiq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel, Yaolhaq dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq gail maq jaol-ail” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaq al gaq bhai, khalhai bhi mil bhiq movq nail-aiq dai, aqyu juq aqbhu gaq bhai aqlavq dao bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqbhu gaq neq, haoqgavq gevq nail dailpav hal khi, aivq nail yaqyov nail aqmil neq, Yaolhaq ngaol dai, gevq daiq bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, aivq daoq ge nia lal-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq daoq ge ge-ail, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.
Aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ya moel-u phao, geesil nail ngaol. Ganl al, Yuldav milkhaoq daoltavq bha doi dai, gaiq doi ail-a nail ngaol.

Khal ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai yovqgavq noeq thaq-ai thaq khi, “Yaq niil gaq, khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail maq heeq laq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq aivq nail kovtavq bhai jiav nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yaolhaq nail aqbhu Yaqkhaqlil, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhee lal khi, Miqyail nail daoq niailhai gedan-a nail ngaol:
“Ilsaqleiqlal nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail
bhai tsiqeeq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
aivq aivq nail yaqkav
Daqbhil nail
jeq-e lavqkhoel khe,
ngadao nail haqbhoil
bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail
Hevqkovq nail gaq
bhi dov lee-a nail ngaol.
Aivq aivq nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai
heldaiq lee khi
hevqkovq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail alhai
nl-a nail neq,
milnee uqnee nee
aivq nail haqbhoil
gedan nail meeq nail
haol nail juq bhai juq khi
ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
nl-a nail ngaol.
Aivq ngadao bhai
neejiav jiav nail
tsaol-aq juq nail
lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq,
ngadao bhai
maq heldaiq nul nail
tsaol-aq juq nail
lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq,
ngadao bhai
hevqkovq nail khi
nl-a nail ngaol.
Aivq niailhai
nl-u phao,
ngadao nail aqphiq
aqbhal juq bhai
gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail
lavqkhoel nee
nl-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail meeq nail
haol nail daoqma
saljial bhai iqsanl,
noeq kev khi
nl-a nail ngaol.
Daoqma saljial
al daoq neq,
ngadao nail aqbhu
Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai
Miqyail aivq-i mail
khanq-ai thaq nail
daoqma saljial
al daoq ngaol.
Daoqma saljial al
bhaqda nee,
ngadao bhai
neejiav jiav nail
tsaol-aq juq nail
lavqkhoel nee
ngadao ya jel-ail khi,
ngadao nail yeel
gil-u kev dai,
meeq nail haol nail
tsaq nail daol nail
lavqkhoel nee,
Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai
maq ya geesil dai,
ngadao ganl nl
kivq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail yaqyov-ol,
naoq bhai eeq dee
heel deedee nail
Miqyail nail haqbhoil
gedan nail gaq nial dai,
yu khul naol.
Naol neq,
Heeqphaq nail
iqmoeq ya ail khi
aivq nail gailkhaol
ya lav daol-ail nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
ngadao nail Miqyail neq,
gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia
deedee nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
hevqkovq nail phaq neq,
oeqbal phaiq bhiq-a nail
lavqkhoel nee
dov lee-a nail ngaol dai,
aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai
bhiq heeq nia dai,
nqtavq kovtavq
khe aqbhaq
ngadao nail kovtavq bhai
bhaq lee-u phao,
aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai
jaol nail tsaol-aq khi
sil nail phaq nail
kov-uvq bhai jaol nail
tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl,
aqbhaq bhaq bhiq khi,
neesal-ovq nail
gailkhaol bhai
hevqdaiq lavq naol” dai,
Saqkhaqlil ge nail ngaol.

Yaq al gaq aqmaol phao eeq lal heel lal khi, aqhaqlal phao iqsanl, eeq lal heel lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai maq dov lal-u phao, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai taivq-ail jaol-a nail ngaol.
Yanq ya lao al nail lavqkhoel, “Milkhaoq yaq iqsanl, aqmil ya gevq bhoel ail naol” dai, heeqphaq Gailsaq Aolgultuv daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Niil thal khe pov, aqmil gevq nail neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq khe pov ngaol. Aq-u phao, Sulliv milkhaoq bhai Gulleiqnil joiqjaq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, aqmil gevq ail nail dai khi, yovqgavq nail meenq bhai yovqgavq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yaolsai iqsanl, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a ngel-i mail, aivq-i mail hevq naol dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail Maqlil hevq khi, aqmil gevq lai-a nail ngaol. Gaqliqlail milkhaoq Naqsaqlail meenq nee mail Heeqphaq Daqbhil doevq lee-a nail meenq pevq nail Yuldav milkhaoq Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Maqlil neq, aqhaq aqmaol liq nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq maolyaq Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai jaol-u phao, Maqlil neq, yaq tsiq nail yanq tsaq lal-aoq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Maqlil yaq tsiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq lee-a nail Yaqyov al gaq bhai tsiqdaq daq khi, niaoqjal laoqkhaiq lavqkhoel bhai tsiq iqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, daq-i yavq duq bhai aqyu nvq maolyaq nail haqbhoil yavq duq maq jiav-ail.
Milkhaoq al khaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai yaol lovq nail juq neq, nqkiv phao yalphiq bhai aqyu juq nail yaol bhai lovq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq dov lee khi, aqyu juq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol lee-a nail ngaol. Miqyail nail aqbhaq aqyu juq jaol nail teevq jaoq bhaq lee-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Thaq geesil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal nail daoq, ngal nuljuq bhai cavq gaiq lee-a nail ngaol.
Yanqgaol heeqphaq Daqbhil nail meenq lavqkhoel bhai, nuljuq nail haqbhoil Hevqkovq nail gaq doevq lee-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Heeqphaq Khali

Nuljuq aivq bhai niailhai ya moel naol. Yaqbeiv bhai tsiqdaq daq khi, niaoqjal laoqkhaiq lavqkhoel bhai tsiq iqthaiq-ai thaq nail bhai, nuljuq ya moel nail ngaol. Alhai ya moel-u phao al gaq neq, Khali ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq jaol nail bha, nqtavq gaqkhoel munl munl lao-ail thaiqphuq dai, dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai niailhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol:
“Nqtavq kovtavq bha jaol nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel bhel. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai iqsanl, aivq neema tsaq nail tsaol-aq juq nee neesal-ovq dei-eiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel juq nqtavq bha kovq dav lai gaq-u phao, yaol lovq nail juq ge nail: “Ngadao Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai ail khi, pevq lal-a nail ganl niil, Miqyail-i mail ngadao bhai ge lavq-a nail khe-ai, heldaiq ail bhel” dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaoq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq lavqtsail mail ail khi, Maqlil khi Yaolsai bhai maqkhaiq, niaoqjal laoqkhaiq lavqkhoel bhai tsiq iqthaiq-ai thaq nail yaqbeiv bhai maqkhaiq, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ya moel gaq-u phao, yaqbeiv al gaq nail ganl nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl, yu bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khal ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl mail, yaol lovq nail juq-i mail ge bhiq-a nail bhai noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil neq, ganl al juq iqsanl mail, noeq thaq-ai thaq khi, aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhail saol-nvq saol-nvq-ail jaol nail ngaol.

Yaol lovq nail juq, nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, iqsanl bhai ya gaiq, ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel khi tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Eivq n bhee lal khi, yaqbeiv bhai bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq-u phao, aivq bhai Yeiqsul dai, mil bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqmil al neq, aqma nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai maq ceiv lai-u phao nee mail nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail mil-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl nail aqyanq kev lal-u phao, aqyu nvq maolyaq yaqbeiv bhal khi, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsiq ha lai nail haqbhoil Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq khe uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lai-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq lee nail yaqyov gaq neq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail haqbhoil ya meeq ya haol khi, aivq bhai ya av bhiq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, khaoqkhoiq teevq gu maq ngel haq neq, salmil khaoqkhoiq maol yaq teevq gu, ya laol bhiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Silmiqoq dai mil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq pevq khi, Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ngaol, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail bhai daonq nail teevq gaq ngaol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
“Miqyail nail Khali bhai, naol maq ya moel-u kev dai, naol maq ya sil-ai” dai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal aivq bhai phaodaiq-ai bhiq thaq nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail aivq bhai bhi noeq dov-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq aq-u n-gaol uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai dav lai-a nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail khe-ai, nl bhiq nail dai khi mail, yaqbeiv nail aqbhu aqma yaqbeiv Yeiqsul bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai bhal laivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Silmiqoq al gaq yaqbeiv bhai tsiq khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail, niailhai ge nail ngaol:
“Heeqphaq-ol,
naoq-i mail
ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
naoq nail yaqkav
neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel
naoq-ai nee jaol lal naol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
naoq-i mail
lav sav-ai thaq nail
hevqkovq nail phaq bhai,
ngal teevq bhee
ya moel-aoq nail ngaol.
Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail
sivtavq bhai
hevqkovq nail niil phaq
naol lav sav-ai
thaq nail ngaol.
Hevqkovq nail niil neq,
laolkivq yaq bhai
bhaq bhiq nail
aqbhaq pevq khi,
naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a
Ilsaqleiqlal nail
tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil
eeq deedee nail
seiqleiq khaoqsail
pevq nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.
Silmiqoq yaqbeiv al gaq nail ganl niailhai ge nail ngel-i mail, yaqbeiv nail aqbhu aqma noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Silmiqoq aqyu juq bhai geeqlaoq bivq khi, aqma Maqlil gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqbeiv niil gaq bhaqda nee, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maodai gaq tsuq-ail khi, maodai gaq thul lal nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, aivq bhai khaonq khi aivq neq, yu bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, tsaol-aq maodai gaq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai noeq nail juq phao dov daiq lavq nail ngaol. Naoq nail neema bhai thaoma-i mail coevpav lavq nail khe-ai, naol ya noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqsaq nail jeq-e jaq-a Phaqnoeqlal nail yaqmiq Haqnaq dai mil-ai thaq nail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, joiqmaoq maoq deedee lai-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq maol ail khi, aivq nail yovjil nee mail sivq kovq taivq-ail ya jaol khi mail, miqtsiq miqma pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, eivq tsel liq kovq bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai taivq-ail jaol jaol-ail, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq khi teevq yanq ngal-aq, teevq pov maq jaq nail aol nl nl-ail khi, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Al teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq Maqlil khi Yaolsai jaol nail bha lal khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha hevqkovq lavq dai noeqthunq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai yaq al gaq nail ganl, aivq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolsai khi mail Maqlil, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail khe-ai, iqsanl bhai nl gil-u phao, aqyu nvq maolyaq, yaq bhal khi mail, yovqgavq nail jaol duq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Naqsaqlail meenq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaqyov al gaq eeq lal khi, gaq iqsanl kav lal-aoq nail ngaol. Neenoeq neekha teevq bhee aol lal khi, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol iqsanl aivq nail kovtavq-ai jiav nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail aqbhu aqma neq, yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee Bhaqsaqkhaq
Yeiqsul tsel-nvq kovq bhee lal-u phao, aqyu juq nail aolsaolkovq jiav nail khe-ai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai-a nail ngaol.
Bhaoqaiq lav sav gaq khi, aqyu juq kovq ail-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Maqlil khi Yaolsai maq heeq nia-ail.

“Yeiqsul neq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nee mail kovq lee thailthaiq naol” dai, aqyu nvq maolyaq noeq khi, teevq n yaoq yal bha kev ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqivq jaqbheq khi aqtsaoq aqlaol jaol nail bha halpov daiq lai-a nail ngaol.
Maq halpov moel-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq maolyaq Yeiqsul bhai Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha halpov lai-a nail ngaol.

Hail n bhee lal-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel-ai, Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul neq, saqlaq juq nee mail jaoldeel khi, aqyu juq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail phaq bhai naldaiq khi, aqyu juq bhai mee nia phaq gaoq naldaiq kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail daoq ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, aivq nail neenoeq neekha bhai maqkhaiq, aivq-i mail ge kovq-ail leevq nail daoq juq bhai maqkhaiq, noeq-u maq dov-ail, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail aqbhu aqma Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, aivq nail aqma aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqyov-ol, khul khi mail, naol naoq nail aqbhu nv-nvq gaq bhai niailhai nl lavq-a nail-aiq. Naoq nail aqbhu nv-nvq gaq noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee naoq bhai halpov nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
