Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai nqtavq bha tsiqdav kev lavq naol dai, noeq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq bhai sil nail milkhaoq nail daoqthaoq bha tsiq bhoel lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail daoq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khaonq nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai khaonq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai khaonq nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai iqsanl khaonq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol al sivq tsel-nvq gaq lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, kovq kev lal khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, naoq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, nvjuq neivq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “Neivq Saqdaq neq, nqmeivq meivq nail khe-ai, nqtavq nee mail ga lee nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, eellel khi mail bhoiqkeiv lavqmav bhai naoqthaiq nia dai maqkhaiq, neivq Saqdaq nail bhaqaoq bhai gaq lai nia dai maqkhaiq, ngal nuljuq bhai bhaqaoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Khul phaq iqsanl, nuljuq bhai maq lav thaoq maq lav nal nia-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neivq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail, lavqkhiq thaq tsail. Nqtavq kovtavq bha nuljuq nail aqmil gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail bhai lavqkhiq tsail yaoq” dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee lavqkhiq tsail khi ge nail: “Nqtavq khi miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail Aqbhu-ol, neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq khi aqgeel geel nail tsaol-aq bhai naol ganl niil juq oil tsail-ai thaq khi, yaqnoil khe-ai neema thaq nia nail juq bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai tsiqeeq naol. Aqbhu-ol, alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai, naol neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ngaq nail Aqbhu ngaq bhai av lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail maq ngel haq neq, Yaqyov khaq sil gaq dai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail. Yaqyov khi mail Yaqyov phaodaiq bhiq movq nail tsaol-aq maq ngel nail neq, Aqbhu Miqyail khaq sil gaq dai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq jaol nail phao tsiqphaol khi, aqyu juq bhai taivq-ail ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq niil juq bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail juq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail maodai gaq khi heeqphaq juq maodai gaq moel movq khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya moel-al, nuljuq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail juq aqyu juq gaiq movq khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya gaiq-a” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq gaq Yeiqsul bhai laonqdaiq lal khi ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, ngal nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya kivq dai, khalhai ya nl nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai khalhai gevq-ai thaq nail-aiq. Naol ge daiq-a nail, khalhai naldaiq heeq lal ail-aiq.

Naoq nail neema iqsanl mail, naoq nail aqhaqlal iqsanl mail, naoq nail gaq iqsanl khi mail, naoq nail neenoeq needul iqsanl mail, naoq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai gaiq-a yaoq. Naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol ge kovq lavq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Naol alhai nl ail yaoq. Nl haq neq, doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al gaq, aivq nail aqmaol aivq tsaq nail daol nail ngaol dai, saol-nvq movq nail ngel-i mail: “Ngaq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail Yeiqlilkhol meenq bha ail thailthaiq-u phao, tsaolpheel bhai thaoqphuq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq, aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi nieivq loev khi, aivq bhai maq sil teevq phaiq deeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaonq-ail ceevq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Philma teevq gaq gailkhaol al khaol bhai ail-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gail jao jao khi iqmoeq phao ail-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, Leiqbhil nail tsaol-aq
Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq ga nail bha ail khi, deeq nal-ai thaq nail malkhoeq bhai aqtseel khi mail aqheeq tsilju ullul leivq bhiq khi, lavqsiv-i mail pavqthaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq al gaq, nal nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai aivq nail moeqphaq bhai tsiq jeeq bhiq khi daq-i yavq duq ilkhaol teevq il bhai hel-aivq khi mail, lav sav bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Niaohao kev lal-u phao, aivq ilheel gaq bhai phul nvq bavq oil dov khi ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai aqmeeq-ai lav sav bhiq yaoq. Phul niil taivq-ail maq lovq haq neq, naoq-i mail khal gil-a nail juq ngal kovq lal-u phao naoq bhai bivq kovq naol’ dai, ge bhiq-ail ceevq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol.

Naoq bhai khalhai noeq nail-aiq. Tsaol-aq al hail gaq nail lavqkhoel khe, tsaolpheel bhai thaoqphuq-a nail al gaq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail dai, ge kivq nail tsaol-aq, khul gaq ngel-ail” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Aivq bhai gaoqhaq bhiq thaq nail gaq nial” dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail al gaq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-u phao, “Naol iqsanl alhai nl ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq gailphail lail ma bhai lai thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul julgu teevq gu nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol. Maqtha dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq, aivq nail ilkhaol bha Yeiqsul bhai hav-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq, Maqlil dai mil-ai thaq nail jaqbheq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Maqlil neq, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai jaoldeel khi aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.

Maqtha neq, jaqjaq daoldaol mee nia phaq ya lav sav nail ngel-i mail, khaoqlaol nail ngaol. Aivq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail jaqbheq thoil gaq, jaqjaq daoldaol mee nia phaq ngaq bhai taivq-ail bhi lav sav lavq nail bhai naoq bhai khul dai iqsanl maq noeq lal-ail laiq. Ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq dai, aivq bhai khoel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq nail: “Maqtha-ol, Maqtha-ol, naol neq, mee nia phaq bhai khaoqlaol nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq phaq taivq-ail loq nail ngaol. Maqlil neq, aqmeeq al phaq bhai tsel-a nail ngaol. Al phaq bhai yu maq luv dov lal-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq pov neq, Yeiqsul jaol duq teevq dao bhai jaol khi geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol. Aivq geeqlaoq hal gaq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol teevq gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, Yaolhaq aivq nail yaqlaol bhai geeqlaoq khalhai ya hal nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nvjuq bhai iqsanl, cavq lavq cov lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-u phao niailhai hal yaoq.
‘Aqbhu-ol,
naoq nail aqmil bhai
bhi ev dei-eiq.
Naol heeqphaq jiovq khi
uvthaiq nail milkhaoq
bhi kev lee yaoq.
Nvjuq loq nail
jaq nail daol nail phaq,
yaoq n yaoq n nee
nvjuq bhai bivq lavq yaoq.
Nvjuq nail oeqbal bhai
phaiq lavq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
nvjuq bhai
nl bheeq lavq bheeq
lavq-a nail tsaol-aq nail
oeqbal bhai
nvjuq phaiq
bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Oeqbal jalmul
mul nail haoqnao
nvjuq bhai thaq
bhi ail lavq-o’ dai,
hal yaoq” dai,
aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai niailhai tsiq ceiv khi gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav hul-iq tsilma yovqgavq nail aqtsaoq nail ilkhaol bhai ail khi, ‘Aqtsaoq-ol, ngaq bhai khaqmul hail heeq bhee dai, phal lavq-o.
Ngaq nail aqtsaoq teevq gaq ngal jaol nail bha lal dov khi, aivq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl, bhi jaq nail maq jiav-il’ dai, ge bhiq-u phao,

ilheel gaq ge nail: ‘Ngaq bhai thaq lav suqsaq lal. Lolgov pheeqthaiq gil-aoq nail ngaol. Ngaq nail yaq ngaq-ai nee mail iqthaiq nail ngaol. Ngal thul khi, naoq bhai maq bivq kivq-ail’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aivq neq, aqtsaoq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, thul iqsanl maq thul, bivq iqsanl maq bivq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al gaq maq naq lai dai, hal thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, thul khi, al gaq khal loq nail phaq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Hal yaoq. Hal haq neq, ya nail ngaol. Halpov yaoq. Halpov haq neq, moel nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai kov yaoq. Kov haq neq, phao lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, hal nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee ya nail ngaol. Halpov nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, moel nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai kov nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, lolgov phao lavq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe, aqbhu khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail yaqyov delgil hal haq neq, delgil nail haqbhoil eellel nieivq bhiq naol laiq.
Yavuv hal haq neq, bhoiqkeiv lavqmav nieivq bhiq naol laiq.

Nuljuq haqeiv nail tsaol-aq ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq nail yaq bhai yalkav aqmeeq bivq nia nail ngaol. A dai nee maqtsil, nqtavq bha jaol nail nuljuq nail Aqbhu bhai, khal hal nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhi jaol lee nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq n neq, yaqjaoq bhi jaoq-ail nail neivq bhai, Yeiqsul the dov-a nail ngaol. Neivq al maol dov ail-u phao, yaqjaoq al gaq daoq ge nia lal-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aivq neq, neivq heeqphaq Bheiqsaqbhullav bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Teevq pav ganav juq neq, aivq bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, “Nqtavq kovtavq khe bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl daiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail neenoeq bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yovqgavq nail gaiqlaq bhai bhoilpav khi, maq tsaq maq jil lai nail milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol. Maq tsaq maq jil lai nail ildaoq iqsanl, pav-ail sav-ail nail ngaol.

Bheiqsaqbhullav bhai juq juq-ail khi neivq bhai the dov nail niil dai, nuljuq ngaq bhai ge nail ngaol. Neivq Saqdaq neq, aqyu juq bhai aqyu juq maq tsaq maq jil lai haq neq, aivq nail milkhaoq khalhai khi ivqdao dai, jiav nia nail-aiq.

Ngal Bheiqsaqbhullav nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail ngel haq neq, nuljuq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, khaq sil gaq nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail khi the dov nail-aiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq ge nail maq tsaq-ail dai, aqyu juq yalkhaq dal lal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, neivq bhai the dov nail ngel haq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Gaq mao-ail kav nail teevq gaq, khen kha-ao teevq bhee jiav khi aivq nail ilkhaol bhai lovq-u phao neq, yu aivq nail yalkav maq khoiq nia-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nee maqtsil gaq kav nail teevq gaq lal khi, aivq bhai gaq lai khi, aivq-i mail gaq juq nail khen kha-ao bhai luv dov haq neq, aivq nail yalkav bhai khoiq kivq nail ngaol.
Ngal jaol nail phao maq jaol nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail phao jaol nail ngaol. Ngaq-ai nee mail maq gov jil-a nail tsaol-aq, gov ha nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Neivq aqcavq teevq maol tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, geelee deldeel jaol duq bhai gaqnaq naq duq halpov ail-u phao, maq halpov moel-al. Aq-u phao, ‘Ngaq-i mail dov lee-a nail, ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai kovq lai naol’ dai, ge khi, kovq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq kovq lai-u phao, ilkhaol al il aqmeeq-ai lav sav-ai thaq nail nee ovqtavq, yavphail-ai thaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nee maqtsil haqeiv nail neivq sivq maol bhai khul ail khi jaol lai-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq nail haqbhoil iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil haoqnao khe pov neq, khoeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel khe yaqmai-aq teevq gaq mailma-ail ge nail: “Naoq nail aqma neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Maldil geeqlaoq eeq nail juq neq, Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq nail juq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq mao lal thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Niil yeel khe tsaol-aq neq, mao-ail haqeiv nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq hal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yaolnav nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq maq ngel haq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq niil yeel bhai maq bhi moel-ail.

Yaolnav neq, Nilnaqbheiq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq pevq nail khe-ai, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov iqsanl, niil yeel nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, pul-nvq phao jiav nail milkhaoq khe heeqphaqma, niil yeel nail tsaol-aq nee mail thul lal khi, niil yeel khe tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neenoeq neekha mao-ail eeq nail heeqphaq Saollavmoq nail daoq naldaiq lal nail dai khi mail, nqjail miljail nee mail aivq lal thaq nail ngaol. Niilniai Saollavmoq nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq jaol nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, Nilnaqbheiq meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, yeel niil yeel khe tsaol-aq nee mail thul lal khi, niil yeel nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yaolnav-i mail daoq cavq daoq cov cov bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq oeqbal noeq pov-a nail ngaol. Niilniai Yaolnav nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail gaq jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Phalmanq tovq khi, bhallal phao tsiq thaq nail maqkhaiq, pheeqdeel-i mail movqtsaoq-ail nail maqkhaiq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq nl daiq-al. Khal aol lal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail aqbhaq bhai ya moel dai, daqmoe bha tsiq dav-ai nail ngaol.

Maivneev neq, aqmaol nail phalmanq pevq nail ngaol. Naoq nail maivneev moel kivq haq neq, naoq nail aqmaol maol lao-ail aqbhaq aqmeeq-ai ya nail ngaol. Naol maivneev maq moel kivq haq neq, naoq nail aqmaol maol lao-ail navtsee dai, pevq-ail nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail aqbhaq navtsee dai maq ya pevq-ail dai, yaolphaol yaoq.
Naoq nail aqmaol maollao-ai navtsee dai maq jiav-ail, aqbhaq taivq-ail aol haq neq, phalmanq nail aqbhaq naoq bhai bhaq nail khe-ai naoq nail aqmaol aqbhaq bhaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq-u phao, “Ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai aoq jaq lal yaoq” dai, Phaqliqsail teevq gaq Yeiqsul bhai khul-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aol lai khi, aoq jaq tavq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aoq jaq nail maq kev lal-u phao, Yeiqsul aqlavq maq tsiq nail bhai, Phaqliqsail al gaq ya moel khi, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq Phaqliqsail juq neq, maiqgaoq kovqlaol bhai lavqniil phao aqmeeq-ai tsiqhaol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel phao neq, maivjeel jeel nail phaq khi haqeiv nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.
Yaqjaoq khaq lal miqthoi juq-ol, lavqniil phao teivq-a nail gaq, lavqkhoel phao iqsanl teivq-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Lavqkhoel bhai aol nail juq, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bivq yaoq. Alhai bivq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee haol nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq-ol, nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Nuljuq laolhaol haoldao, gaollaol yasaol khi, kha gaoq kha jal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee tsel bhoil teevq bhoil danq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daolcoev dai nl nail phaq khi Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail phaq bhai, nuljuq aqphoiq maq thaq kav-il. Nuljuq niil juq bhai nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail nee ovqtavq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao bhai iqsanl, aqphoiq thaq kav nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail juq-ol, nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai sivtavq phao jiav nail khaoqsail eeq nail doiqbev bhai jaoldeel movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Leiv lavqkhoel bhai tsao-u phao, yu nuljuq bhai bhi ev movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neq, tsaol-aq maq moel nia nail luqdaol khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Luqdaol al bhai naoq naoq-ail tsao nail tsaol-aq juq, luqdaol niil dai, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail teevq gaq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naol niailhai ge nail neq, nvjuq bhai iqsanl khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail nuljuq iqsanl, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maq phi tsaol nail yalkav, nuljuq yu bhai nieivq phi bhiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, lavqnoil taivq-ail iqsanl maq thoiqtsi-ail.

Nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai deeq heivq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, aqyu juq nail luqdaol bhai kaovq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail juq bhai, neema tsaq naol dai, nuljuq salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai deeq heivq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, luqdaol al juq bhai kaovq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail neenoeq neekha daoq niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal aqyu juq jaol nail bha ngaq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq khi gaqkhoel juq bhai khoel-ai leevq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai, khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq khi teevq pav ganav juq bhai deeq heivq nail ngaol’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqbheiqlal nail aqsivq nee mail, laol duq khi mail meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq nail gaiqlaq bhai deeq heivq-a nail, Saqkhaqlil nail aqsivq bhai kev dai, miltsaq teivq-u n-gaol nee mail khal leevq-a nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq al juq nail aqsivq, niil yeel nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aqsivq al neq, niil yeel nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai maldil kev lee nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq-ol, nuljuq geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neenoeq neekha nail taovq taovqphoil nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Nuljuq maq aol lai nail nee ovqtavq, aol lai movq nail tsaol-aq bhai lav tsoiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq neq, Yeiqsul bhai neejiav jiav nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq daoq ge bheeq nail bhai halpov moel kivq dai, Yeiqsul bhai mailma-ail naldaiq naldaiq-ail khi, ganl mee nia phaq bhi ge khi, khoiq heldaiq nail ngaol.
Teevq gaq bhai teevq gaq naoqthaiq tsal dai, tsaol-aq aqhinl aqmeel-nvq gaq jil lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai iqmoeq ge bhiq-a nail:
“Phaqliqsail juq nail deqtsiq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Deqtsiq dai ge nail neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq bhai ge movq nail ngaol.
Khal deeq pheeq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol. Khal oil tsail-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai iqsanl, heeq kivq lal nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail aqnav nail lavqkhoel nee khal ge nail juq, aqbhaq bhai yu ya gaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq mail sunq lavqkhoel bhai khal khoiq thail-a nail juq, khaolpoiv bha dav lai khi, mailma-ail ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngaq nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aqmaol bhai heivq nia khi ngaol-aoq, yaqhao khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq khi nia nail juq bhai thaq geesil.

Nuljuq khaq sil gaq bhai ya geesil nail dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel dei-eiq. Deeq heivq khi, daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai bavq bhoel nia nail Miqyail bhai geesil yaoq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aivq bhai geesil yaoq.
Jaltsil ngaq maol bhai phul nvq bhaiq nee mail gaoq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq. Miqyail neq, jaltsil al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq maol bhai iqsanl, maq nioilpeivq-ail.
Aivq nuljuq nail uqhuq tsailkheel iqsanl bhai gedaiq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thaq geesil. Nuljuq jaltsil maodai mao nee maqtsil phoiq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel: ‘Ngal Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol ngaol’ dai, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai ge dov nail khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq, ‘Thoil gaq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol ngaol’ dai, Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail sivtavq bhai tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov ge dov nail ngaol.

‘Ngal Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol maq ngel-ail’ dai, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai ge dov nail khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq, ‘Thoil gaq ngaq nail yaqlaol maq ngel’ dai, Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail sivtavq bhai, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov ge dov nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai ge bheeq nail khaq sil gaq nail oeqbal bhai iqsanl, phaiq bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail tsaol-aq nail oeqbal bhai maq phaiq bhiq-ail.
Yu nuljuq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yanq al nail lavqkhoel nuljuq khalhai ya ge ya thail nail dai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nuljuq bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, ngaq nail mailnail ngaq bhai jaiqbhoil bhoil lavq dai, aivq bhai teevq pov ge bhiq-ail lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.

“Aqtsaoq-ol, nul-nq nvq mail bhai, yalkhaq dal bhiq nail gaq khi jaiqbhoil bhoil bhiq nail gaq jiovq yaoq dai, khaq sil gaq ngaq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Yu nail yalkav bhai maivjeel jeel nail neema teevq peivq-ail thaq aol. Phul heel yalkav maodai jiav nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq aqdoevq ya doevq nail maq ngel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail: “Aq-u phao, hulmeeq hulbhao teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail daiyal khe gov maodai ya-a nail ngaol.
Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq, aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai niailhai noeq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal khalhai khi heeq meeq. Ngaq nail gov phi bhoel duq maq jiav-aoq nail.

Ngal niailhai nl naol’ dai, aivq noeq dov lal-a nail ngaol. ‘Ngaq nail govjil juq peiv ha khi, cov eeq naol. Al nail lavqkhoel bhai ngaq nail gov khi ngaq nail yalkav iqsanl mail, oil bhoel gai nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngaq nail neema bhai niailhai ge bhiq naol: Ngaq nail neema-ol, naol neq, mee nia kovq nail haqbhoil phul heel yalkav halpov thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Gaqnaq naq yaoq. Teevq bov jaq teevq bov daol khi, lavqkhiq tsail tav dai doevq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi-ol, yaq n kiv nee naoq nail aqhaqlal bhai oil kovq naol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, naoq-i mail halpov jil-ai thaq nail yalkav juq, khaq sil gaq nail yalkav pevq ail nail-aiq’ dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yovqgavq nail haqbhoil yalkav halpov jil-ai thaq khi, Miqyail phao haq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, alhai dul nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Khalhai khi ya jaq ya daol heeq meeq dai, nuljuq aqdoevq doevq nail haqbhoil khaoq thaq laol. Khalhai khi ya gaq ya doi heeq meeq dai, nuljuq nail aqmaol nail haqbhoil iqsanl, khaoq thaq laol.
Aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq, jaqjaq daoldaol nee maqtsil phoiq khi, aqmaol iqsanl, aqgaq aqdoi nee maqtsil phoiq nail ngaol.

Ovngavq bhai saol-nvq daiq. Ovngavq al juq neq, gov maq kha. Gov maq gaiq-ail. Govjil maqkhaiq, yalkav oil bhoel nail thaoqlao maqkhaiq, maq jiav. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail ovngavq al juq bhai, bhiq jaq bhiq daol nail ngaol. Nuljuq keivq-avq nee maqtsil khadai phoiq jaiq nail ngel-ail.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe khul gaq maqkhaiq, khaoqlaol nail bhaqda nee, yovqgavq nail yeel yovqgavq teevq cav heel lal dai, khaq sil gaq nl kivq nail-aiq.
Nuljuq micil cil deel niil phaq bhai maq nl nia nail bhai, khul khi mail, yaoq phaq yaoq bhai khaoqlaol nail-aiq.

Haqtsoiq khe aqeiv khalhai khi eeq lal nail ngel-ail dai, saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Aqeiv aqbhaol al juq neq, ganl maq nl-ail. Haqlaq iqsanl maq gaol-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Heeqphaq Saollavmoq-i mail doi nail phoiq deedee nail aqgaq aqdoi neq, aqeiv al teevq eiv dai iqsanl maq heldaiq meeq-ail.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, yanqgaol doevq khi niaohao miqjaq nail lavqkhoel bhai liv poiv kivq nail pavqkhuq lovkhuq bhai, Miqyail aqdai dai-ail lav sav meeq bhiq haq neq, a dai nee maqtsil nuljuq bhai bhi gaq bhi doi lavq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Nuljuq khalhai ya jaq ya daol heeq meeq dai, thaq halpov. Khaoqlaol nail neema iqsanl thaq aol.
Laolkivq yaq juq neq, al juq iqsanl bhai halpov nail ngaol. Nuljuq al juq loq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq nail Aqbhu Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai halpov yaoq. Al juq iqsanl, Miqyail nuljuq bhai bivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Maq mao nail yaol mavqmav-ol, thaq geesil. Nuljuq nail Aqbhu Miqyail neq, aivq nail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai, nuljuq bhai bhi jaol nail, neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail yalkav gaoq ha khi, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bivq yaoq. Nuljuq nail haqbhoil maq pheq maq daoq-ail nia nail phul baivluvq guvq thaq-ai yaoq. Maq cov maq lav-ail nia nail phul heel yalkav nqtavq kovtavq bha halpov thaq-ai yaoq. A bhai neq, khoiqbhaoq maq bhaoq nia. Bhoiq iqsanl maq jaq lai nia-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, nuljuq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq khal halpov jil-ai thaq nail bha, nuljuq nail neema jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai lainq thaq ail yaoq. Phalmanq iqsanl tovq ail yaoq.
Yovqgavq nail ilheel khaqma hevq ail-a nail kovq lal khi, lolgov bhai kov-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail phao bhiq ail kivq dai, lovq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Ilheel gaq kovq lal-u phao, lovq thailthaiq nail yaqkav juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ilheel gaq aqmeeq-ai lainq khi, yaqkav juq bhai kovqkhail aoqjaoq bhi jaoq khi mail, aivq aqyu juq bhai aoqbhaol lav sav bhiq nail ngaol.
Ilheel gaq hul-iq tsilma maqkhaiq, yavphoil doil thaoq phao maqkhaiq, kovq kev lal khi, yaqkav juq alhai lovq nail bhai ya moel haq neq, aqyu juq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol
Ilheel gaq, khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lee nail yanq bhai heeq nia-ail nul neq, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai khoiqbhaoq maq bhi aol lal dai, lovq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai lainq-ai thaq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq maq noeq maq dul dai jaol-u phao, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov yavq kha lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, daoqma uqhuq daoq thoil daoq, nvjuq bhai taivq-ail ge lavq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai gail ge bhiq thailthaiq nail laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “ ‘Ngaq nail yaqkav juq bhai heldaiq phail khi, aqyanq tsaq dai, jaqjaq daoldaol bivq dei-eiq’ dai, ilheel gaq-i mail khoel-ai thaq nail saljial ivq khi neenoeq neekha aol nail yaqkav neq, khul gaq pevq nail-aiq.
Ilheel gaq kovq lal-u phao, alhai nl thailthaiq nail yaqkav bhai ya moel haq neq, yaqkav al gaq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ilheel gaq yaqkav al gaq bhai aivq nail ildaoq maoqgaiq iqsanl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq gaq bhi jiovq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqkav al gaq, ‘Ngaq nail ilheel, lavqtsail mail maq kovq lal-ail’ dai, neema lavqkhoel bhai noeq noeq-ail, yaqkav jiovq nail aivq nail aqtsaoq yaqyov-aq khi yaqmai-aq juq bhai deeq nail nee ovqtavq, jaq bov daol bov khi, jilpheeq daol bov khi jaol haq neq,

yaqkav al gaq maq noeq maq dul-ail jaol-u phao, maq heeq nia nail aqyanq lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nail ilheel gaq kovq kev lal nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq bhai sil heeq phaq-ail deeq khi, saljial maq ivq nail tsaol-aq nee mail bhi jaol-ail nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail ilheel nail neema bhai heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aqmeeq-ai lainq khi maq jaol dai, ilheel gaq nail neenoeq khe-ai maq nl nail yaqkav gaq neq, mee nia lavq deeq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Ilheel gaq nail neenoeq bhai maq heeq nia-ail khi, deeq heeq phaq-ail tsaq dai, nl laiq-a nail yaqkav gaq neq, mee nia lavq deeq nail bhai maq ya daq-ail. Maodai ya-a nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, maodai ya khaoq nail ngaol. Maodai bivq lavq-a nail bhai oil-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, a dai nee maqtsil hal kovq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miltsaq kovtavq bhai miqjaq bhi tovq lal nail khi mail, ngal lee-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il iqsanl, ngal miqjaq al bhi tovq movq deedee-ail nial.
Ngal ya daq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi sil nail teevq phaq jiav-ail haq naol. Ngal maq ya nl-u kev dai, ngaq bhai khadai tsiqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-ail.

Ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lee-a nail dai, nuljuq noeq nail laiq. Ngal alhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lee-a nail maq ngel. Yu gaoq ail gail ail dai, nl lee-a nail ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel.
Niai nee pultavq neq, teevq ildaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, ngaq gaq gaoq ail gail ail khi, nvq gaq teevq munl, hail gaq teevq munl dai, pevq-ail nail ngaol.
Aqbhu khi mail yaqyov, aqma khi mail yaqmiq, khiqma khi mail aqma, teevq gaq teevq dao gaoq ail gail ail nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai gaoq ge bhiq nail: “Nlma gakhoeq phao nqdil dov lal nail bhai, nuljuq ya moel-u phao, ‘Maoq-aol aol lee nail khul-il’ dai, teevq pov taivq-ail, nuljuq ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, aol lee nail ngaol.
Pul-nvq phao nee lilmoel bhoe dav lavq nail bhai, nuljuq ya moel-u phao, ‘Aqlaol haq uvq deedee lal nail khul-il’ dai, nuljuq ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, pevq lal nail ngaol.

Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq miltsaq khi mail nqtavq bha heldaiq khi, tselpav bhoilpav nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail, nuljuq yanq yaq lao niilniai maq tselpav maq bhoilpav kivq nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq khul khi mail, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai maq tselpav maq bhoilpav kivq nail-aiq.

Naoq bhai, yalkhaq ge lal nail gaq, yalkhaq dal duq bha lai thailthaiq-u phao, nul-nq nvq gaq nail gaiqlaq bhai, lavqtsail mail lav tsaq yaoq. Maq lav tsaq haq neq, aivq naoq bhai yalkhaq dal nail gaq jaol nail bha hel-aivq lavq nail ngaol. Yalkhaq dal nail gaq iqsanl, naoq bhai thaonq aqivq gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi, thaonq aqivq gaq iqsanl, naoq bhai thaonq bhai laol lavq nail ngaol.
Ngal naoq bhai ge lavq bhel. Maq khaoq gil mail phul teevq bhaiq khal jail-u kev dai, naol thaonq bhai maldil ya aol nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nee jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail, Heeqphaq Phillav neq, Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai coevheivq khi, aqyu juq nail aqsivq khi mail aqyu juq-i mail laol bhiq-a nail jaiqyaq nail aqsivq nee bhi il kheq-a nail ganl, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq juq alhai bhiq heivq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Gaqliqlail tsaol-aq iqsanl nee maqtsil oeqbal eeq jaiq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq noeq nail laiq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aqyu juq oeqbal eeq jaiq nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq oeqbal maq noeq pov haq neq, aqyu juq khe-ai nuljuq iqsanl mail, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Silloq julgu lavqkhoel bhai mailma-ail moe nail ilkhaol teevq il tsuq peiv-ail khi, tsuq thaiq heil laivq-a nail tsaol-aq al tsel eivq gaq neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nee maqtsil nl bheeq-a nail ngaol dai, nuljuq noeq nail laiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aqyu juq nl bheeq jaiq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq oeqbal maq noeq pov haq neq, aqyu juq khe-ai nuljuq iqsanl mail, ya luq ya seil-ail naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail, niailhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail: “Aq-u phao, aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail jiav nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nail gaoqkhail bhai, heeqguq aqbhaol teevq bhaol kha-ai thaq nail ngaol. Heeqguq aqbhaol al bhaol aqheeq heeq-ail laiq dai, aivq heldaiq ail-u phao, aqheeq maq heeq-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq gaoqkhail nl nail gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Hail kovq bhee dai ngal-aq, heeqguq aqbhaol niil bhaol nail aqheeq bhai heldaiq lee khi ngaol-aoq, aqheeq maq moel-al. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqbhaol niil bhaol thul ha yaoq. Khul khi mail, miltsaq niilniai aqnieivq-ail bhi jiav cov nail’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Gaoqkhail nl nail gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail: ‘Heeqphaq-ol, ceevq nee teevq kovq neq, bhi doevq yaoq. Daoqthaoq bhai jaoq jaoq dai duq khi, miltsaq mil meeq hoel bhoel naol.
Yaqhao aqheeq heeq lee haq neq, aqmeeq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqheeq maq heeq lee haq neq, bhi thul ha naol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.”
Jaol n n-gaol, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsel eivq kovq bhee dai, neivq aol khi nal nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq a bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, kaolceevq aqkovq kovq dai pevq-ail khi, aivq bhai aivq teevq peivq-ail maq gaol daol nia-ail.
Yeiqsul yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq bhai khul khi, “Yaqmiq-ol, naol naoq nail nalgoel nee jel-ail aoq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul yaqmai-aq al gaq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav-u phao, teevq pov nee yaqmai-aq al gaq kaolceevq gaol daol nia lal khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n n-gaol, Yeiqsul nal nail tsaol-aq bhai lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol khe aqivq gaq neema phail lal bhiq khi, tsaol-aq al juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nl nail hal nail aqn kovq n jiav nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail nalgoel meeq lai dai, al kovq n nail lavqkhoel-ai lal yaoq. Jaol n n-gaol thaq lal” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, jaol n n-gaol yovqgavq nail niaoqnel khi mail moeqphaq laljieiv bhai pheel khi, ulcuvq tseeldaol-ail bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaqmiq niil gaq bhai neivq Saqdaq-i mail tsel eivq kovq bhee dai, pheethaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Pheethaiq-ai thaq nail bhai, jaol n n-gaol pheel bhiq nail maq tsaq-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge bhiq-u phao, aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, haqsil lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee aol nail ganl iqsanl bhai, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, khul phaq khe-ai dul nail ngel-aiq. Ngal khul phaq nee mail tsiqceiv daiq heeq meeq.

Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail gaoqkhail bhai haiq-ai thaq nail gaoqpavq aqneev khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqneev al neq, aqjiiv jiiv lal eeq lal khi, aqbhaol bhaol ma ma lal-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq phao bhail nail keivq-avq lavqmeiv bhai deivq lee khi keivq-avq aqkheel kheel lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai ngal khul phaq nee mail tsiqceiv daiq heeq meeq.

Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, deqtsiq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq deqtsiq oil khi, khaqmul lav sav nail tsoelthoel hail deel bhai oil kheq khi mail, iqsanl bhai bhi bhaonq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq gailphail lail ma bhai jiav nail meenq juq julgu juq bhai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-ail, lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq: “Heeqphaq-ol, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail tsaol-aq micil teevq-eel laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Govkhoiq khoiq yaq bhai ya aol lai dai, laijai deedee yaoq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq mee nia gaq ya aol lai dai, laijai khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya aol lai-ail.

Ilheel gaq thul khi lolgov pheeqthaiq gaq-u phao, nuljuq lavqniil phao thulphaol khi, lolgov bhai kov nail ngaol. ‘Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq bhai lolgov phao lavq yaoq’ dai, hal-u phao, ‘Nuljuq khaq bha nee lal thaq-al meeq, ngal maq heeq kivq’ dai, ilheel gaq nuljuq bhai ge kovq lavq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nuljuq niailhai ge naol: ‘Nvjuq neq, naoq-ai nee mail jaq tavq daol tavq daiq-a nail ngaol. Naol nvjuq nail meenq bhai jiav nail gailkhaol bhai tsao tsao-ail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge naol.
‘Nuljuq khaq bha nee lal thaq-al meeq, ngal maq heeq kivq. Haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, ngaq-ai nee mail pav ail yaoq’ dai, ilheel gaq nuljuq bhai ge lal nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq, Ilcav, Yaqkov khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel-ai jaol nail bhai, nuljuq ya moel nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq bhai neq, lavqniil phao the ha lavq nail ngaol. A bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee nioil khi haoqgil keivq nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol, nlma dov khoeq ga khoeq, pul-nvq pultavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq lal khi, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol.

Yu nail haoqnao jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, yu nail iqmoeq ya jaol nail ngaol. Yu nail iqmoeq jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, yu nail haoqnao ya jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yanq yaq lao al nail lavqkhoel, Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq lal khi, “Naol niilniai nee dov ail yaoq. Heeqphaq Heiqlol naoq bhai deeq heivq movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq kheeqsiv

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yanqgaol, niaohao khi mail halpha n-gaol neq, ngal ya lai-ai haq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq ngel haq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq maq ya luq maq ya seil-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq-ol, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq-ol, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai naol khaq mao iqsanl heivq khi, naol jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq nail juq bhai, naol khaq mao iqsanl lovmav-i mail liv heivq nail ngaol. Yavciv yav ma aivq nail yav yaq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngal naoq nail yaq bhai khadai pov uvthaiq movq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq bhi uvthaiq lavq-al.

Naldaiq yaoq. Miqyail nuljuq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai khaonq ha nail ngaol dei-eiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. ‘Heeqphaq Miqyail nail aqmil kov-uvq nee lee-a nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq’ dai, nuljuq maq ge-u kev dai, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq ya moel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n n-gaol, Phaqliqsail munl lavqkhoel khe aqivq jiovq-ai thaq nail teevq gaq nail ilkhaol bhai Yeiqsul aoq jaq nail dai khi aol lai-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai khoiq heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, ovqmav lavqkhoel-ai ulcuvq deq deq-ail nal nail teevq gaq, Yeiqsul nail sivtavq bhai jaol nail ngaol.

“Jaol n n-gaol nal nail tsaol-aq bhai lav meeq bhiq khaoq-ail laiq, maq lav meeq bhiq khaoq-ail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq aqtsi tsu dai jaol nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nal nail al gaq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi, lav meeq bhiq khi, bhi kovq lai-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq gaq ganav, nuljuq nail yaqyov maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail niaoqnel maqkhaiq, jaol n n-gaol lovduq bhai ga bhoel-ail haq neq, teevq pov taivq-ail maq he dov bhiq nail, khaq sil gaq jaol nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai teevq phaq-ail maq ge kovq bhiq nia dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq khaoqsail jiav nail jaol duq aqmeeq tsel thailthaiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, aivq aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, ‘Khaqma hevq jaq lal yaoq’ dai, naoq bhai khul lal-u phao, khaoqsail jiav nail doiqbev bhai thaq jaoldeel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-ai nee mail maqtsil khaoqsail eeq nail gaq bhai iqsanl, aivq khul-ai thaq lao haq neq, nul-nq nvq gaq bhai khul-ai thaq nail gaq lal khi,

‘Naoq nail jaol duq niil gaq bhai bhi jaoldeel yaoq’ dai, naoq bhai ge lal naol. Aq-u phao, naol ya haqsil deedee nail lavqkhoel yu nee mail maqtsil khaoqsail maq jiav nail jaol duq bhai ya jaoldeel nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav naoq bhai khul lal-u phao, khaoqsail maq jiav nail jaol duq bhai jaoldeel yaoq. Alhai jaoldeel haq neq, naoq bhai khul-a nail gaq lal khi, ‘Aqtsaoq-ol, thoi dai nee maqtsil khaoqsail jiav nail jaol duq bhai jaoldeel lal yaoq’ dai, naoq bhai ge lal naol. Aq-u phao, naoq-ai nee mail jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai naol khaoqsail ya naol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaqeeq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, thaqtheq nail bhai ya daq naol. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaqtheq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, thaqeeq nail bhai ya daq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq bhai khul-a nail gaq bhai iqsanl, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “ ‘Aoqhaoq maq ngel haq neq, aoqkivq jaq lal yaoq’ dai, naol yu bhai khul-u phao, naoq nail aqtsaoq juq, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq, naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a juq khi mail, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail hulmeeq hulbhao juq bhai thaq khul. Alheel juq bhai khul haq neq, aqyu juq iqsanl, naoq bhai gaoq khul khi geeqlaoq nl kovq lavq nail ngaol.
‘Jaq tavq daol tavq lal yaoq’ dai, naol yu bhai khul-u phao, haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq, khil khoi khoi nail tsaol-aq, aqkhil maq meeq nail tsaol-aq khi mail, maivpeivq juq bhai khul yaoq.

Alheel juq bhai khul haq neq, naol geeqlaoq ya naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq naoq bhai geeqlaoq maq nl kovq lavq nia-ail. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq doevq kovq lal nail yanq kev lal-u phao, Miqyail naoq bhai geeqlaoq nl kovq lavq naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai jaoljaoq khi jaq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao: “Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai ya jaq ya daol nail tsaol-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Tsaol-aq teevq gaq, aoqbhaol laol bhiq nail dai khi, tsaol-aq maodai bhai khul-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aoqbhaol laol nail aqyanq kev lal-u phao, ‘Lal yaoq dei-eiq. Iqsanl mail, lainq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol’ dai, aivq nail yaqkav bhai khoel khi, khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, bhi khul ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq teevq gaq teevq phaq doeqleivq doeqleivq-ail, niailhai ge nail ngaol: ‘Ngal yalgaol teevq khoeq ul-ai thaq nail bhai, ya heldaiq ail nail ngel-i mail, ya hal nail nial’ dai, iqmoeq ilmoeq khe gaq ge nail ngaol.
‘Ngal niaoqnel ngaq gu ul-ai thaq nail, ya tseqdaiq-ail nail ngel-i mail, ya hal nail nial’ dai, yaoq gaq yaoq gaoq ge nail ngaol.
‘Ngal khaqma hevq-a nail aqsivq ngel-i mail, maq lal kivq-il’ dai, yaoq gaq yaoq ge nail ngaol.

Yaqkav al gaq kovq lal khi, ganl al ilheel gaq bhai ge gaiq bhiq lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, ilheel gaq neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, aivq nail yaqkav bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Meenq lavqkhoel khe gailkhaol khaol ma khi mail gailtsil gaillavq juq bhai lavqtsail mail ail khi, haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq, khil khoi khoi nail tsaol-aq, aqkhil maq meeq nail tsaol-aq, maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq bhai, hel lavq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqkav al gaq kovq lal khi, ‘Heeqphaq-ol, naoq-i mail khoel-a nail khe-ai nl gil-aoq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, jaol duq jiav-ai haq-il’ dai, yaqkav al gaq ilheel gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ilheel gaq ge nail: ‘Ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai tsaol-aq bhi bhee lal movq-ail nial. Meenq meenq jail bhai daol nail, gailkhaol khaol ma khi mail gailbhaq gailheiv juq bhai gaoq ail khi, lal-u kev dai, aqyu juq bhai hel lavq yaoq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Iqmoeq-u nee mail ge gaiq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq, teevq gaq gail ngaq nail aqjal niilniai maq ya mevqdaiq-ail’ dai, yaqkav al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.”
Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul haoqnaol naolkovq kovqdaiq khi, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail:

“Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma, yovqgavq nail miqsaol yovyaq, yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai maqkhaiq, a dai nee maqtsil, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, maq khaonq ha haq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol maq jiovq nia-ail.
Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail lavqyavq yovqgavq bavq khi ngaq nail haoqnao maq lal haq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol maq jiovq nia-ail.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq gaq ganav, moe deedee nail ilkhaol teevq il cov movq haq neq, ilkhaol al il cov gaq kivq dai, phul lovq lai-ail laiq, maq lovq lai-ail laiq dai, khadai gil lai ngel-ail dai, jaoldeel khi maq saol-nvq daiq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav jaol naol laiq.

Alhai maq saol-nvq daiq haq neq, cov khoel khoel-ai khi, cov ngaiq ngaiq-ai thaq khi mail, maq cov gaq nia-a nail bhai ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aivq bhai helsil helsil-ail, niailhai ge nail ngaol:
‘Niil gaq neq, ilkhaol cov khoel khoel-ai khi, cov ngaiq ngaiq thaq nail bhai maq cov gaq nia-il thoq’ dai, meelnaq lal naol.

Teevq phaq neq, heeqphaq teevq gaq, heeqphaq yaoq gaq yaoq bhai genl dev ail nail khi-u phao, ‘Yu nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq, nvq meel-nvq gaq lal nail bhai, ngaq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq teevq meel-nvq gaq taivq-ail, genl dev gaq nia-ail laiq, maq dev gaq nia-ail laiq’ dai, jaoldeel khi mail, maq saol-nvq daiq nail heeqphaq teevq gaq ganav jaol naol laiq.
Maq gaq lai-ail dai, heeq kivq haq neq, heeqphaq al gaq eqyal bha lal-u phao nee mail, aivq nail haqbhoil teevq gaq bhai khoel gai-aivq khi, tsaq lai jil lai dai, aivq nl nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq khal jiav nail iqsanl mail maq khaonq-ail ceevq haq neq, ngaq nail yaqlaol maq jiovq nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Cavqdevq neq, ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, cavqdevq niail nail phaq deq-ail haq neq, khalhai khi gaoq bhi niail lal nia nail-aiq.

Cavqdevq al neq, miltsaq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, miltsaq mil meeq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ganl maq tsoiq nail ngel-i mail, yu lavqniil bhai hoel ha-ai thaq nail ngaol. Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq khi oeqbal yaq juq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul nail daoq naldaiq nail khi aivq nail aqjail bha jiiv lal-a nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail juq khi aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq ge nail: “Niil gaq oeqbal yaq bhai hav khi, aqyu juq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai jaq tavq daol tavq-il” dai, ge doil nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq nee mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav, yaol teevq yal maol jaol nail lavqkhoel nee, teevq maol peivq-ail haq neq, goiq tsel goiq maol bhai haqtsoiq haqyal bha bhi jaol-ail ceevq khi, peivq ail-a nail yaol al maol bhai moel-u kev dai, maq halpov nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq.
Aivq yaol al maol bhai halpov moel-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, bavqpuv bhai bavq dav khi kovq lal nail ngaol.

Aivq ilkhaol bha kovq kev lal-u phao, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq khi mail aqjail bhai jaol nail juq bhai khul jil khi, ‘Ngaq-ai nee mail lavqkhiq tsao tsail lal yaoq! Peivq ail-a nail ngaq nail yaol al maol bhai halpov moel-aoq nail ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, oeqbal noeq pov nail maq loq nail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq goiq tsel goiq gaq bhaqda nee, nqtavq kovtavq bha lavqkhiq tsail nail nee maqtsil, oeqbal yaq teevq gaq oeqbal noeq pov-a nail ngel-i mail, nqtavq kovtavq bha lavqkhiq tsail jaiq nail ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail ngaol.”

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Teevq phaq neq, yaqmai-aq teevq gaq phul tsel bavq jiav khi, teevq bavq peivq-ail haq neq, miqjaq kheq khi yavphail yav yav-ail, moel-u kev dai, aqmeeq-ai maq halpov nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq.

Phul al teevq bavq bhai halpov moel-u phao, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq khi mail aivq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail juq bhai khul jil khi, ‘Ngaq-ai nee mail lavqkhiq tsao tsail lal yaoq. Peivq ail-a nail phul al bavq, halpov moel-aoq nail ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, oeqbal yaq teevq gaq, oeqbal noeq pov-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail ngaol.”
Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq, yaqyov nvq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol.
Jaqbheq gaq aivq nail aqbhu bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Aqbhu-ol, ngaq bhai ovq nail jaiqbhoil bhoil lavq yaoq’ dai, hal-u phao, aqbhu gaq aqyu nvq mail bhai jaiqbhoil bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Mao-ail maq maoq lal mail jaqbheq gaq, aivq nail phul heel yalkav iqsanl mail oil khi, mao-ail eq nail milkhaoq bha ail-a nail ngaol. Al bhai, aivq khal doevq movq-ail doevq khi, phul heel yalkav al, yuq ha gil-a nail ngaol.
Aivq khal jiav nail iqsanl, yuq ha gil-u phao, milkhaoq al khaoq bhai moevq dee sivq deedee nail phaq kev lee khi, aivq ya haq ya aoq deedee-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yaqyov al gaq milkhaoq al khaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai juq juq-ail jaol-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq aivq bhai yalphiq bhai wavq bhi tsu ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq aoq moevq deedee lal bhiq-u phao, wavq jaq nail aqbhai al teevq bov jaq movq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq iqsanl aivq bhai teevq phaq iqsanl maq bhi jaq-al.
Aq-u phao, yaqyov al gaq noeqgeel lal bhiq khi ge nail: ‘Ngaq nail aqbhu bhai gaqmaol maoljaq nail juq neq, maq jaq maq daol gil tsaol khi ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, niilniai moevq heil leevq-ai nial.
Ngal ngaq nail aqbhu jaol nail bha kovq lai khi, Aqbhu-ol, ngal neq, Miqyail bhai iqsanl, naoq bhai iqsanl, nl bheeq-a nail ngaol.

Niai nee pultavq neq, naoq nail yaq dai, khul lavq nail bhai ngal maq geel-nvq-ail. Naoq bhai gaqmaol maoljaq nail teevq gaq khe-ai ngaq bhai saol-nvq lavq yaoq’ dai ge bhiq naol dai, noeq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq aivq nail aqbhu jaol nail bha kovq lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq eqyal bha kovq lal thailthaiq nail bhai, aivq nail aqbhu ya moel khi, aivq bhai gaoqhaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq jaol nail bha tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail Yaqyov nail leelkhaol bhai phalthaiq khi, moeqsaol saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqyov aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Aqbhu-ol, ngal neq, Miqyail bhai iqsanl, naoq bhai iqsanl nl laiq-a nail ngaol. Niai nee pultavq neq, naoq nail yaq dai, khul lavq nail bhai ngal maq geel-nvq-ail’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqbhu al gaq aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Mao-ail meeq nail phailkhaoq heelma lavqtsail mail hel leevq khi, aivq bhai bhi doi yaoq. Aivq nail lavqnoil bhai noiltsaoq bhi tsaoq yaoq. Aqkhil bhai saiqnaov bhi tsaoq yaoq.
Bhi jaqtsul-ai thaq nail niaoqnel niaoq yaq tseel lavq khi heivq yaoq. Ngadao juq teevq gaq khe-ai lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, jaq tavq daol tavq bhel.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail yaqyov niil gaq, sil thaq nail ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Peivq-ail khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il moel kovq-ao naol’ dai, ge khi, aqyu juq lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, nl-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aq-u phao, aqivq gaq yalgaol bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aivq ilkhaol aqjail bhai kovq kev lal-u phao, laiqgaiq jiiv jiiv-ail bhoeloe nioi nail aqthel bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq yaqkav teevq gaq bhai khul khi, ‘Al khul khi nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqkav al gaq ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Naoq nail jaqbheq kovq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq nal nail goel nail khi luq-ail seil-ail nail phaq bhai jel-ail khi, naoq nail aqbhu aivq bhai ya hav-a nail ngel-i mail, bhi jaqtsul-ai thaq nail niaoqnel niaoq yaq heivq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqivq gaq neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, ilkhaol bha maq aol lai-al. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nail aqbhu dov lee khi, aivq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Aqivq gaq aivq nail aqbhu bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Ngal neq, naoq nail yaqkav taivq-ail jiovq-a nail aqkovq aqlav iqsanl maoq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Ngal naoq nail daoq teevq daoq iqsanl maq lel daiq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail aqtsaoq juq nee mail jaq tavq daol tavq kivq dai, civqmeiv civq yaq teevq maol taivq-ail iqsanl, naol ngaq bhai teevq pov iqsanl, maq bivq lavq daiq-al.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, phul halpov nail yaqmai-aq nee mail khaqmiq sev sev-ail, naoq nail phul heel yuq ha gil-a nail, naoq nail yaqyov niil gaq kovq lal-u phao, bhi jaqtsul-ai thaq nail niaoqnel niaoq yaq naol aivq nail haqbhoil heivq bhiq-il thoq’ dai, aivq nail aqbhu bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqbhu gaq ge nail: ‘Yaqyov-ol, naol neq, khaq mao iqsanl ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail ngaol. Ngal khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, naoq nail ngaol.

Naoq nail jaqbheq neq, sil khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Peivq-ail khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il moel-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq teevq tsail dai lav sav bhiq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol’ dai, aivq nail aqbhu aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.”

Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aq-u phao hulmeeq hulbhao teevq gaq, aivq nail phul heel yalkav bhai heldaiq nail yaqkav teevq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n neq, yalkav bhai heldaiq nail al gaq, ilheel gaq nail yalkav yuq ha thailthaiq nail ganl, yu ilheel gaq bhai ge bhiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Ilheel gaq aivq bhai khul khi, ‘Naoq nail ganl, ngaq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai ngel naol laiq. Naoq-i mail yalkav bhai heldaiq thailthaiq nail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq aqphul al, ngaq bhai bhiq heldaiq lavq yaoq. Niai nee pultavq neq, yalkav bhai heldaiq nail ganl niil, naoq bhai maq bhi nl yaoq-aol’ dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yalkav bhai heldaiq nail gaq aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai niailhai noeq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal khalhai khi heeq meeq. Ngaq nail ilheel gaq, aivq nail yalkav bhai heldaiq nail ganl niil nail lavqkhoel nee ngaq bhai the dov lavq naol. Ngaq bhai neq, miltsaq-ai duq duq-ail maq nl maq hal tsaol-il. Yu bhai hal jaq hal daol-ail khi ngaol-aoq, haqsil lal-il.

Phul heel yalkav bhai heldaiq nail ganl niil nail lavqkhoel nee, ngal ya dov ail-u phao, yu nail ilkhaol-ai ngaq bhai hav lavq dai, ngal khalhai ya khi nail dai, noeq dov lal-aoq naol’ dai, aivq noeq nail ngaol.

Aivq aivq nail ilheel gaq bhai gailjiov bavq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq khai-aq teevq gaq bhai, aivq khul-ail khi, iqmoeq khe gaq bhai, ‘Naol ngaq nail ilheel gaq bhai gailjiov khadai bavq nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

‘Saqloq aqbhaol nail aqtseel teevq yal bhun bavq naol’ dai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. ‘Naoq nail haoqgavq aqphul oil khi, lavqtsail mail jaoldeel khi, ngaq tsel bhun taivq-ail gevq thaq-ai yaoq’ dai, yalkav bhai heldaiq nail al gaq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq yaoq gaq yaoq bhai, ‘Naol gailjiov khadai bavq nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq-u phao, ‘Gov teevq yal hav bavq naol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. ‘Naoq nail haoqgavq aqphul oil lavq khi, eivq tsel hav taivq-ail gevq thaq-ai yaoq’ dai, yalkav bhai heldaiq nail al gaq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Phul heel yalkav bhai heldaiq nail maq see maq daol nail al gaq, neenoeq neekha yuq nia nail ngel-i mail, ilheel gaq aivq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq yaq juq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq nail yeel lavqkhoel, aqbhaq nail yaq juq nee maqtsil neenoeq neekha yuq nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Phul heel yalkav neq, miltsaq kovtavq khe nlmaoq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, aqtsaoq bhao lal dai, al yuq yaoq. Phul heel yalkav al gil haq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail jaol duq khe aqtsaoq al neq, naoq bhai hav lavq nail ngaol.

Ganl gal yaq phaq nl-u phao, saljial ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, ganl gal ma phaq nl-u phao iqsanl, saljial ivq naol. Ganl gal yaq phaq nl-u phao, saljial maq ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, ganl gal ma phaq nl-u phao iqsanl, maq see maq daol-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq miltsaq niil nail phul heel yalkav yuq-u phao saljial maq ivq haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq khe phul heel yalkav khaq sil gaq nuljuq bhai av lavq nail-aiq.
Nuljuq yu nail phul heel yalkav yuq-u phao, saljial maq ivq haq neq, nuljuq bhai khaq sil gaq yalkav gaoq bivq lavq nail-aiq.

Yaqkav khul gaq maqkhaiq, heeqphaq nvq gaq nail yaqkav maq jiovq kivq-ail. Teevq gaq bhai neejiav jiav haq neq, teevq gaq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq bhai ev haq neq, teevq gaq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq Miqyail nail yaqkav khi mail phul heel nail yaqkav teevq pov nee, maq jiovq kivq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail juq neq, phul heel bhai maivjeel jeel nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, ganl al juq iqsanl mail ya gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai meelnaq meelnaq-ail helsil nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq neq, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail khe-ai tavq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nuljuq nail neema bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail thaqeeq nail phaq bhai, Miqyail maq heldaiq nul-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail daoq neq, ulcuvq saol bhiq nail Yaolhaq nail yeel maq kev lee-u phao khe nail haqbhoil ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, aqdoil nl bhiq-a nail mee nia phaq bhai daq jel lavq nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq milkhaoq al khaoq bhai genl dev gaq nail dai khi laijai nail ngaol.
Nqtavq khi mail miltsaq peivq-ail nail haq nail nee maqtsil, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel khe, haoqgavq aqgevq gevq yaq teevq gevq peivq-ail nail neq, haq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yovqgavq nail khaqma kovq khi yaoq gaq yaoq bhai hevq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, nl bheeq-a nail ngaol. Yu nail miqkovq hevq-a nail juq iqsanl, yu nail khaqma bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aq-u phao, hulmeeq hulbhao teevq gaq jaol laoq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, nel nav nav nail aqgaq aqdoi doi khi mail, mailma-ail meeq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhatsuq doi khi, yaoq n yaoq n nee lavqkhiq tsail nail lavqkhoel, jaq bov daol bov nail ngaol.

Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq nail iqphaiq phao khe lolgov aqjail bhai, Laqyaqlul dai mil-ai thaq nail hal jaq hal daol nail teevq gaq bhai, yu bavq thaq-ai lal-a nail ngaol. Laqyaqlul al gaq, aqmaol maollao lao-ail malyal daol nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq nail kovqkhail kov-uvq bhai jaq khal-ai thaq nail juq bhai jaq movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, kheeq lal khi, aivq nail malyal bhai mevq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq n neq, haq nail aoq nail al gaq sil khi, nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai Aqbhaqlaqhaq jaol nail bha hevq dal laivq-a nail ngaol. Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq iqsanl sil khi, yu aivq bhai duqpheeq-a nail ngaol.

Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq neq, sil nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai, haq dee aoq deedee nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Aivq gaollel daiq-u phao, eqyal bha Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai maqkhaiq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail Laqyaqlul jaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq mailma-ail ge nail: ‘Aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq. Miqjaq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai, ngal ya daq deedee thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, Laqyaqlul aivq nail lavqnoil ulcuvq bhai tsaoq deev khi, ngaq nail moeqlal jieiv lal dai, bhi jiav bhoel-aivq leevq lavq yaoq’ dai, hal nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Aqbhaqlaqhaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail: ‘Yaqyov-ol, naol miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq-u phao, aqmeeq bhoil ya teiv khi, Laqyaqlul neq, aqdoil bhoil ya teiv-a nail bhai, thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq. Niil aq-il, aivq niilniai neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel ya jaol khi, naol neq, haq nail aoq nail lavqkhoel bhai, ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, nvjuq khi mail nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai gaqlaovq khoeq navq jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, niilniai nee mail nuljuq jaol nail bha yu lee movq khi ngaol-aoq, maq lee nia-ail. Nuljuq jaol nail nee mail, nvjuq jaol nail bha yu lal movq khi ngaol-aoq, maq lal nia-ail’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq ge nail: ‘Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngal naoq bhai niailhai hal movq-ail nial, aqbhu-ol. Ngaq nail mailnail ngaq gaq doevq-ail ceevq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq iqsanl mail, haq dee aoq deedee nail niilniai maq ya kev lee dai, Laqyaqlul bhai ngaq nail aqbhu nail ilkhaol bhai khoel gai-aivq khi, aqyu juq bhai mailma-ail bhi cavq bhi cov-ail yaoq’ dai, aivq hal nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Aqbhaqlaqhaq ge kovq bhiq nail: ‘Aqyu juq jaol nail bhai Molseiq khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq, daoq al juq bhai ya naldaiq nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Hulmeeq hulbhao al gaq ge nail: ‘Aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq-ol, thailhai ngaol-aoq, al taivq-ail maq lovq-ai haq-al. Gaoq doevq kovq lal thaq nail teevq gaq ganav aqyu juq jaol nail bha ail haq neq, aqyu juq oeqbal noeq pov naol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ‘Aqyu juq Molseiq nail daoq khi mail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail daoq maq naldaiq haq neq, teevq gaq ganav gaoq doevq kovq lal khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail dai, Aqbhaqlaqhaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.’ ”
Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yu bhai bhi nl laiq nail phaq jiav lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu bhai bhi nl laiq nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq, yaqnoil niil juq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav bhai bhi nl laiq nail nee maqtsil, aivq nail leelkhaol bhai lovmav heeq ma pheethaiq khi iqyaq iqma bhai bavq puvq ail haq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaoq. Naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq naoq bhai nl laiq lavq haq neq, aivq bhai mailma-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Aivq oeqbal noeq pov haq neq, aivq nail oeqbal phaiq bhiq yaoq.

Aivq teevq n nail lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail sivq pov kev dai, naoq bhai nl laiq lavq khi, ‘Ngal oeqbal noeq pov naol’ dai, naoq bhai sivq pov kev daiq ge lal haq neq, naol aivq nail oeqbal ya phaiq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, gaqkhoel juq ge nail: “Nvjuq naoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq, mao lal dai nl lavq yaoq” dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge bhiq nail: “Nuljuq ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaoqpavq nail aqneev dai, eeq haq neq, heeqlaoq gaoqmaiq aqbhaol niil bhaol bhai, ‘Naol naoq nail daoqtsail gaol khi, iqyaq iqma bhai doevq-ail yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-u phao, aqbhaol al bhaol nuljuq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Naoq nail yaqkav teevq gaq, daiyal tseq-ail khi kovq lal-u phao maqkhaiq, yaol lovq-ail khi kovq lal-u phao maqkhaiq, ‘Lavqtsail mail jaoldeel khi jaq lal yaoq’ dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav aivq bhai ge bhiq naol laiq.

Yaqkav al gaq bhai, ‘Ngaq nail haqbhoil aoq jal nl jaq lavq yaoq. Ngal jaq bov daol bov-u kev dai, aqmeeq meeq dai, lainq khi, aoqbhaol lav sav lavq yaoq. Ngal jaq bov daol bov gaq haq neq, naol ya jaq nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Yaqkav al gaq ilheel gaq-i mail khoel nail khe-ai taivq-ail nl-a nail ngel-i mail, ilheel gaq aivq bhai maq tsiqeeq-ail.

Alhai dul dai, nuljuq iqsanl, nuljuq bhai khal khoel lavq-a nail phaq taivq-ail nuljuq nl gil-u phao, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq niailhai ge yaoq: ‘Nvjuq neq, ganl maq tsoiq nail yaqkav juq ngaol. Nvjuq bhai dal nail ganl juq taivq-ail nvjuq nl gil-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai-u phao, Saqmaqliv milkhaoq khi Gaqliqlail milkhaoq nail milkhaiq bhai lai pav-a nail ngaol.

Aivq julgu teevq gu bhai aol lai thailthaiq-u phao, niaoqbhaoq daol nail tsel gaq micil eqyal bha jaol khi, Yeiqsul bhai moel-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq “Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-ol, nvjuq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ya moel-u phao: “Nuljuq nail aqmaol Philyaq juq bhai bhi heldaiq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ail thailthaiq-u phao, meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq, aivq meeq lal-a nail bhai heeq nia-u phao, kovq lal khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq deedee-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai miltsaq bhai gaolbeiv-ai thaq khi, Yeiqsul bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq ngaol.
Aq-u phao Yeiqsul ge nail: “Meeq lai-a nail tsaol-aq neq, tsel gaq maq ngel-ail laiq. Goiq gaq neq, khaq bha ail-a nail-aiq.
Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a maq ngel nail neq, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel nail khi mail kovq lal-a nail teevq gaq iqsanl maq jaol-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Thul khi kovq ail yaoq. Naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Miqyail Milkhaoq khaq mao kev lee nail-aiq” dai, Phaqliqsail juq naldaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail Milkhaoq kev lee nail neq, maivneev moel kivq nail phaq maq ngel-ail.

‘Heldaiq. Niai jiav-ail nial. A bhai jiav-ail nial’ dai, maq ge kivq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail aqn bhai moel movq nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq ya moel-ail.
‘Niai heldaiq lal yaoq! A bhai heldaiq ail yaoq’ dai, yu nuljuq bhai ge lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, thaq heldaiq ail. Aqyu juq nail haoqnao thaq tsaothel-aivq.

Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, nqtavq teevq phao bal-nvq bha nqmeivq meivq nail yaoq phao yaoq-ao bha kev dai, bhaq kev ail nail khe-ai, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov yavq kha lee-u phao, alhai pevq lal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, alhai maq pevq lal-u phao, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, haq nail aoq nail mee nia phaq bhai ya daq nail nee ovqtavq, niil yeel khe tsaol-aq-i mail khaonq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.
Nol-avq nail yeel bhai kev lee thel lee-a nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail yeel bhai iqsanl, kev lee thel lee nail ngaol.

Nol-avq laovq laovq ma nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u n-gaol kev dai, aqyu juq jaq nail daol nail nee ovqtavq, hevq pheel maol pheeljaq-ai haq nail ngaol. Nol-avq laovq bhai aol lai gaq-u phao, ulcuvq deq bhee lal khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail luq-ail seil-ail gil-a nail ngaol.
Laoltavq nail yeel bhai iqsanl alhai dul dai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq jaq nail daol nail, yalkav gaoq, yalkav ul nail, kha jaq kha daol nail nee ovqtavq, ilkhaol cov nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Laoltavq Saoldoq meenq nee mail dov ail-u n-gaol nee, nqtavq nee mail miqjaq khi miqjal jalheel maoq-aol aol nail khe-ai aol lee khi, aqyu juq iqsanl bhai lav luq lav seil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov yavq kha lee-u n-gaol, alhai dul nail ngaol.

Aq-u n-gaol, khaolpoiv bha dav nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai yalkav jiav haq neq, yavq kha lee khi yalkav oil ail nail khi ilkhaol bha thaq aol ail. Alhai dul dai, yalgaol bha jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, thaq kovq lai.
Laoltavq nail khaqma bhai thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq.

Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq yovqgavq bhi jel-ail dai, laijai haq neq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq sunq-ail nail ngaol. Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhi sunq-ail haq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aq-u nqkiv tsaol-aq nvq gaq iqjial teevq jial bhai taivq-ail iqthaiq-u phao, teevq gaq bhai hel-aivq khi, teevq gaq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq nvq gaq gov thaoq thailthaiq-u phao, teevq gaq bhai hel-aivq khi teevq gaq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq nail ngaol.
[Yaqyov-aq nvq gaq yalgaol bhai jaol-u phao, teevq gaq bhai hel-aivq khi, teevq gaq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq nail ngaol]” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao yaqlaol juq: “Heeqphaq-ol, khul dao bhai niailhai pevq lal nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail niailhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Sil-ai thaq nail aqmaol khal jiav nail bhai, joelma ga jil lee nail ngaol
Aqyu juq neema maq cov mail khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Aq-u phao, meenq teevq meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq nail teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Miqyail bhai maq geesil nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai iqsanl, maq ev nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Meenq al meenq bhai miqtsiq miqma teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq yalkhaq dal bhiq nail al gaq jaol nail bha teevq yanq ngal-aq, teevq pov lai lai-ail khi, ‘Ngaq bhai ge gaq movq-ail bhiq nail phao jaol nail gaq, ngaq bhai nl laiq lavq-a nail bhai, tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee dal ceiv lavq yaoq’ dai, hal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yalkhaq dal bhiq nail al gaq maq dal bhiq dai, tsaq dai jaol-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai niailhai noeq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal neq, Miqyail bhai maq geesil nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai maq ev nail teevq gaq pevq khi ngaol-aoq,

miqtsiq miqma niil gaq ngaq bhai lav suqsaq lal nail ngel-i mail, ngal aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee dal ceiv bhiq naol. Alhai maq ngel haq neq, aivq lal lal-ail lav suqsaq lal nail bhai bov-ail bov lal-aoq nial’ dai, noeq nail ngaol.”
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Maq see maq daol nail yalkhaq dal bhiq nail al gaq, aivq nail neema lavq khoel-ai aol nail bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq.

Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, aivq bhai hal haq neq, Miqyail tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil maq nl bhiq-ail laiq. Aivq daonq daonq-ail jaol naol laiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Aivq aqyu juq nail haqbhoil tsaq nail daol nail phaq lavqtsail mail nl bhiq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov yavq kha lee-u phao, miltsaq kovtavq bhai, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq jiav nail bhai, ya moel naol laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq neq, tsaq naol daol naol dai saol-nvq khi, yu bhai thaqtheq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol:
“Tsaol-aq nvq gaq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai geeqlaoq hal lai-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, Phaqliqsail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Phaqliqsail al gaq thulphaol khi, aivq bhai aivq niailhai ge ge-ail khi geeqlaoq hal nail: ‘Miqyail-ol, ngal neq, yu khe-ai maq dul nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq eeq naol. Aqyu juq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq nail tsaol-aq, maq tsaq maq daol nail tsaol-aq khi mail, yu nail khaqma bhai bheeq nail leel nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, ngal neq, khaon tavq nail niil gaq khe-ai maq dul nail ngel-i mail iqsanl, naoq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Jaol n teevq jao nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal maq jaq nail aol nvq pov nl nail ngaol. Ngal khal ya nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee naoq bhai tsel bhoil teevq bhoil danq nail ngaol’ dai, aivq ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaon tavq nail al gaq neq, eqyal bha thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nqtavq phao maq gaollel daiq sal-ail, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee neema bhai deeq deeq-ail khi ge nail: ‘Miqyail-ol, ngal oeqbal eeq deedee nail bhai, gaoqhaq lavq yaoq’ dai, hal nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Khaon tavq nail al gaq tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal khi, ilkhaol bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Phaqliqsail al gaq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq maq pevq lal-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaqeeq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, thaqtheq nail bhai ya daq naol. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaqtheq nail tsaol-aq, thaqeeq nail bhai ya daq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul-i mail yaqbeiv juq bhai bhi thoiqtsi nail haqbhoil, yu aivq jaol nail bha bhal lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq al bhai ya moel-u phao, yaqbeiv bhal lavq-a nail juq bhai khaq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul yaqlaol juq bhai khul khi ge nail: “Yaqnoil juq ngal jaol nail bha bhi lal yaoq. Aqyu juq bhai thaq lav tsoiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, aqyu juq kheel yaqnoil juq bhai ovq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaqnoil khe-ai Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai maq hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, a bhai maq ya aol lai-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Meeq nail saqlaq-ol, ngal nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya dai, khalhai ya nl nail-aiq” dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aqivq teevq gaq, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq lal-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Khul khi mail, naol ngaq bhai, meeq nail saqlaq dai, khul nail-aiq. Miqyail maq ngel nail neq, meeq nail teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail.

Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq heeq nia nail ngaol. Yu nail khaqma nee thaq bheeq thaq leel. Yu bhai thaq lav heivq. Yu nail nlmaoq thaq khoiq. Yu bhai maq tsaq nail salkhil thaq khanq. Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao nee, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al juq iqsanl mail, naldaiq gil-aoq nail ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq al gaq Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, “Naol teevq phaq loq-ail haq nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Naol khal jiav nail nlmaoq iqsanl mail gaoq ha gil khi, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bhoil bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai mao-ail phoiq nail naoq nail phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq jiav lal naol. Aq-u phao, naol kovq lal khi, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, noeqhaq deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, hulmeeq hulbhao teevq gaq ngaol.
Aivq noeqhaq nail bhai Yeiqsul ya moel khi ge nail: “Hulmeeq hulbhao juq Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail neq, khadai haq nail ngel-ail.
Laolthao geevqjieivq geeq naq bhai aol lai nail neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aol lai nail nee maqtsil ngaq-aiq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, khaq sil gaq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nia nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq yaq maq nl nia nail phaq bhai, Miqyail nl nia nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Nvjuq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, naoq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Miqyail Milkhaoq nail haqbhoil, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol, khaqma, aqivq jaqbheq, aqbhu aqma khi mail, yaqmiq yaqyov, niil juq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail khul gaq maqkhaiq,
niil yeel nail lavqkhoel, a dai nee maqtsil ya nail nee ovqtavq, yaqhao khe yeel nail lavqkhoel neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq iqsanl ya naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngadao juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai thailthaiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail ganl, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail iqsanl mail, ya bhee lal nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai yu nail jeq-e nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi, meelnaq meelnaq-ail helsil khi, khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq khi mail, thaiqkhaq thaiqbav nail bhai, aivq ya daq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq, aivq bhai neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq gaq khi, heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n bhee lal haq neq, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ganl al juq gaqkhoel juq teevq peivq-ail maq naldaiq heeq nia-ail. Aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq al juq neq, aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai oil-uvq-ai thaq nail phaq pevq khi, Yeiqsul-i mail ge nail bhai, aqyu juq teevq peivq-ail maq naldaiq heeq nia-ail.
Yeiqsul Yeiqlilkhol nail meenq meenq jail bhai ail kev-u phao, maivpeivq teevq gaq gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai jaoldeel khi hal jaq nail ngaol.
Maivpeivq al gaq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma ail nail lal nail bhai ya gaiq-u phao: “Khul pevq thailthaiq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul lee thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq maivpeivq al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, aivq gul-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq phao tsao nail juq aivq bhai, “Aqtsi tsu dai jaol yaoq” dai, khaq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq maq naldaiq dai, “Daqbhil nail Yaqyov-ol, ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq yaoq” dai, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil gaoq gul-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul naq lai khi, “Aivq ngal jaol nail bha hel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Maivpeivq al gaq, aivq nail aqjail bhai lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal naoq nail haqbhoil khul bhi nl bhiq movq nail-aiq” dai, aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, “Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail maivneev moel lal dai, bhi nl lavq movq-ail nial” dai, hal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Moel lal yaoq. Naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, meeq lai-a nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq teevq pov nee mail, maivneev moel lal khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail al bhai ya moel-u phao, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Yeiqlilkhol meenq bhai aol lai khi, ail pav-a nail ngaol.
A bhai, Saqgail dai mil-ai thaq nail hulmeeq hulbhao teevq gaq, jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, khaon tavq nail phao aqivq teevq gaq ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, khul gaq meeq dai, aivq moel movq nail ngel-i mail, heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma jaol bhee-ai thaq khi, aivq tsaol-aq daqmaiq ngel-i mail, maq heldaiq moel nia-al.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq Yeiqsul bhai ya moeldaiq iqmoeq phao tsaol-aivq khi, Yeiqsul lee nail gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai doevq nail heeqguq aqbhaol bhai dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul a bhai kev lee-u phao, aivq bhai gaollel khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Saqgail-ol, lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee yaoq. Yanqgaol ngal naoq nail ilkhaol bha ya yavq lee nail niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Saqgail lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee khi, Yeiqsul bhai lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, hav-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail al bhai ya moel-u phao: “Aivq neq, oeqbal yaq teevq gaq nail ilkhaol bha dav ail-il” dai, ge doil nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq neq, Saqgail thulphaol khi ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, heldaiq yaoq. Ngaq nail yalkav teevq pav haq nail aoq nail juq bhai bivq naol. Ngal tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail yalkav bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq thaq nail jiav haq neq, liq bhoil khaoq kovq bivq naol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Yanqgaol ilkhaol niil il nail lavqkhoel bhai hevqkovq nail phaq kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq iqsanl, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaq teevq gaq ngaol.
Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, peivq ail-a nail tsaol-aq bhai halpov khi hevqkovq nail haqbhoil lee-a nail ngaol” dai, Saqgail bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq daoq al juq bhai naldaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail aqjail bhai lai kev-aoq nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, teevq pov taivq-ail kev lee naol dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aq-u phao, eeq nail heel nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Aivq heeqphaq nail alyaq oil ail nail khi, mao-ail eq nail milkhaoq bha ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq heeqphaq nail alyaq ya gaq haq neq, kovq lal naol dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
