Aivq ail nail dai, khi-u phao, aivq nail yaqkav tsel gaq bhai khul khi, teevq gaq bhai heel teevq jao-ai teevq jao-ai dai, bivq-a nail ngaol. ‘Ngal kovq lal-u phao kev dai, heel niil yuq khi jaiqgaiq gaiq yaoq dei-eiq’ dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail milkhaoq yaq juq aivq bhai neejiav jiav khi, aqyu juq nail jiqdan juq bhai aivq nail haoqnao bhi tsaothel-aivq khi, ‘Tsaol-aq niil gaq, nvjuq bhai uvthaiq lal nail bhai, nvjuq maq movq-ail’ dai, bhi cavq gaiq ail-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq heeqphaq nail alyaq ya khi kovq lal-u phao, aivq-i mail phul bivq-ail ceevq-a nail yaqkav al juq, khadai gaiqjeq thaq nail ngel-ail dai, ya heeq kivq dai, aqyu juq bhai khul ail yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq khe gaq lal khi, ‘Heeqphaq-ol, ngal naoq nail heel al jao-ai nee mail tsel jao-ai gaiq jeq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq al gaq ge nail: ‘Aqmeeq nial. Yaqkav aqmeeq gaq-ol, saljial ivq nail lavqkhoel naol ganl ganl yaq bhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, meenq tsel meenq bhai uvthaiq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nvq gaq teevq gaq lal khi ge nail: ‘Heeqphaq-ol, ngal naoq nail heel al jao-ai nee mail ngaq jao-ai gaiq jeq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
‘Naol meenq ngaq meenq bhai uvthaiq yaoq’ dai, heeqphaq aivq bhai iqsanl ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao yaqkav teevq gaq gaoq lal khi ge nail: ‘Heeqphaq-ol, thoiq, ngal naoq nail heel niil jao-ai bhai lavqsiv-i mail toev cuvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Naol neq, mao-ail yanvq nail teevq gaq ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai geesil lal-ail nial. Naoq-i mail maq bhi jiav-a nail bhai, naol oil nail ngaol. Naoq-i mail maq haiq-a nail bhai, naol gaiq nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao heeqphaq al gaq ge nail: ‘Mao-ail haqeiv nail yaqkav-ol, naoq nail daoq nee mail, ngal naoq bhai yalkhaq dal naol. Ngal neq, mao-ail yanvq nail teevq gaq pevq khi, ngaq-i mail maq bhi jiav-a nail bhai ngal oil nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq-i mail maq haiq-a nail bhai ngal gaiq nail ngaol dai, naol heeq kivq nail phal-iq neq,

ngaq nail phul thoil oil khi, phul phal bhiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, khul khi mail, maq phal bhiq-a nail-aiq. Alhai phal bhiq-al nul neq, ngal kovq lal-u phao, ngaq nail heel thoil khi jailjeq iqsanl ngal ya nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol nail juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Heel al jao-ai bhai, aivq nail lavqkhoel nee oil kovq khi, heel tsel jao-ai jiav nail gaq bhai bivq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
‘Heeqphaq-ol, aivq heel tsel jao-ai jiav nail ngaol’ dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
‘Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Jiav nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai bivq laoq nail ngaol. Maq jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai, aqyu juq-i mail khal jiav nail juq bhai, oil dov gil nail ngaol.

A bhai nee pultavq, ngaq bhai neejiav jiav khi, ngaq bhai aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai maq bhi uvthaiq movq nail juq bhai hel lavq yaoq. Ngaq nail sivtavq bhai aqyu juq bhai heivq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.”
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq khi, aqyu juq nail iqmoeq moeq khi mail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha aol lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Saqloq gaoqjaoq nail aqjail bhai jiav nail Bheilphaqjeiq julgu khi mail Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol nvq gaq bhai khoel khi ge bhiq-a nail:

“Nul-nq nvq gaq iqmoeq phao jiav nail julgu bhai lai yaoq. Julgu al gu bhai aol lai-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl maq jeeq daiq-a nail moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq teevq maol pheethaiq-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel nail ngaol. Cevpheel khi tseel lavq yaoq.

‘Nul-nq nvq gaq khul khi mail thailhai cevpheel nail-aiq’ dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav naldaiq lal haq neq, ‘Heeqphaq loq nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul-i mail khoel gai-aivq-a nail tsaol-aq al nvq gaq ail kev-u phao, Yeiqsul-i mail ge nail khe-ai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq al maol bhai cevpheel thailthaiq-u phao: “Nul-nq nvq gaq khul khi mail, moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq thoil maol bhai cevpheel nail-aiq” dai, ilheel juq aqyu nvq gaq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq loq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu nvq gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu nvq gaq moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq al maol bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha tseel lavq-a nail ngaol. Moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq al maol bhai aqyu juq nail aqgaq aqdoi kheq dav bhiq khi, Yeiqsul bhai bhi jeeq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul jeeq khi ail thailthaiq-u phao, aqyu juq yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi yovqgavq gailkhaol bhai kheq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq Saqloq gaoqjaoq nail gaiqthoiq bhai ail kev-u phao, yaqlaol juq iqsanl mail, aqyu juq-i mail ya moel-a nail bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail ganl juq bhaqda nee lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, Miqyail bhai mailma-ail tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail:
“Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
aqmil kov-uvq nee
lee nail Heeqphaq neq,
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq.
Nqtavq kovtavq bha
neesal-ovq nail
phaq jiav khi,
daqmoe bha jaol nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail
seiqleiq khaoqsail
ya dei-eiq” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail Phaqliqsail teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naoq nail yaqlaol juq bhai mailma-ail thaq gul dai, khaq bhiq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel: Tsaol-aq niil juq aqtsi tsu daiq jaol haq neq, lovmav niil juq gul dol lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail aqjail bhai ail kev khi, meenq bhai ya moel-u phao, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail haqbhoil nioil nioil-ail khi ge nail:

“Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq-ol, khalhai khi mail, naol neesal-ovq nail phaq ya nail ganl, yanqgaol nee mail naol heeq nia-ail nul neq, meeq deedee naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neesal-ovq nail al phaq bhai, niil aq-il naoq nail sivtavq bhai oil-uvq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, naol maq moel nia-il.
Naoq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq juq naol jaol nail teevq jaoq tavq cov khi yaoq phao yaoq-ao nee naoq bhai lovq jaoq lal nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yu naoq bhai maqkhaiq, naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai khal jaol nail naoq nail yaq juq bhai maqkhaiq, oil kivq nail phaq maq aol dai pevq ail-u kev dai, aqyu juq lav luq lav seil gil nail ngaol. Naoq nail lavqkhoel khe lovmav teevq heeq nail kovtavq bhai teevq heeq maq jiav nia-u phao kev dai, lav peiv gil nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail naoq bhai heldaiq lee-a nail yanq bhai, naol maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai khi, yalkav gaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai the ha-a nail ngaol.
“ ‘Ngaq nail ilkhaol bhai,
geeqlaoq hal nail ilkhaol dai,
ya khul naol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ilkhaol niil il bhai khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel nail ilkhaol bhi pevq lal thaq nail niil” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, yaoq n yaoq n nee uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Philma juq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu jiovq-ai thaq nail juq aivq bhai deeq heivq nail khi mail naoqjaoq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq khul maq khi nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail bhai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq nail ngaol.

Teevq n neq, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai, tsaol-aq maodai bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-u phao, Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq lal khi,
“Naol khaq bha khe alyaq ya khi niil juq nl nail-aiq. Khaq sil gaq naoq bhai alyaq bivq lavq-a nail-aiq. Nvjuq bhai ge lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq daoq naldaiq la, nuljuq ge kovq lavq dei-eiq.
Yaolhaq ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail al, Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail laiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai niailhai ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol: “Miqyail-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao ge haq neq, thailhai phal-iq neq, ‘Nuljuq khul khi mail, Yaolhaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail-aiq’ dai, Yeiqsul ge lal nail ngaol.

‘Tsaol-aq-i mail bhi nl thaq nail ngaol’ dai, ngadao ge haq neq, tsaol-aq niil juq ngadao bhai, lovmav-i mail liv heivq lal naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yaolhaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol dai, tsaol-aq al juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail: “Khaq sil gaq-i mail aivq bhai bhi nl thaq-al meeq, maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Alhai dul dai, khaq sil gaq-i mail ngaq bhai alyaq bivq lavq khi ganl niil nl thailthaiq nail bhai, nuljuq bhai ngal maq ge bhiq-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq nee mail gaoq cavq gaoq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol lao thaq nail ngaol. Teevq n neq, aivq aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiiv kha-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq gaoqkhail nl nail juq bhai ngaq bhiq-ail ceevq khi mail, yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq bha tsaq dai, jaol ail thaq nail ngaol.

Aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq mi lal khi koevq nail yanq tsaq lal-u phao, gaoqkhail al khail khe aqheeq tsilju nail aqheeq aivq bhai ovq nail juq ya dai, gaoqkhail nl nail juq jaol nail bha aqheel gaq, aivq nail yaqkav teevq gaq bhai bhi lai-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqkhail nl nail juq, yaqkav al gaq bhai deeq khi, aqnieivq-ail bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq pov yaoq yaqkav yaoq gaq yaoq bhai aqyu juq jaol nail bha gaoq bhi lai-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq yaqkav al gaq bhai iqsanl deeq khi, khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq khi, aqnieivq-ail gaoq bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaqkav hail gaq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl gaoq bhi lai-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq bhai, malkhoeq daol lal-u kev dai deeq khi, the ha bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail khe ilheel gaq ge nail: ‘Ngal khalhai khi heeq meeq. Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail yaqyov bhai bhi lai naol. Aqyu juq ngaq nail yaqyov bhai ev-ail jaol-aq’ dai, ge khi aivq nail yaqyov bhai bhi lai-a nail ngaol.

Gaoqkhail bhai ganl nl nail juq, yaqyov al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, ‘Aivq neq, jaiqbhoil ovq nail gaq ngaol. Ngadao juq aivq nail jaiqbhoil ya kivq dai, aivq bhai heivq bhel’ dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq aivq bhai gaoqkhail lavqniil phao he dol-aivq khi, heivq-a nail ngaol. Gaoqkhail nail aqheel gaq aqyu juq bhai khalhai khi bhiq nail dai, nuljuq noeq nail-aiq.

Aqheel gaq kovq lal khi, gaoqkhail nl nail al juq bhai heivq khi, gaoqkhail al yaoq gaq yaoq bhai, ngaq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq ya gaiq-a nail juq neq, “Alhai maq pevq lal-ail” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq khi ge bhiq-a nail:
“Ilkhaol cov nail
tsaol-aq-i mail
bavq ha-a nail
lovmav al heeq,
jioivqloiv daoqthaoq bhai
kaovq-a nail
lovmav heeq ma
pevq lal nail ngaol dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq khul bhai ge movq nail ngel-ail.

Lovmav al heeq nail kovtavq bhai ga tsuq ail nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, keivq-ail khoi-ail nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq khul gaq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, lovmav al heeq ga dav-ail haq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq peivq-ail leiv-ail nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq, “Ngadao juq bhai ge movq nail niil” dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq heeq nia-a nail ngel-i mail, yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq movq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai geesil nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yuldav milkhaoq bhai joiqjaq nail Phillav nail aqlavq lavqkhoel-ai Yeiqsul bhai av bhiq kivq dai, khoiq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Khoiq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, Yeiqsul daoq ge bheeq nail bhai ya gai dai, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq tavq khi ail-a nail ngaol.

Khoiq naldaiq lai-a nail tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naol neq, tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel dai, Miqyail nail gailkhaol nee daolcoev dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq naol.
Ngadao juq heeqphaq Gailsaq bhai khaon dov bhiq nail tsaq naol laiq. Maq tsaq-ail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Aqyu juq ngaq bhai bhi ge bheeq movq nail niil” dai, Yeiqsul heeq nia khi, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail:

“Ngaq bhai phul teevq bavq bhi heldaiq lavq yaoq. Khaq sil gaq nail maolkhoel, khaq sil gaq nail aqmil aol nail ngel-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-u phao: “Heeqphaq Gailsaq nail niil” dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Thailhai phal-iq neq, Gailsaq bhai tavq nail phaq neq, Gailsaq bhai bivq yaoq. Miqyail bhai tavq nail phaq neq, Miqyail bhai bivq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail sivtavq bhai, aivq-i mail ge-a nail daoq al juq nail lavqkhoel khe, aqyu juq laiq nail tsa nail phaq maq moel-al. Yeiqsul-i mail ge kovq bhiq-a nail daoq al daoq bhai, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov-ail aqtsi tsu dai, jaol-a nail ngaol.
Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq maq doevq kovq lal nia-ail dai, ge nail Saqduqgail nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi naldaiq lal-a nail ngaol.

“Saqlaq-ol, Molseiq nvjuq nail haqbhoil niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Tsaol-aq teevq gaq khaqma hevq khi, yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail sil haq neq, algao gaq nail jeq-e jaq-a maq ya peivq-ail dai, jaqbheq gaq aivq nail aqtsu bhai ya hevq nail ngaol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Jel lal-u phao, mailnail sivq gaq jaol-a nail ngaol. Aqivq ivqsaq gaq khaqma hevq khi, yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail sil-a nail ngaol.
Nvq gaq teevq gaq iqsanl hail gaq teevq gaq iqsanl, yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai hevq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, mailnail sivq gaq sivq gaq-ail yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail sil-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqmai-aq al gaq iqsanl sil-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal-u n-gaol, yaqmai-aq al gaq, khaq sil gaq nail khaqma pevq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu mailnail sivq gaq sivq gaq-ail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai hevq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Yeel niil yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, hevq pheel maol pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqhao khe yeel bhai maqkhaiq, gaoq doevq kovq lal nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, geel-nvq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, hevq pheel maol pheeljaq nail phaq maq bhao-ail.

Aqyu juq neq, teevq thal-iq maq ya sil-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel khe-ai pevq lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail yaq pevq nail ngaol.

Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, jiavbuv nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail dao bhai, Molseiq phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Miqyail bhai, ‘Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail Miqyail, Ilcav nail Miqyail, Yaqkov nail Miqyail ngaol’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, sil nail tsaol-aq nail Miqyail maq ngel-ail. Doevq nail tsaol-aq nail Miqyail ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl mail doevq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naol ge nail tsaq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq aivq bhai teevq phaq-ail maq naldaiq tseq dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yu Khali bhai Daqbhil nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, khul nail neq, khalhai khi pevq nia nail-aiq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Daqbhil ge nail:
‘Heeqphaq Miqyail
ngaq nail Heeqphaq
bhai ge bhiq-a nail:
Naoq bhai neejiav
jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai,
naoq nail aqkhil
kov-uvq bhai
ngal bhi jaol-u
n-gaol kev dai,
ngaq nail lavqmal phao
jaoldeel yaoq’ dai,
Tsiqeeq nail Haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Daqbhil Khali bhai Heeqphaq dai, khul nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, aivq khalhai khi Daqbhil nail yaqyov pevq nia nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail naldaiq nail bhai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, phailkhaoq heelma doi doi-ail tsao movq nail ngaol. Leiv lavqkhoel bhai tsao-u phao, yu aqyu juq bhai bhi ev movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai sivtavq phao jiav nail khaoqsail eeq nail doiqbev bhai jaoldeel movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, khaoqsail eeq nail jaol duq bhai, jaoldeel movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, miqtsiq miqma juq nail ilkhaol khi ildaoq maoqgaiq iqsanl mail khoeq jaq kav jaq khi, yu ya moel dai, geeqlaoq heelma ma dai hal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yu nee maqtsil yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq phul danq duq bhai phul danq danq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, haq nail aoq nail miqtsiq miqma teevq gaq, giqheel meivbhaiq nvq bhaiq oil bhoel nail bhai iqsanl ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Haq nail aoq nail miqtsiq miqma niil gaq, aqyu juq iqsanl nee mail maqtsil danq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq neq, maodai jiav nail lavqkhoel nee oil dov khi danq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqmai-aq niil gaq neq, mao-ail haq nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq aqdoevq doevq nail haqbhoil khal jiav nail iqsanl mail oil dov khi danq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel khe meeq deedee nail lovmav khi Miqyail bhai khalhai laol bhiq nail ganl juq bhai, tsiqphoiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail:

“Niil aq-il nuljuq-i mail ya moel nail niil juq bhai peiv-ail leiv-ail nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, lovmav teevq heeq nail kovtavq bhai teevq heeq maq jiav nia-u kev dai, peiv-ail leiv-ail gil naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Saqlaq-ol, al juq khaq mao pevq lal nail-aiq. Al juq pevq lal-u phao, nvjuq khalhai khi ya heeq kivq nail-aiq” dai, tsaol-aq al juq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yu nuljuq bhai maq ya hevq bheel-aivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq maodai ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail khi, ‘Ngal neq, Khali ngaol. Aqyanq kev lee-aoq nail ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq nail haoqnaol thaq tsaothel-aivq.

Genl dev nail aqthel khi milkhaoq suqsaq nail ganl juq bhai nuljuq ya gaiq-u phao, geesil nail neema thaq aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, al juq iqmoeq ya pevq lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pov taivq-ail daoq loi loi lai nail yanq maq kev lal haq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee pultavq, Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Jeq-e teevq jeq-e khi mail teevq jeq-e, milkhaoq teevq khaoq khi mail teevq khaoq genl dev pheeljaq nail ngaol.

Milluv luv deedee lal nail ngaol. Teevq dao khai-aq teevq dao moevq nail sivq nail phaq khi aqjao jao ma nal nail nalgoel aqkav phaq kev lee nail ngaol. Nqtavq nee mail geesil deedee lal nail phaq khi mail, eeq deedee nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq dov lee nail ngaol.

Niil juq iqsanl mail maq pevq lal-u phao, yu nuljuq bhai nieivq khi khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail ngaol. Yu nuljuq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai maqkhaiq, thaonq bhai maqkhaiq, av bhiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq nail aqmil bhaqda nee, uvthaiq nail juq khi mail heeqphaq juq nail sivtavq bhai, yu nuljuq bhai hel-aivq lavq nail ngaol.
Alhai nl lavq-u phao, nuljuq ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq kivq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, khalhai ya ge kovq bhiq nail dai, aqyanq maq kev lal-u nee mail ngal maq saol-nvq-ail dai, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq noeqceiv-ai thaq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail juq maq ge gaq nia nail daoq khi neenoeq neekha, ngal nuljuq bhai bivq naol.
Nuljuq nail aqbhu aqma, aqivq jaqbheq, jeq-e jaq-a khi mail aqtsaoq juq, nuljuq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nuljuq teevq pav ganav juq bhai deeq heivq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aqmil bhaqda nee tsaol-aq iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav lal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq neq, nuljuq nail tsailkheel teevq deeq iqsanl maq ya ga-ail.
Nuljuq neema ivq haq neq, nuljuq doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha genl dev nail munl munl ma lovq jaoq-ai thaq nail bhai nuljuq ya moel-u phao, meenq al meenq luq-ail seil-ail nail yanq kev lee aoq thaq nail nial dai, heeq kivq yaoq.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, daoltavq bha tsaoq dal laivq yaoq. Meenq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq dov ail yaoq. Meenq lavqniil phao jaol nail tsaol-aq, meenq lavqkhoel bhai thaq aol lai.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail iqsanl mail bhee lal dai, aqyanq al neq, Miqyail nl kovq bhiq nail aqyanq ngaol.

Aqn aqyanq al kev lee-u phao, aqhaq aqmaol liq nail juq khi, aqtsil cuvq yaq jaol nail aqma juq ya noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, noeqhaq deedee nail phaq milkhaoq niil khaoq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee khi, neema phail nail phaq Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, thaoma-i mail heivq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Yu aqyu juq bhai pheel-aivq khi, yu nail milkhaoq bha yaqkav ya jiovq-ail nail ngaol. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq, aqyu juq nail aqyanq kev lee-u phao kev dai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ya naoqthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Aq-u phao, nlma, bhala khi aqgil nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq dov lee nail ngaol. Iqyaq iqma khi ulcuvq eelkhaol juq aqthel meel deedee-i mail, miltsaq kovtavq khe jeq-e jaq-a juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol.

Miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, kev lee thel lee thailthaiq nail ganl al juq bhai saol-nvq daiq-u phao, geesil deedee nail ngel-i mail, mavq lai-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nqtavq khe bhaqaoq juq luv luv dai, dao lal nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, eeq deedee nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi bhaqaoq nail lavqkhoel nee nqdil jeeq khi yavq kha lee nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel nail ngaol.
Niil juq iqmoeq ilmoeq pevq lal-u phao, uqhuq bavq dil khi heldaiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq bhai hevqkovq lee nail aqyanq aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daoqma uqhuq daoq nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail: “Heeqguq aqbhaol khi aqbhaol iqsanl bhai heldaiq yaoq.
Bhoenaiq naiq lal haq neq, jaolla yanq dov lee-aiq nial dai, nuljuq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq heldaiq khi heeq nia nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal nail bhai ya moel-u phao, Miqyail Milkhaoq kev lee-aoq thaq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq-ai thaq yaoq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yeel niil yeel maq gil-u nee mail, al juq iqsanl mail pevq lal nail ngaol.
Nqtavq khi miltsaq peivq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail daoq neq, maq peivq-ail dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaoq. Maq yaolphaol haq neq, aljaiq jaq jel khi, jilpheeq daol bov khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao khaoqlaol nail phaq bhaqda nee, nuljuq nail neema noeqdee noeqdeel khi jaol-u phao, bavgavq bhai phee lai nail khe-ai aqn aqyanq al, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai thaiqphuq dai, kev lee nail ngaol. Aqn al n neq, miltsaq kovtavq khe khal jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, kev lee thailthaiq nail al juq iqsanl bhai nuljuq ya jel-ail khi, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol kivq dai, khaq mao iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal hal-ail aqgeel geel dai jaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, yaoq n yaoq n nee n-gaol phao uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Nqkiv phao neq, Saqloq gaoqjaoq bha yavq lai nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Yeiqsul-i mail cavq nail cov nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail dai khi, nqhao navqmav-ail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq jaol nail bha jil lal nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq dai khul nail, deqtsiq maq goe dai, khaqmul lav sav nail bhaoqaiq aqjail jail lal-a nail ngaol.

Philma juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq neq, khalhai khi mail, Yeiqsul bhai aqtsi tsu dai deeq heivq heeq meeq dai, naoqjaoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq bhai geesil nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail, Ilsaqgaqliqoq dai khul nail Yuldav al gaq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai, neivq Saqdaq aol lai-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav dov ail khi, Philma juq khi mail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai heldaiq nail aqivq juq jaol nail bha lai khi mail, “Ngal Yeiqsul bhai nuljuq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai khalhai khi ya av bhiq heeq” dai, aqyu juq jaol nail bha ge tsaoq pheeljaq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal bhiq khi mail, “Naoq bhai phul bivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yuldav iqsanl neema tsaq khi, tsaol-aq munl munl ma maq jaol-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail, khaq mao eivq lal-ail meeq dai, halpov-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail haqbhoil yaol aqyaq ya heivq nail aqn pevq nail, deqtsiq maq goe dai, khaqmul lav sav nail aqn kev lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq bhai khul khi, “Ngadao juq Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq kivq dai, ngadao juq nail haqbhoil lav sav thaq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Khul dao bhai bhi lav sav thaq-ail movq nail-aiq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq meenq bhai ail kev-u phao, meldel bavq-nvq thaq nail yaqyov-aq teevq gaq bhai ya thaoqphuq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq khi, aivq-i mail aol ail nail ilkhaol bhai aol ail yaoq.

Al khai-aq neq, ilheel gaq bhai niailhai ge bhiq yaoq: ‘Saqlaq ge nail: ngal ngaq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq kivq dai, daq-i naq duq, khaq bha jiav nail geiq’ dai, naldaiq ail dei-eiq.

Aq-u phao, pultavq teiv-nvq bhai jiav nail lav sav-ai thaq nail daq-i naq duq teevq dao aivq nul-nq nvq gaq bhai hevqdaiq lavq nail ngaol. A bhai lav sav thaq ail yaoq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq khi khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq ail-u phao, Yeiqsul-i mail ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai ya moel khi, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq nail haqbhoil lav sav ail-a nail ngaol.
Bhaqsaqkhaq jaq nail yanq kev lal-u phao, Yeiqsul kovqkhail bhai jaoljaoq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail gaqkhoel juq iqsanl, aivq nee mail jaoljaoq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal haq dee aoq deedee phaq bhai maq ya daq-u nee mail, nuljuq nee teevq gaq khe-ai, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq niil, jaq movq deedee-ail nial.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhaoqaiq niil nail daoqceevq maq bhee lal-u kev dai, bhaoqaiq niilniai ngal maq jaq yaoq-aol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq khaoqanq tsiq khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq gaq khi mail ge nail: “Khaoqanq niil tsiq khi teevq gaq micil micil dai, daol yaoq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Miqyail Milkhaoq maq kev lee-u kev dai, ngal aqheeq tsilju nail ullul maq daol yaoq-aol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq khaqmul oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al ngaoqpav khi, yaqlaol juq bhai tsiq bhiq khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Niil neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil laol bhiq-a nail, ngaq nail aqmaol ngaol. Ngaq bhai ya noeq kev dai niailhai nl yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, aoq kivq jaq gaq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail khaoqanq tsiq khi ge nail: “Khaoqanq niil neq, daoqma saljial aqsivq bhai tavq nail, ngaq nail aqsivq ngaol. Aqsivq niil, nuljuq nail haqbhoil bhi il lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bivq nail al gaq ngaq-ai nee mail kovqkhail teevq khail bhai taivq-ail jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, Miqyail-i mail aivq nail ganl noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ya sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqlaol al juq: “Ngadao juq nail lavqkhoel khe, khaq sil gaq Yeiqsul bhai, yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail meeq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, “Ngadao juq nail lavqkhoel, khul gaq yu nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail-aiq” dai, yaqlaol juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao Yeiqsul ge nail: “Miltsaq kovtavq khe heeqphaq heeq ma juq neq, miltsaq yaq bhai uvthaiq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq neq, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai bhaqaoq jiav nail juq bhai, geeqlaoq nl lavq-a nail juq dai, khul nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq alhai thaq khi. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel, yu nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq, yu nee maqtsil nil nail gaq khe-ai jaol yaoq. Aqivq jiovq nail gaq iqsanl, yaqkav khe-ai jaol yaoq.

Khul gaq eeq jaiq nail-aiq, jaoldeel khi jaq thailthaiq nail gaq laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, aoqbhaol lav sav bhiq nail gaq laiq. Jaoldeel khi jaq thailthaiq nail gaq, eeq jaiq nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, nuljuq bhai aoqbhaol lav sav bhiq nail gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Ngal jalmul mul nail bhai ya daq-u phao, nuljuq neq, khaq mao iqsanl ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqbhu, ngaq bhai heeqphaq bhi jiovq lavq khi bhi uvthaiq lavq-a nail khe-ai dul dai, nuljuq ngaq nail Milkhaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi jaq nail daol nail bhai maqkhaiq, doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel khi, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e tsel-nvq jeq-e bhai yalkhaq dal dai maqkhaiq, ngal nuljuq bhai alyaq bivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Silmoq-ol, Silmoq-ol, gov bhai pheeqjaiq-i mail aoq nail khe-ai, neivq Saqdaq nuljuq bhai aoq nail dai, khi hal ya-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol neema thaqtsaol nail phaq maq ya cov-ail dai, ngal naoq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol. Naol noeq pov khi kovq lal-u phao, naoq nail aqtsaoq yaqlaol juq bhai gaq bivq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao Silmoq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, thaonq bhai maqkhaiq, sil nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal naoq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ail nail dai khi ngal lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Bheiqtuvluv-ol, ngal naoq bhai ge lavq bhel. Yanq-nl kiv yavphoil maq doil lal nail lavqkhoel, naol ngaq bhai, maq heeq kivq-ail dai, hail pov kev dai, jil naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai khoel gai-aivq-u phao, phul baivluvq, phalthaoq khi mail saiqnaov thaq oil-aivq dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nuljuq teevq phaq ganav loq nail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq-u phao, “Teevq phaq-ail maq loq-ail” dai, aqyu juq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil thal khe pov neq, phul baivluvq jiav nail tsaol-aq juq, oil-aivq yaoq. Phalthaoq jiav nail tsaol-aq, hal-aivq yaoq. Thaoma maq jiav nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi gaoq khi, thaoma ul ail yaoq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. ‘Aivq bhai haqeiv nail tsaol-aq nee mail yu saol-nvq bhoel naol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail Jalliq daoq al daoq, ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai ya bhee lal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail juq ya bhee lal nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, niilniai thaoma nvq keiv jiav-ail nial” dai, ge bhiq-u phao: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, gaq-ao nial” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul meenq nee dov ail khi, aivq aol jiav nail khe-ai, Saqloq gaoqjaoq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq iqsanl aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel laivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul a bhai lai kev-u phao, “Nuljuq jalmul mul nail haoqnao maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai, geeqlaoq hal hal-ail jaol yaoq” dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq jaol nail nee lovmav teevq liv livkheel kivq dai, ail eq khi, peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi mail, geeqlaoq hal ail-a nail ngaol.

“Aqbhu-ol, naol neema tsaq haq neq, haq dee aoq deedee nail niil nee, ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neema tsaq nail khe-ai, thaq bhi pevq. Naol neema tsaq nail khe-ai, bhi pevq yaoq” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq nqtavq nee mail dov lee khi, Yeiqsul bhai gaq bivq lee-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai haq aoq nl deedee nail ngel-i mail, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail khiqtsal aqsivq sivq phai khe-ai, pevq-ail khi, miltsaq bhai jiav kha nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai geeqlaoq hal gaq khi, thul khi mail yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha kovq lal-u phao, aqyu juq noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee iqthaiq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
“Khul khi mail nuljuq iqthaiq nail-aiq. Thul yaoq. Jalmul mul nail haoqnao maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai, geeqlaoq hal hal-ail jaol yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail Yuldav dai khul nail al gaq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma hevq khi lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq Yeiqsul bhai moeqsaol saol nail dai khi, Yeiqsul nail aqjail bhai jiiv lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Yuldav-ol, naol moeqsaol saol nail khe-ai tavq khi, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nee mail jaol nail juq neq, khalhai pevq lal nail ganl heeq nia khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq thaoma-i mail ya tsil nail laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq, Philma nail yaqkav bhai tsil gai-aivq khi, lavqmal phao khe naqkov ceiv ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Gaq-ao naol! Thaq gaoq nl” dai, ge khi, yaqkav al gaq nail naqkov bhai thoiqtsi khi mail lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aivq jaol nail bha lee kev-ai thaq nail Philma juq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai heldaiq nail aqivq juq khi mail, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq tsaolpheel bhai nieivq nail khe-ai, thaoma khi mail doiqthoi bavq khi, ngaq bhai nieivq lee-a nail laiq.

Ngal yaoq n yaoq n nee mail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai nuljuq nee mail jaol khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq nieivq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yanq niil yanq neq, nuljuq nail yanq ngaol. Niil aq-il neq, aqnav nail bhaqaoq uvthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq khi, Philma nail ilkhaol bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Bheiqtuvluv neq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao al jaiq-ail maq eq nail bhai tsaothe jaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Ilkhaol nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq miqjaq sivtovq khi teevq dao bhai taivq-ail jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai, Bheiqtuvluv iqsanl aqyu juq nee mail jaoldeel lai-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv miqjaq aqbhaq bhaq nail bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai, yaqkav jiovq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq ya moel khi, aivq bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq khi mail: “Thoil gaq iqsanl, Yeiqsul nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.
“Yaqmiq-ol, naoq-i mail ge nail gaq bhai, ngal maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv jil-a nail ngaol.

Teevq yanq gaoq khi-al ngal-aq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq Bheiqtuvluv bhai moel khi, “Naol iqsanl, aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai aol nail teevq gaq nial” dai, ge bhiq-u phao, “Aqtsaoq-ol, ngal maq ngel-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Naqli teevq lavq niidai bhee lal-u phao, “Thoil gaq iqsanl, maldil dai, Yeiqsul nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nail aqthel, Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq nail aqthel niil” dai, yaoq gaq yaoq mailma-ail ge nail ngaol.
“Yaqyov-ol, naol ge nail daoq bhai ngal maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail yavphoil doil lal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Bheiqtuvluv bhai haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq-a nail ngaol. “Yanq-nl kiv yavphoil maq doil lal nail lavqkhoel, naol ngaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai, hail pov kev dai jil naol” dai, Yeiqsul-i mail ge bhiq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai, Bheiqtuvluv noeq dov lal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq dov ail khi nioil deedee-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul bhai lovq nail tsaol-aq al juq, aivq bhai meelnaq meelnaq-ail, deeq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq, aivq bhai maivpheeq pheeq khi, “Naoq bhai khaq sil gaq deeq nail-aiq dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq khe-ai, nvjuq bhai ge daiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai khal ge movq-ail mee nia phaq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u phao, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu jiovq-ai thaq nail juq khi, Philma juq khi mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq maoqbhaoq nl nail khi, jil lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, yu Yeiqsul bhai aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol Khali phal-iq neq, nvjuq bhai ge lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.
Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq phaq ganav gaoq naldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq ge kovq lavq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, yaqhao bhaqaoq aol nail Miqyail nail lavqmal phao ya jaoldeel nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, “Naol Miqyail nail Yaqyov laiq” dai, aqyu juq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Nuljuq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, ngal pevq naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail: “Ngadao juq khul nail salkhil gaoq loq nail-aiq. Ngadao juq aivq ge nail daoq ya gaiq-ao nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, jil lal-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail tsaoq thul lal khi, Yeiqsul bhai heeqphaq Phillav jaol nail bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq, Yeiqsul nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq thaq-ail khi ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, nvjuq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai gailkhaol hevq bheel-aivq khi, heeqphaq Gailsaq bhai khaon thaq dov bhiq dai, lav tsoiq nail ngaol. A bhai nee pultavq, ‘Ngal neq, Khali dai khul nail heeqphaq ngaol’ dai, iqsanl aivq ge nail bhai nvjuq ya gaiq, ya moel-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.
“Naol Yuldav tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq ngaol laiq” dai, Phillav Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Naol ge nail khe-ai, ngel naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal aivq nail lavqkhoel khe laiq nail tsa nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq moel-al” dai, Phillav Philma juq khi tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil, gaoq laijai lal khi gul nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq nee mail niai kev dai, Yuldav milkhaoq doi dai cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, milkhaoq yaq juq suqsaq lal dai, gaq bivq nail ngaol” dai, gul bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Gaqliqlail dai, ge nail daoq al daoq bhai, Phillav ya gaiq-u phao, “Aivq Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, heeqphaq Heiqlol uvthaiq nail milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Phillav heeq nia-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai Heiqlol jaol nail bha bhi hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Heiqlol neq, yanq al nail lavqkhoel bhai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail ngaol.

Heiqlol Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul nail ganl aivq ya gaiq daiq khi, Yeiqsul-i mail nl nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail teevq phaq ganav nl daiq lavq nail bhai, moel movq nail, maoq lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq Yeiqsul bhai mee nia phaq naldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, aivq bhai daoq teevq daoq iqsanl maq ge kovq bhiq-al.
Philma juq khi aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq a bhai thulphaol khi, Yeiqsul nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq deedee nail ngaol.

Heiqlol neq, aivq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Yeiqsul bhai khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq khi, meeq deedee nail heeqphaq nail aqgaq aqdoi aqnel bhi doi khi mail, meelnaq meelnaq-ail helsil nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Phillav jaol nail bha bhi hevq kol laivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol neq, heeqphaq Heiqlol khi heeqphaq Phillav teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqtsaoq tsaoq nail ngaol. Jel lal-u phao neq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq neejiav jiav lao thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Phillav-i mail Philma juq, aqivq jiovq nail juq khi mail, milkhaoq yaq juq bhai khul jil-a nail ngaol.

Phillav aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, milkhaoq yaq bhai hevq bheeq nail gaq ngaol dai, nuljuq ge khi mail, ngal jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai ngal aivq bhai naldaiq-u phao, nuljuq-i mail aivq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail khe-ai, ngal oeqbal teevq phaq iqsanl maq moel-al.

Heiqlol iqsanl, aivq nail lavqkhoel khe laiq nail tsa nail phaq maq halpov moel nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal jaol nail bha bhi hevq kol lavq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq sil heeq phaq-ail nl laiq thaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal aivq bhai deeq khi phaiq bhiq naol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
[Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee, Phillav aqyu juq nail haqbhoil tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai ya phaiq bhiq nail ngaol.]
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl mul lao-ail gul nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai tavq heivq yaoq! Nvjuq nail haqbhoil Bhaqlaqbhal bhai phaiq yaoq” dai, teevq gaq khe-ai mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.
Bhaqlaqbhal neq, meenq lavqkhoel milkhaoq yaq juq suqsaq lal dai nl nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq bhai heivq-a nail ngel-i mail, thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Phillav Yeiqsul bhai phaiq bhiq movq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al juq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq gaoq gul nail: “Aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq. Tavq heivq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq mailma-ail gaoq gul nail ngaol.

Phillav hail pov teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail, bhi tavq heivq movq nail-aiq. Aivq haqeiv nail phaq khul nl-a nail-aiq. Ngal aivq nail lavqkhoel khe sil heeq phaq-ail laiq nail tsa nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq moel-al. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal aivq bhai deeq khi phaiq bhiq naol” dai, aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul bhai, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq dai, aqyu juq mailma-ail gul thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq jaol nail phao, gaq lai-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq-i mail gul nail khe-ai, dalceiv bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Milkhaoq bhai suqsaq lal dai nl khi, tsaol-aq bhai heivq-a nail ngel-i mail, thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail Bhaqlaqbhal bhai, aqyu juq-i mail hal nail khe-ai phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul bhai neq, aqyu juq-i mail khal nl movq nail khe-ai nl dai, aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail tsaol-aq juq, Yeiqsul bhai hel-aivq-u phao, Khulleiqniq meenq bhai jaol nail Silmoq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq, yalgaol bha lai khi kovq lal nail bhai nieivq thaiq khi, Yeiqsul nail lavqyavq bhi bavq khi mail Yeiqsul nail haoqnao bhi tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq munl, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil noeqhaq khi, nioilkhaoq khaoq nail yaqmai-aq teevq juq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai haoqnaol naolkovq kovq khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail yaqmai-aq juq-ol, ngal bhaqda nee thaq nioil. Nuljuq yovqgavq nail haqbhoil khi yovqgavq nail yaq nail haqbhoil nioil yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ‘Maq bhao aqma juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ovqtavq, yaqbeiv maq uvq daiq-a nail yaqmai-aq khi yaq bhai aqtsil maq bhiq cuvq daiq-a nail yaqmai-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq naol’ dai, ya ge nail aqn aqyanq kev lee nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq gaoqjaoq juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq nail ngaol. ‘Nvjuq bhai doeqkhaiq lee yaoq.’ Gaoqjaoq jaoq yaq juq bhai iqsanl, ‘Nvjuq bhai phalthaiq lavq yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq aqbhaol aqjiq bhai niidai phaq-ail nl bhiq haq neq, aqbhaol aqgee bhai neq, khadai gaoq nl bhiq nail ngel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai tavq heivq nail dai khi mail, haqeiv nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq bhai iqsanl, hevq dol-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Uqcov dai khul nail gaoqjaoq bhai lai kev-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-a nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq al nvq gaq bhai iqsanl, aivq nail lavqmal phao teevq gaq, lavqtsel phao teevq gaq dai, tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aqbhu-ol, aqyu juq nail oeqbal phaiq bhiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq khalhai nl thailthaiq nail dai, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, genl dev nail juq neq, Yeiqsul nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai khul gaq khul keiv ya dai, eellaoq bheq khi bhoilpav khi oil-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq maodai a bhai thulphaol khi heldaiq-u phao, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq Yeiqsul bhai meelnaq meelnaq-ail khi ge nail: “Aivq neq, yu bhai hevqkovq kivq naol geiq. Aivq neq, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail Khali dai, khul nail gaq ngel haq neq, aivq nail aqmaol bhai aivq bhi hevqkovq daiq yaoq” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail juq iqsanl aivq nail aqjail bhai lal khi, aqtsel mao-ail tsel nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aivq bhai bhi daol bhi daol-ail khi ge nail: “Naol Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq ngel haq neq, naoq nail aqmaol bhai naol bhi jel-ail yaoq” dai, meelnaq meelnaq-ail khi ge nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq ngaol” dai, gevq khi, Yeiqsul nail uqhuq pultavq phao tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq nee mail bhi tavq heivq-a nail tsaol-aq al nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ge nail: “Naol Khali maq ngel laiq. Naoq nail aqmaol bhai bhi jel-ail khi, nv-nvq gaq bhai iqsanl bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai khal ge movq-ail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvq gaq teevq gaq aivq nail aqtsaoq bhai khaq khaq-ail khi ge nail: “Naol aivq khe-ai dalceiv-ai thaq nail bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai maq geesil lal-ail laiq.

Ngadao nvq gaq niailhai ya daq nail neq, tsaq naol. Ngadao nvq gaq nl laiq-a nail ngel-i mail, daq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngel-i mail ya daq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl laiq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq ge nail: “Yeiqsul-ol, naol heeqphaq joiqjaq lee-u phao, ngaq bhai thaq nioilpeivq lavq dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yanqgaol naol ngaq-ai nee mail Bhaqlaqdilsuv dai khul nail gaoqkhail
Aqyanq al neq, n-gaol laolma nee mail, kivq hail lail ma naqli hail lavq bha kev dai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai navtsee dai pevq-ail khi, nlma nail aqbhaq iqsanl maq bhaq-ail.
Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel khe thao pav-ai thaq nail haqphal phal ma iqsanl, gaoltsi nee mail nvq pav pav ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul mailma-ail gul khi ge nail: “Aqbhu-ol, ngaq nail aqhaqlal naoq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq naol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ge gaq khi, aqhaq ceiv-a nail ngaol.

Alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai, genl dev nail teevq yal gaq nail aqivq teevq gaq ya moel-u phao, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, maldil tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngel lao thaq nial” dai, ge khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
A bhai heldaiq lal-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai, ya moel-u phao, noeqhaq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee, neema bhai deeq deeq-ail khi, kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqtsaoq juq khi mail Gaqliqlail milkhaoq nee mail aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq-a nail yaqmai-aq juq neq, al jaiq-ail maq eq nail bhai thulphaol khi, pevq lal thailthaiq nail ganl al juq bhai heldaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Aqlilmaqthaiq meenq bhai jaol nail, Yaolsai dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, meeq nail jaq nail tsaq nail daol nail teevq gaq ngaol. Aivq iqsanl, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai noeqthunq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl lavqkhoel bhai aol khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail maoqbhaoq nl khi ge ceiv-a nail ganl bhai neema maq tsaq-ail.
Aivq Phillav jaol nail bha Yeiqsul nail aqmaol hal lai-a nail ngaol.

Aivq Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai lavqyavq kovtavq nee bavq kha khi, haqphal-i mail maoltoev toev-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq bavq bhoel daiq-a nail, lovmav-i mail tavq-ai thaq nail luqdaol nail lavqkhoel bhai bavq duq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol neq, jaol n n-gaol nail haqbhoil lainq nail aqn pevq khi, jaol n kev lal-aiq nail ngaol.

Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bha nee mail, Yeiqsul nee mail lal-a nail yaqmai-aq al juq neq, luqdaol bhai maqkhaiq, aivq bhai bavq duq ail-a nail dao bhai maqkhaiq, tsaothel-aivq khi, heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq kovq lai khi, huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel juq khi huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq jaol n n-gaol gaqnaq naq-a nail ngaol.
Jaol n jel-ail khi teevq n n-gaol, nqbhaq bhaq lal thao, yaqmai-aq al juq aqyu juq-i mail lainq-ai thaq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq oil khi, luqdaol bha lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq a bhai lai kev-u phao, luqdaol govkhoiq bhai ngaoq tsoiq-ai thaq nail lovmav al heeq, ngaoq ha-ai thaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq luqdaol nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-u phao, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai maq moel-al.

Aqyu juq ganl al bhai noeq-u maq dov dai jaol-u phao, nljeel coev lal nail aqgaq aqdoi doi-nq thaq nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq thaiqphuq dai dov lee khi, aqyu juq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol lee-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqmai-aq al juq geesil deedee-ail khi, miltsaq bhai gaolbeiv-u phao, tsaol-aq al nvq gaq ge nail: “Khul khi mail, nuljuq doevq nail tsaol-aq bhai, sil nail tsaol-aq bavq thaq duq bhai heldaiq lee-a nail-aiq.
Aivq niilniai maq jaol yaoq-aol. Aivq doevq kovq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, nuljuq bhai ge lavq-a nail daoq al daoq bhai thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq.

Aivq niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, oeqbal yaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail bhai ya daq naol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai, yu aivq bhai tavq heivq khi, hail n bhee lal haq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal naol’ dai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai noeq dov lal bhiq thaq nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq luqdaol nee kovq lee khi, gaqkhoel tsel teevq gaq bhai khi yaqlaol yaoq juq yaoq bhai iqsanl pevq lal-a nail ganl al juq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Gaqkhoel juq bhai pevq lal-a nail ganl ge bhiq-a nail yaqmai-aq al juq neq, Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil, Yaolhaqna, Yaqkov nail aqma Maqlil khi mail yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl aol nail ngaol.
Gaqkhoel juq neq, yaqmai-aq juq-i mail ge nail daoq neq, “Teevq phaq-ail aqduq aqyal maq bhao nail daoq ngaol” dai, noeq khi aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bheiqtuvluv thul khi, luqdaol bha tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq tsaoq kel-aivq khi, luqdaol bhai heldaiq ail-u phao, maoltoev bhai taivq-ail ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq noeq-u maq dov dai, ilkhaol bha kovq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol, yaqlaol nvq gaq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail naqli hail lavq eq nail bha jiav nail Eilmaov dai, khul nail julgu bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, pevq lal-a nail ganl al iqsanl mail, aqyu nvq gaq ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq nail aqjail bha lal khi, aqyu nvq gaq nee mail ail-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu nvq gaq nail maivneev bhai doeqkhaiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul niidai, maq heldaiq heeq nia-al.
Aq-u phao Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq khul nail ganl ge ge-ail, ail nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq maivphaoq niaq laq khel dai, pevq-ail khi, naq lai-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel nee Gaqlaolphal dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq ge nail: “Niil aq-il mee nia n bhai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai pevq lal-a nail ganl juq maq heeq nia nail daq-i, naol teevq gaq teevq-eel nial” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Khul nail ganl pevq lal-a nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai naldaiq bhiq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq ge nail: “Naqsaqlail meenq khe Yeiqsul nail ganl ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aivq ge nail thail nail, nl nail hal nail lavqkhoel, bhaqaoq eeq nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol.
Philma juq khi mail, ngadao nail aqivq aqtsu juq, aivq ya sil dai, yalkhaq dal yaoq dai, ge khi, yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai bhi tavq heivq-a nail ngaol

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai ul kovq nail gaq ngaol dai, nvjuq noeqthunq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, ganl niil juq pevq lal-a nail neq, yanqgaol hail n bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail yaqmai-aq teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl, noeq-u maq dov nail ganl, nvjuq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol. Yanq-nl hao navqmav-ail aqyu juq luqdaol bhai ail thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai maq moel-a geiq. Aq-u phao, aqyu juq kovq lal khi, ‘Nvjuq nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai ya moel khi, Yeiqsul doevq nail ngaol dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel nvjuq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol’ dai, yaqmai-aq al juq ge nail ngaol.

Nvjuq nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl, luqdaol bhai heldaiq lai-u phao, yaqmai-aq al juq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, ya moel khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai maq moel-a geiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Neema gaol khi neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail iqsanl bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail laiq.
Khali alhai ya daq gaq khi, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail nail lavqkhoel bhai ya aol lai nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nail ganl khal gevq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Molseiq-i mail gevq-a nail haoqgavq nee mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq bhai kev dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq julgu aqjail bhai lai kev-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, julgu al gu bhai maq aol lai nail khe-ai khi, iqmoeq phao ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq ge nail: “Niilniai yavq yaoq. Nlma ga bhoel-aiq nial. Nqkivq iqsanl kivq lee-aiq nial” dai, ge ge-ail, aivq bhai hal deedee-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq gaq nail ilkhaol bhai yavq nail khi aol lai-a nail ngaol.

Aivq aqyu nvq gaq nee mail aoq jaq nail dai khi, jaoljaoq-u phao, aivq khaqmul oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul al ngaoqpav khi, aqyu nvq gaq bhai bhiq jaq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq nail maivneev bhai doeqkhaiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai dul nail al phao lal khi, Yeiqsul niil dai, heeq nia lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq nail sivtavq nee mail peivq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail: “Gailphail lail ma bhai ngadao nvq gaq kovq lee thailthaiq-u phao, ngadao nvq gaq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lal khi, Jalliq nail daoqceevq phaodaiq lavq-u phao, neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai aol lal khi lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal-a naol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq teevq pov nee tsaoqthul khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha gaoq lai-a nail ngaol. A bhai lai kev-u phao, gaqkhoel tsel teevq gaq khi mail aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail juq, teevq dao bhai taivq-ail jil lai khi jaol nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Heeqphaq Yeiqsul maldil doevq kovq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqmaol Silmoq bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq iqsanl, gailphail lail ma bhai pevq lal-a nail ganl maqkhaiq, khaqmul ngaoq pav-u phao, Yeiqsul niil dai, heeq kivq lal-a nail ganl maqkhaiq, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai ge thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai thulphaol lee khi, “Nuljuq neesal-ovq dei-eiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq teevq phaq ganav nail aqheel meeq dai, noeq nail ngel-i mail, geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Khul khi mail, nuljuq nail neema suqsaq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail, neema lavqkhoel bhai pov pov lav lav dai, pevq nail-aiq.

Maldil ngal ngaol. Ngaq nail aqkhil aqlavq bhai heldaiq yaoq. Ngaq bhai thoiqdaiq heivdaiq lal yaoq. Ngal neq, nuljuq moel nail khe-ai, aqmaol bhao nail ngaol. Aqheel neq, aqmaol maq bhao-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge gaq khi, aivq nail aqkhil aqlavq bhai bhi heldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov dai pevq ail khi, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngel-i mail, neema maq thaqtsaol-ai haq-al. Aq-u phao, “Nuljuq jaq nail teevq phaq ganav jiav naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq-i mail poiv-ai thaq nail delgil teevq pav Yeiqsul bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao Yeiqsul oil khi, aqyu juq nail sivtavq nee jaq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Tsiqeeq nail Haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail iqsanl mail, ya bhee lal naol dai, ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Jalliq nail daoqceevq bhai heeq nia lal dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail neema bhai bhi noeq dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Khali neq, haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ya sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n bhee lal haq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

Oeqbal noeq pov yaoq, oeqbal noeq pov nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail oeqbal al phaiq lavq nail ganl, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai aivq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee ya cavq bhiq nail ngaol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, niil juq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Ngaq nail Aqbhu-i mail bivq naol dai, saljial jaq-ai thaq nail al gaq, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq naol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nqtavq kovtavq khe bhaqaoq al maq ya-u kev dai, meenq niil meenq bhai daonq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai Bheiqtaqnil nail julgu aqjail bha hevq kel-aivq khi mail, aivq aqlavq bavq dil khi, aqyu juq bhai geeqlaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai geeqlaoq bivq thailthaiq-u phao, aivq aqyu juq nee pav-ail khi, nqtavq kovtavq bha bhi tsiqdal laivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq, Yeiqsul bhai uqhuq thaoq khi mail, lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq khaq mao iqsanl uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai jaol khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq-u nee Daoq jiav nail ngaol. Daoq al neq, Miqyail nee mail jaol khi Daoq al neq, Miqyail ngaol.
Daoq al neq, iqmoeq-u nee Miqyail nee mail jaol nail ngaol.
Khal jaol, khal jiav nail iqsanl, aivq-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khal teivq-ai thaq nail juq nail lavqkhoel, aivq-i mail maq teivq-ai thaq nail teevq phaq-ail, maq jiav-ail.
Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail phaq aol nail ngaol. Doevq nail al neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail aqbhaq ngaol.
Aqbhaq al neq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai bhaq nail ngaol. Aqnav neq, aqbhaq al bhai maq gaq lai nia-ail.
Miqyail-i mail bhi lee-a nail Yaolhaq dai, mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, aqbhaq al nail ganl salkhil khanq lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, aqbhaq al bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, aivq salkhil khanq lee-a nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, aqbhaq al maq ngel-ail. Aqbhaq al nail ganl salkhil khanq lee-a nail teevq-eel ngaol.
Maldil pevq nail aqbhaq al neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai lee khi, tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl bhai bhaq bhiq lee nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaol. Miltsaq niil aivq-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq yaq juq aivq bhai maq heeq nia-ail.
Aivq nail jaol duq bhai, aivq lee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a juq aivq bhai maq hav-al.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai khal hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq, aivq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal nail aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal-a nail neq, jeq-e jaq-a bhaqda nee maq ngel-ail. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neekhaol bhaqda nee iqsanl, maq ngel-ail. Yaqyov-aq nail neenoeq neekhaol bhaqda nee iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Miqyail bhaqda nee aqyu juq Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al neq, tsaol-aq pevq lee khi, ngadao nee mail jaol lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai nvjuq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Seiqleiq khaoqsail al neq, Aqbhu Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail Yaqyov teevq gaq teevq-eel nail seiqleiq khaoqsail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq neq, geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail saljial ivq nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Yaolhaq aivq nail ganl salkhil khanq khi niailhai gul nail ngaol: “Ngaq nail haoqnao lee nail gaq neq, ngaq-ai nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal maq doevq lee-u nee mail, aivq doevq nail ngaol dai, ngaq-i mail ge nail al gaq neq, aivq ngaol” dai, Yaolhaq mailma-ail salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq al juq teevq phaq khai-aq neq, teevq phaq ngadao ya nail ngaol.

Miqyail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bivq lavq-u phao, Molseiq bhai juq khi, bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, geeqlaoq eeljaol khi saljial ivq nail phaq neq, Yeiqsul Khali nee mail dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Miqyail bhai maq moeldaiq gaoq-aol. Aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail Miqyail pevq khi, Aqbhu nail jail-nq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail Yaqyov al gaq neq, Miqyail khaq sil gaq pevq nail ganl, phaodaiq lee-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Philma juq khi mail Leiqbhil tsaol-aq juq bhai, Yaolhaq jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. “Naol khaq sil gaq” dai, aqyu juq Yaolhaq bhai naldaiq-u phao, Yaolhaq salkhil niailhai khanq-a nail ngaol:

Aivq maq jil mail, “Ngal neq, Khali maq ngel” dai, daolcoev dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq gaoq naldaiq nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, naol Eillilya laiq.” “Ngal Eillilya maq ngel” dai, aivq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Naol Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al gaq laiq” dai, gaoq naldaiq nail ngaol. “Maq ngel” dai, aivq gaoq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Naol khaq sil gaq dai, nvjuq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai cavq lai kivq dai, naol yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq, khaq sil gaq dai, ge heeq” dai, gaoq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq ge nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
‘Heeqphaq lee nail haqbhoil
gailkhaol lav daol yaoq’ dai,
haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaol khi gul nail al gaq, ngal ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Naldaiq lee-a nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, Phaqliqsail juq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a juq iqsanl, kheq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Naol neq, Khali iqsanl maq ngel. Eillilya iqsanl maq ngel. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al gaq iqsanl maq ngel nail phal-iq neq, khul khi mail, naol yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq ge nail: “Ngal yu bhai ulcuvq lavqkhoel bhai, ulcuvq saol bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, nuljuq nee mail jaol nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, ngaq nail haoqnao lee nail gaq ngaol. Ngal neq, aivq nail saiqnaov neeqtsaq bhai iqsanl pheel nail maq geel-nvq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel bhai jiav nail Bheiqtaqnil nail julgu bhai jaol khi, ulcuvq saol bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq Yaolhaq bhai alhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, aivq jaol nail bha Yeiqsul lee nail bhai, Yaolhaq ya moel-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Miltsaq yaq nail oeqbal bhai phi ha lee-a nail Miqyail nail Yaolyaq bhai heldaiq daiq.

‘Ngaq nail haoqnao lee nail gaq, ngaq-ai nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal maq doevq lee-u nee mail aivq doevq nail ngaol’ dai, ngaq-i mail ge nail al gaq neq, aivq ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u, ngal aivq bhai maq heeq kivq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq aivq bhai aqmeeq-ai ya heeq ya moel dai, ngal lee khi, yu bhai ulcuvq lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Yaolhaq salkhil khanq khanq-ail ge nail: “Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal khaoqkhoiq khe-ai nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee khi, aivq nail kovtavq-ai deivq lee-a nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u ngal aivq bhai maq heeq kivq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ‘Ulcuvq lavqkhoel-ai yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq yaoq’ dai, ngaq bhai khoel nail gaq, ngaq bhai niailhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol: ‘Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail kovtavq bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal yavq kha lee khi jaol nail bhai, naol ya moel-u phao, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel ulcuvq saol bhiq nail gaq neq, aivq ngaol dai, naol ya heeq kivq naol.
Ngal alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, ngal salkhil khanq nail ngaol’ ” dai, Yaolhaq ge nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, Yaolhaq aivq nail yaqlaol nvq gaq nee mail, a bhai gaoq thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq Yeiqsul lee nail bhai ya moel khi, “Miqyail nail Yaolyaq bhai heldaiq daiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol al nvq gaq, Yaolhaq ge nail daoq al daoq ya gaiq khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel laivq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq khi, aqyu nvq gaq aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq nail bhai, ya moel-u phao, “Nul-nq nvq gaq khul halpov lal-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq: “Laqbhil-ol, naol khaq bha jaol nail-aiq” dai, aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Laqbhil dai ge nail neq, saqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.

“Heldaiq lal yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq gaq lai khi, aivq nail jaol duq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yanq al yanq neq, kivq hail lail ma phao naqli liq lavq niidai bhee lal-aoq nail ngel-i mail, aq-u n-gaol aqyu nvq gaq a bhai jaol-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq-i mail ge-a nail daoq al daoq ya gaiq khi, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel laivq-a nail al nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq neq, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv nail jaqbheq, Aqdaiqlaiq ngaol.

Aqdaiqlaiq iqmoeq ilmoeq nl-a nail neq, aivq nail aqivq Silmoq bhai halpov moel-ail khi, “Nv-nvq gaq Meiqsilya bhai moel-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Meiqsilya dai ge nail neq, Khali bhai ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Aqdaiqlaiq neq, Silmoq bhai Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Silmoq bhai heldaiq khi, “Naol neq, Yaolhaq nail yaqyov Silmoq nial. Yaqhao neq, naoq bhai Geiqphal dai, ya khul naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Geiqphal dai ge nail neq, lovmav bhai ge nail ngaol.
Niaohao Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail naol dai, Yeiqsul noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq Pillilpuv bhai thaoqphuq khi, “Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Pillilpuv neq, Aqdaiqlaiq khi mail Bheiqtuvluv jaol nail Bheiqjeildaq meenq bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Pillilpuv neq, Naqdaqneiqlal bhai halpov moel-ail khi ge nail: “Molseiq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel khi mail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq juq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail lavqkhoel, aqyu juq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, nvjuq ya moel-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Naqsaqlail meenq yaq, Yaolsai nail yaqyov Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naqsaqlail meenq bhai aqmeeq phaq dov lal nia nail laiq” dai, Naqdaqneiqlal naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Heldaiq lal yaoq thoil” dai, Pillilpuv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Naqdaqneiqlal lal thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel-u phao, Naqdaqneiqlal nail ganl niailhai ge-a nail ngaol: “Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maldil pevq nail gaq bhai heldaiq yaoq. Aivq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail neema maq aol-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Naol ngaq bhai khalhai khi heeq kivq-a nail-aiq” dai, Naqdaqneiqlal Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Pillilpuv naoq bhai maq khul-u nee mail, naol heeqguq aqbhaol nail daoqthaoq bhai jaol-u phao nee, ngal naoq bhai moel-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Naqdaqneiqlal ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, naol neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov nial. Ilsaqleiqlal nail Heeqphaq iqsanl ngel-ail nial” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “ ‘Naol heeqguq aqbhaol daoqthaoq bhai jaol-u nee mail, ngal naoq bhai moel-a nail ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngel-i mail, naol ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail laiq. Niidai nee maqtsil eeq nail ganl juq bhai iqsanl, naol ya moel naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nqtavq phao-ai thaq nail bhai nuljuq ya moel naol. Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail kovtavq bhai tsaoq thoiq tsaoq dav dai, tsao nail bhai ya moel naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, hail n jel-ail khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Gaqnaq julgu bhai yu khaqma hevq jaq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul nail aqma iqsanl, a bhai jaol nail ngaol.
“Khaqma hevqjaq nail bhai lee yaoq” dai, yu Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai iqsanl khul-a nail ngaol.
Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aqma-ol, ngal naoq-ai nee mail khalhai tavq nail-aiq. Ngaq nail yanq maq tsaq lal haq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Yeiqsul nuljuq bhai khal khoel nail khe-ai nl yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul nail aqma gaqmaol maoljaq nail juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aolsaolkovq bhai tavq lai khi, ulcuvq ya jiivq haol nail aol jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, al nail haqbhoil ulcuvq keivq bhoel nail caivlov kovq heeq a bhai bhi jiav thaq nail ngaol. Caivlov al teevq heeq nail lavqkhoel bhai neq, ulcuvq ngaq bhun kovq bhun niidai dail lai nail ngaol.

“Caivlov thoil juq nail lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq teevq bhee keivq bhoel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul gaqmaol maoljaq nail al juq bhai khoel bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl, ulcuvq teevq bhee keivq bhoel-a nail ngaol.
“Niil aq-il neq, khuq khi, khaqma hevq nail bhai heldaiq nail aqivq gaq bhai tsil-aivq bhiq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul khoel bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl, khuq khi tsil-aivq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Khaqma hevq jaq lee-a nail bhai heldaiq nail aqivq jiovq nail gaq, ulcuvq nee aqheeq tsilju nail ullul pevq lal-a nail al bhai, micil daol daiq-a nail ngaol. Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul al, khaq bha nee ya-a nail dai, aivq maq heeq nia-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ulcuvq keivq bhoel-a nail gaqmaol maoljaq nail juq neq, heeq nia nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, khaqma hevq nail bhai heldaiq nail aqivq jiovq nail gaq, khaqma hevq nail gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail:

“Tsaol-aq yaq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqkheel iqmoeq bhi daol khi, yu daol bov gaq haq neq, maq kheel nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul bhi daol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol neq, niil aq-il kev dai, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul aqkheel tsiq thaq-ai thaq-il thoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq khe pov, bhi heeq bhi moel nail niil phaq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jiav nail, Gaqnaq julgu nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail yu bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nail yaqlaol juq neq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail aqma, aivq nail jaqbheq juq khi mail, aivq nail yaqlaol juq neq, Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq a bhai mee nia n maq jaol-al.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail yanq aqjail jail lal-u phao, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai, yaol, niaoqnel khi mail khaoqkhoiq gaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai Yeiqsul ya moel-a nail ngaol. Phul dovq phal bhiq nail tsaol-aq juq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai iqsanl, ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neeqtsaq deeq yaq nieivq jil khi, thoiqthaiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, yaol khi niaoqnel juq bhai maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel nee the ha-a nail ngaol. Phul dovq phal bhiq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq juq nail phul bhai ngaoq khal khi, aqyu juq nail kovqkhail iqsanl ngaoq ha-a nail ngaol.
Khaoqkhoiq gaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl, “Khaoqkhoiq niil juq bavq dol-aivq yaoq. Ngaq nail Aqbhu nail ilkhaol bhai leiv thaq bhi pevq lal” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, “Miqyail-ol, naoq nail ilkhaol bhai, ngal gaiq-a nail, ngaq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai miqjaq tovq nail khe-ai, dul-ail nial” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail al daoq bhai, aivq nail yaqlaol juq noeq dov lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol thailhai nl kivq nail bhaqaoq aol nail phal-iq neq, naol nvjuq bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq khul nl daiq lavq nail-aiq” dai, aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma niil peiv ha yaoq. Hail n nail lavqkhoel, ngal cov phal naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Liq tsel kovq kovq bhee dai, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma niil il cov-a nail ngaol. Hail n nee taivq-ail naol cov phal kivq naol laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge nail neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma pevq nail, aivq nail aqmaol bhai ge movq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq doevq kovq lal-u phao, aivq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq, aivq nail yaqlaol juq noeq dov lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Jalliq bhai iqsanl, Yeiqsul-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhai iqsanl, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngaol.

Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail yanq lavqkhoel, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha Yeiqsul jaol-u phao, aivq-i mail nl-a nail noeq-u maq dov nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq bhai, yu ya moel khi, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq nail aqmaol tsaol-aq al juq bhai maq av bhiq-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.
Aivq tsaol-aq nail neema bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq nail ganl yu aivq bhai ge bhiq nail maq loq-ail.

Aq-u phao, Nilgaoldiq dai mil-ai thaq nail Phaqliqsail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai aqivq jiovq nail maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.

Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, aivq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal khi, “Saqlaq-ol, naol neq, Miqyail-i mail bhi lee thaq nail saqlaq teevq gaq nial dai, nvjuq heeq kivq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl-a nail juq, nl nail gaq nee mail Miqyail maq jaol lao-aol nul neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq nl nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, nvq pov teevq pov maq doevq phal lal
Nilgaoldiq ge nail: “Joiqmaoq teevq gaq khalhai khi doevq phal lal nia nail-aiq. Aqma nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi, teevq pov gaoq doevq lee nia nail laiq” dai, naldaiq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ulcuvq lavqkhoel khi mail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel maq doevq phal lal haq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ya aol lai-ail.
Aqsivq haqjoil nee doevq lee-a nail phaq neq, aqsivq haqjoil ngaol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nee doevq lee-a nail phaq neq, aqhaqlal ngaol.
Nuljuq nvq pov teevq pov ya doevq phal lal naol dai, ngal naoq bhai ge nail bhai, noeq-u maq dov ail thaq pevq-ail.

Lilmoel neq, khal bhoel-aivq movq nail phao, bhoel-aivq nail ngaol. Lilmoel bhoe nail aqthel bhai, naol ya gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, lilmoel al kha phao nee bhoel lavq khi, kha phao bhoel-aivq nail dai, naol maq heeq nia-ail. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel doevq lee nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, alhai dul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ganl niil juq khalhai pevq lal nia nail-aiq” dai, Nilgaoldiq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naol neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai saqlaq teevq gaq jiovq khi ngaol-aoq, ganl niil juq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.

Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nvjuq heeq kivq nail ganl nvjuq ge khi, nvjuq moel nail ganl nvjuq salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvjuq salkhil khanq nail bhai, nuljuq maq hav bhoel movq-ail.

Miltsaq bhai tavq nail ganl juq ngal ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neema maq thaqtsaol haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai tavq nail ganl juq ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq khalhai khi neema thaqtsaol heeq.
Nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee-a nail Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov maq ngel nail neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, nqtavq kovtavq bhai maq dav lai daiq-al.

Aivq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, maq ya cov-ail nail nee ovqtavq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail haqbhoil, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai, Molseiq eellel bhai kha thul-a nail khe-ai, yu tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai ya kha thul naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miqyail miltsaq yaq bhai gaiq-a deedee nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail Yaqyov teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq maq ya cov-ail nail nee ovqtavq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq yaq bhai yalkhaq bhi dal nail dai khi, Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov miltsaq kovtavq bhai bhi lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miltsaq yaq bhai bhi hevqkovq lee-a nail ngaol.

Aivq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq yalkhaq dal nail bhai maq daq-ail. Neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il iqsanl yalkhaq dal-ai thaq nail bhai daq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Yalkhaq dal nail al neq, niailhai ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqbhaq bhaq lee gaq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaq juq haqeiv nail phaq nl nail ngel-i mail, aqbhaq nee maqtsil, aqnav bhai neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, aqbhaq bhai maq heldaiq nul nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nl nail phaq maq ya dov lal dai, aqbhaq bhaq nail bhai maq lal-ail.
Maldil tsaq nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, aqyu juq nl nail juq Miqyail bhai juq khi nl-a nail ngaol dai, bhi dov lal dai, aqbhaq bhaq nail bhai lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq yaqlaol juq nee mail a bhai jaol khi, yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Saqliq meenq aqjail bhai, Eilnoq dai mil-ai thaq nail dao, ulcuvq maodai deq nail ngel-i mail, Yaolhaq iqsanl, a bhai yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq a bhai ulcuvq saol lee-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao neq, Yaolhaq bhai thaonq lavqkhoel bhai maq laol bhoel haq-al.
Yaolhaq nail yaqlaol teevq pav ganav juq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq nee mail bhi haol lal nail aol juq nail ganl jil pheeljaq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yaolhaq jaol nail bha lai khi ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel bhai naoq-ai nee mail jaol-u phao, aivq nail ganl naol salkhil khanq-a nail al gaq, yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq maodai aivq jaol nail bha ail thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
