Yaolhaq ge nail: “Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq nail phaq, maq ngel nail neq, tsaol-aq yaq teevq phaq iqsanl maq ya nia-ail.

Ngal neq, Khali maq ngel. Khali nail iqmoeq khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq neq, ngal ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Ge bhiq-a nail daoq al daoq gaiq-a naol dai, nuljuq iqsanl, salkhil khanq kivq naol.

Maol ail nail gaq bhai hevq nail gaq neq, khaqma hevq nail gaq ngaol. Khaqma hevq nail gaq nail aqtsaoq neq, aivq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol khi, khaqma hevq nail gaq nail daoq ya gaiq-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, ngal iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail deedee-ail nial.
Yeiqsul neq, ya eeq ya heel ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, ya theq ya nil ail naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolhaq gaoq ge nail: “Nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail gaq neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai eeq jaiq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq, miltsaq bhai tavq khi, miltsaq nail ganl taivq-ail ge nail thail nail ngaol. Nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail gaq neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai eeq jaiq nail ngaol.
Aivq ya gaiq ya moel-a nail ganl juq, aivq salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail salkhil khanq nail bhai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq hav bhoel-ail.
Aivq salkhil khanq nail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Miqyail neq, saljial ivq deedee nail ngaol dai, heeq duq khi, salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai lee-a nail gaq neq, Miqyail nail daoq ge nail thail nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, aqhaqlal bivq-u phao, maq phaiq maq hav dai, teevq bhee bivq nail ngaol.
Aqbhu Miqyail neq, Yaqyov bhai gaiq-a khi, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq bhai av bhiq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov bhai neema thaqtsaol nail gaq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Yaqyov nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail gaq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq maq ya-ail. Miqyail neema phail nail phaq aivq nail kovtavq bhai jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, Yaolhaq nee maqtsil yu bhai yaqlaol bhi pevq lal khi, ulcuvq saol bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, Phaqliqsail juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Maldil dai, ge haq neq, Yeiqsul yu bhai ulcuvq maq saol bhiq-al. Aivq nail yaqlaol juq taivq-ail, yu bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ganl niil ganl Phaqliqsail juq ya gaiq-ao naol dai, Yeiqsul heeq nia-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq nee mail dov ail khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai teevq pov gaoq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Saqmaqliv milkhaoq bhai aivq ya ail pav nail ngaol.

Saqmaqliv milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail, Sulkhaq dai khul nail meenq teevq meenq bhai, aivq lai kev-a nail ngaol. Meenq al meenq neq, Yaqkov-i mail aivq nail yaqyov Yaolsai bhai bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail miltsaq al dao nail aqjail bhai jiav nail ngaol.
A bhai Yaqkov nail lovduq jiav nail ngaol. Yeiqsul gaq doil tsao doil-a nail ngel-i mail, lovduq aqjail bhai jaoldeel-a nail ngaol. Yanq al yanq neq, n-gaol laolma ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Saqmaqliv nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq ulcuvq keivq lee-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq bhai ulcuvq micil bhi daol lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai hal nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq neq, meenq bhai jaqjaq daoldaol ul lai-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge nail: “Ngal neq, Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq ngaol. Naol neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khul khi mail, naol ngaq bhai ulcuvq hal daol nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail alhai ge nail dai ngal-aq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq neq, Saqmaqliv nail tsaol-aq bhai, aqtsaoq teevq peivq-ail maq tsaoq tavq khaoq-ail.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai leevq-a nail kovpavq khi mail naoq bhai ulcuvq hal daol nail gaq bhai, naol heeq nia-ail nul neq, naol aivq bhai ulcuvq hal daol naol. Aivq iqsanl, naoq bhai doevq nail ulcuvq bhi daol lavq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol ulcuvq keivq dov nail teevq phaq-ail maq aol nail nee ovqtavq, lovduq niil duq neq, navq deedee nail ngaol. Naol doevq nail ulcuvq khaq bha keivq-ail nail-aiq.

Ngadao nail Aqbhu Yaqkov, lovduq niil duq nvjuq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq khi mail aivq nail yaq juq iqsanl, lovduq niil duq bhai keivq daol-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail jaiqyaq juq bhai iqsanl, keivq dov khi bhi daol-a nail ngaol. Naol Yaqkov nee maqtsil eeq nail laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “Ulcuvq niil khal daol nail tsaol-aq, ulcuvq gaoq moevq lal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i bhi daol nail ulcuvq khal daol nail tsaol-aq, ulcuvq teevq thal-iq, maq moevq lal yaoq-aol. Ngaq-i bhi daol nail ulcuvq al, tsaol-aq al gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq dov lee nail ulcuvq laolbev pevq lal nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, ngal ulcuvq maq ya moevq lal nail nee ovqtavq, niilniai iqsanl ulcuvq maq ya keivq lee dai, ulcuvq al ngaq bhai bhi daol lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naoq nail yovjil khul lai yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal yovjil maq bhao” dai, Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Yovjil maq bhao dai, naol ge nail neq, tsaq naol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naol neq, ngaq aol hal-aoq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il naoq-ai nee mail jaol nail gaq, naoq nail yovjil maq ngel-ail. Naol thailhai ge nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq nial dai, ngal heeq kivq lal-aoq naol.

Nvjuq Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq neq, gaoqjaoq niil jaoq nail kovtavq-ai, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha thaoq nail tsaq naol dai, nuljuq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal ge nail daoq bhai, neema thaqtsaol yaoq. Gaoqjaoq niil jaoq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq Aqbhu Miqyail bhai uqhuq maq ya thaoq lai nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, nuljuq maq heeq nia nail phaq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol. Nvjuq neq, nvjuq heeq kivq nail phaq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail bhai maldil uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqhaqlal lavqkhoel khi, saljial ivq nail neema aol nail lavqkhoel nee, uqhuq thaoq nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol. Niil aq-il iqsanl, kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail neq, aivq bhai alhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai oil movq nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, aqhaqlal ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhai uqhuq khal thaoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqhaqlal lavqkhoel khi, saljial ivq nail neema aol nail lavqkhoel nee, uqhuq ya thaoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq ge nail: “Meiqsilya lee naol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Aivq lee kev-u phao, nvjuq bhai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee cavq lavq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Meiqsilya dai ge nail neq, Khali bhai ge nail ngaol.
“Naoq-ai nee mail daoq ge tsaoq thailthaiq nail ngal neq, Meiqsilya ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq kovq kev lee-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul yaqmai-aq al gaq nee mail daoq ge tsaoq nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Naol khul oil movq nail, khul khi mail, naol aivq nee daoq ge tsaoq nail-aiq” dai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq naldaiq-al.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq, aivq nail miltsaq iqlaoq bavq thaq-ail ceevq khi, meenq bhai kovq lai-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq-i mail khal nl jel lavq-a nail iqsanl bhai gedaiq lavq-a nail gaq bhai heldaiq lee yaoq. Aivq neq, Khali ngel-ail meeq” dai, meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq meenq nee dov lee khi, Yeiqsul jaol nail bhai lee-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lee thailthaiq-u phao, “Saqlaq-ol, jaq lal yaoq” dai, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal nuljuq maq heeq nia nail jaq nail phaq jiav naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav aivq bhai bhi jaq bhi daol thaq nail jaol-aq” dai, yaqlaol juq aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq neema tsaq dai nl khi, aivq nail ganl nl gil-a nail niil neq, ngaq nail jaq nail phaq ngaol.

Bhala liq heeq jail-ail haq neq, gov gaiq nail yanq kev lal aoq nial dai, nuljuq ge nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Gov gov yal bhai heldaiq yaoq. Niil aq-il iqsanl gov mi lal khi, gov gaiq mao lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Haiq nail gaq khi mail, gaiq nail gaq teevq gaq khe-ai lavqkhiq ya tsail dai, gaiq nail gaq aqphoiq ya thailthaiq khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail aqheeq deeq bhoi thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Teevq gaq haiq khi, teevq gaq gaiq nail ngaol dai, daoqdaq daq nail daoq al daoq, niilniai maldil tsaq lai nail ngaol.
Nuljuq-i mail maq nl-ai thaq nail yalgaol bhai ngal nuljuq bhai gov bhi gaiq-ail naol. Yu-i mail nl-ai thaq nail yalgaol bhai nuljuq ya gaiq jaq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail Saqmaqliv nail tsaol-aq maodai gaq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq-i mail khal nl jel lavq-a nail iqsanl mail, aivq ngaq bhai gedaiq lavq-a nail ngaol” dai, yaqmai-aq al gaq salkhil khanq-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Saqmaqliv nail tsaol-aq al juq, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lee kev khi, “Nvjuq nee mail jaol lavq yaoq” dai, hal nail ngel-i mail, aivq a bhai nvq n jaol-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul-i mail ge-a nail daoq al juq bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nvjuq naoq nail daoq bhaqda nee taivq-ail, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaq tsaol nail maq ngel yaoq-aol. Nvjuq aivq nail daoq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq niil gaq maldil miltsaq yaq bhai Hevqkovq nail gaq nial dai, nvjuq heeq kivq lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul a bhai nvq n jaol gaq khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq neq, yovqgavq nail jaolkhaoq jaollaoq bhai khaoqsail maq jiav-ail” dai, Yeiqsul aivq salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail kev-u phao, Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai hav bhoel-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl jaol khi, Yeiqsul-i mail khal nl-a nail phaq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq Gaqliqlail milkhaoq, Gaqnaq julgu bhai gaoq lai kev-a nail ngaol. Julgu al gu neq, aivq-i mail ulcuvq bhai aqheeq tsilju nail ullul bhi pevq lal-a nail julgu ngaol. Aq-u phao, Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai jaol nail heeqphaq teevq gaq nail yaqkav nail yaqyov coevq sil nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Yuldav milkhaoq nee mail Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai lal kev-aoq naol geiq dai, eeq nail heel nail al gaq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqyov sil lai-aiq nail ngel-i mail, aivq Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lai khi, “Ngaq nail yaqyov bhai lav meeq lee lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq khi mail noeq-u maq dov nail juq bhai nuljuq maq ya moel haq neq, nuljuq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq nail Yaqyov maq sil-u nee mail lee lavq yaoq” dai, eeq nail heel nail al gaq, Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail Yaqyov meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol. Kovq ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Eeq nail heel nail al gaq Yeiqsul-i mail ge nail daoq bhai, neema thaqtsaol khi, kovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq kovq ail thailthaiq-u phao, gailphail lail ma bhai, aivq nail yaqkav juq aivq bhai thaoqphuq khi, “Naoq nail yaqyov meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngaq nail yaqyov khul yanq bhai meeq lai-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, “Milgaol n-gaol laolma naqli teevq lavq bhai aivq coevq sil nail meeq lai-a nail ngaol” dai, yaqkav al juq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yanq al yanq neq, “Naoq nail yaqyov meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail yanq bhai tsaq nail ngaol dai, aivq heeq nia nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq iqsanl, aivq nail miqyaq khaqma iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Bhi heeq bhi moel nail niil neq, Yeiqsul Yuldav milkhaoq nee mail Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai ail kev khi, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl-a nail nvq phaq teevq phaq ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav nail yanq kev lal-a nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel, yaol nail laolkhoiq bhai, Heiqbhail nail daoq, Beiqdeiqsaqdal dai khul nail ngaqkha teevq lao jiav nail ngaol. Ngaqkha al nail aqjail bhai gaqnaq yavqtsoel ngaq tsoel jiav nail ngaol.

Gaqnaq yavqtsoel al ngaq tsoel nail lavqkhoel bhai, nal nail tsaol-aq, maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq, khil khoi khoi nail tsaol-aq khi mail, khil sil lavq sil sil nail tsaol-aq maodai iqthaiq nail ngaol.

Yanq kev lal haq neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel yavq kha lee khi, ulcuvq bhai lav dao lee nail ngaol. Ulcuvq al dao lal-u phao, yu nail iqmoeq aol ail nail gaq neq, aivq khul nail nalgoel nal khi ngaol-aoq, meeq lai nail ngaol.
Hail tsel eivq kovq bhee dai, nal bhee lavq thaq nail yaqyov-aq teevq gaq a bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq nal nail maoq lal-aoq naol dai, heeq nia khi, “Naol meeq lai movq-ail laiq” dai, aivq bhai nal daiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, ulcuvq niil dao lal-u phao, ngaqkha lavqkhoel-ai, ngaq bhai tsiq bhoel lavq nail teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail. Ngal aol ail nail khi-u phao, yaoq gaq yaoq ngaq nail iqmoeq nee aol ail nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Thul yaoq. Naoq nail iqjial bavq khi dov ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq teevq pov nee meeq lai khi, aivq nail iqjial bavq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail jaol n n-gaol ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, meeq lai-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge bhiq-a nail: “Yanqgaol neq, jaol n n-gaol ngaol. Naol naoq nail iqjial bavq bavq-ail maq tsao khaoq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao aivq ge nail: “Ngaq bhai bhi meeq lai lavq-a nail gaq, ‘Naoq nail iqjial bavq khi dov ail yaoq’ dai, ngaq bhai khoel nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“ ‘Naoq nail iqjial bavq khi dov ail yaoq’ dai, naoq bhai khoel nail al gaq, khaq sil gaq” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Meeq lai-a nail al gaq, aivq bhai lav meeq lavq-a nail al gaq khaq sil gaq dai, aivq maq heeq nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, a bhai tsaol-aq munl munl ma jaol nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul a bhai nee dov ail-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel, Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai halpov moel khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol meeq lai-aoq thaq nial. Iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil doil nail phaq, naoq nail kovtavq bhai maq ya kev lee dai, oeqbal thaq gaoq nl” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Meeq lai-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq jaol nail bha ail khi, “Ngaq bhai bhi meeq lai lavq-a nail gaq neq, Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul jaol n n-gaol alhai bhi meeq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, aq-u n-gaol nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail phaq nl-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao Yeiqsul ge nail: “Niil aq-il kev dai, ngaq nail Aqbhu khaq mao iqsanl maq naq lai dai, ganl nl nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal iqsanl ya nl naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aqivq juq neq, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil Yeiqsul bhai deeq heivq nail khi, halpov nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, jaol n n-gaol maq nl khaoq nail phaq nl-a nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail bhai aivq nail Aqbhu dai khul nail ngel-i mail, aivq khi mail Miqyail teevq gaq kheel ngaol dai, ge movq nail khe-ai dul lai nail, ngel-i mail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaqyov neq, aivq bhai aivq teevq phaq-ail maq nl kivq-ail. Aqbhu Miqyail nl nail bhai ya moel-a nail khe-ai, Yaqyov iqsanl nl nail ngaol. Aqbhu khal nl nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Yaqyov nl naol.

Aqbhu Miqyail neq, Yaqyov bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq khal nl nail iqsanl mail, Yaqyov bhai, nl daiq bhi nail ngaol. Nuljuq noeq-u maq dov-ail bhi pevq-ail nail dai khi, niidai nee maqtsil eeq nail yaoq phaq yaoq iqsanl, aivq Yaqyov bhai nl daiq bhiq naol.
Aqbhu Miqyail neq, sil nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nail khe-ai, Yaqyov iqsanl aivq bhi doevq kovq lal movq nail tsaol-aq bhai, bhi doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.
Aqbhu Miqyail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, yalkhaq maq dal-ail. Yalkhaq dal nail bhaqaoq iqsanl mail, Yaqyov bhai av bhiq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai ev nail khe-ai, Yaqyov bhai iqsanl ev dai, av bhiq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaqyov bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq, Yaqyov bhai bhi lee-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai iqsanl, maq ev-ail.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq nail daoq naldaiq khi, ngaq bhai bhi lee lavq-a nail gaq bhai, neema thaqtsaol nail gaq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail al gaq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai maq ya daq-ail. Aivq neq, sil nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, doevq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-aoq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Sil-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov nail daoq bhai, ya gaiq nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol. Niil aq-il iqsanl kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ya doevq naol.
Aqbhu neq, doevq nail phaq dov lee duq pevq nail khe-ai, aivq nail yaqyov iqsanl, doevq nail phaq dov lee duq pevq dai, aivq nl bhiq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, aivq neq, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov ngel-i mail, yalkhaq dal nail bhaqaoq, Aqbhu Miqyail aivq bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl niilniai noeq-u maq dov dai, thaq pevq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, luqdaol bhai duqpheeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, aivq nail daoq ya gaiq khi, luqdaol nee dov lal nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol.

Aqmeeq phaq nl-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq ya nail haqbhoil gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail phaq nl-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai daq nail haqbhoil, gaoq doevq kovq lal naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal taivq-ail neq, khul teevq phaq-ail maq nl kivq-ail. Ngal ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, ngal yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Ngal dal nail neq, tsaq nail daol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, ngal nl naol. Ngal neema tsaq nail khe-ai, ngal nl nail maq ngel.
Ngal teevq gaq taivq-ail ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq haq neq, ngal khanq nail salkhil maq tsaq-ail.
Ngaq nail ganl, salkhil khanq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq khanq nail al neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol.
Nuljuq yu bhai, Yaolhaq jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq-u phao, aivq maldil pevq nail ganl, salkhil khanq-a nail ngaol.
Maldil dai, ge haq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail khanq nail salkhil bhai ngal maq juq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngal niailhai ge lavq bhel.
Yaolhaq neq, tovq bhaq-ai thaq nail phalmanq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqbhaq bhaq nail bhai, nuljuq teevq yanq taivq-ail, lavqkhiq tsail movq nail neema aol nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yaolhaq-i mail salkhil khanq-a nail nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaq nail ganl, salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol. ‘Ganl niil juq nl gil yaoq’ dai, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel nail ngaol. Niil aq-il ngal nl nail niil neq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol dai, salkhil pevq nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail iqsanl, ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail nail daoq maq gaiq daiq haq-al. Aqbhu Miqyail bhai iqsanl maq moel daiq haq-al.
Aqbhu Miqyail nail daoq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai, jaol duq maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai, nuljuq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq halpov moel kivq naol dai, nuljuq noeq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai halpov halpov-ail ge nail ngaol. Jalliq al neq, ngaq nail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq ya dai, nuljuq ngal jaol nail bha maq lal movq-ail.
Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail tsiq eeq lal nail bhai ngal halpov nail maq ngel.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai maq aol-ail dai, ngal heeq kivq naol.

Ngal ngaq nail Aqbhu nail aqmil kov-uvq nee lee khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq hav bhoel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee yovqgavq lee-a nail yaoq gaq yaoq bhai, nuljuq hav bhoel naol.

Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, tsiqeeq nail bhai oil movq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail Miqyail pevq nail gaq-i mail bhi tsiqeeq dai, nuljuq maq halpov-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai, neema khalhai khi thaqtsaol nail-aiq.
Aqbhu Miqyail nail sivtavq-ai, nuljuq bhai oeqbal thaq nail gaq, ngal ngaol dai, thaq noeq. Nuljuq bhai oeqbal thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Al gaq neq, nuljuq-i mail juq nail Molseiq ngaol.
Nuljuq Molseiq bhai, neema thaqtsaol-ail nul neq, ngaq bhai iqsanl neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq ngaq nail ganl gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aivq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail juq bhai, neema maq thaqtsaol haq neq, ngaq nail daoq bhai neema khalhai khi thaqtsaol heeq” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Gaqliqlail ngaqkha a phao lelkhel bha ceiv lai-a nail ngaol. Gaqliqlail ngaqkha bhai Deiqbheiqlil dai iqsanl, khul nail ngaol.
Yu bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail dai khi, Yeiqsul nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi meeq lai-u phao, ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoqjaoq bhai dav lai khi, aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee mail jaoldeel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail yanq aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, aivq jaol nail bha lal nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. “Ngadao juq, tsaol-aq niil juq bhai bhi jaq nail khaqmul khaq bha ul ail heeq” dai, Yeiqsul Pillilpuv bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq khalhai ya khi nail-aiq dai, heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, Pillilpuv bhai laonqdaiq movq nail ngel-i mail, alhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Pillilpuv ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil juq teevq gaq micil ya jaq dai, khaqmul nvq yal bavq nail aqphoiq ul ail khi ngaol-aoq, maq lovq lai-ail” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail yaqlaol juq nail lavqkhoel, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv nail jaqbheq Aqdaiqlaiq ge nail: “Niilniai jaol nail yaqyov teevq gaq, khaqmul ngaq heeq khi mail delgil nvq maol aol-ail nial. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niidai nail haqbhoil neq, khul maq niail lai-ail jaol-aq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Tsaol-aq niil juq bhai bhi jaoldeel yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai neq, moeqgaq doevq nail daikhaoq aqsal ngaol. A bhai jaoldeel-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yaqyov-aq taivq-ail, ngaq hinl gaq niidai bhee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul khaqmul al oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai, bhi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol. Delgil al iqsanl, alhai bhi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, teevq bov ya jaq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq jaq bov gaq-u phao, “Teevq peivq-ail maq ya peivq-ail dai, maq jaq gil-ail jaiq lal-a nail juq iqsanl mail, gov kovq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq gov kovq daiq-u phao neq, tsoelthoel-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail khaqmul al ngaq heeq nail jaiq lal thaq nail juq, pheeqdeel nee tsel-nvq deel bhee nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq bhai tsaol-aq al juq ya moel-u phao, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai lee naol dai, ge-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al gaq maldil nial” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq, aivq bhai nieivq khi, heeqphaq bhi jiovq nail khi bhai, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail gaoqjaoq bhai gaoq dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Nqkivq kivq lee-u phao, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq ngaqkha jiav nail bha yavq kha ail khi, laovq bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq ngaqkha a phao lelkhel phao jiav nail Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai kovq ceiv lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqkivq kivq lee-aoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, aqyu juq nail haoqnao maq the kheel lee haq-al.
Aq-u phao, lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, eelkhaol thaoq deedee nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq hail lail liq lail bhee dai, laovq e kel-aivq-u phao, Yeiqsul ulcuvq kovtavq bhai tsao tsao-ail, laovq nail aqjail-ai tsao kel leevq nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel khi, geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq thaq geesil. Ngal ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq lavqkhiq tsail nail lavqkhoel nee Yeiqsul bhai, laovq lavqkhoel bhai khul bhoel khi, aqyu juq-i mail ail nail dao bhai, teevq yanq lal yanq nee mail, ail kev-a nail ngaol.

Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq, ngaqkha a phao lelkhel phao jaol-aiq haq nail ngaol. Milgaol neq, niilniai laovq teevq laovq taivq-ail jiav nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol. Yeiqsul laovq bhai maq aol lai dai, aivq nail yaqlaol juq taivq-ail, laovq jeel-aivq-a nail bhai, aqyu juq moel-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq khi aqyu juq-i mail khaqmul ya jaq-a nail al dao nail aqjail bhai, Deiqbheiqlil meenq nee mail laovq yaoq juq yaoq lal kev-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi mail aivq nail yaqlaol juq niilniai maq jaol-aoq thaq nail dai, tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq, heeq nia lal-u phao, aqyu juq laovq jeeq khi, Yeiqsul bhai halpov ail nail dai khi, Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ngaqkha a phao lelkhel-ai, Yeiqsul bhai halpov moel-u phao, “Saqlaq-ol, naol niilniai khaq mao lee kev-a nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq bhi heeq bhi moel phaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai halpov nail maq ngel-ail. Khaqmul teevq bov ya jaq nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai halpov nail ngaol.

Buvq-ail tsiq-ail nia nail jaqjaq daoldaol nail haqbhoil maq laijai dai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel bhi doevq nail jaqjaq daoldaol nail haqbhoil, laijai yaoq. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov pevq nail, ngal nuljuq bhai jaqjaq daoldaol al phaq, bhi jaq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai neema tsaq khi junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Miqyail nail ganl nl kivq dai, nvjuq khalhai ya khi nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, Miqyail nail ganl nl nail phaq pevq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, nvjuq ya moel khi, neema thaqtsaol lal dai, bhi heeq bhi moel nail khul phaq, naol nvjuq bhai bhi moel lavq heeq. Naol khul phaq nl daiq lavq nail-aiq.

Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq neq, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaol-u phao, maqnav khaqmul ya jaq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ya jaq dai, ‘Nqtavq kovtavq khe khaqmul, Miqyail bivq-a nail ngaol’ dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq bhai nqtavq kovtavq khe khaqmul bivq lavq-a nail gaq, Molseiq maq ngel-ail. Maldil nqtavq khe khaqmul, ngaq nail Aqbhu nuljuq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail khaqmul neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee lee khi, miltsaq yaq bhai aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail khaqmul ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, khaqmul al nvjuq bhai khaq mao iqsanl bhi jaq lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai hal nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail khaqmul ngaol. Ngal jaol nail bha lal nail tsaol-aq, maq moevq lal yaoq-aol. Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq ulcuvq iqsanl, maq moevq lal yaoq-aol.
Nuljuq ngaq bhai moel khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-il dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel.
Ngaq nail Aqbhu, ngaq bhai khal bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, ngal jaol nail bha lal naol. Ngal jaol nail bha khal lal nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngal maldil maq khaonq ha-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal neema tsaq nail khe-ai nl nail dai khi, nqtavq kovtavq nee lee-a nail maq ngel. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq, neema tsaq dai nl nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq, neema tsaq nail neq, niil ngaol. Aivq ngaq bhai khal bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel, ngal teevq gaq-ail maq bhi peivq-ail nail nee ovqtavq, daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol, ngal aqyu juq iqsanl bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nail neq, aivq neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov bhai moel khi, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu neema tsaq nail ngaol. Daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol ngal iqsanl, tsaol-aq al juq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal naol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Ngal neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail khaqmul ngaol” dai, aivq ge nail ngel-i mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge doil nail ngaol.

“Aivq neq, Yaolsai nail yaqyov Yeiqsul maq ngel-ail laiq. Aivq nail aqbhu aqma iqsanl ngadao juq heeq kivq nail ngaol. ‘Ngal nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail ngaol’ dai, aivq khalhai ge nail meeq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai thaq ge doil.

Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail, ngal jaol nail bha, maq hel lavq haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, ngal jaol nail bha maq lal nia-ail. Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail ngal jaol nail bha bhi lal-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol, ngal gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal naol.

Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel, ‘Miqyail neq, aqyu juq iqsanl bhai cavq bhi cov bhi naol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail nail daoq gaiq khi, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail cavq nail cov nail bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, ngal jaol nail bha lal naol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai maq moel daiq haq-al. Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail gaq taivq-ail, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai moel daiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail khaqmul ngaol.
Nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq neq, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaol-u phao, Maqnav khaqmul ya jaq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq sil gil-a nail ngaol.
Ngal ge movq nail khaqmul neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail khaqmul ngaol. Khaqmul niil jaq nail tsaol-aq maq ya sil-ail.

Ngal neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee mail lee-a nail khaqmul ngaol. Khaqmul niil neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail khaqmul ngaol. Khaqmul niil jaq nail tsaol-aq nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq aqdoevq doevq nia dai, ngaq-i mail bivq-a nail khaqmul niil neq, ngaq nail haqjoil ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, aivq nail haqjoil, ngadao juq bhai khalhai khi bhi jaq lavq nia nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai jil pheeljaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov nail haqjoil maq jaq-ail, aivq nail aqsivq maq daol haq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqdoevq doevq nail phaq maq aol-ail.
Ngaq nail haqjoil jaq khi, ngaq nail aqsivq daol nail tsaol-aq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol, ngal aqyu juq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal naol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ngaq nail haqjoil neq, maldil jaq nail phaq pevq khi, ngaq nail aqsivq iqsanl maldil daol nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail haqjoil jaq khi, ngaq nail aqsivq daol nail tsaol-aq, ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol naol.
Doevq nail Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq khi, aivq bhaqda nee, ngal doevq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, ngaq bhai jaq nail tsaol-aq ngal bhaqda nee, aqdoevq ya doevq naol.

Khaqmul niil neq, nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail ya jaq-a nail khaqmul al khe-ai, maq dul-ail. Aqyu juq neq, khaqmul al ya jaq khi ngaol-aoq, sil gil-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaqmul niil neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee lee-a nail ngaol. Khaqmul niil jaq nail tsaol-aq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol
Gaqbheiqneiqoq meenq bhai jiav nail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, ganl niil juq, Yeiqsul ge-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail yaqlaol juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, “Daoq niil daoq neq, haq deedee nail neq, khaq sil gaq hav bhoel tsaol nail-aiq” dai, mee nia gaq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.

Aivq nail yaqlaol juq ganl al bhai alhai khoiq thail pheeljaq nail bhai, Yeiqsul aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai heeq nia khi ge nail: “Daoq niil daoq bhaqda nee, nuljuq ngaq bhai khaonq movq nail laiq.
Thailhai phal-iq neq, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov aivq nail jaol duq bhai gaoq kovq dav lai nail bhai, nuljuq ya moel haq neq, khalhai khi nail-aiq.

Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal taivq-ail, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nia nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil neq, khul maq nl nia-ail. Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq juq neq, aqhaqlal pevq khi aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq teevq pav ganav juq neq, neema maq thaqtsaol-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khul gaq aivq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol khi aivq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail gaq bhai iqsanl, iqmoeq-u nee mail, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngaol.

Aivq gaoq ge nail: “Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq nail Aqbhu maq bhi lal haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl ngal jaol nail bha maq lal nia-ail dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee dan khi, aivq nail yaqlaol juq mee nia gaq, aivq nee mail pav-ail khi, aivq nail haoqnao maq tsaothel-aivq-al.
“Nuljuq iqsanl kovq ail naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq khaq sil gaq nail haoqnao gaoq tsaothel-aivq nail-aiq. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail daoq, naol jaol nail bhai jiav nail ngaol.
Naol neq, Miqyail nail Tsaolmeeq Tsaolhaol gaq nial dai, nvjuq heeq kivq lal khi neema thaqtsaol lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq tsel-nvq gaq bhai ngaq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq neq, neivq heeqphaq ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq alhai ge nail neq, Silmoq Ilsaqgaqliqoq nail yaqyov Yuldav bhai ge movq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq lavqkhoel, teevq dao nee teevq dao ail-a nail ngaol. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, halpov nail ngel-i mail, Yuldav milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai aivq maq ail movq-ai bhiq-ail.
Aq-u phao neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail saivqqgov
Aivq nail jaqbheq juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol nl nail ganl juq, naoq nail yaqlaol juq ya moel dai, niilniai nee dov ail khi, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai lai yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq nail aqmil bhi dov lal movq nail tsaol-aq neq, yu maq moel nail bhai, khul teevq phaq-ail maq nl-ail. Naol ganl niil juq nl haq neq, miltsaq yaq bhai naoq nail aqmaol bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bhi moel yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail, aqyu juq alhai ge nail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nail jaqbheq juq iqsanl, aivq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq nail haqbhoil, yanq maq tsaq-ai haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil neq, khaq mao iqsanl yanq tsaq nail ngaol.

Miltsaq yaq juq neq, nuljuq bhai neejiav maq jiav-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail nl nail phaq neq, haqeiv nail phaq pevq dai, ngal salkhil khanq nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq yaq juq, ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol.
Bhaoqaiq lav sav nail bhai, nuljuq lai yaoq. Ngaq nail haqbhoil yanq maq tsaq-ai haq nail ngel-i mail, ngal maq lal-ai haq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq khi, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail jaqbheq juq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail bhai lai jel-u phao, yu maq bhi heeq maq bhi moel dai, Yeiqsul iqsanl lai-a nail ngaol.
Bhaoqaiq lav sav nail lavqkhoel, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq aivq bhai halpov halpov-ail, “Aivq khaq bha ail-a nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai naldaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, aivq nail ganl ge pheeljaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aivq neq, tsaol-aq aqmeeq ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aivq neq, tsaol-aq aqmeeq maq ngel, tsaol-aq bhai hevq bheeq nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Yeiqsul nail ganl bhaqlaoq kheq dai, maq ge tseq-ail.
Bhaoqaiq lav sav nail teevq pav pav lal-u phao, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai dav lai khi, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, haoqgavq maodai maq saol daiq khi ngaol-aoq, khalhai khi niidai dai-ail heeq nia nail meeq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal cavq nail cov nail daoq niil neq, ngaq nail daoq maq ngel-ail. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq nail daoq ngaol.

Miqyail neema tsaq dai nl movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngal cavq nail cov nail daoq niil, Miqyail nail daoq ngel-ail laiq, ngaq nail neenoeq bhai juq khi cavq nail cov nail daoq ngel-ail laiq dai, tselpav nia nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail neenoeq yovqgavq cavq nail cov nail gaq neq, yovqgavq nail khaoqsail ya dai, halpov nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, halpov nail gaq neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Maq tsaq nail phaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail.

Molseiq nuljuq bhai aoldaoq kovqdaoq bivq lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq teevq gaq iqsanl, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al bhai maq nl-ail. Nuljuq ngaq bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, khul khi mail, halpov nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Naol neq, neivq aol nail niil. Naoq bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, khaq sil gaq halpov nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal teevq phaq nl naol. Al bhai nuljuq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail naol.

Molseiq nuljuq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol bhi nl-a nail ngaol. (Maldil dai, ge haq neq, Molseiq-i mail bhi nl-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail nl khal leevq-a nail ngaol.) Jaol n n-gaol iqsanl nuljuq bavkov uqjaq oev nail ngaol.

Molseiq-i mail bivq-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq ya cov-ail dai, jaol n n-gaol iqsanl, nuljuq bavkov uqjaq oev nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, jaol n n-gaol ngal tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail aqmaol bhai bhi meeq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema phail nail laiq.
Nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail juq bhai taivq-ail, heldaiq khi yalkhaq thaq dal. Maldil tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee, yalkhaq dal yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aqyu juq deeq heivq nail khi mail halpov nail gaq, thoil gaq maq ngel-ail laiq.

Heldaiq, aivq bhaqlaoq kheq dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq aivq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge-il. Tsaol-aq niil gaq Khali ngaol dai, aqivq aqtsu juq maldil heeq nia-aoq thaq nail meeq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niil gaq khaq bha nee dov lal-a nail dai, ngadao juq heeq kivq nail ngaol. Khali lee-u phao neq, aivq khaq bhai nee dov lee nail dai, teevq gaq-ail maq heeq nia-ail” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, mailma-ail ge nail: “Nuljuq ngaq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Ngal khaq bhai nee dov lee-a nail dai iqsanl, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail neenoeq ngal lee-a nail maq ngel. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq neq, saljial ivq nail ngaol. Nuljuq aivq bhai maq heeq nia-ail. Ngal neq, aivq bhai heeq kivq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal aivq jaol nail nee lee khi, aivq iqsanl ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aivq bhai nieivq nail dai khi, naoqjaoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail yanq maq tsaq-ail haq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aivq bhai maq nieivq nia-ail.

Tsaol-aq al juq nail lavqkhoel, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ge nail: “Khali lee kev haq neq, tsaol-aq niil gaq-i mail nl-a nail, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nee maqtsil, aivq bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl naol laiq” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, Yeiqsul nail ganl ge pheeljaq nail bhai Phaqliqsail juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Philma juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq neq, Yeiqsul bhai bhi nieivq-ail nail dai khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai jaol khi heldaiq phail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq nee mail, teevq yanq jaol naol. Teevq yanq khai-aq neq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq jaol nail bha ngal kovq lai naol.
Nuljuq ngaq bhai halpov naol. Halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel nia-ail. Nuljuq ngal jaol nail bha maq lal nia-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Ngadao juq aivq bhai maq ya moel dai, aivq khaq bha ail nail khi meeq. Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq nee mail jaol ail-a nail tsaol-aq juq jaol nail bha ail khi, Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq juq bhai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq ail nail khi meeq.

‘Nuljuq ngaq bhai halpov naol. Halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel nia-ail. Nuljuq ngal jaol nail bha maq lal nia-ail’ dai, Yeiqsul ge nail neq, khul bhai ge movq nail meeq” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.
Bhaoqaiq lav sav nail haoqnao n-gaol, eeq jaiq nail aqn al n bhai, Yeiqsul thulphaol khi aqthel aqkav kav dai ge nail: “Ulcuvq khal moevq nail tsaol-aq ngal jaol nail bha daol lal yaoq.

Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail juq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aqdoevq bhi doevq nail laoljaol juq il dol leevq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq alhai ge nail neq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq yaqhao ya nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai, ge nail ngaol. Khul khi mail yaqhao ya nail dai ngal-aq, Yeiqsul seiqleiq khaoqsail maq ya haq nail ngel-i mail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail maq jaol lee haq-al.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al gaq maldil nial” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq neq, Khali nial” dai, ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Khali neq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq bhai dov lal naol laiq.

‘Khali neq, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a ngel-i mail, Daqbhil nail jaol duq, Bhaiqlaiqhaiq meenq bhai dov lal naol’ dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul nail ganl nee mail nvq munl pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Teevq pav ganav juq, aivq bhai nieivq movq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aivq bhai maq nieivq nia-al.

Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq-i mail khoel gai-aivq-a nail tsaol-aq al juq, kovq lal-a nail ngaol. “Nuljuq khul khi mail, aivq bhai maq nieil lavq-a nail-aiq” dai, Philma juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq al gaq cavq nail cov nail khe-ai teevq gaq iqsanl, maq cavq maq cov daiq haq-al” dai, tsaol-aq al juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail al juq ge nail: “Nuljuq bhai iqsanl aivq-i mail hevq bheel-aivq lavq-ao nail laiq.
Aqivq aqtsu khi mail Phaqliqsail juq nail lavqkhoel, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail teevq gaq ganav jaol naol laiq.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq teevq peivq-ail maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, iqkhail yavq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha ail daiq-a nail, Nilgaoldiq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq iqsanl, aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Ngadao juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ge nail daoq bhai maq ya gaiq dai, aivq-i mail nl-a nail ganl bhai, maq ya heeq kivq-u kev dai, aivq bhai yalkhaq dal nail aol maq jiav-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Naol iqsanl, Gaqliqlail nail tsaol-aq laiq. Jalliq bhai aqmeeq-ai ge daiq yaoq. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq dov lal daiq-a nail bhai, naol ya moel naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
[Aq-u phao, aqyu juq yovqgavq nail ilkhaol bhai yovqgavq kovq ail-a nail ngaol.]
[Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, Saqloq gaoqjaoq bhai dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Nqhao navqmav-ail, aivq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai gao yavq kha lee khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, aivq jaol nail bha lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq jaoldeel khi aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq khi mail Phaqliqsail juq, yu nee mail bheeq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq bhai moel khi Yeiqsul jaol nail bha hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai gaoltsi-ai hevq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, yaqmai-aq niil gaq, yu nee mail bheeq nail bhai, nvjuq moel khi nieil lavq-a nail ngaol.
Niilheel nail tsaol-aq bhai lovmav-i mail ya liv heivq naol dai, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Naol neq, khalhai ge nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai ge nail neq, Yeiqsul bhai oeqbal thaq nia dai, aivq bhai laonqdaiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul thaoqkovq khi, miltsaq bhai lavqnoil-i mail gevq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, aivq thul lal khi ge nail: “Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel, oeqbal maq aol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, lovmav-i mail aivq bhai iqmoeq liv yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq teevq pov gaoq thaoqkovq khi, miltsaq bhai lavqnoil-i mail gaoq gevq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yeiqsul nail daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, aqkovq jiav jaiq nail gaq nee mail, aqkovq nil jaiq nail gaq bhai kev dai, teevq gaq khai-aq neq, teevq gaq dov gil-ail khi, Yeiqsul teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq iqsanl, a bhai thulphaol nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul thul khi ge nail: “Aqyu juq khaq bha ail gil-aoq nail-aiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, naoq bhai yalkhaq maq dal lavq-al lai laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

“Heeqphaq-ol, ngaq bhai teevq gaq iqsanl yalkhaq maq dal lavq-al” dai, yaqmai-aq al gaq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal iqsanl naoq bhai yalkhaq maq dal. Ail yaoq. Oeqbal thaq gaoq nl ail dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.]

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal neq, miltsaq nail aqbhaq ngaol. Ngaq nail haoqnao lal nail tsaol-aq neq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai maq ya tsao-ail. Aqdoevq bhi doevq nail aqbhaq, aivq jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Phaqliqsail juq, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol neq, naoq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail niil. Naoq nail salkhil neq, maq tsaq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq nail ganl, ngal salkhil khanq khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail salkhil neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal khaq bha nee lee khi, ngal khaq bhai ail nail dai iqsanl, heeq kivq naol. Ngal khaq bha nee lee khi, ngal khaq bhai ail nail dai iqsanl, nuljuq maq heeq nia-ail.
Nuljuq neq, miltsaq yaq yalkhaq dal nail khe-ai, dal nail ngaol. Ngal neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, yalkhaq maq dal.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal yalkhaq dal-ail nul neq, ngal dal nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail maq ngel. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail Aqbhu, ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq nvq gaq salkhil khanq haq neq, salkhil khanq nail al, tsaq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail ganl, ngal salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail Aqbhu iqsanl, ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail Aqbhu khaq bha jaol nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq naldaiq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq neq, ngaq bhai iqsanl, ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail. Nuljuq ngaq bhai heeq nia-ail nul neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai iqsanl, heeq nia naol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai, phuldaq daq duq bhai jaol khi daoq al juq, Yeiqsul cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail yanq maq tsaq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, aivq bhai maq nieivq-al.

Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Ngal lai naol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai halpov khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail oeqbal lavqkhoel bhai ya sil naol. Nuljuq ngal ail nail bhai maq lal nia-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “ ‘Nuljuq ngal lai nail bhai maq lal nia-ail’ dai, aivq ge nail neq, aivq bhai aivq lav heivq nail khi mail meeq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq neq, nqtavq nail kov-uvq khe tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngal neq, nqtavq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Nuljuq neq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, miltsaq bhai maq tavq.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail oeqbal lavqkhoel nee ya sil naol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Ngaq-i mail ge-a nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai al gaq nial dai, nuljuq neema maq thaqtsaol haq neq, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail oeqbal lavqkhoel nee ya sil naol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol khaq sil gaq thoil” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul ge nail: “Iqmoeq-u nee, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngal nuljuq nail ganl ge khi, yalkhaq dal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail mee nia phaq jiav-ai haq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq neq, saljial ivq nail ngaol. Ngal aivq nail daoq ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, miltsaq yaq bhai ge bhiq naol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul-i aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail gaq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaol dai, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai kha thul-u phao, ngal neq al gaq nial dai, nuljuq heeq nia lal naol. Ngal taivq-ail neq, khul maq nl nail nee ovqtavq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail khe-ai taivq-ail, ngal ge nail bhai iqsanl, nuljuq heeq nia lal naol.

Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq, ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail ngaol. Ngal teevq gaq taivq-ail ya jaol dai, aivq ngaq bhai maq khaonq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neema tsaq nail phaq, ngal khaq mao iqsanl nl nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq daoq al daoq ge-u phao, tsaol-aq maodai aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq bhai neema thaq tsaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq ngaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq haq neq, nuljuq ngaq nail yaqlaol maldil pevq lal naol.
Nuljuq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai ya heeq nia lal khi, maldil tsaq nail al phaq neq, nuljuq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Nvjuq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol. Nvjuq yu nail yaqkav teevq pov iqsanl, maq jiovq daiq haq-al. ‘Nuljuq bhai phaiq lavq naol’ dai, naol khalhai ge nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Oeqbal nl nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, oeqbal nail yaqkav ngaol.
Yaqkav neq, ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai khaq mao iqsanl ya jaol nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqyov neq, khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail ngaol.
Yaqyov nuljuq bhai phaiq lavq haq neq, nuljuq yaqkav jiovq nail nee maldil jel-ail nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail daoq bhai maq hav bhoel nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, halpov nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu nee mail jaol-u phao, moel-a nail juq ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl, nuljuq nail Aqbhu-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl nail nial” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aqbhaqlaqhaq neq, nvjuq nail aqbhu ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaq ngel haq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nl nail khe-ai nl nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail maldil pevq nail phaq ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai deeq heivq nail khi halpov nail ngaol. Aqbhaqlaqhaq neq, thailhai maq nl-ail.
Nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail aqbhu nl nail khe-ai nl nail nial” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail: “Nvjuq neq, del yaq maq ngel. Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail nvjuq nail Aqbhu ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Miqyail nuljuq nail Aqbhu ngel haq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai gaiq-a naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail jaol nail nee ngal lee-a nail ngaol. Ngaq nail neenoeq nee lee-a nail maq ngel-ail, aivq ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq-i mail ge nail daoq bhai khul khi mail, nuljuq maq gov heeq nia nail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal cavq nail cov nail daoq bhai nuljuq maq naldaiq nul nail, ngel-i mail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail aqbhu neq, neivq heeqphaq ngaol. Aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq nl movq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, iqmoeq-u nee tsaol-aq bhai lav heivq nail aqheel ngaol. Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai tsaq nail phaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol nail ngel-i mail, tsaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aivq maq jaol nia-ail. Aivq goiqbhaoq bhaoq-u phao, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai pevq nail khe-ai, aivq bhaoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail aqheel pevq khi, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail aqbhu ngaol.
Ngal maldil tsaq nail daoq ge nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Ngaq bhai oeqbal aol-ail nial dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khaq sil gaq tsiqtsoe kivq nail-aiq. Ngal maldil tsaq nail daoq ge nail ngel haq neq, khul khi mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema maq thaq tsaol nail-aiq.

Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee pevq dov lal-a nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq nail naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee pevq dov lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail daoq bhai nuljuq maq naldaiq movq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Naol neq, Saqmaqliv nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl ngel-ail nial dai, nvjuq ge nail neq, tsaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal neivq aol nail tsaol-aq maq ngel. Ngal ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai thaqeeq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, ngaq bhai maq thaqeeq-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, ngal halpov nail maq ngel. Ngaq bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi ya nail dai khi, halpov nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, yalkhaq dal nail gaq ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, teevq thal-iq maq ya sil ail” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Naol neq, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq nial dai, niil aq-il nvjuq heeq kivq duq-ao nail ngaol. Aqbhaqlaqhaq khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq iqsanl, sil gil-aoq nail ngaol. ‘Ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, khaq mao iqsanl maq ya sil-ail’ dai, naol ge nail laiq.

Naol ngadao nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail laiq. Aivq neq, sil-aoq nail ngaol. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq iqsanl sil-a nail ngaol. Naol neq, khaq sil gaq jiovq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, ngal nl haq neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail al neq, teevq peivq-ail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Ngal seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, ngaq nail Aqbhu ganl nl nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq nail Aqbhu al gaq bhai, ‘Aivq neq, nvjuq nail Miqyail ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aivq bhai maq heeq nia-ail. Ngal neq, aivq bhai heeq kivq naol. Ngal iqsanl, aivq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai ge-ai nul neq, ngal iqsanl, nuljuq khe-ai goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq pevq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal aivq bhai heeq kivq khi, aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Ngal lee nail aqn bhai ya moel naol dai, noeq khi, nuljuq nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol. Aivq maldil ya moel khi, lavqkhiq ya tsail-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Naol neq, ngaq tsel kovq maq bhee lal haq-al. Naol Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai moel daiq-ao nail laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Aqbhaqlaqhaq maq doevq lee-u nee mail, ngal jaol nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq lovmav gov khi, aivq bhai liv nail khi ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq maq bhi moel dai, Yeiqsul neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ail thailthaiq-u phao, doevq lee-u nee mail maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, tsaol-aq niil gaq doevq lee-u nee mail, maivpeivq peivq nail neq, khaq sil gaq nail oeqbal bhaqda nee meeq. Aivq nail oeqbal bhaqda nee laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, aivq nail aqbhu aqma nail oeqbal bhaqda nee laiq” dai, aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Aivq nail oeqbal bhaqda nee maq ngel-ail. Aivq nail aqbhu aqma nail oeqbal bhaqda nee iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Miqyail taivq-ail nl nia nail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq bhai aivq nail lavqkhoel nee yu ya moel dai, aivq alhai doevq lee-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail gaq nail ganl bhai, n-gaol phao ngadao ya nl naol. Nqkivq kivq lee haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, ganl maq nl nia-ail.
Ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, ngal miltsaq nail aqbhaq ngaol” dai, ge-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq khi, miltsaq bhai thaiqkhaq thaiqkha khi, cavqnoevq nieivq pevq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsaol-aq al gaq nail maivneev bhai leivq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Silloq dai khul nail ngaqkha bhai, “Maivpuvq puvq haol-ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai khoel-a nail ngaol. Silloq dai ge nail daoqceevq neq, khoel gai-aivq-a nail dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail aivq maivpuvq puvq haol ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq maivneev moel lal khi, kovq lal-a nail ngaol.

Maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq nee mail ilkhaiq tavq nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail, aivq hal jaq hal daol nail bhai moeldaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, jel lal-u phao jaoldeel khi hal jaq hal daol lao nail al gaq maq ngel ail laiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail neq: “Thoil gaq ngaol.”
Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail neq: “Thoil gaq maq ngel-ail. Aivq neq, al gaq khe-ai dul lai nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq ge nail: “Ngal neq, nuljuq ge thailthaiq nail al gaq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Thailhai phal-iq neq, naoq nail maivneev khalhai khi moel lal-a nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Yeiqsul dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq miltsaq bhai thaiqkhaq thaiqkha khi cavqnoevq nieivq pevq khi ngaq nail maivneev bhai leivq lavq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, ‘Silloq dai khul nail ngaqkha bhai maivpuvq puvq haol-ail yaoq’ dai, aivq khoel nail ngel-i mail, ngal puvq haol ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, ngaq nail maivneev moel lal-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Tsaol-aq al gaq khaq bha jaol nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Ngal maq heeq kivq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq, maivpeivq pevq daiq-a nail al gaq bhai Phaqliqsail juq jaol nail bha, hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul cavqnoevq nieivq pevq khi, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai maivneev bhi moel lal-a nail aqn al neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail jaol n n-gaol ngaol.

Aivq maivneev khalhai khi moel lal-a nail ganl, Phaqliqsail juq iqsanl, aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq ge nail: “Aivq ngaq nail maivneev bhai cavqnoevq leivq lavq khi, ngal maivpuvq puvq haol ail-u phao, moel lal-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Phaqliqsail nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq al gaq, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jaol n n-gaol iqsanl, aivq maq lao-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Oeqbal yaq teevq gaq, niilheel nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq, khalhai khi nl nia nail-aiq” dai, ge nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nvq munl pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq bhai: “Naoq nail maivneev bhai bhi moel lal-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq nail ganl, naol khalhai ge heeq” dai, teevq pov gaoq naldaiq-u phao, “Aivq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aqivq juq, maivneev moel lal-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq nail aqbhu aqma bhai maq ya naldaiq-u kev dai, iqmoeq-u aivq maivpeivq peivq khi niil aq-il maivneev moel lal-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ai haq-al.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq nail aqbhu aqma bhai, aqyu juq naldaiq-a nail: “Niil gaq, nul-nq nvq gaq nail yaqyov ngaol laiq. Doevq lee-u nee mail, maivpeivq peivq nail ngaol dai, nul-nq nvq gaq-i mail ge nail neq, niil gaq ngaol laiq. Thailhai phal-iq neq, niil aq-il aivq maivneev khalhai khi moel nia lal-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqbhu aqma ge nail: “Niil gaq neq, nv-nvq gaq nail yaqyov ngaol. Doevq lee-u nee mail maivpeivq peivq nail ngaol dai, nv-nvq gaq heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aivq nail maivneev khalhai khi moel nia lal thaq nail dai, nv-nvq gaq maq heeq kivq. Aivq nail maivneev bhai khaq sil gaq-i mail bhi moel lal-a nail dai iqsanl, nv-nvq gaq maq heeq kivq. Aivq bhai naldaiq yaoq, aivq eeq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq nail ganl, aivq ge daiq lavq nia nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail aqbhu aqma Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, alhai ge-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail, geesil nail dai ngal-aq neq, “Yeiqsul bhai Khali ngaol dai, khal ge nail tsaol-aq bhai, nvjuq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai maq bivq tavq mail the dov naol” dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq-i mail ge ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Aivq eeq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq bhai naldaiq yaoq” dai, aivq nail aqbhu aqma ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Phaqliqsail juq maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq bhai, khul lavq khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail bhai taivq-ail tsiq eeq yaoq. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, oeqbal yaq ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Aivq oeqbal yaq ngel nail, maq ngel nail neq, ngal maq heeq kivq. Teevq phaq taivq-ail ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao ngal maivpeivq peivq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il ngal maivneev moel lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq naoq bhai khalhai lav sav lavq-a nail-aiq. Naoq nail maivneev bhai khalhai khi lav moel lavq-a nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq aivq bhai gaoq naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Aq-il dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maq naldaiq-ail, khul khi mail, nuljuq teevq pov gaoq gaiq movq nail-aiq. Nuljuq iqsanl, aivq nail yaqlaol jiovq movq lal-aoq nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai khaq khaq-ail khi ge nail: “Naol neq, aivq nail yaqlaol nial. Nvjuq neq, Molseiq nail yaqlaol ngaol.
Miqyail Molseiq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lee-a nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al gaq khaq bha nee lal-a nail dai, nvjuq maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq ge nail: “Aivq ngaq nail maivneev bhai bhi moel lal khi ngaol-aoq, aivq khaq bha nee lal-a nail dai, nuljuq maq heeq nia nail neq, noeq-u maq dov-ail nial.

Miqyail neq, oeqbal yaq nail daoq maq naldaiq-ail dai, ngadao heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Miqyail bhai ev khi, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai nl haq neq, Miqyail tsaol-aq al gaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Nq teivq mil teivq teivq-u nee mail, yanqgaol kev dai, doevq lee-u nee mail maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq bhai, maivneev bhi moel lal-a nail ganl, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq gaiq dai haq-al.
Tsaol-aq al gaq Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail maq ngel-ail nul neq, aivq teevq phaq iqsanl, maq nl nia-ail” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail: “Naol neq, oeqbal lavqkhoel bhai doevq lee khi ngaol-aoq, nvjuq bhai cavq lal cov lal nail laiq” dai, ge khi, maivpeivq peivq daiq-a nail al gaq bhai the dov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq bhai yu the dov-a nail ganl Yeiqsul ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul aivq bhai halpov moel-ail khi, “Naol tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai neema thaqtsaol naol laiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, ngal aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol dai, tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, tsaol-aq al gaq naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol aivq bhai ya moel-a nail nee ovqtavq, niil aq-il naoq-ai nee mail daoq ge tsaoq thailthaiq nail gaq neq, aivq ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, ngal neema thaqtsaol naol” dai, ge khi, Yeiqsul bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Maivneev maq moel nia nail tsaol-aq maivneev moel nia lal khi, maivneev moel nia nail tsaol-aq maivpeivq peivq-ail dai, yalkhaq dal nail khi mail miltsaq kovtavq bhai ngal lee-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai, aivq nee mail jaol nail, Phaqliqsail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, “Nvjuq iqsanl maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq laiq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq maldil maivpeivq peivq-ail nul neq, nuljuq oeqbal maq aol-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvjuq maivpeivq maq peivq-ail dai, niil aq-il nuljuq ge nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq oeqbal aol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaol yaol khu bhai aol lal-u phao, govkhoiq nee mail maq aol lal mail, yaoq dao yaoq nee mail dav bhoel lavq nail gaq neq, khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, govkhoiq nee mail aol lal nail gaq neq, yaol lovq nail gaq ngaol.

Govkhoiq bhai lovq nail gaq, aivq bhai lolgov phao bhiq nail ngaol. Yaol juq neq, aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, aivq nail yaol al juq nail aqmil khul khi, yaol al juq bhai hevq dol-aivq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail yaol juq iqsanl mail phaiq dov gil haq neq, yaol juq nail iqmoeq, aivq ail nail ngaol. Yaol juq iqsanl, aivq nail aqthel heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol.

Yaol al juq neq, aqyu juq maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq nail haoqnao maq tsaothe-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq nail aqthel bhai maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, tsaoq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul daoqma uqhuq daoq niil daoq nee mail aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq khalhai ge movq nail dai, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel dei-eiq. Ngal neq, yaol juq aol lal nail govkhoiq ngaol.
Ngaq nail iqmoeq nee lee-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel ngaol. Yaol juq neq, aqyu juq nail daoq maq naldaiq-ail.

Ngal neq, govkhoiq ngaol. Ngaq-ai nee mail khal aol lal nail gaq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq, aol iqsanl aol lai, dov iqsanl dov lee dov lee-ail, gavjaq duq ya moel nail ngaol.

Khoiqbhaoq tsaolpheel neq, khoiq nail, heivq nail, lav cov nail khi taivq-ail lal-a nail ngaol. Ngal neq, yaol juq ya doevq nail nee ovqtavq, doevq nail al teevq bhee teevq lovq ya nia dai, lee-a nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, yaol bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, tsu lovq nail gaq ngaol. Yaol bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, tsu lovq nail gaq neq, yaol juq nail haqbhoil sildan naol.

Gaqmaol maoljaq nail tsaol-aq neq, yaol bhai tsu lovq nail gaq maq ngel nail nee ovqtavq, aivq nail yaol maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, oelnel lal nail bhai ya moel-u phao, yaol juq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi tsaoq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, oelnel al juq neq, yaol juq bhai keivq keivq-ail, the pav the sav gil nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq, gaqmaol maoljaq nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail pevq khi, yaol juq nail haqbhoil khul iqsanl maq saol-nvq dai, aivq tsaoq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, yaol bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, tsu lovq nail gaq ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai heeq nia khi, ngal iqsanl Aqbhu Miqyail bhai heeq kivq nail khe-ai, ngaq nail yaol juq bhai ngal heeq kivq naol. Ngaq nail yaol juq iqsanl, ngaq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Ngal yaol juq nail haqbhoil ngaq nail aqmaol av bhiq khi sildan naol.

Yaol yaol khu niil khu bhai, maq tavq nail yaol yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl ngal jaol-aiq haq naol. Yaol al juq bhai iqsanl ngal ya hevq ail haq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, yaol teevq munl taivq-ail pevq lal khi, yaol bhai tsu lovq nail aqheel iqsanl teevq gaq taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol.
Ngal gaoq doevq kovq lal dai, ngaq nail aqmaol av bhiq khi sildan nail ngel-i mail, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail doevq nail phaq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq luv dov nia-ail. Ngal neema kev nail lavqkhoel, sildan naol. Ngal sildan nail bhaqaoq khi mail gaoq doevq kovq lal nail bhaqaoq jiav nail ngaol. Alhai nl dai, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq lavq-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail daoq al juq bhaqda nee, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nvq munl pav ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq ge nail: “Aivq neq, neivq aol khi naiquq uq ail-aoq thaq nail niil. Nuljuq khul khi mail, aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail-aiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Aivq nail daoq neq, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq nail daoq maq ngel-il. Neivq neq, maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq bhai maivneev bhi moel lal nia nail laiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yanq al yanq neq, aqcoevq coevq nail yanq ngaol. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma av bhiq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav nail ngaol.
Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail, Saollavmoq nail gaqnaq yavqtsoel lavqkhoel bhai Yeiqsul tsao thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq jaol nail bhai jil lal khi ge nail: “Naol nvjuq bhai khal ngel nail khe-ai maq ge lavq dai, khaq mao kev dai bhi haq lavq nail-aiq. Nvjuq bhai daolcoev dai, ge lavq yaoq. Naol Meiqsilya

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq gaq jel-aoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail. Ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai juq khi ngaq-i mail nl-a nail ganl juq, ngaq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq ngaq nail yaol maq ngel-ail.
Ngaq nail yaol juq neq, ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai ngal heeq kivq khi, aqyu juq ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ngal bivq khi, aqyu juq teevq thal-iq maq ya luq maq ya seil-ail yaoq-aol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai ngaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee mail maq luv dov nia-ail.

Yaol al juq ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail gaq pevq nail, ngaq nail Aqbhu neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai eeq jaiq nail ngaol. Ngaq nail Aqbhu heldaiq nail kov-uvq bhai aqyu juq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq luv dov nia-ail.
Aqbhu khi ngal neq, teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol” dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq lovmav oil khi, aivq bhai liv-aiq nail khi mail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aqbhu-i mail bhi nl lavq-a nail, meeq nail ganl mee nia phaq ngal nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai nl gaq-ao nail ngaol. Ganl al juq nail lavqkhoel, ganl khul phaq bhaqda nee, nuljuq ngaq bhai lovmav-i mail liv nail dai khi, gaoq lainq nail-aiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Naol ganl aqmeeq phaq nl-a nail bhaqda nee, naoq bhai lovmav-i mail liv nail khi maq ngel. Naol Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail ngel-i mail, liv nail khi ngaol. Al ovqtavq, naol tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail jiovq-il” dai, Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Nuljuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai, nuljuq neq, Miqyail juq ngaol dai, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq teevq dao gevq-ai thaq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail aivq nail daoq bhi gaiq ail-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, miqyail juq dai khul nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail tsel dov khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail al gaq, ‘Ngal Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngel-i mail, ‘Naol Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail niil’ dai, nuljuq ge nail laiq.
Ngal ngaq nail Aqbhu nail ganl maq nl haq neq, ngaq bhai neema thaq thaqtsaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal ngaq nail aqbhu nail ganl nl haq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i mail nl-a nail ganl juq bhai neema thaq tsaol yaoq. Alhai neema thaqtsaol haq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, ngal iqsanl Aqbhu Miqyail nail lavqkhoel jaol-ail nial dai, nuljuq ya heeq ya moel naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq nail khi, gaoq laijai-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu bhai maq bhi nieivq dai, jel ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq-i mail ulcuvq iqmoeq ilmoeq saol bhiq-a nail, Yaoldaq laoljaol a phao lelkhel bhai, Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq ail khi, a bhai jaol ail-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq mee nia gaq aivq jaol nail bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ge nail: “Yaolhaq neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niil gaq nail ganl, Yaolhaq-i mail khal ge-ai thaq nail iqsanl, tsaq-ail nial” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul al bhai jaol-u phao, tsaol-aq mee nia gaq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai jaol nail, Laqsaqlul dai mil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq nal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Bheiqtaqnil julgu neq, Maqlil khi mail aivq nail aqivq Maqtha aqyu nvq mail jaol nail julgu al gu ngaol.

Maqlil neq, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil bhai huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq hoel dav khi, aivq nail tsailkheel-i mail siv bhiq-a nail yaqmai-aq al gaq ngaol. Nal thailthaiq nail Laqsaqlul neq, Maqlil nail jaqbheq ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, naoq-i mail gaiq-a nail gaq nal-ai bhiq nail ngaol” dai, Maqlil khi Maqtha aqyu nvq mail Yeiqsul jaol nail bha, bhi cavq gaiq lai-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al daoq bhai Yeiqsul ya gaiq-u phao, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Nal nail al neq, sil heeq phaq-ail nal kav khoeq nail nalgoel maq ngel-ail. Nal nail al bhaqda nee, Miqyail seiqleiq khaoqsail ya khi, Miqyail nail Yaqyov iqsanl, al bhaqda nee seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqtha, Maqlil, Laqyaqlul aqyu hail mail bhai, Yeiqsul gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Laqyaqlul nal nail ganl, Yeiqsul ya gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, lavqtsail mail maq lai mail. Aivq-i mail jaol nail bhai nvq n gaoq jaol-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngadao Yuldav milkhaoq bha kovq ail bhel” dai, yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Saqlaq-ol, milgaol sinqgaol bhai, a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq, naoq bhai lovmav-i mail liv nail dai khi, maq ngel-ail laiq. Naol a bhai gaoq kovq ail nail khi laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Teevq n lavqkhoel, naqli tsel-nvq lavq jiav nail maq ngel-ail laiq. N-gaol phao khal tsao nail tsaol-aq neq, miltsaq nail aqbhaq bhaq nail ngel-i mail, phaqthiq maq thiq lai-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqkiv phao tsao haq neq, aivq nail lavqkhoel phao aqbhaq maq aol nail ngel-i mail, phaqthiq thiq lai nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq khi, teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Ngadao nail aqtsaoq Laqsaqlul iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal ail khi lav noeq-ail bhiq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, aivq iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail teevq-eel phal-iq neq, meeq lai nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge movq nail neq, Laqsaqlul sil-aoq nail ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol juq neq, aivq maldil iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail ngaol dai, gov heeq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai daolcoev dai, ge bhiq-a nail: “Laqsaqlul sil-aoq nail ngaol.

Ngal Laqsaqlul nee mail maq jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail haqbhoil lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ganl al bhaqda nee, nuljuq ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal nail ngaol. Niil aq-il ngadao juq aivq jaol nail bha ail bhel” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq pov taivq-ail nvq gaq doevq lee-a nail Tholmav dai khul nail gaq, aivq nail aqtsaoq yaqlaol juq bhai ge bhiq nail: “Ngadao juq iqsanl saqlaq nee teevq gaq khe-ai ail khi, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai sil naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul kev lee-u phao, Laqyaqlul duqpheeq thaq nail, liq n bhee lal-aoq thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqtaqnil julgu neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail nvq lal bhai jiav nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maodai Maqtha khi Maqlil jaol nail bha lal khi, aqyu nvq gaq nail jaqbheq sil-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq mail bhai gaq bivq nail dai khi, jil lal thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul lee thaq nail ganl ya gaiq-u phao, Maqtha dov ail khi hav laq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao Maqlil gaq neq, ilkhaol bhai jaol nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Maqtha Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol niai jaol-ail ceevq-a nul neq, ngaq nail jaqbheq Laqsaqlul maq sil-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il iqsanl, naol khal hal nail phaq bhai Miqyail naoq bhai nl bhiq naol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naoq nail jaqbheq Laqsaqlul gaoq doevq kovq lal naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqtha ge nail: “Miltsaq niil daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal neq, doevq kovq lal nail phaq khi aqdoevq doevq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol haq neq, sil khi ngaol-aoq, doevq-ai haq nail ngaol.
Aqdoevq doevq-u phao, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, teevq thal iqsanl, maq ya sil-ail dai. Ngaq nail daoq bhai naol neema thaqtsaol naol laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqtha ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, ngal neema thaqtsaol naol. Naol neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai lee nail, Miqyail nail Yaqyov Khali ngaol dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqtha alhai ge gaq-u phao, Maqlil jaol nail bha ail khi, “Saqlaq kev lee khi, naoq bhai khul thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, aqtsi tsu dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Daoq al daoq bhai Maqlil ya gaiq-u phao, lavqtsail mail tsaoq thul khi, Yeiqsul bhai hav laq ail-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, julgu bhai maq aol lee dai, Maqtha bhai thaoqphuq-a nail dao bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.
