Maqlil nail ilkhaol bha lee khi, gaq bivq lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl, Maqlil lavqtsail mail tsaoq thul khi, dov ail nail bhai ya moel-u phao, tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq luqdaol bha ail khi, nioilkhaoq khaoq-ail nail khul-il dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol.

Maqlil Yeiqsul jaol nail bha ail kev khi, aivq bhai ya moel-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, naol niai jaol-ail nul neq, ngaq nail jaqbheq Laqsaqlul maq sil-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil neq, nioil thailthaiq khi, Maqlil nee mail lee-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl nioil nail bhai, Yeiqsul ya moel-u phao, aivq nail neema bhai yao deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq aivq bhai, khaq bha duqpheeq ail-a nail-aiq” dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai naldaiq-u phao, “Heeqphaq-ol, lee khi heldaiq lee yaoq” dai, aqyu juq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nioil-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Heldaiq yaoq. Aivq Laqsaqlul bhai khadai gaiq-a nail ngel-ail” dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq ge nail: “Maivpeivq bhai maivneev moel nia lal dai, aivq nl nia nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Laqsaqlul maq ya sil dai, aivq maq nl bhiq nia-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail neema bhai gaoq yao deedee lal bhiq khi, luqdaol bha ail-a nail ngaol. Luqdaol al neq lovmav lov khaoq pevq khi luqdaol al nail moeqkhoeq bhai lovmav ngaoq tsoiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Lovmav ngaoq ha yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Sil-a nail gaq nail aqivq pevq nail Maqtha ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, aivq aqbuvq aqnil nil lal-aoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq bhai duq pheeq-a nail, liq n bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol neema thaqtsaol haq neq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ya moel nail ngaol dai, ngal naoq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq lovmav ngaoq ha-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul nqtavq phao gaollel khi ge nail: “Aqbhu-ol, ngaq nail hal daoq bhai naol naldaiq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, naoq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Naol ngaq nail hal daoq bhai khaq mao iqsanl, naldaiq naol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal hal nail niil neq, niai khe jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Ngaq bhai naoq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol lal dai, hal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq-u phao: “Laqsaqlul-ol, dov lee yaoq” dai, mailma-ail gul nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Laqsaqlul dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aqkhil aqlavq bhai maoltoev toev-ai thaq khi, maivphaoq bhai lavqsiv-i mail lee cuvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Aivq bhai maoltoev pheel ha bhiq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil jaol nail bha lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maodai, Yeiqsul-i mail alhai nl-a nail bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, Phaqliqsail jaol nail bha kovq lai khi, Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail ganl al juq bhai, ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi Phaqliqsail juq neq, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma bhai khul jil khi, “Ngadao khalhai khi heeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aivq bhai alhai taivq-ail nl nl-ail bhi jaol haq neq, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol gil lal nail ngaol. Alhai pevq lal haq neq, Lolmav nail tsaol-aq juq lal khi, ngadao nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma khi ngadao nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai lav luq lav seil lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe, Gaqyaqphal dai khul nail, aq-u kovq Philma aqivq jiovq-ai thaq nail gaq ge nail: “Nuljuq neq, khul iqsanl maq heeq nia-il.

Tsaol jeq-e teevq jeq-e jeq lao-ail maq ya luq maq ya seil-ail nail haqbhoil, tsaol-aq teevq gaq tsaol jeq-e nail haqbhoil sildan nail neq, meeq jaiq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq bhai maq gov heeq lal-ail laiq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al daoq neq, aivq bhai aivq noeq dov khi ge nail maq ngel-ail. Aq-u kovq, aivq Philma aqivq gaq jiovq thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul neq, jeq-e niil jeq-e nail haqbhoil sildan nail ngaol dai, Miqyail nail daoq gedan nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail maq ngel mail, miltsaq doi dai bhi the peiv-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq teevq munl taivq-ail gaoq bhi jil lal nail haqbhoil, aivq ya sildan nail ganl gedan nail iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol.
Aq-u n-gaol nee dan khi, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai heivq nail haqbhoil lainq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Yuldav milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai yu moel nail bhai maq tsao dai pevq-ail khi, haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal nail aqjail bha jiav nail, Eilphaqleiq meenq bha ail khi, yaqlaol juq nee mail a bhai jaol ail-a nail ngaol.

Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail aqjail jail lal-a nail ngel-i mail, bhaoqaiq maq lav sav-u phao nee, aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl lai nail haqbhoil, daoltavq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai halpov halpov-ail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai jil lai khi jaol-u phao, “Nuljuq bhai khalhai noeq nail-aiq. Aivq bhaoqaiq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai maq lal nail neq, aqduq bhao nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul jaol nail bhai khal moel nail tsaol-aq, Philma juq khi Phaqliqsail juq bhai ya cavq gaiq lal nail ngaol dai, daoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq miv kivq dai, daoq alhai bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Bhaqsaqkhaq maq kev lal nail kovq n jiav-u phao, aivq-i mail bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail Laqyaqlul al gaq jaol nail Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai Yeiqsul lai-a nail ngaol.
A bhai, aivq bhai aoqbhaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Maqtha gaq neq, aoq laoq jal laoq laoq nail gaq jiovq khi, Laqsaqlul gaq neq, kovqkhail bhai Yeiqsul nee mail aoq jaoq jaoq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao Maqlil neq, aqphoiq mao-ail phoiq nail naqdul dai khul nail, huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel hail khanl tsiq khi, Yeiqsul nail aqkhil bhai leivq bhiq khi, aivq nail uqhuq tsailkheel-i mail siv bhiq-a nail ngaol. Huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel al ilkhaol teevq il il lao-ail, huqbhiq nil deedee nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq nail lavqkhoel khe, haoqnao Yeiqsul bhai gaoq jaq-a nail Yuldav Ilsaqgaqliqoq al gaq, niailhai ge nail ngaol:
“Huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel thoil cavq hail yal bavq nee gaoq khi, haq nail aoq nail juq bhai, khul khi mail, maq bhoil bhiq ail nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Haq nail aoq nail juq nail haqbhoil saol-nvq khi, aivq alhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq neq, khoiqbhaoq teevq gaq ngel-i mail alheel nail daoq ge nail ngaol. Aivq neq, phul baivluvq thaoq nail gaq pevq khi, al nail lavqkhoel khe phul khoiq daiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aivq bhai teevq phaq iqsanl thaq lav tsoiq lai. Ngaq bhai duqpheeq nail haqbhoil aivq huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq niil cavq lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Haq nail aoq nail juq neq, nuljuq nee khaq mao iqsanl jaol naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, nuljuq nee khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail, maq ngel-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Bheiqtaqnil julgu bhai jaol nail ganl, tsaol-aq maodai ya gaiq khi, a bhai lai-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul bhai moel movq nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail lai-a nail iqsanl, maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul-i mail bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail Laqsaqlul bhai iqsanl, moel movq nail ngel-i mail, lai-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Philma juq Laqyaqlul bhai iqsanl, heivq nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, aivq sil khi gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail bhaqda nee, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maodai aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq nail bha lal-a nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq, Yeiqsul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lal thailthaiq nail ganl, ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq dal-aol lavqmeiv bavq khi, aivq bhai hav lavq ail nail dai khi, niailhai gul gul-ail dov ail-a nail ngaol:
“Hoqsaqnaq!
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
aqmil kov-uvq nee
lee nail gaq
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e nail Heeqphaq
geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq” dai,
aqyu juq gul nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail jiav nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul moeqphaq laljieiv maol yaq teevq maol halpov moel khi jeeq nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Yeel-ovq Yaqmiq-ol
thaq geesil.
Naoq nail Heeqphaq
moeqphaq laljieiv
maol yaq jeeq khi
lee thailthaiq nail bhai,
heldaiq yaoq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq nail yaqlaol juq ganl al, maq heeq nia-ai haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul seiqleiq khaoqsail ya gaq-u phao, aivq nail ganl alhai gevq-ai thaq nail bhai maqkhaiq, yu aivq bhai alhai nl bhiq nail bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq noeq dov lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Laqsaqlul bhai luqdaol lavqkhoel nee khul dol lavq khi, bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail bhai moel-a nail tsaol-aq juq, aqyu juq-i mail ya moel-a nail khe-ai, yu bhai ge daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl al munl Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail phaq noeq-u maq dov nail ganl al, ya gaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai hav laq lai-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Phaqliqsail juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ge pheeljaq nail: “Heldaiq. Ngadao juq-i mail noeq-ai thaq nail phaq maq nl pevq kivq yaoq-aol. Miltsaq yaq iqsanl aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-ao nail ngaol” dai, ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha uqhuq thaoq lai-a nail juq nail lavqkhoel bhai, Heiqlaqsal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl kheq nail ngaol.
Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq al juq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq Bheiqjeildaq meenq bhai jaol nail Pillilpuv jaol nail bha ail khi, “Saqlaq-ol, nvjuq Yeiqsul bhai moel movq-il” dai, ge bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Pillilpuv Aqdaiqlaiq bhai tsaoq ail khi, aqyu nvq gaq teevq gaq khe-ai Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail aqyanq kev lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Ngal nul-nq nvq gaq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Aqiq aqneev teevq neev neq, miltsaq bhai ga ail khi maq sil-u kev dai, aqiq aqneev teevq neev teevq-eel ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqiq aqneev al neev sil-u phao, aqiq aqneev maodai gaoq mao lal nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq neq, doevq nail phaq sunq ail nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq-u phao, yovqgavq nail doevq nail phaq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail haqbhoil ganl nl movq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq nail haoqnao ya tsaothel lavq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail yaqkav neq, ngal khal jaol nail bha ya jaol nail ngaol. Ngaq nail ganl khal nl nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngaq nail Aqbhu thaqeeq thaqheel bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngaq nail neema haqaoq nl deedee-ail nial. Khalhai ge heeq dai, maq heeq lal-il. ‘Aqbhu-ol, aqyanq niil yanq ngaq nail kovtavq bhai maq yaq kev lee’ dai, ge haq neq, meeq-ail meeq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil nail haqbhoil ngal lee-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Aqbhu-ol, naoq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhiq moel yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqtavq nee daoq ge dov-ai leevq-a nail: “Ngaq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai moel gaq-ao nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pov gaoq bhi moel-ai haq naol” dai, ge-ai leevq thaq nail ngaol.

A bhai thulphaol thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma aqthel al thel bhai ya gaiq-u phao, teevq pav ganav juq neq, “Nqjaiq jaiq nail niil” dai, ge khi, teevq pav ganav juq neq, “Nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lee thaq nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Daoq niailhai ge dov-ai lee-a nail neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq nail haqbhoil ngaol.
Niil aq-il miltsaq bhai yalkhaq dal nail aqyanq tsaq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il miltsaq niilniai uvthaiq nail gaq bhai, bhi the ha nail ngaol.
Miltsaq niil nail kovtavq bhai ngaq bhai kha thul lavq-u phao, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee ngal jaol nail bha lal dai, ngal he naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge nail neq, aivq khalhai ya sil nail ganl, ge movq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq ge nail: “Nvjuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai, ‘Meiqsilya neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail ngaol’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov bhai bhi kha thul nail ngaol dai, naol khalhai ge nail-aiq. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov al gaq neq, khaq sil gaq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aqbhaq neq, nuljuq jaol nail bha niil aq-il teevq yanq taivq-ail bhaq nail ngaol. Aqbhaq khal bhaq-u kev dai, tsao yaoq. Maq ngel haq neq, aqnav nuljuq bhai the kheel lal nail ngaol. Aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai tsao nail tsaol-aq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq khaq bha ail nail dai iqsanl, maq heeq nia-ail.

Nuljuq jaol nail bhai aqbhaq bhaq-u phao, nuljuq aqbhaq nail yaq pevq lal dai, aqbhaq bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai ge gaq-u phao, aqyu juq maq jaol nail bha dov ail khi jaol ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai noeq-u maq dov nail phaq a dai dai-ail nl daiq bhi khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.
Aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol nail al neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq, bhee lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq ge nail:
“Heeqphaq-ol,
nvjuq ge nail daoq bhai
khaq sil gaq
neema thaqtsaol nail-aiq.
Miqyail nail bhaqaoq
khaq sil gaq bhai
phaodaiq bhiq nail-aiq” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq maldil neema maq thaqtsaol nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Ilsaqyal niailhai gaoq ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Tsaol-aq niil juq
neema gaol khi,
naqkov aqthul
bhi thul lal khi,
maivneev maivpeivq
lav peivq bhiq yaoq.
Alhai maq lav
sav bhiq haq neq,
aqyu juq maivneev
moel nia khi,
naqkhaol gaiq nia
lal nail nee ovqtavq,
neema lavqkhoel bhai
gov heeq nia
lal nail ngel-i mail,
ngal jaol nail bhai
kovq lal khi,
ngal aqyu juq bhai
bhi meeq
lai nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqyal-i mail alhai ge-ai thaq nail al neq, Yeiqsul nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai aivq ya moel khi, aivq nail ganl ge-ai thaq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq maodai jaol nail ngaol. Alhai neema thaqtsaol khi ngaol-aoq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai maq bhi tavq lavq dai, Phaqliqsail juq the ha lal nail bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, bhaqlaoq kheq dai maq ge dov tseq-ail.
Miqyail-i mail tsiqeeq bhiq nail nee maqtsil, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail tsiqeeq bhiq nail phaq bhai, aqyu juq oil movq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqthel aqkav kav dai ge nail: “Ngaq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai taivq-ail neema thaqtsaol nail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai iqsanl, neema thaqtsaol nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Ngaq bhai moel-a nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai moel-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Ngaq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai maq ya jaol dai, aqbhaq khe-ai miltsaq niil nail kovtavq bhai, ngal yavq kha lee-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail daoq gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngal yalkhaq maq dal. Miltsaq bhai yalkhaq dal lee nail khi ngal lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Hevqkovq lee nail dai khi, lee-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai maq hav bhoel-ail, ngaq nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail dao jiav nail ngaol. Miltsaq niil daoq loi loi lai-u n-gaol, ngaq-i mail ge jel lavq-a nail daoq niil juq, aivq bhai yalkhaq dal nail ngaol.
Ngal ngaq nail neenoeq tsaq dai, teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge-ail. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail, ngal khalhai ya ge ya thail nail dai, aivq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq-i mail bivq-ai leevq-a nail daoq lavqkhoel bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq aol naol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq-i mail ge nail daoq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail ngaq bhai bhi ge lavq-a nail daoq ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq maq kev lal nail iqmoeq-u n-gaol, aivq miltsaq niilniai nee gaoq ail khi, Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha ya kovq lai nail aqyanq tsaq lal-aoq nail ganl, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq-ai jaol nail aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai aivq gaiq-a khi, haoqnao naosaq-u n-gaol kev dai, gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul khi aivq nail yaqlaol juq aoqkivq jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Silmoq Ilsaqgaqliqoq nail yaqyov Yuldav nail neema lavqkhoel bhai, Yeiqsul bhai gaoq jaq movq nail neema, neivq heeqphaq-i mail oil bhoel bhiq gaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail, Yeiqsul bhai bhaqaoq teevq bhee bivq-ai thaq nail ganl Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngaol. Aivq Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha nee lee khi, Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha ya kovq lai nail ganl iqsanl, heeq nia nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq kovqkhail nee thulphaol lal khi, kovtavq khe phailkhaoq heelma loev khi, aqjiovq bhai lavqsiv pheethaiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, maiqgaoq thailphail phail ma bhai, ulcuvq hoel bhoel khi, yaqlaol juq nail aqkhil tsiq bhiq khi, aqjiovq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail lavqsiv-i mail siv gee bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv jaol nail bha kev ail-u phao, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol ngaq nail aqkhil bhai tsiq lavq nail dai khi laiq” dai, Silmoq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nl thailthaiq nail ganl niilniai, niil aq-il naol maq gov heeq nia-ail haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqhao heeq kivq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Naoq-i mail ngaq nail aqkhil bhai teevq thal-iq maq bhiq tsiq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naoq nail aqkhil bhai ngal maq ya tsiq bhiq haq neq, naol ngaq-ai nee maq tavq-ail” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, thailhai phal-iq neq, ngaq nail aqkhil taivq-ail maq ngel dai, aqlavq khi uqhuq iqsanl tsiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Aqmaol jiivq gaq-a nail tsaol-aq, aqhaol ngel-i mail, aqkhil maq ngel nail neq, tsiq nail maq loq-ail. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq maq ngel nail neq, iqsanl aqhaol ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul gaq aivq bhai gaoqjaq nail ganl bhai, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, “Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe, teevq gaq maq ngel nail neq iqsanl, aqhaol ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail aqkhil tsiq gaq gil-u phao, phailkhaoq heelma gaoq doi kovq khi, aivq nail jaol duq bhai aoq jaoq gaoq jaoq lai khi, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Nuljuq bhai ngaq-i mail nl bhiq-a nail niil, nuljuq gov heeq lal-ail laiq.

Nuljuq ngaq bhai, saqlaq-ol, Heeqphaq-ol, dai khul nail ngaol. Nuljuq alhai khul nail, tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal neq, nuljuq-i mail khul nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail saqlaq khi Heeqphaq pevq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail Heeqphaq khi nuljuq nail saqlaq pevq nail ngal neq, nuljuq nail aqkhil bhai tsiq bhiq gaq-ao nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqkhil ya tsiq bhiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq ngaq bhai heldaiq khi nl tsao nia dai, ngal nuljuq bhai nl dai bhiq gaq-ao nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yaqkav neq, yovqgavq nail ilheel nee maqtsil maq eeq-ail. Khoel-ai leevq nail bhai ya daq-a nail gaq iqsanl, khoel nail gaq nee maqtsil maq eeq-ail.
Niil aq-il ganl niil juq, nuljuq heeq nia gil-aoq nail ngaol. Heeq kivq-a nail khe-ai, nl haq neq, nuljuq khadai geeqlaoq eeq nail ngel-ail.

Nuljuq iqsanl nail ganl, ngal ge thailthaiq nail maq ngel. Ngaq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail, ‘Ngaq-ai nee mail jaltsoiq maiqgaoq teevq gaoq bhai tavq khi jaq nail gaq, ngaq bhai gaoqjaq nail ngaol’ dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq ya bhee lal nail ngaol.
Ganl al maldil pevq lal-u phao, ngaq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, ngal neq, Meiqsilya ngel lao thaq nial dai, nuljuq heeq nia dai, maq pevq lal-u phao nee mail, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq-i mail khoel gai-aivq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai hav nail gaq neq, ngaq bhai hav nail khe-ai dul khi, ngaq bhai khal hav nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai iqsanl, hav nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq-u phao, aivq nail neema haqaoq nl deedee nail lavqkhoel, niailhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ge dov bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq, ngaq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq heldaiq heldaiq-ail, “Aivq khaq sil gaq bhai ge movq nail meeq” dai, kalkav-ai kav lai-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaqlaol teevq gaq, Yeiqsul bhai laiq dal khi iqthaiq nail ngaol.
Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv-i mail yaqlaol al gaq bhai aqlavq dao bhiq khi, “Khaq sil gaq bhai ge movq nail-aiq dai, teevq pov naldaiq daiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqlaol al gaq, Yeiqsul jaol nail phao gaolgai khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, khaq sil gaq bhai ge movq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal khaqmul oil khi jaltsoiq bhai thaoqsoil khi bivq naol. Ngaq-i mail bivq nail al gaq neq, ngaq-i mail ge nail al gaq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq khaqmul oil khi, jaltsoiq bhai thaoqsoil khi, Silmoq Ilsaqgaqliqoq nail yaqyov Yuldav bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.

Khaqmul al bhai Yuldav oil gaq-al ngal neq, neivq Saqdaq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol. “Naoq-i mail nl nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai lavqtsail mail nl-ail yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail Yeiqsul aivq bhai alhai ge bhiq nail meeq dai, kovqkhail bhai aoq jaoq jaoq nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq neq, maq heeq nia-ail.

Yuldav neq, phul baivluvq aqheel thaoq-nq thaq nail gaq ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul aivq bhai khoel khi, Bhaoqaiq lav sav nail lavqkhoel bhai yuq nail phaq maq ngel haq neq, haq yaq aoq yaq bhai bivq nail teevq phaq ganav bhi ul ail nail khul-il dai, yaqlaol teevq gaq ganav juq, noeq nail ngaol.
Yuldav neq, khaqmul al khoeq oil khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Yanq al yanq neq, hul-iq tsilma ngaol.
Yuldav dov ail jel-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Niil aq-il Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov seiqleiq khaoqsail ya-aoq nail ngaol. Miqyail iqsanl aivq bhaqda nee seiqleiq khaoqsail ya-a nail ngaol.
Aivq bhaqda nee Miqyail seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail phal-iq neq, Miqyail iqsanl, Yaqyov bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq nail ngaol. Aivq teevq pov taivq-ail alhai nl nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq nee mail maodai maq ya jaol yaoq-aol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai halpov nail ngaol. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aqivq juq bhai ngaq-i mail ge bhiq-a nail daoq al, ngal nuljuq bhai gaoq ge lavq bhel. Ngal lai nail jaol duq bhai nuljuq maq lal nia-ail.
Niil aq-il, ngal nuljuq bhai daoq aqsivq teevq daoq bivq-ail ceevq naol. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a nail phaq aol haq neq, nuljuq ngaq nail yaqlaol nial dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail heeq nia nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol khaq bha lai nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-u phao, Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq-i mail lai nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail bhai naol niil aq-il nee mail maq tsaothel lavq nia ail haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqhao neq, tsaothel lavq kivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, khul khi mail, ngal naoq nail haoqnao niil aq-il nee mail maq tsaothel lavq kivq nail-aiq. Ngal naoq nail haqbhoil sildan tseq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naol ngaq nail haqbhoil maldil sildan tseq naol laiq. Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Yavphoil maq doil lal nail gaiqlaq bhai, ngaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail dai, hail pov bhee dai, naol jil nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail neema bhai haqaoq thaq nl. Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq, ngaq bhai iqsanl neema thaqtsaol yaoq.

Ngaq nail Aqbhu nail ilkhaol bhai jaol duq jiav gao nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil jaol duq lav sav lai naol. Jaol duq maq jiav-ail nul neq, maq jiav-ail dai, ngal daolcoev dai, ge bhiq nail ngaol.
Ngal jaol duq lav sav gaq-u phao, nuljuq bhai gaoq hevq lee khi, ngaq-ai nee mail bhi jaol lal naol.
Ngal lai nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail jaol duq al dao nail gailkhaol bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tholmav ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol khaq bha lai nail-aiq dai, nvjuq maq heeq kivq-ail. Naol lai nail jaol duq al dao nail gailkhaol bhai, nvjuq khalhai khi ya heeq kivq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal neq, gailkhaol pevq naol. Maldil tsaq nail phaq pevq khi aqdoevq doevq nail phaq iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai maq juq haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha maq kev lai nia-ail.

Ngal khaq sil gaq dai, nuljuq heeq nia-ail nul neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu khaq sil gaq dai iqsanl, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Yanqgaol nee pultavq neq, nuljuq aivq bhai aqmeeq-ai ya heeq ya moel-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Pillilpuv ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq bhai Aqbhu Miqyail bhi moel lavq yaoq. Aivq bhai ya moel haq neq, nvjuq neekhaol sil naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal nuljuq nee mail niidai jaol kel lavq khi ngaol-aoq, Pillilpuv, naol ngaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ai haq-al laiq. Ngaq bhai khal ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai ya moel-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. ‘Nvjuq bhai Aqbhu Miqyail bhi moel lavq yaoq’ dai, khul khi mail ge nail-aiq.

Aqbhu Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal jaol khi, ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai Aqbhu Miqyail jaol naol dai, Pillilpuv, naol neema maq thaqtsaol-ail laiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail daoq niil juq neq, ngaq nail neenoeq nee ge nail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail Aqbhu Miqyail ganl nl nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Ngal Aqbhu Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail bhai, neema thaqtsaol yaoq. Maq ngel haq neq, ngaq-i mail nl-a nail juq bhaqda nee, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, ngaq-i mail nl-a nail ganl al juq nl nail ngaol. Ngal ngaq nail Aqbhu jaol nail bha kovq lai nail ngel-i mail, niidai nee maqtsil eeq nail juq iqsanl, aivq nl nail ngaol.
Aqbhu Miqyail neq, Yaqyov bhaqda nee seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, nuljuq ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq khi, khal hal nail iqsanl mail, ngal bhi pevq lal naol.
Nuljuq ngaq nail aqmil bhai juq khi teevq phaq ganav hal haq neq, nuljuq-i mail hal nail khe-ai, ngal bhi pevq lal naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq ngaq bhai gaiq-a haq neq, ngaq-i mail bivq-a nail daoq juq bhai, naldaiq nail ngaol.
Ngal Aqbhu Miqyail bhai hal nail khi ngaol, ngal hal nail khe-ai, khaq mao iqsanl, nuljuq nee mail bhi jaol nail dai khi, nuljuq bhai Tsaojao-ai nail gaq, Aqbhu Miqyail nuljuq bhai bivq lavq naol.

Aivq neq, Miqyail nail ganl maldil tsaq nail phaq phaodaiq bhiq nail gaq pevq nail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq juq aivq bhai neema lavqkhoel bhai maq hav bhoel nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq aivq bhai maq heeq nia, maq moel daiq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aivq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngaol-aoq neq, aivq nuljuq nee mail jaol khi, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai aqbhu aqma maq bhao nail yaqtsiq khe-ai khaonq-ail ceevq nail maq ngel-ail. Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha gaoq kovq lee naol.
Teevq yanq lal yanq nail lavqkhoel, Miltsaq yaq ngaq bhai maq ya moel yaoq-aol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai ya moel nail ngaol. Ngal doevq nail bhaqda nee, nuljuq iqsanl ya doevq nail ngaol.

Aqn al n kev lee-u phao, ngal Aqbhu Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, ngal nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail bhai, nuljuq ya heeq kivq duq nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai ya gaiq khi, naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngaq bhai khal gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngaq nail Aqbhu gaiq-a nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai gaiq-a khi, ngaq nail aqmaol aqyu juq bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bhi moel nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav Ilsaqgaqliqoq maq ngel nail, Yuldav dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naoq nail aqmaol nvjuq bhai ya bhi moel nail bhai, khul khi mail, miltsaq yaq juq bhai maq bhi moel kivq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, ngaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail ngaol. Alhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngaq nail Aqbhu gaiq-a khi, ngaq nail Aqbhu nv-nvq gaq aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai jaol lee nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai maq gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, ngaq nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq-ail. Nuljuq-i mail ya gaiq thailthaiq nail daoq niil juq neq, ngaq nail daoq maq ngel-ail. Ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail nail daoq ngaol.
Niil aq-il ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, daoq niil juq nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai tsaojao-ai nail gaq dai khul nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, ngaq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee Aqbhu Miqyail bhi lee naol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail al gaq neq, nuljuq bhai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee cavq lavq cov lavq khi, ngaq-i mail ge-ail ceevq-a nail daoq niil juq bhai, nuljuq noeqmoel lal dai, tsaojao-ai lavq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai neesal-ovq nail phaq bivq-ail ceevq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail bivq nail neesal-ovq nail phaq neq, miltsaq yaq juq neesal-ovq nail phaq bivq nail khe-ai, maq dul-ail. Nuljuq neema haqaoq thaq nl. Gee iqsanl, thaq geesil.

Ngal nuljuq bhai teevq yanq khaonq-ail ceevq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq pov gaoq lee naol dai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq gaq-ao nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai gaiq-a haq neq, ngal Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha kovq lai-u phao, nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, ngaq-ai nee maqtsil eeq jaiq heel jaiq nail ngaol.
Ganl al juq pevq lal-u phao, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol dai, niil aq-il maq pevq lal-u phao nee mail, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nee mail daoq ge tsaoq ge tsaoq-ail jaol nail aqyanq maq jiav yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail gaq lee thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngaq bhai gaq lal nia nail bhaqaoq maq jiav-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal Aqbhu Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail, niidai miltsaq yaq ya heeq ya moel dai, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai daoq bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, ngal nl naol. Thul yaoq. Ail bhel” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal neq, maldil aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiav daoqthaoq ngaol. Ngaq nail Aqbhu neq, gaoqkhail lav sav nail aqheel ngaol.

Aqheeq maq heeq nail ngaq nail lavqmeiv juq bhai, aivq he dil bhiq nail ngaol. Aqheeq heeq nail lavqmeiv juq bhai neq, gaoq bhi heeq jaiq lee nail dai khi, aivq ganl maq tsoiq nail lavqmeiv meiv yaq juq bhai thaiq ha nail ngaol.
Ngaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail daoq bhaqda nee, nuljuq haol lal gaq-ao nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol yaoq. Ngal iqsanl, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol naol. Lavqmeiv juq neq, aqjiav daoqthaoq bhai maq covq cavq haq neq, aqyu juq bhai aqyu juq aqheeq maq heeq lee nia nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl, ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq jaol haq neq, aqheeq maq heeq lee nia-ail.

Ngal neq, aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiav daoqthaoq ngaol. Nuljuq neq, lavqmeiv ngaol. Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai covq cavq khi, ngal iqsanl aqyu juq bhai covq cavq nail gaq neq, aqheeq maodai heeq lee nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai maq covq cavq haq neq, nuljuq khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq nl nia-ail.

Ngaq bhai maq khal covq cavq nail tsaol-aq neq, miltsaq bhai ga ail khi gee lai nail lavqmeiv khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Alheel nail lavqmeiv juq bhai govjil khi, miqjaq jaibhoil bhai gov poiv khi, kheq ha nail ngaol.
Nuljuq ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, ngaq nail daoq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol haq neq, nuljuq khal hal movq nail phaq hal yaoq. Khal hal nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Nuljuq aqheeq maodai heeq lee nail bhai heldaiq khi, ngaq nail Aqbhu nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai yu ya moel nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nuljuq ngaq nail yaqlaol pevq lal-aoq nail ngaol dai, ge kivq nail ngaol.
Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl, nuljuq bhai gaiq-a naol. Ngaq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai ivqdao dai, jaol yaoq.

Ngaq nail Aqbhu nail daoq bhai ngal naldaiq khi, ngaq nail Aqbhu nail goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal jaol nail khe-ai, nuljuq ngaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq haq neq, ngaq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai, nuljuq jaol nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi, nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhee lal dai, nuljuq bhai ngal niailhai ge bhiq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq bhai daoq niil daoq bivq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq.
Yovqgavq nail aqtsaoq nail haqbhoil sildan nail nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq, maq jiav yaoq-aol.
Ngaq-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq nl haq neq, nuljuq ngaq nail aqtsaoq ngaol.

Niai nee pultavq neq, ngal nuljuq bhai yaqkav dai, maq khul yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ilheel khal nl nail phaq yaqkav maq heeq gil nia-ail. Ngal nuljuq bhai aqtsaoq dai, khul naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail Aqbhu-i mail khal ge lavq-a nail phaq, nuljuq bhai ngal ge bhiq gil-aoq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail ngaq bhai tsel-a nail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai tsel-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq ail khi, aqheeq heeq lee nail nee ovqtavq, aqheeq al ivqdao dai pevq lal nail haqbhoil, ngal nuljuq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq nail aqmil lavqkhoel nee, nuljuq hal nail phaq, Aqbhu Miqyail nuljuq bhai bivq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai bivq nail daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, gaiq-a yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Miltsaq yaq nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav lal-u phao, nuljuq bhai neejiav maq jiav lal-u phao nee mail, ngaq bhai iqmoeq neejiav jiav-aoq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Nuljuq miltsaq niilniai tavq haq neq, miltsaq yaq niil nuljuq bhai aivq nail yaq khe-ai gaiq-a lavq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq niil nail lavqkhoel nee nuljuq bhai ngaq-i mail tsel dov gaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miltsaq niilniai nuljuq maq tavq yaoq-aol. Alheel ngel-i mail, miltsaq yaq juq nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol.

Yaqkav neq, yovqgavq nail ilheel nee maqtsil maq eeq-ail dai, ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq bhai, thaq nioilpeivq. Miltsaq yaq juq ngaq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai iqsanl, khoeq lal jiovq lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ngaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq haq neq, nuljuq nail daoq bhai iqsanl, naldaiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nuljuq bhai nl khoeq lal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq bhai, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail.

Ngal lee khi aqyu juq bhai maq ge bhiq lee-al nul neq, aqyu juq oeqbal maq aol-ail dai, ge kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil thal khe pov neq, aqyu juq-i mail nl nail phaq oeqbal dai maq dul-al dai, maq jil nia yaoq-aol.
Ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq, ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai iqsanl, neejiav jiav nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq nl daiq-a nail ganl niil juq bhai, aqyu juq jaol nail bha ngal maq nl-a nail nul neq, aqyu juq oeqbal maq aol-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i mail nl-a nail ganl bhai aqyu juq ya moel khi, ngaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail Aqbhu bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq neejiav jiav nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai, ‘Khul nail ganl maq jiav nail bhai, aqyu juq ngaq bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol’ dai, gevq-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngel-i mail, daoq al bhee lal dai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail nee dov lee nail Tsaojao-ai nail gaq ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq naol. Aivq neq, tsaq nail phaq pevq khi tsaq nail phaq bhai phaodaiq lavq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail ngaol. Aivq lee kev haq neq, ngaq nail ganl, salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq iqsanl, iqmoeq-u nee mail ngaq-ai nee jaol nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai maq ya khaonq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq bhai maq bhi tavq dai, the ha lavq nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai heivq nail neq, Miqyail neekhaol sil nail ngaol dai, nuljuq bhai heivq lal nail tsaol-aq juq noeq nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Aqbhu Miqyail bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai maqkhaiq, maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai alhai khoeq lal jiovq lal nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al juq nuljuq bhai alhai khoeq lal jiovq lal nail aqyanq kev lee-u phao, alhai kev lee nail ngaol dai, ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail bhai, nuljuq bhi noeq moel nail haqbhoil, ngal nuljuq bhai niil aq-il nee ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nee jaol-ai haq nail ngel-i mail, ganl niil iqmoeq-u phao nee, ngal nuljuq bhai maq ge bhiq-al” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Niil aq-il neq, ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail gaq jaol nail bha, ngal kovq lai nail khi ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ‘Naol khaq bha ail nail-aiq’ dai, nuljuq teevq gaq iqsanl, ngaq bhai maq naldaiq-ail.
Nuljuq bhai ganl niil juq ge bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail neema haqaoq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngal kovq lai nail neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal maq kovq lai haq neq, Tsaojao-ai nail gaq nuljuq jaol nail bha maq lee-ail. Ngal kovq lai haq neq, Tsaojao-ai nail gaq nuljuq jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq naol.
Aivq kev lee-u phao, oeqbal nail ganl maqkhaiq, tsaq nail daol nail ganl maqkhaiq, yalkhaq dal nail ganl maqkhaiq, aivq miltsaq yaq bhai phaodaiq bhiq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail oeqbal neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai laiq ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq ngaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.
Tsaq nail daol nail ganl, aivq phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha kovq lai nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq yaq moel yaoq-aol.
Miltsaq niilniai uvthaiq nail gaq bhai, yalkhaq dal bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yalkhaq dal nail ganl bhai iqsanl, aivq phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail phaq maodai jiav-ai haq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai maq hav bhoel gil tsaol-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maldil tsaq nail phaq phaodaiq lavq nail gaq pevq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail lee-u phao, tsaq nail daol nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, nuljuq heeq nia lal dai, aivq hevq daiq lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nail neenoeq neelov nee maq ge mail, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail khal ge bhiq thaq nail phaq, nuljuq bhai ge lavq khi, yaqhao pevq lal nail ganl juq bhai iqsanl, phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngal seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, aivq nl nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq bhai tavq nail juq aivq oil khi, nuljuq bhai phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail khal jiav nail juq iqsanl, ngaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, ngaq-i mail khal bivq-a nail daoq juq oil khi, nuljuq bhai gaoq ge bhiq lee nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Teevq yanq khai-aq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq ya moel yaoq-aol. Teevq yanq gaoq khai-aq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai gaoq ya moel nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail: “Khalhai ge movq nail ngel-ail. Teevq yanq khai-aq neq, ngadao juq aivq bhai maq gaoq ya moel-ail. Teevq yanq gaoq khai-aq neq, ngadao juq aivq bhai gaoq ya moel nail ngaol dai, ge nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha kovq lai nail dai iqsanl, aivq gaoq ge nail ngaol.
Teevq yanq khai-aq neq dai, ge nail thoil, khul bhai ge movq nail-aiq. Aivq khalhai ge movq nail-aiq dai, maq gov heeq kivq-il” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aivq bhai naldaiq movq nail bhai, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, niailhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Teevq yanq khai-aq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq ya moel-ail, teevq yanq gaoq khai-aq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai gaoq ya moel naol dai, ngal ge nail ngaol. Ngal khalhai ge movq nail meeq dai, nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq ya nioil nail nee ovqtavq, nioilkhaoq iqsanl ya khaoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, milkhaoq yaq juq lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol. Nuljuq neema haqaoq ya nl nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq-i mail noeqhaq-a nail al, lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq yaq tsiq-u phao, yaq tsiq nail yanq kev lal khi, mao-ail nal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaq tsiq gaq-u phao, miltsaq kovtavq bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq doevq lee-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail deedee khi, iqmoeq-u phao aivq-i mail ya nal-a nail juq bhai, nioilpeivq gil-ail nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl, alhai dul nail ngaol. Niil aq-il nuljuq ya noeqhaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai gaoq moel-u phao, nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nuljuq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhai, teevq gaq iqsanl, maq luv dov nia-ail.

Aqn al n kev lee haq neq, nuljuq ngaq bhai teevq phaq iqsanl, maq naldaiq lal yaoq-aol. Ngal nuljuq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Ngaq nail aqmil lavqkhoel nee nuljuq khal hal nail phaq, Aqbhu Miqyail bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Yanqgaol kev dai, ngaq nail aqmil nail lavqkhoel nee, nuljuq teevq phaq iqsanl maq hal haq-al. Nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq teevq bhee teevq lovq ya dai, hal yaoq. Hal haq neq, ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Ngal daoqma uqhuq daoq nee ganl niil juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal daoqma uqhuq daoq bhai maq yuq mail, Aqbhu Miqyail nail ganl nuljuq bhai daolcoev dai, ya ge bhiq nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol.
Aqn al n kev lee-u phao, nuljuq ngaq nail aqmil lavqkhoel nee, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail haqbhoil ngal aivq bhai hal nail maq loq yaoq-aol.
Nuljuq ngaq bhai gaiq-a khi, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail ngaol dai, neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Aqbhu Miqyail nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha nee lee khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai lee-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il ngal miltsaq niilniai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha kovq lai naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqlaol juq Yeiqsul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Niil thal khe pov neq, naol daoqma uqhuq daoq maq yuq-ail, daolcoev dai, cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol.

Naol neq, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail ngaol dai, nvjuq neema thaq tsaol naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naol iqsanl bhai heeq nia khi, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail naoq bhai naldaiq nail bhai, naol maq loq-ail dai, niil aq-il nvjuq heeq kivq lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Niil aq-il nuljuq aqduq bhao dai, neema thaqtsaol lal-aoq naol laiq.

Nuljuq iqsanl bhi the gaoq bhi the gail gil khi, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol bha yovqgavq kovq gil-ail nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq bhai taivq-ail khaonq ha-ail ceevq nail aqyanq kev lee nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, teevq gaq teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq neesal-ovq nail phaq ya nia dai, nuljuq bhai niailhai ge bhiq nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai, nuljuq ya daq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq peivq-ail thaq geesil. Miltsaq niilniai ngal gaq lai-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul alhai ge gaq-u phao, nqtavq phao gaollel khi, niailhai geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol:
“Aqbhu-ol, aqyanq kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Yaqyov bhaqda nee naoq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai yu moel nia dai, naoq nail Yaqyov bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq lavq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail Yaqyov bhai khal av bhiq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq Yaqyov bivq nia dai, miltsaq tsaoljeq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai, naol aivq bhai bhaqaoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Naol teevq gaq taivq-ail maldil Miqyail ngaol dai, heeq nia khi, naoq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai heeq nia nail al neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq, pevq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq bhai naoq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai, ngal bhi moel gaq-ao nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail bhi nl lavq-a nail ganl bhai iqsanl ngal nl gil-aoq nail ngaol.

Aqbhu-ol, miltsaq maq teivq-u phao nee, ngal naoq-ai nee mail jaol-u phao, ngaq-i mail jiav nail seiqleiq khaoqsail al, niil aq-il naoq nail sivtavq-ai ngaq bhai gaoq bhi ya lavq yaoq” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul geeqlaoq gaoq hal-a nail: “Miltsaq niil nail kovtavq bhai, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq dov lavq-a nail tsaol-aq juq naoq bhai heeq nia dai, ngal nl gaq-ao nail ngaol. Aqyu juq naoq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Naoq nail daoq bhai aqyu juq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Naoq-i mail ngaq bhai khal bivq lavq-a nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, naol jaol nail nee lee-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq niil aq-il heeq nia lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail daoq juq, aqyu juq bhai ngal cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, aqyu juq naldaiq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, naol jaol nail bha nee lee-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia khi, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq thaq nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul geeqlaoq gaoq hal-a nail: “Naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq naoq nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq nail haqbhoil ngal geeqlaoq hal nail maq ngel.
Ngal khal jiav nail phaq iqsanl, naoq nail pevq khi, naol khal jiav nail phaq iqsanl, ngaq nail pevq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel-ai ngaq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai, yu ya moel nail ngaol.

Niai nee pultavq ngal-aq, ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai maq jaol yaoq-aol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niil juq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaol. Ngal naol jaol nail bha kovq lal naol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqbhu-ol, ngadao nvq phaqyaq teevq gaq taivq-ail pevq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl, neema teevq heeq thaq-ail tavq nia lal dai, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail aqmil kov-uvq nee heldaiq phail bhiq yaoq.

Ngal aqyu juq nee mail jaol-u phao, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail aqmil kov-uvq nee, ngal heldaiq phail-a nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, bhee lal dai peivq ail-a nail al teevq gaq maq ngel nail neq, aqyu juq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq bhi peivq-ail dai, ngal heldaiq phail-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul geeqlaoq gaoq hal-a nail: “Niil aq-il naol jaol nail bha ngal kovq lal-aiq nail khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq nail neema bhai ngaq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq teevq bhee ya nail haqbhoil, ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, daoq niil juq niailhai ge nail ngaol.

Ngal aqyu juq bhai naoq nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq juq, aqyu juq bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal miltsaq niilniai maq tavq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl, miltsaq niilniai maq tavq-ail.

Aqyu juq bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai maq bhi jaol mail hevq dol-aivq yaoq dai, ngal hal nail maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq haqeiv nail phaq bhai jel-ail nia dai, aqyu juq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq yaoq dai, ngal hal nail ngaol.
Ngal miltsaq niilniai maq tavq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl miltsaq bhai maq tavq-ail.
Maldil tsaq nail phaq-i mail aqyu juq bhai bhi haol lal yaoq. Naoq nail daoq neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Naol ngaq bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl aqyu juq bhai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail aqmaol maldil tsaq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee, naoq bhai ya av bhiq dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil ngaq nail aqmaol naoq bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul geeqlaoq gaoq hal-a nail: “Aqyu juq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail, ngal naoq bhai geeqlaoq hal nail maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq nail daoq bhaqda nee ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, hal nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq iqsanl mail, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq nia lal dai, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Aqbhu-ol, naol ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, ngal iqsanl, naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl mail, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, ngadao nvq phaqyaq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol yaoq. Alhai jaol haq neq, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq thaq nail ngaol dai, miltsaq yaq juq neema thaqtsaol lal nail ngaol.

Ngadao nvq phaq yaq neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq nia lal dai, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail al, aqyu juq bhai ngal bivq nail ngaol.

Naoq-i mail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ganl khi, ngaq bhai naol gaiq-a nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq niil juq bhai iqsanl, naol gaiq-a nail ganl bhai miltsaq yaq juq heeq nia lal nail haqbhoil, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq niil juq, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq nia lal dai, ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai naol jaol khi, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal jaol nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul geeqlaoq gaoq hal-a nail: “Aqbhu-ol, naoq-i mail bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq niil juq, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai moel nia dai, aqyu juq bhai ngal khal jaol nail bha bhi jaol movq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq maq teivq-u nee mail, naol ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaq dee daol deedee nail Aqbhu-ol, miltsaq yaq juq naoq bhai maq heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai heeq kivq khi, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol dai, tsaol-aq niil juq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq naoq bhai heeq nia lal dai, ngal cavq bhiq cov bhiq naol. Iqmoeq phaoq iqsanl, gaoq cavq bhiq gaoq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai goil nail gaiq-a nail al phaq, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi, ngal aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol kivq dai, alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq naol” dai, Yeiqsul geeqlaoq alhai hal-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai geeqlaoq hal gaq-u phao, aivq nail yaqlaol juq hevq khi, Gildaqloq laoljaol a phao lelkhel phao ceiv ail-a nail ngaol. Al bhai gaoqkhail teevq khail jiav khi, Yeiqsul khi aivq nail yaqlaol juq, gaoqkhail al khail bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai gaoqjaq-a nail Yuldav al gaq iqsanl, gaoqkhail al khail bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul aivq nail yaqlaol juq nee gaoqkhail al khail bhai mee nia pov ail daiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yuldav neq, Philma juq khi Phaqliqsail juq-i mail khoel-ai leevq thaq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai jaol khi heldaiq phail nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail genl dev nail juq hevq khi lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq phalmanq tovq khi, miqhuq kheq khi, genl dev nail khen kha-ao iqsanl, bavq-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, aivq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee thailthaiq nail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, iqmoeq phao dov lee khi, “Nuljuq khaq sil gaq bhai halpov nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Naqsaqlail meenq bhai jaol nail, Yeiqsul bhai halpov nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol. “Ngal neq, Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, aivq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul bhai gaoqjaq-a nail Yuldav iqsanl, tsaol-aq al juq nee thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
“Ngal Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai Yeiqsul ge bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq haoqnaol phao jiiv kovq-ail khi helbhail lail-nq khaoqthaq-ail bavq tsuq ail-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq khaq sil gaq bhai halpov nail-aiq” dai, Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Naqsaqlail meenq bhai jaol nail Yeiqsul bhai halpov nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal Yeiqsul ngaol dai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ao nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Nuljuq ngaq bhai halpov nail phal-iq neq, ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail tsaol-aq niil juq bhai neq, maq nieivq mail bhi kovq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge nail al neq, “Aqbhu-ol, naoq-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq bhi peivq ail-al” dai, aivq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhi bhee lal nail haqbhoil ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv aivq-i mail bavq-nvq thaq nail thaoma gaol dov khi, Philma nail yaqkav teevq gaq bhai tsil gai-aivq khi, lavqmal phao khe naqkov tsilceiv gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Yaqkav al gaq nail aqmil neq, Maqlaqkhul ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naoq nail thaoma thaobhai bhai soiq bhoel yaoq. Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail ngaq bhai bhi daq lavq nail haq dee aoq deedee phaq bhai, ngal yaq daq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi Phaqliqsail juq-i mail khoel-ai leevq thaq nail tsaol-aq khi mail genl dev nail juq Yeiqsul bhai nieivq khi pheel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Aqnaq jaol nail bhai iqmoeq hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aqnaq neq, aq-u kovq bhai Philma aqivq gaq jiovq thailthaiq nail Gaqyaqphal nail tsaolmaoq ngaol.

“Tsaol jeq-e teevq jeq-e je lao-ail ya luq ya seil-ail nail haqbhoil, tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhi sildan nail neq, meeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai ge noeq ge dul bhiq-a nail gaq neq, Gaqyaqphal ngaol.

Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv khi yaqlaol yaoq gaq yaoq, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol al gaq, Philma aqivq gaq bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, Philma aqivq gaq nail ilkhaol khe khainl lavqkhoel-ai, Yeiqsul nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv neq, lavqniil phao khe khainl lolgov aqjail bhai jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol al gaq gaoq kovq lee khi, khainl lolgov bhai lovq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai ge bhiq khi, Bheiqtuvluv bhai hevq bhoel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Khainl lolgov bhai lovq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol iqsanl, tsaol-aq al gaq nail yaqlaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Bheiqtuvluv neq, “Ngal maq aol-ail” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqcoevq coevq nail ngel-i mail, yaqkav juq khi ilkhaol lovq phail nail tsaol-aq juq, calgevq-i mail miqjaq sivtovq khi, teevq jaoq thulphaol khi aqcoevq loil-a nail ngaol. Bheiqtuvluv iqsanl, a bhai thulphaol khi, aqyu juq nee mail aqcoevq loil-a nail ngaol.
Philma aqivq gaq Yeiqsul bhai, aivq nail yaqlaol juq nail ganl khi, aivq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ganl juq bhai peivtsel khi naldaiq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal yu bhai daoq khal ge tsaoq-u phao, tsaol-aq maodai jaol nail sivtavq nee bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ge tsaoq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, jil lal duq pevq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai taivq-ail, ngal cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Bhallal phao nee khoiq ge nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jiav-ail.

Khul khi mail, naol ngaq bhai peivtsel khi naldaiq nail-aiq. Ngaq nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq, ngal khalhai ge laoq-aol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai naldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge-u phao, a bhai ilkhaol bhai lovqphail nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, aivq nail bhaqbha bhai teiv khi ge nail: “Naol Philma aqivq gaq bhai thailhai ge khaoq nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Philma aqivq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq-i mail ge nail daoq maq ngel haq neq, maq ngel-ail dai, niai jaol nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nail sivtavq bhai ge duq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i mail ge nail daoq ngel haq neq, khul khi mail, ngaq nail bhaqbha bhai bhi teiv nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail nee maq pheel bhiq dai, Aqnaq-i mail Yeiqsul bhai Philma aqivq gaq pevq nail Gaqyaqphal jaol nail bha bhi hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv neq, a bhai thulphaol khi aqcoevq loil nail ngaol. Yu aivq bhai naldaiq nail: “Naol iqsanl, tsaol-aq al gaq nail yaqlaol maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, “Maq ngel-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv jil nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv-i mail naqkov tsilceiv bhiq-a nail gaq nee aqivq jaqbheq tavq nail, Philma aqivq gaq nail yaqkav teevq gaq, Bheiqtuvluv bhai ge nail: “Naol iqsanl, Yeiqsul nee mail gaoqkhail lavqkhoel-ai jaol nail bhai, ngal moel-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Maq ngel-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv teevq pov gaoq jil-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail yavphoil doil lal-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq nqhao navqmav-ail, Yeiqsul bhai Gaqyaqphal nail ilkhaol nee hevq dol-aivq khi, heeqphaq nail haol ilkhaol bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq neq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq jaq nail bhai aol lai nail haqbhoil yovqgavq nail aqmaol aqhaol haol dai bhi jiav movq nail ngel-i mail, heeqphaq nail haol ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai maq aol lai dai, jaol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Phillav lavqniil bha dov lee khi, ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq khul phaq laiq nail dai, nuljuq ge movq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq haqeiv nail phaq nl thaq nail maq jiav-ail nul neq, aivq bhai naol jaol nail bha nvjuq maq hel lavq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Phillav ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, nuljuq aivq bhai hevq kol-aivq khi, nuljuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq khal jiav nail khe-ai yalkhaq dal-ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aqyu juq ge nail: “Nvjuq tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, heivq nail aqkhaoqanq maq jiav-ail” dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai ge nail neq, “Ngal neq, alhai ya sil nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul-i mail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, bhee lal dai, ge nail ngaol.
Phillav haol lavqkhoel bhai gaoq-aol lai khi, Yeiqsul bhai khul khi, naldaiq nail: “Naol Yuldav tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq ngaol laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Daoq thoil daoq maldil naoq nail daoq ngaol laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, ngaq nail ganl yu-i mail naoq bhai ge lavq-a nail daoq bhai juq khi, ge nail laiq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Phillav ge nail: “Ngal Yuldav nail tsaol-aq laiq. Naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a khi Philma aqivq-i mail, naoq-ai ngaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel-ai av lavq-a nail ngaol. Naol khul nl-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngaq nail milkhaoq neq, miltsaq niilniai tavq nail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq nail milkhaoq miltsaq niilniai tavq nail nul neq, ngaq bhai Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq-i mail maq nieivq-u phao nee, ngaq nail tsaol-aq juq genl dev lal nail ngaol. Ngaq nail milkhaoq neq, miltsaq niilniai maq tavq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Phillav aivq bhai naldaiq nail: “Naol Heeqphaq ngaol laiq.” Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal Heeqphaq ngaol dai, ge nail neq, nuljuq ngaol. Ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai yavq kha lee khi, doevq lee-a nail neq, tsaq nail salkhil khanq lee-a teevq-eel ngaol. Maldil tsaq nail phaq phao, khal jaol nail tsaol-aq neq, ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Phillav ge nail: “Maldil tsaq nail phaq dai, ge nail neq, khul bhai ge nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, haol ilkhaol nail lavqniil bhai jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq jaol nail bha, Phillav dov lee khi, niailhai ge bhiq lee-a nail ngaol: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq nail laiq nail tsa nail phaq bhai, ngal maq halpov moel kivq-il.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq khal kev lal-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil tsaol-aq teevq gaq ngal ya phaiq bhiq nail aolsaolkovq jiav nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail haqbhoil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq niil gaq bhai, ngal bhi phaiq movq-ail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq mailma-ail gaoq gul kav lal khi ge nail: “Aivq bhai thaq phaiq, Bhaqlaqbhal bhai phaiq yaoq” dai, gul nail ngaol. Bhaqlaqbhal neq, tsaolpheel teevq gaq ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Phillav-i mail Yeiqsul bhai hevq dol-aivq khi, neeqtsaq-i mail bhi jiivq deedee-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail juq aqgoe aqjiav-i mail heel uqtsaoq khe-ai jievq khi, aivq bhai nieivq tsaoq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, nel nav nav nail heeqphaq nail phailkhaoq heelma nieivq doi bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq nail aqjail bhai lai khi, “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail heeqphaq, geeqlaoq eeq dei-eiq” dai, ge ge-ail khi, bhaqbha bhai teiv-a nail ngaol.

Phillav teevq pov gaoq dov lee khi ge nail: “Ngal tsaol-aq niil gaq nail lavqkhoel khe laiq nail tsa nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq moel-al dai, nuljuq ya heeq nia dai, ngal aivq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha hevq dol leevq-a nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, aqgoe uqtsaoq tsaoq khi, nel nav nav nail heeqphaq nail phailkhaoq heelma iqsanl doi khi mail, dov lee-a nail ngaol. “Tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai heldaiq daiq-o” dai, Phillav aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Philma juq khi mail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lovq phail nail juq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq bhai, “Lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq, tavq heivq yaoq” dai, mailma-ail ge nail ngaol. Phillav ge nail: “Nuljuq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq aivq bhai he dol-aivq khi, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq ail yaoq. Ngal aivq nail lavqkhoel khe laiq nail tsa nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq moel-al” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ge nail: “Nvjuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail khe-ai, nl haq neq, aivq sil nail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, ‘Ngal Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol.”
Phillav daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil gaoq geesil lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq haol ilkhaol lavqkhoel bha gaoq aol lal khi, “Naol khaq bha nee lal-a nail tsaol-aq” dai, Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq ge kovq bhiq-al.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Phillav ge nail: “Khul khi mail, naol ngaq bhai daoq maq ge tsaoq lal nail-aiq. Naoq bhai phaiq bhi nail maqkhaiq, naoq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq nail maqkhaiq, ngal bhaqaoq jiav nail bhai, naol maq heeq kivq-ail laiq” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Miqyail-i mail naoq bhai bhaqaoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail, naol ngaq nail kovtavq bhai bhaqaoq jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai naoq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail gaq neq, naoq-ai nee maqtsil oeqbal eeq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al daoq bhai Phillav ya gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai phaiq bhiq nail gailkhaol halpov nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq mailma-ail ge nail: “Naol aivq bhai phaiq bhiq haq neq, naol heeqphaq Gailsaq nail aqtsaoq maq ngel yaoq-aol. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq, heeqphaq ngaol dai, ge nail tsaol-aq neq, heeqphaq Gailsaq bhai genl dev nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Daoq al daoq bhai Phillav ya gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai lavqniil bha hevq dol leevq khi, lovmav-i mail kheq-ai thaq nail jaol duq dai, khul nail bha jiav nail yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel lai-a nail ngaol. Lovmav-i mail kheq-ai thaq nail jaol duq al bhai, Heiqbhail daoq neq, Gaqbhaqdaq dai, khul nail ngaol.

Aq-u n-gaol neq, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav nail haqbhoil lainq nail aqn pevq khi, n-gaol gaol kavkav lal-aiq nail ngaol. Phillav tsaol-aq al juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail heeqphaq bhai heldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq gul nail: “Aivq bhai heivq yaoq. Aivq bhai heivq yaoq. Lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq yaoq” dai, gul nail ngaol. Phillav aqyu juq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq nail heeqphaq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-o laiq.” Aq-u phao, Philma juq ge nail: “Nvjuq nail heeqphaq neq, heeqphaq Gailsaq teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq nail haqbhoil, Phillav-i mail aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq-i mail, Yeiqsul bhai he dol-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq nail lavqyavq bavq khi, Uqcov dai khul nail jaol duq bha lai kev-a nail ngaol. Jaol duq al dao bhai, Heiqbhail daoq neq, Gaollaqgaoldav dai, khul nail ngaol.

Al bhai, aqyu juq aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nvq gaq bhai iqsanl, aivq nail jail-nq phao teevq phao teevq gaq dai, tavq thaiq-ai thaq khi, aivq bhai neq, gaoltsi bhai tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Phillav-i mail haoqgavq gevq khi, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai bhi tavq bav-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Niil gaq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq pevq nail Naqsaqlail meenq bhai jaol nail Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail jaol duq al neq, meenq nee mail mao-ail maq eq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai haoqgavq gevq-ai thaq nail al bhai ya ge nail ngaol. Haoqgavq al neq, Heiqbhail nail daoq, Latinq nail daoq, Heiqlaqsal nail daoq, niil hail phaq hail phaq-ail gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Philma juq Phillav bhai ge bhiq lai-a nail: “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq dai, maq gevq mail, tsaol-aq niil gaq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Heeqphaq ngaol dai, ge nail ngaol dai, gevq nail neq, tsaq jaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Phillav ge nail: “Ngaq-i mail gevq gaq-a nail phaq neq, khal gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ya bhi jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail juq Yeiqsul bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq gaq-u phao, aivq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai liq bhoil bhoil khi, teevq gaq teevq bhoil oil-a nail ngaol. Lavqkhoel phao doi bhoel nail phailkhaoq heelma al keiv iqsanl, aqyu juq oil-a nail ngaol. Phailkhaoq al keiv neq, phalkhaol maq bhao dai, teevq keiv keiv lao-ail teevq pov taivq-ail yavq thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq ge nail: “Phailkhaoq niil keiv maq he pav mail, khaq sil gaq oil nail tsaq nail ngel-ail dai, ya heeq kivq dai, eellaoq bheq bhel” dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ge pheeljaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai ge nail neq,
“Aqyu juq ngaq nail
aqgaq aqdoi bhoilpav khi,
ngaq nail phailkhaoq
kha sil gaq oil nail
tsaq nail ngel-ail dai,
eellaoq bheq khi
oil nail ngaol” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhee lal dai, genl dev nail juq alhai nl-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail lavqyavq aqjail bhai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Yeiqsul nail aqma, Yeiqsul nail meelmee, Gaqlaolphal nail khaqma Maqlil khi Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil, niil liq gaq ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, aivq nail aqma khi aivq mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaqlaol al gaq, a bhai thulphaol nail bhai ya moel-u phao, “Aqma-ol, aivq bhai naoq nail yaq khe-ai saol-nvq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, yaqlaol al gaq bhai iqsanl, “Aivq naoq nail aqma khe-ai, saol-nvq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol nee ngal-aq, yaqlaol al gaq Yeiqsul nail aqma bhai he kol-aivq khi, aivq nail ilkhaol bha bhi jaol-a nail ngaol.

Niil thal khe pov neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee lal gaq-ao nail ganl, Yeiqsul heeq nia nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai bhee lal dai, “Ulcuvq moevq-il” dai, Yeiqsul ge nail ngaol.

A bhai, aqtsel tsel nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail caivlov heeq yaq teevq heeq, jiav nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqyaq iqma khe mullul khe-ai dul nail niaqpeovq teevq khai oil khi, aqtsel tsel deedee nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul nail lavqkhoel bhai gov deev-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, lunl aqkhaoq bhai soiqtsaoq khi, Yeiqsul nail moeqthaoq bhai soiq tuv bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, aqtsel tsel deedee nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul al daol gaq-al nee ngal-aq neq, “Ganl nl gil-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge khi, uqhuq ga movq lee khi mail aqhaq ceiv-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, lavqyavq kovtavq-ai tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq nail aqkhil deeq khoi khi, lavqyavq kovtavq nee bavq khal leevq nail haqbhoil, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq heeqphaq Phillav bhai hal nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol neq, jaol n n-gaol nail haqbhoil lainq nail aqn pevq khi, sil thaq nail aqmaol al juq bhai jaol n n-gaol kev dai, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai maq bhi jiav movq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq alhai hal nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, jaol n al n neq, meeq jaiq haol jaiq nail jaol n teevq n pevq nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, genl dev nail juq neq, Yeiqsul nee mail lavqyavq kovtavq-ai bhi tavq thaiq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al nvq gaq nail aqkhil bhai deeq khoi-a nail ngaol.
Genl dev nail juq, Yeiqsul nail aqjail bhai kev lee-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, sil ceiv-aoq thaq nail bhai ya moel khi, aqkhil maq deeq khoi dai, khaonq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, genl dev nail teevq gaq-i mail Yeiqsul nail aqbhail bhai geeqkhaoq-i mail coev khi, aqsivq khi mail ulcuvq teevq pov taivq-ail il dol leevq-a nail ngaol.

Pevq lal-a nail ganl bhai moel duq-a nail al gaq, nuljuq iqsanl neema thaqtsaol lal dai, salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Aivq ge nail neq, maldil tsaq khi, aivq daolcoev dai, ge lao thaq nial dai, aivq bhai aivq heeq nia-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq nail haqeeq teevq khaoq iqsanl maq ya khoi-ail” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhee lal dai, alhai pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai teevq dao gaoq gevq-ai thaq nail: “Aqyu juq-i mail geeqkhaoq-i coev-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai, aqyu juq heldaiq nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Aqlilmaqthaiq meenq bhai jaol nail, Yaolsai al gaq, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bavq kol-aivq nail haqbhoil, heeqphaq Phillav bha hal lai-a nail ngaol. Yaolsai al gaq neq, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol aqtsi tsu dai, jiovq-nq thaq nail teevq gaq ngaol. Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bavq kol-aivq nia dai, Phillav aivq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq lai khi bavq kovq lai-a nail ngaol.

Jel lal-u phao, Yeiqsul jaol nail bha nqkiv phao lal daiq-a nail Nilgaoldiq al gaq iqsanl, mullaq khi aqjaoq kheq khi lav sav-ai thaq nail huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel nvq tsel jao-ai niidai oil khi, Yaolsai nee mail ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bavq khi, huqbhiq nil nail aqtseel al bheq bav bheq bav-ail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maoltoev toev nail aolsaolkovq jiav nail khe-ai, haoltaiv deel haqphal-i mail maoltoev toev-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq thaiq-a nail jaol duq al nail aqjail bhai, gaoqkhail teevq khail jiav nail ngaol. Gaoqkhail al khail nail lavqkhoel-ai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl maq duqpheeq daiq-a nail, lovmav-i mail tavq-ai thaq nail luqdaol aqsivq teevq daol jiav nail ngaol.

Aq-u n-gaol neq, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail jaol n n-gaol nail haqbhoil lainq nail aqn pevq khi, luqdaol al daol iqsanl, aqjail bhai jiav nail ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq gaq Yeiqsul bhai, al dao bhai duq pheeq-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n jel-ail khi teevq n n-gaol nqhao navqmav-ail nqbhaq maq bhaq lal-u nee mail, Maqlil Maqgaqdaqlal luqdaol bha heldaiq ail-u phao, luqdaol moeqkhoeq bhai ngaoq tsoiq-ai thaq nail lovmav ngaoq ha-ai khi jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv khi Yeiqsul mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaqlaol al gaq jaol nail bha, tsaoq kol-aivq khi, “Aqyu juq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai, luqdaol lavqkhoel nee bavq dol-aivq khi, khaq bha bavq thaq-ai thaq nail dai, maq heeq kivq yaoq-aol” dai, ge bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv khi yaqlaol al gaq luqdaol bha heldaiq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq teevq gaq khe-ai tsaoq tsaoq-ail, ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol al gaq Bheiqtuvluv nee maqtsil lav nail ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv nail iqmoeq, luqdaol bha tsaoq kel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq thaoq kovq khi heldaiq-u phao, maoltoev haqphal jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq luqdaol lavqkhoel bhai maq aol lai daiq dai, jaol nail ngaol.
Aivq nail haoqnao Bheiqtuvluv tsaoq kel leevq khi, luqdaol lavqkhoel bha aol ail-a nail ngaol. Maoltoev haqphal ga nail bhai, Bheiqtuvluv ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail uqhuq bhai pavqthaiq bhiq-a nail lavqsiv al keiv iqsanl, a bhai ga nail ngaol. Lavqsiv al keiv neq, maoltoev haqphal nee teevq gaq khe-ai maq ga dai, yaoq daoq yaoq phao kaolteiv teiv khi jiav nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, luqdaol bhai iqmoeq tsaoq kel leevq-a nail yaqlaol al gaq iqsanl, luqdaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lee khi, alhai jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u kev dai, Yeiqsul neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ganl al bhai aqyu nvq gaq aqmeeq-ai maq gov heeq haq-al.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu nvq gaq kovq lai-a nail ngaol.
Maqlil neq, luqdaol nail lavqniil phao thulphaol khi nioil thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq nioil nioil-ail thaoq kovq khi, luqdaol lavqkhoel bhai heldaiq bhoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel nvq gaq, aqgaq aqdoi aqphul doi khi, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai bavq thaq khi bhi jiav-a nail al dao bhai, uqhuq phao teevq gaq, aqkhil phao teevq gaq dai, jaol nail bhai, aivq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

“Yaqmiq-ol, khul khi mail nioil nail-aiq” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel al nvq gaq, aivq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Maqlil ge nail: “Yu ngaq nail Heeqphaq bhai bal-aivq khi, khaq bha bavq thaq-ai thaq nail-aiq dai, ngal maq heeq kivq-i mail, nioil nail ngaol” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai ge gaq khi, haoqnaol tsiq phaol gaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul a bhai thulphaol nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul niil dai, aivq maq heeq nia-ail.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqmiq-ol, khul khi mail nioil nail-aiq. Naol khaq sil gaq bhai halpov thailthaiq nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Maqlil Yeiqsul bhai, gaoqkhail nl nail tsaol-aq niidai dul khi ge nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, naoq-i mail aivq bhai bavq dol-aivq-a nail phaq al neq, khaq bha bavq thaq-ail a nail-aiq dai, ngaq bhai teevq pov ge lavq yaoq. Aivq bhai, ngal bavq kovq-ail naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai, “Maqlil-ol” dai, khul-u phao, aivq tsiqphaol-ail khi, “Laqbhaolnil” dai, eq-el kha-a nail ngaol. Laqbhaolnil dai, ge nail neq, Heiqbhail nail daoq pevq khi, saqlaq dai, ge movq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq bhai thaq nieivq thaiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal ngaq nail Aqbhu jaol nail bha maq kovq lai haq-al. Ngaq nail yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha ail khi, ‘Ngaq nail Aqbhu khi nuljuq nail Aqbhu pevq nail, ngaq nail Miqyail khi, nuljuq nail Miqyail jaol nail bha, ngal kovq lai naol dai, ge nail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha, Maqgaqdaqlal meenq bhai jaol nail Maqlil ail khi, aivq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-a nail ganl khi, Yeiqsul-i mail aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq juq, aqyu juq bhai ge daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n jel-ail khi teevq n n-gaol nqkiv phao, yaqlaol juq Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, teevq dao bhai jil lai khi, lolgov saiqthaiq khi jaol nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai thulphaol lee khi, “Nuljuq neesal-ovq dei-eiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge gaq khi, aqyu juq bhai aivq nail aqlavq khi aqbhail bhai bhi heldaiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq neesal-ovq dei-eiq. Aqbhu Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai iqsanl, ngal khoel gai-aivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge gaq-u phao, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai aivq aqhaq jiiv khi, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai hav bhoel yaoq.

Nuljuq-i mail oeqbal phaiq bhiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, Miqyail oeqbal phaiq bhiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail oeqbal maq phaiq bhiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, Miqyail oeqbal maq phaiq bhiq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol juq jaol nail bha Yeiqsul lee-u phao, yaqlaol tsel-nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail, Tholmav al gaq maq jaol-ail. (Tholmav daiq ge nail neq, teevq pov taivq-ail nvq gaq doevq lee thaq nail bhai, ge nail ngaol.)
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Nvjuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol” dai, yaqlaol juq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tholmav aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aivq nail aqlavq bhai hail hailtsoe mail tavq-ai thaq nail malbavq bhai, ngal moel duq khi, ngaq nail lavqnoil-i mail malbavq al bhai thoiq daiq gaq khi, aivq nail aqbhail bhai ngaq nail aqlavq-i mail aqmeeq-ai heivdaiq gaq khi, pultavq maq ngel nail neq, ngal neema maq thaqtsaol-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Jaol n teevq jao jel ail-u phao, yaqlaol juq ilkhaol teevq il bhai jil lai khi jaol nail ngaol. Tholmav iqsanl, aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq lolgov saiqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aqyu juq jaol nail bha thulphaol lee khi, “Nuljuq neesal-ovq dei-eiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul Tholmav bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naoq nail lavqnoil-i mail thoiq daiq lal khi, ngaq nail aqlavq bhai heldaiq duq lal yaoq. A bhai nee ngal-aq, naoq nail aqlavq gaoltsaoq khi, ngaq nail aqbhail bhai heivdaiq lal yaoq. Pov pov lav lav-ail maq noeq mail, neema thaq tsaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Tholmav ge nail: “Naol neq, ngaq nail Heeqphaq khi ngaq nail Miqyail nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naol ngaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, neema thaq tsaol nail nial laq. Ngaq bhai maq moel khi ngaol-aoq, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Haoqgavq niil keiv nail lavqkhoel bhai, maq gevq bhoel gil-ai thaq nail, noeq-u maq dov nail mee nia phaq, yaqlaol juq nail sivtavq bhai, Yeiqsul nl-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niai khal gevq-ai thaq nail niil juq neq, Yeiqsul neq, Khali khi Miqyail nail Yaqyov pevq nail bhai, nuljuq neema thaq tsaol lal dai maqkhaiq, nuljuq aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-u phao, doevq nail phaq ya nia dai maqkhaiq, gevq-ai thaq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Deiqbheiqlil ngaqkha daoljail bhai, yaqlaol juq jaol nail bhai Yeiqsul teevq pov gaoq dov lee-a nail ngaol. Ganl al neq, niailhai ngaol.

Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv, nvq gaq doevq lee-a nail dai khul nail Tholmav, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq Gaqnaq meenq bhai jaol nail Naqdaqneiqlal, Seiqbheiqdail nail Yaqyov nvq gaq, al maq ngel nail Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol nvq gaq, niil juq teevq gaq khe-ai jaol nail ngaol.

“Ngal ovjeel joe ail la” dai, Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, “Nvjuq iqsanl, naoq-ai nee mail lee naol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq laovq jeeq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aq-u nqkivq teevq kivq kivq lao-ail, aqyu juq delgil teevq maol iqsanl, maq joe miv-al.
Nqhao nlma dov lal-u phao, Yeiqsul ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai thulphaol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul niil dai, yaqlaol juq maq heldaiq heeq-al.
“Aqtsaoq juq-ol, delgil joe miv-a naol laiq” dai, Yeiqsul naldaiq bhiq-u phao, “Maq joe miv-al” dai, aqyu juq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Laovq nail lavqmal phao joe yaoq. Delgil miv lal nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq khi, aqyu juq joe-u phao, delgil phee deedee lai thaq nail ngel-i mail, ovjeel maq he dil tsaol-ail.
