Yeiqsul mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaqlaol al gaq Bheiqtuvluv bhai, “Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul niil” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul niil dai, ge nail bhai Bheiqtuvluv ya gaiq-u phao, aqgaq aqdoi he doi khi ulcuvq bha tsaoq pul-aivq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, aivq aqgaq aqdoi maq doi dai, ovjeel joe thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol yaoq juq yaoq neq, laovq e khi, delgil teevq bhee phee lai thaq nail ovjeel al keiv bhai, ngaqkha daolbhaq bhai he dol lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail ovjeel joe-a nail al neq, ngaqkha daolbhaq nee sivq tsel lail khaiq-ail teevq-eel ngaol.
Aqyu juq daolbhaq bhai dov lal-u phao, calgevq-i mail miqjaq sivtovq khi delgil poiv-ai thaq khi khaqmul iqsanl, jiav nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq-i mail niil aq-il joe miv lavq-a nail delgil thoil, micil oil lavq yaoq” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv laovq bhai aol ail khi, delgil maol ma teevq bhee phee lai thaq nail ovjeel al keiv bhai, daolbhaq bhai he dol lavq-a nail ngaol. Delgil maol ma iqsanl mail, teevq yal ngaq tsel hail maol bhee nail ngaol. Delgil aqdai dai-ail phee lai khi ngaol-aoq, ovjeel al keiv maq pav-ail dai, jiav nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai, “Aoqhaoq jaq lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol juq aivq bhai, “Naol khaq sil gaq” dai, teevq gaq iqsanl maq naldaiq tseq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia-aoq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul khaqmul oil-aivq khi, aqyu juq bhai bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol. Delgil poiv-ai thaq nail al iqsanl, gaoq oil-aivq khi bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul doevq kovq lal gaq khi mail, aivq nail aqmaol yaqlaol juq bhai bhi moel-a nail niil pov, hail pov teevq pov ngaol.

Aqyu juq jaq gaq daol gaq-u phao, Yeiqsul Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv bhai naldaiq-a nail: “Yaolhaq nail Yaqyov Silmoq-ol, tsaol-aq niil juq ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail nee maqtsil, naol ngaq bhai gaiq-a naol laiq.”
Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Gaiq-a naol, Heeqphaq-ol. Ngal naoq bhai gaiq-a nail, naol heeq nia nail ngaol.”
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaol aqyaq bhai bhi jaq bhi daol nail khe-ai, ngaq nail yaol aqyaq juq bhai bhi jaq bhi daol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq bhai nvq pov teevq pov gaoq naldaiq-a nail: “Yaolhaq nail Yaqyov Silmoq-ol, naol ngaq bhai gaiq-a naol laiq.”
Aivq ge nail: “Gaiq-a naol, Heeqphaq-ol. Ngal naoq bhai gaiq-a nail, naol heeq nia nail ngaol.”
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq nail yaol juq bhai heldaiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aivq bhai hail pov teevq pov gaoq naldaiq nail: “Yaolhaq nail Yaqyov Silmoq-ol, naol ngaq bhai gaiq-a naol laiq.”

Yeiqsul aivq bhai hail pov naldaiq kel lavq-ao nail ngel-i mail, Bheiqtuvluv neema maq sal-ail, niailhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Heeqphaq-ol, naol yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee heeq nia nail ngaol. Ngal naoq bhai khadai gaiq-a nail dai, naol heeq nia nail ngaol.”
Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngaq nail yaol bhai bhi jaq bhi daol yaoq.

Ngal naoq bhai maldil dai, ge lavq bhel. Naol yaqkhaq yaquv-ail jiav-u phao, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq jiovqpavq pavq khi, naol khal ail movq nail bha, ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol joiqmaoq maoq lee-u phao, naoq nail aqlavq bhai yu nieivq thaiq khi, naol maq ail movq nail bha hel-aivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul alhai ge nail neq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai yu ya moel dai, yaqhao Bheiqtuvluv khalhai ya sil nail ganl bhai, ge movq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul Bheiqtuvluv bhai, “Ngaq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq gai-aivq-u phao, Yeiqsul mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaqlaol al gaq, aqyu nvq gaq nail haoqnaol bhai tsaothel lavq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yaqlaol al gaq neq, aoqkivq jaq tavq-u nqkiv Yeiqsul bhai laiqdal khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, naoq bhai gaoq jaq nail gaq neq khaq sil gaq” dai, naldaiq-a nail, al gaq ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv yaqlaol al gaq bhai ya moel-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai niailhai naldaiq nail ngaol: “Heeqphaq-ol, niil gaq thoil-oiq. Aivq nail haqbhoil sivtavq phao khalhai pevq lal nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal kovq lee-u phao kev dai, aivq bhai ngal bhi doevq kev movq haq neq, naoq bhai khalhai tavq nail-aiq. Naol neq, ngaq nail haoqnao lal yaoq” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq, daoq al daoq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yaqlaol al gaq neq, maq yaq sil yaoq-aol dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol al gaq maq ya sil-ail dai, Yeiqsul alhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. “Ngal kovq lee-u kev dai ngal aivq bhai bhi jaol movq haq neq, naoq bhai khalhai tavq nail” dai, Yeiqsul ge nail ngaol.

Yaqlaol al gaq neq, ganl niil juq salkhil khanq nail gaq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, gevq dov-a nail gaq iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail ge jel lavq-a nail ganl niil juq neq, maldil tsaq naol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul-i mail nl-a nail ganl maodai phaq jiav-ail haq nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail khal nl-a nail ganl juq bhai teevq phaq gil-aq teevq phaq dai, gevq dov haq neq, gevq dov-a nail haoqgavq phaldoiq al juq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai maq dail lai-ail khul-il dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.

Thaolphilluv-ol, Yeiqsul-i mail iqmoeq ilmoeq nl khi, iqmoeq ilmoeq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail nee mail, aivq bhai nqtavq bha bhi tsiqdal laivq-a nail ganl bhai kev dai, haoqgavq iqmoeq khe keiv nail lavqkhoel bhai, ngal naoq bhai gevq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai maq tsiqdal laivq-u nee mail, Yeiqsul Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi, aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail gaqkhoel juq bhai, daoq bivq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq sil khi gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq duq nia lal dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai mee nia phaq nl daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Liq tsel n nail lavqkhoel, gaqkhoel juq bhai aivq nail aqmaol bhi moel khi, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq pov aqyu juq jil lai khi aoq jaq-u phao, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail thaq dov ail haq lao dei-eiq. ‘Ngal nuljuq bhai bivq naol’ dai, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq ya-u kev dai, daonq dei-eiq dai. Ganl niil aq-u phao, ngaq-i mail cavq nail cov nail bhai, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaolhaq yu bhai ulcuvq lavqkhoel-ai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel, ulcuvq ya saol naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq kovq jil lal khi jaol-u phao: “Heeqphaq-ol, niil aq-il naol Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai milkhaoq bivq kovq naol laiq” dai, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Aqbhu Miqyail aivq bhai aivq noeqceiv-ai thaq nail yanq bhai nuljuq heeq kivq nail maq loq-ail.

Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai lee kev-u phao, nuljuq bhaqaoq ya naol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail, Yuldav milkhaoq, Saqmaqliv milkhaoq khi mail, nqjail miljail bhai kev dai, nuljuq ngaq nail salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq ya pevq lal naol” dai, Yeiqsul aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai ge gaq khi, gaqkhoel juq aivq bhai heldaiq-u phao, aivq bhai tsiqdal laivq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqdil aivq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aivq bhai maq moel nia-al.

Yeiqsul kovq dav lai nail bhai gaqkhoel juq heldaiq cov-ai thaq-u phao, aqgaq aqdoi phulleq dai, doi-nq thaq nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq thaiqphuq dai, dov lee khi, aqyu juq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq ge nail: “Gaqliqlail tsaol-aq juq-ol, khul khi mail nuljuq nqtavq phao gaollel khi heldaiq thailthaiq nail-aiq. Nuljuq nee mail pav-ail khi nqtavq kovtavq bha tsiqdal laivq-a nail bhai, ya daq-a nail Yeiqsul neq, nuljuq nail sivtavq nee nqtavq kovtavq bha kovq dav lai-a nail khe-ai, teevq pov gaoq yavq kha lee nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, gaqkhoel juq Saqloq dai khul nail gaoqjaoq nee mail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Gaoqjaoq al jaoq neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail maq eq-ail. Jaol n n-gaol tsao khaoq nail ee dai, eq-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Aqyu juq meenq bhai kovq kev ail khi, aqyu juq yavq nail ilkhaol pultavq khe teiv-nvq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Bheiqtuvluv, Yaolhaq, Yaqkov, Aqdaiqlaiq, Pillilpuv, Tholmav, Bhaqthaollaqmail, Maqthaiq, Aqlaqphail nail yaqyov Yaqkov, Seiqlul dai khul nail Silmoq khi mail Yaqkov nail yaqyov Yuldav niil juq ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail teevq gaq khe-ai, geeqlaoq hal hal-ail jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail juq neq, yaqmai-aq juq, Yeiqsul nail aqma Maqlil khi mail, Yeiqsul nail jaqbheq juq ngaol.
Teevq pov, aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq teevq yal nvq tsel gaq gaoq jil lai khi jaol-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol khi ge nail:

“Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq niil daoq maldil ya bhee lal naol. Yeiqsul bhai nieivq lal-a nail juq bhai gailkhaol hevq daiq bhiq-a nail Yuldav nail ganl, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal iqmoeq-u nee Daqbhil bhai juq khi ge-a nail daoq al daoq ngaol.
Yuldav al gaq, ngadao nail munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, ngadao nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ganl nl-a nail ngaol.

Aivq mao-ail haqeiv nail phaq nl khi, ya-a nail aqphoiq nee mail miltsaq teevq tsaol ul-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq uqhuq daoq pov phaq-ail ga-ail khi, aivq nail ovqmav pav-ail khi, aqul iqsanl mail, ga dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Ganl niil ganl Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, miltsaq al tsaol bhai aqyu juq nail daoq Aqjeiqdaqmal dai khul nail ngaol. Daoqceevq neq, aqsivq nail miltsaq dai, ge movq nail ngaol.
Tsiqeeq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
‘Aivq nail ilkhaol
iltsoiq tsoiq-ail khi
tsaol-aq maq jaol dai
bhi jiav dei-eiq.
Aivq nail alyaq iqsanl
yu bhai bivq yaoq’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ganl, ngadao juq nee mail salkhil tsao khanq nail teevq gaq tsel dov heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Yaolhaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq saol-u n-gaol nee, Yeiqsul kovq dav lai-u n-gaol kev dai, ngadao juq nee mail tsao tsao-ail, ngadao juq nee mail jaol nail teevq gaq ya pevq naol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq tsaol-aq nvq gaq bhai bhi tsel-a nail ngaol. Iqmoeq khe gaq nail aqmil neq, Yaolsai Bhaqsaqbhal dai khul khi, Yulthul dai iqsanl khul nail ngaol. Nvq gaq teevq gaq neq, Maqthil dail khul nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq geeqlaoq hal hal-ail ge nail: “Tsaol-aq iqsanl nail neema bhai heeq nia nail Heeqphaq-ol, Yuldav neq, saqlaq nail alyaq khi gaqkhoel nail alyaq khaonq-ail ceevq khi, aivq bhai geel-nvq nail jaol duq bhai lai-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nail haqbhoil ganl nl khi, gaqkhoel nail alyaq ya dai niil nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel, naoq-i mail tsel dov-a nail gaq bhai ge lavq yaoq” dai, geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu nvq gaq nail aqmil gevq khi, eellaoq bheq-u phao, Maqthil bhai tsaq lai-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Maqthil neq, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nee mail jaol nail alyaq ya-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqdeiqgoldeiq

Aq-u phao, lilmoel lil ma bhoe nail khe-ai teevq pov taivq-ail, nqtavq nee mail aqthel meel dov-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ilkhaol il lao lao-ail aqthel al meel bhee ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq moeqlal khe-ai dul nail miqjaq miqlail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Miqjaq miqlail al juq neq, bhoil-ai thaq khi, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nail kovtavq bhai naq lai khi, jiav nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhee lal khi, Aqhaqlal Miqyail-i mail bhi ge bhi thail-a nail khe-ai, mee nia phaq nail daoq ge-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Miqyail bhai ev nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jiav nail, milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee mail lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqthel al ya gaiq-u phao, tsaol-aq munl munl ma jil lal khi, ge-a nail daoq al daoq bhai yovqgavq nail daoq nee mail yovqgavq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi ge nail: “Daoq ge thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq niil juq iqsanl mail, Gaqliqlail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail laiq.
Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngadao juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq nail jeq-e nail daoq nee mail khalhai gaiq lee-a nail-aiq.

Ngadao juq neq, Bhaqthil milkhaoq, Miqdil milkhaoq, Illaq milkhaoq, Miqsolbholtaqmil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, Yuldav khi mail Gaqbhaqdaolciv milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, Bhoqthul khi mail Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq.

Phuqgil khi mail Paqbhullil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, Iljiltuv milkhaoq khi mail Khulleiqniq milkhaoq aqjail bhai jiav nail Liqbhul milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, Lolmav meenq nee mail lal-a nail daq-i juq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aol thaoq nail yu nail jeq-e juq maqkhaiq, Gaqlaqdeiq tsaol-aq khi mail Aqlal tsaol-aq, Miqyail-i mail nl-a nail eeq deedee nail ganl juq iqsanl mail, ngadao yovqgavq nail daoq nee mail, yovqgavq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq lai khi, “Khalheel meeq nial niil neq” dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, khal ge movq-ail ge ge-ail khi, “Aqyu juq neq, jilpheeq daol bov thaq nail niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv gaqkhoel tsel teevq gaq nee mail thulphaol khi, tsaol-aq al juq bhai aqthel aqkav kav dai, ge bhiq-a nail: “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khi mail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha khal jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, ngal ganl niil juq ge lavq bhel. Aqmeeq-ai naldaiq dei-eiq.
Tsaol-aq niil juq neq, nuljuq noeq nail khe-ai, jilpheeq daol bov-a nail maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niil aq-il neq, nqhao laoma naqli goiq lavq bhee lal-al teevq-eel ngaol.
Ganl niil neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Yaol-illav-i mail ge-ai thaq nail kheel ngaol.
Yaol-illav ge nail:
‘Miqyail-i mail
ge-ai thaq nail daoq neq,
daoq loi loi lai nail
aqn aqyanq lavqkhoel,
jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail
kovtavq bhai,
ngal ngaq nail Aqhaqlal
hoeldav bhiq naol.
Nuljuq nail
yaqmiq yaqyov juq,
Miqyail nail haqbhoil
gedan naol.
Nuljuq nail
malyov yovkhaoq juq
aqhaqlal lavqkhoel
nee ya moel naol.
Nuljuq nail
joiqmaoq juq iqsanl,
nvmav mav moel naol.
Aqn aqyanq al
kev lee-u phao,
ngaq nail yaqkav
juq nail kovtavq bhai,
yaqmiq yaqyov
maq tselpav dai,
ngaq nail Aqhaqlal
hoeldav bhiq khi,
ngaq nail haqbhoil
bhi gedan naol.
Nqtavq bhai
noeq-u maq dov nail phaq
ngal bhi moel naol.
Ngal miltsaq
kovtavq bhai,
aqsivq, miqjaq
tovq nail khi mail
miqjaq miqkhoiq
bhai bhi heeq
bhi moel nail niil juq
bhi moel naol.
Seiqleiq khaoqsail
eeq deedee nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
aqn n-gaol,
miltsaq kovtavq bhai
maq kev lee-u nee mail,
nlma navtsee dai
pevq ail khi,
bhala iqsanl
aqsivq khe-ai,
nel lal naol.
Aq-u phao,
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai
khal hal nail yaoq
gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai,
Miqyail hevqkovq
bhiq naol’ dai,
Yaol-illav ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, ngaq nail daoq aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul neq, nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, Miqyail aivq bhai juq khi, nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai bhaqaoq eeq nail ganl juq, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq khi mail bhi heeq bhiq moel nail phaq nl-a nail ngaol. Ganl al juq bhai heldaiq-u phao, Miqyail aivq bhai salkhil khanq nail bhai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u nee Miqyail heeq nia khi noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq oeqbal nl nail yu nail jeq-e bhai juq khi, aivq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Haq nail aoq nail sil nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail aivq bhai pheel bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, sil nail phaq aivq bhai maq nieivq thaiq nia-ail.
Aivq nail ganl Daqbhil niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
‘Heeqphaq Miqyail
ngaq nail sivtavq bhai
khaq mao iqsanl
jaol nail bhai,
ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Ngal khaq mao
iqsanl ivq dai,
aivq ngaq nail lavqmal
phao jaol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
ngaq nail neema
neesal ya khi,
ngal lavqkhiq
tsail nail lavqkhoel,
daoq ge nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq,
ngaq nail aqmaol
noeqthunq nail
lavqkhoel aqdoevq
ya doevq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
naol ngaq nail
Aqhaqlal bhai
sil nail milkhaoq bhai
maq khaonq-ail
ceevq lavq-al.
Naoq nail
Tsaolmeeq Tsaolhaol
gaq nail aqmaol
maq ya buvq
maq ya tsiq-ail dai,
naol nl naol.
Aqdoevq bhi
doevq nail gailkhaol
naol ngaq bhai cavq
naq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Naol ngaq-ai nee mail
jaol nail ngel-i mail,
ngal lavqkhiq
tsail nail phaq
bhee nail ngaol’ dai,
Daqbhil ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, eeq dee heel deedee nail, ngadao nail aqbhu heeqphaq Daqbhil nail ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai daolcoev dai, ge lavq bhel. Aivq sil khi, aivq bhai bavq pheeq-a nail luqdaol yanqgaol kev dai, ngadao juq jaol nail bha jiav nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq pevq khi, Miqyail-i mail aivq bhai saljial khanq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai, aivq heeq nia nail ngaol. ‘Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a lavqkhoel, Daqbhil khe-ai dul nail heeqphaq teevq gaq bhi dov lal naol’ dai, Miqyail daoqma saljial khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ganl, iqmoeq-u nee mail Daqbhil noeqheeq noeqmoel khi, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ge-ai thaq nail al neq, sil nail milkhaoq nail lavqkhoel, Khali bhai maq khaonq nail nee ovqtavq, aivq nail aqmaol maq ya buvq maq ya tsiq-ail dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, Yeiqsul al gaq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq iqsanl mail ganl al salkhil khanq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail lavqmal phao aivq bhai thaqeeq thaqheel khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bivq naol dai, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail daoqma saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aivq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il nuljuq ya gaiq ya moel thailthaiq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul Aqhaqlal Miqyail hoeldav lavq-a nail ngaol.
Daqbhil neq, nqtavq kovtavq bha dav lai-a nail maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ge nail:
‘Heeqphaq Miqyail
ngaq nail Heeqphaq
bhai ge bhiq-a nail:
Naoq bhai neejiav
jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai,
naoq nail aqkhil
kov-uvq bhai
ngal bhi jaol-u n-gaol kev dai,
ngaq nail lavqmal phao
jaoldeel yaoq’ dai,
Daqbhil ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail niilniai aqmeeq-ai heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail Yeiqsul al gaq bhai, Miqyail-i mail Heeqphaq khi mail Khali bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai suqsaq lal bhiq khi, “Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq khalhai ya khi nail-aiq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv khi mail gaqkhoel yaoq juq yaoq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail nuljuq nail oeqbal phaiq nia dai, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq nee, oeqbal noeq pov khi, Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil kov-uvq nee ulcuvq saol yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nuljuq Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai leevq-a nail kovpavq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ya naol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ‘Nuljuq bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bivq naol’ dai, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial daoq nuljuq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, nuljuq nail yaq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, eqyal bha jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Miqyail-i mail khal khul nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv neq, aqyu juq bhai mee nia phaq ge ge-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, gaq gaoq bivq-a nail ngaol. “Yeel niil yeel bhai doevq nail haqeiv nail tsaol-aq niil juq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail khi lainq-ai thaq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel bhai, nuljuq ya jel-ail dai, hevqkovq nail phaq bhai hav bhoel yaoq” dai, gaq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq daoq cavq daoq cov cov nail bhai tsaol-aq maodai gaq neema thaqtsaol lal khi, ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol, tsaol-aq hail hinl gaq bhee dai, aqyu juq nail munl bhai aol lal-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, gaqkhoel juq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail daoq naldaiq nail nee ovqtavq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqtsaoq tsaoq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq jaq tavq daol tavq nail nee ovqtavq, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq khaq mao iqsanl al juq nl nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi geesil nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, gaqkhoel juq neq, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq khi mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq mee nia phaq nl dol lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail teevq munl taivq-ail munl khi, nlmaoq iqsanl mail teevq gaq khe-ai yuq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq yovqgavq nail nlmaoq juq gaoq khi, loq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq yaoq n yaoq n nee mail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai teevq gaq khe-ai jil lai nail nee ovqtavq, aqyu juq nail neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi ilkhaol bhai lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail lavqkhoel, jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail aqyu juq bhai neekhaol sil nail ngaol. Hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail tsaol-aq juq, teevq n nee teevq n aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai bhi mao lal dai, Miqyail nl-a nail ngaol.
Teevq n neq, geeqlaoq hal nail yanq pevq nail kivq hail lail ma phao, naqli hail lavq bhai, Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq aqyu nvq gaq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, a bhai doevq lee-u nee mail aqkhil khil khoi khoi nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai nail juq bhai bhi hal jaq nail dai khi, yaoq n yaoq n nee yu aivq bhai bal lavq bhiq nail ngaol. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai jiav nail, mao-ail heldaiq meeq nail govkhoiq dai khul nail aqjail bhai, aivq bhai bhi jaol-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai nail bhai ya moel-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq bhai hal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq aivq bhai heldaiq khi, “Nv-nvq gaq bhai heldaiq yaoq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq ngaq bhai teevq phaq ganav bivq lavq nail jaol-aq dai, noeq khi, aivq aqyu nvq gaq bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Ngal phul heel maq aol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal aol nail phaq naoq bhai bivq naol. Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil kov-uvq nee thul khi, gailkhaol tsaol-aivq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Bheiqtuvluv tsaol-aq al gaq nail lavqmal lavq nee mail he thul bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail aivq nail aqkhil pavq-uvq khi mail cilmeiv phuqlul gaq aol lal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq tsaoq thul lal khi, gailkhaol tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq tsaoq tsaoq-ail tsao khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail lavqkhoel, aqyu nvq gaq nee mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.
Aivq gailkhaol tsao tsao-ail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail bhai, a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, mao-ail heldaiq meeq nail govkhoiq bhai jaoldeel khi hal jaq hal daol nail al gaq pevq nail bhai, aqyu juq heldaiq heeq-u phao, aivq alhai pevq lal-a nail bhai noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq, Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq-u phao, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, aqyu nvq gaq jaol nail, Saollavmoq nail gaqnaq yavqtsoel tsoel ma dai khul nail dao bhai tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq tsaol lavq nail bhai Bheiqtuvluv ya moel-u phao, tsaol-aq al juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq khul khi mail ganl niil ganl bhai noeq-u maq dov dai pevq nail-aiq. Nv-nvq gaq neq, nv-nvq gaq nail bhaqaoq khi mail nv-nvq gaq meeq nail haol nail bhaqda nee, tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai gailkhaol bhi tsao nia lal-a nail dai, nuljuq noeq khi, nv-nvq gaq bhai taivq-ail heldaiq nail laiq.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq, Ilcav, Yaqkov, aqyu juq nail Miqyail pevq khi, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal nail Miqyail neq, aivq nail Yaqkav Yeiqsul bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aivq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi, heeqphaq Phillav aivq bhai phaiq naol dai, noeqceiv-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, Phillav nail sivtavq bhai, nuljuq aivq bhai khaonq ha-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, meeq nail haol nail, tsaq nail daol nail gaq bhai khaonq ha khi, yu bhai heivq-a nail gaq bhai hal dov-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq lavq-a nail aqheel gaq bhai heivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Nv-nvq gaq neq, al nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail ya heeq ya moel-a nail tsaol-aq niil gaq, gaq aol lal-a nail neq, aivq Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, aqmil al aivq bhai, gaq bhi aol lal-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul bhaqda nee aivq neema thaqtsaol lal khi, nuljuq-i mail ya moel-a nail khe-ai, neema thaqtsaol nail al bhaqda nee, aivq meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq nail aqivq aqtsu juq maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail nl-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, alhai nl-a nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol.
‘Khali neq, haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ya sil naol’ dai, Miqyail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai juq khi, iqmoeq-u nee ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nl bhee-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nuljuq nail oeqbal tsiqhaol lavq nia dai, oeqbal noeq pov khi, aivq jaol nail bhai kovq lal yaoq.

Alhai nl haq neq, Miqyail nuljuq bhai neesal bhi ya khi, gaq teevq bhee bivq lavq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil tsel dov-ai thaq nail Yeiqsul dai mil-ai thaq nail Khali, aivq khoel-ai leevq nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, aq-u nee mail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail meeq nail haol nail juq bhai juq khi ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail aqsivq lav phal nail yanq maq kev lal-u kev dai, Yeiqsul neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai ya jaol nail ngaol.

Molseiq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail: ‘Nuljuq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel, aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil khoel-ai leevq naol. Al gaq, khal ge nail daoq nuljuq ya naldaiq naol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al gaq nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a lavqkhoel nee ya the ha naol’ dai, aivq ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Saqmeqlal nail yeel nee mail haoqnao khal dov lee-a nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, yanq niil nail ganl ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail aqjievq lilheel ngaol. ‘Naoq nail aqjievq lilheel bhaqda nee jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail, geeqlaoq ya naol’ dai, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial al daoq nail lavqkhoel, nuljuq iqsanl aol nail ngaol.
Miqyail aivq nail Yaqkav

Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq aqyu nvq gaq, tsaol-aq al juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, Philma juq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lovqphail nail juq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail eeq nail heel nail gaq khi mail, Saqduqgail juq lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq tsaol-aq al juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq nail bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul sil thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail ganl cavq bhiq thailthaiq nail bhai maqkhaiq, lee kev-a nail tsaol-aq al juq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, neema phail nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu nvq gaq bhai nieivq khi, niaohao n-gaol kev dai, thaonq bhai laol-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aq-u n-gaol neq, nqkivq kivq lee-aiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq maodai gaq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yaqyov-aq taivq-ail ngaq hinl gaq bhee nail ngaol.
Yaoq n yaoq, uvthaiq nail yovkav juq, aqivq aqtsu juq khi mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jil lai-a nail ngaol.
Philma Aqnaq, Gaqyaqphal, Yaolhaq, Aqleiqsaqdul khi mail, Philma nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail jil lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq gaqkhoel al nvq gaq bhai aqyu juq nail gaoltsi bhai hevq thaq khi, “Nul-nq nvq gaq, khaq sil gaq nail bhaqaoq, khaq sil gaq nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, thailhai nl nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv nail lavqkhoel Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal teevq bhee jaol khi, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail yovkav juq khi aqivq aqtsu juq-ol.
Aqkhil maq meeq nail niil gaq bhai nl bhiq-a nail meeq nail ganl khi mail, aivq khalhai khi meeq lai-a nail ganl, nv-nvq gaq bhai naldaiq nail dai ngal-aq neq,

nuljuq iqsanl khi mail Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, niilniai aqmeeq-ai heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq khi, Miqyail-i mail gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail, Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil bhaqda nee, tsaol-aq thoil gaq meeq lai khi, nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, nuljuq ilkhaol cov nail tsaol-aq-i mail bavq ha-a nail lovmav al heeq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, jioivqloiv daoqthaoq bhai kaovq nail lovmav heeq ma pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq maq ngel haq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq teevq gaq gail, maq hevqkovq nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, aivq nail aqmil maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq bhai bivq-ai thaq nail aqmil yaoq mil yaoq maq jiav-ail” dai, Bheiqtuvluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq geesil nail neema maq aol nail bhai, aqyu juq ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu nvq gaq haoqgavq maodai maq saol daiq thaq nail nl jaq keivq daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq Yeiqsul nee mail jaol daiq-a nail ngaol dai iqsanl, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, aqkhil meeq lai-a nail al gaq, aqyu nvq gaq nee mail thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai, aqyu juq ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq ge nia-ail.
Aq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq bhai maoqbhaoq nl nail aqduq nee mail bhi dov ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq taivq-ail ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Ngadao juq tsaol-aq niil nvq gaq bhai khalhai khi bhiq heeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu nvq gaq bhi heeq bhi moel nail niil phaq nl nail bhai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl mail ya heeq ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao juq khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq ge kivq-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ganl niil ganl yu bhai maq bhi gaiq-ail dai, ‘Aqmil al mil bhai juq juq-ail teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq gaoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq dei-eiq’ dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai aqkav kav dai ge bhiq naol” dai, ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq aqyu nvq gaq bhai khul kovq khi, “Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail teevq peivq-ail thaq gaoq ge thaq gaoq cavq thaq gaoq cov bhiq dei-eiq” dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq nail nee maqtsil nuljuq nail daoq naldaiq nail neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq naol laiq. Nuljuq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq saol-nvq daiq yaoq.
Nv-nvq gaq neq, nv-nvq gaq-i mail ya gaiq ya moel-a nail ganl juq maq ge maq thail mail, maq jaol kivq-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq, aqyu nvq gaq bhai aqkav kav dai, gaoq ge bhiq khi, phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq bhai khalhai ya khoeq ya jiovq bhiq nail dai, aqyu juq oeqbal maq halpov moel-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq meeq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl khi, lav meeq bhiq-a nail al gaq, liq tsel kovq jaiq ail-aoq nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq bhai phaiq bhiq-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq neq, aqyu nvq gaq nail aqtsaoq juq jaol nail bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Philma juq khi mail aqivq aqtsu juq aqyu nvq gaq bhai khal ge bhiq-a nail iqsanl mail, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ya gaiq-u phao, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, Miqyail bhai hal-a nail: “Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail Heeqphaq-ol, naol neq, nq teivq mil teivq teivq-a nail gaq ngaol. Iqyaq iqma bhai iqsanl, teivq-a nail ngaol. Khal jaol khal jiav nail iqsanl mail, naoq-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Naol Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi, naoq nail yaqkav Daqbhil nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee mail niailhai bhi ge-a nail ngaol:
‘Khul khi mail
yu nail jeq-e juq,
neema phail
deedee nail ngel-aiq.
Khul khi mail
miltsaq tsaol-aq yaq juq
ganl maq tsoiq nail
phaq bhai
saol-nvq nail ngel-aiq.
Heeqphaq Miqyail
khi mail
aivq-i mail aqtseel
hoeldav-ai thaq nail
Khali bhai
genl dev nail dai khi,
miltsaq nail heeqphaq juq
khi mail
uvthaiq nail juq iqsanl
thul lal khi
bhoi lal jil lal-a nail ngaol.’

Naoq-i mail aqtseel hoeldav-ai thaq nail naoq nail Meeqnail Haolnail Yaqkav Yeiqsul bhai genl dev nail dai khi, heeqphaq Heiqlol khi mail, heeqphaq Bhoqthil Phillav, yu nail jeq-e juq khi mail Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, meenq niil meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq gaq khe-ai, jil lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq, naoq nail bhaqaoq khi mail naol neema tsaq nail khe-ai pevq lal dai, aq-u nee naoq-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail juq, jil lai khi nl-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq-ol, aqyu juq nvjuq bhai lav cov nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail bhai heldaiq khi, naoq nail yaqkav pevq nail nvjuq bhai naoq nail daoq ge bhiq thail bhiq-u phao, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, tsaojao-ai lavq yaoq.

Nal nail goel nail bhai lav meeq nia dai, naoq nail aqlavq gaol tsaoq khi, naoq nail Meeqnail Haolnail Yaqkav Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhaqda nee bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq khi mail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl yaoq” dai, aqyu juq geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq geeqlaoq hal gaq-u phao, aqyu juq-i mail jaol nail ilkhaol al il dao lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhee lal khi, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, Miqyail nail daoq ge bhiq thail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail munl mul lao-ail neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, neenoeq teevq phaq taivq-ail noeq nail ngaol. Khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq jiav nail nlmaoq juq, yovqgavq nail ngaol dai maq ge dai, khal jiav nail nlmaoq juq iqsanl mail, teevq gaq khe-ai yuq-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Yeiqsul gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ganl, gaqkhoel juq eeq deedee nail bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel nee salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol eeq deedee nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel haq nail aoq nail teevq gaq iqsanl maq jaol-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq khi mail ilkhaol khal jiav nail juq, miltsaq khi mail ilkhaol gaoq khi, ya-a nail phul gaqkhoel juq nail sivtavq bhai oil thaq lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel jaol nail teevq gaq nee teevq gaq loq nail khe-ai, bhoil bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Gulbhaqlul eeljaol laol-n bhai doevq lee-a nail Leiqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a, Yaolsai dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Gaqkhoel juq aivq bhai Bhaqnaqbhal dai mil phal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Bhaqnaqbhal dai ge nail neq, gaq bivq nail gaq dai, ge movq nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, aivq nail miltsaq gaoq khi, ya-a nail phul al gaqkhoel juq nail sivtavq bhai oil thaq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqnaqnil dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq khi mail aivq nail khaqma Saqphillav, aqyu nvq maolyaq iqsanl, miltsaq teevq tsaol gaoq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq maolyaq neema tsaq khi, gaoq ya-a nail aqphoiq al teevq bhoil oil thaq-ail ceevq khi, teevq bhoil taivq-ail gaqkhoel juq nail sivtavq bhai oil thaq lai-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv ge nail: “Aqnaqnil-ol, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq-a nail maqkhaiq, miltsaq aqphoiq teevq bhoil oil thaq-ail ceevq-a nail bhai maqkhaiq, naol thailhai nl movq nail neema teevq bhee aol lal dai, khul khi mail neivq Saqdaq naoq bhai bhi uvthaiq-a nail-aiq.

Miltsaq al maq gaoq-u nee mail, naoq nail maq ngel ail laiq. Gaoq khi mail ya-a nail aqphoiq iqsanl naoq nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Khul khi mail thailhai nl nail dai, naol noeq-a nail-aiq. Naol tsaol-aq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqnaqnil daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, ga tsuq-ail khi sil-a nail ngaol. Ganl al ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail geesil deedee nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq thul lal khi, maoltoev toev khi, bavq duq ail-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, naqli hail lavq niidai khaiq-ail khi, aivq nail khaqma gaq gaoq lal-a nail ngaol. Pevq lal-a nail ganl al juq aivq nail khaqma gaq teevq peivq-ail maq heeq nia-ail.
“Nul-nq nvq gaq-i mail miltsaq gaoq-a nail, aqphoiq niidai teevq-eel ngaol laiq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. “Niidai teevq-eel ngaol” dai, aivq ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, khul khi mail Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal bhai laonqdaiq nail-aiq. Thoiq, naoq nail yovjil bhai bavq duq ail-a nail juq govkhoiq bhai kovq kev lal-aoq nial. Aqyu juq naoq bhai iqsanl bal-aivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq iqsanl, teevq pov taivq-ail, Bheiqtuvluv nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai ga tsuq-ail khi sil-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq aol lal-u phao, yaqmai-aq al gaq sil-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq bhai iqsanl, aivq nail yovjil nail aqjail bhai duqpheeq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Khali yaq munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, ganl al ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail geesil deedee nail ngaol.

Gaqkhoel juq tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq khi mail noeq-u maq dov nail mee nia phaq nl-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl mail neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, Saollavmoq nail gaqnaq yavqtsoel tsoel ma bhai jil lai-a nail ngaol.
Yu teevq gaq iqsanl aqyu juq nee mail maq jil lai tseq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq maodai aqyu juq bhai ev lal-a nail ngaol.
Yaqyov-aq maqkhaiq, yaqmai-aq maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail tsaol-aq juq mao jaiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqtuvluv gailkhaol tsaol-aivq-u phao, aivq nail nelne taivq-ail ngaol-aoq, nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai aqhaiq bhi haiq bav ail nail dai khi, yu nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai bal lavq khi, gailkhaol gailbhaq bhai iqjial khi mail aildeel kovtavq bhai bavq iqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nail aqjail bhai jiav nail meenq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq maodai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jil lal-a nail ngaol. Nal nail tsaol-aq juq khi mail neivq aol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai hel lavq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl mail meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Philma khi mail Saqduqgail nail munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail aqyu juq nail aqtsaoq iqsanl mail neekhaol maq sil nail lavqkhoel nee neema phail deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, teevq gaq khe-ai tsaoq thul lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq gaqkhoel juq bhai nieivq khi, thaonq bhai laol-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq hul-iq tsilma thaonq nail lolgov phao khi, aqyu juq bhai hevq dol-aivq khi ge bhiq-a nail:

“Nuljuq, lai yaoq. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel bhai thulphaol khi, tsaol-aq al juq bhai aqsivq doevq phal lal nail ganl teevq bhee teevq lovq ge bhiq thail bhiq lai yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nqhao navqmav-ail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aol lai khi cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi mail aivq nail aqtsaoq juq lal khi, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma khi mail Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai khul jil-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Thaonq bhai aol nail gaqkhoel juq bhai, hevq dov ail yaoq” dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Khoel gai-aivq-a nail tsaol-aq al juq thaonq bhai ail kev-u phao, gaqkhoel juq bhai maq moel-al. Aq-u phao, aqyu juq maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma juq jaol nail bha kovq lai khi, niailhai ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol:

“Thaonq nail lolgov aqmeeq-ai pheeqthaiq-ai thaq khi, lovq nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl lolgov bhai lovq nail bhai, nvjuq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvjuq lolgov phao daiq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Philma aqivq juq khi mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lovqphail nail juq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail eeq nail heel nail gaq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, khalhai pevq lal thaq nail-aiq dai, noeq-u maq dov-ail.

Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq aol lal khi ge nail: “Nuljuq-i mail thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq, niil aq-il uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai thulphaol khi, a bhai jaol nail juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Eeq nail heel nail tsaol-aq al gaq aivq nail tsaol-aq juq hevq khi, gaqkhoel juq bhai hevq ail-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq aqyu juq bhai lovmav liv lal nail bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, gaqkhoel juq bhai khal nl movq-ail maq nl bhiq dai, hel lavq-a nail ngaol.
Gaqkhoel juq bhai hel lavq khi, maoqbhaoq nl nail tsaol-aq juq nail sivtavq bhai bhi jaol-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Philma aqyu juq bhai naldaiq nail:

“Aqmil niil mil bhai juq juq-ail, thaq gaoq cavq thaq gaoq cov dei-eiq dai, nvjuq nuljuq bhai daoq aqduq aqtsil tsil dai bivq-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq cavq nail cov nail ganl juq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq meenq lao-ail gaiq doi ail-aoq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq ya sil-a nail neq, nvjuq guq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq laijai laijai-ail ge nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Bheiqtuvluv khi mail gaqkhoel juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq nail daoq nee maqtsil, nvjuq Miqyail nail daoq ya naldaiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq-i mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail Yeiqsul bhai, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal nail Miqyail-i mail gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq oeqbal noeq pov khi, Miqyail aqyu juq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq bhiq nia dai, Miqyail Yeiqsul bhai uvthaiq nail gaq khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq bhi pevq lal khi, aivq nail lavqmal phao aivq bhai thaqeeq thaqheel-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq ganl niil juq salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal iqsanl salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail al neq, Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, gaqkhoel juq bhai deeq heivq movq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ev nail Gaqmaqleiqlal dai mil-ai thaq nail Phaqliqsail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail gaq ngaol. Aivq maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma nail lavqkhoel nee thul lal khi, gaqkhoel juq bhai teevq yanq hevq dol-aivq yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq ge nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq tsaol-aq niil juq bhai khalhai nl bhiq nail dai khi, aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq daiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aq-u phao Tuldav dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq dov lal khi, ‘Ngal neq, eeq nail heel nail teevq gaq ngaol’ dai, ge nail ngaol. Aivq nail haoqnao iqsanl tsaol-aq liq yal gaq tsaothe-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai deeq heivq gaq-u phao, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail pav-ail sav-ail khi, peivq-ail gil-a nail ngaol.

Aivq sil gaq khi, milkhaoq yaq bhai aqmil oil-u phao, Yuldav dai mil-ai thaq nail Gaqliqlail tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe lal dai, aivq milkhaoq yaq teevq pav ganav juq bhai jalmul mul-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail haoqnao tsao the nail tsaol-aq iqsanl teevq munl jaol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq luq-ail seil-ail khi, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, pav-ail sav ail-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, niil aq-il tsaol-aq niil juq bhai teevq phaq iqsanl thaq nl bhiq. Thailhai bhi jaol yaoq. Aqyu juq noeq khi nl nail phaq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail noeq dov khi nl nail ngel haq neq, luq-ail seil-ail naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail bhi nl-a nail ngel haq neq, nuljuq maq lav cov nia-ail. Al ovqtavq, nuljuq Miqyail bhai genl dev nail tsaol-aq pevq lal la geiq” dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Gaqmaqleiqlal nail daoq naldaiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq gaqkhoel al juq bhai khul kovq khi deeq-a nail ngaol. “Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, yu bhai thaq gaoq ge thaq gaoq thail dei-eiq” dai, aqkav kav dai, ge bhiq khi phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhaqda nee aqyu juq khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai daq nail neq, geel-nvq naol dai, Miqyail noeq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, gaqkhoel juq maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma nail sivtavq nee lavqkhiq teevq tsail dov ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq yaoq n yaoq n nee mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai maqkhaiq, ilkhaol bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul neq Khali ngaol dai, khaq mao iqsanl, cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel yaqlaol juq mao lal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Heiqlaqsal daoq ge nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Heiqbhail tsaol-aq juq bhai daoq mao nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaoq n yaoq n nee mail jaqjaq daoldaol bhoil bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq nail miqtsiq miqma juq aqmeeq-ai maq ya nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq yaqlaol juq iqsanl bhai khul jil khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Nvjuq Miqyail nail daoq cavq nail niil khaonq-ail ceevq khi, jaqjaq daoldaol bhoil bhiq nail neq, maq tsaq-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai tsaol-aq sivq gaq tsel dov yaoq. Aqyu juq neq, aqmil aqmeeq dov nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq bhee aol nail tsaol-aq khi mail, neenoeq neekha teevq bhee aol nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Nvjuq aqyu juq bhai jaqjaq daoldaol bhoil bhiq nail ganl niil bhi nl naol.
Nvjuq neq, khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal hal-ail daoq cavq daoq cov cov naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge nail bhai munl al munl neema tsaq khi, tsaol-aq niil juq bhai tsel dov-a nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail neema teevq bhee aol khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal iqsanl teevq bhee aol nail Saqteiqphaq khi mail Pillilpuv, Bhaolkhaoq, Nilgaqnaoq, Tilmoq, Bhaqmeiqnal khi mail, Aqdil-aoq meenq bhai jaol nail Nilgaolla, niil juq ngaol. Nilgaolla neq, yu nail jeq-e pevq khi, jel lal-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aol thaoq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq tsaol-aq al sivq gaq bhai gaqkhoel juq nail sivtavq bhai hel lavq-a nail ngaol. Gaqkhoel juq geeqlaoq hal khi, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq gaiq doi ail khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai yaqlaol juq maodai mao lal khi Philma juq mee nia gaq iqsanl, neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Saqteiqphaq neq, geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol khi, yu nail sivtavq bhai mao-ail eeq nail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq khi mail bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Khulleiqniq milkhaoq, Aqleiqsaqdul milkhaoq, Gillilciv milkhaoq khi mail Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail bhuq ail-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq juq, tsaoq thul lal khi, Saqteiqphaq nee mail jil pheel jil lul jaq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail neenoeq neekha khi mail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee, aivq ge nail daoq bhai aqyu juq maq jil gaq nia-ail.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai maoqbhaoq khoiq nl bhiq khi, niailhai bhi ge-a nail ngaol: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, Molseiq bhai iqsanl, Miqyail bhai iqsanl, khal ge movq-ail ge nail bhai, nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Milkhaoq yaq juq, aqivq aqtsu juq khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail juq Saqteiqphaq bhai neema phail lal dai, aqyu juq mee nia phaq ge ge-ail gaq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Saqteiqphaq bhai nieivq khi, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma nail sivtavq bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, maq tsaq nail salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khul thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq al juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, meeq nail haol nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai khi mail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail ganl bhai khaq mao iqsanl, khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol.

Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma niil il bhai peiv ha khi, Molseiq-i mail nvjuq bhai bhi thaoq khal leevq lavq-a nail aol bhai iqsanl, lav phal naol dai, aivq ge nail bhai nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl lao-ail, Saqteiqphaq bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq-u phao, aivq nail maivphaoq nqtavq gaqkhoel nail maivphaoq khe-ai dul nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, “Aqyu juq ge nail khe-ai ngel naol laiq” dai, Philma Saqteiqphaq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Saqteiqphaq ge nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq juq khi mail aqphiq aqbhal juq-ol, naldaiq yaoq. Ngadao nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq, Haqlaq meenq bhai maq jaol ail-u nee mail, Miqsolbholtaqmil milkhaoq bhai jaol-u phao, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Miqyail, aivq jaol nail bha dov lee-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Naoq nail milkhaoq khi mail naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, ngaq-i mail cavq naq nail milkhaoq bhai ail yaoq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq Khaqlaqdail tsaol-aq nail milkhaoq

Aq-u phao, milkhaoq niil khaoq nail lavqkhoel, aivq nail aqkhil teevq naoq daq dai iqsanl maq bivq haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq yaq maq jaol lee-u nee mail, ‘Milkhaoq niil khaoq naoq bhai iqsanl, naoq nail aqjievq lilheel juq bhai iqsanl bivq naol’ dai, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai daoqma saljial ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail aivq bhai niailhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: ‘Naoq nail aqjievq lilheel juq neq, yu nail milkhaoq bhai daq-i ya jiovq khi, aqyu juq milkhaoq yaq al juq nail kov-uvq bhai liq yal kovq bhee dai, yaqkav ya jiovq nail nee ovqtavq, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq bhai yaqkav bhi jiovq-a nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai, ngal yalkhaq dal bhiq naol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq dov ail khi, niilniai ngaq bhai uqhuq thaoq lee nail ngaol’ dai, Miqyail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol bhai tavq lai nail daoqma saljial, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nail yaqyov Ilcav doevq lee khi, eivq n bhee lal-u phao, aivq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Ilcav iqsanl, aivq nail yaqyov Yaqkov bhai, bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqkov iqsanl aivq nail yaqyov tsel-nvq gaq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov al juq neq, ngadao nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel, aqmil dov nail aqbhal tsel-nvq gaq ngaol.

Yaqkov nail yaqyov juq neq, aqyu juq nail jaqbheq Yaolsai bhai neekhaol maq sil nail ngel-i mail, yu bhai gaoq jaq khi, yu-i mail Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai yaqkav bhi jiovq ail nail dai khi, gaoq jaq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq nee mail jaol khi, aivq ya daq nail haq dee aoq deedee nail iqsanl bhai, bhi jel ail-a nail ngaol. Yaolsai Iljiltuv nail heeqphaq Phaqlaol nail sivtavq bhai ail-u phao, Miqyail aivq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neenoeq neekha bivq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, heeqphaq Phaqlaol Yaolsai bhai, Iljiltuv milkhaoq khi mail, aivq jaol nail ilkhaol bhai bhi uvthaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Iljiltuv milkhaoq khaoq lao khi mail Khaqnaq milkhaoq khaoq lao-ail moevq nail sivq nail phaq kev lee khi, haq dee aoq deedee nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yaqkov nail yaqyov juq jaq nail daol nail phaq maq halpov ya nia-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ‘Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai gov jiav naol geiq’ dai, Yaqkov ya gaiq-u phao, aivq nail yaqyov juq bhai iqmoeq khe pov bhi ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nvq pov teevq pov gaoq ail-u phao, Yaolsai aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai, ‘Ngal neq, Yaolsai ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Phaqlaol iqsanl Yaolsai nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai ya heeq nia-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yaolsai aivq nail aqbhu Yaqkov khi mail, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai bhi hevq lai-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl mail sivq tsel ngaq gaq bhee nail ngaol.
Yaqkov iqsanl Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai ail khi, aivq iqsanl, aivq nail yaqyov juq iqsanl, a bhai sil gil-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq bhai, Seiqjeiq meenq bhai bavq kol laivq khi, Seiqjeiq meenq bhai jaol nail, Haqmaoq nail yaq juq bhai Aqbhaqlaqhaq-i mail phul bivq khi ul-ai thaq nail luqdaol bhai, duqpheeq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai jaq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial al daoq bhee lal nail yanq aqjail jail lal-u phao, Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai ngadao nail jeq-e jaq-a, mao deedee lal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yaolsai bhai maq heeq nia nail heeqphaq teevq gaq dov lal khi Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai uvthaiq-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq al gaq, ngadao nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai jalmul mul goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi, yaqbeiv juq bhai heivq dai, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq khi, yaqbeiv juq bhai bhi tsiq ha ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai mao-ail meeq nail Molseiq dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqyov teevq gaq doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Bhala hail heeq bhee dai, aivq bhai ilkhaol bhai tsu-a nail ngaol.
Haoqnao aivq bhai tsiq ha ail-u phao, Phaqlaol nail yaqmiq-i mail, aivq nail yaq khe-ai, tsi tsu-a nail ngaol.
Molseiq neq, Iljiltuv tsaol-aq nail neenoeq neekha iqsanl mail ya saol-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, daoq ge nail maqkhaiq, ganl nl nail maqkhaiq, gaq kav deedee nail ngaol.
Aivq liq tsel kovq bhee lal-u phao, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq bhai heldaiq ail nail dai, noeq dov lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Iljiltuv nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a teevq gaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail bhai Molseiq ya moel-u phao, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a al gaq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq khi, Iljiltuv nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai nl kovq bhiq khi mail, heivq-a nail ngaol.

‘Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel nail bhai maqkhaiq, ngal ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai hevqkovq nail khi bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq heeq nia ail jaol-aq’ dai, Molseiq noeq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail.

Yaoq n yaoq, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a nvq gaq aqtsaoq khaq pheeljaq nail bhai ya moel khi, ‘Aqtsaoq juq-ol, nul-nq nvq gaq neq aqivq jaqbheq ngaol. Khul khi mail khaq pheeljaq nail-aiq’ dai, ge khi, aqyu nvq gaq bhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lai nail dai khi, he phail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqtsaoq bhai khaq pheeljaq lai-a nail al gaq Molseiq bhai doeq ha gai khi ge nail: ‘Nvjuq bhai uvthaiq khi yalkhaq dal nail gaq jiovq yaoq dai, khaq sil gaq naoq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail-aiq.
Milgaol naol Iljiltuv tsaol-aq al gaq bhai heivq-a nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai iqsanl heivq movq nail laiq’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Molseiq daoq al daoq ya gaiq-u phao, Mildiqyaq milkhaoq bhai tsaol-aivq khi jaol ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq a bhai jaol-u phao, yaqyov nvq gaq jaol lee-a nail ngaol.

Liq tsel kovq jel-ail khi, Silnaq gaoqjaoq nail aqjail bhai jiav nail haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai, aqgoe jiavbuv lavqkhoel miqjaq bhaol khi, miqjaq miqlail nail lavqkhoel nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq bhai Molseiq ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Aivq al bhai ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, heldaiq duq nail dai khi, aqjail bhai jiil laivq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail aqthel aivq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

‘Ngal neq, naoq nail aqphiq aqbhal nail Miqyail, Aqbhaqlaqhaq, Ilcav, Yaqkov nail Miqyail ngaol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Molseiq geesil khi aqjuq juq nail ngel-i mail, maq heldaiq tseq-ail.
Miqyail aivq bhai gaoq ge bhiq-a nail: ‘Naoq nail saiqnaov loev yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail thulphaol-nvq thaq nail jaol duq niil dao neq, meeq nail haol nail jaol duq ngaol.

Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel-ai ngaq nail tsaol-aq bhai yu khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail bhai ngal maldil ya moel khi, aqyu juq maq daq tsaol-ail dai, gul nail aqthel bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai bhi jel-ail nail dai khi, ngal yavq kha lee-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il lal yaoq. Ngal naoq bhai Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai khoel gai-aivq naol’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

‘Nvjuq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq khi, yalkhaq dal nail gaq jiovq yaoq dai, khaq sil gaq naoq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail-aiq’ dai, Molseiq al gaq bhai aqyu juq ge khi khaonq ha-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq uvthaiq nail gaq khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq bhi jiovq nail khi mail, Miqyail khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aqgoe jiavbuv lavqkhoel bhai Molseiq-i mail moel-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq bhai Miqyail juq khi Molseiq bhai khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Molseiq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq bhai hevq dov-a nail ngaol. Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, aqnel dai khul nail iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, liq tsel kovq bhee dai, tsaol-aq maq jaol nail haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaol-u phao maqkhaiq, aivq bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq khi mail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl-a nail ngaol.

Molseiq al gaq, ‘Miqyail ngaq bhai bhi dov lal lavq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail jeq-e jaq-a lavqkhoel aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq nuljuq nail haqbhoil bhi dov lal naol’ dai, Molseiq Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jil lal khi jaol-u phao, aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail al gaq, Molseiq ngaol. Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq al gaq iqsanl, aivq ngaol. Silnaq gaoqjaoq bhai nqtavq gaqkhoel daoq ge tsaoq lee-u phao jaol nail gaq iqsanl, aivq ngaol. Ngadao bhai bivq nail haqbhoil, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail daoq ya-a nail gaq iqsanl aivq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq neq, Molseiq nail daoq maq naldaiq-ail, Molseiq bhai khaonq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Iljiltuv milkhaoq bhai kovq lai movq nail neema taivq-ail aol nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Aqloq

Yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel, aqyu juq niaoqnel niaoq yaq nail maolkhoel teevq maol teivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, maolkhoel al maol bhai danq bhiq danq bhiq-ail, aqyu juq nail aqlavq-i mail teivq-a nail maolkhoel bhai thaqeeq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, aqgil juq bhai uqhuq bhi thaoq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
‘Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e jaq-a juq-ol,
nuljuq haqaiq mildai
haqtsoiq haqyal bhai
liq tsel kovq jaol-u phao,
ngaq bhai jaiqyaq
laol lavq-a nail laiq.
Danq nail phaq
danq lavq-a nail laiq.
Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq.
Uqhuq thaoq nail
haqbhoil nuljuq-i mail
lav sav-ai thaq nail
Maollov miqyail nail
maolkhoel yavqtsoel
khi mail
Leiqphaq miqyail nail
aqgil maolkhoel bhai
nuljuq thaqeeq khi,
bavq bavq-ail,
tsao-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
ngal nuljuq bhai
Bhaqbhulloq milkhaoq
a phao bal-nvq bhai
pheethaiq khi
hel-aivq naol’ dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq, haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai jaol-u phao, salkhil khanq nail haqphal yavqtsoel jiav nail ngaol. ‘Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail khe-ai cov yaoq’ dai, Miqyail Molseiq bhai ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, Molseiq cov-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq nail sivtavq nee, milkhaoq al khaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, Miqyail the dov-a nail ngaol. Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq, Yaolsu nee mail milkhaoq niil khaoq oil nail dai khi aol lal-u phao, haqphal nail yavqtsoel al tsoel iqsanl bavq bhoel laivq-a nail ngaol. Haqphal nail yavqtsoel al tsoel neq, Daqbhil nail yeel bhai kev dai, jiav nail ngaol.

Daqbhil neq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai halpov moel-a nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq pevq khi, ‘Naoq nail haqbhoil jaol duq bhi cov lavq yaoq’ dai, Yaqkov nail Miqyail bhai hal khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil ilkhaol cov-a nail gaq neq, Saollavmoq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, eeq dee heel deedee nail Miqyail neq, tsaol-aq-i mail cov-a nail ilkhaol bhai jaol nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail teevq gaq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol:
‘Nqtavq neq,
ngal joiqjaq nail
doiqbev bev ma ngaol.
Miltsaq neq,
ngaq nail aqkhil
tsaoq thaq duq ngaol.
Ngaq nail haqbhoil
nuljuq ilkhaol
khalhai cov heeq.
Ngaq nail naq duq
khul dao bhai
jiav nail-aiq’ dai,
Miqyail ge nail ngaol.
‘Al juq iqsanl
ngaq-i mail
teivq-ai thaq nail
maq ngel laiq’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail neema khadai dai-ail gaol nail-aiq. Naqkov khadai dai-ail thul nail-aiq. Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq juq khe-ai khadai dai-ail jaoq nail-aiq. Nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq khe-ai dul khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai lav tsoiq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal-i mail maq khoeq maq jiovq daiq-a nail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail khul gaq jaol nail-aiq. ‘Tsaq nail daol nail gaq lee naol’ dai, ge nail juq bhai, aqyu juq deeq heivq-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il nuljuq iqsanl, tsaq nail daol nail al gaq bhai yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq khi tavq heivq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail bivq lee-a nail, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai ya-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, nuljuq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al bhai nuljuq maq naldaiq-al” dai, Saqteiqphaq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Saqteiqphaq alhai ge nail bhai ya gaiq-u phao, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl lavqkhoel khe aol nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, haoqgil keivq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Saqteiqphaq nail lavqkhoel Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal teevq bhee jaol khi, aivq nqtavq phao gaollel daiq-u phao, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail lavqmal phao Yeiqsul thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai maqkhaiq, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq ge nail: “Heldaiq! Nqtavq phao-ai thaq khi Miqyail nail lavqmal phao Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov thulphaol nail bhai ngal moel thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq gul gul-ail, yovqgavq nail naqkhaol bhai yovqgavq daqtsoiq khi, Saqteiqphaq jaol nail bha tsaol laivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, meenq meenq jail-ai aivq bhai he dol-aivq khi, lovmav-i mail liv-a nail ngaol. Salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq juq, yovqgavq nail phailkhaoq yovqgavq loev khi, Saolluv dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqyov-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai oil thaq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Saqteiqphaq bhai lovmav liv thailthaiq-u phao, Saqteiqphaq geeqlaoq hal hal-ail, “Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-ol, ngaq nail aqhaqlal bhai hav bhoel lavq yaoq” dai, ge-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi, “Heeqphaq-ol, aqyu juq nl thailthaiq nail oeqbal niil, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai thaq thaq dei-eiq” dai, mailma-ail ge-a nail ngaol. Alhai ge gaq khi sil-a nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai alhai heivq nail bhai Saolluv iqsanl, neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u n-gaol nee mail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail Khali yaq nail munl, khoeq dee jiovq deedee nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, gaqkhoel juq maq ngel nail neq, Khali yaq juq iqsanl mail, gaoq ail gail ail khi, Yuldav milkhaoq khi mail Saqmaqliv milkhaoq doi dai, phaol ail-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Saqteiqphaq bhai duq pheeq-ail khi, nioilkhaoq khaoq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Saolluv neq, Khali yaq nail munl bhai lav peivq lav boev nail dai khi, nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq teevq il nee teevq il dav lai dav lai-ail, yaqyov-aq bhai maqkhaiq, yaqmai-aq bhai maqkhaiq, nieivq khi thaonq bhai laol-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, gaoq ail gail ail-a nail Khali yaq al juq, doidoi-ai geeqlaoq daoq cavq ail-a nail ngaol.
Pillilpuv iqsanl, Saqmaqliv nail milkhaoq khe meenq teevq meenq bhai ail khi, aqyu juq bhai Khali nail ganl cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq aivq cavq nail bhai ya gaiq khi, aivq-i mail nl-a nail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq bhai ya moel-u phao, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail thaq khi, aivq cavq nail daoq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neivq aol nail tsaol-aq mee nia gaq nail lavqkhoel nee, neivq juq gul gul-ail dov ail-a nail ngaol. Khil sil lavq sil sil nail tsaol-aq khi mail, aqkhil khil khoi khoi nail tsaol-aq mee nia gaq bhai iqsanl, lav meeq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, meenq al meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai Silmoq dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, maolovq lovq khi Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq bhai noeq-u maq dov dai, bhi pevq ail-a nail ngaol. “Ngal neq, eeq nail heel nail teevq gaq ngaol” dai, aivq ge nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, eeq yaq nil yaq iqsanl mail ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, eeq deedee nail bhaqaoq dai khul nail, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq nial” dai, ge ge-ail, aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq, tsaq dai maolovq lovq daiq bhiq khi, aqyu juq bhai noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl daiq bhiq-a nail, maoq lal-aoq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl khi mail Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil bhai tavq nail, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail ganl, Pillilpuv cavq nail cov nail bhai, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol lal khi, yaqyov-aq iqsanl yaqmai-aq iqsanl ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Silmoq al gaq iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq ulcuvq saol khi, Pillilpuv nee mail maq gaoq ail dai, jaol-a nail ngaol. Bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq khi mail, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl nail bhai ya moel-u phao, aivq noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq deedee ail-a nail ngaol.

Saqmaqliv tsaol-aq Miqyail nail daoq hav bhoel nail ganl, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail gaqkhoel juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq bhai, a bhai khoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq a bhai lai kev khi, tsaol-aq al juq Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ya dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq teevq gaq iqsanl, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal maq ya haq-al. Aqyu juq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee ulcuvq saol-a teevq-eel ngaol.
Bheiqtuvluv khi mail Yaolhaq aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ya-a nail ngaol.

Gaqkhoel al nvq gaq, yu nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yu Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ya-a nail bhai Silmoq al gaq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq phul oil lavq khi niailhai ge nail ngaol:
“Khaq sil gaq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal aqlavq bavq dav bhiq-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ya dai, bhaqaoq thoil, ngaq bhai iqsanl bivq lavq yaoq” dai, hal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Miqyail nail kovpavq bhai phul-i mail ul naol dai, naol noeq nail ngel-i mail, naol naoq nail phul nee mail luq-ail seil-ail yaoq.
Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai naoq nail neema maq daol nail ngel-i mail, ganl niil ganl naoq-ai nee teevq peivq-ail maq tavq-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, haqeiv deedee nail naoq nail neenoeq thoil noeq, noeq phal yaoq. Alhai noeq nail phaq bhai, oeqbal phaiq lavq dai, Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neema lavqkhoel khe oil uvq-ai thaq nail maq meeq nail phaq naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq bhee aol khi, oeqbal-i mail naoq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Silmoq ge nail: “Nul-nq nvq gaq-i mail khal ge-a nail niil juq, teevq phaq-ail ngaq nail kovtavq bhai maq ya kev lee dai, ngaq nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq salkhil khanq khanq-ail, Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq khi mail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Kovq ail thailthaiq-u phao, Saqmaqliv nail julgu mee nia gu bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq Pillilpuv bhai ge bhiq lee-a nail: “Pul-nvq phao kovq dov ail yaoq. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail Gaqsaq meenq bhai ail nail gailkhaol bhai ail yaoq” dai, khoel bhiq-a nail ngaol. Gailkhaol al khaol neq, haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai daol nail ngaol.

Alhai khoel nail ngel-i mail, Pillilpuv lav dan khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Aildaqyaolphil milkhaoq khe heeqphaqma nail phul heel yalkav juq bhai lainq khi heldaiq phail nail eeq nail heel nail Aildaqyaolphil milkhaoq yaq teevq gaq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha uqhuq thaoq lai khi kovq lee thailthaiq nail bhai, Pillilpuv ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, aivq nail moeqphaq lalaoq jeeq khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq ge ge-ail, kovq lee thailthaiq nail ngaol.
“Moeqphaq lalaoq al kovq lee thailthaiq nail bhai ail yaoq” dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Pillilpuv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Pillilpuv tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq tsaoq kel-aivq-u phao, eeq nail heel nail al gaq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq ge thailthaiq nail bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. “Naol ge thailthaiq nail ganl thoil, naol heeq kivq naol laiq” dai, Pillilpuv aivq bhai naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Yu ngaq bhai daoqceevq maq ge daiq lavq haq neq, ngal khalhai khi heeq kivq nail-aiq” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Ngaq-ai nee mail jeeq lal yaoq” dai, Pillilpuv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq-i mail ge daiq thailthaiq nail Jalliq neq, niil dao ngaol:
“Heivq nail haqbhoil
tseel-aivq nail
yaol khe-ai, aivq bhai
tseel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Yaol nail aqmevq
thaiq nail tsaol-aq nail
sivtavq bhai
yaol yaq maq meel dai
jaol nail khe-ai,
aivq iqsanl moeqthaoq
maq gaolpav dai,
aqtsi tsu dai,
jaol nail ngaol.
Yu aivq bhai
thaqtheq khi,
maq tsaq maq daol
nail lavqkhoel
yalkhaq dal
bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqceevq
khaq sil gaq
ge nia nail-aiq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
miltsaq kovtavq bhai
aivq nail
doevq nail phaq
oil ha-a nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Eeq nail heel nail al gaq Pillilpuv bhai naldaiq nail: “Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail niil gaq, khaq sil gaq nail ganl ge nail ngel-aiq. Aivq nail ganl ge nail ngel-ail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, yu nail ganl ge nail laiq dai, ngal naoq bhai naldaiq movq-ail nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Pillilpuv Jalliq al dao nee mail, Yeiqsul nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq, aivq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq ail thailthaiq-u phao, ulcuvq deq nail bhai kev lee khi, eeq nail heel nail al gaq ge nail: “Heldaiq. Niilniai ulcuvq deq-ail nial. Naol ulcuvq thaq saol dai, ngaq bhai lav tsoiq nail khul phaq jiav nail-aiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.

[Pillilpuv ge nail: “Naol neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai neema thaqtsaol haq neq, ulcuvq saol kivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Eeq nail heel nail al gaq ge nail: “Yeiqsul Khali neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.]
Aq-u phao, eeq nail heel nail al gaq moeqphaq lalaoq la naq khi mail, aqyu nvq gaq ulcuvq lavqkhoel bhai aol ail khi, Pillilpuv aivq bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq ulcuvq lavqkhoel nee dov lal-u phao, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal teevq pov taivq-ail Pillilpuv bhai tsiq kol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Eeq nail heel nail al gaq aivq bhai maq moel khi ngaol-aoq, lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail lavqkhoel kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Pillilpuv neq, Aqcovq meenq bhai kev dai, tsiq kol-aivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq Gailsaqlil meenq bhai lai-a nail ngaol. Gailphail lail ma bhai khal jiav nail meenq yaoq meenq yaoq-ao nee bhai aivq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Saolluv neq, Yeiqsul nail yaqlaol juq bhai maq ya heivq-u neq, maq juq dai, khaq mao iqsanl ge ge-ail jaol nail ngaol. Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jiav nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma khe aqivq juq bhai bivq nail dai khi, aivq Philma bhai haoqgavq hal-a nail ngaol. Hal-a nail al neq, Yeiqsul nail gailkhaol bhai tsao nail yaqyov-aq juq bhai maqkhaiq, yaqmai-aq juq bhai maqkhaiq, khal ya moel nail tsaol-aq juq bhai pheethaiq khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha bhi hel-aivq lavq yaoq dai, hal-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq Daqmaqsail meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq meenq aqjail bhai kev ail-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail aivq bhai nqtavq nee mail aqbhaq teevq jaoq bhaq lee-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aivq ga tsuq ail-a nail ngaol. “Saolluv-ol, Saolluv-ol, khul khi mail naol ngaq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail-aiq” dai, ge nail aqthel Saolluv ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq-ol, naol khaq sil gaq” dai, Saolluv naldaiq-u phao, aqthel al ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Ngal neq, naol khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq thailthaiq nail Yeiqsul ngaol.
Thul yaoq. Meenq bhai aol lai yaoq. Naol khalhai ya nl nail dai, a bhai ge lavq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nee mail ail thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq al juq aqthel al ya gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq moel-a nail ngel-i mail, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Saolluv thul khi, maivneev bhai dil daiq-u neq, teevq phaq iqsanl maq moel nia dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aivq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai hel laivq-a nail ngaol.
Hail n bhee dai, aivq maivneev maq moel nia-al. Al hail n nail lavqkhoel aivq maq jaq maq daol dai, jaol-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai Aqnaqnil dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqlaol teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee Aqnaqnil bhai bhi moel khi, “Aqnaqnil-ol” dai, khul-a nail ngaol. “Heeqphaq-ol, ngal niilniai jaol naol” dai, Aqnaqnil ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Thul yaoq. Gailkhaol aqdaol dai khul nail al khaol bhai ail yaoq. Yuldav nail ilkhaol-ai, Daqsul meenq bhai jaol nail Saolluv bhai heldaiq ail yaoq. Aivq geeqlaoq hal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aivq nail maivneev moel lal dai, Aqnaqnil dai khul nail gaq aol lal khi, aivq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav nail bhai, aivq aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee ya moel-aoq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul Aqnaqnil bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqnaqnil ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Heeqphaq-ol, tsaol-aq al gaq nail ganl, mee nia gaq ngaq bhai ge lavq daiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail naoq nail tsaol-aq bhai, haqeiv nail phaq khadai nl bhiq thailthaiq nail bhai iqsanl, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Niilniai iqsanl, naoq bhai uqhuq khal thaoq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, nieivq nail dai khi, aivq Philma juq bhai hal ya-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, Aqnaqnil ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai maqkhaiq, heeqphaq juq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail aqmil bhai heeq nia lal dai bhi nl nail dai khi, ngaq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aqmil nail haqbhoil aivq khadai khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail dai, ngal neq, aivq bhai bhi moel naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqnaqnil ail khi, ilkhaol al il bhai aol ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq Saolluv nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav khi ge nail: “Jaqbheq Saolluv-ol, naol gailphail bhai lee thailthaiq-u phao, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aivq nail aqmaol naoq bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Naol maivneev moel lal khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhee lal dai, Yeiqsul ngaq bhai naol jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, Saolluv nail maivneev nee mail ngaqgiq khe-ai dul nail phaq ga dov lee khi, aivq nail maivneev moel nia lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Saolluv thul khi, ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq aoq jaq khi, gaq aol kovq lal-a nail ngaol.
Saolluv neq, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jaol nail yaqlaol juq nee mail micil tsaq dai, jaol-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yeiqsul neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, teevq pov taivq-ail Saolluv uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai cavq bhiq ail-a nail ngaol.

Ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail khi ge nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel, Yeiqsul bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail al gaq maq ngel-ail laiq. Niilniai iqsanl, alheel nail tsaol-aq juq bhai nieivq khi, Philma juq jaol nail bha hel-aivq nail dai khi, aivq lee-a nail, maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.

Saolluv neq, teevq n nee teevq n aqhaqlal phao gaq kav lal khi, Yeiqsul neq maldil Khali ngaol dai, aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngel-i mail, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai khalhai ya ge kovq bhiq nail dai, teevq peivq-ail noeq-u maq dov-ail.
Mee nia n mee nia yanq jel ail-u phao, Saolluv bhai deeq heivq naol dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq maoqbhaoq nl pheeljaq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq maoqbhaoq nl-a nail ganl Saolluv ya heeq nia-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Saolluv bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, meenq nail lolgov juq bhai lovq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Saolluv nail yaqlaol juq, nqkiv lima phao aivq bhai hel-aivq khi, kavlaol bhai bhi aol lai khi, laolkhoiq nail lavqniil phao phaiq kha gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Saolluv Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha kovq ail khi, yaqlaol juq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai jaol nail khi mail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq yaqlaol pevq lal-a nail bhai aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol dai, iqsanl mail geesil nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bhaqnaqbhal lee khi, aivq bhai gaqkhoel juq jaol nail bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Saolluv gailphail lail ma bhai Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai khalhai khi ya thaoqphuq-a nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul aivq bhai daoq ge tsaoq bhiq-a nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, Bhaqnaqbhal-i mail aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Daqmaqsail meenq lavqkhoel bhai, Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee Saolluv maq geesil dai, cavq bhiq-a nail ganl iqsanl, aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, Saolluv aqyu juq nee mail ya jaol khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq doi dai, aqyu juq nee mail tsao tsao-ail, Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, maq geesil dai, cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heiqlaqsal daoq ge nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nee iqsanl mail, aivq daoq ge tsaoq khi jil pheeljaq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq aivq bhai deeq heivq nail dai khi, laijai nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq ganl al heeq nia-u phao, Saolluv bhai Gailsaqlil meenq bhai hevq kel-aivq bhiq khi, Daqsul meenq bhai bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq, Gaqliqlail milkhaoq khi mail Saqmaqliv milkhaoq, yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel nee ya jaol khi, gaq eeq lal kav lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai ev deedee nail ngaol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal tsaojao-ai nail khe-ai, aqyu juq doevq khi, tsaol-aq mao lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Bheiqtuvluv doi doi dai tsao tsao-ail khi, Luldaq meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq juq jaol nail bha, ail kev-a nail ngaol.
A bhai khil sil lavq sil sil nail ngel-i mail, eivq kovq bhee dai iqthaiq thailthaiq nail Ailneiq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol.
“Ailneiq-ol, Yeiqsul Khali naoq bhai bhi meeq lai-aoq nail ngaol. Thul yaoq. Naoq nail iqjial laiqyov yaoq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv aivq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, aivq thaiqphuq dai, thul lal-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Luldaq meenq khi mail Saqlol milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, meeq lal-a nail tsaol-aq al gaq bhai ya moel khi, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.

Yulbheiq meenq bhai Daqbhiltav dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqlaol jiovq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aqmil al mil bhai Heiqlaqsal daoq Daoqkavq dai khul nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al gaq, yaoq n yaoq n nee mail yu bhai aqmeeq phaq nl bhiq khi, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai bivq nail ngaol.
