Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, milkhaoq yaq nail sivtavq bhai, aivq Jalliq bhai juq juq-ail khi Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nee mail, mailma-ail jil-u phao, Yeiqsul neq, Khali pevq nail ganl bhai, ge gaq-a nail ngaol.

Aqpaolluv Gaolliqthu meenq bhai jaol-u phao, Paolluv pultavq phao khe milkhaoq nee yavq kha lee khi, Eilpheilsu meenq bha kev lee-a nail ngaol. A bhai, yaqlaol teevq pav ganav juq bhai aivq thaoqphuq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Nuljuq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-u phao, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai ya-aoq naol laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail: “Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal jaol nail dai, ge nail nvjuq teevq pov iqsanl maq gaiq daiq-al” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ge nail: “Thailhai phal-iq neq, nuljuq ulcuvq saol-a nail, khul phaq saol-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ge nail: “Yaolhaq-i mail saol lavq nail phaq saol-a nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaolhaq-i mail nl bhiq-a nail ulcuvq saol nail al neq, oeqbal noeq pov nail bhai tavq nail ngaol. ‘Ngaq nail haoqnao lee nail gaq bhai neema thaqtsaol yaoq’ dai, Yaolhaq tsaol-aq al juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaolhaq-i mail ge nail tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Yeiqsul ngaol” dai, Paolluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee, ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav-u phao, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal yavq kha lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq mee nia phaq nail daoq ge nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail tsel-nvq gaq niidai bhee nail ngaol.

Paolluv uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai aol lai khi, bhala hail heeq bhee dai, maq geesil dai, ge nail thail nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl, aqyu juq bhai laijai laijai-ail, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, neema gaol nail ngel-i mail, neema maq thaqtsaol-ail. Yu nail sivtavq bhai Yeiqsul nail ganl bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Paolluv neema thaqtsaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq hevq khi aqyu juq jaol nail nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Daqlaqnul dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq nail haoqgavq saol nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai, yaoq n yaoq n nee Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvq kovq bhee dai, aivq alhai nl dal lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, yu nail jeq-e juq maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail daoq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv bhai juq khi, eeq deedee nail noeq-u maq dov nail phaq, Miqyail nl daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv-i mail yuq nail lavqsiv maqkhaiq, aqjiovq bhai pheethaiq nail lavqsiv maqkhaiq, nal nail tsaol-aq juq bhai oil dav bhiq-u phao, nalgoel meeq lai khi, neivq aol nail juq iqsanl neivq dov ail nail ngaol.

Doidoi-ai neivq the dov the dov-ail tsao nail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai juq khi, the dov-a nail ngaol: “Paolluv-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail Yeiqsul al gaq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee ngal naoq bhai daoq bivq nail ngaol” dai, haqeiv nail neivq juq bhai, aqyu juq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Geiqbhal dai mil-ai thaq nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Philma aqivq gaq nail yaqyov sivq gaq iqsanl, alhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haqeiv nail neivq al maol aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Yeiqsul bhai ngal heeq kivq naol. Paolluv bhai iqsanl, heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, khaq bha khe tsaol-aq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail neivq aol nail tsaol-aq al gaq, aqyu juq bhai bhail jeeq lai khi, iqsanl bhai gaq lai-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhi deeq nal deeq goel gil khi, aqgaq aqdoi iqsanl he pav gil-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq nail ilkhaol nee maoldeq lavqnel-ail tsaoq dol-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Eilpheilsu meenq bhai khal jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq khi yu nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail, ganl al ya gaiq-u phao, geesil deedee lal bhiq khi, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel deedee nail ngaol.
Neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, maodai lal khi, yovqgavq-i mail khaq nl jel lavq-a nail phaq bhai, maq oil tsail dai, yu nail sivtavq bhai ge daiq bhiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Maolovq lovq nia nail tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq juq oil lavq khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai kheq ha-a nail ngaol. Haoqgavq phaldoiq al juq nail aqphoiq saol-nvq jil saol-nvq ja daiq-u phao, ngaq meel-nvq bavq phoiq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq neq, bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail ngel-i mail, milkhaoq doi dai gaiq doi ail khi, gaq mao-ail kav nail ngaol.

Ganl al juq pevq lal gaq-u phao, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq khi Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai lai khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ail naol dai, aqhaqlal Miqyail lavqkhoel nee Paolluv noeqceiv-a nail ngaol. “A bhai ail gaq haq neq, Lolmav meenq bhai iqsanl, ya lai daiq nail niil” dai, aivq ge nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhai tsaojao-ai nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel khe, Tilmolseiq khi Eillaqdul aqyu nvq gaq bhai Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai bhi lai khi, aivq gaq neq, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai teevq yanq gaoq jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyanq al yanq bhai, Yeiqsul nail ganl bhaqda nee Eilpheilsu meenq lavqkhoel bhai suqsaq deedee nail phaq kev lee-a nail ngaol.

Deiqmeiqdeiqlil dai mil-ai thaq nail phul teivq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, phul oil khi Aqdeiqmil miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol maolkhoel teivq gaoq nail ngaol. Ganl thoil bhaqda nee, phul teivq jaq nail tsaol-aq juq, phul ya deedee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl mail khi aqyu juq khe-ai nl jaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, Deiqmeiqdeiqlil khul jil khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aqtsaoq juq-ol, ganl niil nl nail bhaqda nee, ngadao juq phul heel maodai ya lal nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il, Paolluv dai khul nail tsaol-aq al gaq, khalhai ge nail ganl bhai, nuljuq ya heeq ya moel-aoq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq nail aqlavq-i mail teivq nail phaq neq, miqyail juq maq ngel-ail dai, ge ge-ail khi, Eilpheilsu meenq lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail maq ngel mail, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq doi dai, aivq tsaol-aq maodai bhai jalmul mul khi, neema phal lal thailthaiq nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail ganl niil aqmil cov-ail nail bhai ya geesil nail nee ovqtavq, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq khi miltsaq yaq iqsanl, uqhuq thaoq nail miqyail pevq nail Aqdeiqmil miqyail nail ilkhaol khul teevq phaq iqsanl, ganl maq tsoiq dai pevq-ail khi, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail peivq-ail boev-ail nail bhai, khaoqlaol deedee phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, “Eilpheilsu tsaol-aq nail Aqdeiqmil miqyail neq, eeq dee heel deedee nail ngaol” dai, gul nail ngaol.

Meenq teevq meenq meenq lao-ail suqsaq lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Paolluv nee tsaothe jaol nail, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Gaqyul khi Aqliqdaqgul bhai, tsaol-aq al juq-i mail nieivq khi, bhaoqaiq lav sav duq bhai hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv iqsanl, bhaoqaiq lav sav duq bhai aol lai movq khi ngaol-aoq, yaqlaol juq aivq bhai maq bhi aol lai-al.

Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail yovkav teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl, Paolluv bhai “Bhaoqaiq lav sav duq bhai thaq aol lai” dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Paolluv nail aqtsaoq ngaol.

Aq-u phao, jil lal thaq nail tsaol-aq juq suqsaq deedee nail ngaol. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maq naldaiq dai, teevq gaq teevq phaq gul nail ngaol. Khul khi mail alhai jil lal thaq nail ganl bhai, tsaol-aq jemao teevq pav maq heeq nia-ail.

Aq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq, Aqleiqsaqdul dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq bhai, tsaol-aq al juq nail sivtavq bhai, doeq bhoel gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. “Naol daoq ge yaoq” dai, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq nail ganl tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai aivq ge kovq bhiq nail dai khi, Aqleiqsaqdul aqlavq wanq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq niil dai, aqyu juq heldaiq heeq-u phao, “Eilpheilsu tsaol-aq nail Aqdeiqmil miqyail neq, eeq dee heel deedee nail ngaol” dai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee teevq thel taivq-ail naqli nvq lavq bhee dai, gul nail ngaol.

Haoqnao naosaq saq lal-u phao, meenq khe yovkav-i mail tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai aqtsi tsu dai, bhi jaol-a nail ngaol. Aivq niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, Eilpheilsu meenq neq, eeq dee heel deedee nail Aqdeiqmil miqyail juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol khi nqtavq nee ga lee-a nail meeq nail haol nail lovmav bhai suvsiv nl khi lav sav-ai thaq nail meenq pevq nail ganl, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ganl niil maq ngel-ail dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq jil nia-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neema ivqdao dai, jaol nail tsaq nail ngaol. Iqmoeq maq saol-nvq daiq mail, suqsaq nail neq maq tsaq-ail.

Tsaol-aq niil nvq gaq neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lal thaq nail maq ngel-ail. Ngadao juq nail Aqdeiqmil miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail iqsanl, maq ngel nail bhai aqyu nvq gaq bhai nuljuq-i mail niai hel lavq thaq nail ngaol.

Deiqmeiqdeiqlil khi aivq nail aqtsaoq phul teivq nail juq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai neekhaol maq sil-ail, yalkhaq ge movq haq neq, yovkav juq jaol khi, yalkhaq dal nail aqn iqsanl bhao nail ngaol. A bhai dav lai khi yalkhaq ge kivq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq thoi dai maqtsil nl movq nail dai ngal-aq neq, milkhaoq yaq juq jil lai khi maoqbhaoq nl nail aqn bhai bhi dal ceiv lai yaoq.

Yanqgaol pevq lal-a nail ganl bhaqda nee, milkhaoq suqsaq lal dai nl nail niil dai, ngadao nail kovtavq bhai yu oeqbal thaq lal nail bhai, khaoqlaol heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail niailhai jil lal khi suqsaq nail dai, ngadao bhai naldaiq lal-u phao, ngadao aqduq aqtsil tsil dai, ge kovq bhiq kivq nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge gaq khi, jil lal thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bhi kovq gil ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao jil lal-a nail juq aqtsi tsu dai pevq ail-u phao, Paolluv yaqlaol juq bhai khul jil khi, gaq bivq nail lavqkhoel nee geeqlaoq eeq daoq ge-ail ceevq khi, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bha ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai ail pav-u phao, yaqlaol juq bhai gaq bivq-ail ceevq khi, Heiqlaqsal milkhaoq bha ail kev-a nail ngaol.

A bhai bhala hail heeq bhee dai aivq jaol-a nail ngaol. Sulliv milkhaoq bha kovq lai nail dai lainq thailthaiq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai heivq nail dai khi, naoq jaoq nail ganl heeq nia khi, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq phao nee kovq lai nail dai, noeqceiv-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqlil meenq bhai jaol nail Bhulluv nail yaqyov Solbhaqdaqlul, Theilsaqlolni meenq bhai jaol nail Aqliqdaqgul khi Seiqguldul, Deiqbheiq meenq bhai jaol nail Gaqyul, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Duljil khi Daqlolbheiq aqyu juq khi Tilmolseiq iqsanl, Paolluv nee mail ail-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al juq iqmoeq-u nee dov ail khi, nvjuq bhai Daqlol meenq bhai daonq nail ngaol.

Deqtsiq maq goe nail khaqmul jaq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav gaq khi pultavq, Pillilpiv meenq nee mail nvjuq laovq jeeq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Ngaq n bhee lal-u phao, Daqlol meenq bhai aqyu juq jaol nail bha kev ail khi, a bhai sivq n gaoq jaol-a nail ngaol.

Teevq jao nail lavqkhoel iqmoeq-u n-gaol, nvjuq jaq tavq daol tavq nail dai khi, jil lai-a nail ngaol. Niaohao neq dov ail naol dai, Paolluv noeq nail ngel-i mail, aivq aqyu juq bhai hul-iq tsil lai-u kev dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq-i mail jil lai-a nail pultavq khe teiv-nvq bha, phalmanq maodai tovq bhaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Uldulkuv dai mil-ai thaq nail yaqyov-aq yaqnoil teevq gaq lolgov gov yaq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Paolluv cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail al maodai ma lai-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq iqthaiq kol laivq khi, ilkhaol al il nail hail teiv-nvq teevq teiv-nvq nee gaq kha ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq bhai tsiq ail-u phao, sil ceiv-aoq thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Paolluv yavq kha ail khi, yaqyov-aq yaqnoil al gaq bhai tsiq khi, “Thaq noeq haq. Aivq doevq-ai haq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, pultavq teiv-nvq bha aivq gaoq dav lai khi, khaqmul ngaoqpav khi jaq-a nail ngaol. Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u kev dai, aqyu juq nee mail aivq daoq ge tsaoq pheeljaq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, meenq al meenq nee aivq dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq yaqyov-aq yaqnoil al gaq bhai aqdoevq ya hevq kol-aivq-a nail ngel-i mail, gaq gaoq aol jaiq lal bhiq khi lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol.

Paolluv-i mail nvjuq bhai ge lavq-a nail khe-ai, nvjuq laovq jeeq khi Aqcovq meenq bha ail thailthaiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq gaq neq, a bhai kev dai gailkhaol tsao khi Aqcovq meenq bhai moel naol dai, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqcovq meenq bhai thaoqphuq-u phao, teevq gaq khe-ai laovq jeeq khi Meiqdulleiq meenq bha ail-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq a bhai nee dov ail khi, niaohao n-gaol Tsil-ol eeljaol laol-n bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Halpha n-gaol Saqmol eeljaol laol-n bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Phaiqhal n-gaol Meiqleiqdul meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.

Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai aqyanq maq bhi gil nail haqbhoil, nii naq nii naq-ail maq jaol dai, Eilpheilsu meenq meenq jail nee laovq jeeq khi ail naol dai, Paolluv noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Bheiqdeiqgoldeiq bhaoqaiq lav sav-u n-gaol, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ya jaol dai, aivq lavqtsail mail ail movq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.
Paolluv Meiqleiqdul meenq bhai jaol-u phao, Eilpheilsu Khali yaq munl nail aqivq aqtsu juq aivq bhai thaoqphuq lee nia dai, bhi khul lai-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq lal kev-u phao, Paolluv niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bha lal kev-u teevq n nee, nuljuq nee mail ngal khalhai doevq khalhai jaol-ail ceevq-a nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ngaq bhai nieivq nail dai, naoq jaoq nail ngel-i mail, haq deedee nail aqyanq al yanq bhai neema thaqtheq khi maivbhil dov nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail nail ganl nl-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Milkhaoq yaq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ilkhaol jilkhaol nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhai ngal cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq nail phaq, teevq phaq iqsanl maq oil tsail dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail oeqbal noeq pov khi Miqyail jaol nail phao kovq lal nail lavqkhoel nee, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai neema ya thaqtsaol nail ngaol dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, teevq gaq khe-ai ngal salkhil khanq-a nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il, ngal Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail hel-aivq lavq nail lavqkhoel nee Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ail thailthaiq nail ngaol. A bhai, ngaq nail kovtavq bhai khalheel phaq kev lee nail dai, ngal maq heeq kivq-ail.

Meenq yaoq meenq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai, thaonq bhai bhi nieivq bhoel nail phaq khi, ya haq ya aoq deedee nail phaq ngaq bhai lovq thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail al maq ngel nail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq neq ngal maq heeq kivq-ail.

Ngal ya tsao nail gailkhaol niil dao loi loi lai-u kev dai, ngal tsao khi, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-i mail ngaq bhai bhiq nl lavq-a nail khe-ai, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail ganl, ya cavq ya cov gaq haq neq, ngaq nail aqmaol niil aqphoiq bhao nail ngaol dai, ngal maq saol-nvq-ail.

Nuljuq jaol nail bha ngal tsao doi khi, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl cavq bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao neq, nuljuq teevq gaq iqsanl ngaq nail maivphaoq bhai maq ya moel yaoq-aol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq teevq gaq ganav doevq nail phaq sunq-ail haq neq, ngal bhaqda nee maq ngel-ail dai, yanqgaol ngal salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nail neema tsaq nail phaq iqsanl mail, nuljuq bhai ngal maq oil tsail dai, ge daiq bhiq gil-aoq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail aqmaol aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol khi doevq nail nee ovqtavq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail nuljuq bhai av lavq khi bhi heldaiq phail lavq-a nail yaol mavqmav bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq khi lav sav yaoq. Miqyail aivq nail aqsivq-i mail ul kovq-ai thaq nail, aivq nail Khali yaq munl bhai, yaol bhai lovq nail khe-ai lovq yaoq.
Ngal dov ail jel haq neq, mao-ail haqeiv nail kheeqsiv juq lee khi, yaol mavqmav bhai maq gaoqhaq mail lav luq lav seil lee nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol.

Al ovqtavq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq dov lal khi, yaqlaol juq bhai jalmul mul nail lavqkhoel nee aqyu juq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq dai, tsaq nail daoq bhai lavqphal-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, hail kovq bhee dai, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ngal nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, maivbhil dov nail lavqkhoel nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail bhai maq nioilpeivq dai, yaolphaol yaolphaol-ail doevq yaoq.

Niil aq-il, Miqyail nail aqlavq lavqkhoel khi aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail daoq nail lavqkhoel-ai nuljuq bhai ngal av bhiq-ail ceevq nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq, nuljuq bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nia khi, meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail nuljuq jaiqbhoil jiav nail ngaol.
Yu nail phul heel bhai maqkhaiq, aqgaq aqdoi bhai maqkhaiq, maivjeel jeel nail neema, ngal maq aol-al.
Ngal khi ngaq nail aqtsaoq juq khal loq nail phaq ya kivq dai, ngaq nail aqlavq niil-i mail, ganl nl khi phul heel halpov-a nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

‘Ya nail nee maqtsil bivq nail neq, geeqlaoq eeq jaiq nail ngaol’ dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-i mail ge-a nail daoq al daoq bhai, noeq kev nail lavqkhoel nee, ganl alhai nl khi gaq bhaq nail juq bhai ya tsaojao-ai nail ngaol dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail ngal nuljuq bhai nl daiq hal daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv alhai ge gaq-u phao, aqyu juq nee mail peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nioil nioil-ail khi, Paolluv bhai phalthaiq khi moeqsaol saol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aivq bhai maq ya moel yaoq-aol dai, Paolluv-i mail ge bhiq-a nail daoq al daoq bhaqda nee, aqyu juq noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqyu juq Paolluv bhai laovq naq duq bhai kev dai, hevq ha-ail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq aqyu juq nee pav-ail gaq-u phao, laovq jeeq khi Gaolsav eeljaol laol-n bhai daolcoev dai, ail-a nail ngaol. Yaoq n yaoq Laolduv eeljaol laol-n bhai ail kev khi, a bhai nee ngal-aq, Bhaqdaqlal meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Philnilsav milkhaoq bhai ail nail laovq teevq laovq bhai thaoqphuq khi, jeeq khi ail-a nail ngaol.

Gulbhaqlul eeljaol laol-n moel lal nail bhai ail kev-u phao, pul-nvq phao Sulliv milkhaoq phao ail-a nail ngaol. Laovq al laovq Dullu meenq bhai yalkav bavq dov nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq a bhai naq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai a bhai ya moel khi, aqyu juq nee mail sivq n jaol-a nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq nail lavqkhoel nee, Paolluv bhai, “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha thaq lai” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvjuq aqyu juq nee mail sivq n jaol khi, iqmoeq phao ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq khi aqyu juq nail miqsaol yovyaq iqsanl mail, meenq nee mail iqyaq iqma laol dai bha kev dai, nvjuq bhai hevq ha lee khi, nvjuq iqsanl mail a bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi geeqlaoq hal-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq geeqlaoq eeq daoq cavq-ail ceevq khi, nvjuq laovq lavqkhoel bhai aol ail-u phao, aqyu juq neq, ilkhaol phao kovq lai-a nail ngaol.
Dullu meenq nee laovq jeeq khi Bhaqdaolleiq meenq bhai nvjuq ail kev-a nail ngaol. A bhai jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai thaoqphuq khi, aqyu juq nee mail teevq n jaol-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq gaoq dov ail khi, Gailsaqlil meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Pillilpuv dai khul nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq nail gaq nail ilkhaol bhai nvjuq yavq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai ganl bhi tsaojao-ai nail haqbhoil tsaol-aq sivq gaq bhai tsel dov-u phao, aivq iqsanl aol nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail kovpavq ya khi maq maol ail haq nail yaqmiq liq gaq jaol nail ngaol.
Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail, Aqgaqbhul dai khul nail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq kev lee-u phao, nvjuq a bhai jaol-a nail neq, maoq lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq jaol nail bha aivq lee khi, Paolluv nail jiovqpavq oil khi, yovqgavq nail aqkhil aqlavq bhai pheethaiq khi niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Jiovqpavq niil nail aqheel bhai, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq niailhai pheethaiq khi, yu nail jeq-e nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol dai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal ge nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Daoq al daoq bhai nvjuq ya gaiq-u phao, nvjuq khi a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq Paolluv bhai: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha thaq ail-oq” dai, hal-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ge nail: “Khul khi mail, nuljuq nioil nioil-ail khi ngaq nail neema tsaoq pav ail-u khe-ai, nl lavq nail-aiq. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha yu-i mail bhi pheethaiq nail nee maqtsil, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil a bhai sildan nail bhai kev dai, ngal lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq aivq bhai maq ge phaoq kivq nail ngel-i mail, “Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai pevq lal dei-eiq” dai, ge khi aqtsi tsu dai, jaol-a nail ngaol.
A bhai micil tsaq dai jaol gaq-u phao, nvjuq yalkav lainq khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ail-a nail ngaol.

Gailsaqlil meenq bhai jaol nail yaqlaol teevq pav ganav juq nvjuq nail haoqnao tsaothel leevq khi, nvjuq-i mail yavq lai nail Maqnaqsoq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq nail ilkhaol bhai, nvjuq bhai hevq ha lal lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Gulbhaqlul eeljaol laol-n bhai jaol khi, yaqlaol pevq lal-a nail, maoq lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ail kev-u phao, aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq, nvjuq bhai lavqkhiq teevq tsail hav lavq-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq Paolluv nvjuq aqivq aqtsu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail Yaqkov jaol nail bha nalga ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Khali yaq munl nail kovtavq bhai aqivq aqtsu jiovq nail al juq iqsanl mail, a bhai jil lee-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv aqyu juq bhai daoq tsaoq phuq khi, aivq bhai juq khi Miqyail yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq nail haqbhoil khalhai nl khalhai hal-a nail ganl, teevq phaq gil haq teevq phaq dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq alhai ge daiq bhiq gaq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl mail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq Paolluv bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Jaqbheq Paolluv-ol, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khadai meel-nvq gaq jaol khi, aqyu juq iqsanl aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai khadai dai-ail neema kev nail dai, naol heeq nia nail ngaol.

Yu nail tsaoljeq nail milkhaoq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai khal jaol nail Yuldav tsaol-aq juq bhai, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai khaonq dai, naol cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail bhai, aqyu juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq nail yaq juq bhai bavkov uqjaq maq oev bhiq mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aolsaolkovq bhai maq tsaothe mail doevq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, naol cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ganl, aqyu juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Naol niai kev lee-aoq nail ganl, aqyu juq ya gaiq-ao nail neq, aqduq bhao nail ngaol. Khalhai khi heeq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq gaoq ge nail: “Nvjuq naoq bhai niailhai bhi nl movq-ail nial. Daoqma saljial jaq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq liq gaq niai jaol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nee mail lai khi, aqmaol haol lal nail aol nl lai yaoq. Aqyu juq uqhuq tsailkheel he ha nia dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil aqphoiq bivq yaoq. Alhai nl gaq haq neq, naoq nail ganl yu mail khal ge nail khe-ai maq ngel lao thaq-il dai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee heeq nia nail nee ovqtavq, naol iqsanl Molseiq nail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq bhai tsaothe khi doevq nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil maoqbhaoq nl khi, aqyu juq bhai haoqgavq niailhai gevq bhiq jel-aoq nail ngaol. Thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai danq bhiq-a nail jaqjaq daoldaol jaq nail maqkhaiq, aqsivq jaq nail maqkhaiq, phee heivq thaq nail haqjoil jaq nail maqkhaiq, khaqmiq sev nail maqkhaiq, niil juq lao nail tsaq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq Paolluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv tsaol-aq al liq gaq bhai khul khi, yaoq n yaoq aqyu juq nee mail aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl lai-a nail ngaol. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai aivq aol lai khi, aqyu juq aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl gil nail aqn ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol kev lal haq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail phaq jiav nail ngaol.

Aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl-a nail sivq n bhee lal-aiq nail khi-u phao, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq nee lal-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai Paolluv bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai neema lav phail khi, Paolluv bhai nieivq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq gul khi ge nail: “Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, tsaojao-ai lee yaoq. Tsaol-aq niil gaq khaq bhai maq bhao ail doi khi, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma niilniai maqkhaiq, neejiav jiav lal dai, cavq cavq-ail tsao nail ngaol. Niil thal khe pov neq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai kev dai, yu nail jeq-e hevq bhoel lavq khi, meeq nail haol nail jaol duq niil dao bhai lav jiivq lav cavq lal thaq nail ngaol” dai, gul-a nail ngaol.

Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol nail Daqlolbheiq dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq, Paolluv nee mail meenq lavqkhoel bhai tsao nail bhai iqmoeq-u n-gaol, aqyu juq moel-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngel-i mail, Paolluv-i mail aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel bhai hel lavq thaq nail khul-il dai, noeq khi alhai ge nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Meenq meenq lao-ail suqsaq lal khi, tsaol-aq munl munl lao-ail tsaol lavq khi, Paolluv bhai nieivq thaiq khi uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqniil phao hevq dol leevq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lolgov bhai teevq pov taivq-ail lolgov ngaoq pheeq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq Paolluv bhai heivq nail dai khi, laijai nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq meenq lao-ail suqsaq thailthaiq nail ganl, Lolmav genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq bhai heldaiq nail aqivq gaq jaol nail bha gaiq kev lai-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq, genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq juq khi genl dev yaq juq hevq khi, teevq pov taivq-ail tsaol-aq munl munl ma jil lai thaq nail dao bhai tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq genl dev yaq juq hevq khi lee-a nail bhai tsaol-aq al juq ya moel-u phao, Paolluv bhai dee thailthaiq nail nee, naq lai-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq Paolluv jaol nail bha ail khi, aivq bhai nieivq khi hailcav nvq deeq oil khi, pheethaiq yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq khaq sil gaq. Aivq khul khi thaq nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq munl al munl teevq gaq teevq phaq gul gul-ail suqsaq nail ngel-i mail, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq maq naldaiq heeq nia-ail khi, Paolluv bhai genl dev nail juq jaol nail ilkhaol bhai hel-aivq nail haqbhoil, aivq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv thaoqjoe pavqteivq bhai lai kev-u phao, tsaol-aq munl al munl aivq bhai deeq nail dai khi, mailma-ail laijai nail ngel-i mail, genl dev nail juq-i mail aivq bhai tsiq khi ail-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq munl al munl, “Aivq bhai heivq yaoq” dai, gul gul-ail, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail juq Paolluv bhai genl dev nail juq jaol nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai hevq bhoel laivq nail khi-u phao, Paolluv genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Ngal naoq bhai daoq ge tsaoq movq-il.” Aqivq al gaq ge nail: “Naol Heiqlaqsal daoq iqsanl, heeq nia lao thaq-il laq.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, milgaol sinqgaol khe milkhaoq bhai pheeq khi, yu bhai heivq nail tsaol-aq liq hinl gaq hevq khi haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bha dov-ai thaq nail Iljiltuv tsaol-aq al gaq, naol maq ngel lao thaq-il laq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv ge nail: “Ngal neq, Gillilciv milkhaoq Daqsul meenq bhai doevq lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, eeq nail meenq al meenq nail milkhaoq yaq pevq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq thoil juq bhai daoq teevq pov bhi ge tsaoq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq al gaq Paolluv bhai, “Daoq ge tsaoq nail ya naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Paolluv thaoqjoe kovtavq bhai thulphaol khi, tsaol-aq al juq bhai aqtsi tsu dai jaol nail haqbhoil, aqlavq dao bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aqtsi tsu dai jaol-u phao, aivq Heiqbhail daoq ge khi, niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol:
“Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngaq nail ganl nuljuq bhai ge kovq-ai leevq nail daoq bhai, teevq pov naldaiq lavq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Heiqbhail daoq ge nail bhai, aqyu juq ya gaiq-u phao, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil aqtsi tsu dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Paolluv niailhai ge nail ngaol:

“Ngal neq, Gillilciv milkhaoq Daqsul meenq bhai doevq lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq pevq nail ngaol. Ngal meenq niil meenq bhai eeq lal khi, saqlaq Gaqmaqleiqlal jaol nail bha haoqgavq saol eel lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq juq bhai ngal iqsanl mail aqmeeq-ai saol gaq khi, yanqgaol niai jil lal thaq nail nuljuq khe-ai, Miqyail bhai neema kev deedee nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ngaol.

Yeiqsul nail gailkhaol bhai tsaothe nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, sil nail bhai kev dai, ngal khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov-aq khi yaqmai-aq juq bhai nieivq khi thaonq bhai laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal ge thailthaiq nail ganl niil maldil ngel nail ngaol dai, Philma khi Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq iqsanl mail salkhil khanq nia nail ngaol. Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq jaol nail bha gevq bhiq-a nail haoqgavq, aqyu juq ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, a bhai jaol nail Khali yaq juq bhai nieivq khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha nieivq khal leevq khi khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail haqbhoil, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai ngal lai-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Ngal Daqmaqsail meenq nail aqjail bhai lai kev-u phao, n-gaol gaol kav kav lal nail yanq bhai thaiqphuq dai, nqtavq kovtavq nee kav deedee nail aqbhaq ngaq nail teevq jaoq bhaq lee-a nail ngaol.
Ngal miltsaq bhai ga tsuq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, ‘Saolluv-ol, Saolluv-ol, khul khi mail, naol ngaq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail-aiq’ dai, ge nail aqthel bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
‘Heeqphaq-ol, naol khaq sil gaq’ dai, ngal naldaiq-u phao, ‘Ngal neq, naoq-i mail khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq thailthaiq nail Naqsaqlail meenq yaq Yeiqsul ngaol’ dai, aivq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq-ai nee lai-a nail tsaol-aq juq aqbhaq al bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai ge tsaoq lee-a nail al gaq nail aqthel bhai, aqyu juq maq ya gaiq-al.

‘Heeqphaq-ol, ngal khalhai ya khi nail-aiq’ dai, naldaiq-u phao, ‘Thul khi Daqmaqsail meenq bhai lai yaoq. Naoq bhai bhi nl nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, a bhai naoq bhai ge lavq naol’ dai, Yeiqsul ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Aqbhaq al bhaqda nee ngaq nail maivneev maq moel kivq dai, pevq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail aqtsaoq al juq-i mail aqlavq bhai bhi nieivq thaiq khi Daqmaqsail meenq bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.

A bhai, Aqnaqnil dai mil-ai thaq nail teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, a bhai jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai aqmil aqmeeq dov nail nee ovqtavq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail haoqnao aqmeeq-ai tsaothe khi, Miqyail bhai ev nail ngaol.

Aivq ngal jaol nail bha lal khi, ngaq nail aqjail bhai thulphaol khi, ‘Jaqbheq Saolluv-ol, maivneev moel lal yaoq’ dai, ge-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail maivneev moel lal khi, aivq bhai moel-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao aivq ge nail: ‘Naol Miqyail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia lal dai maqkhaiq, Tsaqnail Daolnail gaq bhai ya moel dai maqkhaiq, aivq-i mail ge nail daoq ya gaiq dai maqkhaiq, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal nail Miqyail naoq bhai, tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naoq-i mail ya gaiq ya moel-a nail juq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai aivq nail haqbhoil naol salkhil ya khanq nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il, nii naq nii naq-ail thaq gaoq jaol. Thul khi ulcuvq saol yaoq, Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail lavqkhoel nee, naoq nail oeqbal bhi tsiqhaol yaoq’ dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.”

Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha kovq lee khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai geeqlaoq hal thailthaiq-u phao, Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal niailhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq ngaq bhai ge nail: ‘Lavqtsail mail lainq khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee dov ail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, naol ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail bhai maq hav bhoel-ail dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.’

Aq-u phao, ngal niailhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol: ‘Heeqphaq-ol, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol khal jiav nail bhai ngal ail khi, naoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai nieivq nieivq-ail khi deeq-a nail ganl, aqyu juq aqmeeq-ai heeq nia nail ngaol.

Naoq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail Saqteiqphaq bhai yu liv heivq-u phao, ngal iqsanl aqjail bhai thulphaol khi, aqyu juq-i mail nl nail ganl bhai neema tsaq-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai liv heivq-a nail tsaol-aq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai ngal lovq-a nail ngaol’ dai, ngal ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ngaq bhai ge nail: ‘Ail yaoq. Eqyal bha jaol nail, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a jaol nail bha, ngal naoq bhai khoel gai-aivq naol’ dai, Yeiqsul ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.”

Daoq al daoq ge lal-u phao kev dai, Paolluv-i mail ge nail bhai tsaol-aq munl munl ma al juq naldaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, aqyu juq mailma-ail gul khi ge nail: “Tsaol-aq thoil gaq bhai thaq gaoq bhi doevq! Heivq yaoq! Aqdoevq doevq nail maq geel-nvq-ail” dai, gul nail ngaol.
Aqgaq aqdoi liv dil nail juq liv dil khi, khaqlail haiq dil nail juq haiq dil haiq dil-ail, alhai gul nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq, Paolluv bhai genl dev nail juq nail ilkhaol nail lavqkhoel bhai hevq bhoel-aivq nail haqbhoil aivq nail tsaol-aq bhai daoq bivq khi, khul khi mail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq bhai alhai gul nail ganl bhai ya heeq kivq dai, Paolluv bhai deeq khi peivtsel daiq yaoq dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq nail dai khi, pheethaiq gaq-u phao, Paolluv genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Lolmav milkhaoq yaq teevq gaq bhai yalkhaq maq dal ceiv dai, thailhai deeq nail ya nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq al gaq daoq al daoq bhai ya gaiq-u phao, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq jaol nail bha lai khi ge bhiq lai-a nail: “Naol khalhai khi nail khi-iq. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Lolmav milkhaoq yaq ngel lao thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq Paolluv jaol nail bha ail khi, “Naol Lolmav milkhaoq yaq laiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, “Ngel naol” dai, Paolluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq al gaq ge nail: “Ngaq neq, phul maodai bivq khi Lolmav milkhaoq yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol”. Paolluv ge nail: “Ngal neq, doevq lee-u nee mail Lolmav milkhaoq yaq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv bhai deeq deeq-ail naldaiq nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq teevq pov taivq-ail haoqnaol phao jiiv kovq lee-a nail ngaol. Genl dev teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq neq, aivq-i mail phee-ai thaq nail Paolluv niil gaq, Lolmav milkhaoq yaq pevq nail dai, heeq nia-u phao, deel-nq-ail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq Paolluv nail kovtavq bhai khul khi mail oeqbal alhai thaq nail bhai maldil ya heeq kivq dai, niaohao nqhao Philma juq khi maoqbhaoq nl nail munl munl ma juq bhai genl dev teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq-i mail bhi jil lal-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv bhai pheel khi, aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai hevq thaq-ail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv maoqbhaoq nl nail munl juq bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, yanqgaol kev dai, ngal Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqdoevq doevq nail niil, laiq nail tsa nail maq aol-ail dai, ngaq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai heeq kivq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq nail moeqthaoq bhai teiv gai-aivq yaoq” dai, Paolluv nail aqjail bhai thulphaol nail tsaol-aq bhai Philma Aqnaqnil khoel bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Phulleq dai leivq-ai thaq nail ilphail-ol, Miqyail naoq bhai deeq nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai yalkhaq dal nail dai khi, naol niai jaoldeel-nvq thaq khi ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee naol ngaq bhai bhi deeq nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naol Miqyail nail Philma bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail laiq” dai, Paolluv nail aqjail bhai thulphaol nail juq, Paolluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv ge nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, aivq Philma aqivq gaq dai, ngal maq heeq kivq-al. ‘Naoq nail jeq-e bhai uvthaiq nail gaq bhai daoq aqdoil thaq ge bhiq-o’ dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Jil lal thaq nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel teevq pav ganav juq neq, Phaqliqsail pevq khi teevq pav ganav juq neq, Saqduqgail ngaol dai, Paolluv heeq nia-u phao, aivq maoqbhaoq nl nail munl juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal neq, Phaqliqsail ngaol. Ngaq nail aqbhu iqsanl, Phaqliqsail ngaol. Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, ngal noeqthunq nail ngel-i mail, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, mailma-ail ge nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai ge gaq-u phao, Phaqliqsail khi Saqduqgail juq nail gaiqlaq bhai jil pheeljaq khi, jil lal thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq, nvq munl pav ail-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Saqduqgail juq neq, tsaol-aq maq doevq kovq lal-ail dai, ge nail ngaol. A bhai nee pultavq, nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl, aqhaqlal iqsanl maq jaol-ail dai, ge nail ngaol. Phaqliqsail juq neq, al juq iqsanl mail jiav naol jaol naol dai, neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqthel gul kav lal khi, Phaqliqsail munl bhai tavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail saqlaq teevq pav ganav juq tsaoq thul lal khi ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq nail laiq nail tsa nail teevq phaq iqsanl ngadao juq maq moel-al. Aqhaqlal-i mail maq ngel haq neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel-i mail aivq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lee thaq nail jaol-aq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai jil pheeljaq nail al, aljaiq jel lal khi, Paolluv bhai he pav he sav nail khe-ai, pevq lal thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, Lolmav genl dev teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq khaoqlaol lal bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al juq jaol nail bha yavq kha ail khi, Paolluv bhai hevq dol-aivq khi genl dev nail ilkhaol bhai hevq kol-aivq nail haqbhoil aivq nail genl dev yaq juq bhai daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u nqkiv, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Paolluv nail aqjail bhai thulphaol lee khi ge nail: “Thaq geesil. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai ngaq nail haqbhoil naol salkhil khanq gaq-ao nail ngaol. Lolmav meenq lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, alhai ya khanq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq juq thaoqphuq khi, Paolluv bhai maq ya heivq-u kev dai, khul iqsanl maq jaq maq daol dai, jaol nail ngaol dai, saljial jaq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai aqtsi tsu dai, maoqbhaoq nl-a nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, liq tsel gaq jaiq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Philma juq khi Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq jaol nail bha aqyu juq ail khi ge nail: “Paolluv bhai maq ya heivq-u kev dai, teevq phaq iqsanl maq jaq maq daol-ail dai, nvjuq yovqgavq nail kovtavq bhai yovqgavq iqkhail yavq yavq-ail, saljial jaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Niil thal khe pov neq, Paolluv nail ganl nuljuq aqduq aqtsil tsil dai, peivtsel movq-il dai ge khi, aivq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi hevq ha lee nail haqbhoil, Lolmav genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq gaq jaol nail bha hal lai yaoq. Aivq bhai niai maq hevq kel leevq mail heivq nail haqbhoil, nvjuq lainq khi lovq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai aqtsi tsu dai, maoqbhaoq nl nail ganl bhai, Paolluv nail jaqbheq

Aq-u phao, Lolmav genl dev nail teevq yal gaq nail aqivq teevq gaq bhai Paolluv khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqyov-aq niil gaq bhai, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq gaq jaol nail bha teevq pov hevq ha lai bhiq yaoq. Aivq aivq bhai ge bhiq nail ganl jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail teevq yal gaq nail aqivq al gaq, yaqyov-aq al gaq bhai genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq jaol nail bha hel-aivq khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Yaqyov-aq niil gaq naoq bhai ge bhiq nail ganl jiav nail ngel-i mail, naol jaol nail bha teevq pov hevq ha bhiq-ail yaoq dai, thaonq bhai aol nail Paolluv al gaq, ngaq bhai khul khi ge lavq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq nail aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi, bhallal bha ail khi ge nail: “Naol ngaq bhai khul ge bhi movq nail phaq jiav nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqyov-aq al gaq ge nail: “Paolluv nail ganl naldaiq movq nail khe-ai ge khi, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl jaol nail bha, niaohao bhi hel-aivq lavq yaoq dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq naoq bhai hal lee nail dai, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail, maoqbhaoq nl ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq ge nail bhai thaq naldaiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq liq tsel gaq jaiq dai, uvq jiav khi lovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Paolluv bhai maq ya heivq-u kev dai, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq jaq maq daol-ail jaol nail dai, aqyu juq saljial jaq ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il aqyu juq lainq thaq gil-ai khi, naol daoq bivq nail bhai daonq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Naoq-i mail ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ganl niil tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, thaq ge bhiq dei-eiq” dai, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq aivq daoq bivq khi bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, genl dev teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq al gaq, genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq nvq gaq bhai khul khi ge bhiq-a nail: “Genl dev nail tsaol-aq nvq yal gaq, moeqphaq jeeq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq sivq tsel gaq khi, geeqkhaoq bavq-nvq thaq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq nvq yal gaq lainq-ai khi, yanq-nl kiv naqli goiq lavq bhai Gailsaqlil meenq bhai ail nail haqbhoil lainq-ai thaq yaoq.
Paolluv bhi jeeq nail moeqphaq iqsanl lainq bhiq khi, heeqphaq Peiqlil jaol nail bha aqmeeq-ai hevq kel-aivq bhiq yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq heeqphaq Peiqlil bhai haoqgavq niailhai gevq bhoel bhiq-a nail ngaol:
“Eeqnail heelnail heeqphaq Peiqlil jaol nail bha, ngal Gaqlaldil Lulsil naoq bhai ev nail lavqkhoel nee haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai nieivq khi heivq nail khi ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq Lolmav milkhaoq yaq pevq nail ganl, ngal ya heeq kivq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail ail khi, hevqkovq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai khul nail oeqbal thaq nail phaq jiav nail meeq dai, ngal heeq kivq movq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai aqyu juq nail maoqbhaoq nl nail munl juq jaol nail bha hel-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq bhai heivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq maqkhaiq, thaonq bhai laol phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq maqkhaiq, aivq-i mail nl thaq nail laiq nail tsa nail phaq teevq phaq iqsanl ngal maq moel-al. Aivq bhai oeqbal thaq nail ganl neq, aqyu juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail ganl teevq-eel ngaol.

Aivq bhai yu aqtsi tsu dai heivq nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail ganl, ngal ya heeq kivq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail naol jaol nail bha bhi hel leevq naol dai, noeqceiv-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai yalkhaq ge movq nail tsaol-aq juq naoq nail sivtavq bhai ge-ail yaoq dai, ngal aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Genl dev nail tsaol-aq al juq, aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Paolluv bhai hevq khi, aq-u nqkiv Aqdilbhaqlil meenq bha kev dai, hevq ha-ail bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq neq, gailkhaol tsao nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq juq neq, genl dev nail ilkhaol bhai kovq ail khi, moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq juq taivq-ail aivq bhai hevq ha ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq bhai Gailsaqlil meenq bhai hevq kel-aivq khi, haoqgavq al keiv heeqphaq Peiqlil bhai bivq khi, Paolluv bhai iqsanl aivq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Peiqlil haoqgavq al keiv ge daiq-u phao, Paolluv bhai, “Milkhaoq khul khaoq bhai jaol nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq-u phao, Gillilciv milkhaoq bhai jaol nail dai, heeq nia-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq ge nail: “Naoq bhai yalkhaq ge movq nail tsaol-aq juq kev lee khi pultavq, naoq bhai khal naldaiq nail phaq naldaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv bhai aqmeeq-ai lovq khi Heiqlol-i mail cov-ail ceevq-a nail heeqphaq nail haol ilkhaol thaonq lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol nail haqbhoil daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq n jel ail-u phao, Philma Aqnaq khi Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq, yu nail haqbhoil gedan nail Deiqlaqdulluv dai mil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq hevq khi, Gailsaqlil meenq bhai ail-a nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Peiqlil nail sivtavq bhai aqyu juq lai khi, Paolluv bhai yalkhaq ge lai-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv bhai hevq bhoel lavq khi, Deiqlaqdulluv al gaq Paolluv nail ganl niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Eeqnail heelnail heeqphaq Peiqlil-ol, naol neenoeq neekha aol nail lavqkhoel nee milkhaoq bhai uvthaiq khi, nvjuq neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel nee aqdoevq ya doevq dai, nvjuq nail milkhaoq bhai naol mee nia phaq nl lavq-a nail ngaol.
Naoq-i mail nl-a nail ganl niil juq bhai, khaq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, khaq mao iqsanl nvjuq hav bhoel khi, naoq nail geeqlaoq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal daoq maodai ge nail lavqkhoel nee, naoq nail aqyanq maq lav gil movq-il. Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq nail ganl ngal davqnil nil dai ge nail bhai, naol gaoqhaq nail lavqkhoel nee teevq pov naldaiq lavq yaoq dai, naoq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, haqeiv nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq pevq nail bhai, nvjuq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl suqsaq lal dai, gaq bivq nail Naqsaqlail munl khe aqivq teevq gaq pevq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai aivq lav jiivq lav cavq nail dai, nl nail bhai, nvjuq aivq bhai nieivq-a nail ngaol.
[Nvjuq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq khal jiav nail khe-ai, nvjuq aivq bhai yalkhaq dal nail khi ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq Lulsil lee khi, aivq bhai nvjuq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee luv dov khi hevq kol-aivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, ‘Aivq bhai yalkhaq khal ge movq nail juq naol jaol nail bha ya ail nail ngaol’ dai, Lulsil daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.]
Tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai naol naldaiq haq neq, nvjuq aivq bhai oeqbal khal thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai naol ya heeq kivq nail ngaol” dai, Deiqlaqdulluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge nail bhai Yuldav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, “Tsaq naol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv daoq ge nail haqbhoil heeqphaq Peiqlil aqlavq dao bhiq-u phao, Paolluv niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Naol neq, milkhaoq niil khaoq nail kovtavq bhai yalkhaq dal nail gaq jiovq-a nail, mee nia kovq bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq nail sivtavq bhai ngaq nail ganl ya ge dai, aqyanq bivq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail neekhaol sil khi gaq ya ail nial.
Ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha uqhuq thaoq lai-a nail tsel-nvq n maq jaiq-ail haq-al dai, naol tsaotsel duq kivq nail ngaol.

Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, meenq lavqkhoel teevq dao ganav bhai maqkhaiq, ngal yu nee jil pheeljaq nail bhai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq-i mail moel-ai thaq nail maq jiav-ail. Yu suqsaq lal dai, ngal nl nail bhai aqyu juq-i mail moel-ai thaq nail iqsanl maq jiav-ail.
Aqyu juq niil aq-il ngaq nail laiq nail phaq halpov khi ge thailthaiq nail ganl, thoil juq iqsanl bhai, salkhil teevq phaq iqsanl, maq tsiqtsoe nia-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naoq nail sivtavq bhai ngal daolcoev dai, niailhai ge dov nail ngaol. Yu nee pav-ail nail dai, aqyu juq-i mail khul nail Yeiqsul nail gailkhaol bhai ngal tsaothe nail teevq-eel ngaol. Ngal nvjuq nail aqphiq aqbhal nail Miqyail bhai alhai uqhuq thaoq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai khal gevq-ai thaq nail daoq iqsanl bhai, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Tsaolmeeq tsaoldoil iqsanl, sil thaq nail nee gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, niai jaol nail tsaol-aq niil juq, Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai noeqthunq nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl noeqthunq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq yaq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq nail neema khaq mao iqsanl aqhaol haol dai jiav nia dai, laijai thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha maq ail dai jaol-a nail mee nia kovq bhee lal-aoq nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail tsaol-aq haq nail aoq nail juq bhai yu-i mail danq lavq-a nail phul bivq ail khi, Miqyail bhai danq bhiq nail phaq iqsanl nl ail nail dai khi, a bhai ail-a nail ngaol.

Ngal alhai nl thailthaiq khi, aqmaol lav haol nail aol nl gaq-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai aqyu juq ngaq bhai moel-a nail ngaol. Ngaq-ai nee mail tsaol-aq munl juq maq jaol nail nee ovqtavq, suqsaq nail phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq juq a bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq iqsanl, ngaq bhai oeqbal thaq nail phaq jiav haq neq, naoq nail sivtavq bhai lee khi ge nail, tsaq nail ngaol.

Maq ngel haq neq, maoqbhaoq nl nail munl juq nail sivtavq bhai ngal thulphaol lai-u phao, ngaq nail lavqkhoel khe laiq nail phaq moel-ai thaq nail khul jiav nail-aiq dai, niai lee thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bhi ge daiq yaoq.

Aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai ngal thulphaol-u phao, ngaq-i mail gul gul-ail khi ge-a nail ganl al ganl bhai doeq leivq duq jiav-ail teevq-eel ngaol. ‘Sil thaq nail tsaol-aq gaoq doevq lal naol dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail teevq phaq bhaqda nee, yanqgaol nuljuq-i mail nieivq khi niailhai bhi naldaiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol’ dai, ge nail al daoq bhai doevq leivq nail phaq jiav-ail teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail ganl heeq nia-ai thaq nail Peiqlil neq, “Genl dev nail teevq hinl gaq nail aqivq gaq pevq nail Lulsil kev lee-u phao, nuljuq nail ganl niil ganl ngal dalceiv bhiq naol” dai, ge khi, ganl al ganl pheethaiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, bhi lovq nail haqbhoil, genl dev nail teevq yal gaq nail aqivq gaq bhai aivq daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Al jaiq-ail maq laol thaiq mail bhi jaol nail nee ovqtavq, aivq loq nail phaq bhai aivq nail aqtsaoq juq heldaiq bhiq nail bhai thaq lav tsoiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Hail n liq n bhee lal-u phao, Peiqlil khi Dulsilleiq aqyu nvq maolyaq lee-a nail ngaol. Dulsilleiq neq, Yuldav nail jeq-e pevq nail ngaol. Paolluv bhai bhi khul ail khi, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ganl ge nail bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq khi, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nail phaq khi, yaqhao kev lee nail yalkhaq dal nail ganl juq bhai Paolluv ge kel laivq-u phao, Peiqlil geesil lal bhiq khi ge nail: “Naol kovq ail yaoq. Yaqhao dan-u phao, naoq bhai ngal gaoq bhi khul lee naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Peiqlil neq, Paolluv aivq bhai phul bivq lavq-ail jaol-aq dai, noeqthunq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Paolluv bhai teevq yanq ngal-aq teevq pov khul khul-ail khi, daoq ge tsaoq nail ngaol.

Nvq kovq bhee lal-u phao, Peiqlil nail jaol duq bhai Bhaolgil Bheiqthul heeqphaq gaoq jiovq phal lee-a nail ngaol. Peiqlil neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai aqmil ya movq nail ngel-i mail, Paolluv bhai thaonq bhai bhi aol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Bheiqthul milkhaoq al khaoq bhai kev lee-a nail hail n bhee lal-u phao, Gailsaqlil meenq nee mail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Philma juq khi Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu Paolluv nail ganl heeqphaq Bheiqthul bhai, yalkhaq ge lai-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail maivphaoq bhai heldaiq khi, Paolluv bhai Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha teevq pov bhi hevq ha lal nail haqbhoil, hal nail ngaol. Gailphail bhai lovq khi, Paolluv bhai heivq nail haqbhoil, aqyu juq lainq gil-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bheiqthul ge nail: “Paolluv bhai Gailsaqlil meenq nail thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl, maq maoq lal mail, a bhai kovq ail nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq al gaq-i mail nl laiq thaq nail phaq jiav nail phal-iq neq, nuljuq nail aqivq aqtsu juq ngaq-ai nee mail lee khi, yalkhaq ge lee yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Bheiqthul Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha goiq n tsel n bhee dai, gaoq jaol khi, Gailsaqlil meenq bha kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Yaoq n yaoq aivq yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev bhai jaoldeel khi, Paolluv bhai bhi hel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv kev lal-u phao, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail lee-a nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq aivq nail teevq jaoq thulphaol khi, aivq laiq deedee nail ganl mee nia phaq ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail ge nail al juq neq, salkhil maq jiav-ail.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Paolluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail: “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai maqkhaiq, Lolmav milkhaoq bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq-i mail nl bheeq-ai thaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jiav-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Bheiqthul neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai aqmil ya movq nail ngel-i mail, Paolluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naol Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai khi, ngaq nail sivtavq bhai ganl niil ganl nee yalkhaq dal movq-ail laiq” dai, naldaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq Gailsaq nail yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev sivtavq bhai ngal thulphaol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai niilniai yalkhaq ge nail tsaq nail ngaol. Naol heeq nia nail khe-ai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nail kovtavq bhai ngaq-i mail nl laiq-a nail khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.

Ngal sil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail laiq nail phaq nl thaq nail nul neq, al bhai bhi jel-ail lavq yaoq dai, ngal maq hal-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq ngaq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal halpov nail thoil maq tsaq haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai ngaq bhai maq av bhiq nia-ail. Heeqphaq Gailsaq jaol nail bha yalkhaq bhi dal-ail lavq yaoq dai, ngal hal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bheiqthul neq, aivq bhai neenoeq needul bivq nail juq nee mail maoqbhaoq nl khi, niailhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Heeqphaq Gailsaq-i mail yalkhaq bhi dal-ail lavq yaoq dai, naol hal nail ngel-i mail, naoq bhai Gailsaq jaol nail bha bhi lai naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, heeqphaq Aqgilpav khi mail aivq nail al-ivq Bheiqlaqnil, Bheiqthul bhai hav nail dai khi, Gailsaqlil meenq bhai lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq mail a bhai mee nia n jaol kel lavq-u phao, Bheiqthul-i mail Aqgilpav bhai Paolluv nail ganl niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Heeqphaq Peiqlil-i mail niilniai thaonq bhai laol-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq jaol nail ngaol.

Ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lal-u phao, Philma juq khi mail Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aqivq aqtsu juq aivq nail ganl ngaq bhai ge lavq khi, aivq bhai yalkhaq dal ceiv khi heivq yaoq dai, ngaq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal aqyu juq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: ‘Nvjuq Lolmav tsaol-aq nail aol neq, niailhai jiav nail ngaol: Oeqbal thaq nail bhai ya daq thailthaiq nail gaq, oeqbal thaq nail tsaol-aq juq nee jaol khi, oeqbal thaq nail ganl al maq ge daiq bhiq-u kev dai, khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq yu nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai maq av bhiq-ail’ dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq niai kev lee-u phao, lavqtsail mail yaoq n yaoq yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev bhai jaoldeel lai khi, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai bhi hel lavq nail haqbhoil, ngal daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai yalkhaq ge movq nail juq thul lal khi ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i mail noeq-ai thaq nail laiq nail phaq teevq phaq iqsanl, maq ge dol lavq-al.

Aqyu juq ge nail al neq, aqyu juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail aolsaolkovq nail ganl khi, sil jel-a nail Yeiqsul dai khul nail gaq nail ganl nee taivq-ail jil pheeljaq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul al gaq doevq nail ngaol dai, Paolluv ge nail ngaol.
Ganl al juq bhai khalhai peivtsel heeq meeq dai, ngal maq noeq duq kivq nail ngel-i mail, ‘Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha lai khi, yalkhaq ge lai naol laiq’ dai, Paolluv bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai aqmeeq-ai lovqphail lavq khi, heeqphaq Gailsaq-i mail yalkhaq bhi dal ail lavq yaoq dai, hal nail ngel-i mail, heeqphaq Gailsaq jaol nail bha maq hevq ha ail-u kev dai, aivq bhai aqmeeq-ai lovqphail nail haqbhoil daoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqgilpav ge nail: “Ngal iqsanl, tsaol-aq al gaq daoq ge nail bhai, gaiq movq-ail nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. “Niaohao ya gaiq nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqthul ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq, Aqgilpav khi Bheiqlaqnil aqyu nvq mail, seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel nee teevq gaq khe-ai, genl dev nail juq bhai uvthaiq nail aqivq juq khi, meenq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail aqivq aqtsu juq nee mail, yalkhaq dav nail haol lavqkhoel bhai, aol lai-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Bheiqthul-i mail daoq bivq khi, Paolluv bhai bhi hevq bhoel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao Bheiqthul ge nail: “Heeqphaq Aqgilpav khi mail niai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, niil gaq bhai heldaiq daiq. Ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol-u phao maqkhaiq, niai jaol-u phao maqkhaiq, niil gaq neq, aqdoevq doevq nail maq geel-nvq-ail dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq aivq nail ganl, mailma-ail ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhi sil nail haqbhoil yalkhaq dal kivq dai, aivq-i mail nl bheeq thaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl, ngal maq halpov moel kivq nail nee ovqtavq, eeq deedee nail heeqphaq Gailsaq nail sivtavq bhai, yalkhaq bhi dal-ail lavq yaoq dai, Paolluv ngaq bhai hal nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai bhi hevq ha lai nail haqbhoil, ngal noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, heeqphaq Gailsaq jaol nail bha aivq nail ganl khul teevq phaq-ail gevq bhiq nail phaq maq jiav-il. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhai peivtsel gaq-u phao, aivq nail ganl ngal haoqgavq gevq bhiq kivq dai, duq lal nail haqbhoil nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai taivq-ail maqtsil heeqphaq Aqgilpav nail sivtavq bhai, aivq bhai hel lavq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, thaonq bhai aol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai bhi ail-u phao, yu aivq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail ganl, haoqgavq aqmeeq-ai maq gevq bhoel bhiq haq neq, teevq peivq-ail maq tsaq-ail dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol” dai, Bheiqthul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqgilpav Paolluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Naoq nail ganl naol ge nail ya nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Paolluv aqlavq gaoltsaoq khi, aivq laiq nail phaq maq aol nail ganl niailhai ge nail ngaol:

“Heeqphaq Aqgilpav-ol, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq-i mail ngaq bhai oeqbal khal thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, yanqgaol naoq nail sivtavq bhai ngal ya ge kovq bhiq nail niil neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq eeq nail teevq phaq ngaol dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aolsaolkovq khi aqyu juq teevq yanq maqkhaiq dai jil pheeljaq nail ganl bhai, naol aqmeeq-ai heeq nia nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, neema heelma ma dai thaq khi, ngal ge nail bhai teevq pov naldaiq lavq yaoq dai, ngal hal nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Ngal yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao nee, ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, ngaq-i mail aqdoevq doevq-a nail ganl, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ge dov movq-ail nul neq, ngadao juq nail uqhuq thaoq nail aolsaolkovq nail lavqkhoel, yu nee mail maqtsil aolsaolkovq bhai tsaothe bhee deedee nail munl pevq nail, Phaqliqsail nail munl lavqkhoel bhai, iqmoeq-u nee ngal aol nail bhai, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il ngal niai yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq thailthaiq nail niil neq, ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq bhai, Miqyail-i mail jaq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial bhai ngal noeqthunq nail bhaqda nee, ya daq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq nail jeq-e tsel-nvq jeq-e nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, laijai laijai-ail Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail lavqkhoel, daoqma saljial al bhai ya dai, noeqthunq nail ngaol. Heeqphaq-ol, ngal iqsanl alhai noeqthunq nail bhaqda nee, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, sil nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail, nuljuq niilniai neema maq thaqtsaol nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Naqsaqlail tsaol-aq Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai lav tsoiq dai, mee nia phaq nl nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngal noeq daiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel bhai, ngal alhai nl daiq-a nail ngaol. Philma juq bhai aqkhaoqanq hal ya khi, Khali yaq maodai gaq bhai nieivq khi, thaonq bhai laol-a nail ngaol. ‘Aqyu juq bhai deeq heivq nail tsaq naol laiq’ dai, yu naldaiq-u phao, ngal iqsanl, aqlavq bavq dil-a nail ngaol.

Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol juq nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal aqyu juq bhai mee nia pov khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq khi, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai khal ge movq-ail ge dai, ngal laijai daiq-a nail ngaol. Ngal neema phail deedee nail ngel-i mail, yu nail milkhaoq bha jiav nail meenq juq bhai kev dai, lai lai-ail khi aqyu juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Ngal alhai nl lai nail haqbhoil, Philma juq bhai aqkhaoqanq hal khi, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai ngal lai-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, heeqphaq-ol, gailphail bhai n-gaol gaol kavkav lee-u phao, nqtavq nee mail nlma nee maqtsil kav nail aqbhaq, ngal khi ngaq-ai nee mail ail thailthaiq nail juq bhai teevq jaoq bha lee-a nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq iqsanl mail, bavq tsuq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Heiqbhail daoq nee mail niailhai ge nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol: ‘Saolluv-ol, Saolluv-ol, khul khi mail naol ngaq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail-aiq. Niaoqnel bhai coev nail khaoltsoe bhai naol thoel nail neq, naol ya nal-ail teevq-eel ngaol’ dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
‘Heeqphaq-ol, naol khaq sil gaq’ dai, ngal naldaiq-u phao, ‘Ngal neq, naoq-i mail khoeq lavq jiovq lavq thailthaiq nail Yeiqsul ngaol’ dai, aivq ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ngaq bhai gaoq ge nail: ‘Thul khi daolcoev dai, thulphaol yaoq. Naoq bhai ngaq nail ganl bhi nl khi, salkhil bhiq khanq nail dai, ngaq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, naoq nail sivtavq bhai ngal dov lee-a nail ngaol. Yanqgaol naol ngaq bhai ya moel-a nail ganl niil khi, yaqhao ngaq-i mail naoq bhai bhi moel nail ganl juq bhai, naol yu bhai salkhil ya khanq bhiq nail ngaol.
Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a khi Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee, ngal naoq bhai bhi jel-ail naol. Al ovqtavq, ngal naoq bhai yu nail jeq-e jaq-a jaol nail bha khoel gai-aivq naol.

Aqyu juq maivneev moel lal khi, aqnav nail lavqkhoel nee, aqbhaq bhaq nail bha aol lal nail nee ovqtavq, neivq Saqdaq nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee Miqyail jaol nail phao kovq lal dai, ngal naoq bhai khoel gai-aivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail aqyu juq nail oeqbal phaiq bhiq khi, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai aivq nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal naol’ dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.”

Paolluv gaoq ge nail: “Alheel ngel-i mail heeqphaq Aqgilpav-ol, nqtavq kovtavq nee lee-a nail Yeiqsul-i mail aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee bhiq heeq bhiq moel lavq-a nail juq bhai, ngal maq naldaiq-ail, khul maq khi kivq-ail.

Iqmoeq Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jaol nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqnao Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq khi Yuldav milkhaoq khaoq lao bhai jaol nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai maqkhaiq, ngal cavq-a nail ngaol. ‘Nuljuq oeqbal noeq pov khi, Miqyail jaol nail phao kovq lal yaoq. Nuljuq oeqbal noeq pov aoq thaq nial dai, yu heeq nia dai doevq yaoq’ dai, ngal cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaq bhai nieivq khi, deeq heivq nail dai, laijai nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yanqgaol kev dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq nail ngel-i mail, niai thulphaol khi, eeq yaq nil yaq niidai nail gaiqlaq bhai salkhil ya khanq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il ngaq-i mail ge thailthaiq nail ganl niil neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq khi mail Molseiq-i mail niailhai pevq lal nail ngaol dai, ge thaq-ail ceevq-a nail ganl al ganl nee teevq phaq ngaol.

Aqyu juq niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol: ‘Khali neq, ya sil khi, sil nail lavqkhoel nee iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq kovq lal nail gaq pevq khi, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khi, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai aqbhaq nail ganl aivq cavq bhiq nail ngaol’ ” dai, Paolluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Paolluv alhai ge kovq bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, Bheiqthul ge nail: “Paolluv-ol, naol neq, naiquq uq ail-aoq thaq nail ngaol. Naol haoqgavq maodai saol thaq nail ngel-i mail, uq ail-aoq thaq nail niil” dai, mailma-ail ge nail ngaol.
Paolluv ge nail: “Heeqphaq Bheiqthul-ol, ngal naiquq maq ngel-ail. Ngal aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq saol-nvq-ail maldil ngel nail phaq bhai, ngal ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Aqgilpav, aivq ganl niil juq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail sivtavq bhai daolcoev dai, ngal ge tseq naol. Ganl niil neq, bhallal bhai pevq lal-a nail maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq heeq gil nia nail ngaol dai, ngal ge tseq nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Aqgilpav-ol, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai naol neema thaq tsaol naol laiq. Naol neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqgilpav Paolluv bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aqyanq niidai nail lavqkhoel nee, ngal Khali yaq pevq lal dai, naol nl kivq nail dai, noeq nail laiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Aqyanq teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, maodai nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, naol khi yanqgaol ngaq nail daoq bhai ya gaiq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, hailcav pheethaiq-ai thaq nail niil maq ngel nail neq, ngaq-ai khe-ai dul lal dai, ngal Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol” dai, Paolluv ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, heeqphaq Aqgilpav maqkhaiq, heeqphaq Bheiqthul maqkhaiq, Bheiqlaqnil maqkhaiq, aqyu juq nee mail khal jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail juq maqkhaiq, kovq ail nail khi thul gil lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq dov lee khi teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq bhai heivq heeq phaq-ail, maq ngel haq neq, thaonq bhai laol heeq phaq-ail nl laiq thaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jiav lao thaq-il laq” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aqgilpav Bheiqthul bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, heeqphaq Gailsaq-i mail yalkhaq bhi dal ail lavq yaoq dai, maq hal-ai thaq-al nul neq, aivq bhai phaiq bhiq kivq lao thaq nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq bhai Iqtaqliq milkhaoq bhai bhi ail nail dai, ge ceiv gaq-u phao, Paolluv khi thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq bhai iqsanl, genl dev nail teevq ya gaq nail aqivq Yulluv dai, mil-ai thaq nail gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yulluv neq, Aolgultuv genl mavq dai khul nail Lolmav genl dev nail munl teevq munl bhai aol nail ngaol.

Aqsil-aq milkhaoq lavqkhoel khe, iqyaq iqma daol jail bhai jiav nail meenq juq bhai ail nail dai, ge-i mail, nvjuq Aqdaqmuldil meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq nail laovq jeeq-a nail ngaol. Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Theilsaqlolni meenq bhai jaol nail, Aqliqdaqgul iqsanl nvjuq nee mail jeeq jaol nail ngaol.

Yaoq n yaoq, nvjuq Sildoq meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Yulluv daiq khul nail aqivq al gaq Paolluv bhai gaoqhaq nail ngel-i mail, aqtsaoq juq bhai thaoqphuq lai khi, khal loq nail phaq bhi bivq nail haqbhoil, Paolluv bhai aqyanq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq a bhai nee dov ail-u phao, lilmoel bhoe nail phaoq maq tsaq nail ngel-i mail, Gulbhaqlul eeljaol laol-n bhai juq khi, lilmoel maq yao nail phao nee laovq jeeq khi ail-a nail ngaol.
Gillilciv milkhaoq khi Paqbhullil milkhaoq nail aqjail bhai jiav nail iqyaq iqma nee ail pav khi, Lulsil milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Muqlal meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.
A bhai ail kev-u phao, Aqleiqsaqdul meenq nee lee khi, Iqtaqliq milkhaoq bha lai nail laovq teevq laovq bhai aqivq al gaq halpov moel khi, nvjuq bhai bhi jeeq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq aqya ya dai, mee nia n haqhaq-ai ail khi, Gaqnil meenq nail aqjail bhai, ail kev-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, lilmoel bhoe nail phaoq maq tsaq nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq iqmoeq phao maq ail kivq-ail, Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaol laol-n bhai juq khi, lilmoel maq yao nail, Saqmoqneiq meenq phao nee ail-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq haq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee, eeljaol laol-n al nail aqjail bhai ail khi, Laqsail meenq nail aqjail bhai, mao-ail meeq nail naq duq dai khul nail bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq a bhai al jaiq jaol maoq jel khi, iqmoeq phao gailkhaol dov ail nail haqbhoil ya geesil nail aqyanq kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maq jaq nail aol nl nail aqyanq jel ail-aoq nail ngaol.

“Aqtsaoq juq-ol, niil aq-il laovq jeeq khi ail haq neq, laovq khi yalkav taivq-ail ya luq ya seil-ail nail maq ngel-ail. Ngadao iqsanl ya sil nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, yaolphaol yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, genl dev teevq yal gaq nail aqivq al gaq, Paolluv nail daoq naldaiq nail nee maqtsil, laovq e nail gaq khi, laovq nail aqheel gaq nail daoq bhai, naldaiq nail ngaol.

Aqcoevq coevq nail yanq bhai naq duq al dao bhai, maq jaol meeq nail ngel-i mail, a bhai nee dov ail khi, khi kivq haq neq, Philnil meenq bhai jiav nail laovq naq duq bhai ail kev khi, aqcoevq coevq nail yanq jel ail-u kev dai, a bhai jaol naol dai, tsaol-aq maodai teevq pav neema tsaq nail ngaol. Philnil meenq neq, Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaol laol-n bhai jiav nail ngaol. A bhai jiav nail laovq naq duq al duq neq, nlma dov khoeq nail pultavq phao khi nlma dov khoeq nail pul-nvq phao phaoq nail ngaol.

Pul-nvq phao nee bhoel lavq nail lilmoel al, aqya ya dai, bhoel lavq nail ngaol. “Nvjuq-i mail noeqthunq-ai thaq nail khe-ai pevq lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, hail khulu he dov khi, Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaol laol-n nail aqjail bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, daoltavq phao khe lilmoel lil ma nlma dov khoeq nail pultavq phao nee mail, lilmoel bhoe leevq-a nail ngaol.

Lilmoel lil ma al, laovq bhai tsiqthaoq lee-u phao, laovq maq khanq tsaol dai pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq laovq bhai aivq bhai aivq bhi ail khi, lilmoel khal bhoe nail phao ail-a nail ngaol.

Gaqlaoldeiq dai khul nail eeljaol laol-n laol yaq bhai juq khi lilmoel maq yao nail phao nee ail thailthaiq-u phao, laovq laovq yaq maq ya luq maq ya seil-ail dai, laijai deedee-a nail lavqkhoel nee, laovq laovq ma nail kovtavq bhai he dav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Laovq laovq ma maq ya pav-ail dai, aqyu juq neeqtsaq oil khi, aqmeeq-ai pheethaiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Sultiv dai khul nail, iqyaq iqma nail lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail tsalhail bhai laovq tsiq thaoq-ail nail khul-il dai, aqyu juq geesil nail ngel-i mail, haqphal keiv ma al he kha khi, laovq bhai lilmoel khal bhoe nail phao bhi ail-a nail ngaol.

Lilmoel lil ma al maq naq lai dai bhoe khi, laovq al jaiq-ail tsaoq thoiq tsaoq dav-ail pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, yaoq n yaoq laovq lavqkhoel bhai thaonq thaq nail yalkav teevq pav ganav juq bhai, aqyu juq bavq ha-a nail ngaol.
Hail n bhee lal-u phao, laovq nail yalkav bhai iqsanl, aqyu juq yovqgavq nail aqlavq nee mail yovqgavq bavq ha-a nail ngaol.
Aqn aqyanq maodai, nlma khi aqgil bhai maq ya moel nail nee ovqtavq, lilmoel lil ma iqsanl bhoe nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq ya jel-ail naol dai, teevq peivq-ail noeqthunq duq, maq jiav-ail.

Aqyu juq khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jaq dai jeeq-a nail, maoq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Paolluv aqyu juq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol lal khi, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq ngal ge nail bhai naldaiq khi, Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaol laol-n nee mail maq dov lee dai jaol-al nul neq, luq-ail seil-ail nail niil juq bhai maq ya thaoqphuq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il gaq thaq gaoq bhaq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq teevq gaq iqsanl, maq ya sil-ail. Laovq niil laovq taivq-ail luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal uqhuq thaoq nail, ngaq bhai uvthaiq nail Miqyail nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq, milkiv ngal jaol nail bha lee khi, niailhai ge lee-a nail ngaol.

‘Paolluv-ol, thaq geesil. Heeqphaq Gailsaq nail sivtavq bhai naol ya thulphaol nail ngaol. Naoq-ai nee mail laovq jeeq jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, naol bhaqda nee, ya jel-ail naol’ dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqtsaoq juq-ol, gaq thaq gaoq bhaq. Yaoq. Ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail khe-ai pevq lal nail ngaol dai, ngal Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol naol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao juq-i mail jeeq-nq thaq nail laovq niil laovq neq, eeljaol laol-n teevq dao bhai ya tsiq thao-ail nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsel liq n nqkiv, nvjuq Aqdillail dai khul nail iqyaq iqma bhai ail thailthaiq nail ngaol. Hul-iq tsil lee-u phao, “Ngadao juq miltsaq teevq tsaol ganav bhai aqjail jail lee-aoq thaq nail khul-il” dai, laovq lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail juq noeq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ulcuvq bhai tsadaiq-u phao, nvq tsel lail navq nail bhai heeq nia-a nail ngaol. Teevq yanq gaoq kev lal-a ngal neq, aqyu juq teevq pov gaoq tsadaiq khi, tsel ngaq lail navq nail bhai heeq nia-a nail ngaol.
Laovq lovmav bhai thaoq tuv ail nail khul-il dai, aqyu juq geesil nail ngel-i mail, laovq ivqgovq phao hail khulu liq khu phaiq kha khi, “Nqbhaq lavqtsail mail bhaq lal” dai, noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Laovq lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail tsaol-aq juq, laovq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi tsaoq nail dai, noeq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, laovq nail uqhuq phaoq hail khulu phaiq kha nail khe-ai tavq khi, laovq laovq yaq bhai ulcuvq lavqkhoel bhai phaiq khaq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv genl dev nail teevq yal gaq nail aqivq gaq khi genl dev nail juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Tsaol-aq niil juq laovq lavqkhoel bhai maq jaol haq neq, nuljuq maq ya jel-ail yaoq-aol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, genl dev nail juq laovq laovq yaq al laovq nail neeqtsaq devceiv khi iqyaq iqma bhai liv puvq gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Nqbhaq bhaq lal thao, Paolluv aqyu juq iqsanl bhai gaq bivq bivq-ail khi ge nail: “Aoq jaq yaoq. Nuljuq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq jaq dai jaol-a nail, yanqgaol tsel liq n bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, jaq yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol. Jaq haq neq, ya jel-ail nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq teevq gaq nail uqhuq tsailkheel teevq kheel iqsanl, maq ya peivq-ail” dai, Paolluv aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai ge gaq-al ngal-aq neq, aivq khaqmul oil khi, iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul ngaoqpav khi jaq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqyu juq iqsanl mail gaq aol jaiq lal khi jaq-a nail ngaol.
Laovq al laovq bhai jeeq jaol nail tsaol-aq neq, nvq yal sivq tsel kovq gaq bhee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq jaq bov gaq khi, laovq aqphai phai lal dai, khal thaonq thaq nail govtsail iqsanl mail, iqyaq iqma bhai hoel puvq gil-a nail ngaol.

Nqbhaq bhaq lal-u phao, miltsaq niil khul daoq bhai dai, laovq lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail juq maq heeq nia-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsalhail jiav nail lavqgovq teevq govq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Khi kivq haq neq, lavqgovq al govq bhai laovq el-aivq nail dai, aqyu juq noeq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, hail khulu al juq bhai iqyaq iqma bhai pheel haq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Laovq bhai koev phaoq nail daillav juq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail neeqtsaq bhai iqsanl pheel-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, laovq nail uqhuq phaoq khe haqphal phal ma bhai lilmoel bhoe yao dai, he dav khi, daolbhaq phao laovq el-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ulcuvq maq navq nail bhai jiav nail miltsaq phutsu bhai thaoq tsi lai khi, laovq tsiq thaoq lai-a nail ngaol. Laovq nail uqhuq phao thaoqtsaoq-ai thaq nail al, aqthel thel deedee nail ngel-i mail, laovq teevq peivq-ail maq ail jiiv nia-ail. Laovq nail daoqthaoq phao ulcuvq eelkhaol mao-ail thaoq nail ngel-i mail, laovq pav-ail thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Phee-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq, ulcuvq eeldeeq deeq deeq-ail tsaoq nail khul-il dai, genl dev nail juq geesil nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai deeq heivq bhel dai, maoqbhaoq nl-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqivq al gaq Paolluv bhai bhi jel-ail movq nail ngel-i mail, genl dev nail juq maoqbhaoq nl nail bhai lav tsoiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, “Ulcuvq eeldeeq deeq nia nail juq bhi tev puvq-ail khi, daolbhaq phao bhi deeq dol laivq yaoq” dai, aqivq al gaq daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

“Eeldeeq maq deeq nia nail juq neq, dailpav bhai bhi jeeq nail juq bhi jeeq, laovq nail yalkav bhai iqsanl bhi jeeq yaoq” dai, daoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail jel-ail khi, daolbhaq phao dov kev gil lai-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq bhuq-ail lao-ail khi daolbhaq bhai lai dov-u phao, eeljaol laol-n al laol bhai Meiqleiqdeiq dai, khul nail bhai ya heeq kivq-a nail ngaol.

Eeljaol laol-n al laol bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nvjuq bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, hav lavq-a nail ngaol. Maoq-aol gaoq aol lee khi, aqcoevq coevq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq miqjaq sivtovq khi nvjuq bhai hav lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Paolluv miqjaq dalphail bal lavq khi bavq poiv lal-a nail ngaol. Dovq mao-ail kav nail eellel teevq maol miqjaq aqlaol laol lal-u phao dov lal khi, Paolluv nail aqlavq bhai keivq khi leel thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Dovq mao-ail kav nail eellel al maol Paolluv nail aqlavq bhai leel thaiq khi ga tseq nail bhai, a bhai jaol nail juq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, tsaol-aq bhai maldil deeq heivq thaq nail gaq nial. Aivq iqyaq iqma nail lavqkhoel nee ya jel-ail khi ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq aivq bhai maq bhi doevq-il” dai, aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge pheeljaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Paolluv eellel al maol bhai miqjaq lavqkhoel bhai jiivqpoiv gai-aivq khi, aivq neq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ngel-ail.

“Aivq nail aqmaol bhaonq lal nail ngaol, maq ngel haq neq, teevq pov taivq-ail bavq tsuq-ail khi sil nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq noeq noeq-ail heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq tsaq dai, heldaiq heldaiq-ail jaol khi ngaol-aoq, Paolluv khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq pevq lal nail bhai ya moel-u phao, aqyu juq noeq phal khi, “Tsaol-aq niil gaq, miqyail teevq gaq niil” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Jaol duq al dao nail aqjail bhai, Bhulbhaqlil dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq daiyal khoeq ma jiav nail ngaol. Aivq neq, eeljaol laol-n al laol bhai aqivq jiovq nail gaq ngaol. Aivq nvjuq bhai aqmeeq-ai hav lavq khi, hail n bhee dai, bhiq jaq bhi daol lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Bhulbhaqlil nail aqbhu coevq iqsanl coevq sil khi, ovqmav aqnel nal-ai bhiq nail lavqkhoel nee iqthaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Paolluv aivq jaol nail bha lai khi, geeqlaoq hal bhiq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav bhiq khi bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, eeljaol laol-n al laol bhai jaol nail, nal nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl lal-a nail ngaol. Paolluv aqyu juq bhai iqsanl bhi meeq lai-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl nvjuq bhai meeq nia phaq nail lavqkhoel nee ev lavq khi, nvjuq laovq jeeq khi dov ail-u phao, nvjuq loq nail juq bhai laovq lavqkhoel bhai bavq bhoel lavq-a nail ngaol.
