Bhala hail heeq jel-ail khi, Aqleiqsaqdul meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq nail laovq teevq laovq bhai jeeq khi dov ail-a nail ngaol. Laovq al laovq neq, coevqjieiv jieiv nail yanq jel ail-u phao kev dai, eeljaol laol-n al laol bhai naq-a nail ngaol. Laovq al laovq nail maolkhoel neq, teevq pov taivq-ail nvq gaq doevq lee-a nail miqyail nail maolkhoel ngaol.
Nvjuq Sullaqgul meenq bhai ail kev khi, a bhai hail n jaol-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq a bhai nee gaoq dov ail khi, Leiqjiqoq meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol. Niaohao kheel neq, pul-nvq phaoq khe lilmoel bhoe nail ngel-i mail, halpha n-gaol neq, nvjuq Bhaoldaqyallil meenq bhai ail kev-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq a bhai aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. “Nvjuq nee mail sivq n jaol lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq nvjuq bhai hal nail ngaol. Nvjuq Lolmav meenq bhai alhai khi lai kev-a nail ngaol.

A bhai jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq nvjuq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol geiq dai, ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, Aqbhil leiv dai khul nail dao khi Gaqnaq yavqtsoel hail tsoel dai khul nail meenq bhai kev dai, nvjuq bhai hav lee-a nail ngaol. Paolluv aqyu juq bhai ya moel-u phao, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq khi, neema gaq aol lal-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq Lolmav meenq bhai lai kev-u phao, Paolluv neq, aivq bhai lovq nail genl dev nail teevq gaq nee mail, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai aivq ya jaol dai, aqyanq ya-a nail ngaol.

Hail n jel ail-u phao, Paolluv a bhai jaol nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel aqivq jiovq nail juq bhai khul jil-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq jil lal-u phao, Paolluv aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail: “Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai maqkhaiq, aqphiq aqbhal nail aolsaolkovq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl bheeq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq lavqkhoel khe, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq ngaq bhai nieivq khi, Lolmav tsaol-aq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Lolmav tsaol-aq ngaq bhai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq gaq-u phao, ngaq nail lavqkhoel khe, sil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail oeqbal maq moel-a nail ngel-i mail, phaiq bhiq movq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq lav tsoiq nail ngel-i mail, ‘Heeqphaq Gailsaq jaol nail bha yalkhaq bhi dal-ail lavq yaoq’ dai, ngal hal-a nail ngaol. Ngal alhai ya hal khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail maq ngel.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai moel khi daoq ya ge tsaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai khul-a nail ngaol. Ngal neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a-i mail noeqthunq nail phaq bhai ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, hailcav niil phee-ai thaq nail bhai, ya daq nail ngaol” dai, Paolluv aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq ge nail: “Yuldav milkhaoq nee mail, naoq nail ganl gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail haoqgavq bhai, nvjuq maq ya daiq-al. Aqivq jaqbheq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl lal khi, naoq nail ganl maq meeq nail phaq maq ge lavq daiq-al.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu nee mail gaoq ail nail dai, khul nail munl al munl bhai khaq bhai khe jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl oeqbal thaq nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq-i mail noeq thaq-ai thaq nail juq ge lavq nail bhai, nvjuq gaiq movq-ail nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq nv peiv peiv-a nail ngaol. Nv peiv peiv-ai thaq nail aqn kev lal-u phao, tsaol-aq maodai Paolluv jaol nail bha jil lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl aivq teevq n n-lao salkhil khanq khanq-ail, aqyu juq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, Molseiq-i mail bivq-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq khi Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq bhai juq juq-ail, mailma-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail bhai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Aqyu juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maq tsaq maq jil lai mail, dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq maq dov ail-u phao nee, Paolluv aqyu juq bhai daoq niil daoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal bhai juq khi, nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq al daoq neq, tsaq deedee nail ngaol.
Ilsaqyal ge nail:
‘Tsaol-aq niil jeq-e
niil jaq-a
jaol nail bha ail khi
niailhai ge bhiq ail yaoq:
Nuljuq ya gaiq
khi ngaol-aoq,
maq gov heeq nia-ail.
Nuljuq ya moel
khi ngaol-aoq,
maq heeq nia-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
tsaol-aq niil jeq-e
niil jaq-a neq,
neema aqgaol
gaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq maq
naldaiq movq-ail.
Maivneev iqsanl,
maiv khul-ai
thaq nail ngaol.
Alhai maq ngel-ail
nul neq,
aqyu juq
ngal jaol nail bha
kovq lal nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq bhai
bhi meeq lai nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao,
aqyu juq maivneev
moel nia lal khi,
naqkhaol gaiq nia
lal nail ngaol.
Neema lavqkhoel
bhai iqsanl,
noeq heeq nia
lal nail ngaol’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq niailhai heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq. Miqyail nail hevqkovq nail ganl niil, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai cavq bhiq nail ngaol. Alhai cavq bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq naldaiq nail ngaol” dai, Paolluv ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
[Paolluv alhai ge gaq-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq dov ail khi aqyu juq nail gaiqlaq bhai jil pheeljaq deedee nail ngaol.]
Paolluv neq, aivq-i mail ngaq-ai thaq nail ilkhaol bhai nvq kovq bhee dai jaol khi, aivq jaol nail bha khal lal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, hav-a nail ngaol.
Aivq maq geesil dai, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail ganl cavq bhiq khi, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai cavq bhiq nail bhai teevq gaq-ail, maq lav tsoiq-ail.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav Paolluv ngaol. Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhi cavq nail haqbhoil, Miqyail ngaq bhai tsel dov khi khul lavq-a nail gaqkhoel teevq gaq pevq nail ngaol.

Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil neq, “Ngal yaqhao bivq naol” dai, aq-u nee Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai juq khi, meeq nail haol nail Jalliq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al daoq neq, aivq nail Yaqyov nail ganl ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq, aqsivq haqjoil phao nee ge haq neq, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a nee doevq lee-a nail ngaol.

Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal phao nee ge haq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-u phao, “Aivq neq, ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol” dai, bhaqaoq eeq nail lavqkhoel nee phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol maqkhaiq, gaqkhoel ya jiovq dai maqkhaiq, nvjuq ya-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq ganl niil nl nail neq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail neema thaqtsaol lal khi, daoq naldaiq lal dai, Khali nail haqbhoil nl nail ngaol.
Nuljuq iqsanl, Yeiqsul Khali-i mail khul-a nail tsaol-aq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.

Miqyail mailma-ail gaiq-a khi aivq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, aivq-i mail khul-a nail Lolmav meenq bhai jaol nail nuljuq iqsanl bhai, ngal haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Iqmoeq khe phaq neq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ganl milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee gaiq doi ail-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq iqsanl nail haqbhoil Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq juq-ail khi ngaq nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai, Miqyail nail ganl nl khi, aivq nail Yaqyov nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl noeq kev khi geeqlaoq hal nail bhai, Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngal geeqlaoq khal hal-u phao, nuljuq jaol nail bha lavqtsail mail lal kivq dai, naol neema tsaq haq neq, gailkhaol teevq khaol lav daol lavq yaoq dai iqsanl, Miqyail bhai hal nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai moel movq deedee-ail nial. Ya moel haq neq, nuljuq neema ivq lal dai, aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq teevq phaq ganav nuljuq bhai bivq movq-ail nial.
Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq gaq kav lal nail nee ovqtavq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, ngal iqsanl gaq kav lal dai, oil movq-ail nial.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq ol, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil ngal ganl nl-u phao, aqheeq heeq dol leevq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl aqheeq heeq dol leevq dai, nuljuq jaol nail bha lal naol dai, ngal mee nia pov noeqceiv-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il kev dai, lav tsoiq nail phaq jiav nail ngaol.

Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai maqkhaiq, neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, jeq-e jaq-a niidai nail haqbhoil ganl nl bhiq heeq phaq-ail, ngaq nail kovtavq bhai gailjiov bavq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq Lolmav meenq bhai jaol nail juq bhai iqsanl, ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq movq deedee-ail nial.

Ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail maq haqsil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al daoq neq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq pevq nail ngaol. Iqmoeq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai hevqkovq khi haoqnao yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai hevqkovq nail ngaol.

Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq al daoq nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail al phaq bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Tsaq nail daol nail
tsaol-aq
neema thaqtsaol nail
bhaqda nee,
aqdoevq
ya doevq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail Miqyail bhai neema maq thaqtsaol dai, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq khal nl-a nail kovtavq bhai, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq nqtavq nee mail bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lee nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq neq, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq nl khi, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai yu maq bhi moel nia dai, lav tsoiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Miqyail nail ganl heeq nia heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq bhai, ya heeq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail-i mail bhaqlaoq kheq dai, phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Miqyail nq teivq mil teivq teivq-u n-gaol nee mail, aivq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail maq heldaiq moel nia nail phaq maqkhaiq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel bhaqaoq eeq nail phaq maqkhaiq, aivq nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail Miqyail pevq nail ganl maqkhaiq, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, heeq duq moel duq lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail ganl bhai heldaiq khi alhai heeq lal nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, “Nvjuq maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, aqyu juq maq jil nia-ail.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, Miqyail bhai heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel nail geel-nvq nail khe-ai, maq tsiqeeq maq tsiqheel-ail. Al ovqtavq, aivq bhai maq ev-ail. Aqyu juq-i mail khal noeq nail phaq neq, khul teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq dai, pevq-ail khi aqyu juq nail neema iqsanl, navtsee dai pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Ngal neenoeq neekha aol naol dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq ge khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neq, yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi juq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Teevq thal-iq maq sil nail Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai, aqyu juq maq hav bhoel-al. Sil nia nail tsaol-aq nail maolkhoel, keivq-avq, liq khil liq lavq covq nail jaiqyaq khi mail, soiq soiq-ail tsao nail jaiqyaq juq nail maolkhoel bhai hav bhoel-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai khal nl movq nail khe-ai aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl dai, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai phaiq ha-u phao, aqyu juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq haqsil deedee lal nail phaq nl-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail alhai phaiq ha bhiq-a nail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq Miqyail nail maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai maq hav bhoel dai, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq bhai hav bhoel-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, iqsanl mail teivq-ai thaq nail Miqyail bhai khaonq ha khi, aivq-i mail teivq-a nail phaq bhai uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail, al juq nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail ngaol. Iqsanl mail teivq-a nail Miqyail bhai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq bhel.

Alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq haqeiv nail phaq nl movq nail neema aol nail khe-ai nl dai, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq yaqmai-aq juq neq, nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail aolsaolkovq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, yaqmai-aq aqtsaoq maq nl khaoq nail phaq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov-aq juq iqsanl alhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq juq nee mail maq iqthaiq tavq movq dai, yaqyov-aq aqtsaoq khaqmiq sev movq deedee nail neema aol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq haqsil deedee heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq-i mail nl bheeq-a nail khe-ai geel-nvq dai, aqyu juq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail neema maq aol-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq-i mail noeq nail phaq neq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail, maq tsaq maq geel-nvq nail phaq nl dai, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq, haqeiv nail phaq, yu nail nlmaoq bhai maivjeel jeel nail phaq, yu bhai khoeq lai dai nl movq nail phaq, teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Yu bhai maivjeel jeel nail, lav heivq nail, khaq pheeljaq nail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail, maq heldaiq nul nail, yu nail haoqnaol phao nee ge doil nail, niil juq iqsanl teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, khal ge movq-ail ge doil nail, Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail, yu bhai deeq nail, neema eeq nail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq thaqeeq nail, maq meeq nail phaq nl nail, aqbhu aqma nail daoq maq naldaiq nail, niil juq iqsanl teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq, khul teevq phaq-ail maq noeq heeq nia-ail. Saljial maq ivq-ail. Yu bhai maq gaiq-a-ail. Gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail neema iqsanl maq aol-ail.

Alhai khal nl nail tsaol-aq juq neq, sil nail geel-nvq nail ngaol dai, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai ge ceiv-ai thaq nail bhai aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol. Heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq nl thailthaiq nail nee ovqtavq, alhai khal nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, naol khul teevq phaq-ail ge kovq duq maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naol yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail khe-ai, naol iqsanl nl thailthaiq-ail nial. Alheel ngel-i mail, yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq-u phao, naoq nail kovtavq bhai naol oeqbal thaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Miqyail alhai nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Naol yu nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail khe-ai, naol iqsanl nl thailthaiq haq neq, “Miqyail-i mail yalkhaq dal nail bhai ngal ya jel-ail naol” dai, naol noeq nail laiq.

Maq ngel haq neq, Miqyail nail eeq dee meeq deedee nail aqmeeq phaq nl nail bhai maqkhaiq, ol nia nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, neema heelma ma dai noeq nia nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, naol khal nl movq-ail nl nail laiq. Naol oeqbal noeq pov noeqphal lal nia dai, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail Miqyail naoq bhai hevqdaiq lavq nail bhai naol maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol neema gaol khi oeqbal maq noeq pov nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhai naol halpov jil thailthaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail nail aqn al n kev lee haq neq, aivq tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee yalkhaq dal nail bhai naol bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ya moel naol.
Aqn al n nail lavqkhoel bhai, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, yovqgavq-i mail nl-a nail khe-ai geel-nvq dai, Miqyail dal bhiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq neema ivqdao dai aol nail lavqkhoel khaq mao iqsanl aqmeeq phaq nl khi, Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai maqkhaiq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, halpov nail ngaol. Alhai halpov nail tsaol-aq juq bhai Miqyail nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu nee jil pheel jil lul jaq nail tsaol-aq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai maq hav bhoel dai, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq bhai hav bhoel khi nl nail juq nail kovtavq bhai Miqyail neema phail deedee nail phaq kev lee nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail phaq khal nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq khi mail noeq dee noeq deel nail phaq kev lee nail ngaol. Iqmoeq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai kev lee khi, haoqnao yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqmeeq phaq khal nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi mail, neesal-ovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Iqmoeq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ya khi, haoqnao yu nail jeq-e jaq-a ya nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail neq, maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel-ail.

Molseiq nail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq maq jiav-ail, oeqbal khal nl nail tsaol-aq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq tavq-ail, ya luq ya seil ail nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail bhai oeqbal khal nl nail tsaol-aq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq nee yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail maq ngel-ail. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai hav bhoel khi nl nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq maq jiav nail yu nail jeq-e jaq-a, aqyu juq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq noeq heeq khi, aoldaoq kovqdaoq ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl haq neq, aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq jiav nail kheel ngaol.

Aqyu juq doevq nail jaol nail al neq, aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail khe-ai dul nail salkhil pevq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail heeq nia nail neema iqsanl, salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Naol oeqbal aol nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, maq aol nail laiq” dai, aqyu juq nail noeq heeq noeq moel nia nail neema ge lal nail ngaol.

Ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail khe-ai, Miqyail Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq khi, tsaol-aq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai oil-uvq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai, yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol, alhai tsao tsel nail ngaol.
Ngal Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, naol ge nail ngaol. Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq juq-ail, Miqyail bhai tavq lai nail phaq bhai neema eeq nail ngaol.
Naol Miqyail-i mail bhi nl movq nail phaq heeq nia nail ngaol. Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai ya saol-a nail ngel-i mail, aqmeeq phaq bhai tselpav bhoilpav nia nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Naol maivpeivq peivq nail tsaol-aq bhai gailkhaol hevqdaiq bhiq nail gaq jiovq khi, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai aqbhaq bhaq bhiq nail gaq jiovq naol dai, naol noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi bhai gailkhaol hevqdaiq nail gaq jiovq khi, yaqnoil juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail gaq jiovq naol dai iqsanl, naol noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neenoeq neekha maqkhaiq, maldil tsaq nail phaq maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol dai, naol heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, alhai noeq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naol yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq maq cavq maq cov-ail laiq. Yu nail nlmaoq maq ya khoiq-ail dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, naol khoiq thailthaiq nail laiq.

“Yu nail miqyaq khaqma bhai thaq nl bheeq thaq nl leel” dai, naol ge khi ngaol-aoq, naol nl bheeq thailthaiq nail laiq. Naol thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai bhe khi ngaol-aoq, thaoqphaoq aqma nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail nlmaoq juq bhai khoiq thailthaiq nail laiq.
Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq juq-ail neema eeq khi ngaol-aoq, naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq nl bheeq-ail Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai khal nl movq-ail nl nail maq ngel laiq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq
nuljuq bhaqda nee
Miqyail nail aqmil bhai
khal ge movq-ail
ge nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai naldaiq khi tsaothe haq neq, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol al ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq haq neq, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol naol nl khi ngaol-aoq, maq nl-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol maq nl-a nail tsaol-aq juq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai naldaiq khi tsaothe haq neq, aivq aol al maq nl khi ngaol-aoq, aol al nl-a nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Nuljuq neq, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav khi, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqsivq haqjoil phao bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol maq nl khi ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai naldaiq khi tsaothe nail tsaol-aq juq nuljuq aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, oeqbal thaq lal nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, lavqniil phao taivq-ail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq jiovq nail gaq neq, maldil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Lavqniil phao taivq-ail bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl nail phaq neq, maldil bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl nail maq ngel-ail.

Lavqkhoel phao Yuldav nail tsaol-aq pevq nail gaq neq, maldil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Maldil bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq nail phaq neq, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhee lal dai taivq-ail nl nail maq ngel-ail. Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee, neema lavqkhoel nee nl nail ngaol. Alhai nl nail tsaol-aq bhai, yu maq tsiqeeq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, yu nee maqtsil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khul nail geeqlaoq ya jaiq nail-aiq. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl nail, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq.
Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Iqmoeq neq, Miqyail aivq nail daoq aqyu juq bhai bivq khi bhi heldaiq phail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq saljial maq ivq khi ngaol-aoq, khul ge duq jiav nail-aiq. Aqyu juq saljial maq ivq nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail saljial ivq nail phaq bhai lav cov nia nail laiq.
Maldil maq lav cov nia-ail. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neq, saljial ivq nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Naoq-i mail ge-a nail
daoq bhaqda nee
naol tsaq nail
daol nail ngaol dai,
yu ge nail ngaol.
Yalkhaq dal nail
phaq bhai
ya daq-u phao,
naol gaq
lai nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq nl-a nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhi dov lal haq neq, ngadao khalhai ge heeq. Miqyail ngadao bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq haq neq, aivq maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq nl lavq-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao ge nail laiq. (Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, tsaol-aq yaq juq ge nail khe-ai taivq-ail, ge nail ngaol.)
Alhai maq ngel-ail. Daoq al daoq tsaq haq neq, Miqyail miltsaq yaq bhai yalkhaq khalhai khi dal nia nail-aiq.

Ngal saljial maq ivq nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi dov jaiq lal haq neq, khul khi mail Miqyail ngaq bhai oeqbal yaq niil dai, yalkhaq dal lavq nail-aiq.

“Aqmeeq phaq dov lal dai, maq meeq nail phaq nl la” dai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail ngaol. Paolluv iqsanl alhai nl nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq ge doil nail ngaol. Alhai ge nail juq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ya daq nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngadao Yuldav nail tsaol-aq yu nee maqtsil meeq jaiq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail oeqbal nail bhaqaoq kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai teevq pov ge bhiq-ao nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Tsaq nail
daol nail tsaol-aq
maq jaol-ail.
Teevq gaq iqsanl
maq jaol-ail.
Neenoeq neekha
aol nail tsaol-aq
teevq gaq-ail
maq jaol-ail.
Miqyail bhai halpov nail
tsaol-aq iqsanl
teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail,
Miqyail bhai
khaonq ha khi,
gail bheeq bheeq
ail-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl mail
ganl maq tsoiq nail
tsaol-aq pevq
lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqmeeq phaq
nl nail tsaol-aq
maq jaol-ail.
Teevq gaq iqsanl
maq jaol-ail.
Aqyu juq nail
khoeqma neq,
phao-ai thaq nail
luqdaol khe-ai,
dul nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail
moeqlal neq,
goiqbhaoq bhaoq
jaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail
moeqkov bhai neq,
mailma-ail kav nail
eellel nail dovq
aol nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail
moeqthaoq
lavqkhoel bhai
iqkhail yavq nail daoq
khi mail,
yu bhai neema
nal lai dai,
ge nail daoq
teevq bhee
aol nail ngaol.
Yu bhai
heivq nail haqbhoil
aqyu juq nail aqkhil
aqphai ngaol.
Aqyu juq khal
ail nail phao,
yu bhai lav luq
lav seil khi,
lav haq lav aoq
bhiq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq
neesal-ovq nail gailkhaol
maq heeq nia-ail.
Al ovqtavq,
aqyu juq nail
neema lavqkhoel nee
Miqyail bhai
maq ev-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai khal gevq-ai thaq nail daoq juq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq-i mail uvthaiq-ai thaq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ge kovq duq maq jiav-ail. Miltsaq yaq iqsanl mail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq maq pevq lal nia-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao oeqbal aol nail ngaol dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi heeq kivq lal-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq tavq-ail, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Ganl niil neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai ya-a nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai maq tsel pav-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail oeqbal nl-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai maq ya nia-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee aqphoiq maq bivq-ail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail neq, Yeiqsul Khali-i mail ul kovq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, Yeiqsul bhai laol bhiq nail phaq bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul khanq sil-a nail bhaqda nee, aivq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail oeqbal bhai Miqyail phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai nl-a nail neq, “Ngal tsaq nail daol nail Miqyail ngaol” dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol. Miqyail ol nia nail bhaqda nee, jel lal-u phao tsaol-aq-i mail nl-a nail oeqbal bhai aivq yalkhaq maq dal-ail.

Miqyail neq, tsaq nail daol nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aivq Yeiqsul bhai neema khal thaq tsaol nail tsaol-aq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Miqyail alhai nl-a nail neq, “Ngal tsaq nail daol nail ngaol” dai, yanq niil yanq nail lavqkhoel yu bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao khul bhai neema eeq duq jiav nail-aiq. Neema eeq duq maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail haoqnao nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee tsaq nail daol nail phaq ya-a nail maq ngel-ail. Neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee ya-a nail ngaol.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq tavq dai, neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee taivq-ail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Maq ngel haq neq, Miqyail neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Miqyail teevq-eel laiq. Aivq neq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail Miqyail iqsanl maq ngel-ail laiq. Ngel naol. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail Miqyail iqsanl ngel nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Miqyail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol maq thaoq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai iqsanl, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Miqyail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai juq juq-ail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai lav cov nail ngel-ail laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai bhi ivq jaiq lal nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail ganl khalhai ge heeq. Aivq-i mail ya phuq ya moel-a nail ganl neq, pul-nvq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail niil juq ngaol.

Nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee, Aqbhaqlaqhaq tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-al nul neq, aivq neema eeq duq jiav nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aivq neema eeq duq maq jiav-ail.

Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai khalhai gevq-ai thaq nail-aiq. “Aqbhaqlaqhaq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ganl nl nail tsaol-aq, yalgaq aqphoiq ya-u phao, yu aivq bhai kovpavq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol dai, teevq gaq-ail maq saol-nvq-ail. Aivq-i mail nl khi ya nail geel-nvq nail ngel-i mail, ya-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nl nail hal nail phaq bhai maq juq dai, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Miqyail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee maq ngel-ail. Oeqbal aol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal nia nail Miqyail bhai, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nl nail hal nail bhai maq tavq-ail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq bhiq haq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Daqbhil iqsanl, alhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq ge nail:
“Tsaol-aq khul gaq
bhai maqkhaiq,
nl bheeq-a nail
phaq bhai
Miqyail oeqbal
phaiq bhiq khi
aivq nail oeqbal bhai
lav peivq gil
bhiq haq neq,
tsaol-aq al gaq
geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail
kovtavq bhai
Heeqphaq Miqyail
oeqbal maq thaq haq neq,
tsaol-aq al gaq
geeqlaoq
eeq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail geeqlaoq al ya nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, aol al maq thaoq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl ya naol laiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail bhai ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Miqyail aivq bhai alhai khaq mao saol-nvq bhiq-a nail-aiq. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl gaq khi mail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, maq nl-u nee mail laiq. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl gaq khi mail maq ngel-ail. Maq nl-u nee mail saol-nvq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol maq nl-u nee mail tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-aoq nail ngaol dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai bhi dov lal nail dai khi, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol nl-a nail ngaol. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol maq nl khi ngaol-aoq, neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail aqbhu gaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq aivq bavkov uqjaq maq oev-u nee mail, khal doevq-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, neema thaqtsaol thaqtsaol-ail doevq nail bavkov uqjaq oev-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail aqbhu gaq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol.

Miltsaq niil iqsanl, Aqbhaqlaqhaq khi mail, aivq nail aqjievq lilheel bhai jaiqbhoil bivq naol dai, Miqyail saljial jaq-u phao, Aqbhaqlaqhaq aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail haoqnao tsaothe-a nail ngel-i mail, jaq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq neema thaqtsaol khi, Miqyail aivq-i mail tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq nail tsaol-aq jaiqbhoil ovq haq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Daoqma saljial al iqsanl khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhi kev lee nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav-ail nul neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl laiq nail phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, daoqma saljial bhai ya nia dai neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee ya nail ngaol. Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail aqjieivq lilheel juq iqsanl daoqma saljial maldil ya-a nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq taivq-ail ya-a nail maq ngel-ail. Ngadao juq iqsanl nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol nail khe-ai, khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ya nail ngaol.
Aivq nail ganl Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Ngal naoq bhai
jeq-e jaq-a
maodai nail aqbhu
bhi pevq lal naol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq neq, aivq neema thaqtsaol nail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai saljial ya-a nail ngaol. Miqyail al gaq neq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail nee ovqtavq, maq jiav nail phaq bhai iqsanl bhi jiav lal nia nail gaq ngaol.
Jeq-e jaq-a maodai nail aqbhu pevq lal dai, noeqthunq duq maq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol khi noeqthunq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
“Naoq nail aqjievq lilheel
nqtavq khe tsaiq nail
aqgil khe-ai
mao lal naol” dai,
Miqyail aivq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq aivq nail aqmaol bhai saol-nvq khi, aivq teevq yal kovq niidai bhee lal-a nail ngel-i mail, yeel gil lai nail aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq Saqlal iqsanl yaq jaol lee nail yanq jel-ail khi ngaol-aoq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol nail phao gaq maq bhaq-ail.
Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail bhai, aivq pov pov lav lav-ail maq noeq dai, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq kav lal khi Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol.
Saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nl nia nail ngaol dai, Aqbhaqlaqhaq ivqdao dai, neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, “Naol tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, Miqyail aivq bhai saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq alhai saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol dai, gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail haqbhoil teevq-eel maq ngel-ail.

Ngadao juq nail haqbhoil iqsanl gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq bhai ngadao neema thaqtsaol haq neq, ngadao bhai iqsanl tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Miqyail saol-nvq lavq nail ngaol.

Ngadao-i mail nl laiq-a nail oeqbal bhaqda nee Yeiqsul bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, Miqyail bhai tsaq lai jil lai-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee ngadao geeqlaoq eeljaol al nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol ivq lal-a nail ngaol. Ngadao Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ya dai, noeqthunq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.
Al ovqtavq, ngadao haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai ya daq-u phao, lavqkhiq mao-ail tsail-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, haq nail aoq nail bhaqda nee, ngadao oltsaol lal-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao oltsaol nail bhaqda nee, laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol dai, Miqyail ngadao bhai saol-nvq lavq-a nail ngaol. Laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai gaq lai-a nail bhaqda nee, noeqthunq nail phaq jiav lal-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Noeqthunq nail phaq jiav lal-a nail bhaqda nee, neema cov duq maq jiav yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail daiq ngal-aq neq, ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal, ngadao nail neema lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq teevq bhee hoel bhoel lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao gaq hal duq maq jiav-u phao, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail yanq bhai Khali neq, oeqbal yaq nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngaol.

Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil khanqsil nail tsaol-aq halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel kivq-ail. Teevq pov ganav tsaol-aq aqmeeq aqjaq nail haqbhoil khanqsil tseq nail teevq gaq ganav neq, jaol-ail jaol-aq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail ngadao bhai khadai gaiq-a nail dai, niailhai bhi moel lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao oeqbal yaq pevq-u phao, Khali ngadao nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il, Khali khanqsil-a nail bhaqda nee, ngadao Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. A dai nee maqtsil, aivq bhaqda nee ngadao Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhai maldil ya jel ail-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq-u phao, aivq nail Yaqyov khanqsil-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao Miqyail bhai tsaq lai jil lai-a nail ngaol. A dai nee maqtsil, aivq bhai tsaq lai jil lai-a nail ngel-i mail, Yaqyov aqdoevq doevq nail khe-ai, ngadao bhai maldil hevqkovq lavq nail ngaol.
Al taivq-ail maq ngel mail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee Miqyail bhai lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, tsiq eeq nail ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee ngadao Miqyail bhai tsaq lai jil lai-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhaqda nee, miltsaq kovtavq bhai oeqbal jiav lee khi, oeqbal bhaqda nee sil nail phaq jiav lee-a nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai kev lee-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail oeqbal nl-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq bivq-u nee mail, miltsaq kovtavq bhai oeqbal jiav nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq bivq-a nail gaiqlaq bhai neq, oeqbal ngaol dai, maq saol-nvq-ai haq-al.

Alhai maq saol-nvq khi ngaol-aoq, Aqdaq nee mail Molseiq nail yeel bhai kev dai, sil nail phaq-i mail uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq-i mail nl bheeq-a nail khi Aqdaq-i mail nl bheeq-a nail maq dul lai khi ngaol-aoq, sil nail phaq aqyu juq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqdaq al gaq yaqhao khe lee nail gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nl bheeq-a nail al neq, aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq khe-ai, maq dul-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq nl bheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai ya sil-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi aivq-i mail aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq al, tsaol-aq maodai nail haqbhoil mao jaiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq nl bheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, pevq lal-a nail phaq neq, aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq khe-ai, maq dul-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqdaq teevq gaq taivq-ail nl bheeq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, ya sil naol dai, yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq bhaqda nee, ngadao maodai nl bheeq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nl bheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, sil nail phaq aivq bhaqda nee uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq pevq nail Miqyail nail eeq dee mao deedee nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq bhai ya-a nail tsaol-aq, a dai nee maqtsil, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee aqdoevq doevq khi ya uvthaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq nl bheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai ya sil naol dai, yalkhaq dal ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq tsaq nail daol nail phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal khi, aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq maq naldaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai gaq oeqbal yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq naldaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Bheeq nail leel nail phaq mao lal dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq jiav lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, oeqbal mao lal nail al dao bhai, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol mao jaiq lal nail ngaol.

Sil nail phaq bhaqda nee oeqbal uvthaiq-a nail khe-ai, tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhaqda nee geeqlaoq eeljaol uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeljaol al neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee ngadao bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq dai, hevqdaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao khalhai ge heeq. Geeqlaoq eeljaol bhi mao lal nail dai khi, ngadao oeqbal nail haoqnao gaoq tsaothe-ai haq nail laiq.
Teevq peivq-ail maq tsaothe. Oeqbal nl nail phaq bhai tavq lai khi ngadao sil jel-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngel-i mail, oeqbal nail lavqkhoel bhai khalhai khi gaoq doevq kivq nail-aiq.
Ngadao Yeiqsul Khali bhai tavq kivq dai, ulcuvq saol-a nail al neq, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, sil nail gal duq saol-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao ulcuvq saol-u phao, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai sil khi, duq pheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqbhu Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee, Khali sil khi ngaol-aoq, gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl gaoq doevq kovq lal khi, tsaol-aq aqsivq pevq lal nail ngaol.
Ngadao Yeiqsul Khali nee teevq gaq khe-ai sil-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq doevq kovq lal-a nail khe-ai, ngadao aivq nee mail ya doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

Ngadao oeqbal nail yaqkav maq ya jiovq-ail, oeqbal nail aqmaol niilniai lav luq lav seil-ail nia dai, ngadao nail neema aqlil aivq nee mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq neq, oeqbal nee jel-ail nail ngaol.
Ngadao Khali nee mail sil haq neq, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ya doevq nail ngaol dai, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.
Khali sil khi ngaol-aoq, gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq yaqhao teevq thal-iq maq sil yaoq-aol. Sil nail phaq aivq bhai maq uvthaiq nia yaoq-aol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Khali aivq sil-a nail neq, aivq khi mail oeqbal nail gaiqlaq bhai teevq pov taivq-ail gaoqceiv ceiv ail-aoq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il aivq doevq thailthaiq nail neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, nuljuq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq niailhai saol-nvq yaoq. Ngal neq, oeqbal nee gaoq ceiv ceiv-ail khi sil gaq-ao nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee Miqyail nail haqbhoil doevq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq yaoq.
Nuljuq nail aqsivq haqjoil sil nia nail aqmaol bhai oeqbal-i mail thaq bhi uvthaiq. Oeqbal jalmul mul nail haoqnao thaq tsaothe.

Nuljuq nail aqmaol maq meeq nail phaq nl dai, oeqbal bhai thaq av bhiq. Nuljuq neq, sil nail lavqkhoel nee jel-ail khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil doevq nail ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai av bhiq yaoq. Nuljuq nail aqmaol bhai covq nail phaq iqsanl mail, tsaq nail daol nail haqbhoil Miqyail aivq nail khen kha-ao khe-ai yuq nia dai, aivq bhai av bhiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, oeqbal nuljuq bhai maq uvthaiq nia yaoq-aol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, khalhai khi heeq. Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai maq jaol dai, geeqlaoq eeljaol nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngel-i mail, ngadao oeqbal gaoq nl nail laiq. Teevq peivq-ail maq nl-ail dei-eiq.

Nuljuq tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail daoq naldaiq khi, “Ngal naoq nail yaqkav jiovq naol” dai, ge khi yovqgavq nail aqmaol av bhiq gaq haq neq, nuljuq tsaol-aq al gaq nail yaqkav maldil ya jiovq nail ngaol dai, maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Oeqbal nail yaqkav jiovq haq neq, ya sil nail ngaol. Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq khi hav bhoel haq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jel lal-u phao nuljuq oeqbal nail yaqkav jiovq daiq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, Miqyail-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail daoq neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai, nuljuq hav bhoel khi tsaothe-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, oeqbal nail lavqkhoel nee jel-ail khi, tsaq nail daol nail phaq nail yaqkav pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, nuljuq gov heeq nia dai, yaoq n yaoq n nee yuq nail daoq nee ge nail ngaol. Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq nail aqmaol neq, haqeiv nail phaq nl dai, aqjiivq aqcavq khi mail maq meeq nail phaq nail yaqkav jiovq dai, av bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, niil aq-il nuljuq meeq lal haol lal khi, tsaq nail daol nail phaq nail yaqkav jiovq kivq dai, nuljuq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai av bhiq yaoq.
Nuljuq oeqbal nail yaqkav jiovq-u phao, tsaq nail daol nail phaq nail kov-uvq bhai maq jaol-al.
Nuljuq oeqbal alhai nl-u phao, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq. Oeqbal nl-a nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il ya haqsil-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Al nail haoqnao naosaq neq, ya sil nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il nuljuq oeqbal nail lavqkhoel nee jel-ail khi, Miqyail nail yaqkav pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq meeq nail haol nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol. Al nail haoqnao naosaq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Oeqbal nail aqphoiq neq, ya sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail ngadao bhai aqnieivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal niailhai ge nail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq heeq nia nail juq bhai ge nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq aqdoevq doevq-u phao taivq-ail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq, aivq nail yovjil khal doevq-u kev dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq-i mail aivq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yovjil gaq sil haq neq, yovjil gaq nee tavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nee bhuq-ail jel-ail nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nail yovjil maq sil-u phao, yaoq gaq yaoq nee bheeq haq neq, bheeq nail leel nail yaqmai-aq dai, yu aivq bhai ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq nail yovjil sil haq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al bhai bhuq-ail jel ail-aoq nail ngel-i mail, yaoq gaq yaoq bhai maol ail khi ngaol-aoq, bheeq nail leel nail yaqmai-aq maq ngel-ail.

Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, alhai dul dai nuljuq Khali nee teevq gaq khe-ai sil-a nail ngel-i mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai bhuq-ail jel ail-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao Miqyail nail haqbhoil aqheeq heeq lee nia dai, nuljuq neq, gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail Khali bhai maol ail-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol khe-ai aqdoevq doevq-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhaqda nee oeqbal nl movq nail neekhaol ngadao nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl khi, ngadao-i mail khal nl khal hal nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee sil nail phaq bhai dee lai nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il ngadao aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai bhuq-ail jel ail-aoq nail ngaol. Jel lal-u phao, ngadao bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai pheel ha-ail ceevq-a nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il ngadao-i mail nl nail hal nail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq aqlil nail kov-uvq bhai nl nail hal nail maq ngel-ail. Aqhaqlal Miqyail uvthaiq nail neema aqsivq aol khi nl nail hal nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao khalhai ge heeq. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, oeqbal pevq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav-ail nul neq, ngadao oeqbal aol nail dai, ngadao maq heeq kivq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yu nail yalkav bhai maivjeel thaq jeel dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq ge lavq-ail kheel nul neq, maivjeel jeel nail phaq oeqbal ngaol dai, ngadao maq heeq kivq-ail.

Oeqbal neq aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq juq-ail khi, ngadao nail lavqkhoel khe maivjeel jeel nail mee nia phaq bhi dov lal nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav-ail nul neq, oeqbal sil-a nail ngaol.
Jel lal-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq tavq dai ngadao aqdoevq doevq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq kev lee-u phao, oeqbal doevq lal khi ngadao neq, sil-a nail ngaol.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq al bhaqda nee ngadao aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol dai, noeqthunq khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai heivq lao thaq nail niil.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, oeqbal neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al bhai juq juq-ail, ngadao bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq lavq-a nail nee ovqtavq, heivq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq iqsanl mail aqmeeq aqhaol haol khi, aqtsaq ngaol. Aqmeeq ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, aqmeeq phaq-i mail ngadao bhai heivq lavq-a nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq. Oeqbal neq, maldil oeqbal ngaol dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal dai, aqmeeq phaq bhai juq khi ngadao bhai heivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq al juq neq, oeqbal khadai haqeiv nail ngel-ail dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, cavq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, aqhaqlal bhai tavq nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao aqsivq haqjoil bhai tavq khi, oeqbal nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail dai khi, ngadao bhai gaoq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngadao-i mail nl nail juq bhai ngadao maq heeq kivq-ail. Ngadao nl movq nail phaq bhai maq nl mail, ngadao-i mail bhe nail phaq bhai ngadao nl nail ngaol.
Ngadao maq nl movq nail phaq bhai ngadao nl haq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq aqmeeq ngaol dai, ngadao khanq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, maq meeq nail al juq bhai maldil ngadao nl nail maq ngel. Ngado nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail oeqbal nl nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil bhai tavq nail ngadao nail aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel bhai aqmeeq phaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail dai, ngadao heeq kivq naol. Aqmeeq phaq nl movq nail neema aol khi ngaol-aoq, maq nl kivq-ail.
Al ovqtavq, aqmeeq phaq nl movq khi ngaol-aoq ngadao maq nl-al. Maq nl movq nail haqeiv nail phaq ngadao nl nail ngaol.
Maq nl movq nail phaq ngadao nl haq neq, ngadao nl nail maq ngel. Ngadao nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail oeqbal nl nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao aqmeeq phaq nl movq-u phao, khaq mao iqsanl haqeiv nail phaq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail bhai ngadao ya moel nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail neema lavqkhoel bhai neq, Miqyail nail aol bhai lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai, aol yaoq phaq yaoq aol nail bhai ngadao ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aol al neq, ngadao nail neema nee genl dev pheeljaq khi, ngadao nail aqmaol lavqkhoel khe aol nail oeqbal ngadao bhai bhi pheel-aivq nail dai, nl nail ngaol.
Ngadao bhai noeqhaq deedee-ail nial. Ngadao bhai bhi sil-ail thailthaiq nail aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel nee, khaq sil gaq ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail nia nail-aiq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhi jel-ail nia nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhai tsiq eeq bhel. Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngadao nail neema niil Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tsaq nail khe-ai nl naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail aqsivq haqjoil phao tavq nail aqmaol neq, oeqbal nail aol bhai tsaq dai, nl-ai haq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, ya sil naol dai, yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai niil aq-il maq ya daq yaoq-aol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhi doevq lal nia nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail bhaqaoq neq, oeqbal nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel khi mail sil nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao aqsivq haqjoil bhao nail bhaqda nee, aoldaoq kovqdaoq gaq maq aol-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq nl nia nail phaq bhai, nl-ai thaq nail ngaol. Oeqbal yaq nail haqbhoil Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov neq, oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail phaq pevq dai, oeqbal yaq juq aqmaol bhao nail khe-ai, aivq iqsanl aqmaol bhao nail ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai aqsivq haqjoil nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail oeqbal bhai yalkhaq bhi dal lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao maq tsaothe-ail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngadao juq nail lavqkhoel bhai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai bhee lal dai, aivq alhai nl-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqsivq haqjoil bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq neq, aqsivq haqjoil phao khe ganl bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail neema aol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai tavq nail phaq bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil phao khe ganl bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, ya sil nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqsivq haqjoil phao tavq nail ganl bhai noeq cov-ai thaq nail neema neq, Miqyail bhai genl dev nail ngaol. Alheel nail neema neq, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai maq jaol nail nee ovqtavq, jaol khi ngaol-aoq, maq jaol nia-ail.
Aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao tsaothe nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq dai, maq nl nia-ail.

Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai maldil jaol haq neq, nuljuq aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol haoqnao maq tsaothe-ail. Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail lavqkhoel Khali nail Aqhaqlal maq jaol haq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq Khali nee maq tavq-ail.
Khali nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol haq neq, oeqbal bhaqda nee aqmaol sil khi ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhaqda nee, aqhaqlal ya doevq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Yeiqsul bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol haq neq, Yeiqsul bhai gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail khe-ai, Miqyail nuljuq nail sil nia nail aqmaol bhai iqsanl, gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail aivq nail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi alhai nl nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao juq neq gailjiov bavq nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol sil dai nl nail haqbhoil bavq nail maq ngel-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao doevq haq neq, ya sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq khi yovqgavq nail oeqbal nl nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol bhai dev ceiv haq neq, ya doevq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal-i mail hevqdaiq bhiq nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail nail yaq ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nuljuq bhai yaqkav nail neema bivq lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Neema al aol haq neq, geesil nail ngaol. Miqyail nuljuq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee aivq nail yaq nail neema bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, “Aqbhu-ol, ngaq nail aqbhu-ol” dai, ngadao aivq bhai khul kivq nail ngaol.
Ngadao juq neq, Miqyail nail yaq ngaol dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail khi mail ngadao nail aqhaqlal teevq gaq khe-ai, salkhil khanq nail ngaol.

Ngadao neq aivq nail yaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Miqyail-i mail Khali bhai bivq nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail jaiqbhoil iqsanl, Khali nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ngadao ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai Khali nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ngadao daq haq neq, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail ngaol.
Yeel niil yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai ya haq ya aoq nail phaq neq, yaqhao ngadao bhai bivq lavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail nee maq tsiq ceiv tsaol-ail dai, ngal noeq duq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail nail yaq juq bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lee nail bhai ya moel dai, noeqthunq khi daonq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, lav cov nail phaq bhai, niil aq-il kev dai, daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai daq movq jaol movq nail ngel-i mail, maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail alhai bhi jaol-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq noeqthunq nail phaq niailhai jiav nail ngaol. Khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee lav cov nail phaq nail kov-uvq nee ya jel-ail khi, Miqyail nail yaq juq seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ya aol lai dai, aqyu juq noeqthunq nail ngaol.
Khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mail niil aq-il kev dai, yaq bhao-u nal nail khe-ai, maq daq tsaol-ail tev thail meel thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Teivq-ai thaq nail phaq taivq-ail maq ngel nail, Miqyail-i mail iqmoeq ilmoeq bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq pevq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai ya-a nail ngadao juq iqsanl, Miqyail nail yaq maldil pevq lal khi, aqmaol niil ya jel-ail khi phal lal nail bhai daonq thailthaiq-u phao, neema lavqkhoel bhai neq, tev thail meel thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngadao hevqkovq nail phaq ya gaq-u phao maldil ya jel-ail khi phal lal nail ngaol dai, noeqthunq khi daonq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, noeqthunq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai ya moel haq neq, maq noeqthunq yaoq-aol. Ya moel-aoq nail phaq bhai khaq sil gaq gaoq noeqthunq nail-aiq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao maq ya moel haq nail phaq bhai noeqthunq nail ngel haq neq, ol ol-ail ya daonq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, ngadao gaq bhaq-u phao, Aqhaqlal Miqyail tsaojao-ai lavq nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq khalhai ya hal nail dai, ngadao maq heeq kivq-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, daoq maq bhao dai, ngadao nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai meel meel-ail geeqlaoq hal deedee nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq nail neema bhai tsaotsel daiq nail Miqyail neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail neema bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil Aqhaqlal Miqyail geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Miqyail bhai khal gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil, iqsanl nail lavqkhoel aivq aqmeeq phaq bhi dov lal nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aivq tsaol-aq al juq bhai khul-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail Yaqyov khe-ai dul lai dai, iqmoeq-u nee mail Miqyail heeq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai aivq tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq bhai, aqivq jaqbheq maodai gaq nail kovtavq bhai aqivq bhi jiovq nail dai khi, Miqyail alhai nl-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u nee Miqyail aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai aivq khul-a nail ngaol. Khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai aivq tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail al juq bhai, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ganl al juq bhai khul ge duq jiav nail-aiq. Ngadao jaol nail phao Miqyail jaol haq neq, yaoq phao yaoq khaq sil gaq jaol khi lav tsoiq nia nail-aiq.

Miqyail neq, “Ngaq nail Yaqyov maq bhi cov-ail” dai, maq ge mail, ngadao iqsanl nail haqbhoil aivq nail Yaqyov bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, aivq nail Yaqyov nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, aivq khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ngadao bhai bivq lavq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq nail kovtavq bhai khaq sil gaq oeqbal thaq nia nail-aiq. Miqyail thaq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neq, ngadao bhai oeqbal maq thaq dai, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal lavq-a nail ngaol.

Khaq sil gaq ngadao bhai ya sil naol dai, yalkhaq gaoq dal nia nail-aiq. Yeiqsul Khali dal nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq neq, yalkhaq maq dal dai, ngadao nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngaol. Aivq sil-a nail teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Aivq gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel khi mail, ngadao nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Khali nail goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel ngadao jaol-u phao, khul phaq ngadao juq bhai lav pav nia nail-aiq. Haq nail aoq nail phaq, noeq dee noeq deel nail phaq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq, moevq nail sivq nail phaq, aqgaq aqdoi maq jiav nail phaq, geesil nail phaq, thaoma-i mail heivq lavq nail niil juq laiq.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Naoq nail haqbhoil
teevq n n lao
nvjuq heivq nail
bhai ya daq
thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Heivq naol dai,
ge ceiv-ai thaq nail
yaol khe-ai,
yu nvjuq bhai
saol-nvq-ai
thaq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao bhai gaiq-a nail gaq bhaqda nee, al juq iqsanl bhai ngadao gaq gil lai-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, sil nail phaq maqkhaiq, doevq nail phaq maqkhaiq, nqtavq gaqkhoel maqkhaiq, nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai uvthaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, niil aq-il jiav nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, yaqhao jiav lee nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq khul phaq maqkhaiq,

daqmoe phaq maqkhaiq, aqnavq phaq maqkhaiq, khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maqkhaiq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel, ngadao bhai maq lav pav nia-ail dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Ngal Yeiqsul Khali nail sivtavq bhai maldil tsaq nail phaq ge nail ngaol. Ngal goiqbhaoq maq bhaoq. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee, ngaq nail heeq nia nail neema iqsanl, ngaq-ai nee mail salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai noeqhaq deedee khi khaq mao iqsanl khaoqlaol-ail nial.
Ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq nail haqbhoil, ngal Khali nee gaoq ceiv ceiv-ail khi Miqyail-i mail iqkhail yavq nail bhai daq movq nail neema aol-ail nial.

Aqyu juq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail maqkhaiq, daoqma saljial maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail aol maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail saljial maqkhaiq, iqsanl mail ya-a nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, aqmil dov nail Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail aqphiq aqbhal al juq nail ovq nee jeq lee el lee-a nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil phao nee ge haq neq, Khali iqsanl aqyu juq nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail Miqyail ngaol. Aivq bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq bhel. Aqmiq.
Miqyail nail daoq neq, luq-ail seil-ail nail maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maldil pevq nail maq ngel-ail.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai, aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol dai, maq ge nia-ail. “Ilcav nail ovq nee doevq lee-a nail juq bhai taivq-ail naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol dai, saol-nvq bhiq naol” dai, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Niailhai ge movq-ail nial. Aqsivq haqjoil nee doevq lee-a nail jeq-e jaq-a juq neq, Miqyail nail yaq pevq nail maq ngel-ail. Daoqma saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, doevq lee-a nail juq taivq-ail Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai saljial niailhai jaq-a nail ngaol: “Naqyaq kovq niil yanq bhai, ngal teevq pov gaoq lee naol. Aq-u phao, naoq nail khaqma Saqlal yaqyov teevq gaq tsiq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Leiqbhailkavq iqsanl, ngadao nail aqbhu Ilcav bhai maol ail khi, yaq ceiv lai-a nail ngaol. Yaq ceiv lai-a nail al neq, nvq gaq bhee nail ngaol.

Yaq al nvq gaq aqmeeq phaq iqsanl aqdoil phaq iqsanl maq nl haq-al. Miqyail tsaol-aq yaq bhai tsel dov-u phao, aqyu juq nl nail hal nail bhai heldaiq khi tsel dov nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai bhee lal dai, aivq-i mail khul-a nail tsaol-aq bhai taivq-ail tsel dov nail ngaol dai, bhi heeq nia nail haqbhoil, “Aqivq gaq neq, jaqbheq gaq nail yaqkav ya jiovq naol” dai, Miqyail aqma gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Ngal Yaqkov
bhai gaiq-a khi,
Ilsaol bhai bhe naol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao khul ge duq jiav nail-aiq. Miqyail maq tsaq maq daol-ail laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq Molseiq bhai ge bhiq-a nail:
“Ngal geeqlaoq eeljaol
bivq movq nail juq bhai
geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq khi,
ngal gaoqhaq gaiq-a
movq nail juq bhai
gaoqhaq gaiq-a naol” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq yaq nail neekhaol oil movq nail bhaqda nee tsel dov lavq nail maq ngel-ail. Laijai-a nail bhaqda nee iqsanl tsel dov lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail gaoq haq gaiq-a nail phaq bhaqda nee taivq-ail tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai Iljiltuv milkhaoq khe heeqphaq bhai niailhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol:

“Ngaq nail bhaqaoq neq, naoq nail bhaqaoq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaol dai, bhi dov lal khi, milkhaoq doi dai, ngaq nail aqmil bhi gaiq doi ail nail haqbhoil, ngal naoq bhai heeqphaq bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail neq, aivq gaoqhaq gaiq-a movq nail juq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a khi, neema bhi gaol movq nail juq bhai bhi gaol nail ngaol.
“Thailhai phal-iq neq, khul khi mail Miqyail oeqbal gaoq thaq lavq nail-aiq. Aivq nail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai khaq sil gaq lav tsoiq nia nail-aiq” dai, nuljuq ngaq bhai naldaiq movq-ail jaol-aq.

Miqyail bhai daoq kovq kovq nail tsaol-aq ol, naol neq, khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq nail-aiq. “Khul khi mail naol ngaq bhai niailhai teivq lavq-a nail-aiq” dai, iqlaoq neq, teivq-a nail gaq bhai ge lai nia naol laiq.

Iqlaoq lav sav nail gaq, iqlaoq lav sav nail miltsaq bhai khal lav sav movq nail khe-ai lav sav nia nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Miltsaq teevq loe bhai, aqphoiq bhao nail iqlaoq teevq heeq lav sav nail maqkhaiq, aqphoiq maq bhao nail iqlaoq teevq heeq lav sav nail maqkhaiq, aivq bhai jiav nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Miqyail-i mail nl nail phaq iqsanl alhai dul nail ngaol. Aivq nail neema phail nail phaq bhi moel movq khi, aivq nail bhaqaoq bhai bhi heeq nia movq-ail bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq neema phail khi lav luq lav seil-ail bhiq nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail iqlaoq juq bhai ol ol-ail jaol nail ngaol.
Seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, iqmoeq-u nee mail lav sav-ai thaq nail, aivq gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail iqlaoq juq bhai, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khadai eeq khadai heel nail dai bhi moel movq nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngadao juq bhai, alheel nail iqlaoq pevq lal dai, khul-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail khul-a nail maq ngel-ail. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl khul-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail ganl, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Holseiq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq lavqkhoel Miqyail ge nail:
“Ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a
maq ngel nail juq bhai
ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a
ngaol dai, khul khi,
ngal maq gaiq-a nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai,
ngal gaiq-a nail juq dai,
khul nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq,
ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a
maq ngel-ail dai,
aivq-i mail ge-a nail
aqduq bhai nuljuq neq,
doevq nail Miqyail nail
yaq ngaol dai,
gaoq mil phal
bhiq naol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Ilsaqyal iqsanl Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a nail ganl niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Ilsaqleiqlal nail
tsaol-aq neq,
iqyaq iqma nail
tsalhail khe-ai,
mao khi ngaol-aoq,
hevqkovq nail phaq
ya nail tsaol-aq neq,
micil teevq-eel ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
Heeqphaq Miqyail
miltsaq kovtavq bhai
aivq nail daoq
bhee lal dai,
phal lal nail phaq
maq jiav dai,
lavqtsail mail
nl nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqyal gaoq ge nail:
“Bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail
ngadao juq nail
haqbhoil
jeq-e jaq-a
maq bhi doevq-ail
ceevq-al nul neq,
ngadao Saoldoq meenq
khe-ai pevq-ail khi,
Gaolmaollav
meenq khe-ai,
dul nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngadao khul ge duq jiav nail-aiq. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai maq halpov khi ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol. Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail ya-a nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel-al.

Khul khi mail maq halpov moel thaq nail dai ge haq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai maq juq dai, nl nail hal nail phaq bhai taivq-ail juq nail ngel-i mail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail tsaol-aq yaq phaqthiq thiq nail lovmav bhai aqyu juq iqsanl phaqthiq thiq nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Tsaol-aq phaqthiq
bhi thiq khi,
bhi bavq tsuq-ail nail
lovmav,
ngal Yeel-ovq gaoqjaoq
bhai bhi jiav naol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
aivq bhai neema
khal thaqtsaol nail
tsaol-aq maq ya
haqsil-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngaq nail neema lavqkhoel nee aqyu juq nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Miqyail nail haqbhoil neema kev deedee nail ngaol dai, ngal ge kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq heeq nia khi neema kev nail maq ngel-ail.

Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai maq heeq nia-ail, yovqgavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai nl dov nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq nail kov-uvq bhai maq jaol movq-ail bhiq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq bhai neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, Yeiqsul Khali neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl gil lee-a nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq nail ganl bhai Molseiq niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai nl nail tsaol-aq neq, aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol dai, Molseiq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail, jiav nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq neq, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Nqtavq bhai khaq sil gaq dav lai nail-aiq. Aqnavq mao-ail navq nail bha khaq sil gaq aol ail nail-aiq dai, neema lavqkhoel bhai thaq saol-nvq-o” dai, ge nail ngaol. Niailhai ge nail neq, Khali bhai hevq lai nail dai khi, nqtavq bha kha sil gaq dav lai nail-aiq. Khali bhai bhi doevq kovq lal nail dai khi, mao-ail navq nail bhai khaq sil gaq aol ail nail-aiq dai, ge movq nail ngaol.
Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq neq, khalhai ge nail ngel-aiq.

“Daoq niil daoq neq, nuljuq nee aqjail jail deedee nail ngaol. Naoq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, naoq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl aol nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Daoq niil daoq neq, nvjuq-i mail cavq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail daoq bhai, ge movq nail ngaol.

“Yeiqsul neq, Heeqphaq ngaol” dai, naoq nail moeqthaoq khanq khi, “Miqyail aivq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol” dai, naoq nail neema lavqkhoel nee neema thaqtsaol haq neq, Miqyail naoq bhai hevqkovq lavq nail ngaol.
Neema lavqkhoel nee neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal khi, moeqthaoq khanq-a nail ngel-i mail, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq bhai neema
khal thaqtsaol nail
tsaol-aq iqsanl mail
maq ya haqsil-ail” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khi yu nail jeq-e jaq-a dai, maq saol-nvq pav-ail. Tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai uvthaiq nail Heeqphaq teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol khi, aivq bhai khal hal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai Miqyail geeqlaoq teevq bhee bivq nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Heeqphaq Miqyail
bhai gul khi
khal thaoq hal nail
yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai
aivq hevqkovq
bhiq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol haq neq, khalhai khi hal nail-aiq. Aivq nail ganl maq gaiq daiq haq neq, khalhai khi neema thaqtsaol lal nia nail-aiq. Daoq cavq cavq nail tsaol-aq maq jaol haq neq, khalhai khi gaiq nia nail-aiq.
Teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq khoel gai-aivq haq neq, daoq cavq khalhai khi cavq-ail nia nail-aiq. Alhai dul dai,
“Lavqkhiq tsail nail
geeqlaoq daoq
cavq nail tsaol-aq
lal-u phao,
khadai meeq nail
ngel-ail” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai naldaiq nail maq ngel-ail.
“Heeqphaq-ol,
nvjuq-i mail
cavq nail daoq bhai
khaq sil gaq neema
thaqtsaol nail-aiq” dai,
Ilsaqyal iqsanl, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail juq neq, ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. Ya gaiq-a nail al neq, Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yu-i mail cavq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq maq ya gaiq-al laiq dai, ngal naldaiq movq-ail nial. Maldil ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Aqyu juq nail aqthel
milkhaoq doi dai
gaiq-ail khi,
aqyu juq-i mail
cavq bhiq-a nail daoq
nqjail miljail bha
kev ail-a nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq maq heeq nia-ail laiq dai, ngal teevq pov gaoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Molseiq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail:
“Nuljuq yu nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai
maivjeel jeel nail
neema aol lal dai,
ngal nl naol.
Nuljuq neenoeq
neekha maq aol nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai neema
phail lal dai iqsanl,
ngal nl naol” dai,
iqmoeq-u nee mail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqyal iqsanl geesil nail neema maq aol dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil niailhai gedan-a nail ngaol:
“Ngaq bhai
maq halpov nail juq,
ngal aqyu juq bhai
bhiq moel-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail ganl maq
naldaiq nail juq bhai,
ngaq nail ganl bhi
heeq nia naol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail ganl aivq ge nail:
“Maq naldaiq mail
daoq kovq kovq nail
tsaol-aq bhai
bhi lal nail dai khi,
teevq n n lao-ail,
ngal aqlavq tsiqkhail-ai
thaq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, Miqyail aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai khaonq ha-a nail laiq dai, ngal naldaiq movq-ail nial. Teevq thal-iq maq khaonq ha-al. Ngal iqsanl Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail aqjievq lilheel nail lavqkhoel khe Bheiqyaqmiq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol.

Iqmoeq ilmoeq-u nee aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail jeq-e bhai aivq maq khaonq ha-ail. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail Eillilya-i mail Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq juq nail laiq nail phaq Miqyail bhai ge bhiq-a nail ganl, Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol:

“Heeqphaq-ol, naoq nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq juq bhai aqyu juq heivq khi, naoq nail laol duq juq bhai aqyu juq deeq peiv-a nail ngaol. Ngal teevq gaq taivq-ail jel-ail khi, ngaq bhai iqsanl aqyu juq heivq nail dai khi, laijai nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai khalhai ge kovq bhiq-a nail-aiq. “Bhaqlal dai mil-ai thaq nail thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq maq thaoq-a nail sivq hinl gaq ngaq nail haqbhoil bhi jaol-a nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, niil aq-il iqsanl Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq micil jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.

Geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, nl nail hal nail phaq bhai maq tavq-ail. Nl nail hal nail phaq bhai tavq-ail nul neq, geeqlaoq eeljaol al neq, geeqlaoq eeljaol maq ngel yaoq-aol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, khal heel-eeq. Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq, aqyu juq-i mail halpov nail phaq bhai maq ya-al. Tsel dov-a nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail ya khi, maq tsel dov-a nail tsaol-aq neema gaol ail-a nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Yanqgaol kev dai,
iqnoeq maq geel nail
neema maqkhaiq,
maq moel nia nail
maivneev maqkhaiq,
maq gaiq nia nail
naqkhaol maqkhaiq,
Miqyail aqyu
juq nail lavqkhoel bhi
pevq lal-a nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Daqbhil-i mail ge-ai thaq nail niailhai jiav nail ngaol:
“Aqyu juq aqbhee
bhee-u phao,
lavqphee-i mail bhi
khail phee dei-eiq.
Aqyu juq tsuq-ail nail
lavqkhoel nee,
yu-i mail
khoeq bhiq nail bhai
ya daq dei-eiq.
Aqyu juq maivpeivq
peivq-ail khi,
maq moel nia dai
pevq-ail dei-eiq.
Aqyu juq neq,
yaqkav khe-ai
yu nail yalkav
ya phi nail bhaqda nee,
kaolceevq aqkhu khu dai,
pevq-ail dei-eiq” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq phaqthiq thiq-u phao, gaq tsuq-ail khi maq thul lal nia dai, pevq ail-a nail laiq dai, ngal naldaiq movq-ail nial. Maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq oeqbal nl-a nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai maivjeel bhi jeel nail haqbhoil yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq nail kovtavq bhai hevqkovq nail phaq bhi kev lee-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq oeqbal nl-a nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq yaq juq aqhaqlal phao hulmeeq meeq lal khi, aqyu juq-i mail sunq ail-a nail phaq iqsanl, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a aqhaqlal phao hulmeeq bhi meeq lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yuldav tsaol-aq iqsanl Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol khi hav bhoel haq neq, a dai nee maqtsil tsaol-aq yaq juq iqsanl mail, aqhaqlal phao hulmeeq gaoq meeq jaiq lal nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail nuljuq bhai ngal niailhai ge bhiq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil gaqkhoel ngaol. Ngal ganl niilniai thaqeeq nail ngaol.
Ngal ganl niilniai thaqeeq nail neq, ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a maivjeel jeel nail neema aol lal khi, aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngal nl nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq Yeiqsul bhai khaonq ha nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq yaq Miqyail bhai tsaq lai jil lai haq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq Yeiqsul bhai gaoq hav bhoel kovq nail neq, gaoq bhi doevq kovq lal nail khe-ai dul nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Khaqmul iqmoeq ilmoeq lav sav-a nail heeq, Miqyail bhai bivq haq neq, khaqmul iqsanl mail Miqyail bhai danq bhiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Aqbhaol teevq bhaol nail daoqtsail Miqyail bhai danq bhiq haq neq, lavqmeiv juq iqsanl, Miqyail nail pevq nail ngaol.

Miqyail lavqmeiv teevq pav ganav juq bhai dev ha khi, haqtsoiq bhai doevq nail saqloq aqbhaol nail lavqmeiv pevq nail nuljuq bhai, tsaol-aq-i mail kha-a nail saqloq aqbhaol bhai cavq lavq-a nail nee ovqtavq, lavqmeiv yaoq juq yaoq khe-ai, khaqjiq bhai bhi suv lavq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, lavqmeiv al juq nail kovtavq bhai eeq movq heel movq nail neema thaq aol. Eeq movq heel movq nail neema aol haq neq, niilniai saol-nvq dai yaoq. Daoqtsail nuljuq bhai juq juq-ail doevq nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq daoqtsail bhai juq juq-ail doevq nail ngaol.
“Ngal aqbhaol bhai ya cavq lai dai, lavqmeiv juq ya dev ha-a nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq ge movq ail jaol-aq.

Tsaq naol. Aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, dev ha nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, ivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, neema thaq eeq, yaolphaol yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail kha-a nail saqloq lavqmeiv bhai Miqyail maq bhi covq haq neq, nuljuq bhai iqsanl maq bhi covq lavq-ail.

Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi aivq-i mail yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Aivq bhai khaonq ha nail tsaol-aq bhai aivq yalkhaq dal bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol haq neq, aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav nail ngaol. Maq jaol haq neq, aivq nuljuq bhai iqsanl dev ha lavq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl neema gaoq thaqtsaol lal haq neq, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai aqbhaol bhai gaoq bhi cavq kovq lai nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq bhai teevq pov gaoq cavq kovq lai dai, Miqyail nl nia nail ngaol.

Aol maq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, haqtsoiq bhai doevq nail saqloq aqbhaol lavqkhoel khe nuljuq bhai dev khi, kha-a nail saqloq aqbhaol bhai cavq lavq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, kha-a nail saqloq lavqmeiv juq neq, yovqgavq nail aqbhaol bhai cavq lai jaiq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq yovqgavq nail neenoeq neekha bhai maq ya juq dai, oil tsail-ai thaq nail ganl niil nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Miqyail-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail tsaol-aq juq bhee lal-u phao kev dai, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq neema gaol-ai haq nail ngaol.
Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a hevqkovq nail phaq bhai ya haq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq iqsanl hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Hevqkovq nail gaq neq,
Yeel-ovq gaoqjaoq
nee dov lee khi,
Yaqkov nail
jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
haqeiv nail phaq bhai
oil ha nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq nail
oeqbal oil ha-u phao,
al neq,
ngal aqyu juq bhai
jaq bhiq-a nail
daoqma saljial
pevq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq maq hav bhoel-a nail bhaqda nee, nuljuq geeqlaoq ya nia dai, aqyu juq Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
