Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail bhai saol-nvq haq neq, aqyu juq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq bhaqda nee, Miqyail gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq-i mail aqnieivq-ail bivq-ai thaq nail kovpavq bhai Miqyail maq oil kovq-ail. Aivq-i mail khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai aivq maq noeq pov maq noeq phal-ail.

Nuljuq iqmoeq-u phao Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail phaq bhai ya-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq maq naldaiq-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, nuljuq Miqyail nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai ya-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq iqsanl, Miqyail nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai ya nia nail haqbhoil, niil aq-il aqyu juq Miqyail nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl bhai aivq nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail phaq bivq movq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq iqsanl bhai, daoq maq naldaiq nail phaq nail kov-uvq bhai pheethaiq khi bhi jaol-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail nia deedee nail neenoeq neekha khi heeq nia nail neema khadai eeq khadai geel nail ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail yalkhaq dal nail juq bhai teevq gaq-ail maq noeq dov tsaol-ail. Aivq nail gailkhaol bhai teevq gaq gail maq moel nia-ail.
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
neema bhai
khaq sil gaq
heeq nia nail-aiq.
Aivq bhai khaq sil gaq
maoqbhaoq nl
daiq-a nail-aiq.
Kovpavq gaoq bhi
bivq lavq nail dai khi mail,
khaq sil gaq Miqyail
bhai kovpavq bivq
daiq-a nail-aiq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, aivq nee mail dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee doevq lal jiav lal khi, aivq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel bhel. Aqmiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhaqda nee, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Meeq nail haol nail laol bhiq nail phaq khi mail, Miqyail neema tsaq nail aqdoevq doevq nail laol bhiq nail phaq bhi pevq lal nail haqbhoil, nuljuq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai av bhiq yaoq. Alhai av bhiq nail phaq neq, nuljuq nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail uqhuq thaoq nail aol ngaol.

Miltsaq yaq juq aqdoevq doevq nail khe-ai thaq doevq, neema aqsivq phal khi tsaol-aq aqsivq pevq lal yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia lal khi tsel pav nia lal nail ngaol. Meeq nail phaq, bhee nail phaq khi mail, Miqyail neekhaol sil nail phaq bhai iqsanl, heeq nia lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol: Yovqgavq nail ganl saol-nvq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail nee ovqtavq al jaiq thaq saol-nvq jaiq. Miqyail teevq gaq nee teevq gaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhoil bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail ganl saol-nvq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq bhai taivq-ail saol-nvq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqmaol teevq maol bhai alsail maodai covq nail ngaol. Al juq ganl nl nail maq dul lai-ail.

Alhai dul dai, ngadao tsaol-aq mao khi ngaol-aoq, Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai aqmaol teevq maol teevq-eel ngaol. Ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, aqmaol al nail lavqkhoel bhai covq cavq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngadao bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, ngadao-i mail ya-ai thaq nail kovpavq juq maq dul lai-ail. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq kav nail khe-ai, gedan yaoq.
Tsaojao-ai nail gaq jiovq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail gaq jiovq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Yu bhai gaq bivq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, yu bhai gaq bivq yaoq. Yu bhai danq bhiq bhoil bhiq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, maodai danq bhiq bhoil bhiq yaoq. Aqivq jiovq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, laijai khi jiovq yaoq. Yu bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a khi tsaojao-ai bhiq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel haq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail lavqkhoel nee tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq.
Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, maldil neema lavqkhoel nee gaiq-a nail phaq bhi pevq yaoq. Haqeiv nail phaq bhai bhe khi, aqmeeq phaq bhai neq, aqmeeq-ai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.
Aqivq jaqbheq nail gaiqlaq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ev nail lavqkhoel, yu bhai thaqeeq nail laijai yaoq.
Aqdoil maq doil dai, laijai yaoq. Neema kev khi Miqyail nail ganl nl deedee yaoq.
Noeqthunq nail lavqkhoel lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Haq nail aoq nail phaq ya daq-u phao, ol yaoq. Gaq maq bhaq dai, khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal yaoq.
Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq loq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq bhai danq bhiq bhoil bhiq yaoq. Daq-i bhai aqmeeq meeq dai, hav bhiq yaoq.
Nuljuq bhai khoeq lal jiovq lal nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, geeqlaoq bivq yaoq. Iqkhail thaq yavq bhiq. Geeqlaoq taivq-ail bivq yaoq.
Lavqkhiq tsail nail tsaol-aq nee mail lavqkhiq tsao tsail bhiq yaoq. Nioil nail tsaol-aq nee mail nioil tsao bhiq yaoq.

Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaq lai jil lai nail neema aol yaoq. Eeq movq heel movq nail neema thaq aol. Maivphaoq nal moel maq jiav nail tsaol-aq juq nee iqsanl aqtsaoq tsaoq yaoq. Ngal neq, neenoeq neekha aol naol dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaq noeq.
Yu aqdoil phaq nl lal khi ngaol-aoq, aqdoil phaq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq nl kovq bhiq. Tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai aqmeeq phaq taivq-ail nl naol dai, noeq cov-ai thaq khi nl yaoq.
Nuljuq khal khi kivq nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai tsaq lai jil lai kivq dai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol. Yu nuljuq bhai nl laiq lavq-u phao, nuljuq thaq nl kovq bhiq. Miqyail nl kovq bhiq nail haqbhoil bhi jiav yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai:
“Heeqphaq Miqyail ge nail:
‘Nl kovq bhiq nail
phaq neq,
ngaq nail ganl ngaol.
Ngal yalkhaq dal
bhiq nail ngaol’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol”.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
“Naoq bhai neejiav
jiav nail gaq
aoq moevq haq neq,
bhi jaq yaoq.
Ulcuvq moevq haq neq,
ulcuvq bhi daol yaoq.
Alhai nl bhiq haq neq,
aivq ya haqsil
deedee khi
noeq pov lal dai,
nl bhiq nail khe-ai,
dul nail ngaol” dai iqsanl,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Haqeiv nail phaq-i mail nuljuq bhai thaq bhi gaq lal. Aqmeeq phaq bhai juq juq-ail, haqeiv nail phaq bhai bhi gaq lai yaoq.

Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail uvthaiq nail yovkav juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail maq bivq haq neq, uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq maq jiav nia-ail. Aqyu juq nail bhaqaoq neq, Miqyail-i mail bhi jiav-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, uvthaiq nail yovkav bhai lav tsoiq nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail-i mail nl-ai thaq nail phaq bhai lav tsoiq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Lav tsoiq nail tsaol-aq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aqmeeq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, uvthaiq nail yovkav juq bhai geesil duq maq jiav-ail. Maq meeq nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, geesil duq jiav nail ngaol. Uvthaiq nail yovkav juq bhai geesil duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq movq-ail laiq. Pevq movq haq neq, aqmeeq phaq nl yaoq. Nl haq neq, aqyu juq naoq bhai neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Naol aqmeeq phaq ya nia dai, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai khul-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol haqeiv nail phaq nl haq neq, geesil yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq thaoma aqnieivq-ail haq-nvq thaq nail maq ngel-ail. Haqeiv nail phaq khal nl nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail dai khi, Miqyail-i mail aqyu juq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, uvthaiq nail yovkav juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail jaol nail phaq thaq bhi pevq. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq heeq kivq khi, nuljuq nail neema iqsanl neesal-ovq dai, aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq.
Al bhaqda nee, nuljuq khaon ya dov bhiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq yovqgavq nail ganl nl-a nail al neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil nl-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai teevq gaq nee teevq gaq bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai, bivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq bhai bivq yaoq. Khaon tavq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khaon tavq bhiq yaoq. Ev heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ev bhiq yaoq. Thaqeeq thaqheel heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, thaqeeq thaqheel bhiq yaoq.

Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a nail gailjiov maq ngel haq neq, naoq nail kovtavq bhai gailjiov teevq phaq-ail thaq bhi bavq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a nail juq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bhee-a nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

“Yu nail miqyaq khaqma bhai thaq bheeq thaq leel. Yu bhai thaq lav heivq. Yu nail nlmaoq thaq khoiq. Yu nail nlmaoq bhai maivjeel thaq jeel” dai, ge-ai thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maqkhaiq, bivq-ai thaq nail daoq yaoq daoq yaoq juq iqsanl mail, “Naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq” dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol gil nail ngaol.
Yu bhai gaiq-a nail neema aol haq neq, maq meeq nail phaq maq nl bhiq-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, gaiq-a nail phaq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bhee-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, yanq niil yanq neq, iqnoeq noeq lal nail yanq nial dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao iqmoeq ilmoeq neema thaqtsaol lal-u nee maqtsil, niil aq-il ngadao bhai hevqkovq nail phaq aqjail jail lee-aoq nail ngaol.

Nqkiv lima nail yanq jel-ail khi, nqbhaq bhaq lal nail yanq kev lal-aiq naol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqnav phaq bhai tavq nail nl nail hal nail phaq bhai khaonq ha khi, aqbhaq bhai tavq nail phaq bhai nl bhel.

N-gaol phao nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq bhai nl bhel. Maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq bhai bhaoqaiq lav sav khi jilpheeq daol bov nail phaq thaq nl. Yu nail khaqma bhai bheeq nail leel nail phaq khi mail khaqmiq sev nail phaq thaq nl. Yu nee mail iqdaiq iqtsai thaq dov. Yu bhai maivjeel thaq jeel.
Aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai doi yaoq. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neelov haoqnao tsaothe naol dai, teevq phaq-ail thaq lainq.
Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai hav bhiq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maq dul lai nail aol juq nail ganl bhai jil pheel jil lul jaq nail dai khi, hav nail phaq thaq bhi pevq.

Neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, “Ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jaq kivq nail ngaol” dai, noeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, jaltsoiq aqpavq taivq-ail jaq nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jaq nail tsaol-aq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maq jaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maq ya thaqtheq-ail. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maq jaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, jaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai oeqbal maq ya thaq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai hav bhoel-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yu nail yaqkav bhai oeqbal thaq nail gaq-ol. Naol neq, khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq nail-aiq. Aivq bhai bhi jaol nail maqkhaiq, the ha nail maqkhaiq, aivq nail ilheel gaq pevq nail Miqyail bhai jiav nail ngaol. Aivq nail ilheel gaq neq, aivq bhai bhi jaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq jaol nia dai nl nia nail bhaqaoq Miqyail jiav nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav neq, aqn niil n neq, aqn yaoq n yaoq nee maqtsil meeq jaiq nail ngaol dai, thaqeeq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav neq, yaoq n yaoq n nee teevq gaq kheel ngaol dai, noeq nail ngaol. Khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai tsaq naol dai, noeqceiv-ai thaq nail phaq bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.

Aqn teevq n ganav bhai thaqeeq nail tsaol-aq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai noeq kev khi thaqeeq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai noeq kev khi jaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq khi jaq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maq jaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai noeq kev nail ngel-i mail maq jaq dai, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq doevq nail maq ngel. Yovqgavq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq sil nail maq ngel.
Ngadao doevq nail neq, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil ngaol. Ngadao sil khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, doevq nail maqkhaiq, sil nail maqkhaiq, ngadao aivq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, sil nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl, doevq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl Heeqphaq jiovq nail dai khi, Khali khanq sil khi gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naol khul khi mail naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai oeqbal gaoq thaq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai gaoq thaqtheq nail-aiq. Ngadao iqsanl mail, Miqyail yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai ya kev lai nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Heeqphaq Miqyail
ge nail:
‘Ngal neq,
maldil aqdoevq
doevq nail Miqyail
pevq nail khe-ai,
tsaol-aq yaq
yaoq gaq yaoq-ao
nee mail,
ngaq nail sivtavq bhai
peevqceevq kovdoiq
ya doiq khi,
moeqthaoq yaoq thaoq
yaoq-ao nee mail
ngaq bhai ya
tsiq eeq nail ngaol’ ” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, yovqgavq-i mail khal nl khal hal-a nail ganl, yovqgavq Miqyail bhai ya ge dov gil bhiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal thaq nail phaq bhai khaonq ha bhel. Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq phaqthiq thiq khi oeqbal nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi laiq bhi tsa-ail dai, teevq phaq-ail maq nl yaoq-aol dai, noeqceiv nail, meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Jaq nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, aivq bhai aivq aqjiivq aqcavq teevq phaq-ail maq jiav-ail dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhaqda nee ngal heeq kivq khi neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, al phaq niil phaq neq, aqjiivq aqcavq ngaol dai, teevq gaq ganav saol-nvq haq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil neq, aqjiivq aqcavq ngaol.

Naoq-i mail jaq daol-a nail bhaqda nee, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq ya noeqhaq haq neq, naol goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail maq ngel-ail. Naol jaq nail daol nail bhaqda nee, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai thaq lav cov. Aivq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, Khali khanq sil-a nail ngaol.
Naoq nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq bhai, yu ge duq thaq bhi jiav.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, jaq nail daol nail phaq pevq nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail phaq, neesal-ovq nail phaq khi mail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Khali nail haqbhoil alhai nl nail tsaol-aq bhai Miqyail neekhaol sil khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl, aivq bhai neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, khaq mao iqsanl tsaq lai jil lai dai, nl bhel. Eeq lal heel lal dai iqsanl, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaojao-ai bhel.

Jaq nail daol nail phaq bhaqda nee Miqyail nail ganl bhai thaq lav cov. Jaq nail daol nail phaq neq, iqsanl mail aqhaol ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq teevq phaq ganav jaq nail bhaqda nee, yu laiq-ail tsa-ail haq neq, jaq nail al gaq nl laiq-a nail ngaol.
Haqjoil jaq nail maqkhaiq, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul daol nail maqkhaiq, khul phaq nl khi ngaol-aoq, naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai bhi laiq bhi tsa-ail haq neq, teevq phaq-ail nl nail maq tsaq ail.

Naol neema thaqtsaol nail phaq, Miqyail khi mail naoq nail gaiqlaq bhai taivq-ail bhi jiav yaoq. Tsaq-ail nial dai, noeq khi, yovqgavq-i mail nl nail hal nail phaq, yovqgavq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal maq thaq lal haq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq jaq nail phaq bhai yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai maq haol haq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee nl-a nail maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq maq aol dai, khal nl khal hal nail phaq neq, iqsanl mail oeqbal ngaol.
Ngadao gaq kav nail juq, yovqgavq nail neekhaol sil dai taivq-ail maq nl mail, gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq nail gaq bhaq nail phaq bhai ol bhiq nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail aqjail bhai jaol nail juq meeq lal jaq lal, eeq lal heel lal dai, ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee noeq kev nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali iqsanl, aivq nail neekhaol sil dai taivq-ail maq nl-al. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, “Naoq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail juq, aqyu juq-i mail khal ge movq-ail ge nail daoq al, ngal iqsanl ya daq-a nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee khe khal gevq-ai thaq nail juq, ngadao bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail dai khi, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao oltsaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, Jalliq lavqkhoel khe gaq bhiq lavq-a nail phaq ya nail bhai maqkhaiq, noeqthunq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq neema teevq dao bhai tavq lai dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai hevq daiq bhiq dei-eiq. Aivq neq, oltsaol khi gaq bivq lavq nail Miqyail ngaol.
Alhai hevqdaiq lavq-a nail neq, nuljuq neema teevq dao bhai tavq khi ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai teevq gaq khe-ai, tsiqeeq nia nail haqbhoil ngaol.
Khali nuljuq bhai hav bhoel-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq hav bhoel yaoq. Hav bhoel haq neq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail dov lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail juq, maldil tsaq nail ngaol dai, dov lal dai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil Khali neq, yaqkav jiovq lee-a nail ngaol dai, ngal ge nail ngaol. Milnee uqnee Miqyail-i mail aqmil dov nail aqphiq aqbhal bhai ge bhiq-a nail saljial al juq bhai, aivq bhi bhee lal-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Miqyail gaoq haq gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a aivq bhai bhi tsiqeeq nail dai, Khali nl lee-a nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Alheel ngel-i mail,
yu nail jeq-e
jaq-a nail lavqkhoel
ngal naoq bhai
tsiqeeq khi,
naoq nail aqmil bhai
aqthel gul gul-ail
tsiqeeq naol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Teevq pov gaoq ge nail:
“Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a juq-ol,
aivq nail tsaol-aq nee mail
teevq gaq khe-ai
lavqkhiq tsail yaoq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Teevq pov gaoq ge-ai haq nail:
“Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a
iqsanl mail
Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai
tsiq eeq yaoq.
Miltsaq yaq iqsanl mail
aivq bhai tsiq
eeq dei-eiq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqyal iqsanl gaoq ge nail:
“Yeiqsail
daoqtsail bhai
bhoenaiq naiq
lal nail ngaol.
Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai
uvthaiq nail dai khi,
aivq doevq
lee nail ngaol.
Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a
aivq nail lavqkhoel
noeqthunq duq
ya lal nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Noeqthunq nail phaq bivq lavq-a nail Miqyail neq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq khi neesal-ovq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhi bhee lal dei-eiq. Alhai bhi bhee lal nail neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee, nuljuq noeqthunq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi bhee lal nail haqbhoil ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq aqmeeq phaq teevq bhee aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol naol. Nuljuq neq, neenoeq neekha yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee heeq nia nail tsaol-aq khi teevq gaq nee teevq gaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai iqsanl, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal daolcoev dai, nuljuq jaol nail bha haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Ganl teevq pav ganav juq nuljuq bhai gaoq cavq pov bhiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail ngal alhai ge nail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, ngaq bhai khul lavq-a nail ngaol.

Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail dai khi, khul lavq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq nail Philma bhi jiovq nail dai khi iqsanl, khul lavq-a nail ngaol. Alhai bhiq jiovq lavq nail neq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail bhi meeq bhi haol lal-a nail, Miqyail neema tsaq nail laol bhiq nail phaq bhi pevq lal nail haqbhoil ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail ganl nl nail lavqkhoel, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee ngal neema eeq duq jiav nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a naldaiq nia lal dai, Khali ngaq bhai juq khi nl-a hal-a nail juq taivq-ail ngal maldil dai, ge nail ngaol. Aqyu juq naldaiq nia lal dai, daoq ge nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, ganl nl nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, bhiq heeq bhiq moel nail phaq khi noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee ngal nl-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq nee mail Illulli milkhaoq bhai kev dai, doi doi dai, Khali nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal yu-i mail iqmoeq ilmoeq kaovq-ai thaq nail ilkhaol nee maq kaovq dal laiq dai, Khali nail aqmil bhai maq ya gaiq daiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq jaol nail bhai taivq-ail, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq ail naol dai, noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Aivq nail ganl
yu maq cavq bhiq daiq
khi ngaol-aoq,
aqyu juq ya
moel nail ngaol.
Aivq nail ganl
maq ya gaiq daiq
khi ngaol-aoq,
aqyu juq ya heeq
nia nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ganl al bhaqda nee, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha maq ya lal-al.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il milkhaoq niil juq nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl duq maq jiav-aoq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lal movq nail meeq nia kovq bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal Saqbheiq milkhaoq bhai lai-u phao, nuljuq jaol nail bha iqsanl nalga lal naol dai, noeq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nuljuq nee teevq yanq jaol khi jaq tavq daol tavq nail lavqkhoel nee gaq oil gaq haq neq, nuljuq-i mail ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq khi Saqbheiq milkhaoq bhai hevq ha-ail lavq dai iqsanl, ngal noeqthunq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq bhai ngal phul iqmoeq bivq-ai lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq khi Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail haq nail aoq nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bivq nail dai khi, aqyu juq neema tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee, phul danq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq-i mail neema tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee danq lavq-a nail phul al juq neq, gailjiov khaoq nail teevq phaq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqhaqlal phao Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail geeqlaoq bhai yu nail jeq-e jaq-a ya-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqsivq haqjoil phaoq khe nlmaoq juq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai danq bhiq nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Ngal alhai nl ail khi, aqyu juq bhai danq-ai lavq-a nail niil juq av bhiq-ail ceevq haq neq, Saqbheiq milkhaoq bha lai nail pha thao-ail, nuljuq jaol nail bha lal naol.
Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lal-u phao, Khali nail geeqlaoq teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel nee ngal lal naol dai, heeq kivq naol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Ngaq nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal tsao deedee lavq yaoq.

Yuldav milkhaoq lavqkhoel khe Khali bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee ngal ya jel-ail dai, geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq, ngaq-i mail bivq lai-a nail phul al juq bhai neekhaol sil dai iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal yaoq.

Al ovqtavq, Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, lavqkhiq teevq tsail nuljuq jaol nail bha lal kev khi, nuljuq nee ngal gaqnaq ya naq dai, ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal tsao lavq yaoq dai, nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.
Neesal bhi ovq nail Miqyail nuljuq iqsanl nee mail jaol dei-eiq. Aqmiq.
Geiqjeiq meenq bhai jaol nail, Khali yaq munl bhai tsaojao-ai nail gaq pevq nail ngadao nail nailma Philbheiq bhai, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lal naol.

Miqyail nail tsaol-aq nl heeq phaq-ail pevq nail khe-ai, nuljuq Yeiqsul nail maivphaoq bhai heldaiq khi aivq bhai hav yaoq dei-eiq. Aivq khul phaq loq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq tsaol-aq maodai gaq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq bhai iqsanl tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq-ai nee mail Yeiqsul Khali nail ganl tsao nl nail Bhilgillav khi aivq nail yovjil Aqgullav bhai, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.

Ngal ya jel-ail dai, aqyu nvq maolyaq ngaq nail haqbhoil khanqsil tseq nail ngaol. Ngal taivq-ail aqyu nvq maolyaq bhai tsiq eeq nail maq ngel-ail. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail Khali yaq munl iqsanl, aqyu nvq maolyaq bhai tsiq eeq nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq maolyaq nail ilkhaol bhai jil lai nail Khali yaq munl juq bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq-ail dei-eiq. Aqsil-aq milkhaoq lavqkhoel khe iqmoeq ilmoeq Khali yaq pevq lal-a nail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail Ilbhailnail bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq-ail dei-eiq.
Nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl nl deedee nail Maqlil bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.

Ngaq-ai nee mail thaonq bhai aol-a nail ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a Aqdaolniv khi Yulniv bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq. Aqyu nvq gaq neq, gaqkhoel juq nail lavqkhoel aqmil dov nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngal Khali yaq maq pevq lal-u nee mail, aqyu nvq gaq Khali yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail Aqbhaqlil bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq-ail dei-eiq.
Ngaq-ai nee mail Khali nail ganl tsao nl nail Ullaqbhaq khi, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail Saqdaqkhul bhai iqsanl, ngal noeqmoel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.
Khali nail haqbhoil mee nia phaq laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai gaq lai-a nail Aqbheiqleil khi Aqlildaolbhul nail miqsaol yovyaq bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.
Ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail Heiqloldil khi Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail Naqgiqsul nail miqsaol yovyaq bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.

Miqyail nail haqbhoil laijai khi ganl nl nail ngaq nail nailma Daqlulphilnav khi Daqlulphaosav bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail ganl bhai laijai deedee nail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail nailma Bheiqlaqsil bhai maqkhaiq, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq-ail dei-eiq.
Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail Lulphul khi, ngaq nail aqma khe-ai saol-nvq-ai thaq nail aivq nail aqma bhai iqsanl, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq-ail dei-eiq.
Aqsoqgaqleil, Phaqleiqgoq, Heiqlaqmeiq, Bhallaolbhal, Heiqlaqmal khi aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.

Phillaollul, Yuliv, Neiqlul, Neiqlul nail nailma khi Aolloqphal bhai, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq. Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail Khali yaq iqsanl bhai gail, ngal noeq moel naol dai gail cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.
Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee aqlavq he yaoq. Nvjuq nuljuq bhai noeq moel nail ngaol dai, Khali yaq munl iqsanl mail daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq-i mail ya saol-a nail ganl juq bhai maq tsaq maq dul lai nail daoq cavq lavq-a nail juq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Aqyu juq neq, yu bhai bhi gaoq bhi gail ail khi, hevq bheeq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai gail jao jao yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Alheel juq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Khali nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Yovqgavq nail ovqmav nail haqbhoil nl-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, naldaiq meeq nail daoq khi tsiqeeq nail daoq bhai juq juq-ail khi, neema lavqkhoel aqmeeq aqhaol haol nail tsaol-aq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi mul ya nail ngaol.

Nuljuq Miqyail nail daoq naldaiq deedee nail ngaol dai, milkhaoq doi dai, gaiq doi ail-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial. A dai nee maqtsil, nuljuq aqmeeq phaq bhai heeq nia khi, haqeiv nail phaq neema lavqkhoel bhai teevq peivq-ail maq aol dai, ngal oil movq-ail nial.

Neesal bhi ovq nail Miqyail neq, mao-ail maq maoq lal mail nuljuq nail aqkhil phaqyal kov-uvq nee neivq Saqdaq bhai naoq peiv nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngaq-ai nee mail ganl nl thailthaiq nail Tilmolseiq khi, ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a Lulgil, Yaqsoq khi Saolsilphaqtav aqyu juq nuljuq bhai iqsanl noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, Paolluv nail haqbhoil haoqgavq niil gevq thailthaiq nail Deiqlaqtil ngaol. Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel nee ngal nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai maqkhaiq, Khali yaq teevq munl munl laoq bhai maqkhaiq, hav khi bhi jaq bhi daol thailthaiq nail Gaqyul iqsanl, “Ngal nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol” dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Meenq niil meenq nail phul bhai heldaiq phail nail Eillaqdul khi ngadao nail aqivq jaqbheq Gaoqthu iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Miqyail bhai thaqeeq thaqheel bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq neq, ngal cavq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq khi Yeiqsul Khali nail ganl ngal daoq cavq cavq nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai gaq bhi kav lal nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail cavq nail cov nail geeqlaoq daoq niil neq, milnee uqnee nee daoqceevq oil tsail-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail neema thaqtsaol lal khi naldaiq nia lal dai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail Miqyail-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, oiltsail-ai thaq nail al, niil aq-il phaodaiq lavq khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail haoqgavq bhaqda nee, oiltsail-ai thaq nail al bhai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ya heeq kivq khi ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail neenoeq neekha teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, nqmaq maqluv halyeel Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiq heel bhel. Aqmiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel Paolluv ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, “Naol ngaq nail gaqkhoel jiovq yaoq” dai, aivq ngaq bhai khul lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqivq jaqbheq Solthai nv-nvq gaq, Gaolliqthu meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq juq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee Miqyail nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal dai iqsanl, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil bhai khal hal nail khaq bha jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqgavq niil gevq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq nail Heeqphaq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Nuljuq bhaqda nee ngal khaq mao iqsanl Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee nuljuq Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ya-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel nuljuq bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol. Daoq ge nail maqkhaiq, neenoeq neekha maqkhaiq, bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Alhai bhee lal-a nail bhaqda nee, Khali nail ganl nv-nvq gaq salkhil khanq nail khe-ai tsaq-ail nial dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhee lal thailthaiq nail bhai, yu ya moel-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali dov lee nail bhai daonq-u phao, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqhaqlal phaoq khe kovpavq bhee lovq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqn n-gaol, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, haoqnao naosaq kev dai, aivq nuljuq bhai bhi ivq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq pevq nail aivq nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali bhai tavq lai kivq dai, nuljuq bhai khul dov-a nail Miqyail neq, saljial ivq nail Miqyail pevq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil bhaqda nee ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaq lai jil lai yaoq. Nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai munl thaq bhoilpav. Neema teevq heeq taivq-ail, neenoeq needul teevq phaq taivq-ail tavq khi, aqmeeq-ai tsaq lai jil lai yaoq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq iqdaiq iqtsai dov nail ngaol dai, Khaqlaol-iv nail ildaoq juq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal niailhai ge movq-ail nial. Nuljuq ge nail: “Ngal neq, Paolluv nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngal neq, Aqpaolluv nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngal neq, Geiqphal nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Ngal neq, Khali nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
Khali neq, he pav he sav nail gaq laiq. Paolluv nuljuq nail haqbhoil lavqyavq kovtavq bhai khanqsil-a nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, Paolluv nail aqmil kov-uvq nee nuljuq ulcuvq saol-a nail laiq.
Gaqlilphul khi Gaqyul, aqyu nvq gaq bhai maq ngel nail neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal teevq gaq bhai iqsanl ulcuvq maq saol bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq nail aqmil kov-uvq nee ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol dai, teevq gaq-ail maq ge kivq-ail.
(Ngal Saqteiqphaq phaqyaq mayaq bhai iqsanl ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Al juq bhai maq ngel nail neq, ngal yaoq juq yaoq bhai ulcuvq saol bhiq-a nail dai, maq noeq-ail.)

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ulcuvq saol bhiq-ail yaoq dai, Khali ngaq bhai khoel nail maq ngel-ail. Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq-ail yaoq dai, khoel nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq daoq al cavq bhiq-u phao, Khali lavqyavq kovtavq-ai khanq sil-a nail al aqdeq maq ya deq-ail dai, ngal miltsaq bhai tavq nail neenoeq neekha nail daoq bhai maq juq dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Lavqyavq nail ganl daoq cavq daoq cov cov-u phao, luq-ail seil-ail thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil neq, neenoeq neekha maq aol nail daoq pevq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail ngadao nail haqbhoil, daoq al daoq neq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq pevq nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Miqyail ge nail:
‘Ngal neq,
neenoeq neekha
aol nail tsaol-aq nail
neenoeq neekha bhai
lav cov khi,
tselpav bhoilpav nia nail
tsaol-aq nail
tselpav bhoilpav nia nail
phaq bhai aqnieivq-ail
bhi pevq ail naol’ ” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq khaq. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail tsaol-aq khaq. Miltsaq yaq juq nail lavqkhoel, mee nia phaq heeq nia khi jil pheeljaq movq nail tsaol-aq khaq. Miqyail miltsaq nail neenoeq neekha bhai khul nail ganl maq tsoiq nail phaq bhi pevq lal-a nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq yaq juq yovqgavq nail neenoeq neekha bhaqda nee Miqyail bhai maq bhi heeq nia lal dai, Miqyail aivq nail neenoeq neekha bhai juq khi noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, neenoeq neekha maq aol-ail dai, yu-i mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq bhai hevqkovq nail neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq hal daiq nail ngaol. Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq, neenoeq neekha halpov nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai khanq sil-a nail Khali nail ganl nvjuq daoq cavq cavq nail ngaol. Ganl niil neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil phaqthiq thiq nail phaq pevq khi, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil neenoeq neekha maq aol nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail khal khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Khali neq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq khi Miqyail nail neenoeq neekha pevq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail neenoeq neekha maq aol nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail neenoeq neekha nee maqtsil eeq nail ngaol. Miqyail nail gaq bhaq nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail gaq kav nail nee maqtsil kav nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-a nail bhai saol-nvq daiq. Miltsaq nail neenoeq neekha phao saol-nvq daiq haq neq, khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq maq mao-ail. Aqmil dov nail tsaol-aq iqsanl maq mao-ail. Eeq nail heel nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl maq mao-ail.

Neenoeq neekha aol nail juq bhi haqsil nail dai khi, miltsaq yaq-i mail neenoeq neekha maq aol-ail dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail juq bhai, Miqyail tsel dov-a nail ngaol. Gaq kav nail juq bhi haqsil nail dai khi, gaq maq kav-ail dai, miltsaq yaq-i mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail juq bhai, Miqyail tsel dov-a nail ngaol.

Miltsaq yaq juq-i mail ganl tsoiq naol dai, saol-nvq nail phaq bhai ganl maq tsoiq-ail bhi pevq-ail nail haqbhoil, miltsaq yaq-i mail seiqleiq khaoqsail maq jiav, ganl maq tsoiq-ail dai, thaqtheq-ai thaq nail juq bhai, aivq tsel dov-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail neema eeq duq maq jiav-ail.

Miqyail bhaqda nee, nuljuq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai ya jaol-a nail ngaol. Ngadao nail haqbhoil neenoeq neekha, tsaq nail daol nail phaq, meeq nail haol nail phaq khi, hevqkovq nail phaq, Miqyail Yeiqsul bhai bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Neema eeq nail tsaol-aq,
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail
lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail
eeq dei-eiq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, milnee uqnee ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha Miqyail nail ganl salkhil khanq nail daoq cavq lee-u phao, naldaiq meeq nail daoq ge ge-ail cavq lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Neenoeq neekha aol nail daoq ge ge-ail cavq-a nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail.
Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai khanqsil-a nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai taivq-ail heeq kivq naol dai, ngal noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, gaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol ail, geesil khi aqjuq juq juq-ail jaol-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail ge nail thail nail daoq juq khi daoq cavq cavq nail ganl neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail neenoeq neekha bhai juq khi jalmul mul lee-a nail maq ngel. Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhi dov lal dai, nl lee-a nail teevq-eel ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail neenoeq neekha nail kovtavq bhai ivq nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail bhaqaoq kov-uvq bhai ivq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phao gaq kav lal-a nail juq bhai nvjuq neenoeq neekha bhai tavq lai nail daoq saol bhiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq nail neenoeq neekha bhai ge nail maq ngel. Peivq-ail boev-ail nia nail miltsaq khe heeqphaq juq nail neenoeq neekha bhai ge nail iqsanl maq ngel.

Oiltsail-ai thaq khi, daoqceevq navq deedee nail, Miqyail nail neenoeq neekha bhai nvjuq saol bhiq nail ngaol. Neenoeq neekha al bhaqda nee, ngadao juq seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai, miltsaq niil maq teivq-u nee mail Miqyail-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq khe heeqphaq juq neq, neenoeq neekha niilniai maq heeq nia-ail. Aqyu juq heeq nia-ail nul neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Heeqphaq bhai lavqyavq kovtavq-ai maq tavq heivq-ail.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail
tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil,
aivq-i mail lainq-ai
thaq nail juq bhai
maivneev maq moel daiq,
naqkhaol maq gaiq daiq,
tsaol-aq nail
neema lavqkhoel-ai
maq noeq moel daiq-al” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, aivq nail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi al juq ngadao bhai phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai halpov moel khi, Miqyail nail daoqceevq mao-ail navq nail juq bhai iqsanl halpov moel nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail neema maq ngel nail neq, tsaol-aq bhai tavq nail juq bhai khaq sil gaq heeq nia nail-aiq. Alhai dul dai, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal maq ngel nail neq, Miqyail bhai tavq nail juq bhai teevq gaq-ail maq heeq nia-ail.
Ngadao neq, miltsaq yaq nail neema ya-a nail maq ngel. Miqyail-i mail ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail juq iqsanl bhai heeq nia dai, Miqyail nee mail lee-a nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai ya-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq ganl al cavq-u phao, tsaol-aq nail neenoeq neekha bhai juq juq-ail cavq nail maq ngel. Aqhaqlal Miqyail cavq lavq nail khe-ai, cavq nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal phao khe ganl cavq-u phao, aqhaqlal phao tavq nail juq bhai juq juq-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail maq ya-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal bhai tavq nail juq bhai maq hav bhoel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, al juq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil neenoeq neekha maq aol nail juq pevq nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal phao taivq-ail al juq bhai tselpav khi gov heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, aivq al juq bhai maq gov heeq nia-ail.
Aqhaqlal phao noeq dov nia nail tsaol-aq, iqsanl bhai tselpav bhoilpav nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al gaq nail ganl bhai teevq gaq-ail maq tselpav nia-ail.
Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai
neenoeq neekha bivq dai,
khaq sil gaq
aivq nail neema bhai
heeq nia nail-aiq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao neq, Khali nail neema aol nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aqhaqlal phao khe ganl gov heeq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai cavq bhiq nail khe-ai, ngal nuljuq bhai maq cavq bhiq kivq-il. Nuljuq neq, Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phao gaq bhaq nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq nail ganl taivq-ail gov heeq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai cavq bhiq nail khe-ai taivq-ail, ngal nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq kivq-ail teevq-eel nial.

Nuljuq neq, aqjal aqgaol maq jaq nia lal haq nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai maq bhi jaq-ail. Aqtsil taivq-ail nuljuq bhai bhi cuvq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il iqsanl, nuljuq aqjal aqgaol maq jaq nia lal heeq thaq-il.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq neq, aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao tsaothe-ai haq nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maivjeel jeel khi iqdaiq iqtsai dov nail ngel-i mail, aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao tsaothe khi, miltsaq yaq khe-ai aqdoevq doevq thailthaiq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Teevq gaq, “Ngal neq, Paolluv nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Teevq gaq, “Ngal neq Aqpaolluv nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq alhai khal ge-u phao kev dai, nuljuq miltsaq khe yaq taivq-ail pevq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Aqpaolluv khaq sil gaq, Paolluv iqsanl khaq sil gaq. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol lal dai, nv-nvq gaq yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail ganl bhi nl lavq-a nail khe-ai, nv-nvq gaq yovqgavq nail ganl yovqgavq bhao nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, kha nail gaq ngaol. Aqpaolluv neq, ulcuvq hoeq nail gaq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, bhi doevq lal nail gaq neq, Miqyail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, kha nail gaq khi ulcuvq hoeq nail gaq eeq nail maq ngel-ail. Bhi doevq lal nail Miqyail taivq-ail eeq nail ngaol.
Kha nail gaq khi ulcuvq hoeq nail gaq, teevq gaq kheel ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yovqgavq geeqlaoq ya nail ngaol.
Nv-nvq gaq neq, teevq gaq khe-ai, Miqyail nail ganl nl nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail daiyal khi Miqyail nail ilkhaol khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngaq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, mao-ail nia nail ilkhaol covq nail gaq khe-ai ngal iqmoeq ilmoeq cov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yu neq, al nee cov dal laivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khalhai khi cov dal laivq nail bhai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee sativq ya thaq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq daoqthaoq thaoq khi kaovq-ai thaq nail al neq, Yeiqsul Khali ngaol. Khul gaq maqkhaiq, yaoq phaq yaoq nee daoqthaoq maq thaoq kivq-ail.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, phul, heel, sainl, aqbhaol, iqlaq, gov heeq oil khi, daoqthaoq thaoq-ai thaq nail al bhai nee cov dal laivq haq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai, dov lal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yalkhaq dal nail aqn kev lee-u phao, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai miqjaq-i mail poiv tsel daiq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, iqmoeq ilmoeq daoqthaoq thaoq-ai thaq nail a bhai nee cov dal laivq nail al ivq haq neq, aivq geeqlaoq ya nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav-i mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai miqjaq-i mail poiv ha haq neq, aivq nail geeqlaoq sunq-ail nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Hevqkovq nail al neq, miqjaq lavqkhoel nee ya jel-ail nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma pevq nail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, maq heeq kivq ail laiq.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai lav cov haq neq

Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq goiqbhaoq thaq bhaoq. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav, “Ngal neenoeq neekha aol naol” dai, noeq haq neq, aivq maldil neenoeq neekha aol lal dai, iqmoeq neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq ya pevq-ail nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq nail neenoeq neekha neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neenoeq neekha maq aol-ail. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Neenoeq neekha
aol nail tsaol-aq bhai
Miqyail aqyu juq nail
noeqheeq noeqmoel nia nail
phaq bhai juq khi,
aqyu juq bhai
nieivq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yaoq daoq yaoq niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“ ‘Neenoeq neekha
aol nail tsaol-aq nail
neenoeq needul neq,
aqnieivq ngaol’ dai,
Heeqphaq Miqyail
heeq nia nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq bhai juq khi neema thaq eeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nuljuq nail ngaol.

Paolluv maqkhaiq, Aqpaolluv maqkhaiq, Geiqphal maqkhaiq, miltsaq maqkhaiq, aqdoevq phaq maqkhaiq, Aqsil-aq phaq maqkhaiq, niil aq-il pevq thailthaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, yaqhao pevq lal nail juq maqkhaiq, iqsanl mail nuljuq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, Khali nail ngaol. Khali neq, Miqyail nail ngaol.
“Nuljuq neq, Khali nail yaqkav pevq khi, Miqyail-i mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail juq bhai heldaiq phail nail tsaol-aq nial” dai, yu nvjuq bhai saol-nvq lavq nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Heldaiq phail nail juq neq, saljial ivq nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq maqkhaiq, yaoq juq yaoq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai yalkhaq dal lavq khi ngaol-aoq, khul maq khi-ail. Ngal neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq yalkhaq maq dal.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq nail heeq kivq nail neema aqhaol ngaol. Ngal alhai noeq nail ngel-i mail, maldil tsaq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq bhai yalkhaq dal nail gaq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyanq maq kev lal-u phao, khul nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, yalkhaq thaq dal haq lao. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul kev lee-u phao, aqnav nail lavqkhoel oil tsail-ai thaq nail juq bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bhi dov lal khi, tsaol-aq nail neenoeq needul bhai iqsanl bhi dov lal nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai, Miqyail tsiqeeq bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Aqpaolluv nv-nvq gaq nail ganl bhai tavq lai khi nuljuq nail haqbhoil saol-nvq nail lavqkhoel, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol. Nv-nvq gaq bhai heldaiq khi Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai khal gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq tsaothe khi doevq nia dai, ge nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Ngadao juq nail lavqkhoel khe aqivq jiovq nail juq bhai teevq gaq bhai tsiqeeq khi teevq gaq bhai ge doil nail neq, maq tsaq-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khaq sil gaq nuljuq bhai bhi bhee lal lavq-a nail-aiq. Miqyail nee ya-a nail maq ngel nail, nuljuq khul jiav nail-aiq. Miqyail nee mail ya-a nail phal-iq neq, Miqyail nee mail maq ya-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq khul khi mail neema eeq nail-aiq.

Nuljuq khal loq nail phaq iqsanl jiav gil-aoq naol laiq. Nuljuq hulmeeq meeq lal gaq-ao naol laiq. Nvjuq heeqphaq maq pevq lal khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq heeqphaq pevq lal-a nail laiq. Meeq nail ngaol. Nvjuq iqsanl nuljuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai heeqphaq ya jiovq dai, nuljuq bhai maldil heeqphaq bhi pevq lal movq-ail nial.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl khi mail miltsaq yaq iqsanl bhai bhi heldaiq ga nail haqbhoil Miqyail nail gaqkhoel pevq nail nvjuq bhai milkhaoq yaq juq nail sivtavq bhai bhi khoeq bhi jiovq nail dai khi, Miqyail-i mail yu nail haoqnao naosaq bhi jaol lavq thaq nail khul-i dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq Khali nail haqbhoil neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Khali nail lavqkhoel neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq nial. Nvjuq gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, gaq kav nail tsaol-aq nial. Nuljuq khaoqsail eeq nail tsaol-aq ngaol-aoq, nvjuq neq, yu-i mail khul maq tsoiq dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Nvjuq neq, niil aq-il kev dai, aoq moevq nail, ulcuvq moevq nail, maq ya doi maq ya gaq nail, deeq nail kov nail bhai ya daq khi, jaol duq maq bhao nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq yovqgavq nail aqlavq-i mail laijai khi ganl nl jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yu nvjuq bhai iqkhail yavq lal-u phao, nvjuq geeqlaoq bivq nail ngaol. Yu nvjuq bhai khoeq lal jiovq lal-u phao, nvjuq ol nail ngaol.

Yu nvjuq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge lal-u phao, nvjuq aqyu juq bhai thaoq hal nail ngaol. Niil aq-il kev dai, yu nvjuq bhai miltsaq khe aqjiivq aqcavq phaq khe-ai saol-nvq-ai thaq khi, yu-i mail yav ha-ai thaq nail pavqkhuq pavq leivq khe-ai, pevq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq bhi haqsil nail dai khi, ngal niailhai gevq-a nail maq ngel. Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail yaq khe-ai, saol-nvq-ai thaq khi, bhi yaolphaol nail dai khi, gevq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali nail ganl nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq nail saqlaq teevq meel-nvq gaq jaol khi ngaol-aoq, aqbhu teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol. Ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq khi, nuljuq bhai Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi doevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai saol oil yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee jaol nail Khali yaq munl iqsanl bhai ngal cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail khe-ai, ngal Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq juq-ail nl-a nail juq, nuljuq bhai bhi ge noeq lal nail haqbhoil, Tilmolseiq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lal naol. Aivq neq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai saljial ivq khi, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail yaq teevq gaq ngaol.
“Paolluv nvjuq jaol nail bha maq lal-ail” dai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq noeq noeq-ail, neema eeq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, mao-ail maq mao lal mail, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lal naol. Ngal lal kev haq neq, neema eeq nail tsaol-aq al juq daoq ge nail bhai, maq naldaiq-ail. Aqyu juq bhaqaoq aol ail laiq, maq aol ail laiq dai, heldaiq naol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq neq, daoq ge nail bhai tavq nail maq ngel-ail. Bhaqaoq bhai tavq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq khul oil movq nail-aiq. Dailtseel oil khi bhi lal movq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi bhi lal movq nail laiq.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel, yaqyov-aq khi yaqmai-aq nail gaiqlaq bhai maq nl khaoq nail phaq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Maq nl khaoq nail al phaq neq, laolkivq yaq iqsanl maq nl khaoq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Al khul dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq yovqgavq nail aqbhu nail khaqma bhai bheeq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai nl thailthaiq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neema eeq nail ngaol. Nuljuq noeqhaq heeq phaq-ail pevq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq. Nuljuq alhai nl thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai nuljuq nail lavqkhoel nee the ha heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nee mail maq jaol khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail neema nuljuq nee mail jiav nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol nail khe-ai, alhai nl nail tsaol-aq bhai, niil aq-il iqsanl ngal dal bhiq nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee nuljuq jil lai khi, ngaq nail neema iqsanl nuljuq nee mail jiav-u phao, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail bhaqaoq bhai juq juq-ail, niailhai nl yaoq.

Tsaol-aq al gaq, aqsivq haqjoil phao luq-ail seil-ail dai, neivq Saqdaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel-ai av bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqn n-gaol Miqyail aivq nail Aqhaqlal bhai hevqkovq bhiq-ail jaol-aq.
Nuljuq neema eeq nail maq meeq-ail. Deqtsiq micil teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, khaqmul teevq heeq heeq lao bhai bhi bhaonq lal nia nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.

Nuljuq deqtsiq maq aol nail khaqmul aqsivq teevq heeq pevq lal dai, deqtsiq aqlil oil haq yaoq. Maldil dai, ge haq neq, nuljuq deqtsiq maq aol nail khaqmul aqsivq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali neq, ngadao nail haqbhoil laol bhiq-a nail Bhaqsaqkhaq yaol yaq pevq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, haqeiv nail phaq khi aqjiivq aqcavq bhai tavq nail deqtsiq aqlil thaq oil bhoel. Deqtsiq maq aol nail meeq nail haol nail khi maldil tsaq nail khaqmul jaq bhel.
Khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq nee aqtsaoq thaq tsaoq-o dai, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal haoqgavq alhai gevq-ai lavq-a nail neq, yu nee mail bheeq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, neekhaol jiav nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, yu nail yalkav khoiq khi kav jaq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, alhai nl thailthaiq nail laolkivq yaq bhai aqtsaoq thaq tsaoq-o dai, ge movq nail maq ngel-ail. Alheel juq bhai aqtsaoq maq tsaoq haq neq, nuljuq miltsaq niil heeq nail lavqkhoel nee, ya dov ail nail ngaol.

Ngal ge movq nail neq, “Ngal Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol” dai, ge nail bhai, yu nee mail bheeq nail, neekhaol jiav nail, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail, khal ge movq-ail ge nail, khaq mao iqsanl jilpheeq daol bov nail, yu nail yalkav bhai khoiq khi kav jaq nail, alheel nail tsaol-aq bhai aqtsaoq thaq tsaoq. Aqyu juq nee mail aoq iqsanl thaq jaq tavq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail munl nail lavqniil phao khe jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail, ngaq bhai khalhai tavq nail-aiq. Nuljuq iqsanl, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail munl lavqniil phao jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai, Miqyail yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, “Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq bhai nuljuq nail lavqkhoel nee the ha yaoq.”
Nuljuq nail gaiqlaq yalkhaq ge nail phaq dov lal haq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq jaol nail bha maq ail mail, nuljuq bhai dalceiv lavq dai, laolkivq yaq jaol nail bha ail tseq naol laiq.

Miqyail nail tsaol-aq miltsaq yaq iqsanl bhai yaqhao yalkhaq ya dal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq ail laiq. Nuljuq miltsaq yaq bhai yalkhaq ya dal haq neq, nuljuq micil cil deel ganl juq bhai dal heeq phaq-ail maq geel-nvq ail laiq.

Ngadao neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai iqsanl, yalkhaq ya dal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, miltsaq kovtavq khe ganl bhai iqsanl, ngadao maldil yalkhaq ya dal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, dal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail micil cil deel ganl dov lal haq neq, maivphaoq nal moel maq jiav-ail dai, Khali yaq munl-i mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail juq bhai, nuljuq yalkhaq dal nail tsaol-aq bhi jiovq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhi haqsil nail dai khi, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol. Khali yaq nail gaiqlaq bhai, maq tsaq maq jil lai nail bhai dalceiv nia nail neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq gaq-ail maq jaol-ail laiq.
Khali yaq nail gaiqlaq yalkhaq ge nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai yalkhaq ge-ail nail laiq.

Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq yalkhaq ge nail neq, teevq peivq-ail maq tsaq-ail. Khul khi mail aqivq jaqbheq-i mail lav laiq lavq nail bhai nuljuq maq ol nail-aiq. Khul khi mail aqivq jaqbheq juq nuljuq nail yalkav bhai khoiq lal-u phao, nuljuq maq ol nail-aiq.
Nuljuq alhai maq ol nail nee ovqtavq, yu bhai lav laiq khi goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai alhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Maq tsaq maq daol nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel-ai maq ya aol lai-ail dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Thaq noeq bheeq dei-eiq. Khaqmiq sev nail, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail, yu nail khaqma bhai bheeq nail leel nail, yaqyov-aq aqtsaoq gaiqlaq bhai maq nl khaoq nail phaq nl nail,

yu nail yalkav khoiq nail, neekhaol jiav nail, khaq mao iqsanl jilpheeq daol bov nail, khal ge movq-ail ge nail, yu nail yalkav bhai khoiq khi kav jaq nail, alheel nail tsaol-aq Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ya aol lai-ail.

Jel lal-u phao nuljuq teevq pav ganav juq alhai nl-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il Miqyail ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil khi ngadao nail Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal bhaqda nee nuljuq bhai tsiq haol-a nail nee ovqtavq, bhi meeq bhi haol lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, “Ngadao yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl kivq nail aqkhaoqanq jiav naol” dai ge nail ngaol. Nl kivq khi ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ganl tsoiq nail maq ngel-ail. “Ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl kivq nail aqkhaoqanq jiav naol.” Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khul phaq nail kov-uvq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal yaqkav maq jiovq.

Nuljuq neq, “Jaq nail phaq neq, ovqmav nail haqbhoil ngaol. Ovqmav neq, jaq nail phaq nail haqbhoil ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail niil nvq phaq bhai lav peivq lav boev nail ngaol. Aqmaol neq, yu nee mail khaqmiq sev nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul iqsanl aqmaol nail haqbhoil ngaol.
Miqyail aivq nail bhaqaoq-i mail Yeiqsul bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail khe-ai, ngadao bhai iqsanl bhi doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail aqmaol neq, Khali nail alsail juq ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali nail alsail bhai oil khi, maimaqlal nail alsail bhi pevq lal nail laiq. Teevq peivq-ail maq pevq nia-ail.

Maimaqlal nee mail bheeq nail tsaol-aq, aivq nee mail aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai khaqma yovjil nail ganl bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, “Aqyu nvq gaq aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nee tavq nail tsaol-aq, aqhaqlal phao aivq nee mail teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.

Yu nee mail bheeq nail phaq bhai gaoq ceiv ceiv-ail yaoq. Tsaol-aq-i mail nl nail oeqbal yaoq phaq yaoq iqsanl mail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol lavqniil phao nl nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu nee mail bheeq nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail aqmaol neq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Aivq neq, Miqyail nee mail dov lee khi, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail aqmaol neq, nuljuq nail maq ngel-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aqphoiq bivq khi, nuljuq bhai ul kovq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi dov lal yaoq.

Nuljuq-i mail ngal jaol nail bha haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ganl juq, ngal nuljuq bhai gevq kovq-ai lavq bhiq naol dei-eiq. Yaqyov-aq neq, yaqmai-aq nee mail maq bheeq dai jaol kivq haq neq, meeq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu nee mail bheeq nail maodai jiav nail ngel-i mail, yaqyov-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee khaqma hevq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee maol ail nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov-aq neq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai nl bhiq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail aol jiav nail khe-ai nl bhiq yaoq. Alhai dul dai, yaqmai-aq juq iqsanl yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq bhai nl bhiq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail aol jiav nail khe-ai nl bhiq yaoq.

Khaqma juq neq, yovqgavq nail aqmaol yovqgavq nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Yaqyov-aq juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail aqmaol yovqgavq nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Yovqgavq nail khaqma nail haqbhoil ngaol.

“Naoq-ai nee mail maq iqthaiq-ail” dai, miqyaq yovyaq nail gaiqlaq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq thaq ge. Geeqlaoq aqmeeq-ai hal kivq dai, nvq gaq nvq gaq-ail neema tsaq khi teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq iqthaiq tavq nail maq ngel nail neq, maq iqthaiq-ail dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq thaq ge. Yovqgavq nail neema bhai yovqgavq maq oltsaol-ail, neivq Saqdaq nuljuq bhai jalmul maq ya mul ya nia dai, teevq yanq khi-aq teevq gaq khe-ai, gaoq iqthaiq tavq yaoq.
Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, daoq bivq nail maq ngel-ail. Aqkhaoqanq bivq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, ngaq-ai khe-ai maq hevq dai, bhi jaol movq-ail nial. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail kovpavq, teevq gaq teevq phaq ya-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Khaqma maq hevq, maq maol ail nail tsaol-aq khi miqtsiq miqma juq bhai ngal niailhai ge bhiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ngaq-ai khe-ai jaol nia haq neq, meeq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaqma maq hevq, maq maol ail mail maq jaol kivq haq neq, khaqma hevq, maol ail nail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, iqthaiq tavq jaol tavq movq deedee nail neema aol nail nee maqtsil khaqma hevq, maol ail nail neq, meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
Khaqma juq neq, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq nee maq jaol mail maq ya kovq-ail dai, miqyaq yovyaq bhai ngal daoq bivq nail ngaol. Daoq niil daoq neq, ngaq nail daoq maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul nail daoq ngaol.
Kovq haq neq, maq maol ail dai jaol nail tsaq nail ngaol. Maq ngel haq neq, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq nee tsaq lai jil lai dai, nl nail tsaq nail ngaol. Yaqyov-aq juq iqsanl khaqma maq ya kovq-ail.

Khali yaq teevq gaq, yovqgavq nail khaqma Khali yaq maq ngel khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail khaqma aivq nee jaol movq haq neq, kovq nail maq tsaq-ail dai, yaoq juq yaoq bhai iqsanl ngal ge bhiq nail ngaol. Daoq niil daoq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail ge-a nail maq ngel ail. Ngal ge nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq Khali yaq maq ngel khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail yaqyov-aq aivq nee mail jaol movq haq neq, kovq nail maq tsaq-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali yaq maq ngel nail yaqyov-aq juq, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhaqda nee Miqyail nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul lal nail ngaol. Khali yaq maq ngel nail khaqma juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, dul lal nail ngaol. Alhai maq ngel haq neq, nuljuq nail yaqmiq yaqyov juq Miqyail nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aqyu juq Miqyail nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Miqyaq yovyaq nail lavqkhoel, Khali yaq maq ngel nail gaq kovq movq haq neq, kovq dei-eiq. Alhai kovq haq neq, Khali yaq pevq nail yaqyov-aq gaq maq ngel haq neq, yaqmai-aq gaq, aivq-i mail kovq-a nail gaq nee mail leel thaiq-ai thaq nail maq ngel yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neesal bhi ovq nail haqbhoil Miqyail ngadao bhai khul-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq juq-ol, nuljuq nail yaqyov-aq bhai hevqkovq kivq nail, maq hevqkovq kivq nail dai, nuljuq khalhai khi heeq kivq nail-aiq. Yaqyov-aq juq-ol, nuljuq nail yaqmai-aq bhai hevqkovq kivq nail maq hevqkovq kivq nail dai, nuljuq iqsanl khalhai khi heeq kivq nail-aiq.

Miqyail teevq gaq bhai teevq gaq aqdoevq bhi doevq khi teevq gaq nee teevq gaq bhai khul-a nail khe-ai, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee aqdoevq doevq khi nl-ail yaoq. Ngal Khali yaq munl yaoq munl yaoq-ao nee bhai niailhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Miqyail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai khul-u phao, tsaol-aq al gaq bavkov uqjaq oev-ai thaq naol laiq. Oev-ai thaq nail phal-iq neq, maq oev-ai thaq nail khe-ai, thaq gaoq jaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai khul-u phao, bavkov uqjaq maq oev-ai thaq-al laiq. Maq oev-ai thaq nail phal-iq neq, thaq gaoq oev.
Bavkov uqjaq oev nail maqkhaiq, maq oev nail maqkhaiq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai naldaiq nail phaq taivq-ail ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.
Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq khul-u phao, aivq khal pevq nail khe-ai, pevq dei-eiq.

Naoq bhai khul-u phao, naol yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail laiq. Jiovq nail phal-iq neq, al bhai khaoq thaq laol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol yaqkav jiovq nail nee dov ail kivq haq neq, dov ail nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul-i mail khul-a nail tsaol-aq, aivq-i mail bhi jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, yaqkav maq ngel nail tsaol-aq bhai Khali-i mail khul-u phao, aivq nail yaqkav pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail aqphoiq maodai bivq khi nuljuq bhai ul kovq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq nail yaqkav thaq gaoq jiovq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-u phao, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq khal pevq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai alhai aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Yaqmai-aq yaqnoil juq nail haqbhoil Yeiqsul-i mail bivq lavq nail daoq bhai ngal maq ya-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal noeq nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel dei-eiq. Yeiqsul nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, nuljuq ngaq nail daoq niil daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol kivq nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il neq, mao-ail suqsaq nail aqyanq kev lee-aoq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq khal pevq nail khe-ai, aqdoevq doevq nail neq, meeq deedee nail ngaol.
Naol khaqma jaol naol laiq. Jaol haq neq, thaq kovq. Naol khaqma maq jaol-ail laiq. Maq jaol haq neq, thaq hevq.

Naol khaqma hevq khi ngaol-aoq, oeqbal nl-a nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqmai-aq iqsanl maol ail khi ngaol-aoq, oeqbal nl-a nail maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaqma hevq, maol ail nail tsaol-aq, aqsivq haqjoil phao ya haq ya aoq nail ngaol. Haq nail aoq nail al nee, ngal nuljuq bhai bhi jel-ail movq-ail nial.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aqyanq micil taivq-ail jiav nail ngaol dai, ngal ge movq-ail nial. Niil aq-il nee aqdoevq niailhai doevq yaoq. Khaqma jaol nail tsaol-aq, khaqma maq jaol nail khe-ai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Nioilkhaoq khaoq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq, maq nioil nail khe-ai, doevq yaoq. Lavqkhiq tsail nail tsaol-aq, lavqkhiq maq tsail nail khe-ai, doevq yaoq. Yalkav ul nail tsaol-aq, yalkav maq jiav nail khe-ai, doevq yaoq.
Miltsaq kovtavq khe ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai yuq nail juq, maq yuq nail khe-ai, doevq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq bhai jiav nail juq phal lal thailthaiq, peivq-ail thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai khaoq maq bhi laol movq-il. Khaqma maq jaol nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail neema tsaq dai, aivq nail ganl bhai aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq nia nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaqma jaol nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail khaqma neema tsaq dai, miltsaq khe ganl juq bhai khaoqlaol nail ngaol.

Aivq nvq phaq nvq phaq-ail ya saol-nvq nail ngaol. Yaqyov-aq maq jaol nail yaqmai-aq khi yaqmai-aq yaqnoil juq neq, aqmaol phao khi aqhaqlal phao meeq lal haol lal dai, Miqyail nail ganl bhai aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqyov-aq jaol nail yaqmai-aq neq, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq neema tsaq dai, miltsaq khe ganl bhai khaoqlaol nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq dai, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khabal nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq neema pov pov lav lav dai, maq pevq mail nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq bhai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil aqmeeq-ai nl nia dai, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol.

Yaqyov-aq teevq gaq, khaqma maq hevq nail neq, aqmeeq ngaol dai, noeq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail hevq naol dai, noeqceiv-ai thaq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai gaiq-a deedee khi yaqmai-aq al gaq iqsanl, maol ail nail yanq jel ail-a nail ngaol. Alhai ngel haq neq, hevq kivq naol. Oeqbal maq ngel-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqyov-aq al gaq yovqgavq nail neema ivqdao dai thaq khi, yovqgavq nail neekhaol bhai yovqgavq gaq lai nia nail lavqkhoel nee, yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai maq hevq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, khaqma hevq nail tsaol-aq neq, tsaq nail phaq nl-a nail kheel ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khaqma maq hevq nail tsaol-aq neq, a dai nee maqtsil tsaq nail phaq nl-a nail kheel ngaol.

Khaqma juq neq, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq maq sil-u kev dai, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq-i mail leel jaoq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq sil haq neq, maol ail movq nail gaq bhai maol ail kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul bhai juq nail lavqkhoel nee taivq-ail, ya maol ail nail ngaol.

Maq maol ail dai jaol kivq haq neq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol. Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi ge nail ngaol dai, noeq nail ngaol.

Thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq nail jaqjaq daoldaol nail ganl neq, niailhai ngaol. “Ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, neenoeq neekha aol naol” dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neenoeq neekha neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai neema bhi eeq lal khi, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail ngaol.
“Ngal neenoeq neekha aol naol” dai, teevq gaq ganav noeq haq neq, aivq heeq kivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq bhai, maq heeq nia heeq thaq-al.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, Miqyail bhai gaiq-a haq neq, Miqyail aivq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq nail jaqjaq daoldaol jaq nail ganl neq, niailhai ngaol. Thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel neq, maq doevq-ail. Aqsil ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol. Miqyail teevq gaq maq ngel nail neq, Miqyail yaoq gaq yaoq maq jaol-ail dai iqsanl, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Nqtavq kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, miqyail dai khul nail maodai jaol khi, miqyail khi mail aqheel maodai gaq jaol nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail Miqyail neq, teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngadao nail Aqbhu ngaol. Aivq nail lavqkhoel nee yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee pevq dov lal khi, ngadao iqsanl aivq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Yeiqsul Khali ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee pevq lal khi, aivq bhaqda nee ngadao aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail neenoeq neekha al bhai maq heeq nia-ail. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq jel lal-u phao, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai thaqeeq daiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yanqgaol kev dai, jaqjaq daoldaol niil neq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq nail phaq ngaol dai, saol-nvq khi jaq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail heeq nia nail neema alhai gaq bhaq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil aqjiivq aqcavq phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Jaqjaq daoldaol bhaqda nee, ngadao khi Miqyail nail gaiqlaq aqtsaoq tsaoq tavq nail bhai bhi meeq jaiq lal nail phaq maq ngel-ail. Ngadao maq jaq-a nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq theq ail-a nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Ngadao jaq-a nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq yaq jaiq nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nl kivq khi ngaol-aoq, gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil phaqthiq thiq duq maq jiav dai, yaolphaol yaoq.

Naol alheel nail neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq bhai thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel jiav nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai jaoldeel khi jaq thailthaiq nail dai, ge yaoq. Heeq nia nail neema gaq bhaq nail teevq gaq naol jaq nail bhai moel haq neq, aivq neema eeq lal khi, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq-a nail jaqjaq daoldaol jaq nail ngaol laq.
Naol alhai nl haq neq, naoq nail neenoeq neekha al bhaqda nee, gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq cov-ail nail ngaol. Aqivq jaqbheq al gaq nail haqbhoil iqsanl Khali khanqsil-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai alhai nl bheeq khi, aqyu juq nail gaq bhaq nail heeq nia nail neema bhai lavq nal bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq Khali bhai iqsanl nl bheeq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai phal-iq neq, jaqjaq daoldaol bhaqda nee ngal ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai bhi laiq bhi tsa-ail haq neq, ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq maq ya laiq maq ya tsa-ail dai, ngal haqjoil maq jaq yaoq-aol.

Ngal neq, jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail laiq. Ngal gaqkhoel iqsanl, maq ngel ail laiq. Ngal ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai ya moel-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Nuljuq neq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel-ai ngaq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail ganl, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Ngal neq, yu nail haqbhoil gaqkhoel maq ngel khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil gaqkhoel ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Yeiqsul nail gaqkhoel pevq nail salkhil neq, nuljuq ngaol.
Yu ngaq bhai tsao tsel lal haq neq, ngal niailhai ge kovq bhiq nail ngaol.
Nv-nvq gaq-i mail ganl nl-a nail aqphoiq, ngal jaq nail daol nail maq geel-nvq-ail laiq.

Gaqkhoel yaoq juq yaoq khi Yeiqsul nail jaqbheq maqkhaiq, Bheiqtuvluv aqyu juq, yovqgavq nail khaqma yovqgavq hevq khi tsao nail aqkhaoqanq jiav nail ngaol. Nv-nvq gaq iqsanl aqyu juq khe-ai, neema thaqtsaol nail khaqma hevq khi tsao nail aqkhaoqanq maq jiav-ail laiq.
Bhaqnaqbhal nv-nvq gaq taivq-ail yovqgavq nail aqlavq-i mail ganl ya nl jaq nail laiq.

Yovqgavq nail phul yuq khi genl dev nail tsaol-aq jiovq nail jaol naol laiq. Aqheeq tsilju nail gaoqkhail nl khi aqheeq tsilju aqheeq maq koevq jaq nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq. Yaol tsu khi yaol nail aqtsil maq nieivq daol nail tsaol-aq jaol naol laiq.
Ngal niailhai ge nail niil neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail neenoeq ge nail ngel-ail laiq. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl alhai gevq-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

“Gov bhai bhi naoq thailthaiq nail niaoqnel bhai moeqkeivq thaq keivq” dai, Molseiq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol. Miqyail alhai ge-ai thaq nail al, niaoqnel bhai ge movq-ail teevq-eel laiq.

Ngadao juq bhai ge movq nail maq ngel-ail laiq. Ngel naol. Ngadao juq nail haqbhoil ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Daiyal tseq nail gaq maqkhaiq, gov deeq nail gaq maqkhaiq, gov ya lal nail bhai noeqthunq khi nl nail ngaol.
Nv-nvq gaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel aqhaqlal phao khe aqiq haiq khi, aqsivq haqjoil phao khe gov ya gaiq haq neq, nvjuq nl bheeq-a nail ngaol dai, nuljuq noeq nail laiq.

Tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq nuljuq nail aqsivq haqjoil phao khe gov gaiq nail aqkhaoqanq jiav haq neq, nvjuq neq, a dai nee maqtsil, aqkhaoqanq jiav nail, maq ngel-ail laiq. Nv-nvq gaq aqkhaoqanq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, alhai maq nl-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai maq ya lav tsoiq dai, nv-nvq gaq iqsanl bhai ol nail ngaol.

Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai ganl nl nail tsaol-aq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai tavq nail jaqjaq daoldaol ya jaq khi, laol duq bhai ganl nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, laol bhiq-ai thaq nail teevq pav ganav juq bhai ya bhi jaq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq.
Alhai dul dai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail juq iqsanl, geeqlaoq daoq al cavq nail ngel-i mail, ya jaq ya daol nail ngaol dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul daoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngal alhai nl nail aqkhaoqanq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, maq nl. Nuljuq ngaq bhai alhai bhi nl bhiq movq nail ngel-i mail, ngal haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail maq ngel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq-i mail neema eeq duq jiav nail niilniai tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav lav peivq lav boev lal nail nee maqtsil, ngal sil nail neq, meeq nail ngaol.

Ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail neq, ngal neema eeq duq maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail ngaq bhai bhi cavq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, maq cavq mail khul maq khi kivq-ail. Maq ngel haq neq, ngaq bhai geeqlaoq aqdoil kev lee nail ngaol.
Ngal nl movq nail phaq tsel khi nl haq neq, aqphoiq ya nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ganl niil ganl Miqyail-i mail ngaq bhai av lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal ya nl nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngal khul nail aqphoiq ya nail-aiq. Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq-u phao, aqphoiq oil nail aqkhaoqanq jiav khi ngaol-aoq maq oil-a nail al neq, ngal ya nail geeqlaoq ngaol.
Ngal tsaol-aq teevq gaq nail yaqkav maq ngel khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq maodai gaq nail neema bhai gaq lai khi, Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail yaqkav pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil ngal Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khe-ai aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol. Ngal aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai maq jaol khi ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Maldil dai, ge haq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai ngaq nail haqbhoil aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav nail maq ngel-ail. Ngal Khali nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol.

Gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, ngal aqyu juq nail haqbhoil gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Khalhai khi mail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nia dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil, ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee pevq daiq gil-aoq nail ngaol.
Ngal iqsanl, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail geeqlaoq bhai ya dai, geeqlaoq daoq al nail haqbhoil, al juq iqsanl bhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaoq doel pheeljaq-u phao, tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail tsaoq doel pheeljaq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq taivq-ail kovpavq ya nail ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq kovpavq ya dai, laijai khi tsaoq yaoq.

Tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail bhaoqaiq lavqkhoel-ai tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee ol ol-ail ya tsaoq jao nail ngaol. Aqyu juq luq-ail seil-ail nia nail aqeiv nail uqtsaoq ya dai, laijai nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao neq, maq luq maq seil-ail nia nail uqtsaoq bhai ya dai, laijai thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal gaq lai dai, noeq cov-ai khi tsaoq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqlavq-i mail thaoq pheeljaq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao, ngal aqnieivq-ail lilmoel bhai thaoq nail khe-ai maq thaoq-ail.

Ngal yu bhai daoq cavq daoq cov cov gaq haq neq, khaonq ha-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq ngal maq ya pevq dai, ngaq nail aqmaol bhai ngal thaoq thaoq-ail khi, ngaq nail aqmaol niil ngaq nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aq-u khe ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Molseiq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq nqdil nail kov-uvq bhai jaol khi, iqyaq iqma bhai ceiv-a nail ngaol.
Molseiq nail yaqlaol jiovq nail haqbhoil aqyu juq iqsanl mail nqdil khi iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq iqsanl aqhaqlal phao jaq nail phaq teevq phaq taivq-ail jaq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aqhaqlal phao daol nail phaq teevq phaq taivq-ail daol-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqhaqlal nail lovphail aqyu juq nail haoqnao tsaothe khi, lovphail al nee dov lee-a nail ulcuvq aqyu juq daol-a nail ngaol. Lovphail al neq, Khali ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aqyu juq jemao bhai neekhaol maq sil-ail. Aqyu juq haqaiq mildai haqtsoiq haqyal bhai ya sil-a nail ngaol.
Niil neq, aqyu juq khe-ai haqeiv nail phaq bhai ngadao maq nl mail yaolphaol nia lal dai, saol oil duq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq pevq nail khe-ai, nuljuq thaq pevq. Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, “Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq jaoldeel khi jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, thul khi bhoeloe nioi nioi-ail aoltavq tavq nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq khaqmiq sev nail ngaol. Ngadao alhai maq ya nl-ail. Aqyu juq alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, teevq n taivq-ail aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel-ai nvq meel-nvq hail hinl gaq ya sil-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq Khali bhai laonqdaiq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao alhai maq ya nl-ail. Aqyu juq alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, eellel-i mail aqyu juq bhai tuv heivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq teevq pav ganav juq Miqyail bhai daoq govq dov-a nail ngaol. Ngadao alhai maq ya nl-ail. Aqyu juq alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, sil nail phaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee, ya luq ya seil ail-a nail ngaol.

Yu yaolphaol nia lal dai, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai al juq pevq lal khi, haoqnao naosaq khe aqn aqyanq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail, ngadao bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail dai khi, Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Ngal ivqdao dai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav noeq haq neq, aivq maq ya tsuq-ail dai, yaolphaol nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail ya daq daiq-a nail jalmul mul nail juq taivq-ail, nuljuq ya daq nail ngaol. Miqyail saljial ivq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq maq daq tsaol nail jalmul mul nail phaq nuljuq ya daq dai, aivq maq bhi kev lee-ail. Jalmul mul nail phaq ya daq-u phao, nuljuq daq tsaol dai, nuljuq ya jel-ail nail gailkhaol Miqyail lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol.
