Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai teevq peivq-ail uqhuq thaq thaoq.
Nuljuq neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ngal saol-nvq khi ge bhiq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ge nail tsaq maq tsaq dai, nuljuq saol-nvq daiq yaoq.

Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail, geeqlaoq eeq nail khaoqanq nail haqbhoil ngadao Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-u phao, ngadao Khali nail aqsivq bhai tavq nail ngaol dai, ge movq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq. Ngadao-i mail ngaoqpav nail khaqmul neq, Khali nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai ngadao teevq gaq khe-ai tavq nail ngaol dai, ge movq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Khaqmul teevq heeq taivq-ail jiav nail ngel-i mail, ngadao mee nia gaq bhee khi ngaol-aoq, aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail pevq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee khaqmul teevq heeq teevq-eel bhai teevq gaq khe-ai jaq nail ngaol.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Laol bhiq nail phaq bhai jaq nail tsaol-aq, laol duq bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq ngaol laq.
Ngal khul dai ge movq nail dai ngal-aq neq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq nail phaq khi mail thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel neq, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq. Khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, laolkivq yaq-i mail laol bhiq nail phaq neq, Miqyail bhai laol bhiq nail maq ngel-ail. Neivq bhai laol bhiq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai neivq nee mail maq bhi tavq movq-ail.
Nuljuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail khaoqanq bhai daol haq neq, neivq nail khaoqanq bhai maq daol kivq-ail. Yeiqsul nail kovqkhail bhai jaoldeel haq neq, neivq nail kovqkhail bhai maq jaol deeq kivq-ail.
Miqyail neema phail lal dai, ngadao nl naol laiq. Ngadao aivq nee maqtsil gaq kav nail laiq.

Nuljuq neq, “Ngadao yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl kivq nail aqkhaoqanq jiav nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Nl kivq khi ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ganl tsoiq nail maq ngel-ail. “Ngadao yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl kivq nail aqkhaoqanq jiav nail ngaol.” Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhi eeq bhi heel lal nia nail maq ngel-ail.
Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq bhai tavq nail phaq bhai taivq-ail thaq saol-nvq. Yu bhai tavq nail juq bhai iqsanl saol-nvq yaoq.
Nuljuq leiv bhai lai-u phao, heeq kivq nail neema bhaqda nee, maq naldaiq dai, a bhai gaoq nail haqjoil ul jaq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq khi miltsaq kovtavq-ai khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee Heeqphaq Miqyail nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, aqbhee bhee nail lavqkhoel-ai naoq bhai khul lal-u phao, naol ail movq haq neq, khal tsiq dal lavq nail juq bhai jaq yaoq. Heeq kivq nail neema bhaqda nee khul teevq phaq-ail thaq naldaiq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Niil neq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, teevq gaq ganav naoq bhai ge lal haq neq, naoq bhai ge lal nail al gaq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, heeq kivq nail neema bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, thaq jaq.

Heeq kivq nail neema dai ge nail neq, naoq-i mail heeq kivq nail neema bhai ge movq nail maq ngel. Ge lal-a al gaq-i mail heeq nia nail neema bhai ge movq-ail nial. Ngal nl nail aqkhaoqanq jiav nail juq bhai yu-i mail heeq nia nail neema bhai khul khi mail lav tsoiq nail ngel-ail.
Ngal Miqyail nail geeqlaoq bhai noeq kev khi jaq haq neq, aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail jaq khi ngaol-aoq, khul khi mail yu ngaq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge lal nail ngel-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq jaq nail maqkhaiq, daol nail maqkhaiq, khul nl nail maqkhaiq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel yu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq dai, nl yaoq.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhaqda nee phaqthiq thiq duq thaq bhi jiav.
Ngal iqsanl, tsaol-aq maodai hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngaq nail neekhaol teevq sil maq nl mail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel yu neekhaol sil dai, ngal laijai nail ngaol.
Ngal Khali bhai saol oil-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl ngaq bhai saol oil yaoq.
Nuljuq ngaq bhai khaq mao iqsanl noeq kev khi, ngaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail daoq juq iqsanl bhai tsaothe nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq naol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Yaqyov-aq nail uqhuq neq, Khali ngaol. Yaqmai-aq nail uqhuq neq, yaqyov-aq ngaol. Khali nail uqhuq neq, Miqyail ngaol.
Yaqyov-aq teevq gaq, geeqlaoq hal-u phao maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail daoq gedan-u phao maqkhaiq, uqjeeq jeeq haq neq, yovqgavq nail uqhuq pevq nail Khali bhai khal nl movq-ail nl nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaqmai-aq teevq gaq, geeqlaoq hal-u phao maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail daoq gedan-u phao maqkhaiq, uqjeeq maq jeeq haq neq, yovqgavq nail uqhuq pevq nail aivq nail yovjil bhai khal nl movq-ail nl nail ngaol. Aivq uqjeeq maq jeeq haq neq, aivq uqhuq tsailkheel he ha-ai thaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq uqjeeq maq jeeq haq neq, uqhuq tsailkheel thaiq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, uqhuq tsailkheel thaiq nail maqkhaiq, uqhuq tsailkheel he ha nail maqkhaiq, yaqmai-aq nail haqbhoil haqsil nail phaq pevq haq neq, uqjeeq jeeq dei-eiq.

Yaqyov-aq neq, Miqyail khe-ai dul nail phaq aol khi, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dov duq pevq nail ngel-i mail, uqjeeq jeeq nail maq tsaq-ail. Yaqmai-aq neq, yaqyov-aq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dov duq pevq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail tsaol-aq bhai teivq-u phao, yaqmai-aq nee mail yaqyov-aq bhai teivq-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqyov-aq nee mail yaqmai-aq bhai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, yaqmai-aq nail haqbhoil yaqyov-aq bhai teivq-ai thaq nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqyov-aq nail haqbhoil yaqmai-aq bhai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai saol-nvq khi, yaqmai-aq juq uqjeeq jeeq nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel-ai yaqmai-aq yaqyov-aq bhai loq nail khe-ai, yaqyov-aq iqsanl yaqmai-aq bhai loq nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq neq, yaqyov-aq nee mail pevq dov lal-a nail khe-ai, yaqyov-aq iqsanl yaqmai-aq nee mail doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee pevq dov lal-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq uqjeeq maq jeeq dai, Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail, maq tsaq nail, nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai nuljuq saol-nvq dai yaoq.
Yaqyov-aq juq tsailkheel heelma neq, aivq nail haqbhoil haqsil nail phaq pevq nail ngaol dai, aqsivq haqjoil phao nuljuq heeq kivq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Yaqmai-aq tsailkheel heelma neq, aivq nail khaoqsail pevq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nail tsailkheel neq, aivq bhai bhi covq pheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav jil pheeljaq movq haq neq, nvjuq iqsanl, Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl juq iqsanl aol yaoq phaq yaoq maq jiav-ail dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, pul-nvq phao cavq bhi cov bhiq-ai thaq nail ganl bhai tavq lai khi, ngal nuljuq bhai maq tsiqeeq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq teevq dao bhai jil lai khi uqhuq thaoq nail al neq, aqmeeq phaq nee maqtsil aqdoil phaq bhi dov lal jaiq nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq teevq phaq neq, nuljuq Khali yaq munl jil lai-u phao, munl bhoilpav nail ngaol dai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, tsaq nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq aqmeeq juq dov lal nia dai, munl bhoilpav nail phaq ya jiav nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq jil lai-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai noeq kev khi jaq nail bhaoqaiq lav sav nail khi jil lai nail, maq ngel-il.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq alhai jaq-u phao, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq-i mail oil lavq-a nail phaq bhai jaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, teevq pav ganav juq neq, maq ya jaq bov-ail, teevq pav gaq nav juq neq, al jaiq jaq jel khi jaq bov daol bov nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail ilkhaol bhai jaq duq daol duq maq jiav nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, nuljuq Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl bhai khal nl movq-ail nl khi, haq nail aoq nail juq bhai bhi haqsil nail dai khi, nl movq nail laiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai khalhai ge bhi heeq. Nuljuq alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq kivq nail laiq. Maq tsiqeeq kivq-ail.

Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq nail juq, Yeiqsul-i mail ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul neq, yu aivq bhai gaoq jaq-u nqkiv, khaqmul oil khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, khaqmul ngaoqpav khi ge nail: “Niil neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ngaq nail aqmaol ngaol. Ngaq bhai ya noeq kev dai, niailhai nl yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq aoq kivq jaq gaq-u phao, alhai dul dai, aivq aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail khaoqanq tsiq khi ge nail: “Khaoqanq niil neq, ngaq nail aqsivq lavqkhoel-ai daoqma saljial aqsivq ngaol. Nuljuq yaoq pov yaoq-ao nee daol-u phao, ngaq bhai noeq kev yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq khaqmul niil jaq khi, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul niil daol-u phao, yaoq pov yaoq-ao nee, Yeiqsul yavq kha lee-u phao kev dai, aivq sil-a nail al, nuljuq salkhil khanqdaiq bhiq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, maq geel-nvq nail bhai khaqmul jaq khi Yeiqsul nail khaoqanq bhai daol haq neq, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol khi aivq nail aqsivq bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq iqmoeq saol-nvq daiq khi pultavq, khaqmul jaq khi khaoqanq tsiq daol nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Niil neq, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol ngaol” dai, maq noeq kev mail khaqmul jaq khi khaoqanq tsiq daol haq neq, alhai jaq daol-a nail bhaqda nee, yovqgavq nail kovtavq bhai yalkhaq dal nail phaq kev lee dai, nl nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, gaq bhaq nail juq khi mail nal nail juq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai maodai gaq jaol nail ngaol. Sil-a nail juq iqsanl, teevq pav ganav juq jaol nail ngaol.
Ngadao yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq iqmoeq tsao tseldaiq gaq haq neq, Miqyail-i mail yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai maq ya daq-ail.

Haoqnao naosaq n-gaol, Heeqphaq Miqyail ngadao bhai yalkhaq dal-u phao, miltsaq yaq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai dal lavq nail bhai maq ya daq dai, niil aq-il aivq ngadao bhai cavq lavq cov lavq khi deeq lavq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq Yeiqsul bhai noeq kev khi jaq nail daol nail haqbhoil jil lai-u phao, teevq gaq khe-ai daonq jil daonq ja yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq aoq moevq haq neq, aivq nail ilkhaol bhai jaq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Maq ngel haq neq, nuljuq-i mail jil lai nail al, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai yalkhaq bhi dal nail dai khi, jil lai nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Ganl yaoq juq yaoq neq, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lal-u phao, aqmeeq-ai ge bhiq naol dei-eiq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq juq nail ganl nuljuq heeq nia lal dai, ngal oil movq-ail nial.
Nuljuq laolkivq yaq pevq-u phao, yu nuljuq bhai hel-aivq nail khe-ai, nuljuq tsaothe khi, daoq maq ge nia nail thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal bhai juq juq-ail, Yeiqsul bhai iqkhail maq yavq-ail. Al ovqtavq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai maq juq haq neq, “Yeiqsul neq, Heeqphaq ngaol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq ge nia-ail.
Kovpavq maodai phaq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.
Miqyail nail ganl maodai phaq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, Heeqphaq teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.
Nl dol lavq nail ganl maodai phaq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel-ai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhi nl dol lavq nail gaq, Miqyail teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.
Yu nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail aivq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, teevq gaq bhai teevq phaq bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, teevq gaq bhai neenoeq neekha aol nail daoq ge nia thail nia dai, bivq-a nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail al, teevq gaq bhai maodai phaq heeq nia khi al juq bhai ge nia thail nia nail phaq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail al, teevq gaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivq dai, bivq-a nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail al, teevq gaq bhai nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai lav meeq nia nail kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Teevq pav ganav juq bhai neq, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl nia dai kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nia nail kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai neq, aqhaqlal juq bhai tsel pav nia nail kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai neq, daoq mee nia phaq ge nia dai kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai neq, daoq al juq nail daoqceevq oil dov nia dai kovpavq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Kovpavq al juq iqsanl mail Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq nail lavqkhoel nee taivq-ail dov lee khi, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq bhai bhi bivq-a nail ngaol.
Aqmaol teevq maol teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, alsail maodai covq nail ngaol. Alsail al juq mao khi ngaol-aoq, aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail pevq nail khe-ai, Khali iqsanl alheel ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khi Heiqlaqsal nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, yaqkav khi jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, ngadao iqsanl mail aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail pevq dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq teevq-eel nail lavqkhoel ulcuvq saol-a nail ngaol. Ngadao iqsanl nail neema lavqkhoel bhai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol.
Aqmaol neq, alsail teevq sail teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Maodai covq nail ngaol.
“Ngal aqlavq maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol bhai maq tavq-ail” dai, aqkhil ge khi ngaol-aoq, alhai ge nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol bhai maq tavq nail maq ngel-ail.
“Ngal maivneev maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol bhai maq tavq-ail” dai, naqkhaol ge khi ngaol-aoq, alhai ge nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol bhai maq tavq nail maq ngel-ail.
Aqmaol maol lao-ail maivneev teevq-eel nul neq, khalhai khi gaiq nia nail-aiq. Aqmaol maol lao-ail naqkhaol teevq-eel nul neq, khalhai khi huq nil nia nail-aiq.
Miqyail aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aqmaol nail alsail juq bhai yovqgavq nail covq duq covq yal bhai bhi covq-a nail ngaol.
Alsail iqsanl mail teevq phaq taivq-ail pevq haq neq, aqmaol khalhai pevq nia nail-aiq.
Alsail mee nia phaq dai tselpav khi ngaol-aoq, aqmaol teevq maol teevq-eel ngaol.
“Ngal naoq bhai maq loq-ail” dai, maivneev aqlavq bhai maq ge nia-ail. “Ngal naoq bhai maq loq-ail” dai, uqhuq iqsanl aqkhil bhai maq ge nia-ail.
Aqnuq ngaol dai, ngadao-i mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail alsail juq iqsanl aqmaol bhai ya bhi covq nail ngaol.

Khaoqsail maq jiav-ail dai, ngadao-i mail saol-nvq nail alsail juq bhai yaoq juq yaoq-ao nee maqtsil khaoqsail bhi jiav jaiq lal dai, ngadao lav sav nail ngaol. Yu bhai maq bhi moel khaoq nail alsail juq bhai yu nee maqtsil ya lav tsoiq nail ngaol.

Heldaiq meeq nail alsail juq bhai alhai nl nail maq loq-ail. Miqyail aqmaol bhai bhi covq cavq-u phao, aqmaol khe alsail juq maq peiv maq leiv-ail dai, teevq phaq nee teevq phaq saol-nvq tsaq khi tsaojao-ai nia dai, aivq alsail aqnuq juq bhai khaoqsail bhi jiav jaiq-a nail ngaol.
Alsail teevq sail ya daq haq neq, alsail iqsanl mail ya tsao daq nail ngaol. Alsail teevq sail khaoqsail ya haq neq, alsail iqsanl mail lavqkhiq tsao tsail nail ngaol.
Nuljuq neq, Khali nail aqmaol ngaol. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqmaol al nail alsail juq ngaol.

Miqyail neq, Khali yaq munl lavqkhoel bhai tsaol-aq niil juq bhi jaol-a nail ngaol. Iqmoeq khe juq neq, gaqkhoel juq ngaol. Nvq munl teevq munl neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq ngaol. Hail munl teevq munl neq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail juq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl nia nail juq, nal nail goel nail tsaol-aq bhai lav meeq bhiq nia nail juq, yu bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq nail juq, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq juq khi, daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail juq, bhi jaol-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee gaqkhoel maq ngel-ail. Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl nia nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail.

Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nalgoel lav meeq nia nail maq ngel-ail. Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee daoq mee nia phaq ge ge-ail tsiqeeq nia nail maq ngel-ail. Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee daoq al juq nail daoqceevq oil dov nia nail maq ngel-ail.
Nuljuq eeq jaiq meeq jaiq nail kovpavq bhai oil movq deedee yaoq. A bhai nee ngal-aq, iqsanl nee mail maqtsil meeq nail gailkhaol ngal nuljuq bhai cavq naq lavq bhel.

Ngal neq, tsaol-aq nail daoq juq khi nqtavq gaqkhoel nail daoq juq ge kivq khi ngaol-aoq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maq aol haq neq, bhoeloe deeq nail aqthel khi tsaillail tsiq nail aqthel khe-ai taivq-ail dul nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail kovpavq ya nail gaq pevq nail maqkhaiq, Miqyail-i mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail iqsanl khi neenoeq neekha iqsanl bhai heeq nia nail maqkhaiq, gaoqjaoq bhai bhi jiiv-ail nia dai, neema thaqtsaol nail neema teevq bhee aol nail maqkhaiq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maq aol haq neq, ngal khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.

Ngaq nail nlmaoq iqsanl yu bhai bivq gil khi, ngaq nail aqmaol miqjaq bhai bavq poiv khi laol bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maq aol haq neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, neenoeq heelma ma dai noeq khi, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, yu bhai maivjeel maq jeel-ail. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq maq tsiqeeq-ail, eeq movq heel movq nail neema maq aol-ail.
Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, khal nl movq-ail maq nl-ail. Yovqgavq nail neekhaol maq halpov-ail. Neema lavqtsail mail maq phail-ail. Yu-i mail nl lavq-a nail oeqbal bhai maq noeq thaq-ail.
Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, haqeiv nail phaq bhai lavqkhiq maq tsail-ail. Aqtsaq aqdaol phaq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol.
Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, iqsanl bhai khanqtsaol khi iqsanl bhai neema thaqtsaol khi, iqsanl bhai noeqthunq khi, iqsanl bhai oltsaol nail ngaol.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, maq peivq-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail phaq maqkhaiq, daoq mee nia phaq ge nail phaq maqkhaiq, maodai phaq heeq nia nail phaq maqkhaiq, peivq-ail boev-ail nia nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il, ngadao juq-i mail heeq kivq nail juq neq, maq bhee-ai haq-al. Ngadao Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan khi ngaol-aoq, maq bhee-ai haq-al.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, bhee lovq nail phaq kev lee-u phao, maq bhee lovq nail phaq peivq-ail nail ngaol.

Ngal yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao, yaqnoil khe-ai ge nail thail nail nee ovqtavq, yaqnoil nail neema aol khi yaqnoil khe-ai noeq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal yovkav eeq lal-u phao, yaqnoil bhai tavq nail juq khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il ngadao neq, maq moel haol lal nail phaoqdaiq bhai heldaiq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqyanq al kev lee haq neq, ya moel duq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il ngaq-i mail heeq kivq nail niil neq, maq bhee lovq-ai haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il Miqyail ngaq bhai heeq nia nail khe-ai, aq-u n-gaol kev lee haq neq, ngal teevq bhee teevq lovq ya heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il neq, neema thaqtsaol nail, noeqthunq nail, goil nail gaiq-a nail, niil hail phaq ivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil hail phaq nail lavqkhoel, eeq jaiq nail phaq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq ngaol.
Goil nail gaiq-a nail haoqnao laijai laijai-ail tsaothe yaoq. Aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq bhai oil movq deedee yaoq. Iqsanl nee maqtsil Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail kovpavq bhai oil movq yaoq.

Daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail tsaol-aq neq, tsaol-aq bhai daoq ge tsaoq nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nee mail ge tsaoq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail aivq-i mail ge nail daoq bhai maq gov heeq nia-ail. Oil tsail-ai thaq nail juq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee aivq ge nail thail nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai daoq ge tsaoq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail ngaol. Daoq al juq neq, gaq bivq nail nee ovqtavq, neesal bhiq ovq nail ngaol.

Daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail tsaol-aq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq neq, Khali yaq munl bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl mail daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial. A dai nee maqtsil, nuljuq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nia dai, ngal oil movq jaiq-ail nial. Daoq meeq nia phaq ge nia nail tsaol-aq, Khali yaq munl eeq lal heel lal dai, daoqceevq maq oil dov bhiq kivq haq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq aivq nee maqtsil ganl tsoiq jaiq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lal khi, daoq mee nia phaq ge nia haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq naol laiq. Miqyail-i mail phaodaiq lavq-a nail daoq, maodai phaq heeq nia nail phaq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail daoq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail daoq, niil heel nail daoq teevq daoq ganav ngal nuljuq bhai maq cavq bhiq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Alhai dul dai, aqdoevq maq ngel nail tsil lil maqkhaiq, dil-nvq maqkhaiq, aqthel maljiaov dai maq dov lal haq neq, khul phaq nail aqthel bhi dov lal movq nail dai, khalhai khi heeq kivq heeq.
Nqbho jiiv nail aqthel iqsanl maljiaov dai, maq jiiv dol lavq haq neq, genl dev ail nail dai, khaq sil gaq lainq nail-aiq.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq daoq ge-u phao, yu gov heeq nia dai maq ge haq neq, naol ge nail daoq bhai khaq sil ga heeq nia nail-aiq. Nuljuq aqnieivq bhai ge bhiq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq bhai daoq mee nia phaq jiav nail ngaol. Daoq al juq nail lavqkhoel, daoqceevq maq bhao nail teevq daoq-ail maq jiav-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoq al juq nail daoqceevq bhai ngal maq heeq kivq haq neq, daoq ge thailthaiq nail gaq nail sivtavq bhai ngal yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq khe tsaol-aq pevq khi, daoq ge thailthaiq nail al gaq iqsanl, ngaq nail sivtavq bhai yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq khe tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq iqsanl, aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq bhai oil movq deedee nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, Khali yaq munl bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail kovpavq juq bhai, laijai laijai-ail halpov yaoq.
Alheel ngel-i mail, daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, daoqceevq oil dov kivq dai, geeqlaoq hal nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ngal daoq mee nia phaq ge ge-ail geeqlaoq hal haq neq, ngaq nail aqhaqlal geeqlaoq hal khi ngaol-aoq, ngal neema maq kev-ail.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, khalhai khi heeq. Ngaq nail aqhaqlal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Ngaq nail neema iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Ngaq nail aqhaqlal gul khi tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Ngaq nail neema iqsanl gul khi tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Naoq nail aqhaqlal taivq-ail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq haq neq, aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq maq ya-a nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq, naol tsiqeeq nail daoq bhai maq gov heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, Aqmiq dai, khalhai khi ge nia nail-aiq.
Naol aqmeeq-ai tsiqeeq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al gaq bhai maq bhi eeq maq bhiq heel lal nia-ail.
Ngal nuljuq iqsanl nee maqtsil daoq mee nia phaq ge kivq nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Khali yaq munl jil lai-u phao, daoq mee nia phaq ge nail lavqkhoel nee, daoq teevq meel-nvq daoq ge nail nee maqtsil ngal yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq kivq dai, saol-nvq saol-nvq-ail daoq ngaq daoq taivq-ail ge movq-ail nial.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq neenoeq noeq pov noeq phal nail phao neq, yaqnoil khe-ai thaq pevq. Haqeiv nail phao neq, yaqbeiv khe-ai pevq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neenoeq noeq pov noeq phal nail phaoq neq, yovkav juq khe-ai, pevq yaoq.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Heeqphaq Miqyail ge nail:
‘Yu nail daoq
ge nia nail tsaol-aq bhai
juq nail lavqkhoel,
ngaq nail tsaol-aq
niil juq bhai
ngal daoq ge tsao
lee nail ngaol.
Yaoq khaoq yaoq
mil yaoq bhai jaol nail
yu nail moeqthaoq
bhai juq khi
aqyu juq bhai ngal daoq
ge tsao khi ngaol-aoq,
ngaq nail daoq bhai
maq naldaiq-ail’ dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol”.

Alheel ngel-i mail, daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail phaq neq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq pevq nail maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail phaq neq, Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ngaol.

Khali yaq munl munl lao-ail jil lai khi yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee daoq mee nia phaq ge thailthaiq-u phao, maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq khi Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq aol lal-u phao, nuljuq bhai naiquq uq-ail gil-aoq thaq nail ngaol dai, maq ge lal-ail laiq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan thailthaiq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq khi maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq aol lal khi ngaol-aoq, daoq al bhai ya gaiq-a nail bhaqda nee, aqyu juq nail oeqbal phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, “Ngal oeqbal aol laoq thaq nail ngaol” dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq noeq heeq noeq moel lal bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai oil tsail-ai thaq nail juq iqsanl phaodaiq dol lavq nail lavqkhoel nee, peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol. “Miqyail nuljuq nee mail maldil jaol-ail nial” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq jil lai-u phao, gul gul-ail tsiqeeq nail, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail, phaodaiq bhiq nail, daoq mee nia phaq ge nail, al nail daoqceevq oil dov nail, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee teevq gaq teevq phaq nl nail ngaol. Yu eeq lal heel lal dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl yaoq.
Daoq mee nia phaq ge nia nail tsaol-aq jaol haq neq, nvq gaq hail gaq bhai taivq-ail bhi ge yaoq. Teevq gaq gil haq teevq gaq ge gaq haq neq, teevq gaq neq, daoqceevq bhi oil dov yaoq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoqceevq oil dov nail tsaol-aq maq jaol haq neq, daoq mee nia phaq ge nail al gaq Khali yaq munl lavqkhoel bhai aqtsi tsu dai bhiq naq lai khi, Miqyail khi mail aivq nail gaiqlaq bhai taivq-ail, ge nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq hail gaq bhi ge khi, yaoq juq yaoq neq, daoq al bhai bhi saol-nvq daiq yaoq.
A bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Miqyail-i mail phaodaiq bhiq nail teevq phaq ganav ya haq neq, daoq ge thailthaiq nail gaq bhai teevq yanq bhiq naq lai yaoq.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl saol oil khi, gaq kav lal dai, nuljuq iqsanl teevq gaq khi-a teevq gaq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan kivq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq aivq nail kovpavq yuq-u phao, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq ya gaq lai nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail neq, suqsaq nail phaq bhi dov lal nail gaq pevq nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq neq, neesal-ovq nail phaq bhi dov lal nail gaq pevq nail ngaol. Khali yaq munl lavqkhoel bhai aol jiav nail khe-ai, uqhuq thaoq-u phao, yaqmai-aq juq neq, daoq maq ge dai, aqtsi tsu dai jaol nail tsaq nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, yu nail kov-uvq bhai ya jaol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq teevq phaq ganav heeq kivq movq haq neq, ilkhaol bha kovq ail khi, yovqgavq nail yaqyov-aq bhai naldaiq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, uqhuq thaoq-u phao, daoq ge nail neq, haqsil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, nuljuq jaol nail bha taivq-ail kev lee nail laiq.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, “Ngal neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail gaq ngaol” dai, noeq nail maqkhaiq, “Ngal neq, Aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq ya-a nail ngaol” dai, noeq nail maqkhaiq, ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail juq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail bivq-a nail daoq ngaol dai, aivq heeq nia nail tsaq nail ngaol.
“Ngal maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, aivq ge haq neq, nvjuq iqsanl aivq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail kovpavq bhai oil movq deedee yaoq. Daoq meeq nia phaq ge nia nail bhai iqsanl thaq lav tsoiq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee heldaiq meeq dai, aivq nail jaol duq bhai tsaq dai nl yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al bhai, niil aq-il gaoq ge noeq bhiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq geeqlaoq daoq al bhai hav bhoel khi al nail lavqkhoel-ai jaol ivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Geeqlaoq daoq al bhaqda nee, nuljuq hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq-i mail cavq-a nail daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivqdao dai, maq aol haq neq, nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aqnieivq-ail pevq-ail nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail ya-ai thaq nail eeq deedee nail ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol. Ganl al neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Khali neq, ngadao nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngaol.
Luqdaol bhai duq pheeq-a nail ngaol. Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, hail n kev lal-a ngal-aq neq, aivq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqmaol Bheiqtuvluv bhai bivq moel gaq-al ngal-aq neq, gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngadao nail aqivq jaqbheq ngaq yal gaq jaiq dai bhai aivq nail aqmaol teevq pov bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al juq maodai teevq pav, niil aq-il kev dai, aqdoevq doevq-ai haq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, sil-aoq nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail aqmaol Yaqkov bhai bhi moel-a nail ngaol. Al nail haoqnao phao taivq-ail gaqkhoel iqsanl bhai, aivq nail aqmaol bhi moel-a nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, bhala aqheeq maq lovq nail yaqbeiv khe-ai dul khi ngaol-aoq, haoqnao naosaq khe pov aivq nail aqmaol ngaq bhai iqsanl bhi moel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, gaqkhoel nail lavqkhoel yu nee maqtsil theq nail gaq ngaol. Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl bhai khoeq bhi jiovq bhiq daiq-a nail ngel-i mail, yu ngaq bhai gaqkhoel dai khul nail bhai, ngal maq geel-nvq-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail neq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee mail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ya-a nail geeqlaoq niil aqnieivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Gaqkhoel yaoq juq yaoq nee maqtsil ngal ganl nl nail ngaol. Maldil dai, ge haq neq, ngaq-i mail nl-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi nl nail ngaol.
Ganl al bhai, ngal maqkhaiq, aqyu juq maqkhaiq, cavq nail cov nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl ganl al bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol.
Khali gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol dai, nvjuq daoq cavq cavq haq neq, sil nail tsaol-aq maq doevq kovq lal-ail dai, nuljuq teevq pav ganav juq khul khi mail ge nail-aiq.
Sil nail tsaol-aq maq doevq kovq lal haq neq, Khali iqsanl maq doevq kovq lal-ail.
Khali maq doevq kovq lal-a nail nul neq, nvjuq-i mail daoq cavq daoq cov cov nail neq, aqnieivq ngaol. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail iqsanl aqnieivq ngaol.

Al taivq-ail maq ngel-ail haq-al. Nvjuq neq, Miqyail nail ganl maq tsaq nail salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail Khali bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol dai, nvjuq Miqyail nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, sil nail tsaol-aq bhai maldil maq bhi doevq kovq lal haq neq, Khali bhai iqsanl Miqyail maq bhi doevq kovq lal-ail.
Sil nail tsaol-aq bhai maq bhi doevq kovq lal haq neq, Khali bhai iqsanl bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail maq ngel-ail.
Khali maq doevq kovq lal-a nail kheel nul neq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aqnieivq-ail pevq ail khi, nuljuq neq, nuljuq nail oeqbal nail kov-uvq bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol khi sil-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, luq-ail seil-ail gil nail ngaol.

Ngadao aqdoevq doevq-u phao taivq-ail, Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai noeqthunq nail phaq ya-ail teevq-eel phal-iq neq, ngadao neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nee maqtsil gaoqhaq lal heeq phaq-ail pevq nail juq ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Khali neq, maldil doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel khe iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhaqda nee, sil nail phaq kev lee-a nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhaqda nee doevq kovq lal nail phaq jiav lal-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Aqdaq bhaqda nee sil-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Khali bhaqda nee doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq nail aqyanq tsaq lal-u phao, doevq kovq lal nail ngaol. Khali neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao Khali yavq kha lee-u phao, aivq nail tsaol-aq khal ngel nail juq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq neq, haoqnao naosaq khe aqyanq kev lee nail ngaol. Aq-u phao Khali neq, maq moel kivq nail uvthaiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, niil yeel nail lavqkhoel aqnav-i mail uvthaiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, gaq lai gaq haq neq, aivq-i mail uvthaiq nail aqkhaoqanq juq Aqbhu Miqyail bhai av bhiq nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail juq iqsanl bhai Miqyail aivq nail aqkhil kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol-u phao kev dai, Khali ya uvthaiq nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail juq nail lavqkhoel khe, sil nail phaq bhai aivq haoqnao naosaq lav cov nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Miqyail neq, iqsanl bhai aivq nail aqkhil phaqyal kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav nail ngaol” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Iqsanl mail dai, ge nail daoq al daoq nail lavqkhoel bhai, Miqyail maq kheq-ail. Aivq neq, iqsanl bhai Khali nail aqkhil kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav dai, nl nail gaq ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Yaqyov nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jiav gaq haq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav-a nail Miqyail nail kov-uvq bhai Yaqyov iqsanl jaol lai nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai uvthaiq gil nail ngaol.

Sil nail tsaol-aq maldil maq doevq kovq lal haq neq, khul khi mail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq sil-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ulcuvq saol nail-aiq. Khul khi mail sil-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ulcuvq ya saol nail-aiq.
Khul khi mail nvjuq iqsanl naqli yaoq lavq yaoq-ao nee, geesil lal nail phaq bhai yaq daq nail ngel-ail.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel nuljuq bhaqda nee, ngal neema eeq duq maldil ya nail khe-ai, yaoq n yaoq n nee sil nail phaq bhai iqsanl maldil thaoqphuq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail neenoeq neelov nee ya ge haq neq, niil aq-il Eilpheilsu meenq lavqkhoel-ai haqeiv nail jaiqyaq juq khe-ai dul nail juq nee ngal deeq pheeljaq haq neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil khul nail geeqlaoq bhao nail-aiq. Sil nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maq bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail phal-iq neq,
“Niaohao ya sil nail bhaqda nee
jaq tavq daol tavq bhel” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq, tsaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq thaq noeq laiq dei-eiq. Tsaol-aq aqmeeq teevq gaq, maq meeq nail tsaol-aq nee aqtsaoq tsaoq haq neq, maq meeq-ail pevq-ail nail ngaol.

Noeq lal khi neema phal yaoq. Oeqbal thaq gaoq nl. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia-ail. Nuljuq bhi haqsil nail dai khi, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol.
“Sil nail tsaol-aq khalhai khi doevq kovq lal nail-aiq. Doevq kovq lal-u phao, khalheel nail aqmaol” dai, nuljuq teevq gaq ganav naldaiq movq-ail jaol-aq.
Maq noeq dov nia nail tsaol-aq-ol, naoq-i mail kha-a nail aqiq maq sil haq neq, maq doevq lal nia-ail.
Gov gov iq maq ngel haq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nail aqiq naol haiq-u phao, nuljuq-i mail haiq-a nail al neq, aqneev teevq-eel ngaol. Doevq lal meeq lal thaq nail aqbhaol haiq-a nail maq ngel-ail.
Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aqiq bhai aqbhaol bhi bhaol lal nail ngaol. Aqiq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai iqsanl, yovqgavq nail aqbhaol bhi bhaol lal nail ngaol.
Haqjoil khal ngel nail juq, teevq phaq teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Tsaol-aq nail haqjoil, jaiqyaq nail haqjoil, keivq-avq nail haqjoil, delgil nail haqjoil dai, alhai bhao nail ngaol.

Nqtavq bhai tavq nail aqmaol juq jiav nail ngaol. Miltsaq bhai tavq nail aqmaol juq iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Nqtavq bhai tavq nail aqmaol juq nail khaoqsail neq, teevq phaq ngaol. Miltsaq bhai tavq nail aqmaol nail khaoqsail iqsanl teevq phaq ngaol.
Nlma nail aqbhaq teevq phaq, bhala nail aqbhaq teevq phaq, aqgil nail aqbhaq teevq heeq nee, teevq heeq aqbhaq bhaq nail bheeq-n nail ngaol.
Sil nail tsaol-aq doevq kovq lal nail neq, alhai dul nail ngaol. Duqpheeq-a nail aqmaol neq, buvq-ail tsiq-ail nail ngaol. Doevq kovq lal nail aqmaol neq, maq buvq maq tsiq-ail yaoq-aol.

Duqpheeq nail aqmaol neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail maq jiav-ail. Doevq kovq lal nail aqmaol neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav nail ngaol. Duqpheeq nail aqmaol neq, gaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail. Doevq kovq lal nail aqmaol neq, gaq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Duqpheeq nail aqmaol neq, aqsivq haqjoil teevq-eel ngaol. Doevq kovq lal nail aqmaol neq, aqhaqlal nail aqmaol pevq lal nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail aqmaol jiav haq neq, aqhaqlal nail aqmaol iqsanl jiav nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Tsaol-aq yaq pevq nail Aqdaq iqmoeq khe gaq bhai, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haqbhoil teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haoqnao naosaq khe Aqdaq

Aqhaqlal bhai tavq nail doevq nail phaq iqmoeq jiav lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aqsivq haqjoil bhai tavq nail doevq nail phaq jiav lee khi pultavq, aqhaqlal bhai tavq nail doevq nail phaq jiav lee-a nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq khe Aqdaq gaq neq, miltsaq nee teivq khi miltsaq nee pevq dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aqdaq nvq gaq teevq gaq neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Miltsaq bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, miltsaq nee mail pevq dov lal-a nail gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Nqtavq kovtavq bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, nqtavq kovtavq nee dov lee-a nail gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Ngadao neq, niil aq-il miltsaq nee pevq dov lal-a nail gaq nail aqmaol khe-ai dul nail aqmaol bhao nail khe-ai, yaqhao nqtavq kovtavq nee dov lee-a nail gaq nail aqmaol khe-ai dul dai, aqmaol bhao lal nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai ge bhiq nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail aqmaol neq, Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq jaol lai nia-ail. Buvq-ail tsiq-ail nia nail phaq neq, maq buvq maq tsiq ail nia nail phaq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq aol lai nia-ail.
Oil tsail-ai thaq nail daoq teevq daoq ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel dei-eiq. Ngadao iqsanl mail ya sil nail maq ngel-ail. Ngadao iqsanl mail phal lal nail ngaol.

Haoqnao naosaq khe nqbho jiiv-u phao, teevq yanq nee taivq-ail, maivneev maiv tav teevq tav nail lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail ngadao iqsanl mail phal lal nail ngaol. Nqbho al jiiv lal-u phao, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq maq buvq maq tsiq-ail nail lavqkhoel nee doevq kovq lal khi, ngadao iqsanl phal lal nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, buvq-ail tsiq-ail nia nail niilniai, maq buvq maq tsiq-ail nia nail phaq-i mail aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai, ya doi nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq iqsanl, maq sil nia nail phaq-i mail aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai, ya doi nail ngaol.

Buvq-ail tsiq-ail nia nail niilniai, maq buvq maq tsiq-ail nia nail phaq-i mail aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai doi khi, sil nail phaq iqsanl, maq sil nia nail phaq-i mail aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai doi gaq-u phao, Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq niil daoq bheeq lal nail ngaol:
“Gaq lai nail phaq neq,
sil nail phaq bhai
moevq bhoel-aoq nail ngaol.
Sil nail phaq-ol,
naoq-i mail gaq lai-a nail
phaq neq, khaq.
Sil nail phaq-ol,
naoq nail
dovq neq, khaq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Bhiq sil nia nail dovq neq, oeqbal ngaol. Oeqbal nail bhaqaoq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, ngadao bhai bhi gaq lai lavq-a nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, gaq maq bhaq mail, ivqdao dai thulphaol nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail nail ganl bhai laijai laijai-ail nl yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq Miqyail nail haqbhoil nl nail hal nail neq, aqnieivq-ail maq ngel-ail dai, heeq kivq yaoq.

Miqyail nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil phul danq nail ganl neq, niailhai ngaol. Gaqlaqtil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ngaq-i mail ge bhiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl danq yaoq.

Ngal lal kev-u phao, nuljuq bhai phul maq ya tavq dai, niailhai nl yaoq. Jaol n teevq jao nail lavqkhoel iqmoeq khe n-gaol, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq-i mail ya-ai thaq nail khe-ai phul danq nail haqbhoil oil dov khi lainq thaq-ai yaoq.

Ngal lal kev-u phao, nuljuq-i mail danq-ai thaq nail phul al, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha bhi oil ha lai nail dai, nuljuq neema tsaq nail tsaol-aq bhai tsel khi, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail haoqgavq gevq gaq haq neq, ngal aqyu juq bhai bhi oil ha lai nail ngaol.
Ngal iqsanl lai heeq phaq-ail tsaq haq neq, aqyu juq ngaq-ai nee mail lai nia nail ngaol.
Ngal Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai tsao gaq haq neq, nuljuq jaol nail bha lee naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai lai heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Ngal kha phao ya ail khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngal loq nail phaq bhai lainq lavq khi iqmoeq phao hevq ha-ail lavq dai, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha micil tsaq dai jaol naol dai, noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Coevqjieiv jieiv nail yanq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha jaol naol dai, noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niil aq-il nuljuq jaol nail bha teevq yanq taivq-ail nalga lal khi iqmoeq phao gaoq ail nail neq, ngaq bhai neekhaol maq sil lal-il. Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha micil tsaq dai jaol naol dai, noeqthunq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Bheiqdeiqgoldeiq bhaoqaiq
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal ganl aqmeeq-ai nl kivq dai, gailkhaol phao-ai thaq nail ngaol. Lav tsoiq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl maodai jaol nail ngaol.

Tilmolseiq nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lal haq neq, aivq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, khaoq maq ya laol dai, lav sav bhiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq iqsanl ngaq-ai khe-ai, Miqyail nail ganl nl nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, teevq gaq-ail aivq bhai maq ev dai, thaq nl bhiq. Aivq nvjuq jaol nail bhai aqmeeq-ai kovq kev lee nia dai, tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Ngal khi aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq, aivq bhai daonq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail jaqbheq Aqpaolluv nail ganl neq, niailhai ngaol. Aqivq jaqbheq nee mail Gaolliqthu meenq bhai lai yaoq dai, ngal aivq bhai hal deedee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq niil aq-il nuljuq jaol nail bha lal movq nail neema teevq peivq-ail maq aol-il. Aqyanq tsaq lal haq neq, aivq nuljuq jaol nail bha lal nail ngaol.
Aqgeel geel dai, jaol yaoq. Neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel ivqdao dai jaol yaoq. Geesil nail neema maq aol dai, doevq yaoq. Gaq teevq bhee bhi aol yaoq.
Nuljuq-i mail khal nl nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee nl yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, Aqgaqyal milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq Khali yaq pevq lal-a nail juq neq, Saqteiqphaq phaqyaq mayaq ngaol. Miqyail nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail dai khi, aqyu juq nail aqmaol av bhiq-ai thaq nail bhai iqsanl, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Nuljuq alheel nail tsaol-aq nail kov-uvq bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq khe-ai ganl nl nail tsaol-aq nail kov-uvq bhai maqkhaiq, aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Saqteiqphaq, Phaoqdulnav khi Aqgaqyaqgul aqyu juq ngal jaol nail bha kev lee-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal lavqkhiq tsail deedee-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal nuljuq bhai maq ya moel khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, neema sal-ail nial.
Aqyu juq neq, ngaq nail neema bhai iqsanl, nuljuq nail neema bhai iqsanl aqsal bhi sal lal nail ngaol. Niil heel nail tsaol-aq bhai ev yaoq.

Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqgullav, Bhilgillav aqyu nvq maolyaq khi aqyu nvq gaq nail ilkhaol bhai jil lai nail Khali yaq munl iqsanl, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel nee nuljuq bhai noeq moel deedee naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel aqlavq he yaoq.
Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, ngaq nail aqlavq-i mail nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Yeiqsul bhai maq gaiq-a haq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya dei-eiq. Heeqphaq-ol, lee yaoq dei-eiq.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Ngaq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Gaolliqthu meenq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, Aqgaqyal milkhaoq doi dai jaol nail Khali yaq iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, jaqbheq Tilmolseiq nv-nvq gaq haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Aivq neq, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail Aqbhu ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel ngadao bhai neesal bhi ovq nail Miqyail iqsanl ngel nail ngaol.

Nvjuq ya daq nail iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nvjuq bhai neesal bhi ovq lavq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail nvjuq bhai neesal bhi ovq lavq-a nail khe-ai, khoeq nail jiovq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ya daq nail tsaol-aq bhai nvjuq iqsanl neesal-ovq nail al phaq bivq kivq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali-i mail ya daq-a nail haq nail aoq nail juq nvjuq nail lavqkhoel-ai mao lal-a nail khe-ai, Khali bhaqda nee Miqyail-i mail neesal bhi ovq lavq-a nail phaq bhai iqsanl, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel bhai mao lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai ya daq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil neesal-ovq nail phaq khi hevqkovq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Nvjuq neesal-ovq haq neq, nuljuq iqsanl nvjuq khe-ai, neesal-ovq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq-i mail ya daq-a nail juq nuljuq iqsanl ya daq-u phao, nuljuq oltsaol lal nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nail ganl saol-nvq daiq haq neq, noeqthunq nail phaq ivqdao dai, jiav-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, nvjuq-i mail ya daq-a nail juq nuljuq iqsanl ya daq-a nail khe-ai, nvjuq nail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq iqsanl ya nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol-u phao, ya daq-a nail juq nail ganl nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Ya sil nail jaol-aq dai, nvjuq noeq-u phao kev dai, maq khanq tsaol nail khoeq nail jiovq nail juq ya daq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, ya sil naol dai, yalkhaq dal lavq-a nail bhai nvjuq ya daq-a nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Nvjuq neq, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq maq juq mail, sil nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail Miqyail bhai taivq-ail juq dai, alhai pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, a dai eeq nail sil nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nvjuq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq-a nail nee ovqtavq, yaqhao iqsanl bhi jel-ail lavq nail ngaol. Aivq nvjuq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq dai, nvjuq aivq bhai noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl geeqlaoq tsao hal lavq nail ngel-i mail, aivq nvjuq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq maodai geeqlaoq hal lavq-a nail bhaqda nee, nvjuq-i mail ya-a nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail haqbhoil, tsaol-aq maodai Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq niailhai neema eeq duq ya nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, a dai nee maqtsil nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail-i mail bivq-ai leevq-a nail meeq nail haol nail phaq khi maldil tsaq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee nvjuq nl nail hal nail ngaol dai, nvjuq-i mail heeq kivq nail neema salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Nvjuq miltsaq nail neenoeq neekha bhai juq juq-ail, alhai nl nail hal nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai juq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq-i mail maq ge nia nail phaq maq heeq nia nail phaq bhai nvjuq nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail.

Nuljuq maq gal dai heeq nia nail khe-ai, teevq bhee teevq lovq heeq nia lal dai, ngal noeqthunq nail ngaol. Nuljuq alhai heeq nia lal haq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqn n-gaol nuljuq bhaqda nee nvjuq neema eeq duq ya nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl nvjuq bhaqda nee neema eeq duq ya nail ngaol.
Ngal al bhai aqmeeq-ai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nvq pov teevq pov geeqlaoq ya nia dai, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha iqmoeq lal naol dai, noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngal Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai lai-u phao, nuljuq jaol nail bha nalga lal khi, a bhai nee mail kovq lee-u phao iqsanl, nuljuq jaol nail bha gaoq nalga lee naol dai, aq-u phao alhai noeq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, nuljuq ngal loq nail phaq bhai lainq lavq khi Yuldav milkhaoq bhai bhi hevq ha lai nail dai iqsanl, noeq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal alhai noeq-a nail ngel-i mail, maq duq maq tsil dai pevq nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, miltsaq yaq juq nl nail khe-ai, ngel nail phaq iqsanl, maq ngel nail phaq iqsanl, oil kheq oil lel khi mail, ngal ge nail laiq.
Miqyail saljial ivq nail khe-ai, ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq neq, ngel nail phaq iqsanl, maq ngel nail phaq iqsanl, oil kheq oil lel khi ge nail, maq ngel-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Siqlav, Tilmolseiq nvjuq-i mail nuljuq bhai cav bhiq-a nail Miqyail nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali neq, ngel nail phaq iqsanl maq ngel nail phaq iqsanl oil kheq oil lel-ai thaq nail phaq maq ngel-ail. Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai neq, ngel nail phaq teevq-eel ngaol.

Miqyail nail saljial iqsanl neq, aivq nail lavqkhoel-ai ngel nail phaq teevq-eel ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel-u phao, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee “Aqmiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nvjuq bhai Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai bhi jaol ivq lavq-a nail gaq khi tsel dov lavq-a nail gaq neq, Miqyail ngaol.

Aivq neq, ngadao bhai junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaqhao jaiqbhoil ovq nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq dai, niil aq-il nee mail ngadao nail neema lavqkhoel-ai, aivq nail Aqhaqlal bhi jaol lee-a nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai maq bhi noeqhaq movq nail ngel-i mail, Gaolliqthu meenq bhai maq lal-a nail ganl, Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nvjuq niailhai ge nail neq, nvjuq nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai uvthaiq nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, ivq nail ngaol. Nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail dai, nvjuq nuljuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai maq bhi noeqhaq nail haqbhoil nuljuq jaol nail bha maq lee yaoq-aol dai, ngal noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai bhi noeqhaq haq neq, kha sil gaq ngaq bhai bhi noeqsal lal nia nail-aiq. Ngaq-i mail bhi noeqhaq-a nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail, ngaq bhai bhi noeqsal lal nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq al gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal kev lee-u phao, ngaq bhai lavqkhiq bhi tsail lal nail tsaol-aq juq, ngaq bhai maq ya bhi noeqhaq lavq dai, gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal lavqkhiq tsail haq neq, nuljuq iqsanl mail lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol dai, nuljuq iqsanl nail neema bhai ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, noeqhaq deedee nail, khaoqlaol nail khi, maivbhil dov nail lavqkhoel nee, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq al gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai bhi noeqhaq nail dai khi, gevq bhoel-ai lavq nail maq ngel-ail. Ngal nuljuq bhai khadai gaiq-a nail ngel-ail dai, nuljuq heeq nia dai, gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav yu bhai bhi noeqhaq nail phaq nl haq neq, ngaq bhai bhi noeqhaq lavq nail nee maqtsil nuljuq bhai iqsanl bhi noeqhaq lavq nail ngaol. Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, nuljuq bhai al jaiq maq ge jel movq-il.
Nuljuq jemao teevq pav aivq bhai alhai dal bhiq nail neq, gaq-ao nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, noeqhaq deedee nail ngel-i mail, aivq maq noeq maq mav-ail maq ya pevq-ail dai, aivq nail oeqbal phaiq bhiq khi, aivq bhai bhi noeqsal nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Aqyu juq ngaq bhai maldil gaiq-a lao thaq nial” dai, aivq heeq nia dai, aivq bhai nl bhiq yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, nuljuq ngaq nail daoq yaoq daoq yaoq-ao nee bhai naldaiq-ail laiq dai, ngal ya heeq kivq dai, nuljuq bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, ngal haoqgavq al gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq tsaol-aq al gaq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq bhiq haq neq, ngal iqsanl aivq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq bhiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal oeqbal teevq phaq ganav bhai phaiq bhiq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil Khali nail sivtavq bhai, ngal phaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai maq ngel haq neq, neivq Saqdaq ngadao bhai gaq lal nail ngaol. Ngadao aivq nail neenoeq bhai heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Khali nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail dai khi, ngal Daqlol meenq bhai kev lal-u phao, Miqyail ngaq nail haqbhoil gailkhaol phao daol lavq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal ngaq nail jaqbheq Tiltuv bhai Daqlol meenq bhai maq ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, neema maq sal-il. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai daoq cavq cavq-ail ceevq khi, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bha lal-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, ngadao juq Yeiqsul Khali nee teevq gaq khe-ai khaq mao iqsanl gaq lai dai, Miqyail hevq daiq lavq nail ngaol. Yu Khali bhai ya heeq nia dai, huqbhiq nil nail phaq yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee nil kev-ail dai, aivq ngadao bhai yuq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nvjuq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, luq-ail seil-ail nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai laol bhiq nail Khali nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Luq-ail seil-ail nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil neq, bhi sil nail aqbuvq aqnil nil nail phaq khe-ai dul khi hevqkovq nail phaq ya nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil neq, bhi doevq lal nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Niil heel nail ganl nl nia nail khaq sil gaq jaol nail-aiq.

Tsaol-aq maodai gaq Miqyail nail daoq cavq-u phao, jailjeq ya dai, cavq nail ngaol. Nvjuq neq, alheel nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail bhi cavq lavq nail khe-ai taivq-ail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai Khali nail yaqkav khe-ai, meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee, cavq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, yovqgavq nail salkhil yovqgavq khanq nail ngel-ail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq-i mail nl nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai lavq nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq-i mail gevq bhoel-ai leevq a nail salkhil khanq nail haoqgavq bhai maqkhaiq, nvjuq loq nail laiq.

Nuljuq neq, nvjuq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail haoqgavq pevq nail ngaol. Haoqgavq al, nvjuq nail neema bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail haoqgavq al bhai heeq nia khi ge daiq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Khali-i mail gevq bhoel-ai leevq khi nvjuq-i mail oil ha lee-a nail haoqgavq teevq keiv pevq nail ngaol dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal-a nail ngaol. Haoqgavq gevq nail dailkheq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq maq ngel-ail. Lovmav nail dailpav kovtavq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal-i mail tsaol-aq nail neema bhai gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq ngaol.
Khali bhai juq nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail bhai neema eeq duq jiav nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq niailhai ge tseq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ganl niil nvjuq teevq phaq-ail maq nl kivq-ail. Nvjuq nl kivq nail neenoeq neekha khi gaq neq, Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Daoqma saljial aqsivq nail haqbhoil ganl nl kivq dai, Miqyail nvjuq bhai neenoeq neekha khi gaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Daoqma saljial niil neq, gevq dov-ai thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail maq ngel-ail. Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai tavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, gevq dov-ai thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, lav heivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, lav doevq nail ngaol.

Lovmav nail dailpav kovtavq-ai gevq-ai thaq nail lav heivq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail kav deedee nail lavqkhoel nee, dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Molseiq nail maivphaoq bhai bhaq dov lal-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail peivq-ail thailthaiq khi ngaol-aoq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq aivq nail maivphaoq bhai maq heldaiq nia-u phao kev dai, seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dov lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai phal-iq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai tavq nail ganl neq, a dai nee maqtsil seiqleiq khaoqsail khadai eeq jaiq nail-aiq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yalkhaq dal lavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq kev lee-u phao, seiqleiq khaoqsail aol haq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal dai, nl nail phaq neq, a dai nee maqtsil seiqleiq khaoqsail khadai eeq jaiq nail-aiq.
Haoqnao khe dov lee-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail neq, eeq dee meeq deedee nail ngel-i mail, iqmoeq khe jiav nail seiqleiq khaoqsail peivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, peivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai dul nail al phaq seiqleiq khaoqsail aol nail lavqkhoel kev lee haq neq, ivq nail phaq neq, a dai nee maqtsil seiqleiq khaoqsail aol nail ngaol.
Nvjuq niailhai noeqthunq duq ya nail ngel-i mail, geesil nail neema maq aol mail bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ge tseq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, Molseiq khe-ai, maq dul-ail. Molseiq neq, peivq-ail thailthaiq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai haoqnao naosaq kev dai, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq bhai maq bhi heldaiq nail dai khi, aivq nail maivphaoq bhai haqphal he pheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq al juq nail neema aqgaol gaol lal-a nail ngel-i mail, yanqgaol kev dai, daoqma saljial aqlil bhai ge-u phao, he pheeq-ai thaq nail haqphal al maq phao lal haq-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali bhaqda nee taivq-ail haqphal al phao lal nia nail ngaol.
Yanqgaol kev dai, Molseiq-i mail gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq bhai khal ge-u phao, aqyu juq nail neema bhai haqphal-i mail he pheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khul yanq bhai maqkhaiq, Heeqphaq Miqyail jaol nail phao kovq lal haq neq, he pheeq-ai thaq nail haqphal al bhai Miqyail phao bhiq nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, Aqhaqlal pevq khi, Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal khal jaol nail bhai, jel-ail nail phaq jiav nail ngaol.

Ngadao juq iqsanl mail haqphal maq he pheeq-ai thaq nail phaoqdaiq bhai heldaiq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai heldaiq-u phao, ngadao iqsanl aivq khe-ai seiqleiq khaoqsail aol lal nail ngaol. Ngadao seiqleiq khaoqsail al teevq pov nee teevq pov bhaq jaiq lal dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nl lavq nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee nvjuq bhai ganl niil bhi nl lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq nail neema gaq maq bhaq-ail.

Nvjuq ganl niil nl-u phao, haqsil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail oil-uvq-ai thaq nail phaq, teevq thal-iq nl naol dai, maq noeq-ail. Goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail daoq bhai aqdeq bhiq deq-ail dai maqkhaiq, nvjuq nl naol dai iqsanl, maq noeq-ail. Maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai phaodaiq bhiq nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail nail sivtavq-ai tsaol-aq iqsanl nail heeq nia nail neema bhai tsaq dai, nl nail ngaol.
Nvjuq-i mail cavq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai he pheeq-ai thaq nail ngel haq neq, luq-ail seil-ail nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail he pheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail pevq nail Khali nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dov nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq neq, neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq bhai maq ya bhaq bhiq dai, miltsaq niilniai uvthaiq nail gaq pevq nail neivq Saqdaq aqyu juq nail neema bhai navtsee dai, bhi pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, yovqgavq nail ganl yovqgavq cavq nail cov nail maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul Khali neq, Heeqphaq ngaol dai, cavq bhiq nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil nvjuq nuljuq nail yaqkav pevq nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol.

“Aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai aqbhaq bhaq dov lal nail ngaol dei-eiq” dai, ge-ai thaq nail Miqyail neq, ngadao nail neema bhai aqbhaq bhaq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali nail maivphaoq nee mail bhaq dov lee-a nail Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ngadao ya moel khi ya heeq kivq dai, aqbhaq bhaq lavq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail nlmaoq pevq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail al, miltsaq iqlaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail khe-ai, ngadao juq neq, miltsaq iqlaoq kheel teevq-eel ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, eeq deedee nail bhaqaoq al neq, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nee mail dov lal-a nail ngaol dai, yu ya heeq nia nail ngaol.
Nvjuq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee lav tsoiq lal nail bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, laol thaiq-ai lavq nail maq ngel-ail. Noeq-u maq dov khi ngaol-aoq, noeqthunq nail phaq ya-ai haq nail ngaol.
Khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail maq khaonq ha lavq-ail. Deeq tsuq lavq nail bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, sil nail bhai kev dai, ya daq-a nail maq ngel-ail.
Yeiqsul nail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq nvjuq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal dai, Yeiqsul nail sil nail phaq nvjuq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai khaq mao iqsanl phi-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul nail doevq nail phaq neq, sil nia nail nvjuq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel-ai bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nia dai, nvjuq aqdoevq doevq-u phao, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil sil dai khaq mao iqsanl av bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel-ai sil nail phaq ganl nl nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai neq, doevq nail phaq ganl nl nail ngaol.
“Ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nvjuq iqsanl alhai neema thaqtsaol khi ge nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq, nvjuq bhai iqsanl Yeiqsul nee mail bhi doevq kovq lal khi, nuljuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, aivq nail sivtavq bhai nvjuq bhai bhi jaol lavq nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Al juq iqsanl mail nuljuq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol teevq n nee teevq n mao lal nail khe-ai, aivq bhai tsiqeeq nail tsaol-aq mao lal nail ngel-i mail, aivq seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq neema maq cov-ail. Nvjuq aqsivq haqjoil phao luq-ail seil-ail khi ngaol-aoq, aqhaqlal phao teevq n nee teevq n aqsivq pevq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Niil teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel nvjuq-i mail ya daq nail juq neq, mao-ail nil mao-ail phai nail ngaol. Niil juq neq, mao-ail eeq mao-ail bhaq nail nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail nvjuq nail haqbhoil nl lavq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, moel lal nail juq bhai heldaiq nail maq ngel-ail. Maq moel lal nail juq bhai heldaiq nail ngaol. Moel kivq nail juq neq, teevq yanq taivq-ail jiav nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maq moel kivq nail juq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel jiav nail ngaol.

Miltsaq kovtavq-ai aqdoevq doevq nail ngadao nail aqmaol niil neq, gaqnaq yavqtsoel khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Gaqnaq yavqtsoel niil cov-ail haq neq, Miqyail-i mail ngadao nail haqbhoil nqtavq kovtavq bhai cov-ai thaq nail ilkhaol jiav nail ngaol dai, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail ilkhaol al neq, tsaol-aq nail aqlavq-i mail cov-a nail maq ngel-ail.
Aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel bhai ngadao jaol-u phao, nqtavq kovtavq-ai jiav nail ngadao nail ilkhaol al bhai kovq lai movq deedee-ai bhiq nail ngel-i mail, meel nail ngaol.
Ya kovq kev lai haq neq, teevq thal-iq maq cov-ail nia nail jaol duq bhai ya jaol nail ngaol.

Gaqnaq yavqtsoel khe-ai dul nail aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel bhai ngadao jaol-u phao, yalkav aqliq phi khi, tev nail meel nail ngaol. Aqmaol aqlil niilniai maq loev ha movq nail ngel-i mail, tev nail meel nail maq ngel-ail. Aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq sil nail phaq bhai ya moevq bhoel dai, ngadao aqmaol aqsivq bhai doi movq-ail nial.

Alhai pevq lal dai, Miqyail ngadao bhai lav sav lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao ngadao geeqlaoq al bhai ya nail ngaol dai, ya heeq kivq dai, niil aq-il nee mail aivq Aqhaqlal Miqyail ngadao nail neema lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol lee-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, Yeiqsul nee mail eq-ai haq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq khi ngaol-aoq, nvjuq khaq mao iqsanl neema ivqdao dai, jiav nail ngaol.
Nvjuq neq, maivneev moel moel-ail, aqdoevq doel-aivq nail maq ngel-ail. Neema thaqtsaol thaqtsaol-ail, aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq neema ivqdao dai, aol nail ngaol. Aqmaol niil nee pav-ail khi Yeiqsul nee jaol lai movq jaiq-ail nial.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq aqmaol niil nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao maqkhaiq, aqmaol niil nee pav ail-u phao maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul neema tsaq nail tsaol-aq pevq dai, laijai laijai-ail aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, aqdoevq doevq nail khe-ai, aqmeeq maqkhaiq, maq meeq nail maqkhaiq, ya dai, ngadao Khali nail yalkhaq dal nail doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai ya kev lai nail ngaol.

Nvjuq Miqyail bhai ev khi ya geesil nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq yaq bhai cavq bhiq deedee nail ngaol. Nvjuq khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngel-ail dai, Miqyail bhaqlaoq kheq dai heeq nia nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl, neema lavqkhoel bhai alhai heeq nia nail ngaol dai, nvjuq noeq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq niailhai ge nail neq, nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai yovqgavq nail salkhil yovqgavq khanq nail maq ngel-ail dei-eiq. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai khalhai pevq nail bhai maq saol-nvq dai, lavqniil phao taivq-ail neema eeq nail ngaol. Nuljuq tsaol-aq al juq bhai khalhai ya ge kovq dai, nvjuq bhaqda nee nuljuq neema eeq duq jiav nail ngaol dai, nvjuq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail teevq-eel ngaol.
Nvjuq naiquq ngel haq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil uq ail-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq aqgeel ngel haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil geel nail ngaol.

Khali nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nvjuq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq iqsanl sil-aoq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol dai, nvjuq noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq maq doevq mail, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil khanq sil khi doevq kovq lal-a nail Khali nail haqbhoil aqdoevq doevq dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil aivq khanqsil-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yanqgaol nee ngal-aq neq, miltsaq yaq juq saol-nvq nail khe-ai, nvjuq tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq saol-nvq bhiq yaoq-aol. Jel lal-u phao, nvjuq Khali bhai miltsaq yaq juq khe-ai, saol-nvq bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il alhai maq saol-nvq bhiq yaoq-aol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol lal haq neq, aivq tsaol-aq aqsivq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Aqlil juq iqsanl mail peivq gil-ail khi, iqsanl mail aqsivq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Al juq iqsanl mail, Miqyail nee mail pevq dov lee-a nail ngaol. Ngadao aivq bhai tsaq lai jil lai dai, Miqyail Khali bhai juq khi nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, yu aivq bhai tsaq lai jil lai dai, aivq nvjuq bhai bhi nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, miltsaq yaq aivq bhai tsaq lai jil lai dai, nl-a nail ngaol. Aivq aqyu juq nail oeqbal aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai maq thaq-al. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq yaq ngaq bhai tsaq lal jil lal dai nl yaoq dai, aivq nvjuq bhai khoel lavq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq Khali nail gaqkhoel pevq nail ngaol. Miqyail nvjuq bhai juq juq-ail nuljuq bhai khul thailthaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai tsaq lal jil lal yaoq dai, Khali nail gaqkhoel pevq khi nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Khali neq, oeqbal teevq peivq-ail maq aol khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhaqda nee, ngadao Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq pevq lal dai, ngadao nail haqbhoil Miqyail aivq bhai oeqbal bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq Miqyail nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ganl nl nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai hav bhoel-a nail al aqnieivq-ail thaq bhi pevq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq ge nail:
“Aqyanq tsaq-u phao,
ngal naoq nail daoq bhai
naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Hevqkovq nail aqn al n bhai
ngal naoq bhai
tsaojao-ai bhiq naol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il neq, aqyanq tsaq nail ngaol. Yanqgaol neq, hevqkovq nail aqn kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq ganl nl nail bhai yu oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, nvjuq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl phaqthiq maq bhi thiq-ail.

Yu nvjuq bhai maldil Miqyail nail ganl nl nail tsaol-aq nial dai, heeq nia dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel-ai nvjuq nl nail ngaol. Ol deedee nail, ya daq deedee nail, noeq dee noeq deel nail,

yu-i mail dee lavq nail, thaonq bhai laol lavq nail, yu lav suqsaq lal nail, ganl ya nl deedee nail, maq ya iqthaiq nail dai khi, moevq nail sivq nail, nvjuq niil juq bhai daq daq-ail nl-a nail ngaol.
Meeq nail haol nail neema aol nail, neenoeq neekha aol nail, neenoeq heelma ma dai noeq nail, aqmeeq phaq aol nail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq nail, neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai gaiq-a nail,
maldil tsaq nail daoq bhai cavq bhiq nail, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhai juq nail, tsaq nail daol nail khen kha-ao bhai lavqtsel lavqmal nieivq thaiq khi ganl nl nail ngaol.

Khaoqsail ya nail maqkhaiq, yu-i mail khal nl movq-ail nl lavq nail maqkhaiq, yu-i mail tsiqeeq lavq nail maqkhaiq, yu-i mail ge doil lavq nail maqkhaiq, nvjuq nl nail ngaol. Yu bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, yu nvjuq bhai saol-nvq lavq khi ngaol-aoq, nvjuq maldil tsaq nail phaq nl nail ngaol.

“Nuljuq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail” dai, yu nvjuq bhai saol-nvq lavq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail nvjuq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Sil heeq phaq-ail pevq ail-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, yu nvjuq bhai saol-nvq lavq khi ngaol-aoq, aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khoeq lavq jiovq lavq-a nail bhai ya daq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai pevq khi ngaol-aoq, heivq lavq nail bhai maq ya daq-ail.

Noeqhaq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai pevq khi ngaol-aoq, khaq mao iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail nail ngaol. Haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai pevq khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq maodai bhai hulmeeq bhiq meeq lal nail ngaol. Khul teevq phaq-ail maq jiav nail tsaol-aq khe-ai pevq khi ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jiav nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Gaolliqthu meenq bhai jaol nail juq-ol, nvjuq nuljuq bhai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhaqlaoq kheq dai cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai nuljuq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a deedee naol.
Nvjuq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail phaq micil teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nvjuq bhai gaiq-a nail neq, micil teevq-eel ngaol.
Nuljuq iqsanl nvjuq bhai gaoq gaiq-a lavq yaoq. Niailhai ge nail neq, yovqgavq nail yaq bhai ge bhiq nail khe-ai, ge nail ngaol.

Khali bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nee thaq tavq laiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq neq, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq bhai khalhai khi tavq lai nia nail-aiq. Aqbhaq khi mail aqnav khalhai khi aqtsaoq tsaoq nia nail-aiq.

Khali neq, neivq heeqphaq bhai khalhai khi tsaq lai jil lai nia nail-aiq. Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nee mail, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail khalhai khi tavq kivq nail-aiq.

Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma khi thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel khalhai khi tsaq lai jil lai nia nail-aiq. Ngadao neq, aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma ngaol. Miqyail niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Ngal aqyu juq nail
lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi,
aqyu nail lavqkhoel bhai
tsao nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq nail
Miqyail pevq khi,
aqyu juq ngaq nail tsaol-aq
pevq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
“ ‘Aqyu juq nail
lavqkhoel nee dov lal khi
aqyu juq bhai
gaoqceiv ceiv yaoq’ dai,
Heeqphaq Miqyail
ge nail ngaol.
‘Aqcavq phaq bhai
thaq thoiq.
Maq thoiq haq neq,
ngal nuljuq bhai
hav bhoel naol.
Ngal nuljuq nail
Aqbhu pevq khi,
nuljuq ngaq nail yaqmiq
yaqyov pevq lal nail ngaol’ dai,
iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail
ge nail ngaol.”

Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngadao saljial al juq bhai ya-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, ngadao nail aqmaol khi aqhaqlal bhai bhi jiivq bhiq cavq-ail nia nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai tsiqhaol khi, Miqyail bhai ev khi geesil nail lavqkhoel aqmeeq aqhaol haol nail phaq teevq bhee aol dai doevq bhel.
Neema lavqkhoel nee nvjuq bhai hav lavq yaoq. Nvjuq tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq nl laiq-al. Teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq gaq jaq-al. Teevq gaq bhai iqsanl goiqbhaoq maq bhaoq daiq-al.

Ngal nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq thaq-ail niailhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Sil khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq khe-ai ya sil dai, doevq khi ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq khe-ai ya doevq dai, nvjuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq bhai gaiq-a-ail nial dai, aq-u phao iqsanl, ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai aqmeeq-ai neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhaqda nee ngal neekhaol sil duq jiav nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhaqda nee gaq eeq duq iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Nvjuq ya daq deedee-u phao iqsanl, maq ge gil tsaol dai ngal lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.

Nvjuq Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai lal kev-u phao, teevq thal-iq gaqnaq naq nail maq dan-ail. Nvjuq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel, mao-ail suqsaq nail phaq ya daq nail ngaol. Jaoq jaoq-ai iqdaiq iqtsai dov lal thailthaiq khi, neema lavqkhoel bhai geesil nail phaq iqsanl aol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema cov nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi noeqsal lal nail Miqyail neq, Tiltuv lal kev-u phao, nvjuq bhai bhi noeqsal lal-a nail ngaol.

Tiltuv lal kev-a nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail, noeqsal lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, noeqsal-a nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq iqsanl noeqsal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai moel movq deedee nail bhai maqkhaiq, pevq jel-ail ceevq-a nail ganl bhai nuljuq khadai noeqhaq nail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq ngal jaol nail phao aol movq nail neema kev deedee nail bhai maqkhaiq, aivq ge daiq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal lavqkhiq tsail jaiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail nuljuq bhai gevq bhiq-a nail haoqgavq al keiv nuljuq bhai bhi noeqhaq-a nail ngel-i mail, iqmoeq-u phao ngal noeqhaq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, maq noeq haq yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, haoqgavq al keiv nuljuq bhai teevq yanq taivq-ail bhi noeqhaq-a nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai bhi noeqhaq-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq oeqbal noeq pov-u phao kev dai, noeqhaq nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial. Nvjuq bhaqda nee nuljuq geeqlaoq teevq peivq-ail maq ya sunq-ail dai, nuljuq Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail noeqhaq nail phaq bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail noeqhaq nail phaq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-u phao kev dai, oeqbal noeq pov nail phaq bhi dov lal-a nail ngaol. Alhai bhi dov lal haq neq, noeqhaq noeqaoq nail phaq maq jiav yaoq-aol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq nee mail dov lal-a nail noeqhaq nail phaq neq, sil nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail noeqhaq nail phaq neq, neema lavqkhoel bhai khul phaq bhi dov lal nail ngel-ail dai, saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Nuljuq laijai movq deedee nail neema aol lal-aoq nail ngaol laq. “Nvjuq daolcoev dai, nl nail hal nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq ge kovq lavq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neema phail nail phaq maqkhaiq, geesil nail phaq maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai moel movq deedee lal-a nail maqkhaiq, neema kev nail phaq aol lal-a nail maqkhaiq, dal lavq nail phaq maqkhaiq, niil juq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai khadai kev dai, nl dol lavq nail-aiq. Ganl niilniai tavq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel nuljuq oeqbal maq aol-ail dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai bhi dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhiq-a nail neq, nl laiq-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Yu-i mail nl laiq nail bhai ya daq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai nuljuq nvjuq nail haqbhoil khadai laijai nail ngel-ail dai, nuljuq heeq nia dai, gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq bhai noeqsal lal-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq noeqsal lal-a nail nee ovqtavq, Tiltuv lavqkhiq tsail nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq a dai nee maqtsil lavqkhiq tsail lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl mail, aivq bhai bhi noeqsal lal-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq-a nail daoq ngal Tiltuv bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail al, niil aq-il ngal maq ya haqsil-ail. Nvjuq nuljuq bhai yaoq daoq yaoq-ao nee daolcoev dai, ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, Tiltuv nail sivtavq bhai ngal nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq-a nail al neq, tsaq deedee nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl mail aivq nail daoq naldaiq nail nee ovqtavq, geesil khi aqjuq juq nail lavqkhoel nee aivq bhai hav bhiq-a nail bhai, aivq noeq dov lal-u phao, aivq nuljuq bhai gaiq-a jaiq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel-ai ngal nuljuq bhai neema thaqtsaol kivq nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq bhai Miqyail geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq nail ganl, nvjuq nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial.

Aqyu juq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq-i mail laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq haq nail aoq nail bhai maq saol-nvq dai, lavqkhiq tsail nail ngel-i mail, maodai danq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq khal khi kivq nail khe-ai, danq nail nee ovqtavq, a dai nee maqtsil iqsanl lavqkhiq teevq tsail gaoq danq-a nail ngaol dai, ngal salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
“Miqyail nail tsaol-aq bhai tsaojao-ai nia nail geeqlaoq al nvjuq bhai bhi nl lavq yaoq” dai, aqyu juq nvjuq bhai hal deedee nail ngaol.

Nvjuq-i mail noeqthunq nail nee maqtsil, aqyu juq nl nail ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqmoeq-u nee mail yovqgavq nail aqmaol yovqgavq Yeiqsul bhai av bhiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, nvjuq bhai iqsanl av lavq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, “Naoq-i mail aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai, geeqlaoq eeq nail ganl al nl gil yaoq” dai, nvjuq Tiltuv bhai hal-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq maqkhaiq, ge nail thail nail phaq maqkhaiq, neenoeq neekha maqkhaiq, laijai deedee nail phaq maqkhaiq, nvjuq bhai gaiq-a nail phaq maqkhaiq, mee nia phaq nl bhee thailthaiq nail khe-ai, geeqlaoq eeq nail ganl niilniai iqsanl nl bhee yaoq.
Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, daoq bivq nail maq ngel. Ngal yu laijai nail ganl ge-u phao, nuljuq goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maldil aol nail ngaol dai, dov lal dai, ge nail ngaol.

Nuljuq ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Aivq hulmeeq meeq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil haq nail phaq bhai daq-a nail ngaol. Aivq haq nail al bhai daq-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq hulmeeq meeq lal-a nail ngaol.

Ganl niil ngal noeq nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq nail ngaol dei-eiq. Nuljuq milnee kovq nee nl-ai thaq nail al niil aq-il nl gaq yaoq. Niil neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil meeq deedee nail ngaol. Aq-u phao neq, nuljuq yu nail iqmoeq-u nee, nl movq nail neema aol nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, nuljuq khal khi kivq nail khe-ai, haoqnao naosaq bhai kev dai, nl yaoq.
Danq movq nail neema aol khi danq haq neq, Miqyail hav bhoel nail ngaol. Maq jiav nail bhai bivq lavq yaoq dai, Miqyail maq ge-ail.
Ganl niil nl-u phao, yu nail haqbhoil maq haq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil haq dai, ngal nl movq nail maq ngel. Teevq gaq khe-ai di dai, nl movq-ail nial.

Niil aq-il nuljuq al jaiq jiav nail lavqkhoel aqyu juq maq jiav lovq nail phaq bhai nuljuq tsaojao-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Yaqhao nuljuq maq jiav lovq nail phaq bhai, aqyu juq al jaiq jiav nail lavqkhoel nee nuljuq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq khi, teevq gaq khe-ai di lal nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Maodai gov bhoel-a nail tsaol-aq, al jaiq maq jiav-ail. Micil taivq-ail gov bhoel-a nail tsaol-aq, lovq nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
