Ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil neema kev nail khe-ai, Tiltuv iqsanl neema kev lal dai, Miqyail nl bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Tiltuv neq, nvjuq-i mail gaq bivq nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail nee ovqtavq, aivq neema kev deedee nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai aivq noeq dov lal bhiq khi nuljuq jaol nail bha lee nail ngaol.
Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nia deedee nail ngel-i mail, Khali yaq munl iqsanl mail tsiqeeq nail aqivq jaqbheq teevq gaq iqsanl nvjuq Tiltuv nee mail bhi lee nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq niil gaq neq, “Paolluv nee mail tsaothe jaol nail juq nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail geeqlaoq eeq nail phul danq nail ganl niil nl ail yaoq” dai, Khali yaq munl juq-i mail tsel dov khi khoel-ai thaq nail gaq ngaol. Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail dov lal khi, yu bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq movq nail neema bhaqlaoq kheq dai bhi dov lal nail dai khi, nvjuq ganl niil nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Khali yaq juq-i mail danq-ai thaq nail, mao-ail mao nail phul al nvjuq oil khi bhoil bhiq ail-u phao, yu nvjuq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal maq ya thaq dai, yaolphaol nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai taivq-ail maq ngel nail. Tsaol-aq yaq nail sivtavq bhai iqsanl aqsee aqdaol daol-ai nl kivq dai, nvjuq noeqceiv khi nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq nee mail aqivq jaqbheq yaoq gaq yaoq iqsanl nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lee nail ngaol. Aqivq jaqbheq al gaq bhai mee nia phaq nail lavqkhoel nee, mee nia pov laonqdaiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, neema kev deedee nail teevq gaq ngaol dai, nvjuq ya heeq kivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq bhai neema thaqtsaol deedee nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il neema kev jaiq lal-a nail ngaol.

Tiltuv khi mail aqivq jaqbheq niil nvq gaq nail ganl neq, niailhai ngaol. Tiltuv ngaq nail aqtsaoq pevq khi, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ngaq-ai nee mail ganl nl nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khali yaq munl juq-i mail aqivq jaqbheq niil nvq gaq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq neq, Khali nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi dov lal nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq goil nail gaiq-a nail neema aol-ail nial dai, aqyu juq heeq nia dai, nl bhiq yaoq. Nvjuq-i mail nuljuq nail ganl tsaol-aq niil juq nail sivtavq bhai tsiqeeq-a nail daoq al daoq tsaq lao thaq nial dai, aqyu juq heeq nia dai iqsanl, Khali yaq munl nail sivtavq bhai nl yaoq.
Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq nail ganl al ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq nail maq loq-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq yu bhai tsaojao-ai movq nail neema aol nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. “Aqyu juq yu bhai tsaojao-ai movq nail neema aol nail ngaol” dai, ngal Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, ngal nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. “Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai jaol nail juq neq, milnee kovq nee mail lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, ngal aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail laijai deedee nail phaq neq, aqyu juq jemao teevq pav nl movq nail neema aol lal dai, bhi noeq dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail nl nail ganl bhai ngal tsiqeeq thailthaiq nail niil, aqnieivq-ail maq ya pevq nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq-i mail ge nail khe-ai, nuljuq aqmeeq-ai lainq-ai thaq nia dai, aqivq jaqbheq niil juq bhai khoel-ai leevq nail khi ngaol.

Alhai maq ngel haq neq, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai lee-u phao, nuljuq maq lainq-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel haq neq, nvjuq nuljuq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq taivq-ail ya haqsil nail maq ngel-ail. Nvjuq iqsanl ya haqsil nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal maq kev lee-u nee mail, iqmoeq-u nee ge-ai thaq nail geeqlaoq eeq nail phul danq nail ganl al bhai aqmeeq-ai tsao nl gil yaoq dai, ngal aqivq jaqbheq niil hail gaq bhai khoel-ai leevq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, noeq nail ngaol. Nuljuq alhai danq-u phao, maq danq-ail maq khi kivq nail ngel-i mail danq nail maq ngel mail. Lavqkhiq teevq tsail danq movq nail neema aol khi danq nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial.
Micil taivq-ail haiq nail gaq, micil taivq-ail ya gaiq nail ngaol. Maodai haiq nail gaq maodai ya gaiq nail ngaol dai, ge nail daoq al daoq bhai thaq nioilpeivq.

Yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai yovqgavq noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai danq yaoq. Neema maq kev dai, danq nail maqkhaiq, yu khoel nail ngel-i mail danq nail maqkhaiq, neema alhai aol aol-ail thaq danq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, lavqkhiq teevq tsail danq nail tsaol-aq bhai Miqyail gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jiav lovq nail nee ovqtavq, aqmeeq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nia hal nia dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai geeqlaoq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee teevq bhee bivq nia nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Haq nail aoq nail
juq nail haqbhoil
maodai danq bhiq-a nail
tsaol-aq al gaq,
aivq nail tsaq nail daol nail
al phaq neq,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
ivq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqiq haiq nail gaq bhai aqiq iqsanl, jaqjaq daoldaol iqsanl, bivq nail Miqyail, nuljuq bhai aqiq bivq lavq nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail haiq-ai thaq nail aqiq al heeq lee lov lee khi, tsaq nail daol nail phaq maodai ya gaiq dai, aivq bhi mao lal nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail haqbhoil nuljuq maodai bivq nia dai, iqsanl nail lavqkhoel-ai Miqyail nuljuq bhai hulmeeq bhi meeq lal nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq, ngadao maodai bivq nail bhai heldaiq khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq nail ganl al neq, aqyu juq loq nail khe-ai, teevq bhee tsaojao-ai bhiq nail teevq-eel maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai lavqkhiq teevq tsail tsiqeeq jaiq nia lal dai iqsanl nl nail ngaol.

Nuljuq aqyu juq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq nail bhai aqyu juq heldaiq khi, nuljuq khalheel nail tsaol-aq ngel-ail dai, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai hav bhoel khi, al nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, aqyu juq bhai iqsanl, yu bhai iqsanl nuljuq maodai danq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, aqyu juq Miqyail bhai thaqeeq thaqheel nail ngaol.
Miqyail nuljuq bhai mao-ail meeq nail geeqlaoq bivq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nuljuq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal-u phao, nuljuq bhai noeq kev deedee nail ngaol.
Maq ge gil tsaol nail kovpavq Miqyail bivq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai tsiqeeq bhel.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Khali nail neenuq neebeiv khi mail aivq nail neema meeq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol. Nvjuq nee mail jaol-u phao, neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, nvjuq nee mail maq jaol-u phao, geesil nail neema maq aol-ail dai, nuljuq-i mail ge nail al gaq ngal ngaol.

“Aqyu juq neq, aqsivq haqjoil nail haoqnao taivq-ail tsaothe nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, nvjuq bhai saol-nvq lavq nail tsaol-aq bhai geesil nail neema maq aol dai, nl daiq bhiq naol dai, ngal noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal-u phao, niidai dai-ail geesil nail neema aol khi mail maq ya nl daiq bhiq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.
Nvjuq neq, miltsaq kovtavq-ai aqdoevq doevq khi ngaol-aoq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail genl dev nail tsaol-aq genl dev nail khe-ai, nvjuq genl dev nail maq ngel-ail.
Nvjuq genl dev-u phao, yuq nail khen kha-ao neq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail maq ngel-ail. Tavq bhai lav cov nail haqbhoil, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq aol nail khen kha-ao ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, jil pheeljaq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai maq ya heeq nia dai, lav tsoiq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai maqkhaiq, khaonq ha thailthaiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail neenoeq iqsanl bhai pheethaiq khi Khali nail daoq bhai taivq-ail bhi naldaiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq ngaq nail daoq naldaiq khi ngal jaol nail phao aol lal gaq haq neq, maq naldaiq nail juq bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai, yalkhaq dal bhiq nail ngaol dai, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, kovtavq phao taivq-ail heldaiq nail niil laq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq, “Ngal neq, Khali nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, saol-nvq haq neq, aivq Khali nail tsaol-aq pevq nail khe-ai nvjuq iqsanl Khali nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, aivq noeq kev heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail dai khi, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nvjuq bhai alyaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai bhi lav cov nail dai khi, bivq lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, alyaq niil nail ganl ngal neema eeq eeq-ail ge jel khi ngaol-aoq, ngal ya haqsil nail maq ngel-ail.
Nuljuq bhai lav geesil movq nail niil dai, bhiq noeq movq nail ngel-i mail, ngal haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail, maq ngel-ail.

“Paolluv-i mail gevq-a nail haoqgavq neq, bhaqaoq eeq deedee khi haq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqmaol nvjuq nee mail jaol-ail nul neq, khul maq ge tseq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, aivq neq, daoq mao-ail maq ge nia-il” dai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ge nail ngaol.

Nvjuq nuljuq nee mail maq jaol-u phao, nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail khe-ai, nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao iqsanl, alhai nl nail ngaol dai, tsaol-aq al juq bhai bhi heeq nia yaoq.

Yovqgavq nail salkhil yovqgavq khanq nail tsaol-aq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai saol-nvq bhoel nail maqkhaiq, aqyu juq bhai tsiqceiv daiq nail maqkhaiq, nvjuq maq nl tseq-ail. Aqyu juq neq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsiqceiv daiq khi, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq tsiqeeq nail ngel-i mail, neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvjuq neq, neema eeq eeq-ail al jaiq maq ge-ail. Miqyail nvjuq bhai ganl bhoil lavq-a nail aqduq al juq bhai taivq-ail neema eeq khi, nvjuq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, aivq-i mail nvjuq bhai bhi nl lavq-a nail aqduq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail nvjuq bhai bhi nl lavq-a nail aqduq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq jaol nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq yaoq juq yaoq bhai nl bhoel-aivq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lee dai, iqmoeq ilmoeq cavq lee-a nail juq neq, nvjuq ngaol.

Yu-i mail nl-ai thaq nail ganl bhai nvjuq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai tavq khi, neema eeq nail lavqkhoel nee ge nail maq ngel. Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq eeq lal mao lal-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai, Miqyail nvjuq bhai bhoil lavq-a nail aqduq iqsanl eeq lal mao lal dai, nvjuq noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Alhai pevq lal haq neq, nuljuq nail jaol duq a phao bal-nvq bhai kev dai, nvjuq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq kivq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, yu-i mail nl-ai thaq nail ganl bhai neema eeq eeq-ail nvjuq teevq peivq-ail maq ge-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, “Neema eeq nail tsaol-aq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail eeq dei-eiq.”

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq nail ganl yovqgavq salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq bhai, Miqyail neekhaol sil nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq bhai taivq-ail, aivq neekhaol sil nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi nail daoq bhai nuljuq micil bhi ol movq-ail nial. Teevq pov ol lavq dei-eiq.

Miqyail nuljuq bhai gaiq-a deedee nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl nuljuq bhai gaiq-a deedee-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, meeq nail haol nail yaqmai-aq yaqnoil khe-ai pevq khi Khali bhai taivq-ail bhi maol ail nail dai khi, ngal nuljuq-ai aivq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Eellel neq, Eilbav bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi jalmul mul ya-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq Khali bhai meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee maldil gaiq-a nail phaq neema lavqkhoel nee peivq-ail nail khul-il dai, ngal khaoqlaol nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nuljuq jaol nail bha lal khi, ngaq-i mail cavq-a nail Yeiqsul al gaq nail ganl maq cavq mail, Yeiqsul yaoq gaq yaoq nail ganl cavq bhiq-u phao, nuljuq aqyu juq nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, nuljuq-i mail ya-a nail aqhaqlal maq ngel nail, aqhaqlal yaoq phaq yaoq bhai ya nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq-i mail hav bhoel-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq maq ngel nail, geeqlaoq daoq yaoq daoq yaoq bhai nuljuq hav bhoel nail ngaol.
Eeq jaiq heel jaiq nail gaqkhoel juq dai, nuljuq-i mail khul nail gaqkhoel al juq nee maqtsil ngal teevq peivq-ail maq theq jaiq-ail dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.
Ngal daoq ge nail maq nia khi ngaol-aoq, neenoeq neekha aol naol. Ngal niailhai aol nail ngaol dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel nuljuq bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai thaqeeq bhiq nail dai khi, ngaq nail aqmaol bhai thaqtheq khi, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai aqphoiq maq oil dai, nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal oeqbal nl-a nail laiq.
Ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl nl kivq dai, Khali yaq yaoq munl yaoq juq nail phul oil nail neq, aqyu juq nail nlmaoq bhai tsai dov jaq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nee jaol-u phao, ngal teevq phaq ganav loq lal khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq bhai teevq phaq iqsanl maq hal-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq nee lee-a nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq ngal khal loq nail juq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khul teevq phaq gail maq bhi dal dai, ngal alhai nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai, iqmoeq phao iqsanl nl laivq nail ngaol.
Khali nail maldil tsaq nail phaq ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail khe-ai, Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail ngal neema eeq duq jiav nail niilniai maq lav tsoiq nia-ail.
Khul khi mail ngel-ail. Ngal nuljuq bhai maq gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail laiq. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol dai, Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, jel lal-u phao nl lavq-a nail khe-ai, iqmoeq phao iqsanl nl laivq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Nvjuq iqsanl nuljuq khe-ai dul dai ganl nl nail ngaol” dai, gaqkhoel al juq teevq gaq-ail maq ge nia dai, ngal niailhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Al juq neq, maldil gaqkhoel maq ngel nail juq ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Khali nail gaqkhoel juq khe-ai dul khi ngaol-aoq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq bhaoq-ail aqdoevq doevq nail juq ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai nl nail bhai noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail duq maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, neivq Saqdaq iqsanl aqbhaq bhaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel khe-ai, pevq nia nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, aivq nail ganl nl nail juq iqsanl, tsaq nail daol nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail juq khe-ai jiovq nail bhai, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail duq maq jiav-ail. Aqyu juq ganl nl nail khe-ai, haoqnao naosaq aqyu juq ya daq nail ngaol.

Ngal teevq pov gaoq ge la dei-eiq. Nuljuq teevq gaq iqsanl ngaq bhai yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi niil dai, thaq noeq. Nuljuq alhai noeq khi ngaol-aoq, neema eeq nail lavqkhoel nee ngal daoq micil ge kivq dai, ngaq bhai yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi niil dai, saol-nvq lavq yaoq.
Ngal niailhai ge haq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail bhi ge lavq nail ngel-i mail ge nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi khe-ai neema eeq eeq-ail neekhaol teevq sil ge nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq maodai gaq aqsivq haqjoil phao khe ganl nee neema eeq eeq-ail ge nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl neema eeq eeq-ail ge lavq bhel.
Nuljuq neq, neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi juq bhai lavqkhiq teevq tsail dai, ol bhiq nail nial thoq laq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nuljuq bhai yaqkav bhi jiovq lavq nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail nlmaoq bhai oil nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhai khoiqbhaoq goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq lal nail maqkhaiq, aivq nail aqmaol bhai aivq tsiqeeq tsiq heel nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq bhai naqteiv teiv lal nail maqkhaiq, nuljuq ol ol-ail jaol-ail nial.

Nvjuq neq, alhai nl bhiq nail phao, gaq bhaq-ail nial dai, haqsil nail lavqkhoel nee ngal ya ge nail nial thoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav neema eeq eeq-ail ge tseq haq neq, ngal iqsanl neema eeq eeq-ail ge tseq nail ngaol. (Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi khe-ai ge nail ngaol.)

Aqyu juq Heiqbhail nail tsaol-aq laiq. Ngal iqsanl Heiqbhail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqyu juq Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq laiq. Ngal iqsanl Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqyu juq Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a laiq. Ngal iqsanl aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol.

Aqyu juq Khali nail yaqkav laiq. Aqyu juq nee maqtsil ngal Khali nail yaqkav ngaol. (Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, naiquq khe-ai, ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.) Aqyu juq nee maqtsil ngal ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nee maqtsil ngal thaonq bhai aol daiq-a nail ngaol. Maq ge gil tsaol dai, khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail bhai ngal ya daq-a nail ngaol. Sil heeq phaq-ail tsaq dai iqsanl, mee nia pov daq-a nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq-i mail hail tsel goiq lavq bhee dai, jiivq lavq nail bhai, ngal ngaq pov ya daq-a nail ngaol.

Neeqtsaq-i mail jiivq lavq nail bhai hail pov bhee dai, ya daq khi, lovmav-i mail liv lavq nail bhai iqsanl teevq pov ya daq-a nail ngaol. Laovq cov-ail nail bhai hail pov bhee dai, ya daq-a nail ngaol. Teevq n teevq kivq iqyaq iqma nail lavqkhoel bhai ya jaol-a nail ngaol.

Ngal teevq yanq ngal-aq, teevq pov gailkhaol dov ail nail lavqkhoel nee, mee nia phaq bhai geesil duq jiav jiav-ail tsao-a nail ngaol. Laoljaol eeq lee nail bhai maqkhaiq, tsaol pheel deeq lal nail bhai maqkhaiq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khoeq lal nail bhai maqkhaiq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a khoeq lal nail bhai maqkhaiq, geesil geesil-ail tsao-a nail ngaol. Meenq lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, haqtsoiq haqyal bhai maqkhaiq, iqyaq iqma kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, geesil lal nail phaq bhai ya thaoqphuq-a nail nee ovqtavq, maldil Khali yaq maq ngel nail juq-i mail khal nl movq-ail nl lal nail bhai geesil geesil-ail, haq daiq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl nl deedee khi haq deedee nail lavqkhoel nee, mee nia pov maq ya iqthaiq-al. Aoq iqsanl ulcuvq iqsanl moevq daiq-a nail ngaol. Aoq iqsanl mee nia pov jeeq daiq-a nail ngaol. Aqcoevq coevq nail khi aqgaq aqdoi maq jiav nail, niil juq bhai iqsanl ya daq-a nail ngaol.
Niil juq bhai ya daq nail nee ovqtavq, Khali yaq munl iqsanl nail haqbhoil khaoqlaol heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq iqsanl yaoq n yaoq n nee ngaq nail kovtavq bhai jiav nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav gaq bhaq haq neq, ngal iqsanl gaq maq bhaq-ail laiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai bhi laiq bhi tsa-ail haq neq, ngal maq noeqhaq-ail laiq.
Ngal neema eeq eeq-ail, maldil daoq ya ge haq neq, ngaq nail gaq bhaq nail ganl juq taivq-ail neema eeq eeq-ail ge nail ngaol.
Ngal goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail maq ngel-ail dai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq heeq phaq-ail geel-nvq nail, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail Aqbhu Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngal Daqmaqsail meenq bhai jaol-u phao, ngaq bhai nieivq nail dai khi, heeqphaq Aqleiqdal nail pul-nvq khe jaol nail aqivq gaq bhai Daqmaqsail meenq bhai bhi lovq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail aqtsaoq ngaq bhai kavlaol nail lavqkhoel-ai bhi aol lai lavq khi, laolkhoeq bhai daol nail lolgov gov yaq nee phaiq kha gai-aivq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqivq al gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nee ya jel ail-a nail ngaol.

Ngal neema eeq eeq-ail gaoq ya ge nail ngaol. Niailhai ge nail neq, ganl maq tsoiq khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul-i mail phaodaiq lavq-a nail juq khi aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel bhai ya moel-a nail ganl juq nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel dei-eiq.

Jel lal-a nail tsel liq kovq bhai, nqtavq hail teiv-nvq bhai kev dai, tsiq dal laivq nail bhai yaq daq-a nail Khali yaq teevq gaq bhai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. Aqmaol dav lai thaq-al meeq. Aqhaqlal dav lai thaq-al meeq. Miqyail taivq-ail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq Bhaqlaqdilsuv dai khul nail gaoqkhail bhai tsiq dal laivq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. A bhai, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail maq ge daiq bhiq kivq nail phaq khi maq ge dov tseq nail phaq bhai tsaol-aq al gaq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, aqmaol dav lai thaq-al meeq. Aqhaqlal dav lai thaq-al meeq. Miqyail taivq-ail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngal tsaol-aq al gaq nail ganl neema eeq eeq-ail ge la dei-eiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal gaq bhaq nail juq nail ganl maq ngel nail neq, ngaq nail ganl neema eeq eeq-ail khul teevq phaq-ail maq ge-ail.

Ngal neema eeq eeq-ail ge movq khi ngaol-aoq, ngal yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi maq ngel-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai ge nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq-i mail nl nail hal nail juq bhai yu moel khi, ngaq-i mail ge nail thail nail juq bhai ya gaiq-a nail, niil nvq phaq maq ngel nail neq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail ngaq nail ganl maq ya saol-nvq dai, ngaq nail ganl ngal neema eeq eeq-ail khul teevq phaq-ail maq ge-ail.

Mao-ail eeq mao-ail heel nail juq phaodaiq lavq-a nail bhaqda nee, ngaq nail neema bhai ngal maq ya thaqeeq dai, aqsivq haqjoil phao ngaq bhai khaoltsoe coev lavq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Khaoltsoe al neq, neivq Saqdaq nail gaqkhoel pevq khi, ngaq nail neema bhai ngal maq ya thaqeeq dai, ngaq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq-a nail ngaol.
“Khaoltsoe niil he dov lavq yaoq” dai, hail pov bhee dai, ngal Yeiqsul bhai hal-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq aivq ge nail: “Ngaq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol naoq nail haqbhoil lovq nail ngaol. Gaq bhaq nail dao bhai ngaq nail bhaqaoq bhee lal nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali nail bhaqaoq ngaq bhai khaq mao iqsanl uvthaiq lavq dai, ngal gaq bhaq nail ganl juq bhai neema eeq eeq-ail lavqkhiq teevq tsail, ge movq-ail nial.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali nail haqbhoil ya daq nail juq bhai ngal lavqkhiq teevq tsail daq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail ya daq thailthaiq nail juq neq, gaq bhaq nail, khal ge movq-ail ge lal nail, haq nail aoq nail, khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail khi, mao-ail suqsaq nail, niil juq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal gaq bhaq thailthaiq-u phao, ngal gaq kav thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngal yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai niailhai bhi pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngaq bhai tsiqeeq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, khul teevq phaq-ail maq nl dov nail tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, eeq nail heel nail gaqkhoel al juq nail pul-nvq bhai teevq peivq-ail maq jaol-ail.

Nuljuq ngaq bhai maldil gaqkhoel nial dai, ya heeq nia dai, ngal nl daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq maqkhaiq, noeq-u maq dov nail phaq maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq maqkhaiq, ngal ol ol-ail, nuljuq bhai nl daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Phul heel tsaojao-ai lavq yaoq dai, nuljuq bhai ngal maq hal-a nail al teevq phaq maq ngel nail neq, Khali yaq yaoq juq yaoq bhai ngal thaqeeq khi nuljuq bhai maq thaqeeq nail, khul phaq jiav nail-aiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail laiq nail al phaq bhai khalhai khi ngaol-aoq, oeqbal teevq pov phaiq lavq yaoq dai, hal nail ngaol.

Hail pov teevq pov nuljuq jaol nail bha lee naol dai, niil aq-il iqsanl, ngal lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Niil thal khe pov iqsanl, nuljuq ngaq bhai maq ya tsaojao-ai lavq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail phul heel bhai ngal oil movq nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq bhai taivq-ail ngal oil movq-ail nial. Yaq juq neq, aqbhu aqma nail haqbhoil phul heel ya halpov jil-ai nail maq ngel-ail. Aqbhu aqma juq yaq juq nail haqbhoil ya halpov jil thaq-ai nail ngaol.

Ngal khal jiav nail phaq iqsanl khi mail ngaq nail aqmaol iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai tsaojao-ai nail haqbhoil lavqkhiq teevq tsail danq-a nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaiq-a deedee nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq ngaq bhai micil taivq-ail gaiq-a lavq nail laiq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai yalgaq aqphoiq maq hal khi ngaol-aoq, “Paolluv nvjuq bhai jalmul mul ya-a nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq ge nail ngaol.
Ngal tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq khoel-ai leevq-ail, nuljuq nail phul heel bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq-a nail laiq.

“Aqyu juq jaol nail bha ail yaoq” dai, ngal Tiltuv bhai hal khi, aqivq jaqbheq al gaq bhai iqsanl aivq nee mail nuljuq jaol nail bha khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Tiltuv nuljuq nail phul heel bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq jaq-a nail laiq. Nv-nvq gaq neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi ganl nl thailthaiq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq. Nv-nvq gaq gailkhaol teevq khaol bhai taivq-ail tsao nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.

Nvjuq nuljuq nail sivtavq bhai nvjuq nail ganl ge kovq nail dai taivq-ail, nuljuq noeq thailthaiq-ai haq nail laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq. Nvjuq Khali yaq pevq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nail sivtavq-ai nuljuq bhai ge bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, niil juq iqsanl mail nvjuq nl-a nail neq, nuljuq bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail dai khi, nl-a nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal-u phao, ngaq-i mail noeqthunq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq maq pevq lal-a nail nee ovqtavq, nuljuq-i mail noeqthunq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl maq pevq lal nail jaol-aq dai, khaoqlaol-ail nial. Iqdaiq iqtsai dov nail, maivjeel jeel nail, neejiav jiav nail, yovqgavq meeq lal dai taivq-ail nl nail, ge doil nail, haoqnaol phao nee khal ge movq-ail ge nail, neema eeq nail, suqsaq lal heeq phaq-ail nl nail, nuljuq niil juq nl thailthaiq nail khul-il dai, ngaq bhai khaoqlaol-ail nial.

Niil thal khe pov ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal-u phao, ngaq nail Miqyail nuljuq nail sivtavq-ai ngaq bhai thaqtheq lavq nail bhai iqsanl ngaq bhai khaoqlaol-ail nial. Jel lal-u phao, maq meeq maq haol nail phaq, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq khi mail khaqmiq sev nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq juq niil aq-il kev dai, oeqbal maq noeq pov nail ngel-i mail, ngal ya noeqhaq deedee nail ngel-ail jaol-aq dai, khaoqlaol-ail nial.

Niil thal khe pov, nuljuq jaol nail bha lal nail niil neq, hail pov teevq pov ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: “Khal ge nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aqduq aqtsil bhao dai, salkhil khanq nail nvq gaq hail gaq ya jaol nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha nvq pov teevq pov nalga lal-u phao, ge-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, niil aq-il nuljuq nee mail maq jaol khi ngaol-aoq, gaoq ge-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal haq neq, jel lal-u phao, oeqbal nl nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, yaoq juq yaoq bhai maqkhaiq, maq bhi jel-ail.

Khali ngaq bhai juq khi daoq ge nail ngel-ail laiq dai, nuljuq heeq kivq movq nail ngel-i mail, ngal aqyu juq bhai maq bhi jel-ail. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai Khali ganl nl nail neq, gaq bhaq nail maq ngel-ail. Bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail ngaol.

Khali neq, gaq bhaq nail lavqkhoel nee lavqyavq kovtavq bhai sil khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee aivq niil aq-il aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, nvjuq Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai gaq bhaq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee, nvjuq Khali nee mail aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq ya moel nail ngaol.

“Ngal neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivq ail laiq, maq ivq ail laiq” dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq laonqdaiq yaoq. Aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel Yeiqsul Khali jaol nail bhai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, nuljuq laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai maq khanqtsaol-ail.
Nvjuq neq, laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai khanq tsaol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial.

Nuljuq laiq nail tsa nail phaq maq ya nl dai, nvjuq Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Nvjuq laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai khanqtsaol nail ngaol dai, bhi dov lal movq nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq hal nail maq ngel-ail. Nvjuq maq khanqtsaol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aqmeeq phaq nl nia dai, nvjuq geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai lav tsoiq dai, nvjuq khul teevq phaq-ail maq nl kivq-ail. Maldil tsaq nail phaq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail nvjuq nl kivq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq gaq bhaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq gaq kav nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial. Nuljuq meeq lal bhee lal dai, nvjuq geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal-u phao, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ngaq bhai aqyanq bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, mao-ail maq ya khaq dai, ngal nuljuq nee mail maq jaol-u phao, ganl niil juq ngal haoqgavq niil keiv bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail bivq lavq-a nail aqyanq al neq, nuljuq bhai lav cov nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq bhai bhi eeq bhiq heel lal nail haqbhoil ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, haoqnao naosaq khe daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Doevq phal yaoq. Ngaq nail hal daoq bhai iqsanl, naldaiq lavq yaoq. Neema teevq heeq bhai taivq-ail tavq yaoq. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaq lai jil lai yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq khi neesal-ovq nail phaq bivq nail Miqyail nuljuq nee mail jaol nail ngaol.
Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee aqlavq he yaoq. Miqyail nail tsaol-aq-i mail nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol geiq dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol, Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel nee aqtsaoq tsaoq nail phaq, nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Gaqkhoel bhi jiovq nail haqbhoil tsaol-aq yaq-i mail khul-a nail maq ngel-ail, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail gaqkhoel kha lavq-a nail iqsanl maq ngel dai, Yeiqsul Khali khi aivq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail khul-a nail gaq pevq nail, ngal Paolluv ngaol.
Ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq iqsanl nee mail, Gaqlaqtil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Yeiqsul Khali al gaq, ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, mao-ail haqeiv nail niil yeel nail lavqkhoel, ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail nail haqbhoil, ngadao nail oeqbal tsiqhaol nail khi, aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq bhel. Aqmiq.

Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol lavqkhoel, nuljuq bhai khul-a nail gaq bhai nuljuq lavqtsail mail khaonq khi, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao bhai, lavqtsail mail hav bhoel nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai noeq-u maq dov-ail pevq-il.

Maldil dai, ge haq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yaoq phaq yaoq maq jiav-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq bhai lav suqsaq khi Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai oil phal movq nail tsaol-aq teevq juq jaol nail ngel-i mail, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol.

Nvjuq maqkhaiq, nqtavq gaqkhoel maqkhaiq, nvjuq-i mail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niilniai nee bheeq-n nail, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yaoq phaq yaoq cavq haq neq, khal cavq nail gaq nail kovtavq bhai iqkhail yavq nail phaq kev lee dei-eiq.

Iqmoeq-u phao nvjuq-i mail ge jel-a nail daoq bhai niil aq-il ngal teevq pov gaoq ge pov nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, nuljuq-i mail hav bhoel jel-ai thaq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai maq dul lai nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yaoq phaq yaoq cavq lal haq neq, aivq nail kovtavq bhai iqkhail yavq nail phaq kev lee dei-eiq.

Tsaol-aq yaq neema tsaq dai, nl nail maq ngel. Miqyail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai ngal nl movq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq neekhaol sil nail phaq bhai ngal laijai khi nl nail ngel-ail laiq. Alhai gaoq nl haq neq, ngal Khali nail yaqkav maq ngel yaoq-aol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngaq-i mail cavq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil neq, tsaol-aq yaq jaol nail nee dov lee-a nail maq ngel-ail dai, nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial.
Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul Khali-i mail ngaq bhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aolsaolkovq thaoq-u phao, ngal aqdoevq khalhai doevq-a nail ganl, nuljuq ya gaiq daiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, ngal Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl bhai mailma-ail khoeq khi, lav luq lav seil nail dai khi, laijai-a nail ngaol.

Ngal ngaq nail aqphiq aqbhal-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aolsaolkovq bhai, neema kev deedee nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai, ngaq-ai khe-ai aqkovq jiav nail tsaol-aq nee maqtsil maodai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aolsaolkovq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal maq doevq lee-u nee mail, ngaq bhai tsel dov khi, aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nee mail ngaq bhai khul lavq-a nail Miqyail neq, aivq nail Yaqyov nail ganl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai cavq bhiq ail dai, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aivq nail Yaqyov ngaq bhai bhi moel lavq-a nail ngaol. Bhi moel lavq gaq-al ngal-aq neq, ngal tsaol-aq yaq bhai maoqbhaoq nl-a nail maq ngel.

Ngal gaqkhoel maq pevq lal-u nee mail, gaqkhoel pevq thailthaiq nail, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha jaol nail juq jaol nail bha ngal maq lai-al. Teevq pov taivq-ail Aqlal milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Daqmaqsail meenq bhai kovq lai-a nail ngaol.
Hail kovq bhee lal-u phao, Geiqphal jaol nail bha nalga lai nail dai khi, Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha dav lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq nee mail tsel ngaq n jaol-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul nail jaqbheq Yaqkov maq ngel nail neq, ngal gaqkhoel teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq moel-al.
Ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai gevq bhiq-a nail neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail maq ngel-ail dai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai ngal ge nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngal Sulliv milkhaoq khi Gillilciv milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl juq, ngaq bhai maq heeq nia-ail haq-al.

“Jel lal-u phao, ngadao bhai khoeq lavq-a nail al gaq, aq-u phao aivq-i mail lav luq lav seil-ail daiq-a nail, neema thaqtsaol nail geeqlaoq daoq al daoq, niil aq-il cavq bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, ge nail bhai taivq-ail aqyu juq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal bhaqda nee aqyu juq Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsel liq kovq bhee lal-u phao, ngal Tiltuv bhai hevq khi, Bhaqnaqbhal nee mail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha gaoq lai-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngaq bhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, lai-a nail ngaol. Aqivq aqtsu juq nee aqtsi tsu dai, thaoqphuq khi, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maq ngel nail juq bhai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq ail-a nail ganl, ngal ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail nl jel lavq-a nail phaq khi niil aq-il nl thailthaiq nail phaq bhai aqnieivq-ail maq bhiq pevq-ail movq-i mail, alhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail Tiltuv neq, Heiqlaqsal tsaol-aq ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev bhiq yaoq dai, yu maq ge-ail.

Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee ngadao juq-i mail ya-a nail jel-ail nail phaq bhai khoiq heldaiq khi, ngadao juq bhai aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq khi, aqyu juq nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol nail dai khi, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, nvjuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqtsi tsu dai aol khoiq lal-a nail ngaol. “Nvjuq neq, nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil aqivq jaqbheq maq ngel-ail.
Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail maldil tsaq nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai ivq dai, nvjuq aqyu juq nail daoq bhai teevq peivq-ail maq hav bhoel-ail.

Aqivq aqtsu bhi jiovq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl, ngaq nail haqbhoil teevq-eel nul neq, thoi dai dai-ail bheeq-n nail dai, maq noeq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai, lavqniil phao taivq-ail heldaiq khi dal nail maq ngel-ail. Aqivq aqtsu al juq neq, ngal cavq nail juq nee maqtsil, aljaiq khul teevq phaq-ail maq ge laoq lavq-al.

Al ovqtavq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq yaoq dai, Miqyail Bheiqtuvluv bhai av bhiq-a nail khe-ai, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq yaoq dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai av lavq-a nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heldaiq moel-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ganl nl yaoq” dai, Bheiqtuvluv bhai alyaq bivq-a nail Miqyail, “Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil ganl nl yaoq” dai, ngaq bhai iqsanl, alyaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail geeqlaoq bhai aqyu juq ya moel-u phao, Yaqkov, Bheiqtuvluv khi Yaolhaq, aqyu juq Bhaqnaqbhal nv-nvq gaq bhai aqlavq cavq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alhai khi lavq-a nail al neq, aqtsaoq tsaoq nail dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yu nail sivtavq bhai neema ivqdao dai aol nail aqivq jiovq nail juq ngaol. Nv-nvq gaq yu nail jeq-e jaq-a jaol nail bha ail nail bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq jaol nail bha ail nail bhai maqkhaiq, maoqbhaoq nl tsaq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail munl lavqkhoel khe, haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai thaq nioilpeivq lavq dei-eiq dai, aqyu juq nv-nvq gaq bhai hal-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Alhai nl nail neq, ngal iqsanl neema kev deedee nail ngaol.

Teevq pov, Bheiqtuvluv Aqdil-aoq meenq bhai kev lee-u phao, aivq-i mail nl nail teevq peivq-ail maq tsaq nail phaq bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal aivq bhai yu nail sivtavq nee khaq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yaqkov nail tsaol-aq juq maq kev lee-u phao neq, Bheiqtuvluv yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nee mail kovqkhail aoq jaoq jaoq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq al juq kev lee-u phao, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maq ngel nail juq bhai iqsanl, bavkov uqjaq bhiq oev movq nail juq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nee pav ail khi, aqtsaoq iqsanl maq tsaoq-ail jaol nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail tsaol-aq Khali yaq yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl, aivq khe-ai maq ngel nail phaq nl nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Bhaqnaqbhal iqsanl aqyu juq khe-ai nl nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq maldil tsaq nail lavqkhoel bhai daolcoev dai, maq jaol nail bhai ngal ya moel-u phao, ngal aqyu juq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai Bheiqtuvluv bhai niailhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol: “Naol Yuldav nail tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aol maq thaoq-ail, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail aol thaoq nail bhai, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aol ya thaoq nail ngaol dai, khul khi mail aqyu juq bhai khoel nail-aiq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao juq neq, doevq lee-u nee Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a oeqbal yaq maq ngel-ail.

Ngadao Yuldav nail tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq bhi nl lavq nail khe-ai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail pevq lal-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao juq heeq kivq nail ngaol. Ngadao juq iqsanl Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi nl lavq nail khe-ai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq maq pevq lal nia-ail.

Khali bhaqda nee tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, ngadao juq halpov thailthaiq-u phao, ngadao juq oeqbal yaq ngaol dai, dov lal haq neq, Khali neq, oeqbal nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail gaq laiq. Maq ngel-ail dei-eiq.
Ngaq-i mail peiv ha-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai ngal gaoq lav meeq-ail nul neq, ngal neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq-a nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Miqyail phao aqdoevq doevq kivq dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq khi, aoldaoq kovqdaoq phao sil-a nail ngaol.

Ngal Khali nee mail lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, niil aq-il ngal aqdoevq doevq nail neq, ngal doevq nail maq ngel-ail. Khali ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol. Niil aq-il ngal aqsivq haqjoil phao aqdoevq doevq nail neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai neema thaq tsaol khi doevq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngaq bhai gaiq-a khi, ngaq nail haqbhoil aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai aqnieivq-ail maq bhiq pevq-ail. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhaqda nee tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-ail nul neq, Khali sil-a nail neq, aqnieivq ngaol.

Gaqlaqtil milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq neq, aqtheq aqniaov niaov deedee-il. Yeiqsul Khali lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail ganl, nuljuq bhai aqmeeq-ai ge moel bhiq gaq khi ngaol-aoq, khaq sil gaq-i mail nuljuq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail daoq bhai, naldaiq yaoq dai, gaoq ge lavq-a nail-aiq.

Ngal nuljuq bhai daoq niil daoq naldaiq movq-ail nial. Nuljuq Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai ya-a nail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi nl lavq nail khe-ai, nl-a nail ngel-i mail ya-a nail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol-i mail ya-a nail laiq.
Nuljuq thoi dai theq thoi dai niaov nail laiq. Nuljuq Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq khi iqmoeq ilmoeq nl-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aqsivq haqjoil bhai juq juq-ail khi nl gil nail khi laiq.
Haq dee aoq deedee nail al juq nuljuq aqnieivq-ail daq nail laiq. Al juq aqnieivq ngaol dai, ngal maq noeq-ail.

Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhi jaol lee khi nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail phaq nl dol lavq-a nail neq, nuljuq aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi nl lavq nail khe-ai nl-a nail ngel-i mail laiq. Maq ngel haq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail laiq.
Alhai dul dai, Aqbhaqlaqhaq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail aqjievq lilheel maldil ngaol dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail Miqyail aqyu juq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal nail ngaol dai, maq pevq lal-u nee mail Jalliq heeq nia moel nia-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Naol bhaqda nee, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail geeqlaoq ya nail ngaol” dai, Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, neema thaqtsaol nail Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail geeqlaoq ya naol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi nl lavq nail khe-ai nl nail tsaol-aq, iqkhail yavq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel bhai khal gevq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, khaq mao iqsanl maq nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, iqkhail yavq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol dai, Jalliq bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhaqda nee tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq maq pevq lal nia-ail dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai maq tavq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai khal gevq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, nl bhee nail tsaol-aq, al bhaqda nee ya doevq nail ngaol” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

“Lavqyavq kovtavq bhai ya tavq heivq nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, iqkhail yavq nail bhai daq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq ngaol” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Khali neq, ngadao juq nail haqbhoil iqkhail yavq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngel-i mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, ngadao nail kovtavq bhai bhi kev lee nail iqkhail yavq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel, aivq ngadao bhai ul kovq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai bivq-ai thaq nail geeqlaoq, Yeiqsul Khali lavqkhoel nee yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail kovtavq bhai kev ail khi, “Ngal bivq naol” dai, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai ngadao ya-a nail ngaol. Neema thaq tsaol nail bhaqda nee ya-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aivq nail nv aivq yuq nail daoqma uqhuq daoq teevq daoq ge daiq lavq bhel. Tsaol-aq nail gaiqlaq bhai daoqma saljial ge ceiv-ail khi haoqgavq aqmeeq-ai gevq ceiv-ai thaq haq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail ge ceiv-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial pevq-ail teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq lav phal nia-ail. Aljaiq ge jaiq movq khi ngaol-aoq, maq ge jaiq nia-ail.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq khi aivq nail aqjievq bhai saljial al juq Miqyail-i mail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqjievq dai, ge nail neq, maodai gaq bhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Naoq nail aqjievq dai, ge nail neq, teevq gaq bhai ge-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Al gaq neq, Khali ngaol.

Ngal ge movq nail neq, niailhai ngaol. Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail, Miqyail daoqma saljial jaq-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee pultavq liq yal hail tsel kovq bhee lal khi pultavq bivq-ai lee-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq al neq, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail saljial al bhai, aqnieivq-ail maq bhi pevq-ail nia-ail.

Jaiqbhoil al bivq-a nail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq-ail nul neq, saljial bhai maq tavq-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail saljial bhai juq khi, Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai jaiqbhoil aqnieivq-ail bivq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq. Yaqhao khe saljial ya nail aqjievq al gaq maq kev lee nail gaiqlaq bhai, laiq nail tsa nail phaq bhi dov lal nail dai khi, Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq al bivq-u phao, Miqyail neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai juq khi, gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail gaq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq bhai taivq-ail tavq nail phaq neq, gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail gaq maq loq-ail. Miqyail neq, teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial bhai lav luq lav seil nail laiq. Teevq peivq-ail maq lav luq maq lav seil-ail. Bivq-ai thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq al, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nia-ail nul neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhaqda nee tsaq nail daol nail phaq maldil ya nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Jalliq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai oeqbal nail thaonq lavqkhoel bhai laol thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail phaq ya nail haqbhoil, alhai laolthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq maq kev lee nail gaiqlaq bhai, kev lee thailthaiq nail neema thaqtsaol nail al phaq bhai maq phaodaiq lavq-u kev dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq-i mail ngadao bhai laolthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, ngadao tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, Khali lee-u phao kev dai, ngadao bhai heldaiq phail lavq nail gaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il neema thaqtsaol nail phaq kev lee-aoq nail ngel-i mail, ngadao bhai heldaiq phail lavq nail al gaq nail pul-nvq bhai maq jaol yaoq-aol.
Nuljuq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail yaq juq pevq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai ulcuvq saol-a nail juq neq, aqgaq aqdoi doi-nq thaq nail khe-ai, Khali bhai doi-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl mail, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq munl taivq-ail pevq nail ngel-i mail, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq khi yu nail jeq-e jaq-a dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Yaqkav khi jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Yaqyov-aq khi yaqmai-aq dai iqsanl, maq tselpav yaoq-aol.
Nuljuq Khali nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail aqjievq lilheel iqsanl pevq khi, saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Ngal niailhai ge movq-ail nial. Jaiqbhoil ovq nail gaq, jaiqbhoil iqsanl aivq nail pevq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao neq, yaqkav teevq gaq khe-ai ya jaol nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqbhu-i mail ge ceiv-ai thaq nail al yanq maq kev lal-u phao kev dai, yaq al gaq aivq bhai heldaiq phail nail juq khi yalkav bhai heldaiq phail nail juq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, ngadao yaqnoil-ail jiav-u phao neq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol juq nail kov-uvq bhai yaqkav ya jiovq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai laolthaiq-ai thaq nail ngadao bhai ul kovq khi, Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal dai, aqyanq kev lal-u phao, Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq, yaqmai-aq nee mail doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai doevq lee-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq Miqyail nail yaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, “Aqbhu-ol, ngaq nail Aqbhu-ol” dai, bhiq gul nail dai khi, aivq nail Yaqyov nail Aqhaqlal, ngadao nail neema lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol lee-a nail neq, Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, naol miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol nail yaqkav maq ngel yaoq-aol. Naol Miqyail nail yaq ngaol. Miqyail nail yaq ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhaqda nee jaiqbhoil iqsanl ovq naol.
Jel lal-u, nuljuq Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia-u phao, miqyail maldil maq ngel nail juq nail kov-uvq bhai yaqkav jiovq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, Miqyail bhai heeq nia nail nee ovqtavq, maldil dai, ge haq neq, Miqyail nuljuq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail, gaq bhaq deedee khi khul teevq phaq iqsanl, maq nl nia nail miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol juq, gaoq nl kovq ail nail-aiq. Nuljuq al juq nail yaqkav gaoq jiovq movq nail laiq.
Nuljuq neq, nv lao lao-ai haq nail ngaol. Lav lov lav ceiv iqsanl, aqkovq aqlav iqsanl lao-ai haq nail ngaol.
Ngaq-i mail nuljuq nail haqbhoil khal nl khal hal-a nail juq, aqnieivq-ail pevq-ail nail khul-il dai, ngaq bhai khaoqlaol-ail nial.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq khe-ai pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl, ngaq-ai khe-ai pevq lal yaoq dai, hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail ngaq bhai nl laiq lavq-a nail teevq phaq iqsanl, maq jiav-ail.
Ngal nal nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai iqmoeq khe pov lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq ya cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngal alhai nal kav khoeq-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil haq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq ngaq bhai khal nl movq-ail maq nl lavq-al. Khaonq iqsanl, maq khaonq lavq-al. Nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai hav nail khe-ai, hav lavq khi, Yeiqsul Khali bhai hav nail khe-ai iqsanl, hav lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u khe nuljuq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail al, niil aq-il khaq bha bhi peivq ail-aoq nail-aiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq nail maivneev kevq dov khi ngaq bhai oil covq lavq nia nail kheel nul neq, oil covq lavq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq nail ganl ngal salkhil khanq kivq naol.
Niil aq-il ngal nuljuq bhai maldil tsaq nail phaq ge bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail laiq.

Tsaol-aq al juq nuljuq nail haqbhoil neema kev deedee nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqmeeq phaq noeq khi neema kev nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq khi aqyu juq teevq dao bhai tavq lai nia dai, nuljuq ngaq-ai nee pav-ail nail bhai, aqyu juq oil movq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aqmeeq phaq noeq khi neema kev nail neq, aqmeeq ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao taivq-ail maq ngel nail, khaq mao iqsanl alhai nl nail neq, aqmeeq ngaol.
Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, nuljuq Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai eeq lal heel lal-u kev dai, yaq tsiq-u phao nal nail khe-ai, ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil teevq pov gaoq nal thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq bhai noeq-u maq dov-il. Alheel ngel-i mail, niil aq-il nuljuq nee mail jaol khi, aqthel lav phal khi mail cavq bhiq movq-ail nial.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail pul-nvq bhai jaol movq nail juq-ol, nuljuq aoldaoq kovqdaoq ge nail bhai gaiq lal-ail laiq. Ngaq bhai ge daiq lavq yaoq.

Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol: Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail yaqyov nvq gaq jaol nail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, yaqkav jiovq nail yaqmai-aq gaq nail ovq nee doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, jel ail-a nail yaqmai-aq gaq nail ovq nee doevq lee-a nail ngaol.

Yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail yaqmai-aq gaq nail ovq nee doevq lee-a nail gaq neq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq bhaqda nee doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Bhuq-ail laoq ail-a nail yaqmai-aq gaq nail ovq nee doevq lee-a nail gaq neq, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, doevq lee-a nail ngaol.

Ganl niil ganl nee tsiqceiv daiq haq neq, saol oil nail phaq aol nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al nvq gaq neq, daoqma saljial nvq phaq ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, Silnaq gaoqjaoq khe daoqma saljial bhai tavq nail Haqgaqlal ngaol. Aivq yaq tsiq-a nail neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail yaqkav bhi jiovq nail dai khi, tsiq-a nail ngaol.

Haqgaqlal neq, Aqlal milkhaoq bhai jiav nail Silnaq gaoqjaoq ngaol. Niil aq-il jiav nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq bha ge movq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq iqsanl, aivq nail yaq juq iqsanl, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail yaqkav jiovq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq neq, jel ail-a nail yaqmai-aq gaq pevq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngadao nail aqma ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Yaq maq jaol daiq-a nail
maq bhao aqma-ol,
lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.
Yaq tsiq nail bhai
maq ya daq daiq-a nail
yaqmai-aq juq-ol,
lavqkhiq tsail deedee yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
yovjil maq bhao nail
yaqmai-aq neq,
yovjil bhao nail
yaqmai-aq nee maq tsil
yaq
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Ilcav neq, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Ngadao iqsanl alhai doevq lee-a nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq bhaqda nee doevq lee-a nail yaqyov al gaq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee doevq lee-a nail yaqyov al gaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail khe-ai, niil aq-il iqsanl, khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai khalhai gevq-ai thaq nail-aiq.

“Yaqkav jiovq nail aqyu nvq mayaq bhai the ha yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaqkav jiovq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaqyov neq, bhuq-ail lao ail-a nail yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaqyov nee mail jaiqbhoil teevq peivq-ail maq ya-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao neq, yaqkav jiovq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaq maq ngel. Jel ail-a nail yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaq ngaol.
Ngadao bhuq ail-a nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, Khali ngadao bhai bhi bhuq-ail lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ivqdao dai jaol yaoq. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail Yaqkav thaq gaoq jiovq.
Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai ge lavq bhel. Nuljuq bavkov uqjaq oev nail Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail aol thaoq haq neq, Khali nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol khal thaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai ngal teevq pov gaoq ge lavq bhel. Aol al thaoq nail tsaol-aq Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq iqsanl bhai, ya nl bhee nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal naol dai, nuljuq khal noeq nail juq, Khali bhai gaoq ceiv ceiv-aoq nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail lavqniil phao jiiv dol-aivq khi jaol nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol.
Ngadao juq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, noeqthunq khi, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq nail lavqkhoel nee daonq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil neq, bavkov uqjaq oev khi ngaol-aoq, maq oev khi ngaol-aoq, teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nl dol hal dol lavq nia dai, neema thaqtsaol nail al phaq taivq-ail ganl tsoiq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq-u neq, nuljuq aqmeeq-ai tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. Maldil tsaq nail haoqnao bhai maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai, khaq sil gaq nuljuq bhai lav tsoiq nail-aiq.
Nuljuq bhai jalmul mul nail al neq, nuljuq bhai khul-a nail, Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee dov lee-a nail, maq ngel-ail.
Daoqma uqhuq daoq teevq dao ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, deqtsiq micil cil teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, khaqmul teevq heeq heeq lao bhai bhi bhaonq lal nia nail ngaol.

Ngal noeq nail khe-ai nuljuq iqsanl mail noeq dai, ngal Yeiqsul bhai juq juq-ail, neema thaqtsaol naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail neema bhai lav suqsaq lal nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail-i mail yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq naol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq yaoq dai, ngal cavq nail cov nail ngel haq neq, khul khi mail khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ngal ya daq thailthaiq ngel-ail. Ngal alhai cavq nail cov nail ngel haq neq, lavqyavq nail ganl ngal cavq thailthaiq nail daoq al juq neq, yu nail haqbhoil phaqthiq thiq nail daoq juq maq ngel yaoq-aol.
Nuljuq nail neema bhai lav suqsaq lal nail tsaol-aq al juq bhai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq bhi oev ha gil movq-ail nial.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq bhuq-ail lao ail-a nail tsaol-aq ya pevq dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, bhuq-ail lao ail-a nail al bhai yovqgavq nail aqsivq haqjoil khal pevq movq nail khe-ai, thaq yuq. Goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel teevq gaq nail yaqkav teevq gaq jiovq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Naoq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq” dai, bivq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq nail lavqkhoel bhai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq iqsanl mail bhee lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq khaq pheeljaq khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq keivq heivq jaq haq neq, nuljuq pav-ail sav-ail khi cov-ail nail bhai yaolphaol yaoq.
Aqhaqlal Miqyail hel-aivq lavq nail khe-ai, ail yaoq dai, ngal ge movq-ail nial. Alhai ail haq neq, nuljuq aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neekhaol haoqnao maq ail yaoq-aol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai lav tsoiq khi, Aqhaqlal Miqyail iqsanl aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol bhai lav tsoiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq nl movq nail khe-ai maq ya nl dai, al nvq gaq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq genl dev nail ngaol.
Aqhaqlal Miqyail hel-aivq lavq nail bhai nuljuq ail haq neq, nuljuq aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kov-uvq bhai, maq jaol yaoq-aol.

Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol bhaqda nee nl-a nail ganl juq neq, niailhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, moel lal-a nail ngaol. Khaqmiq sev nail, maq meeq maq haol nail phaq nl nail, maq tsaq maq daol nail lavqkhoel nee iqthaiq tavq jaol tavq nail.

Thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail, laol nail sail nail, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq neejiav jiav nail, khaq pheeljaq nail, yu bhai neekhaol maq sil nail, neema phail deedee nail, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail saol-nvq nail, gaoq ail gail ail nail munl bhoilpav nail.

Yu bhai maivjeel jeel nail, jilpheeq daol bov nail, maq tsaq maq daol nail bhaoqaiq lav sav nail, alhai nl nail juq ngaol. Alheel phaq nl nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai maq ya aol lai-ail dai, iqmoeq-u khe pov ngal nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, niil aq-il thal khe pov iqsanl ge lavq bhel.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail aqheeq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail, lavqkhiq tsail nail, neesal-ovq nail, neenoeq heelma ma dai noeq nail, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail, aqmeeq phaq aol nail, saljial ivq nail.
Neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nail, niil juq ngaol. Niil juq thaq nl dai, gevq-ai thaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq teevq daoq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.

Yeiqsul Khali bhai khal tavq nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail aqsivq haqjoil phao maqkhaiq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neekhaol khi maivjeel jeel nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-ao nail ngaol.
Ngadao Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq juq-ail aqdoevq doevq nail ngel haq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail-i mail hevq daiq lavq nail phao, ail bhel.
Neema eeq nail maqkhaiq, iqdaiq iqtsai dov lal dai nl nail maqkhaiq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maivjeel jeel nail maqkhaiq niil juq bhai khaonq ha bhel.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nl laiq haq neq, aivq meeq lal jaq lal dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe, aqhaqlal phao gaq kav nail juq, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol iqsanl jalmul mul nail haoqnao maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq.
Nuljuq teevq gaq nail yalkav teevq gaq tsao phi yaoq. Tsao phi haq neq, nuljuq Khali nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bhee thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, teevq phaq-ail maq nl nia khi ngaol-aoq, “Ngal nl kivq deedee naol” dai, noeq haq neq, aivq bhai aivq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yovqgavq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail juq bhai saol-nvq yaoq. Alhai saol-nvq haq neq, yu-i mail nl-a nail bhai neekhaol maq sil mail, yovqgavq-i mail nl-a nail bhai neekhaol sil nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail yovqgavq bhai dal nail ganl yovqgavq nl nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq ya saol-a nail gaq, aivq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail gaq bhai, aivq jiav nail aqmeeq phaq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bivq nail tsaq naol.
Thaq noeq bheeq dei-eiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Miqyail bhai khal nl movq-ail maq nl nia-ail. Yovqgavq-i mail aqiq haiq-a nail khe-ai, yovqgavq ya gaiq nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil bhai tavq nail phaq, haiq haq neq, aqsivq haqjoil buvq-ail tsiq-ail nail phaq ya gaiq naol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai tavq nail phaq haiq haq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya gaiq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail gaq maq bhaq dai, aqmeeq phaq nl bhel. Ngadao neema maq cov haq neq, yanq kev lal-u phao, ya gaiq nail ngaol.
Khal eivq lal-u phao, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq nl bhel. Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel aqivq jaqbheq pevq nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil, a dai nee maqtsil nl bhel.
Ngaq nail aqlavq-i mail nuljuq bhai gevq bhiq thailthaiq nail haoqgavq aqgevq niil juq, khadai eeq nail-aiq dai, heldaiq daiq.

Aqsivq haqjoil phao khe aol juq bhai heldaiq meeq lal dai, nl movq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, nuljuq bhai bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol thaoq yaoq dai, nuljuq bhai khoel deedee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai nl nail neq, Khali nail lavqyavq bhaqda nee hevqkovq nail phaq ya naol dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq haq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq aqyu juq ya daq nail bhai, geesil nail ngaol.

Bavkov uqjaq oev nail tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail haoqnao maq tsaothe-ail, bavkov uqjaq oev nail aol niil phaq bhai nuljuq nl dai, aqyu juq nl kivq naol dai, khaoqsail he movq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai bavkov uqjaq bhi oev movq-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqyavq bhai taivq-ail, neekhaol sil duq jiav nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq bhaqda nee, neekhaol sil duq maq jiav-ail. Lavqyavq al bhaqda nee, miltsaq bhai tavq nail phaq, ngaq nail haqbhoil sil gil-aoq nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl miltsaq bhai tavq nail phaq nee sil-ail ceevq-ao nail ngaol.
Bavkov uqjaq oev nail maqkhaiq, maq oev nail maqkhaiq, khul teevq phaq-ail, ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Tsaol-aq aqsivq pevq lal nail taivq-ail ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.

Gaiq jel lavq-a nail daoq niil juq nail haoqnao tsaothe nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, neesal-ovq nail phaq khi mail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq jiav dei-eiq.

Yanqgaol nee pultavq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl ngaq bhai thaq gaoq suqsaq lal. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ya daq-a nail malbavq jiav nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Ngal neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel ya jiovq-a nail Paolluv ngaol. Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq juq bhai, haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail meeq nail haol nail juq ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Aivq neq, Khali bhai juq khi, aqhaqlal phao tavq nail nqtavq khe geeqlaoq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, ngadao juq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Miltsaq maq teivq-u nee, Miqyail ngadao juq bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, Khali bhai juq khi ngadao bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao aivq nail sivtavq bhai tsaolmeeq tsaolhaol khi mail oeqbal thaq nail phaq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, Miqyail ngadao juq bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee ngadao bhai iqmoeq-u nee mail aivq nail yaq bhi pevq lal nail haqbhoil noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alhai pevq lal dai, aivq neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Ngadao Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nee tavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, Miqyail aivq mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aivq nail Yaqyov ngadao nail haqbhoil bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqyov nail aqsivq bhaqda nee, Miqyail ngadao bhai hevqkovq lavq khi oeqbal phaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol eeq dee heel deedee nail ngel-i mail, alhai nl-a nail ngaol.
Neenoeq neekha khi mail noeqheeq noeq dov nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol al, ngadao nail kovtavq bhai teevq pov nee teevq pov mao lal dai, aivq nl lavq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aq-u Miqyail aivq nail neenoeq oil-uvq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il ngadao juq bhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Khali bhaqda nee aivq alhai nl nail, neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Phaodaiq lavq-a nail al neq, yanq kev lal-u phao, nqtavq kovtavq bhai khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maqkhaiq, Khali bhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lai nail ngaol.

Ngadao iqsanl Khali bhaqda nee, aivq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal dai, iqmoeq-u nee mail Miqyail ngadao bhai tselpav-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel aivq neema tsaq khi bhi bhee lal dai, noeqceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai bhi tsiqeeq nail dai khi, Khali bhai iqmoeq-u nee mail, noeqthunq-a nail ngadao bhai, Miqyail tselpav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl, nuljuq jaol nail bhai hevqkovq nail phaq bhi kev lee-a nail, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq pevq nail, maldil tsaq nail daoq ya gaiq khi, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi, aivq nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq ceiv nail haqbhoil, nuljuq bhai junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, ngadao Miqyail nail jaiqbhoil teevq bhee ya naol dai, ya heeq kivq nail haqbhoil bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai tsiqeeq nia dai, Miqyail alhai nl lavq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ganl maqkhaiq, Khali yaq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a nail ganl maqkhaiq, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal Miqyail bhai khaq mao iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil iqsanl, tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Ngal geeqlaoq hal-u phao, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Miqyail bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol: “Seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq deedee nail Aqbhu-ol, aqyu juq naoq nail ganl heeq nia lal dai, noeq heeq noeq moel nia nail neema khi, noeq heeq noeq dov nia nail neema aqyu juq bhai bivq yaoq” dai, hal nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal-u phaoq, Khali yaq juq ya nail jaiqbhoil bhai tavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khadai eeq nail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul nail ngel-i mail, noeqthunq nail phaq khalhai jiav nail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai noeq moel nia lal nail haqbhoil, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl thailthaiq nail aivq nail bhaqaoq, khadai eeq nail ganl juq nuljuq heeq nia lal dai iqsanl, hal nail ngaol. Ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail bhaqaoq al neq, gaq kav deedee nail bhaqaoq pevq nail ngaol.
Miqyail bhaqaoq al bhai juq khi, Khali bhai bhi doevq kovq lal nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, Miqyail nqtavq kovtavq bhai aivq nail lavqmal phao bhi jaoldeel-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaol nail Khali neq, uvthaiq nail juq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, gaq kav nail juq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, heeqphaq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aqmil khal mil-ai thaq nail iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, niil yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, yaqhao khe yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, eeq dee heel deedee nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai Khali nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Khali yaq munl nail haqbhoil aivq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uqhuq bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol.
Khali yaq munl neq, Khali nail aqmaol ngaol. Aivq aqmaol al nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq bhee jaol nail khe-ai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee lal dai iqsanl, aivq nl nail ngaol.
Nuljuq Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq mail oeqbal nail lavqkhoel bhai sil-u phao, Miqyail nuljuq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.

Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq niil yeel nail aol haqeiv nail haoqnao tsaothe-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail juq bhai uvthaiq nail neivq Saqdaq nail haoqnao iqsanl, tsaothe-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail aqheel ngaol.

Jel lal-u phao, ngadao juq iqsanl Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, ngadao juq aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol nl movq nail ngel-i mail, aqsivq haqjoil phao nl movq nail khe-ai maqkhaiq, neenoeq neelov nl movq hal movq nail khe-ai maqkhaiq, nl-a hal-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao juq iqsanl, yu khe-ai dul dai, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq bhai daq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia deedee nail Miqyail neq, aivq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq ngadao nail kovtavq bhai eeq deedee nail ngel-i mail, ngadao oeqbal lavqkhoel bhai sil-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq ngadao bhai Khali nee mail aqdoevq bhi doevq lal-a nail ngaol. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee nuljuq hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, ngadao bhai Yeiqsul Khali nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai bhi doevq kovq lal khi, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nqtavq kovtavq khe jaol duq lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol lavq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail aqmeeq phaq ngadao bhai, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi moel lavq khi, aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khadai eeq nail ngel-ail dai, yaqhao khe aqyanq lavqkhoel bhai phaodaiq lavq nail dai khi, aivq alhai nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, hevqkovq nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol. Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee ya-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq ngaol.
Nl nail hal nail bhaqda nee ya-a nail maq ngel-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl neema eeq duq maq jiav-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail ngadao bhai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao aqmeeq phaq nl dai, aivq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai ngadao bhai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miqyail iqmoeq-u nee mail lainq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngadao aqmeeq al juq nl dai, bhi doevq bhi jaol lavq-a nail ngaol.

Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq aqsivq haqjoil phao yu nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail bhai, thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq. Aq-u phao, bavkov uqjaq oev nail yuldav tsaol-aq juq nuljuq bhai, bavkov uqjaq maq oev nail tsaol-aq dai, khul-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, bavkov uqjaq oev-a nail al neq, aqsivq haqjoil phao oev-a nail teevq-eel ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, aqyanq al yanq lavqkhoel, Khali nee mail teevq peivq-ail maq jil lai nia-ail. Ilsaqleiqlal munl lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, maq aol-ail. Geeqlaoq ya naol dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial juq bhai iqsanl, maq tavq-ail. Nuljuq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, noeqthunq duq maq jiav nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail maq bhao nail bhai iqsanl, thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq.
Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq eqyal bha jaol khi ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai, aivq nail aqsivq bhaqda nee, Miqyail niil aq-il aqjail bhi jail lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali bhaqda nee ngadao juq nail gaiqlaq bhai tsaq lai jil lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngadao tsaoljeq-e nvq jeq-e bhai teevq jeq-e taivq-ail bhi pevq lal khi, tsaol jeq-e al nvq jeq-e nail gaiqlaq bhai thao pav-ai thaq nail ilphail khe-ai dul nail neejiav jiav nail phaq bhai peiv ha-a nail ngaol.

Aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail aol juq khi bivq-ai thaq nail daoq al juq bhai, aivq phi ha-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai nl-a nail neq, tsaol jeq-e nvq jeq-e pevq nail bhai aivq nail lavqkhoel nee tsaol jeq-e aqsivq teevq jeq-e taivq-ail bhi pevq lal khi, bhi tsaq bhi jil lai nail dai, nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul lavqyavq kovtavq bhai sildan-a nail bhaqda nee, ngadao tsaol jeq-e nvq jeq-e bhai teevq jeq-e taivq-ail bhi pevq lal-a nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail bhai tsaq lai jil lai dai iqsanl, aivq nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Lavqyavq bhaqda nee, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq neejiav jiav nail phaq bhai bhi peivq ail-a nail ngaol.
Khali lee khi, eqyal bhai jaol nail nuljuq bhai maqkhaiq, aqjail bhai jaol nail nvjuq bhai maqkhaiq, neesal-ovq dei-eiq dai, Khali lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq bhaqda nee ngadao tsaol jeq-e nvq jeq-e nvq jeq-e-ail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq teevq-eel nail lavqkhoel nee, Aqbhu Miqyail jaol nail bha lai nail gailkhaol daol lal-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq khe tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Daq-i iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq juq nee milkhaoq teevq khaoq bhai jaol khi, Miqyail nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel khe yaq juq ngaol.

Ilkhaol al il bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq kaovq-ai thaq nail phaq neq, gaqkhoel juq khi Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq ngaol. Miqyail nuljuq bhai al nail kovtavq bhai kaovq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali neq, ilkhaol nail jioivqloiv bhai kaovq-ai thaq nail lovmav heeq ma ngaol.

Aivq nail lavqkhoel nee ilkhaol il lao lao-ail teevq phaq nee teevq phaq tsaq lai thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel meeq nail haol nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma pevq lal dai, ilkhaol al il eeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Miqyail jaol nail ilkhaol pevq lal dai, aivq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq juq-ail nuljuq bhai iqsanl ilkhaol al il nail lavqkhoel bhai kaovq bhoel thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali nail ganl bhaqda nee ngal thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ganl al neq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail nuljuq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq-a nail al ngaol.
Nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai bhiq tsaojao-ai nail haqbhoil, Miqyail aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, aivq-i mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail phaq, ngaq bhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Ganl niil ngal davqnil nil dai, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq haoqgavq al keiv ge daiq-u phao, Khali bhai tavq nail oil tsail-ai thaq nail phaq bhai, ngal heeq nia-ail nial dai, nuljuq ya heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Oil tsail-ai thaq nail al phaq nail ganl, milnee uqnee khe tsaol-aq juq bhai maq bhi heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, Miqyail nail meeq nail haol nail gaqkhoel juq khi aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai, phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Oil tsail-ai thaq nail al neq, niailhai ngaol. Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhaqda nee yu nail jeq-e jaq-a Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nee jaiqbhoil ya khi, aqyu juq nee mail teevq maol taivq-ail pevq lal nail nee ovqtavq, jaq-ai thaq nail saljial bhai iqsanl teevq gaq khe-ai ya-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ngaq bhai bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil, yu bhai cavq bhiq-ail yaoq dai, aivq ngaq bhai khoel lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel bhai nl lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal aivq nail kovpavq niil ya-a nail ngaol.

Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail, mao dee bhee deedee khi aqphoiq phoiq nail ganl juq, yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai cavq bhiq ail dai, Khali yaq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel khe, yu nee maqtsil theq nail gaq pevq nail ngaq bhai, Miqyail geeqlaoq eeljaol al bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, iqsanl bhai teivq-a nail Miqyail aivq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai, milnee uqnee nee oil tsail-ai thaq nail al phaq, khalhai bhee lal thailthaiq nail ganl tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, phaodaiq bhiq dai, aivq ngaq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail dai ge haq neq, Miqyail neenoeq neekha khadai eeq khadai heel nail ganl, Khali yaq munl bhaqda nee nqtavq khi mail miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai uvthaiq nail juq khi bhaqaoq eeq nail juq bhai niil aq-il bhi heeq nia nail dai khi, milnee uqnee nee oil tsail-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq maq teivq-u nee mail, aivq-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel niil aq-il bhee lal dai, aivq alhai nl-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao juq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aol lai kivq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil haq dee aoq deedee nail juq ya daq thailthaiq nail bhaqda nee, neema thaq cov dei-eiq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol. Ngal ya daq thailthaiq nail niil neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil seiqleiq khaoqsail ngaol.
Ganl niil bhaqda nee, Aqbhu Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai ngal peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq khi geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq bhai maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol jeq-e iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, maldil Aqbhu gaq ngaol.

Ngal niailhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq dee mao deedee nail khe-ai, aivq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai bhaqaoq khi gaq teevq bhee aol lal dai, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Khali nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai jaol ivq lal dai, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee, daoqtsail kha-ail khi daoqthaoq ivq nail ngel-i mail, Khali yaq iqsanl nee mail Khali nail goil nail gaiq-a nail al, khadai eeq khadai heel, khadai moe khi, khadai navq nail bhai heeq nia lal dai iqsanl, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail teevq bhee teevq lovq maq heeq kivq-a nail, Khali nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhai nuljuq heeq nia lal dai iqsanl, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Aivq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail al phaq bhai heeq nia lal-u phao, Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail bhaqaoq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai nl nail hal nail ngel-i mail, ngadao hal nail khi noeq nail dul nail nee maqtsil, aivq maodai nl lavq hal lavq nail ngaol.
Khali yaq munl nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel.
Yeiqsul bhaqda nee thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail ngal, nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul khi aqdoevq bhi doevq-a nail ngaol. A bhai geel-nvq dai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq.
Khaq mao iqsanl yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq thaqtheq khi, neema neenuq neebeiv aol yaoq. Al ovqtavq, neema heelma ma dai thaq khi, goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ol yaoq.
Tsaq lai jil lai nail phaq-i mail nuljuq bhai leel jaoq-ai thaq nail lavqkhoel, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee khaq mao iqsanl neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq kivq lal dai, laijai deedee yaoq.

Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil noeqthunq duq teevq phaq taivq-ail bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq aqmaol teevq maol taivq-ail bhao khi, Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol khi, neema thaqtsaol nail teevq phaq taivq-ail, ulcuvq saol nail iqsanl teevq phaq jiav-ail teevq-eel ngaol.
Ngadao juq iqsanl nail Aqbhu Miqyail teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol. Aivq neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai jaol khi iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai ganl nl nail khi, iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Khali aivq-i mail ngadao bhai kovpavq khal bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq geeqlaoq al ya nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Aivq daqmoe bhai
dav lai-u phao,
aivq bhai neejiav
jiav nail juq bhai
phee dal laivq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq,
aivq tsaol-aq yaq bhai
kovpavq bivq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq dav lai-a nail dai ge nail al neq, iqmoeq-u phao miltsaq daoqthaoq bhai yavq kha ail-a nail bhai ge nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Yavq kha ail-a nail al gaq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee lal dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai iqsanl dav lai-a nail al gaq ngaol.

Aivq-i mail bivq lavq-a nail kovpavq al juq neq, niil juq ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai gaqkhoel bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol.
