Teevq pav ganav juq bhai Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail juq bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail khi cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail juq bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol.
Khali nail aqmaol eeq lal heel lal nia dai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil ganl bhi nl nail dai khi, aivq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai kovpavq al bivq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai nl haq neq, ngadao juq iqsanl mail, neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai heeq nia nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq nia lal nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, ngadao iqsanl Khali bhee nail khe-ai bhee lal khi, yovkav eeq lal nail ngaol.

Yovkav eeq lal haq neq, ngadao yaq maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, jalmul mul nail tsaol-aq juq, neenoeq neekha yuq khi goiqbhaoq bhaoq bhaoq-ail mee nia phaq cavq lal-u phao, lilmoel-i mail bhoe ha nail khe-ai, ngadao bhai maq bhoe pov maq bhoe lav nia-ail.

Al ovqtavq, ngadao goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee tsaq nail daoq taivq-ail ge khi, ngadao nail uqhuq pevq nail Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, ya bhiq eeq ya bhiq heel lal nail ngaol.

Aivq bhaqda nee, aqmaol neq, uqhuq bhai covq cavq lai khi, aqmaol maol lao-ail eeq lal khi, goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai eeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqmaol al neq, khil ceevq lavq ceevq bhaqda nee, teevq khaoq nee teevq khaoq covq cavq khi, alsail yaoq sail yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq nail ganl yovqgavq nl nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol maol lao-ail eeq lal nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel nee ngal nuljuq bhai niailhai aqduq aqtsil tsil dai, ge lavq bhel. Laolkivq yaq aqdoevq doevq nail khe-ai, nuljuq thaq doevq. Aqyu juq nail neenoeq neq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl ganl maq tsoiq-ail.

Aqyu juq nail neema neq, navtsee deel ngaol. Aqyu juq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq heeq nia nail nee ovqtavq, neema aqgaol ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail bivq-a nail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq bhai teevq peivq-ail maq tavq-ail.

Aqyu juq khul teevq phaq bhai iqsanl haqsil nail maq bhaoq dai, aqjiivq aqcavq khaqmiq sev nail phaq nl nail haqbhoil aqmaol av bhiq gaq khi, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq iqsanl bhai, neekhaol teevq sil nl nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Khali bhai saol oil-a nail neq, alhai nl nail haqbhoil maq ngel-ail.
Nuljuq Yeiqsul nail ganl ya gaiq-a nail ngel haq neq, aivq nail lavqkhoel maldil tsaq nail phaq aol nail bhai, ya saol-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail ya saol-a nail al neq, neema aqlil loev ha-ail ceevq yaoq dai, ya saol-a nail ngaol. Neema aqlil al neq, jel lal-u phao, nuljuq-i mail nl nail hal nail aol juq bhai tavq khi, bhi laiq-ail nia nail jalmul mul nail juq bhaqda nee, luq-ail seil-ail thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail neema aqsivq bhi phal lal yaoq.
Maldil tsaq nail phaq pevq nail, tsaq nail daol nail khi mail meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail khe-ai dul lai dai, teivq-ai thaq nail aqdoevq doevq nail aqsivq phaq doi yaoq.

Alheel ngel-i mail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq maldil tsaq nail daoq taivq-ail ge tsaoq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ngadao neq, aqmaol teevq maol bhai taivq-ail covq nail alsail juq ngaol.
Nuljuq neema phail khi ngaol-aoq, oeqbal thaq nl. Nlma maq ga bhoel ail-u nee mail neema phail nail phaq bhi sivq ail yaoq.
Neivq heeqphaq nail haqbhoil jaol duq thaq bhi ya.

Khoiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, maq bhaoq daiq khaonq khi, yovqgavq doevq nia jaol nia nail nee ovqtavq, haq yaq aoq yaq juq bhai tsaojao-ai kivq dai, aqsee aqdaol daol dai, ganl nl jaq keivq daol yaoq.

Nuljuq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee maq meeq nail daoq teevq daoq-ail thaq bhi dov lal. Ya gaiq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq dai, yu loq nail bhai tsaq lai nail daoq taivq-ail ge khi, yu bhai bhi eeq bhi heel lal nail daoq aqmeeq taivq-ail ge yaoq.
Miqyail nail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai thaq bhi noeqhaq. Hevqkovq nail aqn bhai kev dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee aqtsaq cov-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yu bhai neema nal nail, yu bhai neema bhao nail, yu bhai neema phail nail, yu nee mail iqdaiq iqtsai dov nail, yu bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail, niil juq iqsanl bhai khaonq ha yaoq. Yu bhai khoeq lai dai nl movq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee iqsanl, khaonq ha-ail ceevq yaoq.

Nuljuq teevq gaq nail gaiqlaq teevq gaq aqmeeq phaq nl khi, teevq gaq nail gaiqlaq teevq gaq gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail neema aol yaoq. Miqyail Khali bhai juq khi nuljuq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal phaiq bhiq yaoq.
Nuljuq neq, Miqyail gaiq-a nail aivq nail yaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, aivq khe-ai dul lal dai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Khali ngadao juq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel aqdoevq doevq yaoq. Khali ngadao nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail dai khi, aivq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol. Laol bhiq-a nail al neq, Miqyail neekhaol sil nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngel-i mail, khaqmiq sev nail, aqjiivq aqcavq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nail, neekhaol jiav nail, niil heel nail ganl juq bhai maq ya nl-ail. Nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai al juq ge-ail taivq-ail ge khi ngaol-aoq, maq tsaq-ail.

Aqjiivq aqcavq cavq nail daoq, ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq khi mail, ceivqleivq kha nail daoq, daoq niil juq bhai nuljuq teevq peivq-ail thaq ge thaq thail. Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail daoq taivq-ail ge yaoq thail yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq, neekhaol jiav nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, Khali khi mail Miqyail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai maq ya aol lai-ail dai, nuljuq heeq kivq yaoq. Neekhaol jiav nail tsaol-aq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq ge ge-ail, nuljuq bhai jalmul maq ya mul ya dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Al juq bhaqda nee Miqyail neema phail nail phaq, aivq nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq bhai gaoqceiv ceiv yaoq.

Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq iqsanl, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq daiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, Yeiqsul bhaqda nee aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol lal-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail aqbhaq nail yaq khe-ai aqdoevq doevq yaoq.
Aqbhaq al neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq, aqmeeq phaq khi mail tsaq nail daol nail phaq, bhi dov lal nail ngaol.
Nuljuq Miqyail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai halpov moel kivq dai, laijai yaoq.
Aqnav phaq bhai tavq nail ganl maq tsoiq nail nl nail hal nail juq bhai teevq peivq-ail thaq nl thaq hal. Ganl al juq khadai haqeiv nail ngel-ail dai, bhi dov lal yaoq.
Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail juq-i mail, bhallal bhai nl-a nail ganl juq bhai, ngadao ge-ail taivq-ail ge khi ngaol-aoq, haqsil duq jiav nail ngaol.
Khul phaq ngaol-aoq, aqbhaq bhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai, oil dov gil lavq-u phao, aqyu juq khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq nail bhai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, moel duq lal nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail:
“Iqthaiq kov-ai thaq nail
tsaol-aq juq-ol,
noeq lal yaoq.
Sil nail phaq nee
gaoq doevq kovq lal yaoq.
Khali naoq bhai
aqbhaq bhaq lavq naol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq aqdoevq doevq nail aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaoq. Neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai thaq doevq. Neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq khe-ai doevq yaoq.
Niil yeel neq, haqeiv nail yeel ngel-i mail, yanq khal ya-u phao teevq peivq-ail maq bhi sunq-ail dai, nl thailthaiq yaoq.
Neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq thaq bhi pevq. Miqyail neema khalhai tsaq nail ngel-ail dai, heeq nia nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq.
Jilpheeq thaq daol bov. Al neq, nuljuq bhai bhi cov-ail nail teevq-eel ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal teevq bhee bhi jaol yaoq.
Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail daoq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, daoqsel gul khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsiq eeq yaoq. Nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai, gul gul-ail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail haqbhoil, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai khaq mao iqsanl tsiqeeq yaoq.
Khali bhai ev nail lavqkhoel, teevq gaq nail kov-uvq teevq gaq aqmeeq-ail jaol yaoq.
Khaqma juq-ol, Yeiqsul nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai jaol yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali neq, Khali yaq munl nail uqhuq pevq nail khe-ai, yovjil iqsanl yovqgavq nail khaqma nail uqhuq ngaol. Khali neq, aivq nail aqmaol pevq nail Khali yaq munl bhai Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali yaq munl juq Khali nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail khe-ai, khaqma juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai ya jaol nail ngaol.
Yovjil juq-ol, Khali yaq munl bhai Khali gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai gaiq-a yaoq.
Aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail al neq, Khali yaq nail munl meeq lal haol lal nail haqbhoil ngaol. Khali neq, ulcuvq khi geeqlaoq daoq-i mail, aqyu juq bhai tsiq haol-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail tsiq haol-a nail dai ngal-aq, malbavq malyal maq bhao-ail ge duq maq jiav nail nee ovqtavq, meeq nail haol nail, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail Khali yaq munl pevq lal khi, seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel, munl al munl aivq nail sivtavq bhai jaol nia dai, Yeiqsul tsiq haol-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, yovjil juq iqsanl yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai ya gaiq-a naol. Yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq neq, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq maq bhe-ail. Yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq bhi jaq bhi daol khi heldaiq phail nail ngaol. Khali iqsanl alhai dul dai, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail ngaol.
Ngadao neq, Khali nail aqmaol bhai covq nail alsail juq pevq nail ngaol.
“Alheel ngel-i mail, yovjil juq neq, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma nee pavq-ail khi, yovqgavq nail khaqma nee ya doevq tavq nail lavqkhoel, nvq gaq teevq gaq taivq-ail pevq lal nail ngaol” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ganl niil neq, daoqceevq navq deedee nail ngaol. Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, Khali khi aivq nail munl nail ganl ge nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, yovjil juq-ol, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai gaiq-a yaoq. Khaqma juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail yovjil bhai ev yaoq.
Yaq juq-ol, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma nail daoq naldaiq yaoq. Nuljuq alhai nl nail tsaq nail ngaol.

“Naoq nail aqbhu aqma bhai ev yaoq” dai, ge nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq niil daoq bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq bivq nail haqbhoil saljial jaq-ai thaq nail Aoldaoq Kovqdaoq iqmoeq khe daoq ngaol.
“Alhai ev haq neq, naol yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai bhao lee ya lee khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqdoevq doevq-u phao, yeel bhao yeel ya nail ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqbhu juq-ol, naoq nail yaq juq neema phail lal dai, thaq nl bhiq. Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, tsu eeq bhiq yaoq.
Yaqkav juq-ol, Khali nail daoq naldaiq nail khe-ai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail yovqgavq nail ilheel nail daoq bhai neema daolcoev dai, geesil khi ev nail lavqkhoel nee naldaiq yaoq.

Ilheel ya moel dai taivq-ail nl hal khi, tsaol-aq neekhaol sil dai taivq-ail nl nail hal nail phaq thaq bhi pevq. Khali nail yaqkav pevq nail ngel-i mail neema kev nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail neema tsaq dai nl yaoq hal yaoq.
Nuljuq yaqkav jiovq khi, ya nl thailthaiq nail ganl juq bhai, tsaol-aq yaq nail ganl nl bhiq nail khe-ai maq ngel nail, Miqyail nail ganl nl bhiq nail khe-ai lavqkhiq tsail tav dai, nl bhiq yaoq.
Yaqkav maqkhaiq, yaqkav maq ngel nail juq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq-i mail aqmeeq phaq nl-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul kovpavq bivq lavq naol dai, heeq kivq duq yaoq.

Ilheel juq-ol, alhai dul dai, nuljuq iqsanl yaqkav juq nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq nl bhiq yaoq. Aqyu juq bhai geesil lal heeq phaq-ail thaq nl bhiq. Nuljuq maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail yaqkav juq maqkhaiq, iqsanl mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nqtavq kovtavq khe jaol nail al gaq nail yaqkav pevq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq yaoq. Aivq neq, yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai maivphaoq eeq nail nil nail maq tsel pav-ail.
Haoqnao naosaq khe daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, aivq nail gaq kav deedee nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, gaq kav lal yaoq.
Neivq heeqphaq jalmul mul lal nail phaq bhai nuljuq gaq lai kivq dai, Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail khen kha-ao iqsanl mail doi yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao neq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai genl dev nail maq ngel-ail. Maq moel kivq nail, uvthaiq nail juq nee maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq nee maqkhaiq, niil yeel nail lavqkhoel aqnav-i mail uvthaiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, nqtavq miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail neivq juq bhai maqkhaiq, genl dev nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, haqeiv nail aqn aqyanq kev lee-u phao, nuljuq jaol ivq kivq khi, iqsanl mail nl gil khi ivqdao dai thulphaol kivq dai, Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail khen kha-ao iqsanl mail doi-nq thaq yaoq.
Maldil tsaq nail phaq jiovqpavq pavq nail khe-ai pavq khi, tsaq nail daol nail phaq doeqdaq duq khe-ai doi yaoq.
Neesal-ovq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai, saiqnaov tsaoq nail khe-ai tsaoq-nq khi jaol yaoq.

Al ovqtavq, neivq Saqdaq-i mail bev-aivq lavq nail miqjaq tovq nail heeqnav maqtsoe bhai lav miv kivq dai, doeqdaq duq aqlavq bhai khaq mao iqsanl nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai khaq mao iqsanl nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.
Hevqkovq nail phaq pevq nail hail nail uqtsaoq tsaoq khi, Aqhaqlal Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail thaoma pevq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai tuv thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.

Al juq iqsanl, Miqyail tsaojao-ai lavq dai, geeqlaoq hal nail lavqkhoel nee doi yaoq. Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Al ovqtavq, gaq maq bhaq mail aqgeel geel dai jaol khi, geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal yaoq.

Ngal geesil nail neema maq aol dai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai tavq lai nail oil-uvq-ai thaq nail phaq, bhaqlaoq kheq dai cavq bhiq kivq dai, ngaq nail haqbhoil iqsanl geeqlaoq hal tsao yaoq.

Ngal geeqlaoq daoq al daoq nail haqbhoil jiqdan pevq nail ngel-i mail, thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngal geeqlaoq daoq al daoq cavq bhiq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail khe-ai, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, cavq bhiq kivq dai iqsanl, ngaq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal tsao yaoq.

Ngal khalhai nl thail hal thailthaiq nail ganl, nuljuq ya heeq kivq dai, ngal gaiq-a nail jaqbheq Duljil, nuljuq jaol nail bha lal kev-u phao, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ge lavq naol. Aivq neq, Miqyail nail ganl nl nail lavqkhoel-ai, saljial ivq nail teevq gaq ngaol.
Nvjuq khalhai pevq nail bhai nuljuq ya heeq nia dai maqkhaiq, aivq nuljuq nail neema bhai gaq bhi kav lal dai maqkhaiq, ngal aivq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lee naol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq nail kovtavq bhai neesal-ovq nail phaq jiav dei-eiq. Al ovqtavq, Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali-i mail bivq lavq-a nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq khi mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq iqsanl jiav dei-eiq.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai khaq mao iqsanl, maq peivq maq boev-ail dai, gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol jiav dei-eiq.

Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav pevq nail Paolluv khi Tilmolseiq nv-nvq gaq, Pillilpiv meenq bhai jaol nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maqkhaiq, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail juq khi tsaojao-ai nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Ngal nuljuq bhai khal noeq dov lal-u phao, ngal ngaq nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq naol.
Nuljuq iqsanl nail haqbhoil ngal geeqlaoq hal-u phao, yaoq pov yaoq-ao nee lavqkhiq tsail lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nuljuq jaol nail bha iqmoeq ilmoeq cavq lavq-u n-gaol nee yanqgaol kev dai, nuljuq ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel iqmoeq ilmoeq aqmeeq phaq nl-a nail Miqyail neq, Yeiqsul Khali yavq kha lee nail aqn bhai kev dai ganl al juq nl gil nail ngaol dai, ngal maldil neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai khaq mao iqsanl gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail haqbhoil alhai noeq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Ngal thaonq bhai aol-u phao maqkhaiq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq ivqdao dai pevq lal dai maqkhaiq, yalkhaq dal nail juq nail sivtavq bhai geeqlaoq daoq al ge lai-u phao maqkhaiq, nuljuq Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Khali nail gaiq-a deedee nail phaq-i mail ngal nuljuq iqsanl bhai khadai noeq moel khi, khadai gaiq-a nail ngel-ail dai, Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq teevq pov nee teevq pov mao lal dai, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail al bhaqda nee nuljuq maodai phaq bhai aqduq aqtsil tsil dai heeq nia lal dai maqkhaiq, tselpav bhoilpav nia nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai mao lal dai maqkhaiq, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Alhai pevq lal haq neq, iqsanl nail lavqkhoel-ai meeq jaiq nail phaq bhai nuljuq tselpav nia lal nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Khali yavq kha lee nail aqn bhai kev dai, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq meeq nail phaq maq aol dai, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai pevq lal nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi dov lal khi, yu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq lal dai, Yeiqsul Khali taivq-ail nl nia nail tsaq nail daol nail al phaq, nuljuq aqdoevq doevq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal ya daq thailthaiq nail niil neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhi gaiq-ail nail ngel lao thaq nail niil dai, nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq nail ngaol.
Khali nail haqbhoil nee ngal thaonq bhai ya aol thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, heeqphaq nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq phail nail genl dev nail juq khi yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl ya heeq nia-a nail ngaol.

Ngal thaonq bhai ya aol-a nail bhaqda nee, aqivq jaqbheq maodai teevq pav, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel neema ivq lal-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq tseq lal-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, neekhaol maq sil dai, jil pheeljaq movq nail lavqkhoel nee Khali nail ganl cavq bhiq nail ngaol, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq pav ganav juq neq, aqmeeq phaq dov lal dai noeqthunq khi cavq bhiq nail ngaol.

Al juq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee nl nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail bhai lovqphail nail haqbhoil, Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Yaoq juq yaoq neq, neema daolcoev dai thaq khi, Khali nail ganl cavq nail maq ngel-ail. Yovqgavq nail haqbhoil saol-nvq khi nl-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Thaonq bhai aol nail ngaq bhai iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil bhi daq naol dai noeq khi, cavq bhiq-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khul maq khi-ail. Neema daolcoev dai thaq khi, cavq nail maqkhaiq, neema maq daol mail cavq nail maqkhaiq, Khali nail ganl khal cavq kivq nail khe-ai cavq haq neq, ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail nee ovqtavq, iqmoeq phao iqsanl, lavqkhiq ya tsail nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, nuljuq geeqlaoq hal nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqhaqlal tsaojao-ai lavq nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, ngaq-i mail ya daq thailthaiq nail niil nail lavqkhoel nee ngal ya jel-ail nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq naol.

Ngal noeqthunq khi oil movq deedee nail phaq neq, niailhai ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai ngal maq ya haqsil dai, jel lal-u phao khe-ai niil aq-il iqsanl, ngal geesil nail neema maq aol dai, doevq nail maqkhaiq, sil nail maqkhaiq, ngal ngaq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai Khali bhai thaqeeq thaqheel naol.
Ngal aqdoevq doevq nail neq, Khali ngaol. Ngal sil haq neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil jailjeq pevq nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqmaol aqdoevq doevq haq neq, ngal Miqyail nail ganl nl nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, sil nail phaq khi doevq nail phaq, niil nvq phaq nail lavqkhoel ngal khul phaq bhai tsel heeq dai, maq heeq lal-il.

Ngal al nvq phaq nail gaiqlaq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngel-i mail, noeq-u maq dov-il. Ngal oil movq nail phaq neq, kovq lai khi Khali nee mail jaol movq-ail nial. Niil neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal ngaq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel-ai aqdoevq doevq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq jaiq nail ngaol.
Ngal ya doevq nail ngaol dai, aqduq bhao nail ngaol. Nuljuq eeq lal heel lal khi neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel lavqkhiq bhi tsail nail haqbhoil ngal nuljuq iqsanl nee mail jaol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha gaoq kovq lee-u phao, ngal bhaqda nee nuljuq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil lavqkhiq tsail nia jaiq lal nail ngaol.

Khalhai pevq lal gaoq Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai geel-nvq dai, aqdoevq doevq yaoq. Alhai doevq haq neq, ngal kev lee khi nuljuq bhai ya moel-u phao maqkhaiq, nuljuq nee mail maq jaol-u phao maqkhaiq, nuljuq neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi ivqdao dai jaol nail nee ovqtavq, neenoeq noeq nail phaq teevq phaq taivq-ail noeq nail lavqkhoel nee lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai tavq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq nail haqbhoil laijai deedee nail ganl ngal ya gaiq nail gal duq ngaol.

Nvjuq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai teevq peivq-ail thaq geesil. Maq geesil haq neq, aqyu juq bhai niil nvq phaq bhi moel nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, ya luq ya seil-ail khi, nuljuq neq, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail hevqkovq nail phaq ya thaq nail nial dai, aqyu juq ya heeq ya moel nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Khali-i mail nuljuq bhai bivq-ai thaq nail meeq deedee nail geeqlaoq al neq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq taivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Aivq nail haqbhoil khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail phaq iqsanl aol nail ngaol.

Nuljuq khi ngal neq, teevq phaq bhai taivq-ail dev pheeljaq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Genl dev pheeljaq nail niil phaq bhai jel lal-u phao iqsanl mail, ngal dev pheeljaq nail bhai nuljuq ya moel khi, niil aq-il iqsanl ngal dev pheeljaq thailthaiq nail ganl nuljuq ya gaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali bhaqda nee gaq kav lal nail phaq maqkhaiq, aivq goil nail gaiq-a nail bhaqda nee neema sal lal nail phaq maqkhaiq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel aqtsaoq tsaoq nail phaq maqkhaiq, yu nail haqbhoil saol-nvq khi gaoqhaq nail phaq maqkhaiq, niil juq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol haq neq, ngal lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal nia dai, niailhai nl yaoq. Nuljuq neema teevq heeq taivq-ail, goil nail gaiq-a nail teevq phaq taivq-ail, neenoeq needul iqsanl teevq phaq taivq-ail noeq yaoq.

Jil pheeljaq khi neema eeq nail heel nail lavqkhoel nee khul teevq phaq iqsanl thaq nl. Thaqtheq nail neema aol nail lavqkhoel, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq yovqgavq nail aqmaol nee maqtsil yu bhai thaqeeq yaoq.
Yovqgavq bhai tavq nail phaq bhai taivq-ail thaq saol-nvq. Yu bhai tavq nail juq bhai iqsanl saol-nvq yaoq.
Yeiqsul Khali neema thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl thaq yaoq.

Miqyail aivq bhai

aivq bhai

Nqtavq kovtavq bhai
jaol nail maqkhaiq,
miltsaq kovtavq bhai
jaol nail maqkhaiq,
miltsaq nail daoqthaoq bhai
jaol nail maqkhaiq,

yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee,

ya doiq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq,
Aqbhu Miqyail
seiqleiq khaoqsail ya dai,
moeqthaoq yaoq
thaoq yaoq-ao nee,
“Yeiqsul Khali neq,
Heeqphaq ngaol” dai,
salkhil ya khanq nail ngaol.

Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u nee maqtsil ngal nuljuq nee mail maq jaol-u phao iqsanl, ngaq nail daoq aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Nuljuq yovqgavq nail hevqkovq nail phaq ya kivq dai, geesil khi aqjuq juq nail lavqkhoel nee laijai deedee yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq nl movq nail neema aol lal khi nl nia dai, aivq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq khal nl khal hal nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai, khul nail daoqgovq maq dov, maq jil pheeljaq dai, nl yaoq.

Alhai nl haq neq, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq khi, neema haol nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol. Neema neegovq aol khi neema pov pov lav lav-ail pevq nail niil yeel nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, nuljuq neq, laiq nail tsa nail phaq maq aol nail Miqyail nail yaq pevq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq nuljuq neq, niil yeel nail lavqkhoel khe jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai aqbhaq bhaq bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaq bhaq bhiq nail al neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail daoq cavq cavq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali kovq lee haq neq, ngal neema eeq duq niailhai ya nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail tsaoq-a nail neq, aqnieivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Ngaq-i mail nl doil hal doil-a nail iqsanl, aqnieivq-ail maq ngel-ail.

Nuljuq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, Miqyail bhai laol bhiq nail phaq khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Laol bhiq nail al nail kovtavq bhai ngaq nail aqsivq ya hoeldav khi ngaol-aoq, ngal lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Nuljuq nee mail iqsanl lavqkhiq tsao tsail naol.
Alhai dul dai, nuljuq iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Ngaq-ai nee mail iqsanl lavqkhiq tsao tsail yaoq.

Mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, ngal Tilmolseiq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lee naol dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai noeqthunq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq nail ganl ya heeq kivq haq neq, gaq aol lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi dai ngal-aq neq, aivq khe-ai dul dai, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail ngaq-ai nee maq jaol-ail. Aivq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil maldil aqmeeq phaq saol-nvq bhi nia nail gaq ngaol.
Yaoq juq yaoq neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq maq halpov mail, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil meeq lal dai taivq-ail, halpov nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Tilmolseiq nail neema bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Yaqyov teevq gaq yovqgavq nail aqbhu nee mail ganl nl nail khe-ai lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq gaiq doi-ail dai, aivq ngaq-ai nee mail ganl nl-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, yu ngaq bhai khalhai khi lavq nail ganl bhai ngal yaq heeq kivq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail aivq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lee naol dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol.
Ngal iqsanl mao-ail maq mao lal mail nuljuq jaol nail bha lee naol dai, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai neema thaqtsaol naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il, ngaq nail jaqbheq Ilbhaqphaoqdil bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha iqmoeq bhi kovq lee nail neq, tsaq-ail ngel jaol-aq dai, ngal noeq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ganl nl nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai aqhaqlal phao khe genl dev nail gaq ngaol. Ngal loq nail phaq bhai bhi tsaojao-ai nail dai khi, nuljuq-i mail khoel-ai thaq nail gaqkhoel iqsanl ngel naol.

Aivq nuljuq iqsanl bhai noeq moel-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Aivq nal nail ganl nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq noeqhaq deedee-ai bhiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal aivq bhai bhi kovq lee nail ngaol.

Aivq sil heeq phaq-ail nal deedee-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai gaoqhaq-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai taivq-ail gaoqhaq nail maq ngel-ail. Ngal noeqhaq deedee nail bhai maq bhi noeq haq jaiq lal dai, ngaq bhai iqsanl gaoqhaq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aivq bhai ya moel-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail lal dai maqkhaiq, ngal khaoqlaol nail micil maq gal lal dai maqkhaiq, ngal aivq bhai lavqtsail mail bhi kovq lee naol.
Yeiqsul bhaqda nee, lavqkhiq teevq tsail aivq bhai hav yaoq. Aivq khe-ai dul nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ev yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq-i mail ngaq bhai tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail, maq bhee nail juq bhee lal dai, aivq nail aqmaol av bhiq khi Khali nail ganl nl nail ngel-i mail, micil maq ngel-ail nul neq, sil lao-aoq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, haoqnao naosaq khe daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Ganl niil nuljuq bhai teevq yanq ngal-aq teevq pov gevq bhoel-ai lavq nail neq, gaq doil maq doil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq jaol ivq nia dai, ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.
Kheeq khe-ai dul nail tsaol-aq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Aqyu juq neq, haqeiv nail phaq nl nail nee ovqtavq, bavkov uqjaq ya oev naol dai, ge nail ngaol.

Maldil bavkov uqjaq oev nail juq neq, ngadao juq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao juq Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel nee Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel neema eeq duq jiav khi, aqsivq haqjoil bhai maq juq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol.
Maldil dai, ge haq neq, ngal aqsivq haqjoil bhai juq movq haq neq, juq kivq naol. Ngal aqsivq haqjoil bhai juq kivq naol dai, yu teevq gaq ganav noeq haq neq, ngal aivq nee maqtsil juq kivq naol.

Ngal neq, doevq lee khi eivq n bhee lal-al ngal-aq neq, bavkov uqjaq oev-a nail ngaol. Ngal neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel khe, Bheiqyaqmiq nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol. Heiqbhail nail tsaol-aq lavqkhoel nee doevq lee-a nail, Heiqbhail nail tsaol-aq maldil ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq phao nee ge haq neq, Phaqliqsail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail laijai deedee-a nail ganl bhai ge haq neq, Khali yaq munl bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq daiq-a nail teevq gaq ngaol. Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai ge haq neq, oeqbal maq aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq nail haqbhoil jailjeq aol naol dai, ngaq-i mail khal saol-nvq-ai thaq nail al juq iqsanl bhai, Khali nail haqbhoil sunq-ail nail phaq pevq lao thaq nail niil dai, niil aq-il saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Maldil dai, ge haq neq, ngal ngaq nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai heeq kivq-a nail neq, iqsanl nee maqtsil meeq jaiq nail ngel-i mail, yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl bhai sunq-ail nail juq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngal aivq nail haqbhoil yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhi sunq-ail gil-a nail ngaol. Ngal Khali bhai ya khi aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol kivq dai, al juq iqsanl bhai yav ha-ai thaq nail pavqkhuq pavq leivq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngal neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq maq jiav. Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail bhai tavq nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq jiav nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail niil phaq neq, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail tsaq nail daol nail niil phaq bhai ya nia nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il neq, Khali bhai iqsanl, aivq doevq kovq lal-a nail bhaqaoq bhai iqsanl, ngal heeq kivq movq-ail nial. Al ovqtavq, Khali-i mail daq-a nail haq nail aoq nail juq bhai aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai daq daq-ail, aivq sil-a nail khe-ai dul lal dai iqsanl, doevq movq-ail nial.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal iqsanl sil khi doevq kovq lal nail phaq bhai ya kivq-ail jaol-aq dai, noeqthunq deedee nail ngaol.

Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, niil aq-il ya gaq-ao naol dai, ge nail maq ngel-ail. Bheeq lal gaq-ao naol dai, ge nail iqsanl maq ngel. Yeiqsul Khali-i mail ngaq bhai aivq nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail khe-ai, kovpavq al bhai ngal ya dai, laijai thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, kovpavq al bhai ya gaq-ao naol dai ngal maq noeq-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal khaq mao iqsanl nl nail teevq phaq neq, haoqnaol phao khe nl jel-ail ceevq-a nail juq bhai nioilpeivq-ail ceevq khi, sivtavq phao nl heeq phaq-ail jiav nail phaq bhai the kheel lai dai, laijai nail ngaol.

Ngal kovpavq al bhai ngal the kheel lai dai, laijai nail ngaol. Kovpavq al neq, Miqyail Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq khi nqtavq kovtavq bhai aqdoevq ya doevq dai, ngaq bhai khul lavq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phao yovkav eeq lal-a nail ngadao juq neq, neema alhai thaq bhel. Niil nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq-i mail noeq nail teevq phaq ganav maq dul lai haq neq, ganl al juq Miqyail nuljuq bhai phaodaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngadao juq-i mail khal the kheel-ai thaq nail juq bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq khi, daolcoev dai nl dal laivq bhel.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal aqdoevq doevq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl doevq yaoq. Ngaq bhai saol oil khi aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai heldaiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jel lal-u phao, ngal nuljuq bhai mee nia pov ge bhiq-a nail khe-ai, niil aq-il iqsanl maivbhil dov dov-ail gaoq ge lavq bhel. Khali nail lavqyavq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq maodai jaol nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, haoqnao naosaq n-gaol luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail ovqmav neq, aqyu juq nail miqyail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, haqsil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail phaq bhai maq haqsil mail, neema eeq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, miltsaq bhai tavq lai nail juq bhai taivq-ail saol-nvq nail ngaol.
Ngadao neq, nqtavq bha tavq lai nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Hevqkovq nail gaq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali al dao nee mail dov lee nail bhai, ngadao noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai aivq nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav-a nail bhaqaoq bhai juq khi, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq deedee nail aivq nail aqmaol khe-ai pevq lal dai, luq-ail seil-ail nia nail ngadao nail aqmaol bhai aqsivq lav phal lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a khi moel movq deedee nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq neq, ngaq nail lavqkhiq tsail duq khi ngaq nail heel uqtsaoq ngaol. Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai ivqdao dai, doevq yaoq.
Nul-nq nvq gaq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel-ai tsaq lai jil lai yaoq dai, ngal Ilbhaoldil khi Sultuv bhai hal nail ngaol.

Ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, ganl nl daiq-a nail gaq-ol, naol iqsanl yaqmai-aq al nvq gaq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq dai, ngal naoq bhai hal nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq gaiq doi ail dai, aqyu nvq gaq ngaq-ai nee mail tsao nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Gaqleiqmeiq khi aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel bhai aqmil gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail yaoq juq yaoq iqsanl, ngaq-ai nee mail tsao nl lavq-a nail ngaol.
Khaq mao iqsanl, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Ngal teevq pov gaoq ge lavq bhel. Lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.
Neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail tsaol-aq niil dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail naoq bhai heeq nia dai, doevq yaoq. Yeiqsul kev lee-aiq nail ngaol.
Khul teevq phaq bhai iqsanl khaoq thaq laol. Nuljuq loq nail phaq bhai khaq mao iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal-u phao, khal hal movq nail khe-ai, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail hal yaoq.

Alhai hal haq neq, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail tsaol-aq-i mail maq noeq dov tsaol nail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail neema khi nuljuq nail neenoeq needul bhai Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel nee heldaiq phail lavq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, haoqnao naosaq khe daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Maldil tsaq nail phaq, yu ev heeq phaq-ail pevq nail phaq, tsaq nail phaq, meeq nail haol nail phaq, yu heldaiq-u phao, gaiq-a lal bhiq nail phaq, heldaiq meeq nail phaq, aqmeeq phaq khi tsiqeeq heeq phaq-ail pevq nail phaq, niil juq bhai nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl, saol-nvq saol-nvq-ail jaol yaoq.
Nuljuq ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai ya saol oil, ya hav bhoel, ya gaiq ya moel-a nail juq bhai nl dal laivq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, neesal bhi ovq lavq nail Miqyail nuljuq nee mail jaol nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il iqsanl teevq pov, nuljuq ngaq bhai noeq kev lavq nail ngel-i mail, ngal Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel-ai lavqkhiq tsail deedee-ail nial. Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq ngaq bhai noeq kev khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai ya tsaojao-ai dai, gailkhaol maq daol lal haq-al.
Ngal teevq phaq ganav loq nail ngel-i mail, niailhai ge nail maq ngel. Ngal khul phaq bhai ya thaoqphuq khi ngaol-aoq, al nail lavqkhoel bhai neekhaol sil dai heeq kivq lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Haq deedee nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, hulmeeq hulbhao bhao nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal khanqtsaol lal-aoq nail ngaol. Jaq lovq daol lovq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, moevq nail sivq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, bhao lee ya lee nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal niil juq bhai khalhai khi daq tsaol nail ganl, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai heeq kivq lal-aoq nail ngaol.
Ngaq bhai gaq bivq lavq nail gaq bhai juq juq-ail, ngal iqsanl bhai nl kivq hal kivq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq bhai ya daq thailthaiq-u phao, nuljuq tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, meeq deedee-ail nial.

Pillilpiv meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq iqmoeq ilmoeq cavq lal khi, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq nee mail dov ail-u phao, bivq lavq khi tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail lavqkhoel nee aqtsaoq tsaoq lavq-a nail neq, nuljuq teevq-eel ngaol. Khali yaq munl yaoq juq yaoq neq, alhai teevq munl iqsanl maq nl lavq-a dai nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Theilsaqlolni meenq bhai jaol-u phao, ngal loq nail juq bhai nuljuq mee nia pov oil bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal kovpavq bhai oil movq nail ngel-i mail, niailhai ge nail maq ngel-ail dei-eiq. Nuljuq geeqlaoq teevq bhee ya dai ngal movq nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il neq, ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee jiav lovq-ao nail nee ovqtavq, al jaiq iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Nuljuq Ilbhaqphaoqdil bhai khoel khi bhi oil ha lee-a nail kovpavq al juq bhaqda nee ngal teevq bhee jiav nail ngaol. Kovpavq al juq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail tovq khi danq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq khi laol bhiq nail phaq iqsanl ngel naol. Miqyail al juq bhai hav bhoel nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail Miqyail neq, aivq nail mao-ail phoiq mao-ail laoq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail lavqkhoel nee, nuljuq khal loq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq juq-ail khi nuljuq bhai teevq bhee teevq lov bivq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq bhel. Aqmiq.

Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, ge bhiq-ail dei-eiq. Ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Niilniai jaol nail Khali yaq iqsanl mail, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yu nee maqtsil, heeqphaq Gailsaq nail haol bhai ganl nl nail Khali yaq juq nuljuq bhai noeq moel-ai bhiq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail Paolluv ngaol. Jaqbheq Tilmolseiq nv-nvq gaq Gaollaolsail meenq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, Khali bhai saljial ivq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq ngaol. Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Nvjuq nuljuq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal-u phao, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai khaq mao iqsanl tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ganl maqkhaiq, nuljuq Miqyail nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a nail ganl maqkhaiq, nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail geeqlaoq bhai noeqthunq nail ngel-i mail, alhai neema thaqtsaol khi gaiq-a nail ngaol. Noeqthunq nail al phaq neq, maldil tsaq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail bhai, nuljuq aq-u nee ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil neq, nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lee-a nail nee ovqtavq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai doi dai aqheeq heeq lee khi eeq lal nail khe-ai, nuljuq ya gaiq khi Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol maldil tsaq nail lavqkhoel bhai ya heeq nia-u n-gaol nee mail, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl aqheeq heeq lee khi eeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Nvjuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ganl nl nail, nvjuq mao-ail gaiq-a nail Ilbhaqphaqlal bhaqda nee nuljuq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, nvjuq nail haqbhoil saljial ivq nail lavqkhoel nee Khali nail ganl nl nail gaq ngaol.
Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee nuljuq-i mail ya-a nail goil nail gaiq-a nail ganl al, niil aq-il, aivq nvjuq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail ganl bhai nvjuq ya gaiq-u n-gaol nee, nvjuq nuljuq nail haqbhoil maq naq lai dai, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail phao khe neenoeq neekha khi noeqheeq noeq dov nia nail iqsanl nail lavqkhoel nuljuq Miqyail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai teevq bhee teevq lovq heeq nia lal dai iqsanl, nvjuq geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Nuljuq alhai heeq nia lal haq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai, aqdoevq doevq khi, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel aivq nuljuq bhai neekhaol sil nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, nuljuq aqmeeq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nail hal nail lavqkhoel nee aqheeq heeq lee khi Miqyail bhai teevq pov nee teevq pov heeq nia jaiq lal nail ngaol.

Bhaqaoq mao-ail eeq nail Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaqda nee, nuljuq lavqkhiq teevq tsail neema ivq nail lavqkhoel yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nail lavqkhoel bhai ol nia dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai bhaqaoq bivq yaoq dai iqsanl, nvjuq nuljuq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel aivq nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil, lainq-ai thaq nail geeqlaoq bhai ya nail geel-nvq dai, nl lavq-a nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai, nuljuq lavqkhiq teevq tsail tsiqeeq yaoq.
Aqbhu Miqyail neq, aqnav nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail lavq khi, aivq mao-ail gaiq-a nail aivq nail Yaqyov nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai bhi aol lai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqyov al gaq ngadao bhai hevqkovq lavq khi, oeqbal iqsanl mail phaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq Miqyail bhai maq moel nia-ail. Yeiqsul bhai moel haq neq, Miqyail bhai moel-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail kovtavq bhai Yeiqsul neq, aqivq ivqsaq gaq ngaol.

Nqtavq kovtavq khi mail miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jaol khal jiav nail juq maqkhaiq, moel lal nail juq khi maq moel lal nail juq maqkhaiq, nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai uvthaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq maqkhaiq, eeq nail heel nail juq maqkhaiq, heeqphaq juq iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul bhai juq khi Miqyail-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail lavqkhoel-ai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail haqbhoil teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq doevq maq jaol lal-u nee mail, Yeiqsul aqdoevq doevq khi jaol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai ivq khi doevq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, Khali yaq munl nail uqhuq ngaol. Khali yaq munl neq, aivq nail aqmaol ngaol. Aivq neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq khe gaq ngaol. Aivq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel meeq jaiq bhee jaiq nail iqmoeq khe gaq pevq lal dai, iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq ngaol.

Miqyail nail bhee lovq nail phaq iqsanl mail Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel-ai aol lal khi, lavqyavq kovtavq bhai il lee-a nail aivq nail aqsivq bhaqda nee, miltsaq kovtavq-ai khal jaol khal jiav nail juq maqkhaiq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai khal jaol khal jiav nail juq maqkhaiq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee Miqyail bhai tsaq lal jil lal dai, Miqyail neekhaol sil nail ngaol.
Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq Miqyail nee gaoqceiv ceiv ail-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq haqeiv nail phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel nee aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil bhao nail Yeiqsul nail aqmaol khanq sil-a nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il nuljuq Miqyail bhai bhi tsaq bhi jil lal dai, Miqyail nl-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai nl nail neq, nuljuq bhai tsaolmeeq tsaolhaol, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq khi, yu khul dai ge duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal khi, aivq nail sivtavq bhai ya aol kev lai nail dai khi, nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai pevq lal dai, nuljuq-i mail neema thaqtsaol-a nail phaq ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq dal laivq yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai tavq nail noeqthunq nail phaq bhai thaq khaonq ha. Nqtavq nail kov-uvq bhai khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al yu cavq bhiq nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl, geeqlaoq daoq al cavq bhiq thailthaiq nail gaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il, ngal nuljuq nail haqbhoil haq dee aoq deedee nail bhai ya daq nail neq, ngaq-ai lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial. Khali-i mail maq ya daq gil-a nail haq dee aoq deedee nail juq bhee lal dai, aivq nail aqmaol nail haqbhoil ngaq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai ngal daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqmaol dai ge nail neq, Khali yaq munl bhai ge nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail daoq teevq bhee bhi heeq bhi gaiq-ail nia dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngal neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl niil nl yaoq dai, aivq ngaq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Milnee uqnee Miqyail-i mail teevq yeel nee teevq yeel oiltsail-ai thaq nail aivq nail daoq al, niil aq-il, aivq aivq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai phaodaiq bhiq nail ngaol.

Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail haqbhoil Miqyail-i mail oiltsail-ai thaq nail daoq al neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail khadai eeq khadai meeq nail ganl, aivq aivq nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi heeq nia movq nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl yu nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol. Oiltsail-ai thaq nail daoq al neq, Khali nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq seiqleiq khaoqsail al bhai ya dai, noeqthunq nail phaq jiav nail ngaol.

Nvjuq aivq nail ganl daoq cavq cavq nail ngaol. Khalhai khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal khi, nvjuq aqyu juq bhai Miqyail nail sivtavq-ai av bhiq kivq dai, “Yaolphaol yaoq dei-eiq” dai, nvjuq tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ge bhi nail nee ovqtavq, neenoeq neekha iqsanl mail yuq yuq-ail, cavq bhiq cov bhiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Al nail haqbhoil ngal laijai deedee nail ngaol. Khali ngaq bhai bhaqaoq bivq lavq khi, aivq ngaq nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl thailthaiq nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl laijai deedee nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, Laoldilciv meenq bha jaol nail juq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ngaq bhai maq moel daiq-a nail juq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ngal khadai laijai nail ngel-ail dai, nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel neema teevq heeq bhai tavq lal dai maqkhaiq, neema gaq kav lal dai maqkhaiq, ngal nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Al bhaqda nee, Miqyail-i mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail Khali bhai tavq nail phaq bhai aqyu juq gov heeq nia lal khi, heeq nia nail neenoeq neekha teevq bhee aol lal nail ngaol.
Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai, aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail neenoeq neekha khi noeqheeq noeqmoel nia nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, oiltsail-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Khaq sil gaq maqkhaiq, naldaiq meeq nail daoq ge ge-ail, nuljuq bhai maq ya hevq bheel-aivq dai, ngal niailhai ge nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal nuljuq nee maq jaol khi ngaol-aoq neq, ngaq nail neema nuljuq nee mail jiav nail ngaol. Nuljuq teevq phaq gil haq teevq phaq aqduq aqtsil tsil dai, nl nail bhai maqkhaiq, Khali nail lavqkhoel neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivq deedee nail bhai maqkhaiq, ngal ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail-ail nial.
Nuljuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai hav bhoel-a nail khe-ai, aivq bhai juq juq-ail aqdoevq doevq yaoq.

Daoqtsail kha-ail nail khe-ai, nuljuq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai kha-ail khi, eeq lal meeq lal yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail ya saol oil-a nail khe-ai, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq nail lavqkhoel ivqdao dai jaol khi, dee lai nail maq bhao dai, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq.

Neenoeq neekha maq aol nail daoq khi daoqceevq maq jiav nail goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail daoq ge ge-ail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, nuljuq bhai maq ya nieil-aivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq dei-eiq. Daoq al juq neq, Khali bhai tavq nail maq ngel-ail. Teevq yeel nee teevq yeel cavq khal leevq thaq nail daoq khi miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol juq teevq-eel ngaol.
Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai Miqyail-i mail pevq nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal-aoq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, uvthaiq nail juq khi bhaqaoq eeq nail juq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uqhuq ngaol.

Nuljuq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai bavkov uqjaq oev-a nail ngaol. Aqmaol bhai tavq nail phaq oev-a nail bhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Khali bhai tavq nail bavkov uqjaq oev nail dai ge nail neq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neelov khaonq ha-ail ceevq nail bhai ge nail ngaol

Nuljuq ulcuvq saol-u phao, aivq nee mail duqpheeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail Miqyail ganl nl thailthaiq nail bhaqaoq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq aivq nee mail doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, oeqbal nl-a nail bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq maq jiav nail bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, sil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aivq nuljuq bhai Khali nee mail aqdoevq bhi doevq lal khi, ngadao nail oeqbal iqsanl bhai phaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai juq khi ngadao nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail haoqgavq bhai aivq-i mail siv peivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq haoqgavq al keiv bhai lavqyavq kovtavq-ai tavq thaiq nail lavqkhoel nee oil ha-a nail ngaol.

Lavqyavq al nail kovtavq-ai, nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai uvthaiq nail juq khi bhaqaoq eeq nail juq nail khen kha-ao tsai dov khi, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq-ai aqyu juq bhai bhi haqsil-a nail ngaol. Lavqyavq bhaqda nee aivq al juq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, jaq nail daol nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, bhaoqaiq lav sav nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, lav lov lav ceiv lao nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, jaol n n-gaol lao nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, al juq bhaqda nee yu nuljuq nail kovtavq-ai oeqbal thaq lal nail bhai thaq naldaiq.
Al juq neq, yaqhao khe kev lee nail juq nail maolkhoel teevq-eel ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maolkhoel nail aqmaol neq, Khali ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, maq tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai thaqtheq khi, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqyu juq-i mail aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel bhai ya moel-a nail juq bhai juq juq-ail, neema eeq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neq, aqsivq haqjoil phao taivq-ail saol-nvq nia nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq-i mail nl nail hal nail juq neq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Alheel nail tsaol-aq juq-i mail, nuljuq bhai yalkhaq thaq bhi dal.

Alheel nail tsaol-aq juq neq, uqhuq pevq nail Khali bhai aqmeeq-ai maq covq cavq-ail. Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, uqhuq al bhaqda nee aqmaol maol lao-ail eeq lal nail ngaol. Khil ceevq lavq ceevq khi haqguq haqlao juq covq cavq nail ngel-i mail, aqmaol maol lao-ail gaq aol lal eeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Khali nee mail miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol juq bhai sil jel-ail ceevq-ao nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail aol nail kov-uvq bhai khul khi mail aqdoevq gaoq doevq nail-aiq.
“Thaq nieivq thaiq, thaq mevqdaiq, thaq thoiqtsi” dai, ge-ai thaq nail aol juq bhai khul khi mail nuljuq gaoq thaoq nail-aiq.

Nuljuq al juq bhai thaoq-u phao, aol al juq neq, luq-ail seil ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aol al juq neq, tsaol-aq-i mail thaoq khal leevq khi cavq bhi cov bhi nail aol juq teevq-eel ngaol.

Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq noeq dov khi uqhuq thaoq nail maqkhaiq, maq tsaq nail lavqkhoel nee neema thaqtheq nail maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail maqkhaiq, alhai nl nail juq neq, neenoeq neekha aol nail khe-ai dul khi ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil phao neekhaol jiav nail juq bhai gaq lai dai, khul teevq phaq iqsanl ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Nuljuq Khali nee mail doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail juq bhai halpov yaoq. Khali neq, al bhai Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq khe jiav nail juq bhai thaq noeqcov-ai thaq. Nqtavq kovtavq khe jiav nail juq bhai noeqcov-ai thaq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neq sil nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, nuljuq nail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq, Khali nee mail Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai oil tsail-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq, Khali ngaol. Aivq dov lee-u phao, nuljuq iqsanl aivq nee mail seiqleiq khaoqsail nail lavqkhoel nee dov lee nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail, miltsaq bhai tavq nail juq bhai lav heivq yaoq. Al juq neq, khaqmiq sev nail, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl nail, yovqgavq nail neekhaol teevq sil doevq tavq jaol tavq movq nail, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol nee nl movq nail, phul heel bhai neekhaol jiav nail, niil juq ngaol. Phul heel bhai neekhaol jiav nail phaq neq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Al juq bhaqda nee, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq kev lee thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Jel lal-u phao, nuljuq iqsanl al juq nail haoqnao aqdoevq doevq khi, al juq bhai nl daiq hal daiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, nuljuq niil juq bhai khaonq ha yaoq. Neema phail nail phaq, neema bhao nail phaq, yu bhai neejiav jiav nail phaq, yu nail haoqnaol phao nee khal ge movq-ail ge nail phaq khi, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nail daoq ge nail, niil juq ngaol.
Teevq gaq nail gaiqlaq bhai teevq gaq goiqbhaoq thaq bhaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neq, neema aqlil bhai iqsanl, neema aqlil nail aol juq bhai iqsanl, loev ha-ail ceevq khi,
neema aqsivq bhai doi-a nail ngaol. Neema aqsivq al neq, aivq bhai teivq-a nail Miqyail khe-ai dul lal nia dai, heeq nia moel nia nail phao, aqsivq pevq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Neema aqsivq pevq lal-a nail lavqkhoel, Heiqlaqsal nail tsaol-aq khi Yuldav nail tsaol-aq dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Bavkov uqjaq oev nail tsaol-aq khi bavkov uqjaq maq oev nail tsaol-aq dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Yaoqkhaoq yaoq mil yaoq khe tsaol-aq khi aolsaolkovq ma bhao nail tsaol-aq dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Yaqkav khi yaqkav maq ngel nail juq dai, maq tselpav yaoq-aol. Khali neq, iqsanl mail pevq khi, iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Miqyail mao-ail gaiq-a nail aivq-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaolmeeq tsaolhaol ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, yu bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia deedee nail, yu nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq nl nail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai thaqtheq nail, neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, neenoeq heelma ma dai noeq nail, nuljuq aqgaq aqdoi doi nail khe-ai doi yaoq.

Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ol ol-ail doevq yaoq. Teevq gaq nail kovtavq-ai teevq gaq oeqbal thaq nail phaq jiav haq neq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal phaiq yaoq. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nuljuq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal phaiq yaoq.
Al juq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq doi dav gai yaoq. Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, iqsanl bhai bhee lal dai, leel jaoq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khali nail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail neema bhai bhi uvthaiq yaoq. Alhai bhi uvthaiq nail dai khi, aqmaol teevq maol teevq-eel nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq bhai tsiqeeq nail neema aol aol-ail doevq yaoq.

Khali nail daoq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi bhao bhi ya lee yaoq. Neenoeq neekha teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel tsiqeeq nail daoq, tsiqeeq khi aqthel gul nail daoq khi, aqhaqlal phao tavq lai nail daoqdaq daq nail daoq juq bhai juq juq-ail, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi gaq bivq yaoq. Nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel-ai, Miqyail bhai gul gul-ail tsiqeeq yaoq.
Nuljuq daoq ge nail maqkhaiq, nl nail hal nail maqkhaiq, khul phaq nl khi ngaol-aoq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee nl yaoq. Aivq bhai juq juq-ail, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq.
Khaqma juq-ol, yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Niil neq, Khali yaq nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ganl ngaol.
Yaqyov-aq juq-ol, yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai gaiq-a yaoq. Aivq bhai neema thaq nal.
Yaq juq-ol, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel yovqgavq nail aqbhu aqma nail daoq bhai naldaiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq alhai naldaiq nail bhai Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Aqbhu juq-ol, nuljuq nail yaq neema phail lal heeq phaq-ail thaq nl bhiq. Nl bhiq haq neq, neema cov-ail la geiq.

Yaqkav juq-ol, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel, nuljuq nail ilheel nail daoq naldaiq yaoq. Aqyu juq ya moel dai taivq-ail, maivphaoq ya dai, nl nail hal nail phaq thaq bhi pevq. Neema daolcoev dai thaq thaq-ail, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai ev nail lavqkhoel nee nl yaoq.

Nuljuq-i mail khal nl khal hal nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil nl nail ngaol dai, thaq saol-nvq. Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil nl thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, saol-nvq khi, aqmaol neema kev nail lavqkhoel nee nl yaoq hal yaoq.

Yaqhao khe nvjuq-i mail ya nail geeqlaoq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail bivq lavq nail jaiqbhoil ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neq Heeqphaq Khali nail yaqkav ngaol.
Nl laiq-a nail tsaol-aq, al nail haqbhoil yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel-ail.
Ilheel juq-ol, nuljuq nail yaqkav juq bhai aqtsaq aqdaol daol dai, teevq di dai, nl bhiq yaoq. Nuljuq nail ilheel gaq iqsanl, nqtavq kovtavq-ai jaol nail bhai, thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq.
Khaq mao iqsanl gaq maq bhaq dai, geeqlaoq hal hal-ail jaol yaoq. Geeqlaoq hal-u phao, aqgeel geel dai, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail, hal yaoq.

Khali nail ganl oiltsail-ai thaq nail phaq bhai tavq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai nvjuq cavq bhiq kivq dai, Miqyail gailkhaol phao lavq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal tsao lavq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal Miqyail nail daoq cavq nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il thaonq bhai ya aol thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal ya ge heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail daoq al juq bhai, yu gov heeq nia dai, cavq bhiq kivq nail haqbhoil iqsanl geeqlaoq hal tsao lavq yaoq.
Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail juq nail sivtavq bhai neenoeq neekha aol nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq. Aqyanq khal ya-u phao, teevq peivq-ail maq bhi sunq-ail dai, nl thailthaiq yaoq.

Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai khalhai ya ge kovq bhiq nail dai heeq nia lal dai, nuljuq daoq ge-u phao, khaq mao iqsanl yu loq nail bhai tsaq lai nail daoq khi naldaiq meeq nail daoq taivq-ail ge yaoq.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail jaqbheq Duljil neq, ngaq nail ganl iqsanl mail nuljuq bhai ge lavq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, ngaq-ai nee mail Miqyail nail ganl nl nail lavqkhoel, saljial ivq nail ganl nl nail gaq ngaol.
Nvjuq khalhai pevq thailthaiq nail dai, nuljuq ya heeq kivq dai maqkhaiq, aivq nuljuq nail neema bhai gaq bhi kav lal dai maqkhaiq, ngal aivq bhai nuljuq jaol nail bha bhi lal naol.

Al ovqtavq, nuljuq nail munl lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq pevq nail, ngadao mao-ail gaiq-a nail saljial ivq nail jaqbheq Aolneiqsiqmul bhai iqsanl, aivq nee mail bhi lee naol. Niai khal pevq lal thailthaiq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aqyu nvq gaq nuljuq bhai ge lavq nail ngaol.

Ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail Aqliqdaqgul neq, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Bhaqnaqbhal nail jaqbheq Maqkul iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Maqkul nail ganl ngal nuljuq bhai daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq jaol nail bha lee haq neq, aivq bhai hav yaoq.

Yulthul dai khul nail Yeiqsul iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel khe, Miqyail Milkhaoq nail haqbhoil niil aq-il ngaq-ai nee ganl nl thailthaiq nail juq neq, niil juq teevq-eel ngaol. Aqyu juq bhaqda nee ngal neesal ya deedee-ail nial.

Nuljuq nail munl bhai tavq nail, Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav Ilbhaqphaqlal iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel nuljuq yovkav eeq lal khi, ivq lal bhee lal dai, aivq nuljuq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl laijai laijai-ail, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, Laoldilciv meenq khi Heiqlaqbhaollil meenq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, khadai laijai nail ganl, ngal salkhil khanq kivq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq mao-ail gaiq-a nail jagaq coev nail saqlaq Lulkavq khi Deiqmav iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Laoldilciv meenq bhai jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai maqkhaiq, Noqphal khi aivq nail ilkhaol bhai jil lai nail Khali yaq munl bhai maqkhaiq, ngal noeq moel naol dai, ge bhiq ail dei-eiq.
Haoqgavq niil nuljuq ge gaq haq neq, Laoldilciv meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl bhai iqsanl bhi ge daiq dei-eiq. Aqyu juq-i mail ya-a nail haoqgavq al iqsanl, nuljuq ge daiq dei-eiq.
“Yeiqsul-i mail naoq bhai bhi nl lavq-a nail ganl bhai nl gil-u phao kev dai, aqmeeq-ai nl-ail yaoq” dai, Aqgilpuv bhai iqsanl ge bhiq-ail dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, ngaq nail aqlavq-i mail gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail bhai thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal Paolluv, Siqlav khi Tilmolseiq nvjuq hail gaq, Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail, Theilsaqlolni meenq khe Khali yaq munl juq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Nvjuq Miqyail bhai khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal-u phao, nuljuq iqsanl nail haqbhoil tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail, Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, khalhai nl dol hal dol lavq-a nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, goil nail gaiq-a nail bhaqda nee, khadai laijai khi nl thailthaiq nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai noeqthunq nail bhaqda nee neema ivq nail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal-u phao, nvjuq noeq kev nail ngaol.
Miqyail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail, nvjuq heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nvjuq-i mail cavq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq neq, daoq taivq-ail nuljuq jaol nail bha ge bhiq lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al maldil tsaq naol dai, neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, nuljuq jaol nail bha kev lee-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, nuljuq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq dai, nvjuq aqdoevq khalhai doevq-a nail bhai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nvjuq bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul bhai maqkhaiq, saol oil-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, geeqlaoq daoq bhaqda nee, haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai nuljuq ya daq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail bivq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq teevq bheeq aol nail lavqkhoel, geeqlaoq daoq al bhai nuljuq hav bhoel-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neq, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq khi, Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai jaol nail, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil, saol oil duq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq bhaqda nee Miqyail nail daoq neq, Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq khi Aqgaqyal milkhaoq bhai gaiq doi ail-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, nuljuq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ganl yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee gaiq doi ail-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail ganl al nvjuq teevq pov gaoq ge bhiq nail, maq loq yaoq-aol.

Nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha lee-u phao, nuljuq nvjuq bhai khalhai hav lavq-a nail ganl khi mail, maldil tsaq khi maldil doevq nail Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail haqbhoil, nuljuq thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai khalhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, Miqyail jaol nail phao kovq lal-a nail ganl bhai, yu iqsanl mail ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Miqyail-i mail bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail aivq nail Yaqyov nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee nail bhai, nuljuq noeqthunq khi daonq nail bhai iqsanl, yu ge thailthaiq nail ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq neq, yaqhao khe kev lee nail Miqyail neema phail nail phaq nee ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail, Yeiqsul ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha lal-a nail neq, aqnieivq maq ngel-ail dai, nuljuq iqsanl heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, nvjuq neq, nuljuq jaol nail Theilsaqlolni meenq bhai maq lee kev-u nee mail, Pillilpiv meenq lavqkhoel bhai khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi, khal nl movq-ail nl lavq-a nail phaq bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq lal-u phao, lav tsoiq nail maodai phaq jiav khi ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail Miqyail bhaqda nee nvjuq geesil nail neema maq aol dai, cavq lal-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq khaq mao iqsanl cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, noeq bheeq noeq leel-ai thaq nail lavqkhoel nee cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Al ovqtavq, neema maq haol nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, cavq nail cov nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail.

Nvjuq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail nee ovqtavq, aivq bhi cavq lavq-a nail khe-ai taivq-ail nvjuq cavq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq neekhaol sil dai cavq nail maq ngel. Nvjuq nail neema bhai tsao tsel daiq nail Miqyail neekhaol sil dai, cavq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai nvjuq tsiqphoiq khi cavq bhiq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Yu nail nlmaoq bhai maivjeel jeel nail ngel-i mail cavq bhiq-a nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Miqyail neq, nvjuq nail haqbhoil salkhil pevq nail ngaol.

Maldil dai, ge haq neq, nvjuq Khali nail gaqkhoel pevq nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq bhai bhi ev movq haq neq, bhi ev kivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq-i mail bivq lavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq-i mail bivq lavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai maqkhaiq nvjuq maq halpov-ail.
Nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail lavqkhoel nee aqtsil cuvq yaq aqma aivq nail yaq bhai heldaiq phail nail khe-ai, nvjuq heldaiq phail-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaiq-a deedee nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq taivq-ail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq nail maq ngel dai, nvjuq nail aqmaol iqsanl nuljuq nail haqbhoil bivq movq nail neema jiav nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq neq, nvjuq mailma-ail gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq khadai haq haq-ail laijai khi ganl nl-a nail bhai nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq-u phao, nvjuq nail haqbhoil nuljuq bhai khul nail ganl iqsanl maq bhi dal dai, nvjuq nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, ganl nl-a nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail nuljuq bhai, nvjuq-i mail khal nl khal hal bhiq-a nail phaq neq, meeq nail haol nail phaq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq khi mail oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail phaq pevq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq iqsanl, Miqyail iqsanl salkhil pevq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, aqbhu teevq gaq yovqgavq nail yaq juq bhai heldaiq phail nail khe-ai, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai nvjuq cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi gaq bivq-a nail ngaol dai iqsanl, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Aivq nail milkhaoq khi seiqleiq khaoqsail nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lal yaoq dai, nuljuq bhai khul thailthaiq nail Miqyail neema tsaq dai, aqdoevq doevq nia nail haqbhoil, nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaq bivq khi hal nail ngaol.

Miqyail bhai nvjuq maq ceiv lai dai tsiqeeq nail ganl yaoq phaq yaoq neq, niailhai jiav nail ngaol. Nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha Miqyail nail daoq cavq lee-u phao, tsaol-aq nail daoq dai, saol-nvq khi nuljuq hav bhoel-a nail maq ngel-ail. Maldil Miqyail nail daoq nial dai, saol-nvq khi hav bhoel-a nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq, neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq pevq nail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Yuldav milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail munl pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail juq bhai nuljuq saol oil-a nail ngaol. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq aqyu juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq nuljuq bhai iqsanl, alhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail ngaol.

Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai tavq heivq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai iqsanl deeq heivq khi nvjuq bhai iqsanl khoeq lavq jiovq lavq khi the dov lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq dai maq nl nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai neejiav jiav nail ngaol.

Yu nail jeq-e jaq-a hevqkovq nail phaq ya nia dai, nvjuq cavq bhiq nail bhai, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq al juq lav tsoiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq khaq mao iqsanl nl nail oeqbal bhee lal dai, niailhai nl-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol, haoqnao naosaq neq, Miqyail nail neema phail nail phaq, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nail aqmaol nuljuq nee teevq yanq ya pav-ail khi ngaol-aoq, neema neq, nuljuq nee mail jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail maivphaoq bhai moel movq deedee lal khi, laijai-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha kovq lal movq nail ngaol. Ngal iqsanl nuljuq jaol nail bha mee nia pov bhee dai lal movq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neivq Saqdaq neq, nvjuq bhai lav tsoiq nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul yavq kha lee khi mail, ngadao aivq nail sivtavq bhai ya jaol-u phao, nvjuq nail noeqthunq duq, lavqkhiq tsail duq khi mail, nvjuq nail neema eeq duq heel uqtsaoq neq, nuljuq ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq nuljuq neq, maldil nvjuq nail lavqkhiq tsail duq khi neema eeq duq pevq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq nuljuq nail ganl maq ya heeq maq ya gaiq mail maq jaol thaiq tsaol dai, pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, nv-nvq gaq taivq-ail Aqtheiq meenq bhai jaol-ail ceevq nail haqbhoil noeqceiv-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nvjuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Khali nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq nail Miqyail nail ganl nl thailthaiq nail nvjuq nail jaqbheq Tilmolseiq bhai nuljuq neema thaq tsaol nail phaq ivq lal dai, gaq bhi bivq nail haqbhoil nvjuq khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhaqda nee neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai nuljuq maq ya khaonq-ail ceevq nail haqbhoil khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ngadao Khali yaq juq ya daq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, “Ngadao khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ya daq nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khal ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai bheeq lal thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nail ganl maq ya heeq maq ya gaiq dai maq jaol tsaol lal-u phao, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khalhai pevq nail bhai ya heeq kivq dai, Tilmolseiq bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Neivq heeqphaq nuljuq bhai jalmul mul ya khi, nvjuq-i mail nl doil hal doil-a nail phaq aqnieivq-ail pevq-ail nail khul-il dai, ngal khaoqlaol deedee nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il Tilmolseiq kovq kev lee khi, nuljuq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq goil nail gaiq-a nail bhai maqkhaiq, aivq nvjuq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail daoq ge lavq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl nvjuq bhai noeq kev nail bhai maqkhaiq nvjuq khaq mao iqsanl nuljuq bhai moel movq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl nvjuq bhai moel movq deedee nail ngaol dai, aivq ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol. Nvjuq haq nail aoq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ganl bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq nail neema gaq teevq teiv-nvq gaoq aol lal-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol ivq dal laivq haq neq, nvjuq aqdoevq doevq dal laivq maol tsaol khi, neesal ya nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai niil aq-il nvjuq tsiqeeq deedee nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq bhaqda nee aivq nail sivtavq bhai nvjuq lavqkhiq ya tsail-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaoq ya moel khi, nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail maq bhee nail juq bhai bhee lal dai, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, nvjuq geeqlaoq hal deedee nail ngaol.
Nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha lal kivq dai, ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nvjuq nail haqbhoil gailkhaol lav daol lavq dei-eiq.

Nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a nia jaiq lal khi bhee lal dai maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a nia jaiq lal dai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhi mao lal dei-eiq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul, aivq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai yavq kha lee-u phao, ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai, nuljuq nail neema aqhaol haol dai aol khi, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, aivq nuljuq nail neema bhai bhi ivq lal dei-eiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai juq khi, nuljuq bhai niailhai hal hal-ail, gaq bivq movq-ail haq nail ngaol. Nuljuq Miqyail neekhaol sil dai, aqdoevq khalhai ya doevq nail ganl nvjuq nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il nuljuq tsaothe thailthaiq nail khe-ai, iqmoeq phao iqsanl a dai nee maq tsil tsaothe dav laivq yaoq.
Nvjuq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail bhaqaoq bhai juq khi, khalhai ya doevq ya jaol nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail bhai nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aqhaol haol dai doevq khi khaqmiq maq sev dai doevq haq neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq gaq lai nail lavqkhoel nee aqhaol haol dai jaol khi yovqgavq nail khaqma bhai ev khi aqmeeq-ai doevq tavq jaol tavq yaoq.
Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia nail yu nail jeq-e jaq-a yovqgavq nail neekhaol teevq sil doevq tavq jaol tavq nail khe-ai, nuljuq maq ya doevq-ail.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq-i mail aqtsaoq hal bhao-ai thaq nail bhai maq ya bheeq maq ya leel-ail, maq ya kav jaq-ail dai, jel lal-u phao nvjuq nuljuq bhai aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq-a nail khe-ai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul neq, alhai nl nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqjiivq aqcavq nail haoqnao bhi doevq nail dai khi, Miqyail ngadao juq bhai khul-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aqmeeq aqhaol haol dai bhi doevq nail haqbhoil Miqyail ngadao bhai khul lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, daoq al juq bhai khaonq nail tsaol-aq neq, tsaol-aq nail daoq bhai khaonq nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhi jaol lee-a nail Miqyail al gaq nail daoq bhai, khaonq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq nail gaiqlaq bhai khalhai ya goil ya gaiq-a nail ganl nvjuq nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhiq nail maq loq yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq gaq-ao nail ngaol.

Maldil dai, ge haq neq, nuljuq jaol nail Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq khaoq lao bhai jaol nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, a dai nee maqtsil aqyu juq bhai gaiq-a jaiq lal yaoq dai, nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaq bivq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, laijai nail lavqkhoel nee, neema ivqdao dai jaol khi, yu nail ganl bhai maq suqsaq-ail mail, yovqgavq nail ganl nl nl-ail doevq dal laiq yaoq.
Alhai doevq haq neq, Yeiqsul bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail juq, nuljuq bhai ev khi yovqgavq loq nail phaq, yu bhai maq ya juq mail aqdoevq doevq kivq lal nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, khul teevq phaq-ail noeqthunq nail phaq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq noeqhaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq maq ya noeqhaq dai, sil jel-a nail tsaol-aq nail ganl nvjuq nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-ail nial.

Yeiqsul sil khi gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol khi sil-a nail juq bhai Yeiqsul nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Miqyail hevqkovq lavq naol dai, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Nvjuq Yeiqsul-i mail cavq-a nail daoq bhai juq khi nuljuq bhai niailhai ge lavq bhel. Yeiqsul yavq kha lee-u kev dai, aqdoevq doevq thailthaiq nail ngadao juq neq, sil jel-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail iqmoeq nee ya kev lai nail maq ngel-ail.

Yeiqsul nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee-u phao, daoq bivq nail aqthel bhai maqkhaiq, eeq jaiq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel gaq nail aqthel bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail nqbho jiiv nail aqthel bhai maqkhaiq, ya gaiq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol khi sil jel-a nail juq iqmoeq gaoq doevq kovq lal nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aqdoevq doevq nail ngadao juq iqsanl aqyu juq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nqdil jiav duq bha tsiq dal lai lavq khi daqmoe bha Yeiqsul nee mail ya thaoqphuq lai nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao juq Yeiqsul nee khaq mao iqsanl ya jaol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ganl niil ge ge-ail gaq bivq yaoq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Yeiqsul yavq kha lee nail yanq yanq lao khi aqkovq aqlav nail ganl, nvjuq nuljuq bhai gevq bhiq nail maq loq yaoq-aol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, hul-iq tsilma khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lee nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul yavq kha lee nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Milkhaoq sal lal khi, geesil nail maq jiav yaoq-aol dai, yu ge thailthaiq-u phao, luq-ail seil-ail nail phaq aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol. Yaq tsiq nail aqyanq tsaq lal-a nail aqma teevq gaq ovqmav nal dov lal-a nail khe-ai, thaiqphuq dai kev lee khi, aqyu juq maq jel-ail nia-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq neq aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq maq ngel nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul lee nail aqn aqyanq al khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lee nail khe-ai thaiqphuq dai, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai maq kev lee-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq iqsanl aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail yaq khi, n-gaol nail yaq ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail ngadao juq neq, nqkiv nail yaq khi, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail yaq maq ngel-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yu iqthaiq kovq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngadao iqthaiq iqthaiq-ail maq ya jaol-ail. Ngadao aqmeeq-ai yovqgavq nail neema bhai yovqgavq gaq lai khi aqgeel geel dai, ya jaol nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq yaq neq nqkiv phao iqthaiq nail ngaol. Jilpheeq daol bov nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, nqkiv phaoq daol bov nail ngaol.

Ngadao neq, n-gaol nail yaq ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail neema bhai yovqgavq gaq lai bhel. Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khi mail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhai, doeq daq duq khe-ai doi khi, hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, noeqthunq nail phaq bhai hail uqtsaoq khe-ai tsaoq khi jaol bhel.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aivq yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai bhi daq nail dai khi, ngadao bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, aivq ngadao bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul yavq kha lee-u phao, ngadao doevq khi ngaol-aoq, sil khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai ya jaol dai, Yeiqsul neq, ngadao juq nail haqbhoil sildan-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, niil aq-il nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaq bivq khi, eeq lal heel lal thailthaiq nail khe-ai, iqmoeq phao iqsanl nl dal laivq yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail nail ganl nl nail juq bhai ev yaoq. Aqyu juq neq, Yeiqsul nail aqmil kov-uvq nee nuljuq bhai heldaiq phail khi, aqmeeq-ai cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai nl-a nail bhaqda nee nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel nee aqyu juq bhai gaiq-a khi mailma-ail ev yaoq. Alhai dul dai, nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai iqsanl tsaq lai jil lai yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nuljuq bhai gaq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal nul nail tsaol-aq bhai aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Al ovqtavq, geesil nia nail tsaol-aq juq khi gaq bhaq nail juq bhai iqsanl gaq bivq yaoq. Tsaol-aq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai neema heelma ma dai, thaq yaoq.

Yu aqdoil phaq nl lal khi ngaol-aoq, aqdoil phaq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl thaq nl kovq bhiq. Nuljuq nail gaiqlaq bhai maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, khaq mao iqsanl aqmeeq phaq taivq-ail ya nl bhiq dai, laijai yaoq.
Khaq mao iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.
Maq ceiv lai dai, geeqlaoq hal yaoq.
