Khalheel phaq bhai ya thaoqphuq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq. Nuljuq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel-ai aqdoevq alhai doevq nail bhai Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.
Aqhaqlal Miqyail nl nail hal nail bhai thaq lav tsoiq.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail daoq bhai khal ge movq-ail thaq ge.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aqmeeq-ai tsaotsel daiq khi aqmeeq phaq bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.
Maq meeq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, gail jao jao yaoq.

Ngadao bhai neesal-ovq nail phaq bivq lavq nail Miqyail nuljuq bhai teevq bhee teevq lovq bhi meeq bhi haol lal khi, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali yavq kha lee-u phao, nuljuq nail neema, aqmaol, aqhaqlal iqsanl bhai, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, Miqyail heldaiq phail dei-eiq.
Nuljuq bhai khul-a nail Miqyail neq, nuljuq bhai alhai heldaiq phail lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq neq, saljial ivq nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nail haqbhoil iqsanl geeqlaoq hal tsao lavq yaoq.
Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq iqsanl bhai meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee, aqlavq he yaoq.
Haoqgavq niil aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq iqsanl bhai ge daiq bhiq yaoq dai, ngal Yeiqsul bhai juq khi nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol jiav dei-eiq.

Paolluv, Siqlav khi Tilmolseiq, nvjuq hail gaq, ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail, Theilsaqlolni meenq khe jaol nail Khali yaq munl bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nvjuq nuljuq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq eeq lal mao lal thailthaiq khi, nvjuq iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq mao lal thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, nvjuq alhai tsiqeeq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl juq nail sivtavq bhai nvjuq nuljuq bhai tsiqeeq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq khoeq nail jiovq nail khi, haq dee aoq deedee nail iqsanl bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, ol ol-ail neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Nuljuq alheel nail neema aol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee yalkhaq dal nail bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bhi dov lal-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq aivq nail Milkhaoq bhai geel-nvq lal dai, aivq nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Milkhaoq al nail haqbhoil nuljuq daq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee yalkhaq dal nail gaq pevq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhi kev lee nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nqtavq nee mail, bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol nail aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, miqjaq nail aqbhaq lavqkhoel nee dov lee-u phao, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq-a nail nuljuq bhai nvjuq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai gaqnaq bhi naq lavq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, aivq mailma-ail nl kovq bhiq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul yavq kha lee-u n-gaol, tsaol-aq al juq neq, aivq bhai maqkhaiq, seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bheeq aol nail aivq nail bhaqaoq bhai maqkhaiq, ya pav-ail khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel luq-ail seil-ail nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aq-u n-gaol Yeiqsul neq, aivq nail tsaol-aq bhaqda nee seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail nee ovqtavq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail noeq-u maq dov-ail tsiqeeq nia dai, yavq kha lee nail ngaol. Nvjuq salkhil khanq nail bhai nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl munl al munl nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq khaq mao iqsanl nuljuq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq niailhai hal nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Miqyail-i mail khul-a nail bhai geel-nvq lal dai, aivq nl lavq dai maqkhaiq, aqmeeq phaq nl movq nail neema iqsanl khi neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail khal nl khal hal nail iqsanl, aivq nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee aivq nl gil nia dai maqkhaiq, nvjuq geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Alhai bhee lal haq neq, nuljuq bhaqda nee ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil seiqleiq khaoqsail ya khi, aivq bhaqda nee nuljuq seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail ngaol. Ngadao nail Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, alhai pevq lal nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali yavq kha lee nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, ngadao aivq jaol nail bha ya jil lai nail ganl bhai maqkhaiq, nvjuq nuljuq bhai niailhai hal nail ngaol.

“Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqn kev lee-aoq naol” dai, aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, daoq ge daiq lavq nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, nvjuq nail haoqgavq khe-ai, gevq lavq nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, yu nuljuq bhai ge lal khi ngaol-aoq, niil juq bhaqda nee, nuljuq nail neema lavqtsail mail thaq suqsaq thaq geesil.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq gail nuljuq bhai khul phaq nail ganl nee maqkhaiq, jalmul maq ya mul ya dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqn al n maq kev lee-u nee mail, miltsaq kovtavq bhai Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail nee ovqtavq aivq bhai genl dev nail phaq pevq lal nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, haqeiv deedee nail gaq dov lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haoqnao naosaq n-gaol, aivq neq, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al gaq Miqyail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail dai, yu khal khul nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, uqhuq thaoq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai maqkhaiq, genl dev khi, al juq nee maqtsil aivq nail aqmaol bhai aivq thaqeeq nail ngaol. Aivq Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai jaoldeel khi, “Ngal neq Miqyail ngaol” dai, mailma-ail ge nail ngaol.
Ngal nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, ganl niil juq nuljuq bhai ge daiq bhiq-a nail bhai, nuljuq nioilpeivq ail-aoq nail laiq.

Niil aq-il nee mail haqeiv deedee nail al gaq maq dov lal nail neq, ganl teevq phaq jiav nail bhaqda nee mail ngaol. Ganl al phaq bhai nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Aqyanq tsaq lal-u phao, alhai pevq lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail phaq neq, niil aq-il iqsanl aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoq maq naldaiq nail al phaq bhai maq bhi dov lal dai, lav tsoiq nail gaq jaol nail ngaol. Lav tsoiq nail gaq dov ail haq neq, ganl al juq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, haqeiv deedee nail al gaq bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul tsaol-aq al gaq bhai aivq nail aqhaq-i mail jiiv heivq nail ngaol. Aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail lavqkhoel nee yavq kha lee nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq al gaq luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq al gaq, neivq Saqdaq bhaqda nee dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq dov lal-u phao, yu bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq ya nia dai, neivq Saqdaq nail bhaqaoq yuq nail lavqkhoel nee bhi heeq bhiq moel nail juq khi noeq-u maq dov nail phaq nl nail ngaol.

Luq-ail seil-ail thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi jalmul mul ya nia dai, aivq haqeiv nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai juq khi nl nail ngaol. Luq-ail seil-ail thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq, hevqkovq nail phaq bhai ya dai, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai gaiq-a nail neema maq aol nail ngel-i mail, luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, haqeiv nail phaq bhai lavqkhiq tsail khi, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai yalkhaq dal dai, maq ngel nail phaq bhai neema bhi thaqtsaol dai, noeq bheeq noeq leel nail phaq Miqyail aqyu juq bhai bhi kev bhi thel lee-a nail ngaol.

Heeqphaq Yeiqsul mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq nail haqbhoil khaq mao iqsanl Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nuljuq bhai bhi haol lal nail nee ovqtavq, nuljuq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai neema thaqtsaol-a nail bhaqda nee, hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, iqmoeq-u phao nee Miqyail nuljuq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alhai pevq lal dai, Miqyail nvjuq-i mail cavq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai juq khi nuljuq bhai khul-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ya dai, aivq alhai khul-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ivqdao dai doevq yaoq. Nvjuq-i mail nuljuq bhai moeqthaoq-i mail cavq bhiq-a nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqgavq gevq khi cavq bhiq-a nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail iqsanl bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali khi mail ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail ngadao bhai gaiq-a khi aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee nqmaq maqluv halyeel neesal ya nail phaq maqkhaiq, ivqdao dai noeqthunq nail phaq maqkhaiq, ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali khi ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail neq, nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl, aqmeeq phaq nl nia nail nee ovqtavq, daoq aqmeeq phaq ge nia dai, gaq bivq khi bhi ivq lal dei-eiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, haoqnao naosaq khe daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Miqyail nail daoq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai lavqtsail mail gaiq doi-ail khi seiqleiq khaoqsail ya-a nail khe-ai, yaoq dao yaoq bhai iqsanl alhai pevq lal dai, nvjuq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal yaoq.

Maq meeq maq jaq nail tsaol-aq khi haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel nvjuq ya jel-ail dai iqsanl, geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail maq ngel-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq saljial ivq nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq bhai bhi ivq lal khi nuljuq neivq Saqdaq nee ya jel-ail dai, aivq heldaiq phail lavq nail ngaol.
Nvjuq-i mail daoq bivq-a nail khe-ai nuljuq nl nail nee ovqtavq, iqmoeq phao lai-u iqsanl nl nail ngaol dai, Yeiqsul bhaqda nee nvjuq neema thaqtsaol naol.
Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhai nuljuq heeq nia jaiq lal dai maqkhaiq, Khali khe-ai daq tsaol oltsaol dai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul nuljuq nail neema bhai lav sav bhiq dei-eiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil kov-uvq nee, nvjuq nuljuq bhai daoq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Nvjuq-i mail nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail bhai maq tsaothe mail, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal nul nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali ya juq bhai aqtsaoq thaq tsaoq.

Nvjuq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai nuljuq saol oil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, ganl maq nl dai aqnieivq-ail jaol-a nail maq ngel-ail.
Nvjuq aqphoiq maq bivq-ail nuljuq nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jaq-al. Nuljuq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq ya dal dai, nvjuq nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, ganl nl deedee-a nail ngaol.
Yu-i mail bhi jaq lavq nail bhai nvjuq jaq kivq dai, aqkhaoqanq maq jiav nail ngel-i mail, maq jaq-a nail maq ngel. Nuljuq nvjuq bhai saol oil khi tsaothe nia dai, alhai nl-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq nuljuq nee mail jaol-u phao, nuljuq bhai daoq niailhai bivq-a nail ngaol. “Ganl maq nl nul nail tsaol-aq, aoq thaq jaq” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal nul nail nee ovqtavq, yovqgavq nail ganl bhai neq, teevq peivq-ail maq nl dai, yu nail ganl bhai taivq-ail lav tsoiq lav lev nail ngaol geiq dai, nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq alheel nail tsaol-aq bhai Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail aqmil kov-uvq nee daoq niailhai bivq khi, gaq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Ivqdao dai doevq khi, yovqgavq ya jaq ya daol dai, nl yaoq hal yaoq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aqmeeq phaq nl nail bhai, gaq thaq bhaq.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, nvjuq-i mail gevq-a nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq haq neq, aivq bhai noeq thaq-ai yaoq. Aivq ya haqsil dai, aivq bhai aqtsaoq thaq gaoq tsaoq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao bhai neejiav jiav lal nail gaq bhai noeq thaq-a nail khe-ai aivq bhai thaq noeq thaq. Aqivq jaqbheq khe-ai saol-nvq khi, aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.
Neesal bhi ovq nail Heeqphaq, nuljuq bhai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel khaq mao iqsanl neesal bhi ovq dei-eiq. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nuljuq iqsanl nee mail jaol dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, ngaq nail aqlavq-i mail gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail khal gevq-a nail haoqgavq yaoq keiv yaoq-ao nee bhai nuljuq heeq nia dai, niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail gevq-a nail haoqgavq neq, niailhai ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel Paolluv ngaol. Ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Miqyail khi ngadao nail noeqthunq duq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali daoq bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phao ngaq nail yaqyov maldil pevq nail Tilmolseiq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail khi ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail phaq khi neesal-ovq nail phaq, naoq nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal Maqgeiqdaolnil milkhaoq bhai lai nail dai khi-u phao, “Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol-ail ceevq yaoq” dai, naoq bhai hal-a nail ngaol. Maq tsaq nail phaq bhai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai daoq bhi bivq nail dai khi, ngal naoq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ganqje juq bhai maqkhaiq, teevq thal-iq ge gil lai nail maq bhao nail aqceevq ge nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, thaq thaqeeq dei-eiq dai, aqyu juq bhai daoq bhi bivq nail dai khi iqsanl, ngal naoq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Ganl al juq neq, Miqyail-i mail bivq lavq-a nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai maq bhi dov lal-ail. Jil pheeljaq nail phaq taivq-ail bhi dov lal nail ngaol.

Naol aqyu juq bhai daoq alhai bivq-a nail bhaqda nee, aqyu juq goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aol lal dai, ngal noeqthunq nail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail niil phaq neq, neema aqhaol haol dai, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail heeq nia nail neema khi maldil neema thaqtsaol nail neema lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, al hail phaq bhai khaonq-ail ceevq khi, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq nail juq bhai taivq-ail ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq cavq nail cov nail tsaol-aq jiovq movq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq khalhai ge nail bhai maqkhaiq, neema eeq eeq-ail ge nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, aqtsaq tsaq dai, yuq ha neq, aqmeeq ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi jiav-a nail maq ngel-ail. Maq meeq maq jaq nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq, daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq, oeqbal nl nail tsaol-aq, maq meeq maq haol nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail nail aol bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq, aqbhu aqma bhai heivq nail tsaol-aq, yu bhai lav heivq nail tsaol-aq,

khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq, yaqyov-aq aqtsaoq gaiqlaq bhai maq nl khaoq nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq, tsaol-aq bhai gaoq nail tsaol-aq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail lavqkhoel nee salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq, maldil tsaq nail ganl cavq nail cov nail phaq bhai lav tsoiq nail tsaol-aq, maq meeq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nail tsaol-aq niil juq nail haqbhoil aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhi jiav-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Maldil tsaq nail ganl al, geeqlaoq eeq nail Miqyail-i mail av lavq-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq lavqkhoel nee, dov lee nail ngaol.

Ngal ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai tsiqeeq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, aivq ngaq bhai gaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. “Naol saljial ivq nail ngel-i mail, ngaq nail ganl nl nia-ail nial” dai, aivq ngaq bhai saol-nvq-ai thaq khi, tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol.

Jel lal-u phao, ngal Yeiqsul bhai khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq khi haqeiv nail gaq pevq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal neema maq thaqtsaol lal-u phao, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai maq heeq kivq-ail nl-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq ngaq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a lavq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khi goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nee teevq gaq khe-ai, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol iqsanl, maq ge gil tsaol dai, ngal ya-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali neq, oeqbal yaq bhai hevqkovq lee nail dai khi, miltsaq kovtavq-ai lee-a nail ngaol dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq niil daoq neq, saljial ivq khi, maldil hav bhoel heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail daoq ngaol. Ngal neq, oeqbal yaq nail lavqkhoel yu nee maqtsil oeqbal eeq nail gaq ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, Yeiqsul Khali khadai oltsaol nail ngel-ail dai, aivq phaodaiq bhiq movq nail ngel-i mail, ngal yu nee maqtsil oeqbal eeq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq ngaq bhai gaoqhaq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ngal neq, saol oil duq ngaol.

Miqyail neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel uvthaiq nail Heeqphaq ngaol. Aivq neq, maq luq maq seil-ail nia-ail. Tsaol-aq aivq bhai maq moel nia-ail. Aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail Miqyail ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel khi, seiqleiq khaoqsail bhi jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Ngaq nail yaqyov Tilmolseiq-ol, aq-u phao, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq juq neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq khi naoq nail ganl ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngal naoq bhai daoq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq khi, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail heeq nia nail neema aol nail lavqkhoel, aq-u phao ge-ai thaq nail al juq bhai juq juq-ail khi, genl aqmeeq-ail dev yaoq. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail heeq nia nail neema bhai khaonq-ail ceevq-a nail ngel-i mail, laovq cov ail-a nail khe-ai, aqyu juq nail neema thaqtsaol nail neema cov ail-a nail ngaol.

Huqmiqnail khi mail Aqleiqsaqdul iqsanl, cov ail-a nail tsaol-aq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail maq ya ge-ail dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai cavq bhi cov bhiq movq nail ngel-i mail, ngal aqyu nvq gaq bhai neivq Saqdaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq khe phaq, ngal naoq bhai gaq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal nail, yu nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal nail khi, Miqyail bhai tsiq eeq nail juq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil hal yaoq.

Heeqphaq juq khi uvthaiq nail juq nail haqbhoil iqsanl alhai hal yaoq. Alhai hal haq neq, ngadao neesal-ovq khi, neema aqsal sal nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail bhai ev khi, aqmeeq aqhaol nail lavqkhoel nee ya doevq nail ngaol.
Alhai geeqlaoq hal nail neq, ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqmeeq teevq phaq pevq khi, aivq neekhaol sil nail phaq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail hevqkovq nail phaq bhai ya nail nee ovqtavq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia lal dai, Miqyail movq deedee nail ngaol.
Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol khi, Miqyail khi tsaol-aq nail gaiqlaq bhai tsaolkhaiq teevq gaq jaol-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaol-aq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali ngaol.
Aivq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai hevqkovq nail dai khi, aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyanq tsaq lal-u phao, ganl al bhai ngadao ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Al nail ganl salkhil khanq nail haqbhoil, ngal neq, daoq cavq cavq nail gaq khi gaqkhoel pevq lal dai maqkhaiq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khi maldil tsaq nail phaq nail ganl yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail gaq pevq lal dai maqkhaiq, Miqyail ngaq bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngal niailhai ge nail neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail maq ngel-ail. Daolcoev dai, ge nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee jaol nail yaqyov-aq juq, neema maq phail nail nee ovqtavq, maq jil pheeljaq dai, meeq nail haol nail lavqkhoel nee aqlavq bavq dil khi, geeqlaoq hal nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial.

Alhai dul dai, yaqmai-aq juq iqsanl, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail nee ovqtavq, neema thaq nia nail lavqkhoel, aqgaq aqdoi doi heeq phaq-ail doi nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial. Uqhuq tsailkheel phaiq nail, heel-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail nlmaoq goe nail, laoqpav laolpav nail sainl goe nail khi, aqphoiq mao-ail phoiq nail aqgaq aqdoi doi nail bhai ngal maq oil movq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Miqyail bhai ev naol dai, ge nail yaqmai-aq juq ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail khe-ai, aqmeeq phaq nl nl-ail doevq yaoq.
Yaqmai-aq juq neq, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail nee ovqtavq, aqtsi tsu dai jaol khi, yu-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq nail bhai ya saol oil nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq neq, yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail maqkhaiq, yaqyov-aq bhai uvthaiq nail maqkhaiq, ngal aqkhaoqanq maq bivq-ail. Aqyu juq neq, aqtsi tsu dai, ya jaol nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqdaq bhai teivq gaq khi mail pultavq, Eilbav bhai teivq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Aqdaq bhai jalmul mul ya-a nail maq ngel-ail. Yaqmai-aq gaq bhai jalmul mul ya khi, yaqmai-aq gaq nl bheeq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema thaqtsaol nail, goil nail gaiq-a nail, meeq nail haol nail, neema thaq nia nail, aqyu juq niil juq nail lavqkhoel bhai ivq haq neq, yaq bhao-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq ya jel-ail nail ngaol.
Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail ganl bhai halpov nail tsaol-aq, ganl aqmeeq halpov nail ngaol dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, tsaq deedee nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail gaq, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq, khaqma teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail tsaol-aq, yaolphaol nia nail tsaol-aq, neema ivqdao dai, thaq nia nail tsaol-aq, ev heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq, daq-i bhai hav nia nail tsaol-aq khi, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, jilpheeq daol bov khi, yu bhai deeq nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail. Neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail tsaol-aq, yu nee maq jil pheeljaq nail tsaol-aq khi, phul bhai neekhaol maq jiav nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail ildaoq bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail nia khi, yaqmiq yaqyov juq daoq naldaiq nail lavqkhoel nee, tsaq nail phaq bhai nl nia lal dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yovqgavq nail ildaoq bhai maq heldaiq phail nia nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl bhai khalhai khi heldaiq phail nia nail-aiq.
Aivq neq, Khali yaq aqsivq maq ya pevq-ail. Maq ngel haq neq, neema eeq lal khi, neivq heeqphaq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq la geiq.

Khali yaq munl nail lavqniil phaol jaol nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai, khul teevq phaq-ail ge duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Maq ngel haq neq, yu-i mail khal ge movq-ail ge nail bhai ya daq khi, neivq heeqphaq nail lavqphee bhai phee lai nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, tsaojao-ai bhiq nail juq iqsanl, yu ev nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Moeqlal lal jaiq covq nail tsaol-aq, jilpheeq daol bov nail tsaol-aq khi, maq tsaq maq daol nail lavqkhoel nee phul halpov nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail.

Aqyu juq neq, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail heeq nia nail neema aol khi, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail daoqceevq nav deedee nail phaq bhai ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq yaq pevq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq bhai iqmoeq laonqdaiq yaoq. Laonqdaiq khi, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav haq neq, tsaojao-ai nail gaq bhi jiovq yaoq.

Alhai dul dai, yaqmai-aq juq iqsanl yu ev nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Yu bhai khal ge movq-ail ge doil nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail. Yaolphaol nia nail tsaol-aq, khi yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel saljial ivq nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Tsaojao-ai nail gaq iqsanl, khaqma teevq gaq taivq-ail ya jaol nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail yaq khi yovqgavq nail ildaoq lavqkhoel bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail nia khi gaq lai nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaojao-ai nail ganl bhai aqmeeq-ai nl nail tsaol-aq, yu-i mail thaqeeq lavq nail bhai ya daq nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nee geesil nail neema maq aol dai iqsanl, pevq lal nail ngaol.

Mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, naol jaol nail bha lee naol dai, ngal noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal lavqtsail mail maq lee kev-u nee, Miqyail nail ildaoq lavqkhoel khalhai nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq naol ya heeq nia dai, ganl niil juq ngal naoq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ildaoq al neq, aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail Khali yaq munl ngaol. Munl al neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq nail haqbhoil ivq duq khi daoqthaoq ngaol.
Ngadao Khali yaq juq Miqyail bhai ev khi uqhuq thaoq nail aol neq, daoq ceevq nav deedee nail ngaol dai, ge kivq nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, aqsivq haqjoil phi khi doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq tsaq nail daol nail ngaol dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail salkhil khanq-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel aivq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail ganl yu nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai ge gaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail nail lavqkhoel nee tsiqdal laivq-a nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqlaoq kheq dai niailhai ge nail ngaol. Haoqnao naosaq khe aqn aqyanq nail lavqkhoel, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai khaonq haq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail aqheel juq nail daoq khi mail neivq juq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.

Neivq al juq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai juq juq-ail, alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail heeq nia nail neema bhai neivq juq-i mail, tsaq nail maq tsaq nail phaq maq tselpav nia dai, bhi pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Khaqma maq ya hevq, maq ya maol ail nail nee ovqtavq, jaqjaq daoldaol teevq pav ganav juq iqsanl maq ya jaq maq ya daol-ail dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol khi maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia nail tsaol-aq ngaq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail jaq nia dai, jaqjaq daoldaol al juq Miqyail-i mail teivq-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, thaq jaq thaq daol dai, aqyu juq lav tsoiq nail ngaol.
Miqyail-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, aqmeeq ngaol. Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqeeq-ail hav bhoel haq neq, khul phaq bhai iqsanl maq ya khaonq ha-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail daoq bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, geeqlaoq hal nail bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, al juq meeq lal haol lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai naol ganl niil juq cavq bhiq cov bhiq haq neq, naol neq, naoq-i mail tsaothe nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail maldil tsaq nail phaq khi meeq deedee nail cavq nail cov nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee eeq lal-a nail Yeiqsul Khali nail meeq nail yaqkav teevq gaq pevq lal nail ngaol.
Aqphiq joiqmaoq juq-i mail ge nail, Miqyail bhai maq ev nail ganqje nail daoq juq bhai thaq naldaiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai ev lal nia dai, naol aqmeeq-ai nl jao jao yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqsivq haqjoil phao gaq aol lal dai, nl jao jao nail juq neq, ganl micil ganav tsoiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai ganl tsoiq nail ngaol. Niil yeel nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, yaqhao khe yeel nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.
Daoq niil daoq neq, saljial ivq khi, maldil hav bhoel heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail daoq ngaol.

Ngadao aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail bhai noeqthunq thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, laijai laijai-ail ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail Hevqkovq nail gaq ngaol. Aivq neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil a dai nee maqtsil, Hevqkovq nail gaq ngaol.
Ganl niil juq iqsanl yu bhai daoq bivq khi cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Naol yaqkhaq yaquv pevq nail bhai tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail khal ge movq-ail thaq bhi ge. Daoq ge-u phao maqkhaiq, ganl nl-u phao maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil saol oil duq bhi pevq yaoq. Naol nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khi, aqmeeq aqhaol phaq, niil juq bhai iqsanl aqyu juq nail haqbhoil saol oil duq bhi pevq yaoq.
Ngal kev lee-u phao kev dai, yu bhai Jalliq ge daiq bhiq nail, gaq bivq nail dai khi, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail, niil juq bhai laijai nail lavqkhoel nee nl nl-ail jaol yaoq.

Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail juq naoq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav-u phao, aqyu juq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan khi, aivq nail daoq ge ge-ail, naoq bhai aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Naol kovpavq al ya-a nail khe-ai, aqmeeq-ai nl-ail yaoq dei-eiq.
Naoq-i mail nl nail ganl eeq lal heel lal thailthaiq nail bhai tsaol-aq iqsanl ya moel dai, al juq bhai neema kev nail lavqkhoel nee, mailma-ail nl yaoq.

Aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaolphaol-ail, aqdoevq doevq yaoq. Naol cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao iqsanl, aqmeeq-ai yaolphaol yaoq. Al juq nail haoqnao neema ivqdao dai, doevq-ail yaoq. Naol alhai doevq haq neq, naoq bhai maqkhaiq, naoq nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, hevqkovq nail ngaol.
Aqbhal joiqmaoq juq bhai khaq khaq-ail thaq cavq bhiq. Aqyu juq bhai naoq nail aqbhu khe-ai, saol-nvq-ai thaq khi cavq bhiq yaoq. Yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq bhai naoq nail mailnail khe-ai saol-nvq yaoq.
Aqphiq joiqmaoq juq bhai naoq nail aqma khe-ai saol-nvq-ai thaq khi, yaqmai-aq yaqnoil juq bhai neema aqhaol haol deel teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel naoq nail nailma khe-ai saol-nvq yaoq.
Heldaiq phail bhiq nail gaq maq jaol nail miqtsiq miqma juq bhai ev khi heldaiq phail bhiq yaoq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miqtsiq miqma aivq nail yaq maq ngel haq neq, aivq nail aqjievq lilheel jaol haq neq, yaq al juq yovqgavq nail ilkhaol khe tsaol-aq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq khi, aqbhu aqma aqphiq aqbhal juq bhai geeqlaoq nl kovq bhiq nail phaq neq, Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq pevq nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, alhai heldaiq phail bhiq nail phaq bhai Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail doevq khi, heldaiq phail bhiq nail gaq maq jaol nail miqtsiq miqma bhai neq, Miqyail bhai noeqthunq khi, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, “Tsaojao-ai lavq-o” dai, geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil phao lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhai taivq-ail halpov nail miqtsiq miqma neq, doevq khi ngaol-aoq, sil-a nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Yu oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, alhai nl yaoq dai, miqtsiq miqma nail yaq juq bhai daoq bivq yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav yovqgavq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai maqkhaiq, a dai nee maqtsil yovqgavq nail ilkhaol khe tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, maq heldaiq phail haq neq, Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai dul khi, neema maq thaqtsaol lal-a nail tsaol-aq nee maqtsil doil jaiq nail ngaol.

Miqtsiq miqma nail aqmil gevq bhoel nail phaldoiq nail ganl niailhai ngaol. Aqkovq kovq tsel kovq bhee lal-a nail yovqgavq nail yovjil bhai saljial ivq-a nail miqtsiq miqma juq nail aqmil bhai gevq bhoel yaoq.

Aqmeeq phaq nl thail hal thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, yu salkhil khanq nail, yaq juq bhai lav sav nail, daq-i bhai hav nia nail, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq nail aqkhil bhai tsiq bhiq nail, haq nail aoq nail juq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq khi, aqmeeq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl thail hal thailthaiq nail miqtsiq miqma juq nail aqmil taivq-ail gevq bhoel yaoq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqkovq maq jiav lal thaq nail miqtsiq miqma juq nail aqmil gevq bhoel nail phaldoiq bhai thaq gevq bhoel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq maol ail movq lal bhiq haq neq, Khali nail uvthaiq nail kov-uvq nee dov-ail nail ngaol.
Alhai nl haq neq, aqyu juq-i mail iqmoeq phao ge-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial bhai aqyu juq lav cov-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail dal bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq teevq il nee teevq il nalga nalga-ail, aqdoil doil-ail nail ngaol. Aqdoil doil-ail nail taivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq moeqjaiq jaiq lal khi, maq ge khaoq nail phaq ge lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq bhai maq tavq nail, yu nail ganl bhai lav suqsaq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqkovq mao-ail maq jiav lal thaq nail miqtsiq miqma juq neq, maol ail khi yaq jaol lee nail nee ovqtavq, yovqgavq nail ilkhaol bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail nail bhai, ngal oil movq-ail nial. Alhai nl haq neq, ngadao bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq, ngadao bhai khal ge movq-ail ge duq maq jiav-ail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niil aq-il iqsanl miqtsiq miqma teevq pav ganav juq laiq-ail thailthaiq khi, neivq Saqdaq nail haoqnao tsaothel laivq-aoq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq ganav nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai miqtsiq miqma juq jaol haq neq, aqyu juq aivq bhai tsu heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Alhai tsuq haq neq, kavbavq al Khali yaq munl bhai maq dal mail, Khali yaq munl neq, tsaojao-ai nail gaq maq jaol nail miqtsiq miqma juq bhai aqmeeq-ai tsu nia nail ngaol.

Khali yaq munl bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail nail aqivq aqtsu juq neq, ev nail phaq khi danq nail phaq bhai oil nail geel-nvq nail ngaol. Daoq cavq daoq cov cov nail khi yu bhai cavq bhi cov bhiq nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai a dai nee maqtsil iqsanl ev khi danq bhiq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Gov bhai naoq thailthaiq nail niaoqnel bhai moeqkeivq maq ya keivq-ail” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. “Ganl nl nail tsaol-aq, ganl nl nail aqphoiq ya nail tsaq nail ngaol” dai iqsanl, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq hail gaq maq jaol haq neq, aqivq aqtsu juq bhai oeqbal thaq nail daoq bhai thaq naldaiq.
Oeqbal nl thailthaiq nail juq bhai, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai khaq khaq-ail cavq bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, yu iqsanl geesil nail neema aol lal nail ngaol.

Naol al juq nl-u phao, maq tselpav maq bhoilpav nail nee ovqtavq, maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel dai nl yaoq dai, Miqyail khi Yeiqsul Khali nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, tsel dov-ai thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal naoq bhai daoq bivq nail ngaol.
Khaq sil gaq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, lavqtsail mail aqlavq thaq bavq dav. Yu oeqbal nl nail bhai naol teevq peivq-ail thaq aol lai. Aqhaol haol dai, doevq yaoq.
Niai nee pultavq neq, ulcuvq taivq-ail thaq daol. Naol jaol hal maq dov nail haqbhoil khi ovqmav nail haqbhoil maq gal lal dai, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul iqsanl micil daol yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq nail oeqbal bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal khi, yalkhaq dal nail jaol duq bhai aqyu juq bhai hel-aivq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq nail oeqbal neq, haoqnao taivq-ail dov lal nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, nl-ai hal-ai thaq nail aqmeeq juq iqsanl bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nail ngaol. Niil aq-il bhaqlaoq kheq dai maq dov lal nail aqmeeq phaq juq iqsanl, khaq mao kev dai maq oil-uvq thaq nia-ail.

Miqyail nail aqmil bhai maqkhaiq, nvjuq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail daoq bhai maqkhaiq, yu khal ge movq-ail maq yaq ge dai, yaqkav juq neq, yovqgavq nail ilheel bhai mailma-ail ev nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Khali yaq pevq nail ilheel juq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail yaqkav juq neq, yovqgavq nail ilheel nail aqivq jaqbheq pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail ilheel bhai maq ev dai jaol nail maq tsaq-ail. Ilheel juq nail haqbhoil ganl aqmeeq-ai nl nail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq alhai nl-u phao, Khali yaq pevq nail, aqyu juq-i mail gaiq-a nail ilheel juq geeqlaoq al ya nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naol ganl niil juq cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi gaq bhiq thailthaiq yaoq.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, bheeq-n nail ganl teevq phaq ganav yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail haol nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq haq neq,

aivq neq neema eeq khi, khul teevq phaq-ail maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aivq neq, daoq juq nail ganl nee khaq pheeljaq khi jil pheeljaq movq deedee nail neema aol-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Alhai nl nail phaq neq, yu bhai maivjeel jeel nail, iqdaiq iqtsai dov lal nail, khal ge movq-ail ge nail, yu nail ganl haqeiv nail phaq saol-nvq nail, niil juq bhi dov lal nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq, aqmeeq phaq bhai saol-nvq nail phaq luq-ail seil-ail nail nee ovqtavq, maldil tsaq nail daoq teevq peivq-ail maq aol dai, jil pheeljaq nail phaq iqsanl bhi dov lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail bhai ev nail ngel-i mail, jail jeq jeq lal nail ngaol dai, noeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngel nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai ev khi ngadao-i mail khal jiav nail phaq bhai neekhaol sil haq neq, jail jeq mao-ail jeq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq lee-u phao, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq aol dai, doevq lee-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, ngadao sil khi miltsaq niil nee dov ail-u phao, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq oil laiq kivq-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, jaqjaq daoldaol khi aqgaq aqdoi jiav haq neq, ngadao neekhaol sil nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Hulmeeq meeq lal movq nail juq neq, jalmul mul nail lavqkhoel bhai aol ail nail ngaol. Aqyu juq lavqphee bhai phee lai nail nee ovqtavq, neenoeq neekha teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail, maq meeq nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol mee nia phaq nail lavqkhoel bhai ga bhoel ail nia nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol al neq, tsaol-aq yaq luq-ail seil-ail nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi ga nevq ail nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, phul bhai neekhaol jiav nail phaq neq, haqeiv nail phaq iqsanl nail daoqthaoq ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav phul bhai neekhaol jiav nail ngel-i mail, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai khaonq ha khi, noeqhaq noeq aoq nail mee nia phaq aqyu juq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai teevq bhee aol lal nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq-ol, naol al juq bhai gail jao jao yaoq. Tsaq nail daol nail phaq, Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq, neema ol nail phaq khi, neenuq neebeiv aol nail phaq, niil juq nail haoqnao thekheel yaoq.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai tavq nail meeq deedee nail phaq nail haqbhoil genl dev yaoq. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq. Naol al phaq bhai ya dai, Miqyail naoq bhai khul khi tsaol-aq maodai gaq nail sivtavq bhai naol ganl al bhai aqmeeq-ai salkhil khanq-ao nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq nee bhai aqdoevq bhi doevq nail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, heeqphaq Bhoqthil Phillav nail sivtavq bhai salkhil aqmeeq-ai khanq nail Yeiqsul Khali nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal naoq bhai daoq niailhai bivq nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali dov lee-u phao kev dai, naol laiq nail tsa nail phaq khi, oeqbal thaq duq maq ya dai, aivq-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq.

Miqyail-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail aqyanq kev lal haq neq, aivq bhai bhi dov lee nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeq nail Miqyail neq, aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail uvthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, heeqphaq juq nail kovtavq bhai Heeqphaq ngaol. Miqyail juq nail kovtavq bhai Miqyail ngaol.

Aivq taivq-ail nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, teevq gaq-ail aivq nail aqbhaq aqjail bhai maq lai nia nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail aivq bhai maq moeldaiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, moel iqsanl maq moel nia-ail. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi bhaqaoq aivq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Eeq movq heel movq nail neema thaq aol dei-eiq dai, niil yeel nail lavqkhoel khe hulmeeq meeq nail juq bhai cavq bhiq yaoq. Luq-ail seil-ail nia nail phul heel yalkav bhai thaq noeqthunq dei-eiq, ngadao lavqkhiq ya tsail dai yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee teevq bheeq teevq lovq bivq lavq-a nail Miqyail bhai taivq-ail noeqthunq yaoq dai iqsanl, daoq bivq yaoq.
Yu nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq nl bhiq yaoq. Meeq nail ganl mee nia phaq nl yaoq. Laoqniul maq niul dai, danq bhiq yaoq. Yu bhai maodai bivq yaoq dei-eiq dai, aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq yaoq.

Maljiaov dai aqdoevq doevq nail phaq bhai nieivq thaq-ai thaq kivq dai, yaqhao khe yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq ivqdao deel daoqthaoq jiav dai, aqmeeq phaq hal pov jil thaq-ai yaoq dei-eiq dai iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq yaoq.

Tilmolseiq-ol, naoq bhai av bhiq-a nail juq bhai aqmeeq-ai oil thaq-ai yaoq. Miqyail bhai maq ev dai ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq juq khi, jil pheeljaq nail juq bhai gail jao jao yaoq. Neenoeq neekha aol naol dai ge khi ngaol-aoq, maq ngel nail neenoeq neekha juq bhai gail jao jao yaoq.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav juq, maq ngel nail neenoeq neekha al bhai naldaiq nail ngel-i mail, neema thaqtsaol nail gailkhaol bhai gail bheeq bheeq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel Paolluv ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, ngal gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. “Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol dai, jaq-ai thaq nail saljial al cavq bhiq yaoq” dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai khoel nail ngaol.

Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail yaqyov Tilmolseiq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail khi ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq khi, neesal-ovq nail phaq naoq nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal geeqlaoq khal hal-u phao, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, khaq mao iqsanl naoq nail haqbhoil maq nioil peivq dai hal khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq naol. Ngaq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq oeqbal thaq duq maq ya nail heeq nia nail neema aol aol-ail, aivq nail haqbhoil ganl nl nail khe-ai, ngal iqsanl ganl nl nail ngaol.

Naol ngaq bhai noeq moel nail bhaqda nee, maivbhil dov-a nail ngaol dai, ngal noeq dov lal-u phao, naoq bhai moel movq deedee-ail nial. Naoq bhai ya moel haq neq, ngal lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal nail ngaol.

Naol maldil neema thaqtsaol nail bhai, ngaq bhai noeq dov lal-ail nial. Naol neema thaqtsaol nail al neq, iqmoeq-u phao naoq nail aqphiq Laol-il khi naoq nail aqma Ulnil nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi, niil aq-il naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail bhai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai niailhai ge noeq bhiq movq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail naoq nail kovtavq bhai aqlavq bavq dav-u phao, naol Miqyail nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngaol. Miqjaq sivtovq nail khe-ai, kovpavq al bhai sivtovq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail ngadao bhai geesil nail neema bhi aol lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Bhaqaoq aol nail neema, goil nail gaiq-a nail neema khi, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaq laiq nail neema bhi aol lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail, thaq haqsil. Aivq nail haqbhoil nee ganl nl nail ngel-i mail, thaonq bhai ya aol thailthaiq nail ngal bhaqda nee iqsanl thaq haqsil. Miqyail-i mail naoq bhai gaq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq nail haqbhoil khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai daq yaoq.

Miqyail neq, aivq-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai pevq lal dai, ngadao bhai hevqkovq lavq khi, aqmeeq aqhaol nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq yaoq dai, ngadao bhai khul-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao teevq phaq ganav nl-ai hal-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq alhai nl lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeljaol al neq, nqtavq miltsaq maq jiav lee-u nee mail, Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq khi, aivq ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq Yeiqsul Khali dov lee-a nail ngel-i mail, niil aq-il geeqlaoq eeljaol al bhai ngadao bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, sil nail phaq bhai lav cov khi, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq khi maq luq maq seil-ail nia nail phaq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq lavqkhoel nee bhaqlaoq kheq dai, bhi dov lee-a nail ngaol.

“Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq niil nail haqbhoil daoq cavq cavq nail gaq jiovq yaoq. Al ovqtavq, gaqkhoel khi cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail saqlaq iqsanl jiovq yaoq” dai, Miqyail ngaq bhai tsel dov lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai tsel dov lavq-a nail bhaqda nee ngal niailhai ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal maq haqsil. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngaq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail gaq bhai ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol. Ngaq-i mail aivq bhai khal av bhiq-a nail juq, yalkhaq dal nail aqn bhai kev dai, aivq oiltsail-ai thaq nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail maldil tsaq nail daoq bhai saol oil yaoq. Ngadao Yeiqsul Khali bhai tavq nail ngel-i mail, ya-ai thaq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khi goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nail haoqnao doel-aivq yaoq.
Naoq bhai av bhiq-a nail, meeq deedee nail juq bhai, ngadao nail lavqkhoel khe jaol nail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai juq khi aqmeeq-ai oil tsail-ai thaq yaoq.

Naol heeq nia nail khe-ai, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ngaq bhai khaonq ha-a nail ngaol. Philgeiqlul khi Heiqlaqmoljeiq iqsanl, tsaol-aq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.

Aoqneiqsiqphaol aqyu phaqyaq mayaq nail kovtavq bhai Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhi jiav dei-eiq. Aivq ngaq bhai mee nia pov aqsal bhi sal lal-a nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai hailcav pheethaiq-ai thaq nail bhai aivq maq haqsil-ail.
Aivq Lolmav meenq bhai lal kev-u phao, ngaq bhai moel-u phao kev dai, halpov deedee-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, yalkhaq dal nail aqn n-gaol, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aivq bhai gaoqhaq gaiq-a bhiq dei-eiq. Ngal Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol-u phao, aivq ngaq bhai khadai tsaojao-ai lavq-a nail bhai naol heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail yaqyov-ol, Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol lavqkhoel nee gaq kav lal yaoq.

Salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq maodai gaq nail sivtavq bhai ngaq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail juq, naol ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Saljial ivq khi yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq bhai, daoq al juq av bhiq yaoq.
Yeiqsul Khali nail haqbhoil mao-ail meeq nail genl dev nail gaq jiovq nail khe-ai, naol ngaq-ai nee mail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai daq yaoq.
Genl dev nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqivq gaq neekhaol sil dai nl movq nail ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail nl jaq keiv daol nail ganl bhai maq suqsaq-ail.
Tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail bhaoqaiq lavqkhoel, tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail tsaol-aq aivq nail aolsaolkovq jiav nail khe-ai maq tsaoq haq neq, gaq lai nail heel uqtsaoq kovpavq aivq bhai maq bivq-ail.
Laijai khi yalgaol nl nail tsaol-aq, aqheeq allu iqmoeq ilmoeq ya jaq nail ngaol.
Ngal ge nail bhai saol-nvq daiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai naol heeq nia dai, Miqyail naoq bhai neenoeq neekha bivq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngaq-i mail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq nail, sil khi doevq kovq lal-a nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai, thaq nioil peivq dei-eiq.

Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al daoq cavq-a nail bhaqda nee, haqeiv nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai phee nail khe-ai, ngaq bhai phee lavq khi, haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq bhai ngal ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail daoq bhai teevq gaq-ail maq pheethaiq nia-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl, Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ol nail ngaol. Hevqkovq nail al phaq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel nail seiqleiq khaoqsail iqsanl ya nail ngaol.
Daoq niil daoq neq saljial ivq nail ngaol:
Ngadao aivq nee mail
sil haq neq,
aivq nee mail aqdoevq
ya doevq nail ngaol.
Ngadao ol haq neq,
aivq nee mail ya
uvthaiq nail ngaol.
Ngadao aivq bhai
khaonq ha haq neq,
aivq iqsanl ngadao bhai
khaonq ha nail ngaol.
Ngadao saljial
maq ivq khi ngaol-aoq,
aivq saljial ivq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal neq,
aivq-i mail
ge-ai thaq nail saljial bhai
aivq maq khaonq ha-ail.

Ganl al juq aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai ge noeq bhiq yaoq. Daoq juq nail ganl nee thaq jil pheeljaq dai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqyu juq bhai mailma-ail cavq bhiq yaoq. Alhai jil pheeljaq nail neq, khul teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq nail nee ovqtavq, ya gaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi cov ail nail ngaol.
Naol neq, haqsil duq maq jiav dai, maldil tsaq nail daoq daolcoev dai, cavq bhiq nia nail gaq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai ganl nl nail gaq pevq lal dai, laijai deedee yaoq.

Miqyail bhai maq ev dai, ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq bhai gail jao jao yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, alhai ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq ge nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail bhai maq ev nail neema teevq pov nee teevq pov mao jaiq lal nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail juq neq, malyal bhaol-ail nail malkhoeq khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai Huqmiqnail khi Phillail iqsanl aol nail ngaol.

“Ngadao doevq kovq lal nail phaq neq, jel ail-aoq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu nvq gaq ge ge-ail khi, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai gail bheeq bheeq nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq neq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai lav cov nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail kaovq-ai thaq nail daoqthaoq neq, ivq deedee nail ngaol. “Miqyail neq, aivq nail tsaol-aq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.” “Miqyail nail aqmil bhai juq nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq bhai khaonq ha yaoq” dai, daoqthaoq al bhai junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel-ai, phul heel-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail nlmaoq taivq-ail jiav nail maq ngel-ail. Aqbhaol-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail khi miltsaq-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail juq iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Nlmaoq teevq pav ganav juq neq, bhaoqaiq lav sav-u phao taivq-ail yuq khi, teevq pav ganav juq neq, yaoq n yaoq n nee yuq nail ngaol.

Pultavq phao gevq-ai thaq nail aqjiivq aqcavq al juq bhai yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai yovqgavq khaonq ha haq neq, ilheel gaq yuq nia nail meeq nail haol nail nlmaoq pevq lal nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqmeeq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai nl nail haqbhoil, lainq-ai thaq nail, aqphoiq mao-ail phoiq khi ganl tsoiq nail nlmaoq iqsanl pevq lal nail ngaol.

Yaqnoil juq-i mail aqsivq haqjoil phao nee tavq nail neekhaol sil nail phaq bhai, naol gail jao jao yaoq. Neema aqhaol haol deel aol khi, Miqyail bhai hal nail tsaol-aq nee mail, tsaq nail daol nail phaq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq khi, tsaq lai jil lai nail phaq nail haoqnao aqmeeq-ai tsaothel-aivq yaoq.

Neenoeq neekha maq aol-ail, khul teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq dai, jil pheeljaq nail bhai iqsanl, gail jao jao yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jil pheeljaq nail al neq, iqdaiq iqtsai bhi dov lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail ganl nl nail tsaol-aq neq, jil pheel jil lul jaq nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail. Aivq neq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail tsaol-aq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq khi, ol nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq-i mail cavq bhiq nail bhai neema maq tsaq nail tsaol-aq bhai, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail lavqkhoel cavq bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq iqsanl ya pevq nail ngaol. Alhai cavq bhiq ha neq, al gaq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia lal khi, oeqbal noeq pov lal dai, Miqyail nl bhiq-ail meeq.

Al ovqtavq, aivq nail neenoeq khe-ai bhi nl nail dai khi, neivq heeqphaq-i mail aqyu juq bhai khail phee-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq noeq lal khi aivq nail lavq phee lavqkhoel nee ya jel-ail nail ngaol.
Haoqnao naosaq-u phao, haq dee aoq deedee nail aqyanq kev lee nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq yaq niailhai pevq lal nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail, phul bhai neekhaol jiav nail neema aol nail, khal ge movq-ail ge nail, neema eeq nail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq thaqeeq nail, aqbhu aqma nail daoq maq naldaiq nail, yu nail geeqlaoq bhai maq noeq nail nee ovqtavq, maq meeq maq haol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, yu bhai maq gaiq-a nail, yu nail oeqbal bhai maq phaiq bhiq nail, yu nail haoqnaol phao nee ge doil nail, yovqgavq nail neema bhai maq gaq lai nail, mao-ail haqeiv nail khi aqmeeq phaq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq iqsanl pevq lal nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, saljial maq ivq nail, khul teevq phaq-ail maq saol-nvq dai nl nail, neema eeq deedee nail, Miqyail bhai maq gaiq-a mail, miltsaq phao lavqkhiq tsail lal nail juq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl pevq lal nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, lavqniil phao taivq-ail Miqyail bhai ev nail aol thaoq nail ngaol. Lavqkhoel phao neq, aol al bhai tavq nail bhaqaoq teevq peivq-ail maq aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Alheel nail tsaol-aq bhai gail jao jao yaoq.

Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq pav ganav juq neq, yu nail ilkhaol bhai aol lai khi, neenoeq neekha maq aol nail yaqmai-aq juq bhai aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai aol lee dai, jalmul mul nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq al juq neq, oeqbal maodai phi khi, aqsivq haqjoil phao nee tavq nail neekhaol sil nail mee nia phaq aqyu juq bhai hel-aivq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq, khaq mao iqsanl, yu saol bhiq nail bhai saol oil khi ngaol-aoq, maldil tsaq nail daoq bhai, maq heeq nia lal-ail.

Yaqneiq khi Yaqbheiq, Molseiq-i mail cavq nail daoq bhai lav tsoiq deedee nail khe-ai, jalmul mul nail tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl maldil tsaq nail daoq bhai lav tsoiq deedee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail saol-nvq nia nail neema gaol li cevq dai pevq-ail khi, aqyu juq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai laonqdaiq-u phao, sunq-ail nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq al bhai dee lai nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq al nvq gaq neenoeq neekha maq aol ail dai bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal-a nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq niil juq neenoeq neekha maq aol nail iqsanl, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal nail ngaol.

Naol ngaq nail ganl heeq nia nail ngaol. Ngal cavq nail cov nail, ngal nl nail hal nail, ngaq nail noeqthunq nail, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail, ngal neenoeq heelma ma dai noeq nail, ngal goil nail gaiq-a nail khi ngal oltsaol nail, naol niil juq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngal khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai ya daq nail ngaol dai iqsanl, naol heeq nia nail ngaol. Aqdil-aoq meenq, Ilgaolnil meenq khi, Luldaqlal meenq, meenq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao, ya daq deedee-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail al juq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel-ai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq-a nail ngaol.
Maldil dai ge haq neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq juq-ail Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq khi goiqbhaoq khoiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq teevq pov nee teevq pov gaoq haqeiv jaiq lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq yu bhai hevq bheel-aivq khi yu iqsanl aqyu juq bhai hevq bheel-aivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol ya saol khi neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, naol khaq sil gaq bhai saol oil-a nail dai, naol heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, naol neq, yaqkhaq yaquv-ail jiav-u nee mail, meeq nail haol nail Jalliq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol. Jalliq al neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, naol hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, neenoeq neekha bivq nia nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail bhi noeq dov-a nail ngel-i mail, Jalliq iqsanl mail gevq dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Jalliq neq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail, oeqbal phaodaiq bhiq nail, gaoq bhi meeq lal nail phaq khi, aqmeeq aqhaol dai, doevq nia nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.

Al bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee lovq nail tsaol-aq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, aqmeeq phaq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq khi sil nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal nail Yeiqsul Khali nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aivq dov lee khi uvthaiq nail bhai ngal juq juq-ail, naoq bhai daoq niailhai bivq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq yaoq. Aqyanq tsaq maq tsaq khi ngaol-aoq, cavq bhiq yaoq. Aqyu juq-i mail nl laiq thaq nail juq bhai tsiqtsoe bhiq khi, yaqhao thailhai thaq gaoq nl dai, daoq bivq khi gaq iqsanl bivq yaoq. Ol ol-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, mao-ail meeq mao-ail bhee nail daoq cavq nail bhai maq naldaiq nail yanq kev lee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, khul nail ganl iqsanl gaiq movq khi, aqyu juq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, cavq lavq cov lavq nail saqlaq mee nia gaq bhai aqyu juq nee mail bhi jaol nail ngaol.
Yu maldil tsaq nail daoq cavq bhiq-u phao, aqyu juq yaoq phao yaoq tsiqphaol khi, ganqje taivq-ail naldaiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq naol neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel-ai yaolphaol nia nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq. Khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail phaq bhai daq yaoq. Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq thailthaiq yaoq. Naol nl thail hal thailthaiq nail Miqyail nail ganl juq nl gil-u phao kev dai, aqmeeq-ai nl yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, laol duq kovtavq bhai hoeldav hoeldav-ail laol bhiq nail phaq khe-ai dul dai, niil aq-il ngal ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngal kovq lai nail aqyanq aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, aqmeeq-ai laijai-a nail ngaol. Tsaoq doel pheeljaq nail phaq bhai haoqnao naosaq-u n-gaol kev dai, tsaoq-a nail ngaol. Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Niil aq-il iqsanl, tsaq nail daol nail heel uqtsaoq ngaq nail haqbhoil lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqn al n neq, tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee yalkhaq dal nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul neq, uqtsaoq al tsaoq ngaq bhai bivq lavq nail ngaol. Ngaq bhai taivq-ail maq ngel-ail. Aivq dov lee nail bhai khal noeqthunq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai iqsanl, bivq nail ngaol.
Naol ngal jaol nail bha lavqtsail mail lal kivq dai, laijai yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Deiqmav neq, miltsaq niilniai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, Theilsaqlolni meenq bha ail-a nail ngaol. Gaqleiqgeiq neq, Gaqlaqtil milkhaoq bhai lai-a nail ngaol. Tiltuv iqsanl, Daqlaqmaqdil milkhaoq bhai ail-a nail ngaol.

Lulkavq taivq-ail ngaq-ai nee jaol nail ngaol. Naol lee-u phao, Maqkul bhai iqsanl hel leevq dei-eiq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, ngal Miqyail nail ganl nl nail bhai tsao nl nia nail ngaol.
Duljil bhai neq, ngaq-i mail Eilpheilsu meenq bha bhi ail-a nail ngaol.

Naol lal-u phao, Daqlol meenq khe jaol nail Gaqphul jaol nail bhai ngaq-i mail bhi jiav-ail ceevq-a nail phailkhaoq heelma khi haoqgavq juq oil lavq yaoq. A dai nee maqtsil, bavkov bhai gevq-ai thaq nail haoqgavq al juq, maq nioil peivq dai, oil lavq yaoq dei-eiq.
Bhajiq Aqleiqsaqdul neq, ngaq bhai haqeiv nail mee nia phaq nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nl lavq nail bhai geel-nvq dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul aivq bhai nl kovq bhiq nail ngaol.
Naol iqsanl aivq bhai yaolphaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal cavq nail daoq bhai lav tsoiq deedee nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail ganl iqmoeq-u phao yalkhaq dal duq bhai, ge kovq bhiq-u phao, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail ngal jaol nail phao maq jaol-ail. Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ngaq bhai khaonq ha-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq bhi kev lee dei-eiq.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail ngaq bhai khaonq ha lavq khi ngaol-aoq, ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq teevq bhee cavq bhi khi, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail ya gaiq dai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ngaq-ai nee mail jaol khi, gaq bivq lavq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, allaqjaqsil nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee ngal ya jel ail-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, haqeiv nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail nee ovqtavq, nqtavq milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai ngal ya jaol lai-u phao kev dai, aivq ngaq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel aivq bhai tsiqeeq yaoq. Aqmiq.
Bhilgillav khi Aqgullav bhai maqkhaiq, Aoqneiqsiqphaol nail phaqyaq mayaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.
Eillaqdul neq, Gaolliqthu meenq bhai jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol. Daqlolbheiq neq, nal nail ngel-i mail, Meiqleiqdul meenq bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Aqcoevq coevq nail yanq maq kev lal-u phao nee mail, naol ngal jaol nail bha lal kivq dai, laijai yaoq. Ulbhullul, Phuldeiq, Lilnul, Gaqlaoldil khi aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq iqsanl mail, naoq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul naoq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol dei-eiq. Geeqlaoq eeljaol iqsanl, naoq nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Miqyail nail yaqkav khi mail Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel pevq nail Paolluv ngaol. Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq gaq bhi kav lal nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq bhi dov lal nail maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai aqyu juq heeq nia lal dai, ngal Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngal bivq naol dai, goiqbhaoq maq bhaoq nail Miqyail aq-u nee mail ge-ai thaq nail nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bhai, aqyu juq noeqthunq noeqthunq-ail jaol nia lal dai iqsanl, ngal gaqkhoel jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Aqyanq tsaq lal-u phao, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail ganl al, Miqyail ngadao juq bhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. “Ganl al cavq bhiq dei-eiq” dai, ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Miqyail ngaq bhai daoq bivq lavq khi, av lavq-a nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ngaq-ai nee teevq daoq bhai tavq nail ngaq nail yaqyov khe-ai dul nail Tiltuv bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq, naoq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal naoq bhai ge thaq-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, maq nl gil-a nail juq bhi nl gil nail dai khi ovqtavq, yaoq meenq yaoq-ao nee mail jaol nail Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhi tsel dov nail dai khi mail, ngal naoq bhai Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaollaol-n bhai bhi jaol-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq gaq neq, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq khi mail, khaqma teevq gaq taivq-ail bhao nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail yaq juq iqsanl Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Yu ge duq maq jiav dai, aqdoevq doevq nail yaq juq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, daoq naldaiq nail yaq juq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail gaq neq, Miqyail nail nlmaoq bhai heldaiq phail nail gaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail neenoeq taivq-ail oil nail tsaol-aq, neema davqnil nil nail tsaol-aq, jilpheeq daol bov nail tsaol-aq, yu nee deeq pheel deeq lul jaq nail tsaol-aq, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai maivjeel jeel nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail.

Daq-i bhai hav nia nail tsaol-aq, aqmeeq phaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, neema ivqdao dai, thaq nia nail tsaol-aq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq, meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq-i mail ya saol-a nail khe-ai, saljial ivq nail daoq bhai ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail gaq ya pevq nail ngaol. Alhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq haq neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai cavq bhiq nia khi, yu bhai gaq bivq nia nail nee ovqtavq, daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, aqyu juq-i mail laiq ail-a nail dao bhai moel nia dai, cavq naq bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq maodai jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, ganl maq tsoiq nail daoq ge nail nee ovqtavq, yu bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq bhaoq-ail hevq bheeq nail ngaol. Alhai nl nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yu nee maqtsil, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail aolsaolkovq nee Khali yaq phao phal lal khi ngaol-aoq aol al juq bhai gaoq thaoq movq nail juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Naol aqyu juq bhai heeq tsul dai, bhi jaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq haqsil nail phaq maq bhao dai, phul heel halpov khi maq tsaq nail phaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail bhaqda nee, ildaoq daoq lao lao-ail lav luq lav seil bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq-i mail ge nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail dai, noeq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq-i mail ge-ai thaq nail daoq niailhai jiav nail ngaol. “Gaqlaqdeiq eeljaol laol-n bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq khe-ai aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl nul dai, al jaiq jaq bov daol bov nail tsaol-aq teevq-eel ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alhai ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivq lal nia dai, aqkav kav dai khaq khaq-ail cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.
Yuldav tsaol-aq nail ganqje juq bhai khi mail, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq ya nl dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Neema lavqkhoel bhai haol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil neq, iqsanl mail aqhaol ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema lavqkhoel bhai maq haol nail tsaol-aq khi mail neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil neq, aqhaol teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq nail neenoeq khi mail, heeq nia nail neema neq, iqsanl mail aqjiivq aqcavq ngaol.

“Nvjuq Miqyail bhai heeq kivq naol” dai, aqyu juq ge khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail nl nail hal nail bhai heldaiq haq neq, Miqyail bhai teevq peivq iqsanl heeq nia nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, maq dul lal-ail. Aqyu juq neq, bhe lal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail tsaol-aq, daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, aqmeeq phaq nl nail teevq peivq-ail maq geel-nvq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai taivq-ail ya cavq ya cov bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqbhal joiqmaoq juq bhai, yaolphaol nia nail neema aol lal nia dai maqkhaiq, yu ev heeq phaq-ail doevq nia dai maqkhaiq, neema ivqdao dai, thaq nia dai maqkhaiq, maldil tsaq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aol lal dai maqkhaiq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aol lal dai maqkhaiq, daq tsaol ol tsaol nail neema aol lal nia dai maqkhaiq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Alhai dul dai aqphiq joiqmaoq juq bhai iqsanl, Miqyail bhai ev nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nia jaol nia dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Yu nail ganl ge doil nail tsaol-aq khi mail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul al jaiq daol jel nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail. Aqmeeq phaq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nia nail tsaol-aq ya pevq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai nl haq neq, aqkovq maq jiav lal-a nail yaqmai-aq juq bhai yovqgavq nail yovjil khi mail yaq juq bhai gaiq-a nia lal dai, cav bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, yaqmai-aq al juq, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nia nail tsaol-aq, haol nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail ildaoq bhai heldaiq phail nia nail tsaol-aq, neema meeq nail tsaol-aq khi mail yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nia nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai pevq lal haq neq, yu Miqyail nail daoq bhai khal ge movq-ail maq ge nia-ail.
Alhai dul dai, aqkovq maq jiav lal-a nail yaqyov-aq juq bhai iqsanl, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nia dai, gaq bivq yaoq.
Aqyu juq saol oil nia dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel, aqmeeq phaq nl daiq bhiq yaoq. Cavq bhiq cov bhiq-u phao, yu ev heeq phaq-ail aqhaol haol dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Yu oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai tavq nail daoq cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Alhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq haq neq, ngadao bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq ngadao bhai khul teevq phaq iqsanl ge doil nail phaq maq jiav dai, ya haqsil nail ngaol.

Yaqkav juq bhai iqsanl, ilheel gaq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol khi, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel ilheel gaq neekhaol sil dai, nl bhiq khi, daoq pov maq ya kovq lai dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Al ovqtavq, ilheel gaq nail yalkav maq ya khoiq ail. Aqyu juq bhai, “Saljial ivq nail lavqkhoel nee nuljuq nail ilheel gaq nail ganl bhai aqmeeq-ail nl yaoq” dai iqsanl, cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, ngadao bhai Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Miqyail nail ganl cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail phaq neq, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee mao-ail meeq lao thaq nial dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai, dov lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai hevqkovq nail dai khi, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Geeqlaoq eeljaol al, ngadao bhai niailhai cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai maq ev nail phaq bhai iqsanl, yeel niil yeel khe maivjeel jeel nail juq bhai iqsanl khaonq ha yaoq dai, cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nia nail tsaol-aq, aqsee aqdaol daol dai, doevq nail tsaol-aq khi mail Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq dai iqsanl, cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail eeq dee heel deedee nail Miqyail pevq nail Hevqkovq nail gaq Yeiqsul Khali seiqleiq khaoqsail nail lavqkhoel nee dov lee nail geeqlaoq eeq nail aqn al n bhai noeqthunq khi daonq nail haqbhoil cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul neq, oeqbal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel nee ngadao bhai ul kovq lavq-a nail nee ovqtavq, aivq nail haqbhoil meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq bhiq pevq lal dai, aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al neq, aqmeeq phaq nl movq deedee nail neema aol nail ngaol.

Ganl niil juq aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol nail lavqkhoel aqyu juq bhai gaq bivq khi, aqyu juq-i mail nl laiq-a nail juq bhai cavq navq bhiq yaoq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl naoq bhai khal ge movq-ail, thaq bhiq ge.

Aqyu juq ganl niil juq bhai maq ya nioil peivq-ail dai, aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Heeqphaq juq khi mail uvthaiq nail juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Aqyu juq nail daoq naldaiq yaoq. Aqmeeq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ya nl dai, lainq thaq gai yaoq.

“Teevq gaq bhai iqsanl khal ge movq-ail thaq ge. Thaq jil pheel thaq jil lul jaq. Neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai ev yaoq” dai, aqyu juq bhai aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ge haq neq, jel lal-u phao, ngadao juq iqsanl, neenoeq neekha maq aol nail tsaol-aq, daoq maq naldaiq nail khi mail, gail bheeq bheeq ail-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqsivq haqjoil phao maivjeel jeel nail phaq khi mail, maq meeq nail phaq bhai lavqkhiq tsail nail mee nia phaq nail kov-uvq bhai yaqkav jiovq daiq-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aq-u phao, ngadao yu bhai maivjeel jeel khi khoeq lai dai nl-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aq-u yu ngadao bhai neejiav jiav nail nee ovqtavq, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq iqsanl, neejiav jiav-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Miqyail nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq khi mail, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq ngadao bhai phaodaiq lavq-u phao,

aivq ngadao bhai hevqkovq lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao tsaq nail daol nail phaq nl-a nail bhaqda nee, hevqkovq lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq ngadao bhai gaoqhaq nail ngel-i mail, hevqkovq lavq-a nail ngaol. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel, neema aqsivq phal lal khi doevqyeel aqsivq doevq phal lal-a nail neq, tsiq haol lavq-a nail phaq bhai juq khi aivq ngadao bhai hevqkovq lal-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq khi, Miqyail ngadao nail kovtavq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail teevq bhee hoeldav lavq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, ngadao tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngel-i mail, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bhai noeqthunq noeqthunq-ail, Miqyail nail jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Daoq al juq neq, saljial ivq nail daoq pevq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, khaq mao iqsanl, aqmeeq phaq ya nl nail ngaol dai, maq ya nioil peivq-ail dai, ngal naoq bhai aqmeeq-ai bhi cavq bhi cov movq-ail nial. Ganl al juq neq, meeq nail nee ovqtavq, tsaol-aq iqsanl nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq nail phaq bhai jil pheeljaq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, aqceevq ge ge-ail jil pheeljaq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, iqdaiq iqtsai dov nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail ganl jil pheeljaq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, gail jao jao yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, ganl al juq neq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Aqnieivq teevq-eel ngaol.
Munl bhoil pav khi, gaoq ail gail ail dai nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, teevq pov nvq pov bhee dai, aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi maq naldaiq lavq haq neq, gaoq ail ceiv ceiv yaoq.
Alhai nl nail tsaol-aq neq, neema teevq peivq-ail maq daol-ail. Oeqbal nl thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, naol heeq kivq yaoq. Aivq nail oeqbal neq, aivq oeqbal aol naol dai, salkhil pevq nail ngaol.

Aqdeiqmal bhai maq ngel haq neq, Duljil bhai ngal naol jaol nail bhai khoel-ai leevq-u phao, Nilgaolbhaqlil meenq bhai ngaq bhai ya thaoq phuq dai, laijai khi lal yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, coevqjieiv jieiv nail yanq bhai ngal a bhai jaol naol dai, noeq ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq mao-ail heeq nia nail Seiqnal khi mail Aqpaolluv aqyu nvq gaq bhai gailkhaol dov-ail nia dai, laijai khi tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Aqyu nvq gaq khal loq nail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee dai, tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq.
Yu loq nail phaq bhai tsaojao-ai nia dai, ngadao nail tsaol-aq juq, aqmeeq phaq bhai nl nia lal dai, cav bhiq cov bhiq yaoq. Ganl maq tsoiq nail tsaol-aq maq ya pevq-ail.

Ngaq-ai nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl mail, naoq bhai noeq moel nail ngaol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel nvjuq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai iqsanl, nvjuq noeq moel nail lavqkhoel nee daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol dai, ge gaiq bhiq yaoq. Nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail haqbhoil thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail Paolluv ngaol. Jaqbheq Tilmolseiq nv-nvq gaq nee mail ganl teevq gaq khe-ai nl nail nv-nvq gaq mailma-ail gaiq-a nail Philleilmoq bhai haoqgavq niil keiv gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, nv-nvq gaq nail dulma Aqbhil khi mail, nv-nvq gaq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil genl dev yaq pevq nail, Aqgilpuv bhai maqkhaiq, naoq nail ilkhaol bhai jil lal thailthaiq nail Khali yaq munl juq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao nail Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Ngaq nail jaqbheq Philleilmoq-ol. Naol neq, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol dai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal khaq mao iqsanl geeqlaoq hal-u phao, naoq bhai noeq kev khi, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.

Naol khi mail nvjuq nail gaiqlaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel aqtsaoq tsaoq tavq nail niil neq, Khali nail lavqkhoel nee ya-a nail geeqlaoq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ngadao juq heeq nia jaiq lal nail haqbhoil, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Jaqbheq Philleilmoq-ol. Naol goil nail gaiq-a nia nail bhaqda nee, ngal lavqkhiq tsail deedee khi, neema lavqkhoel bhai gaq gaoq aol jaiq lal-ail nial. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, naol bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai neema aqsal bhi sal lal nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, naol nl heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq nl yaoq dai, ngal naoq bhai Khali nail lavqkhoel nee geesil nail neema maq aol dai, daoq bivq kivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, daoq maq bivq dai goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee, hal nail ngaol. Ngal neq, joiqmaoq maoq lee-aoq nail Paolluv pevq nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul Khali nail haqbhoil niil aq-il thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail teevq gaq pevq nail ngaol.
Ngal thaonq bhai aol-u phao, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel ngaq nail yaqyov pevq lal-a nail Aolneiqsiqmul

Aivq neq, jel lal-u phao, naoq nail haqbhoil ganl maq tsoiq-ail. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, naoq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ngaq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, ganl tsoiq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il, ngal aivq bhai naol jaol nail bha bhi kovq lee naol. Ngal alhai bhi kovq lee-u phao, ngaq nail neema iqsanl aivq nee mail tsaothe jaol-nvq thaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhaqda nee, ngal thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail gaiqlaq, aivq naoq nail jiqdan jiovq khi, ngaq nail haqbhoil ganl nl nia dai, ngaq-ai nee mail bhi jaol movq-ail nial.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol aqkhaoqanq maq bivq lavq-u kev dai, ngal aivq bhai maq bhi jaol lee movq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, naol aqmeeq phaq nl lavq-u phao, naol nl movq nail ngel-i mail nl nail phaq pevq nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial. Maq nl mail khul maq khi kivq nail bhaqda nee nl nail phaq maq bhi pevq movq-ail.
Aolneiqsiqmul naoq-ai nee mail khaq mao iqsanl ya jaol nail haqbhoil, aivq naoq-ai nee mail teevq yanq ya pav-ai thaq nail jaol-aq.

Alheel ngel-i mail, niil aq-il aivq kovq lee haq neq, yaqkav maq ngel yaoq-aol. Gaiq-a nail jaqbheq pevq lal-aoq nail ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai gaiq-a deedee naol. Aivq neq, tsaol-aq yaq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai aqivq jaqbheq iqsanl pevq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, naol iqsanl ngaq-ai nee maqtsil aivq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, naol ngaq bhai naoq nail ganl nl tsaoq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngel haq neq, ngaq bhai hav lavq-a nail khe-ai aivq bhai iqsanl hav bhiq yaoq.
Aivq naoq bhai teevq phaq ganav nl laiq-ai thaq nail maqkhaiq, gailjiov bavq nail phaq maqkhaiq, iqsanl mail ngaq nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Paolluv ngaol. Gailjiov al ngal khaoq bhiq naol dai, ngaq nail aqlavq nee gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Naoq nail aqmaol naol ngaq bhai khaoq kovq lavq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail gailjiov al bhai, ngal khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge.
Alheel ngel-i mail, jaqbheq-ol. Yeiqsul nail maivphaoq bhai heldaiq khi, ngaq nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq nl lavq yaoq. Khali nail lavqkhoel ngaq bhai neema sal lal dai, teevq pov nl lavq yaoq.

Naol ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol dai, ngal neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai haoqgavq niil keiv gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal hal nail nee maqtsil, naol nl lavq nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Alhai ngaol-aoq, teevq phaq hal movq-ail nail. Ngaq nail haqbhoil jaol duq micil lav sav thaq-ai lavq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-a nail bhaqda nee, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha teevq pov gaoq ya kovq lee naol dai, noeqthunq nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul Khali nail haqbhoil, ngaq-ai nee mail thaonq bhai aol thailthaiq nail Ilbhaqphaqlal, naoq bhai noeq moel-ail nial dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq-ai nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, ganl nl thailthaiq nail Maqkul, Aqliqdaqgul, Deiqmav khi mail Lulkavq aqyu juq iqsanl, naoq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq iqsanl nail neema lavqkhoel bhai jiav dei-eiq.
Milnee uqnee, Miqyail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai juq khi, aqphiq aqbhal bhai mee nia phaq nail lavqkhoel, meeq nia pov daoq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haoqnao naosaq khe aqn aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel, aivq nail Yaqyov bhai juq khi, aivq ngadao bhai daoq ge lavq-a nail ngaol. Khal jaol khal jiav nail iqsanl, aivq bhai ovq nail jaiqbhoil bhi pevq nail dai, Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov bhai tsel dov-a nail ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai juq khi, bhoiq bhoiq luv luv bhai teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqyov nail lavqkhoel-ai Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dov lee-a nail ngaol. Miqyail khe-ai, Yaqyov iqsanl pevq naol. Bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol nail aivq nail daoq bhai juq khi, khal jaol khal jiav nail iqsanl bhai, Yaqyov heldaiq phail nail ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail oeqbal bhai tsiqhaol gaq khi mail, iqsanl bhai uvthaiq nail Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel lai-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel nail aqmil nee maqtsil aivq-i mail ya-a nail aqmil neq, eeq jaiq meeq jaiq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, aqyu juq nee maqtsil aivq eeq jaiq meeq jaiq nail ngaol.
“Naol neq,
ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol.
Yanqgaol naoq nail Aqbhu
pevq lal-a nail ngaol” dai,
Miqyail nqtavq gaqkhoel khul gaq bhai ge bhiq daiq-a nail-aiq.
“Ngal neq,
aivq nail Aqbhu pevq khi,
aivq neq,
ngaq nail Yaqyov
pevq nail ngaol” dai,
Miqyail nqtavq gaqkhoel khul gaq bhai ge bhiq daiq-a nail-aiq. Teevq gaq bhai gail maq ge daiq bhiq-al.
Al ovqtavq, iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq lee-a nail Yaqyov bhai miltsaq kovtavq-ai bhi lee-u phao,
“Ngaq nail
nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl mail
aivq bhai
uqhuq thaoq yaoq” dai,
Miqyail ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel nail ganl bhai Miqyail ge nail:
“Aivq nail
nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai
lilmoel khe-ai bhi pevq khi,
aivq nail haqbhoil
ganl nl nail juq bhai
miqjaq miqlail khe-ai
bhi pevq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
