Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yaqyov nail ganl bhai Miqyail niailhai ge-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Miqyail-ol,
naoq nail
doiqbev bev ma neq,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
ivq nail ngaol.
Naol naoq nail
milkhaoq bhai
tsaq nail phaq-i mail
uvthaiq nail ngaol.
Naol neq,
tsaq nail daol nail
phaq bhai gaiq-a khi,
maq tsaq maq daol nail
phaq bhai neq,
bhe nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
naoq nail Miqyail
naoq nail aqtsaoq juq
nee maqtsil
naoq bhai thaqeeq khi
lavqkhiq bhiq tsail nail
aqtseel hoeldav-ai
thaq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq,
“Heeqphaq-ol,
iqmoeq ilmoeq-u nee
naol miltsaq bhai teivq khi,
nqtavq bha iqsanl
naoq nail aqlavq-i mail
teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Al juq peivq-ail
boev-ail nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
naol neq,
khaq mao iqsanl,
ivq nail ngaol.
Al juq iqsanl mail
aqgaq aqdoi khe-ai,
khail-ail nail ngaol.
Phailkhaoq kaolteiv
teiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
naol al juq bhai
kaolteiv teiv khi
lavqphal nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
naol neq,
teevq thal-iq maq pov
maq phal lal-ail.
Naoq nail aqkovq aqlav
teevq thal-iq maq gil-ail” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Naoq bhai
neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai
naoq nail aqkhil kov-uvq bhai
ngal bhi jaol-u phao kev dai,
ngaq nail lavqmal phao
jaoldeel yaoq” dai,
Miqyail nqtavq gaqkhoel khul gaq bhai ge bhiq daiq-a nail-aiq. Maq ge bhiq daiq-al.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl neq, hevqkovq nail jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ganl bhi nl nail dai khi, Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai thaq nail gaqkhoel pevq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao-i mail ya gaiq-a nail daoq bhai, maq ya jiiv dov-ail dai, aqmeeq-ai ya naldaiq nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai bhi ge-a nail daoq al daoq neq, ivq nail ngel-i mail, daoq al daoq bhai nl bheeq nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, maq naldaiq nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, alhai maq meeq nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, yovqgavq bhai geel-nvq nail khe-ai, Miqyail-i mail yalkhaq dal lavq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, ngadao mao-ail eeq mao-ail meeq nail hevqkovq nail niil phaq bhai maq naldaiq haq neq, khalhai khi jel-ail nia nail-aiq. Iqmoeq-u phao nee, hevqkovq nail ganl al ganl Heeqphaq Yeiqsul ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Al bhai ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, “Ganl al maldil tsaq nail ngaol” dai, nvjuq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail iqsanl, bhi heeq bhi moel nail juq, noeq-u maq dov nail juq, bhaqaoq mao-ail eeq nail ganl juq khi, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail kovpavq juq bhoil bhiq-a nail al juq nl nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq salkhil tsao khanq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqhao khe jiav lee nail miltsaq nail ganl niil aq-il nvjuq ge thailthaiq nail ngaol. “Miltsaq al bhai uvthaiq yaoq” dai, Miqyail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai maq khoel-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq teevq gaq, Jalliq teevq dao nail lavqkhoel bhai niailhai salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Miqyail-ol, naol
tsaol-aq yaq nail haqbhoil
saol-nvq nail neq,
tsaol-aq yaq neq,
khul pevq nail-aiq.
Naol tsaol-aq nail
Yaqyov bhai
heldaiq phail lee-a nail neq,
Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov neq,
khul pevq nail-aiq.
Naol aivq bhai
teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel,
nqtavq gaqkhoel nee
micil thaqtheq-ai thaq-al
teevq-eel ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq,
seiqleiq khaoqsail khi
tsiqeeq tsiqheel
bhiq nail heel uqtsaoq,
naol aivq bhai
bhi tsaoq-a nail ngaol.
Naol yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee
aivq nail aqkhil
kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol
bhi jiav-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav-a nail dai ge nail neq, aivq nail kov-uvq bhai maq bhi jaol maq bhi jiav-a nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol bhi jiav-a nail bhai niil aq-il ngadao maq ya moel haq-al.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul neq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl nail haqbhoil sildan nail dai khi, teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel, nqtavq gaqkhoel nee micil thaqtheq-ai thaq-al teevq-eel ngaol. Aivq sil nail bhai kev dai, ya daq gaq-a nail ngel-i mail, seiqleiq khaoqsail khi tsiqeeq tsiqheel nail heel uqtsaoq, aivq bhai bhi tsaoq-a nail bhai, ngadao ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aivq nail yaq maodai bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav duq bhai hel-aivq-u phao, aqyu juq bhai hevqkovq khi hel-aivq nail gaq, haq nail aoq nail phaq daq nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail aivq bhai bhi bhee lal-a nail neq, tsaq deedee nail ngaol. Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail nail haqbhoil ngaol. Al juq iqsanl mail aivq-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Bhi meeq bhi haol lal nail gaq khi aivq-i mail bhi meeq bhi haol lal-a nail juq, teevq gaq nail lavqkhoel nee taivq-ail dov lal-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, “Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq ngaol” dai, aqyu juq bhai khul nail bhai aivq maq haqsil-ail.
Aivq ge nail:
“Ngal ngaq nail
aqivq jaqbheq bhai
naoq nail aqmil
ge bhiq naol.
Aqyu juq jil lai khi
jaol nail gaoltsi bhai
ngal naoq bhai daoqsel
gul khi tsiqeeq naol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.
Aivq teevq pov gaoq ge nail:
“Ngal aivq bhai juq naol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, teevq pov gaoq ge nail:
“Heldaiq dei-eiq.
Ngal khi Miqyail-i mail
ngaq bhai bivq
lavq-a nail yaq juq
niilniai jaol naol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

Yaq al juq aqsivq haqjoil phi-nq thaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq iqsanl alhai dul dai, aqsivq haqjoil phi lee-a nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail neivq heeqphaq nail bhaqaoq bhai lav cov-a nail haqbhoil, aivq alhai phi khi sil-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, sil nail phaq bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, teevq yeel yaqkav yaq jiovq nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi jel-ail nail dai khi, aivq aqsivq haqjoil ya phi-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai tsaojao-ai nail dai khi, aivq lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a bhai tsaojao-ai lee-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq Miqyail nail ganl nl nail lavqkhoel gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail nee ovqtavq, saljial ivq nail Philma jiovq jiovq-ail, tsaol-aq nail oeqbal bhai phaiq bhiq nia dai, aivq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel-ai aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq khe-ai, ya jiovq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail juq khi jalmul mul nail bhai ya daq daiq-a nail ngel-i mail, jalmul mul nail bhai ya daq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai tsaojao-ai nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail khul-ai thaq nail munl nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail, aivq nail tsaol-aq pevq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Yeiqsul bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Aivq neq, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail aol phao khe gaqkhoel khi mail Philma ngaol.
Molseiq Miqyail nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel khe ganl bhai saljial ivq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul iqsanl aivq bhai tsel dov-a nail gaq nail sivtavq bhai saljial ivq nail ngaol.
Ilkhaol cov nail gaq, ilkhaol nee maqtsil seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail khe-ai, Molseiq nee maqtsil Yeiqsul neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail ya geel-nvq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ilkhaol yaoq il yaoq-ao nee cov-a nail aqheel jaol nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai teivq-a nail gaq neq, Miqyail ngaol.
Molseiq neq, Miqyail nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel saljial ivq nail yaqkav ngaol. Yaqhao Miqyail-i mail cavq lee nail ganl salkhil khanq nail neq, aivq nail ganl ngaol.

Khali neq, Miqyail nail ilkhaol bhai heldaiq phail nail lavqkhoel saljial ivq nail Yaqyov ngaol. Ngadao juq iqsanl, geesil nail neema maq aol nail bhai maqkhaiq, ivqdao dai, noeqthunq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, haoqnao naosaq-u kev dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq haq neq, ilkhaol al il pevq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal-i mail ge-ai thaq nail:
“Yanqgaol nuljuq
aivq nail daoq
ya gaiq haq neq,
haqtsoiq haqyal bhai
jaol-u phao,
aivq bhai laonqdaiq khi
neema lav phail-a nail
aqn khe-ai,
nuljuq neema thaq gaol.
A bhai, nuljuq nail
aqphiq aqbhal juq
ngaq bhai laonqdaiq khi,
liq tsel kovq bhee dai,
ngaq-i mail nl-a
hal-a nail juq bhai
ya moel-aoq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
ngal al yeel nail tsaol-aq bhai
neema phail lal khi
ge bhiq-a nail:
‘Aqyu juq
neema lavqkhoel bhai
khaq mao iqsanl laiq-ail khi,
ngaq nail gailkhaol bhai
aqyu juq
maq heeq nia-ail’ dai,
ngal ge nail ngaol.
‘Aqyu juq
ngaq nail aqduq bhai
teevq thal-iq
maq ya aol lal-ail’ dai,
neema phail nail
lavqkhoel nee,
ngal khanq-ai
thaq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai haqeiv nail phaq khi neema maq thaqtsaol nail neema maq ya aol dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Alheel nail neema aol haq neq, nuljuq khi aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail gaiqlaq bhai pav-ail nia nail ngaol.

Oeqbal jalmul mul nail bhaqda nee, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq iqsanl neema maq ya gaol lal dai, yanqgaol dai ge kivq nail aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel, yaoq n yaoq n nee nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, gaq bivq yaoq.
Iqmoeq-u nee ngadao neema ivq nail khe-ai, haoqnao naosaq-u kev dai, neema ivq haq neq, Khali nee tavq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Yanqgaol nuljuq
Miqyail nail daoq
ya gaiq haq neq,
aivq bhai neema lav
phail-a nail aqn al n khe-ai,
nuljuq neema thaq gaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ya gaiq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai neema lav phail-a nail tsaol-aq khaq sil gaq. Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel khe Molseiq-i mail hevq dol leevq-a nail tsaol-aq al juq, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Liq tsel kovq bhee dai, Miqyail khaq sil gaq bhai neema phail-a nail-aiq. Oeqbal nl khi haqtsoiq haqyal bhai sil-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, maq ngel-ail laiq.
“Nuljuq ngaq nail naq duq bhai maq ya aol lal-ail” dai, aivq khal sil gaq bhai khanq-ai thaq nail-aiq. Aivq nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai khanq-ai thaq nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, maq ya aol lai-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao noeq heeq noeq moel kivq nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail naq duq bhai aol lai kivq nail aqyanq jiav-u phao, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav maq ya aol lai nail khul-il dai, ngadao juq iqsanl khaoqlaol nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq yaq gaiq-a nail khe-ai, ngadao juq iqsanl ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail daoq bhai aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil ganl maq tsoiq-ail.
Neema thaqtsaol nail ngadao juq neq, gaqnaq naq duq al bhai aol lai thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, aivq ge nail:
“Aqyu juq
ngaq nail naq duq bhai
teevq thal-iq
maq ya aol lal-ail dai,
neema phail nail
lavqkhoel nee
ngal khanq-ai
thaq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, nqtavq miltsaq bhai teivq-u phao nee aivq nail ganl aivq nl gil-ai thaq khi ngaol-aoq, niailhai ge nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Miqyail aivq nail ganl iqsanl nl gil khi, sivq n n-gaol gaqnaq naq-a nail ngaol” dai, sivq n nail ganl, Jalliq teevq dao bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Aqyu juq ngaq nail naq duq bhai teevq thal-iq maq ya aol lal-ail” dai, teevq pov gaoq gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq-u phao nee lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq maq naldaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq maq ya aol lai khi ngaol-aoq, ya aol lai nail tsaol-aq jaol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nv peiv peiv phal-a nail ngaol. Aqyanq maoq lal-u phao, Miqyail Daqbhil bhai juq khi, ge jel-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai,
“Yanqgaol nuljuq
aivq nail daoq
ya gaiq haq neq,
nuljuq neema thaq gaol” dai,
bhi ge-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nv peiv peiv-a nail aqn al neq, yanqgaol ngaol.
Yaolsu aqyu juq bhai gaqnaq naq duq bhai hevq bhoel-aivq nail kheel nul neq, yaoq n yaoq nail ganl Miqyail maq ge yaoq-aol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail yaq juq nail haqbhoil gaqnaq naq nail aqn jiav-ai haq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail aivq ganl nl gil khi gaqnaq naq-a nail khe-ai, aivq nail naq duq bhai aol lai nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail ganl nl gil haq neq, gaqnaq naq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, gaqnaq naq duq al bhai ya aol lai dai, ngadao laijai bhel. Maq laijai haq neq, aqyu juq maq naldaiq dai, tsuq ail-a nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl teevq gaq ganav tsuq-ail nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nail daoq neq, aqdoevq doevq khi bhaqaoq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Daoq al neq, nvq phao nvq phao-ail tav nail thaoma nee maqtsil tav khi, neema khi aqhaqlal bhai maqkhaiq, khil ceevq lavq ceevq khi haqeeq phulnaovq bhai maqkhaiq, coev pav khi bhoil pav nia nail ngaol. Neema lavqkhoel bhai saol-nvq nail juq khi oil movq nail juq bhai iqsanl tsel pav nia nail ngaol.

Khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq nail sivtavq bhai oil tsail-ai thaq nail teevq phaq iqsanl maq jiav-ail. Ngadao juq yaqhao aivq bhai ya ge bhi nail ngaol. Aivq iqsanl mail bhaqlaoq khe dai, heeq nia moel nia nail ngaol.

Ngadao juq mao-ail eeq mao-ail meeq nail Philma teevq gaq jaol nail ngel-i mail, ngadao-i mail neema thaqtsaol naol dai, ge-ai thaq nail bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq thaq gai bhel. Philma al gaq nqtavq kovtavq bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul ngaol.

Ngadao gaq bhaq-u phao, maq gaoqhaq nia nail Philma ngadao jaol nail, maq ngel. Ngadao jalmul mul nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee ya khanq-a nail khe-ai, aivq iqsanl ya khanq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq oeqbal maq nl daiq-al.

Alheel ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq eeljaol teevq bhee aol nail Miqyail nail doiqbev bev ma nail aqjail bhai, geesil nail neema maq aol nail lavqkhoel nee ngadao jil lai bhel. Ngadao aivq nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail geeqlaoq al, a bhai ya nail ngaol. Ngadao khal loq-u phao, aivq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ya moel nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel nee tsel dov-ai thaq nail Philma aqivq khal jiovq-a nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail nail ganl bhi nl nail dai khi, tsaol-aq yaq nail lavqkhoel khe tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq tsaol-aq yaq nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil danq nail phaq danq khi, laol bhiq nail phaq laol nail ngaol.
Aivq iqsanl, gaq bhaq nail tsaol-aq ngel-i mail, maq heeq nia nail tsaol-aq khi nl bheeq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai gaoqhaq nia nail ngaol.
Aivq gaq bhaq nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil iqsanl ya laol bhiq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail, Philma nail alyaq al bhai yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq maq hav bhoel nia-ail. Miqyail Aqloq bhai khul-a nail khe-ai, aivq bhai iqsanl, Miqyail khul nail ngaol.
Khali iqsanl, alhai dul nail ngaol. Aivq bhai aivq thaq eeq khi Philma nail alyaq ya dai, nl-a nail maq ngel-ail.
“Naol neq,
ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol.
Yanqgaol ngal
naoq nail Aqbhu
pevq lal-aoq nail ngaol” dai,
aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail Miqyail-i mail, alyaq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, yaoq dao yaoq-ao bhai aivq niailhai ge-ai thaq nail:
“Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv
Philma nail joiqjaq
ovq nail khe-ai,
naol nqmaq maqluv
halyeel Philma ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqdoevq doevq-u phao, sil nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee aivq bhai bhi jel-ail nia nail Miqyail bhai, aqthel aqkav kav dai, gul gul-ail khi maivbhil dov nail lavqkhoel nee geeqlaoq hal deedee-a nail ngaol. Aivq Miqyail bhai ev khi, Miqyail nail neenoeq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail hal daoq bhai Miqyail naldaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aivq neq Miqyail nail Yaqyov pevq khi ngaol-aoq, haq nail aoq nail phaq daq-a nail lavqkhoel, daoq naldaiq nail phaq bhai heeq nia lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq alhai bhee lal khi, aivq nail daoq bhai khal naldaiq nail juq nail haqbhoil, aivq nqmaq maqluv halyeel Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail ngaol.
Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv Philma jiovq nail joiqjaq ovq nail khe-ai, Miqyail aivq bhai Philma bhi jiovq-a nail ngaol.
Ganl niil ngal ge heeq phaq-ail maodai phaq jiav nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq naqkov aqthul ngel-i mail, daoqceevq ge bhiq nail haq-ail nial.

Aqyanq niidai maoq lal-aoq nail bhai saol-nvq-ai lai haq neq, nuljuq yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail daoq bhai tavq lai khi neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq ya saol nail ganl bhai kev dai, yu-i mail cavq bhiq covq bhiq nail bhai loq-ail haq nail niil. Nuljuq neq, aqjal aqgaol phaq maq jaq-ail. Aqtsil taivq-ail cuvq nail ngaol.
Aqtsil cuvq yaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee yaqnoil ngel-i mail, tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhai maq heeq nia-ail haq-al.

Aqjal aqgaol neq, eeq lal-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, heeq nia lal moel nia lal dai, mee nia pov ya saol-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, meeq nail phaq khi maq meeq nail phaq bhai tselpav nia nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao juq neq, Khali nail ganl daoqthaoq thaoq nail phaq bhai oil thaq-ail ceevq khi, eeq lal heel lal khi bhee lal dai, nl-aivq bhel. Nl bheeq-a nail juq bhai, noeqpov nail phaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq maqkhaiq,

ulcuvq saol nail ganl cavq bhiq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, aqlavq bavq dav nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, doevq kovq lal nail phaq maqkhaiq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel yalkhaq dal ceiv nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, al juq bhai taivq-ail daoqthaoq thaoq thaoq-ail thaq gaoq jaol.
Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, ngadao al juq bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi iqmoeq phao nl-aivq bhel.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqbhaq bhai teevq pov moel daiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, nqtavq kovtavq khe kovpavq bhai ya daiq khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal bhai iqsanl ya-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq,
Miqyail nail mao-ail meeq nail daoq bhai maqkhaiq, yaqhao khe yeel nail bhaqaoq bhai maqkhaiq, ya khi ngaol-aoq,

aqyu juq al juq bhai khaonq ha haq neq, oeqbal teevq pov maq noeq pov kivq yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai lavqyavq kovtavq-ai gaoq tavq heivq khi, milkhaoq yaq nail sivtavq bhai, teevq pov gaoq bhi haqsil nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Mee nia pov aol lee nail maoq-aol bhai ya siv khi, nl jaq keivq daol nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqbhoil ganl tsoiq nail aqheeq allu bhi heeq lee nia nail miltsaq bhai, Miqyail geeqlaoq bivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq al aqgoe khi moeqgaq taivq-ail doevq lal haq neq, ganl maq tsoiq nail ngel-i mail, iqkhail yavq nail bhai ya daq nail aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol. Haoqnao naosaq-u phao, miqjaq-i mail kheq ha nail ngaol.

Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nvjuq niailhai ge khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq a dai nee maqtsil meeq nail phaq ya nail ngaol dai, nvjuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Meeq nail al phaq neq, hevqkovq nail phaq bhai tavq nail geeqlaoq ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail neq, tsaq nail daol nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai aivq maq nioil peivq-ail. Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nuljuq-i mail Khali yaq juq bhai tsaojao-ai nail nee ovqtavq, niil aq-il iqsanl tsaojao-ai bhiq nail ganl bhai aivq maq nioil peivq-ail.
Nuljuq-i mail noeqthunq nail khe-ai pevq lal bhee lal dai, nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee haoqnao naosaq-u phao kev dai, laijai khi nl-ail nail bhai nvjuq oil movq deedee-ail nial.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqdoil doil nail tsaol-aq thaq pevq lal. Neema thaqtsaol khi ol nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail bhai ya-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, saol oil yaoq.
Miqyail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai saljial jaq-u phao, aivq bhai aivq juq khi khanq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq maq jaol-ail.
“Ngal naoq bhai maldil geeqlaoq bivq naol. Ngal naoq bhai maldil bhi jeq bhi ov lee naol” dai, Miqyail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqbhaqlaqhaq ol khi daonq-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail aivq bhai saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, ya-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq nail gaiqlaq bhai, saljial jaq-u phao, yovqgavq nee maqtsil eeq nail gaq bhai juq khi jaq nail ngaol. Alhai jaq-a nail ngel-i mail, yaqhao jil pheeljaq nail phaq maq jiav yaoq-aol.
Miqyail iqsanl, “Ngaq-i mail noeqceiv-ai thaq nail phaq maq phal lal-ail” dai, saljial ya-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq-u phao, aivq bhai aivq juq khi khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-a nail phaq khi khanq-a nail al nvq phaq bhaqda nee, jel-ail nail phaq bhai tsaoq bhoel lavq khi iqmoeq phao jiav nail noeqthunq nail phaq bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngadao juq bhai, gaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Maq phal lal nia nail al nvq phaq bhai Miqyail goiqbhaoq maq bhaoq-ail.

Noeqthunq nail al neq, ngadao nail neema nail haqbhoil ivq khi maq phal ail nia nail hail nail khulu lu ma khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Hail nail khulu lu ma al neq, haqphal phal ma thao pav-ai thaq nail meeq dee haol deedee nail lavqkhoel phao, khu tse-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv Philma nail joiqjaq ovq nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul nqmaq maqluv halyeel Philma pevq khi, ngadao nail haqbhoil al bhai iqmoeq aol lai-a nail ngaol.
Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv al gaq, Saqleiq

Aqbhaqlaqhaq aivq-i mail genl khal dev ya-a nail juq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel khe tsel bhoil teevq bhoil aivq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol. Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv dai, ge nail aqmil al neq, tsaq nail daol nail heeqphaq bhai ge nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Saqleiq nail heeqphaq dai, ge nail neq, neesal bhi ovq nail heeqphaq ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, Aqbhu aqma maq bhao-ail. Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl maq bhao-ail. Aivq nail doevq yeel neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq khi, haoqnao naosaq iqsanl maq bhao-ail. Aivq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov khe-ai khaq mao kev dai, Philma ngaol.
Aivq khadai eeq nail ngel-ail dai, saol-nvq daiq. Ngadao nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq-i mail genl dev ya-a nail nlmaoq juq nail lavqkhoel khe, tsel bhoil teevq bhoil aivq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.

Leiqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a lavqkhoel Philma nail alyaq ya-a nail juq bhai, aqyu juq nail aqivq jaqbheq pevq nail Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq juq, heeqlaoq gaoqjal, tsel bhoil teevq bhoil danq bhiq yaoq dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq aqyu juq bhai daoq bivq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a pevq khi ngaol-aoq, Philma bhai danq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv neq, Leiqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a maq ngel khi ngaol-aoq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq-i mail bivq-a nail tsel bhoil teevq bhoil oil khi, saljial ya-a nail Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai geeqlaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.
Geeqlaoq bivq nail gaq neq, geeqlaoq ya nail gaq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaol. Ganl niil khul dai jil nail maq jiav-ail.

Leiqbhil nail tsaol-aq bhai tsel bhoil teevq bhoil danq bhiq-a nail neq, sil nia nail tsaol-aq bhai danq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv bhai danq bhiq-a nail al neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, teevq thal-iq maq sil nail gaq bhai danq bhiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Yu bhai tsel bhoil teevq bhoil oil nail Leiqbhil iqsanl, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nee mail tsel bhoil teevq bhoil bivq-a nail ngaol dai, ge kivq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai hav ail-u phao, Leiqbhil aivq nail aqbhal Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq juq bhai bivq-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, Leiqbhil nail jeq-e Philma jiovq nail bhai tavq lai khi, bivq-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq pevq nail ngaol. Leiqbhil tsaol-aq Philma jiovq thailthaiq-u phao, Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq bhee lal nia-ail nul neq, khul khi mail Philma yaoq gaq yaoq gaoq dov lal nail loq nail-aiq. Philma al gaq, Aqloq Philma jiovq nail joiqjaq khe-ai maq dul lai-ail. Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv Philma jiovq khi joiqjaq ovq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Philma jiovq nail joiqjaq lav phal-u phao, aoldaoq kovqdaoq iqsanl ya lav phal nail ngaol.
Ngadao-i mail ge jel-ail ceevq-a nail al gaq, Leiqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a maq ngel-ail. Aivq nail jeq-e jaq-a nail lavqkhoel, teevq gaq iqsanl laol duq bhai ganl maq nl daiq-al.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul neq, Yuldav nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol dai, ngadao aqduq duq dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Jeq-e jaq-a al Philma jiovq-a nail ganl Molseiq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ge-ail.

Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv Philma jiovq nail joiqjaq ovq nail khe-ai, Philma nail joiqjaq ovq nail nvq gaq teevq gaq dov lal-a nail ngel-i mail, Philma joiqjaq phal-a nail ngaol dai, aqmeeq-ai ya heeq kivq-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq yaq nail aolsaolkovq-i mail aivq bhai Philma bhi jiovq-a nail maq ngel-ail. Teevq thal-iq maq cov-ai nia nail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq nail ganl Miqyail salkhil niailhai khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Maqlaqkhilsaqdaiv
Philma nail joiqjaq
ovq nail khe-ai,
naol nqmaq maqluv halyeel
Philma ngaol” dai,
khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Milnee uqnee khe bivq-ai thaq nail daoq al neq, gaq maq aol-ail, khul teevq phaq iqsanl ganl maq tsoiq nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail daoq al daoq bhai khaonq ha-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, khul teevq phaq bhai iqsanl maq bhi bhee lal nia-ail. Al heel ngel-i mail, a dai nee maqtsil meeq nail noeqthunq nail phaq Miqyail gaoq bivq-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Noeqthunq nail al phaq bhaqda nee ngadao Miqyail jaol nail bha jiil laivq kivq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, Miqyail-i mail khanq-ai thaq nail daoq iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Philma al juq bhai Philma kha bhiq-u phao, Miqyail-i mail khanq-ai thaq nail daoq maq jiav-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul Philma nail alyaq al ya-a nail neq, khanq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq jiav khi ya-a nail ngaol.
“Khanq-ai thaq nail
daoq al daoq neq,
Heeqphaq Miqyail-i mail
khanq-ai thaq khi,
aivq maq khanq phal yaoq-aol.
‘Naol nqmaq maqluv halyeel
Philma ngaol’ ” dai,
aivq bhai ge bhiq khi khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, meeq jaiq nail daoqma saljial al bhai ivq dai, Yeiqsul nl thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao neq, Philma maodai gaq jaol khal lee-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, sil nail phaq bhaqda nee aqyu juq khaq mao iqsanl ganl maq nl nia-ail.
Yeiqsul neq, khaq mao iqsanl Philma jiovq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq bhai juq khi Miqyail jaol nail bha khal lal nail tsaol-aq bhai Yeiqsul khaq mao iqsanl hevqkovq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal nail dai khi, aivq khaq mao iqsanl aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol.

Alheel nail Philma ngadao juq loq-ail nial. Aivq neq aqmeeq aqhaol ngaol. Oeqbal khi aqcavq phaq maq aol-ail. Oeqbal yaq bhai gaoq ceiv ceiv-a nail ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai nqtavq nee maqtsil moe nail dao bhai tsiq dav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, Philma yaoq juq yaoq khe-ai, iqmoeq yovqgavq nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil, haoqnao tsaol-aq nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil yaoq n yaoq n nee ya laol bhiq nail maq ngel-ail. Teevq pov taivq-ail aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao teevq pov iqsanl gaoq laol bhiq nail maq loq yaoq-aol.

Tsaol-aq yaq gaq bhaq khi ngaol-aoq, Philma ya jiovq dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq aqyu juq bhai alyaq bivq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khanq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail haoqnao lee khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel bhee lovq nail Yaqyov bhai alyaq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail ge movq nail ganl ganl ma neq, niailhai ngaol. Niilheel nail Philma ngadao jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol khi, iqsanl bhai uvthaiq nail Miqyail nail doiqbev bev ma nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq neq, meeq nail haol nail saiqgov gov ma nail lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail nail ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Maldil saiqgov gov ma al neq, tsaol-aq-i mail cov-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miqyail-i mail cov-a nail ngaol.

Danq nail phaq bhi danq khi, laol nail phaq bhi laol nail dai khi, Miqyail-i mail Philma yaoq gaq yaoq-ao bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Philma Yeiqsul iqsanl laol bhiq nail teevq phaq ganav ya jiav nail ngaol.
Aivq miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail kheel nul neq, Philma maq ya jiovq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai laol bhiq nail Philma juq jaol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail saiqgov gov ma khe-ai dul nail saiqgov lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Saiqgov al neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jiav nail saiqgov gov ma nail maolkhoel ngaol. Molseiq saiqgov gov ma cov nail dai, khi-u phao, “Gaoqjaoq kovtavq-ai naoq bhai bhi moel-a nail maolkhoel khe-ai dul dai iqsanl bhai, aqmeeq-ai cov yaoq” dai, Miqyail Molseiq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail khi aivq nail tsaol-aq nail gaiqlaq bhai Yeiqsul-i mail lainq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial al neq, meeq jaiq bhee jaiq nail saljial nail daoq bhai juq khi nl-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, daoqma saljial aqlil nee maqtsil meeq jaiq bhee jaiq nail daoqma saljial pevq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Philma al juq-i mail nl nail ganl nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ganl, Yeiqsul bhai av bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Iqmoeq-u phao ge bhiq-a nail daoqma saljial al ge duq maq jiav-ail, kheel nul neq, nvq pov teevq pov daoqma saljial ge bhiq nail maq loq-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai oeqbal thaq thaq-ail ge nail:
“Heldaiq yaoq.
Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e jaq-a khi
Yuldav nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai,
daoqma saljial aqsivq
ngal jaq nail aqn
kev lee nail ngaol.
Daoqma saljial
aqsivq al neq,
aqyu juq nail
aqphiq aqbhal nail
aqlavq bhai nieivq thaiq khi
Iljiltuv milkhaoq
lavqkhoel nee
hevq dol-aivq-u phao,
ngal aqyu juq bhai
jaq-a nail daoqma
saljial khe-ai, maq dul-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
ngaq-i mail jaq-a nail
daoqma saljial khe-ai,
aqyu juq maq nl-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
ngal aqyu juq bhai
khaonq ha-a nail ngaol dai,
Heeqphaq Miqyail
ge nail ngaol.
Aqyanq al jel ail-u phao,
ngal Ilsaqleiqlal nail
jeq-e jaq-a bhai
daoqma saljial aqsivq
niailhai jaq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq
aqyu juq nail neenoeq
needul lavqkhoel bhai
oil bhoel bhiq khi,
aqyu juq nail
neema kovtavq bhai
gevq bhiq nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, aqyu juq nail
Miqyail pevq khi,
aqyu juq iqsanl
ngaq nail tsaol-aq
pevq nail ngaol.
‘Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai
heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq’ dai,
yovqgavq nail
jeq-e jaq-a nail
gaiqlaq bhai maqkhaiq,
aqivq jaqbheq nail
gaiqlaq bhai maqkhaiq,
teevq gaq nee teevq gaq
cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail
maq loq-ail.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe
eeq yaq nil yaq iqsanl mail
ngaq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq nail oeqbal
phaiq bhiq khi mail
aqyu juq-i mail
nl-a nail laiq nail
tsa nail phaq bhai
maq noeq thaq-ail” dai,
Miqyail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail daoqma saljial aqsivq bhai jaq-u phao, iqmoeq-u phao ge bhiq-a nail daoqma saljial al aqlil ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Maoq lal khi aqlil lil lal-a nail phaq neq, peivq-ail nail aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u phao nee ge bhiq-a nail daoqma saljial lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq nail aol juq aol nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq-i mail cov-a nail uqhuq thaoq nail saiqgov gov ma iqsanl jiav nail ngaol.

Saiqgov gov ma al nail lavqkhoel-ai, iqmoeq-u khe kev lee nail jaol duq bhai neq, phalmanq tsiq dav duq, kovqkhail khi laol bhiq-ai thaq nail khaqmul jiav nail ngaol. Jaol duq al duq bhai neq, meeq nail haol nail jaol duq dai, khul nail ngaol.
Saiqgov gov ma nail lavqkhoel khe, thaoq pav-ai thaq nail haoqnao khe jaol duq neq, meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq dai, khul nail ngaol.

Al nail lavqkhoel, heel leivq-ai thaq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq laol bhiq duq khi, thunq heeq lao lao-ail heel leivq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial nail thunq jiav nail ngaol. Thunq al heeq nail lavqkhoel bhai, maqnav khaqmul aol nail heel iqlaoq, daq tsuq tsuq nail Aqloq nail joiqniovq khi, daoqma saljial gevq-ai thaq nail lovmav dailpav aol nail ngaol.

Thunq al heeq nail kovtavq bhai, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Kheiqlulbheiq dai khul nail maolkhoel nvq maol bhi jiav-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqdao neq, oeqbal phaiq duq dai khul nail thunq al thunq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ganl niil juq iqsanl mail niil aq-il nuljuq bhai maq ge bhiq-ail.
Al juq bhai alhai lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol. Philyaq juq yovqgavq nail ganl nl dai, saiqgov gov ma iqmoeq khe kev lee nail jaol duq bhai khaq mao iqsanl, aol lai nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nvq dao teevq dao bhai neq, Philma gaq taivq-ail aol lai nia nail ngaol. Aivq aol lai-u phao, aivq nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail maq heeq nia dai, nl laiq-a nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil maqkhaiq, laol bhiq nail aqsivq oil laivq nail ngaol. A bhai neq, teevq kovq teevq pov taivq-ail ya aol lai-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Alhai nl-a nail bhaqda nee, iqmoeq-u phao nee cov-ai thaq nail saiqgov gov ma al maq peivq ha-u kev dai neq, meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq bhai aol lai nail gailkhaol maq daol lal haq-al dai, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ganl al juq neq, niil yeel nail haqbhoil daoqma uqhuq daoq teevq-eel ngaol. Al bhai danq bhiq nail phaq danq bhi khi laol bhiq nail phaq laol bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, al juq neq, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq lai nail tsaol-aq nail heeq nia nail neema bhai neekhaol teevq sil maq nl bhee nia-ail.

Al juq neq, jaq nail daol nail phaq maqkhaiq, tsiq haol nail mee nia phaq maqkhaiq, aqsivq haqjoil phao taivq-ail tavq nail aol juq pevq nail ngaol. Aqsivq maq lav phal nail gaiqlaq bhai, aol al juq bhi thaoq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Khali neq, niil aq-il khe kev lee-a nail aqmeeq phaq bhai tavq nail Philma aqivq gaq khe-ai, lee-a nail ngaol. A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq eeq jaiq bhee jaiq nail saiqgov gov ma bhai lai pav khi, teevq pov taivq-ail meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol. Saiqgov gov ma al neq, aqlavq-i mail cov-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miltsaq nee tavq nail iqsanl maq ngel-ail. Aivq meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq bhai aol lai-u phao, civqmeiv khi niaoqnel niaoq yaq nail aqsivq oil khi aol lai-a nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq aivq nail aqsivq oil khi aol lai-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao nqmaq maqluv halyeel hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, aivq nl-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, civqmeiv khi niaoqnel laqsil nail aqsivq maqkhaiq, niaoqnel niaoqkhal laol bhiq-a nail lailmevq maqkhaiq, aolsaolkovq phao maq meeq maq haol nail tsaol-aq bhai haiq bav bhiq-u phao, aqsivq haqjoil phao meeq lal haol lal dai, nl nia haq neq,

Khali nail aqsivq neq, a dai nee maqtsil khadai nl nia nail-aiq. Aivq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai juq khi, malbavq teevq peivq-ail maq daol nail, aivq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqsivq neq, ngadao nail heeq nia nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol nail bheeq nail leel nail juq bhai tsiq haol bhiq khi, aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail haqbhoil nl nia hal nia dai, nl lavq-a nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u phao jaq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial nail kov-uvq bhai ngadao jaol-u phao, bheeq nail leel nail juq nail lavqkhoel ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail nail dai khi, Yeiqsul khanq sil-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai, “Ngal nuljuq bhai bivq naol” dai, Miqyail-i mail ge-ai thaq nail nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail jaiqbhoil ya dai, Yeiqsul neq, daoqma saljial aqsivq nail gaiqlaq khe tsaol-aq ngaol.
Jaiqbhoil bivq naol dai, ge ceiv-ai thaq nail haoqgavq jiav haq neq, jaiqbhoil bivq nail gaq maldil sil-aoq thaq nial dai, iqmoeq-u phao nee ya heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jaiqbhoil niailhai bivq naol dai, haoqgavq gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, bivq nail aqheel gaq sil haq neq, jaiqbhoil bivq nia nail ngaol. Bivq nail aqheel gaq maq sil nail gaiqlaq, gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai jaiqbhoil maq bhoil bhiq kivq-ail.
Iqmoeq-u phao jaq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial al iqsanl, aqsivq maq dov dai, nl khal leevq-a nail maq ngel-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq lavqkhoel-ai ge bhiq-a nail daoq yaoq daoq yaoq-ao nee, Molseiq Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai ge bhiq khi, niaoqnel niaoq yaq khi civqmeiv nail aqsivq ulcuvq kheq khi, neltsaiq deel yaol yaq nail aqmevq khi lunl nail aqnaiq-i mail haoqgavq pavqjiov khi tsaol-aq al juq bhai maqkhaiq, aivq jiivq bav bhiq-a nail ngaol.
“Aqsivq al neq, nuljuq bhi tsaothe nail haqbhoil, Miqyail-i mail nuljuq bhai jaq-ai thaq nail daoqma saljial bhai tavq nail aqsivq ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Saiqgov gov ma khi a bhai khal yuq nail nlmaoq iqsanl bhai, alhai dul dai, aivq aqsivq jiivq bav-a nail ngaol.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, iqsanl mail dai ge kivq dai, aqsivq-i mail tsiq haol-a nail ngaol. Aqsivq dov nail phaq maq jiav haq neq, oeqbal phaiq nail phaq maq jiav-ail.

Nqtavq kovtavq khe maolkhoel juq bhai tsiq haol nail dai khi, alheel juq ya nl haq neq, nqtavq kovtavq khe maldil juq bhai tsiq haol dai, a dai nee maqtsil meeq nail laol bhiq nail phaq ya jiav nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqlavq-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail meeq nail haol nail jaol duq bhai Khali aol lai-a nail maq ngel-ail. Jaol duq al neq, maldil deel jaol duq al nail maolkhoel teevq-eel ngaol. Aivq niil aq-il ngadao nail haqbhoil Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqmaol moel dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai aol lai-a nail ngaol.

Philma neq, yovqgavq nail aqsivq maq oil dai, jaiqyaq nail aqsivq oil khi, meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq bhai yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee aol lai nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Khali neq, aivq nail aqmaol alhai mee nia pov ya laol bhiq nail maq ngel-ail.

Alhai ya laol bhiq nail kheel nul neq, nqtavq khi miltsaq teivq-u phao nee aivq mee nia pov ya khanq sil nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, oeqbal oil ha nail dai khi, haoqnao naosaq khe aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel, aivq teevq pov taivq-ail dov lee khi, aivq nail aqmaol laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao tsaol-aq teevq pov ya sil khi, yaqhao yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, tsaol-aq nail oeqbal bhai phi ha nail dai khi, Khali aivq nail aqmaol teevq pov taivq-ail laol bhiq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Aivq nvq pov teevq pov yavq kha lee-u phao, oeqbal bhai teevq peivq-ail maq tavq-ail yavq kha lee khi, aivq bhai noeqthunq nail tsaol-aq bhai hevqkovq nail ngaol.

Aoldaoq kovqdaoq neq, yaqhao khe kev lee nail aqmeeq juq bhi pevq lal nail maq ngel-ail. Al juq nail maolkhoel teevq-eel ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee, laol bhiq nail phaq laol nail neq, uqhuq thaoq lai nail tsaol-aq bhai teevq thal-iq maq bhi bhee lal nia-ail.

Aqyu juq bhee-ail nul neq, aqyu juq laol bhiq nail phaq maq laol yaoq-aol, maq ngel-ail laiq. Uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq teevq pov meeq lal haol lal gaq haq neq, oeqbal aol naol dai, aqyu juq teevq thal-iq maq noeq yaoq-aol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yaoq kovq yaoq-ao nee, laol bhiq nail phaq laol bhiq-u phao, “Nvjuq oeqbal aol lao thaq nail niil” dai, aqyu juq noeq dov lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niaoqnel nail aqsivq khi civqmeiv nail aqsivq neq, oeqbal bhai teevq thal-iq maq tsiq haol nia-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Khali miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq lee-u phao, Miqyail bhai ge bhiq-a nail:
“Miqyail-ol, naol neq,
laol bhiq nail phaq khi
danq nail phaq bhai,
oil movq nail maq ngel-ail.
Naol neq, ngaq nail haqbhoil
aqmaol lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Miqjaq jao poiv khi
laol bhiq nail phaq khi
oeqbal nail haqbhoil
laol bhiq nail juq bhai
naol neekhaol maq sil-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
ngal daoq niailhai
ge nail ngaol:
‘Heldaiq dei-eiq.
Aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail
haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai
ngaq nail ganl
gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
Miqyail-ol,
naol neema tsaq nail khe-ai,
nl nail dai khi,
ngal lee-a nail ngaol’ ” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq-u phao aivq-i mail ge-a nail: “Laol bhiq-a nail phaq khi danq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, miqjaq jaopoiv khi laol bhiq nail phaq khi oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, naol maq oil movq nail nee ovqtavq, neema maq tsaq” dai, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Laol bhiq nail phaq iqsanl aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai tsaq lai dai, nl nail phaq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq alhai ge nail ngaol.
“Heldaiq dei-eiq. Naol neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nl nail dai khi, ngal lee-a nail ngaol” dai, aivq teevq pov gaoq ge-a nail ngaol.
Laol bhiq nail nvq phaq teevq phaq khaq mao iqsanl ya ivq dai, laol bhiq nail iqmoeq khe phaq bhai aivq khaonq ha-a nail ngaol.

Alhai nl nail bhai Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqsul Khali neq, aivq nail aqmaol teevq pov taivq-ail laol bhiq-a nail ngaol. Alhai laol bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao meeq lal haol lal-a nail ngaol.
Philyaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, yaoq n yaoq n nee laol duq bhai thulphaol khi, oeqbal bhai maq tsiq haol nia nail laol bhiq nail phaq bhai, laol nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, oeqbal phaiq bhiq nail khi, Yeiqsul nqmaq maqluv halyeel nail haqbhoil teevq pov taivq-ail laol bhiq nail phaq laol khi, Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq a bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail neq, aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai Miqyail aivq nail aqkhil kov-uvq bhai bhi jaol-u phao kev dai, daonq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, laol bhiq nail teevq phaq taivq-ail laol nail lavqkhoel meeq lal haol lal nail tsaol-aq bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel bhee nail tsaol-aq, aivq bhi pevq lal nail ngaol.
Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal iqsanl ngadao bhai alhai salkhil khanq lavq-a nail ngaol. Iqmoeq ilmoeq aivq ge nail:
“Yaqhao ngal
aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq nail
daoqma saljial neq,
niailhai ngaol.
Ngaq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq
aqyu juq nail
neema lavqkhoel bhai
oil bhoel bhiq khi,
aqyu juq nail
neenoeq needul nail
kovtavq bhai
gevq bhiq naol dai,
Heeqphaq Miqyail
ge nail ngaol.
Ngal aqyu juq nail oeqbal khi
aqyu juq nail bheeq nail
leel nail juq bhai
maq noeq thaq-ail” dai,
Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal gaoq ge nail ngaol.
Oeqbal al juq bhai phaiq gaq haq neq, oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail phaq maq loq yaoq-aol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Yeiqsul nail aqsivq bhaqda nee, ngadao geesil nail neema maq aol dai, meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq bhai aol lai kivq nail ngaol.

Ngadao juq nail haqbhoil Yeiqsul haqphal phal ma nee jel lai khi aqdoevq bhi doevq nail gailkhaol aqsivq khaol lavq daol lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao gailkhaol al khaol nee mail aol lai kivq nail ngaol. Haqphal phal ma al neq, Yeiqsul nail aqmaol bhai ge nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai, aqivq jiovq-ai thaq nail, eeq dee heel deedee nail Philma, ngadao jaol nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, daolcoev deel neema khi ivqdao deel neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aol nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail nail aqjail bhai ngadao jiiv bhoel laivq bhel. Oeqbal bhai khaoqlaol nail phaq bhi tsiq haol gaq-a nail neema khi, haoltaiv deel ulcuvq-i mail bhi tsiq haol gaq-a nail aqmaol lavqkhoel ngadao jiiv bhoel laivq bhel.

Ngadao-i mail hav bhoel-ai thaq nail noeqthunq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai pov pov lav lav-ail maq pevq mail, ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, saljial jaq lavq-a nail Miqyail neq, saljial ivq nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, goil nail gaiq-a nail neema aol khi aqmeeq phaq nl dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq saol-nvq khi gaq bivq bhel.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq geeqlaoq maq hal lai dai, jaol nail khe-ai, nuljuq alhai thaq jaol. Yalkhaq dal nail aqn al n kev lee nail aqjail jail lal-aoq thaq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaq bivq thailthaiq yaoq.
Ngadao maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq kivq khi ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq nail neenoeq neelov taivq-ail oil khi oeqbal gaoq nl haq neq, oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail phaq maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Mao-ail geesil lal nail yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai daonq-ail teevq-eel ngaol. Aq-u phao, Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq bhai neema phail deedee nail lavqkhoel miqjaq-i mail kheq ha nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail Molseiq bhai bivq-a nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq naldaiq dai, khaonq ha-a nail tsaol-aq neq, aivq-i mail khaonq ha-a nail ganl bhai salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq hail gaq jaol haq neq, maq gaoqhaq dai, heivq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai naoqthaiq khi, yovqgavq nail oeqbal bhai tsiq haol lavq nail Miqyail nail daoqma saljial bhai aqphoiq maq bhao dai saol-nvq khi, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq lavq nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, khadai doil nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai yaq daq nail ngel-ail dai, saol-nvq daiq yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, “Nl kovq bhiq nail phaq neq, ngaq nail ganl ngaol. Ngal dal bhiq naol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhai maqkhaiq, “Miqyail aivq nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq bhai maqkhaiq, khaq sil gaq-i mail ge-a nail bhai ngadao heeq kivq naol.
Aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai kev lai haq neq, mailma-ail geesil lal nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Jel lal-a nail aqn aqyanq bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Aq-u phao, nuljuq Miqyail nail aqbhaq bhai moel gaq-al ngal-aq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail maodai phaq bhai ol ol-ail ya daq-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl nail sivtavq bhai, khal nl movq-ail nl lavq nail bhai maqkhaiq, khoeq lavq jiovq lavq nail bhai maqkhaiq, nuljuq ya daq daiq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, alhai daq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl tsao daq-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq thaonq bhai aol nail tsaol-aq bhai noeq kev nail nee ovqtavq, yu nuljuq nail nlmaoq bhai luv dov lal khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq lavqkhiq teevq tsail daq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao juq a dai nee maqtsil meeq jaiq ivq jaiq nail nlmaoq jiav nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neema ivqdao deel phaq bhai thaq khaonq ha. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, al bhaqda nee nuljuq kovpavq laiq ma ya nail ngaol.
Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq nl nail nee ovqtavq, aivq-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail phaq bhai ya kivq dai, nuljuq ol nail neema loq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Lee nail dai,
lainq-ai thaq nail al gaq
aivq maq naq dai,
mao-ail maq maoq lal mail,
kev lee nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail tsaq nail
daol nail tsaol-aq
neema thaqtsaol nail
bhaqda nee,
aqdoevq ya doevq nail ngaol.
Aivq haoqnaol phao
jiiv kovq haq neq,
ngal aivq bhai teevq peivq-ail
neekhaol maq sil-ail” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao neq, haoqnao phao jiiv kol-aivq khi luq-ail seil-ail nail tsaol-aq maq ngel. Neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, hevqkovq nail phaq bhai ya-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail neema aol nail bhaqda nee noeqthunq-ai thaq nail juq bhai maldil ya nail ngaol dai, aqduq aqtsil bhao nail ngaol. Ngadao-i mail maq ya moel-a nail juq iqsanl, maldil jaol naol jiav naol dai, aqduq aqtsil bhao nail ngaol.
Milnee uqnee khe jaol-a nail tsaol-aq juq neema thaqtsaol nail neema aol nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai neekhaol sil nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail daoq bivq-a nail bhaqda nee, bhoiq bhoiq luv luv iqsanl jaol lal jiav lal-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao-i mail ya moel thailthaiq nail juq neq, maq moel kivq nail juq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqbheiqlal neema thaqtsaol khi Miqyail bhai laol bhiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq-i mail laol bhiq-a nail phaq neq, Gaqilnav-i mail laol bhiq-a nail phaq nee maqtsil, meeq jaiq nail ngaol. Aqbheiqlal-i mail laol bhiq-a nail al bhai Miqyail hav bhoel-a nail bhaqda nee, aivq neq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, Miqyail aivq nail ganl salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, Aqbheiqlal sil khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail neema thaqtsaol nail ganl al, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai daoq ge thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ilnaov neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail aivq bhai maq bhi sil dai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai hevq dal laivq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai hevq dal laivq-a nail ngel-i mail, yu aivq bhai maq halpov moel nia-ail. Miqyail aivq bhai maq hevq dal laivq-u nee mail, “Ngal aivq bhai neekhaol sil naol” dai, Miqyail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq neema thaqtsaol nail neema maq aol haq neq, Miqyail neekhaol sil dai maq nl kivq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail bhai hal lai nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail doevq nail ngaol dai, neema ya thaqtsaol khi, Miqyail aivq bhai halpov nail tsaol-aq bhai geeqlaoq bivq nail ngaol dai iqsanl, neema ya thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Nol-avq neema thaqtsaol-a nail bhaqda nee, maq pevq lal daiq-a nail ganl juq Miqyail aivq bhai ge bhiq-u phao, ev nail lavqkhoel nee naldaiq khi, aivq nail phaqyaq mayaq ya jel-ail dai, laovq laovq ma cov-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail neema thaqtsaol-a nail al neq, miltsaq yaq juq bhai yalkhaq bhi dal nail ngaol. Aivq neema thaqtsaol-a nail bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail teevq gaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, “Naoq bhai jaiqbhoil ovq nail milkhaoq bhai ail yaoq” dai, Miqyail aivq bhai khul-u phao, khaq bha ya ail nail dai, maq heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail daoq bhai naldaiq khi, ail-a nail ngaol.

Aivq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai saljial jaq-ai thaq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel, yu nail milkhaoq bhai jaol nail daq-i khe-ai, jaol-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, milkhaoq al khaoq bhai aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, saljial ya nail gaq pevq nail Ilcav khi Yaqkov khe-ai saiqgov gov gov-ail jaol-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq neq, Miqyail-i mail saol-nvq khi cov-ai thaq nail daoqthaoq thaoq ivq-ai thaq nail meenq bhai noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Aivq nail khaqma Saqlal iqsanl neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, yaq jaol lee nail aqyanq jel-ail khi ngaol-aoq, yaq ceiv lai-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, saljial jaq-a nail Miqyail saljial ivq nail ngaol dai, aivq neema thaq tsaol nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yeel gil nail aqjail jail lal-aoq nail yaqyov-aq al gaq nail ovq nee, aqjievq lilheel maodai jaol lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nqtavq bha tsaiq nail aqgil khe-ai mao khi, iqyaq iqma daol bha bhai jiav nail tsalhail khe-ai, maq ge gil tsaol dai, jaol nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq neema thaqtsaol thaqtsaol-ail sil-a nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail juq bhai aqyu juq maq ya khi ngaol-aoq, al juq bhai eqyal nee ya moel khi, hav lavq-a nail ngaol. “Nvjuq miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, yaoq khaoq yaoq mil yaoq khe tsaol-aq khi daq-i jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail ngaol.
Alhai ge nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yovqgavq nail milkhaoq bhai halpov thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, bhaqlaoq khe dai, dov lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq-i mail dov lee-a nail milkhaoq bhai noeqmoel lal haq neq, aqyu juq kovq lai nail aqyanq jiav nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq-i mail noeqthunq nail milkhaoq neq, a dai nee maqtsil meeq nail nqtavq kovtavq khe milkhaoq ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, “Naol nvjuq nail Miqyail ngaol” dai, aqyu juq ge nail bhai, Miqyail maq haqsil-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq-i mail ya jaol lai nail meenq bhai aivq-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqbhaqlaqhaq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai laonqdaiq-u phao, Ilcav hevq khi laol bhiq lai-a nail ngaol. “Ilcav nail ovq nee doevq lee nail juq bhai taivq-ail naoq nail jeq-e jaq-a dai, saol-nvq nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail saljial ya-a nail al gaq, aivq nail yaqyov teevq gaq teevq-eel ngaol-aoq, laol bhiq nail khi ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail tsaol-aq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal nia nail ngaol dai, aivq neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Maldil ge haq neq, Ilcav sil jel-a nail gaoq ya kovq-a nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Ilcav neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, “Nul-nq nvq gaq yaqhao geeqlaoq ya dei-eiq” dai, Yaqkov khi Ilsaol bhai geeqlaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqkov neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, aivq sil nail aqjail jail lal-u phao, Yaolsai nail yaqyov nvq gaq bhai geeqlaoq bivq-a nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail joiqniovq bhai gaqhal khi Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolsai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, aivq sil nail aqjail jail lal-u phao, Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee ya dov-ai nail ganl ge bhi khi, aivq nail haq eeq bhai khalhai ya duq pheeq nail ganl iqsanl, ge bhiq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.

Molseiq nail aqbhu aqma neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Molseiq doevq lee-u phao, bhala hail heeq bhee dai tsu-uvq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yaqyov al gaq al jaiq-ail meeq nail bhai aqyu nvq maolyaq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq heeqphaq-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail bhai maq geesil-ail.
Molseiq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq eeq lal-u phao, heeqphaq Phaqlaol nail yaqmiq nail yaqyov dai khul nail bhai, aivq maq hav bhoel-ail.
Oeqbal lavqkhoel-ai teevq yanq lavqkhiq ya tsail nail nee maqtsil, Miqyail nail yaq juq nee mail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai daq movq nail ngaol.

Khali nail haqbhoil khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail phaq neq, Iljiltuv milkhaoq nail phul heel nlmaoq nee maqtsil phoiq jaiq nail ngaol dai, aivq noeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, yaqhao khe ya nail kovpavq bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, heeqphaq Phaqlaol neema phail nail bhai maq geesil dai, Iljiltuv milkhaoq nee dov ail-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maq moel kivq nail Miqyail bhai moel-a nail khe-ai, ivqdao dai, jaol nail ngaol.

Molseiq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq lee-a nail yaq juq bhai heivq nail gaq Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq bhai maq ya heivq dai, Bhaqsaqkhaq bhaoqaiq lav sav khi, gov bhaq bhai aqsivq ya leivq-a nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, gee lee del deel milkhaoq bhai tsao nail khe-ai, neltsaiq deel iqyaq iqma bhai ceiv-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Iljiltuv tsaol-aq alhai ceiv lai thailthaiq-u phao, ulcuvq-i mail deq pheeq heivq gil-a nail ngaol.
Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, Yeiqlilkhol meenq bhai sivq n tsao jaoq gaq-u phao, meenq nail khainl gaq peiv gil-a nail ngaol.

Laqhal dai khul nail maimaqlal al gaq neema thaqtsaol-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq nee mail maq ya luq maq ya seil-ail-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq khoiq heldaiq lee-a nail Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq juq bhai hav-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ngal khul phaq gaoq ge heeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Gildoq, Bhaqyail, Saqsoq, Yeiqphaqtav, Daqbhil, Saqmeqlal khi Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail ganl bhai maq ge bhiq gil tsaol-il.

Tsaol-aq al juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, yu nail milkhaoq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngaol. Tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee uvthaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail daoqma saljial jaq-a nail khe-ai, ya-a nail ngaol. Allaqjaqsil nail moeqthaoq bhai iqsanl nieivq cuvq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, mao-ail bhaol nail miqjaq bhai iqsanl lav miv-a nail ngaol. Thaoma-i mail tsil heivq nail khi bhai ya jel ail-a nail ngaol. Gaq bhaq khi ngaol-aoq, gaq kav lal-a nail ngaol. Genl dev-u phao, gaq kav lal-a nail ngaol. Yu nail meenq khe genl dev nail juq bhai the kovq gai-aivq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq ganav juq neq, sil thaq nail aqyu juq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq doevq kovq lal nail bhai gaoq ya hav kovq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav juq neq, meeq jaiq nail doevq kovq lal nail phaq bhai ya nia dai, yu-i mail phai dov bhiq nail bhai maq oil mail, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai daq khi sil-a nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, yu aqyu juq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl bhi khi, deeq nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Teevq pav ganav juq bhai hailcav-i mail pheethaiq khi thaonq bhai laol nail bhai iqsanl ya daq-a nail ngaol.

Yu-i mail lovmav liv nail, leq-i mail leq heivq nail khi, thaoma-i mail tsil heivq nail bhai aqyu juq ya daq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, al jaiq-ail haq nail phaq, khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq bhai, ya daq-a nail lavqkhoel, yaol nail bavkov khi civqmeiv nail bavkov doi khi, teevq dao nee teevq dao tsao tsao-ail jaol-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq haqtsoiq haqyal bha tsaol laivq khi jaol lai-a nail ngaol. Lovphail khaoq bhaoq khi khaq duq bhai tsaoq uvq tsaoq uvq-ail jaol-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq meeq nail jaq nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq niil aqyu juq bhai maq geel-nvq-ail.
Tsaol-aq al juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol dai, Miqyail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, daoqma saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai aqyu juq maq ya haq-al.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail ngadao juq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail phaq lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao iqsanl maq aol lai haq neq, aqyu juq bhee lal nail phaq bhai maq ya nia-ail haq-al.

Neema thaqtsaol nail ganl salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq al juq ngadao nail teevq jaoq jaol bhee-ai thaq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao bhai lav tsoiq lal nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq bhel. Ngadao bhai leel thaiq-ai thaq nail oeqbal iqsanl bhai pheel ha-ail ceevq khi, ngadao nail sivtavq bhai lav sav-ai thaq nail gailkhaol bhai neema ivqdao dai thaq khi, tsaol-aivq bhel.

Tsaol-aivq-u phao, Yeiqsul bhai heldaiq cov-ai thaq yaoq. Aivq neq, ngadao neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq khe bhi bhee lal nail gaq ngaol. Aivq nail sivtavq bhai jiav nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhaqda nee, haqsil nail phaq bhai maq saol-nvq dai, lavqyavq kovtavq-ai khanq sil-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il, aivq Miqyail nail doiqbev bev ma nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq bhai neejiav jiav nail oeqbal yaq juq aivq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq-u phao, aivq oltsaol nail bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq dei-eiq. Alhai saol-nvq dai haq neq, gaq maq bhaq nail nee ovqtavq, neema iqsanl maq cov-ail.
Nuljuq oeqbal nee dev pheel jaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqsivq dov lee-u kev dai, maq khanq daiq haq-al.
Aqbhu yaqyov juq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail daoq bhai nuljuq nioil peivq ail-aoq nail laiq. Aivq ge nail:
“Ngaq nail yaqyov-ol,
Heeqphaq Miqyail-i mail
cavq lavq cov lavq nail bhai
aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq.
Aivq naoq bhai khaq khaq-ail
cavq lavq cov lavq-u phao,
neema thaq cov.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
Miqyail neq,
aivq gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai
cavq bhiq cov bhiq khi,
aivq-i mail
khal hav bhoel nail yaq
yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai
deeq deeq-ail, cavq bhiq
cov bhiq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq-i mail haq nail aoq nail phaq ya daq nail neq, Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail cav lavq cov lavq nail phaq bhai ya nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Aqbhu yaqyov juq bhai nl bhiq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai nl lavq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqbhu maq cavq maq cov bhiq nail yaqyov maq jaol-ail.
Yaq juq iqsanl mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail bhai ya daq nail khe-ai, nuljuq maq ya daq haq neq, nuljuq aivq nail yaq maq ngel-ail. Govbha lavqniil khe yaq ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ngadao bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail dai khi, aqsivq haqjoil phao aqbhu juq jaol nail ngaol. Ngadao aqyu juq bhai ev nail ngaol. A dai nee maqtsil, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq ya dai, aqhaqlal phao khe Aqbhu nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai ya jaol nail ngaol.

Aqsivq haqjoil phao khe ngadao nail aqbhu neq, aqyu juq neema tsaq nail khe-ai teevq yanq lavqkhoel taivq-ail, ngadao bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neq, aivq meeq nail haol nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl meeq lal haol lal dai, ngadao nail haqbhoil aqmeeq phaq saol-nvq khi, cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol.

Cavq lavq cov lavq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai ya daq-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq maq ngel-ail, noeqhaq nail phaq jiav nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail phaq bhai ya daq-a nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil, yaqhao tsaq nail daol nail khi neesal-ovq nail phaq ya nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, gaq maq aol nail nuljuq nail aqlavq gaoqdil khi, gaq maq aol nail nuljuq nail peevqceevq gaq bhi aol kovq lal yaoq.
Aqkhil maq meeq nail tsaol-aq, khil ceevq maq ya pov-ail mail cavq lai dai, nuljuq nail aqkhil nail haqbhoil gailkhaol daolcoev dai, lav daol yaoq.

Tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl nee tsaq lai jil lai dai, laijai yaoq. Meeq lal haol lal dai iqsanl, laijai yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, maq meeq maq haol nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai maq ya moel-ail.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol maq ya-ail maq ya pevq-ail dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Aqkhaq khaq deedee nail aqbhaol meeq lal khi, aivq nail dovq-i mail tsaol-aq maodai bhai lav bheeq lav leel nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail alhai maq ya pevq-ail dai, yaolphaol yaoq.

Ilsaol neq, yaqyov aqivq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, aoq teevq bhaol-i mail aivq nail alyaq phal jaq-a nail ngaol. Aivq khe-ai thaq khi. Aivq neq, khaqmiq iqsanl sev, Miqyail bhai iqsanl maq ev nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Alheel nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq ya dov lal dai, yaolphaol yaoq.

Nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, aivq bhai geeqlaoq bivq nail bhai Ilsaol oil movq lal bhiq-u phao, khaonq ha nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Maivbhil dov dov-ail mailma-ail hal khi ngaol-aoq, noeqpov nail aqyanq maq jiav-ail.

Nuljuq nail aqphiq aqbhal juq khe-ai, aqlavq iqsanl thoiqtsi nia khi miqjaq iqsanl tovq nail Silnaq gaoqjaoq bhai nuljuq ail kev-a nail maq ngel-ail. Gaoqjaoq al jaoq neq, navtsee dai pevq khi, al nail teevq jaoq bhai nqdil uvthaiq-ai thaq nail nee ovqtavq, lilmoel lil ma bhoe nail ngaol.

Nqbho jiiv nail aqthel khi daoq ge nail aqthel dov lee nail gaoqjaoq pevq nail ngaol. Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq juq neq, daoq al daoq bhai haoqnao teevq pov ma ya gaiq nail haqbhoil, Molseiq bhai hal-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, jaiqyaq iqsanl gaoqjaoq bhai thaoq tuv lal haq neq, lovmav-i mail liv heivq yaoq dai, bivq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai, aqyu juq maq khanqtsaol-ail.
Al juq bhai ya moel-u phao, mao-ail geesil lal nail ngel-i mail, “Ngal gee iqsanl geesil, aqjuq iqsanl juq deedee nail ngaol” dai, Molseiq ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Yeel-ovq gaoqjaoq bhai lal kev-ai thaq nail ngaol. Gaoqjaoq niil jaoq neq, aqdoevq doevq nail Miqyail nail meenq ngaol. Nqtavq kovtavq khe Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol. Maq ge gil tsaol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq lavqkhiq teevq tsail jil lai duq iqsanl, ngel nail ngaol.

Nqtavq kovtavq khe haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel-ai aqmil gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq lee-a nail tsaol-aq juq jil lai duq iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai yalkhaq dal nail Miqyail nail jaol duq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol. Bhee lal-a nail tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq nail aqhaqlal iqsanl al bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Daoqma saljial aqsivq nail tsaolkhaiq Yeiqsul iqsanl jaol nail ngaol. Aqbheiqlal nail aqsivq daoq ge nail nee maqtsil, hoel ha-ai thaq nail Yeiqsul nail aqsivq al, mao-ail meeq nail daoq ge nail ngaol.

Nuljuq bhai daoq ge lavq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai cavq lavq cov lavq nail Molseiq nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, maq ya jel ail-a nail ngaol. Thailhai phal-iq neq, nqtavq nee mail cavq lavq cov lavq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai ngadao khaonq ha haq neq, teevq thal-iq maq ya jel-ail.

Aq-u phao, aivq nail aqthel-i mail miltsaq bhai bhi luv lal-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il aivq-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail neq, “Ngal miltsaq bhai teevq pov gaoq bhi luv lal nail nee ovqtavq, nqtavq bha iqsanl bhi luv lal nail ngaol” dai, jaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Teevq pov gaoq bhi luv lal naol dai, ge-ai thaq nail neq, maq luv lal nia nail juq neq khaq mao iqsanl ivqdao dai jiav khi, luv lal nia nail juq neq, oil haq nail ngaol dai, ge movq nail ngaol. Luv lal nia nail al juq neq, teivq-ai thaq nail juq ngaol.
Kaovciv maq dao lal nia nail milkhaoq ngadao ya thaq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Ev khi, geesil nail lavqkhoel, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq bhel.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao nail Miqyail neq, poiv jaq thailthaiq nail miqjaq pevq nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq bhai khaq mao iqsanl gaiq-a yaoq.

Maq nioil peivq dai, daq-i bhai aqmeeq-ai hav yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq daq-i bhai hav-u phao, aqyu juq maq heeq nia-ail, nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai hav ya-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq thaonq bhai aol nail tsaol-aq nee mail aol nail khe-ai, saol-nvq-ai thaq khi, aqyu juq bhai thaq nioil peivq. Nuljuq iqsanl, aqsivq haqjoil phi-nq thaq nail ngel-i mail, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq bhai thaq nioil peivq.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail hevq pheel maol pheel jaq nail phaq bhai thaqeeq yaoq. Miqyaq khaqma nail gaiqlaq bhai saljial ya ivq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq khi yu nee bheeq nail leel nail tsaol-aq bhai Miqyail dal bhiq nail ngaol.
Phul heel oil movq nail neema taivq-ail aol khi aqdoevq thaq doevq. Nuljuq khal jiav nail juq bhai neekhaol sil yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
“Ngal naoq bhai teevq thal-iq
maq gaoq maq gail ail.
Teevq thal-iq
maq khaonq ha-ail” dai,
Miqyail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
“Heeqphaq Miqyail neq,
ngaq bhai heldaiq
phail nail gaq ngaol.
Ngal khul teevq phaq
bhai iqsanl
geesil nail maq jiav.
Tsaol-aq yaq ngaq bhai
khul khi nia nail-aiq” dai,
ngadao geesil nail neema maq aol nail lavqkhoel nee ge kivq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai aqivq jiovq khi nuljuq bhai Miqyail nail daoq cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail juq bhai thaq nioil peivq. Aqyu juq aqdoevq doevq-u phao, nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai nuljuq saol-nvq khi, aqyu juq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai saol oil yaoq.
Yeiqsul Khali neq, teevq thal-iq maq phal lal-ail, aivq neq, milgaol, yanqgaol khi nqmaq maqluv halyeel teevq phaq ngaol.

Maq dul lai nail, maodai phaq cavq lavq cov lavq nail haoqnao thaq tsaothe. Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhaqda nee, neema ivq lal haq neq, meeq deedee nail ngaol. Jaq nail daol nail aol thaoq nail bhaqda nee mail neema ivq lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Jaq nail daol nail aol thaoq nail tsaol-aq, al nail lavqkhoel nee geeqlaoq maq ya-ail.
Ngadao laol duq teevq dao jiav nail ngaol. Saiqgov gov ma lavqkhoel-ai ganl nl nail Philma juq, al bhai laol bhiq-ai thaq nail phaq

Philma aqivq gaq neq, meeq dee haol deedee nail jaol duq lavqkhoel jaiqyaq nail aqsivq tsiq bhoel laivq khi, oeqbal tsiqhaol nail haqbhoil laol bhiq lai-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, laol nail haqbhoil heivq-a nail jaiqyaq nail aqmaol neq, laolkhoiq lavq niil phao ya kheq haq nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, Yeiqsul iqsanl aivq nail aqsivq-i mail tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi meeq bhi haol lal nail dai khi, laolkhoiq lavq niil phao khanqsil-a nail ngaol.
Yu-i mail khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq nail bhai Yeiqsul daq-a nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl daq daq-ail yu jaol nail jail-nq nee, Yeiqsul jaol nail phao dov-ail bhel.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, niil yeel bhai doevq-u phao, ngadao nail ivq nail meenq maq jiav-ail. Yaqhao khe jiav lee nail meenq bhai ngadao noeqthunq-ai thaq khi halpov thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao Yeiqsul bhai juq khi, Miqyail bhai tsiq eeq nail phaq khaq mao iqsanl laol bhiq bhel. Alhai laol bhiq nail neq, ngadao nail moeqthaoq-i mail aivq nail aqmil bhai tsiq eeq nail bhai ge nail ngaol.
Aqmeeq phaq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq tsaojao-ai bhi nail phaq bhai maq nioil peivq dai, nl yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, al neq, Miqyail neema tsaq nail laol bhiq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai aqivq jiovq nail juq nail daoq naldaiq khi, aqyu juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail ganl aqyu juq Miqyail bhai ya ge bhiq lai nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nuljuq bhai nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, heldaiq phail nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai heldaiq phail-u phao, noeqhaq nail phaq maq jiav dai, lavqkhiq teevq tsail nl nia hal nia dai, aqyu juq nail daoq aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Maq naldaiq haq neq, nuljuq nail haqbhoil teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.

Ngaq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal lavq yaoq. Ngaq nail heeq kivq nail neema maq laiq maq tsa-ail dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngal khaq mao iqsanl aqmeeq phaq taivq-ail nl movq-ail nial.
Ngal nuljuq jaol nail bhai lavqtsail mail kovq lal nia dai, geeqlaoq hal lavq yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal deedee nail ngaol.

Neesal bhi ovq nail Miqyail, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail daoqma saljial nail aqsivq bhi dov lee-a nail bhaqda nee, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai bhi doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul neq, mao-ail eeq nail yaol lovq nail gaq pevq nail ngaol.

Neesal bhi ovq nail Miqyail al gaq, nuljuq bhai, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, aqmeeq phaq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nl nia nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal dei-eiq. Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, Miqyail nail neekhaol teevq sil nl nail tsaol-aq, aivq nuljuq bhai bhi pevq lal dei-eiq. Yeiqsul Khali bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel tsiqeeq bhel. Aqmiq.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq davqnil nil dai, gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngal nuljuq bhai gaq bivq nail daoq bhai ol khi naldaiq yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai hal nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail jaqbheq Tilmolseiq bhai yu thaonq nee phaiq dov gaq-ao nail ngaol dai, nuljuq bhai bhi heeq kivq movq nail ngaol. Aivq lavqtsail mail lal kev haq neq, ngal iqsanl aivq nee mail nuljuq jaol nail bha lal khi mail, nuljuq bhai ya moel nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol gaiq-a naol dei-eiq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai aqivq jiovq nail juq iqsanl bhai khi Khali yaq juq iqsanl bhai ge bhiq ail dei-eiq. Niai jaol nail Iqtaqliq milkhaoq khe aqivq jaqbheq juq iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bhi jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Miqyail khi Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav Yaqkov ngaol. Gaoq ail gail ail-a nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq tsel-nvq jeq-e bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl bhai daoq tsaoq phuq naol.
Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, haq nail aoq nail phaq khi laonqdaiq nail maodai phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee-u phao, lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai laonqdaiq nail phaq ya daq-u phao, gaq lai haq neq, ol nia jaiq lal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq khul teevq phaq iqsanl ge duq maq jiav nail nee ovqtavq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq ya theq-ail mail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhee dai, oltsaol nail neema bhi maoq jaiq lal khi bhi bhee lal yaoq.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai teevq gaq ganav neenoeq neekha theq nail ngel haq neq, Miqyail bhai hal yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail neq, tsaol-aq yaq iqsanl bhai, laoqniul maq niul dai, neema kev khi bivq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-u phao, neema thaqtsaol khi hal yaoq. Neema pov pov lav lav dai, thaq jiav. Neema pov pov lav lav dai aol nail tsaol-aq neq, lilmoel khal bhoe nail phao ail nail, iqyaq iqma eelkhaol thaoq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Alheel nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, “Miqyail ngaq bhai teevq phaq ganav bivq lavq nail ngaol” dai, thaq noeq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq aivq neq, neenoeq nvq phaq noeq khi, nl nail hal nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel saljial maq ivq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq teevq gaq ganav, yu nail lavqovq theq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali ya teevq gaq ganav, hulmeeq meeq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neq, yu nail lavqovq theq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, miltsaq kovtavq khe hulmeeq meeq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, moeqgaq nail aqeiv khe-ai peivq-ail gil nail ngaol.

Nlma dov lal khi nltsal kav lal laol lal-u phao, moeqgaq neq, khuq-ail kov-ail nail ngaol. Aqeiv iqsanl ga-ail khi, heldaiq meeq nail phaq iqsanl peivq-ail gil nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, hulmeeq meeq nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, yovqgavq nail ganl nl nl-ail jaol-u phao, luq-ail seil-ail gil nail ngaol.

Haq nail aoq nail phaq khi laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq-u phao, oltsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq-u phao, gaq lai nail tsaol-aq neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail heel uqtsaoq kovpavq ya nail ngaol. Kovpavq al neq, “Ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai ngal bivq naol” dai, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail heel uqtsaoq al tsaoq ngaol.

Tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, jalmul mul nail phaq bhai ya daq-u phao, “Miqyail ngaq bhai jalmul mul nail niil” dai, teevq gaq iqsanl thaq ge. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, haqeiv nail phaq Miqyail bhai jalmul maq mul nia-ail. Alhai dul dai, Miqyail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl, jalmul maq mul-ail.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail maivjeel jeel nail neema al oeqbal nl yaoq dai, aivq bhai jalmul mul khi, hel-aivq bhiq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq nail lavqkhoel khe aol nail maivjeel jeel nail neema al, yaqbeiv uvq nail khe-ai uvq lai khi, oeqbal bhi doevq lee nail ngaol. Oeqbal iqsanl eeq lal khi, sil nail phaq bhi doevq lee nail ngaol.
Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, thaq noeq bheeq dei-eiq.

Geeqlaoq aqmeeq iqsanl khi mail, bhee deedee nail kovpavq iqsanl mail, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail, aqbhaq nail Aqbhu nee mail dov lee nail ngaol. Aivq neq, teevq thal iqsanl maq pov maq phal lal-ail. Aivq nail aqbhaq lavqkhoel bhai bhi phaq lal nail aqhaiq maq aol-ail.
Khal teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel ngadao neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq heeq lee-a nail aqheeq

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq ganl niil juq bhai heeq kivq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Yu daoq ge nail bhai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Daoq lavqtsail mail thaq ge. Neema lavqtsail mail thaq phail.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq yaq-i mail neema phail nail phaq neq, Miqyail nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq maq bhi dov lal nia-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqcavq phaq iqsanl khi mail, maq meeq maq jaq nail phaq iqsanl mail khaonq ha gil yaoq. Neenuq neebeiv aol nail lavqkhoel, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai kha-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai hav bhoel yaoq. Daoq al neq, nuljuq bhai hevqkovq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, Miqyail nail daoq bhai hav bhoel khi nl tsao nail tsaol-aq pevq yaoq. Naqkhaol bhai taivq-ail gaiq nail tsaol-aq thaq pevq. Naqkhaol taivq-ail gaiq nail tsaol-aq pevq haq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq bhai ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, maq nl maq hal tsao nail tsaol-aq juq neq, phaoqdaiq bhai yovqgavq nail maivphaoq yovqgavq heldaiq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Aivq phaoqdaiq bhai heldaiq khi ngaol-aoq, dov ail haq neq, aivq nail maivphaoq khal heel dai, teevq pov taivq-ail nioilpeivq-ail nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi jel-ail nail bhee deedee nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai khaq mao iqsanl heldaiq khi, khal ya gaiq-a nail phaq bhai maq nioilpeivq dai, aqmeeq-ai tsaothe khi nl tsao hal tsao nail tsaol-aq neq, aivq-i mail khal nl khal hal nail phaq bhai Miqyail geeqlaoq bivq nail ngaol.

“Ngal uqhuq thaoq nail aolsaolkovq aqmeeq-ai thaoq thailthaiq naol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav noeq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail moeqthaoq bhai aivq maq gaq lai haq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail uqhuq thaoq nail al neq, khul nail ganl maq tsoiq-ail.

Aqbhu Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqcavq phaq maq aol dai, haoltaiv deel uqhuq thaoq nail aolsaolkovq neq, niailhai ngaol. Aqbhu aqma maq jaol nail juq bhai khi mail miqtsiq miqma juq haq nail aoq nail juq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq khi, miltsaq khe aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol-i mail maq bhi lav cov dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq yaolphaol khi doevq nia nail juq pevq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Heeqphaq pevq nail ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai neema thaqtsaol nail nuljuq neq, maivphaoq eeq nil teevq peivq-ail thaq tsel.

Nuljuq jil lal khi, uqhuq thaoq thailthaiq-u phao, heel nail noiltsaoq tsaoq khi aqgaq aqdoi iqsanl aqmeeq meeq dai doi-nq thaq nail hulmeeq teevq gaq khi mail, aqgaq aqdoi aqkhail aqlail doi-nq thaq nail haq yaq aoq yaq teevq gaq aol lal haq neq,

aqgaq aqdoi aqmeeq doi-nq thaq nail gaq bhai hav khi, “Jaol duq aqmeeq niil dao bhai jaol lal yaoq” dai, ge bhiq nail ngaol. Haq nail aoq nail al gaq bhai neq, “Thoilthai thulphaol yaoq. Maq ngel haq neq, ngaq nail aqkhil tsaoqthaq duq bhai jaoldeel yaoq” dai, nuljuq ge bhiq haq neq,
nuljuq yu bhai munl bhoilpav nail nee ovqtavq, maq meeq maq tsaq nail neenoeq nee yalkhaq dal nail tsaol-aq pevq nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Neema thaqtsaol nail phao hulmeeq meeq lal dai, Miqyail neq, miltsaq yaq-i mail haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq ha-ai thaq nail juq bhai tsel dov-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq. “Ngaq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai ngaq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhi jaol lal naol” dai, Miqyail ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai aqyu juq neq, jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, haq nail aoq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl bhiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khoeq lavq jiovq lavq khi yalkhaq dal duq bhai hel-aivq lavq-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq maq ngel-ail laiq.
Nuljuq bhai uvthaiq nail gaq nail aqmil aqmeeq bhai khal khul movq-ail khul nail tsaol-aq neq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq maq ngel-ail laiq.

“Yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai, yovqgavq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai gaiq-a yaoq” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai ge-ai thaq nail, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai tavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq al daoq bhai nuljuq nl bhee haq neq, meeq deedee nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq maivphaoq eeq nil tsel thailthaiq haq neq, oeqbal nl nail phaq pevq khi, nl bheeq thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, aoldaoq kovqdaoq phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq iqsanl bhai tsaothe thailthaiq khi ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq teevq daoq bhai nl laiq haq neq, iqsanl bhai nl laiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

“Yu nail khaqma bhai thaq bheeq thaq leel” dai, ge-a nail Miqyail neq, “Tsaol-aq bhai thaq lav heivq” dai, iqsanl ge-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naol yu nail khaqma bhai maq bheeq maq leel khi ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq bhai heivq haq neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl laiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq ge nail thail nail maqkhaiq, nl nail hal nail maqkhaiq, ngadao bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai yuq khi, Miqyail yaqhao ngadao bhai yalkhaq dal lavq nail bhai thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq.

Yu bhai maq gaoqhaq maq gaiq-a bhiq nail tsaol-aq bhai, Miqyail maq gaoqhaq maq gaiq-a dai, yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq neq, yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai gaq lai nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, “Ngal neema thaqtsaol naol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav ge khi ngaol-aoq, aivq maq nl maq hal dol lavq haq neq, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq. Alheel nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, aivq bhai hevqkovq nia nail laiq.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq nail lavqkhoel yaqmai-aq maqkhaiq, yaqyov-aq maqkhaiq, teevq gaq ganav, aqgaq aqdoi maq jiav nail nee ovqtavq, teevq n nee teevq n jaqjaq daoldaol maq jiav dai haq nail bhai,

nuljuq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ganav aivq bhai, “Lavqkhiq tsail tsail-ail kovq ail yaoq. Aqloil loil dai jaol-ail yaoq. Teevq bov jaq-ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail loq nail khe-ai, nuljuq maq bivq haq neq, khul nail ganl tsoiq nail-aiq.
Alhai dul dai, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal haq neq, aqsil ngaol.

“Teevq gaq ganav neq, neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Teevq gaq ganav neq, nl nail hal nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq teevq gaq ganav ge movq-ail jaol-aq. Khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal dai, naoq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq cavq naq lavq yaoq. Ngal neq, nl nail hal nail lavqkhoel nee ngal neema thaqtsaol nail phaq naoq bhai cavq naq bhiq naol dai, ngal nuljuq bhai ge kovq bhiq movq-ail nial.

Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail ngaol dai, naol neema thaqtsaol-ail nial lavq. Naoq-i mail alhai neema thaqtsaol nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neivq juq iqsanl Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol nail bhai neema thaqtsaol khi geesil deedee nail lavqkhoel nee aqjuq juq-ai bhiq nail ngaol.
Maq saol-nvq nia nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, maq nl maq hal mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl ganl maq tsoiq-ail dai, aqmeeq-ai heeq kivq movq-ail laiq.

Ngadao nail aqbhu Aqbhaqlaqhaq, aivq nail yaqyov Ilcav bhai laol duq kovtavq bhai laol bhiq-u phao, nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq.
