Aivq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq nee teevq gaq khe-ai, nl-a hal-a nail ngaol. Nl-a hal-a nail bhaqda nee, aivq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhee lal-a nail ngaol dai, naol ya moel-a nail ngaol.

“Aqbhaqlaqhaq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol” dai, gevq-ai thaq nail Jalliq daoq al daoq bhee lal-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq bhai Miqyail nail aqtsaoq ngaol dai iqsanl, ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail taivq-ail, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail maq ngel-ail. Nl nail hal nail phaq iqsanl aol nail bhaqda nee, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, Laqhal dai mil-ai thaq nail aqmaol gaoq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai hav bhoel khi gailkhaol yaoq khaol yaoq nee bhi kovq ail-a nail ngaol. Aivq alhai nl-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail aivq bhai tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhi pevq lal-a nail, maq ngel-ail laiq.
Aqmaol bhai aqhaqlal maq aol haq neq, sil nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq iqsanl maq nl maq hal haq neq, aqsil ngaol.

Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq maodai thaq jiovq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngadao juq, aqmeeq meeq dai, maq nl haq neq, yu nee maqtsil Miqyail yalkhaq dal lavq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Ngadao yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mee nia pov nl laiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav teevq thal-iq maq ge laiq haq neq, aivq neq, bhee nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, aivq nail aqmaol teevq maol maol lao bhai gaq lai nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Ngadao moeqphaq bhai gaq lai kivq dai, moeqphaq nail moeqthaoq bhai moeqkeivq oil tsaoq bhiq nail ngaol. Alhai oil tsaoq bhiq gaq haq neq, moeqphaq nail aqmaol maol lao-ail ngadao-i mail khal bhi ail movq nail phao ail nail ngaol.

Laovq laovq ma nail ganl saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Laovq khadai eeq khi lilmoel khadai bhoe lal khi ngaol-aoq, laovq e nail gaq mao-ail nil nail daillav-i mail, laovq laovq ma al bhai el-aivq movq nail phao el-aivq nia nail ngaol.

Moeqlal neq, aqmaol teevq maol maol lao nail lavqkhoel khal nil nail alsail pevq khi ngaol-aoq, “Ngal neq, mailma-ail eeq nail phaq nl kivq naol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Miqjaq miqjiiv neq, milgaoq gaoq lao bhai poiv jaq gil nia nail bhai, saol-nvq daiq yaoq.

Moeqlal neq, miqjaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Moeqlal neq, ngadao nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail haqeiv nail milkhaoq teevq khaoq pevq khi, ngadao nail neema aqmaol iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai haqeiv nail phaq bhi bhee lal nail ngaol. Moeqlal al neq, daqovq laoma eeltsul bhai tovq nail miqjaq oil khi, ngadao aqdoevq doevq nail phaq iqsanl bhai bhi poiv jaq nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq yaq neq, jaiqyaq, keivq-avq, soiq soiq-ail tsao nail jaiqyaq khi mail, ulcuvq lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail jaiqyaq yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, lav goil nia nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq yaq nail moeqlal bhai neq, maq lav goil nia-ail. Moeqlal neq, aqtsi tsu dai maq jaol nia nail haqeiv nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Bhi sil nia nail dovq iqsanl teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail moeqlal nee, Aqbhu khi Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, Miqyail-i mail aivq khe-ai dul lai dai, teivq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai iqsanl, ngadao nail moeqlal nee iqkhail yavq nail ngaol.

Moeqthaoq teevq thaoq nail lavqkhoel nee taivq-ail tsiqeeq nail daoq iqsanl, iqkhail yavq nail daoq iqsanl dov lal nail ngaol. Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, alhai bhi dov lal nail neq, maq tsaq-ail.
Ulcuvq eelbev teevq bev nee taivq-ail ulcuvq aqkheel khi mail ulcuvq aqkhaq teevq gaq khe-ai dov lee nia naol laiq.

Ngaq nail aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol. Heeqguq aqbhaol bhai saqloq aqheeq heeq lee nia naol laiq Aqheeq tsilju nail aqjiav bhai, heeqguq aqheeq heeq lee nia naol laiq. Alhai dul dai, ulcuvq aqkhaq dov lal nail ulcuvq eelbev iqsanl ulcuvq aqkheel maq dov lal nia-ail.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel neenoeq neekha aol khi mailma-ail heeq nia nail tsaol-aq khaq sil gaq. Tsaol-aq al gaq neenoeq neekha aol nail khe-ai, neema neenuq neebeiv aol nail lavqkhoel meeq nail nlmaoq hal dao juq nl nl-ail, aivq nia nail al bhi dov lal yaoq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yu bhai neema nal nail maivjeel jeel nail phaq khi mail, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail saol-nvq nail phaq nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai aol haq neq, neenoeq neekha aol naol dai, khaoqsail he he-ail, goiqbhaoq thaq bhaoq.

Alheel nail neenoeq neekha neq, nqtavq nee mail dov lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miltsaq bhai tavq nail neenoeq neekha pevq khi, aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq neekha khi mail, neivq bhai tavq nail neenoeq neekha pevq nail ngaol.
Maivjeel jeel nail phaq khi mail, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail saol-nvq nail phaq khal jiav nail bhai, maq tsaq maq jil lai nail phaq khi mail, haqeiv nail mee nia phaq jiav nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq nee mail dov lee-a nail neenoeq neekha phaq neq, meeq nail haol nail phaq ngaol. Nvq phaq teevq phaq neq, tsaq lai jil lai nail phaq ngaol. Al ovqtavq, neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, hav bhoel nia nail ngaol. Neenoeq neekha al neq, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia nail phaq maqkhaiq, aqmeeq phaq nl nail maqkhaiq, teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Maivphaoq eeq nil tsel nail phaq khi mail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq maq aol-ail.
Tsaq lai jil lai dai, nl nail tsaol-aq, neesal ya nail lavqkhoel aqiq haiq khi tsaq nail daol nail phaq ya gaiq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel teevq gaq nee teevq gaq neejiav jiav nail khi mail iqdaiq iqtsai dov thailthaiq nail-aiq. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol nuljuq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai dev pheeljaq thailthaiq nail ngel-i mail, dov lal nail maq ngel-ail laiq.

Nuljuq oil movq nail phaq maq ya-a nail ngel-i mail, yu bhai heivq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq yu nail nlmaoq bhai maivjeel jeel nail khe-ai maq ya-a nail ngel-i mail, iqdaiq iqtsai dov lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq Miqyail bhai maq hal-a nail ngel-i mail maq ya-al.
Nuljuq hal khi ngaol-aoq, maq ya-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol sil dai taivq-ail, nl movq nail ngel-i mail, hal laiq nail ngaol.

Bheeq nail leel nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, miltsaq nail aol bhai aqtsaoq tsaoq tavq nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, nuljuq maq heeq kivq-ail laiq. Miltsaq nail aol bhai aqtsaoq tsaoq movq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

“Ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail-i mail oil bhoel lavq-a nail aqhaqlal bhai aivq gaiq-a deedee khi aivq nail taivq-ail bhi pevq nail ngaol” dai, Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, aqnieivq-ail gevq-ai thaq nail niil dai, nuljuq noeq nail laiq.
Miqyail ngadao juq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol maodai bivq lavq nail ngaol.
“Miqyail neq,
neema eeq nail
heel nail tsaol-aq bhai
lav tsoiq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
neema thaqtheq nail
juq bhai neq,
geeqlaoq eeljaol
bivq nail ngaol” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail uvthaiq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Neivq heeqphaq bhai lav tsoiq yaoq. Lav tsoiq haq neq, aivq nuljuq jaol nail nee tsaoq dol-aivq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail aqjail bhai tuv dai jiil lavq yaoq. Alhai jiil lavq haq neq, aivq iqsanl nuljuq nail aqjail bhai jiil leevq nail ngaol. Oeqbal yaq juq-ol, nuljuq nail aqlavq tsiqhaol yaoq. Neenoeq nvq noeq noeq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, nuljuq nail neema bhi haol lal yaoq.

Noeqhaq deedee khi nioilkhaoq khaoq nail lavqkhoel nee nioil deedee yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail helsil nail phaq nioil nail phaq bhi pevq-ail khi, lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhai noeqhaq nail phaq bhi pevq-ail yaoq.
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neema thaqtheq khi jaol yaoq. Alhai jaol haq neq, aivq nuljuq bhai thaqeeq thaqheel lavq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq thaq ge doil. Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai ge doil nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, oeqbal thaq nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai ge doil khi, oeqbal thaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq haq neq, naol aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai maq hav bhoel mail, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai yalkhaq dal nail tsaol-aq pevq lal nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bivq lavq-a nail Miqyail teevq gaq taivq-ail yalkhaq dal nail aqkhaoqanq jiav nail ngaol. Aivq neq, bhi jel-ail nia nail bhaqaoq maqkhaiq, lav cov nail bhaqaoq maqkhaiq, jiav nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq nail aqjail bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal thaq nail tsaol-aq-ol naol neq, khalheel nail tsaol-aq pevq nail-aiq.

“Yanqgaol maq ngel haq neq, niaohao nvjuq meenq teevq meenq ganav bhai teevq kovq jaol ail naol. A bhai jaiqgaiq gaiq khi, jailjeq ya lal nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq teevq pav ganav ge thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alhai ge nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq.

Niaohao khul pevq lal nail dai, nuljuq maq heeq nia-ail. Nuljuq aqdoevq doevq nail phaq neq, khul phaq khe-ai dul nail ngel-ail. Teevq yanq taivq-ail ya moel khi, peivq-ail nail ulcuvq eelhaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
“Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, nvjuq aqdoevq doevq khi niailhai alhai nl naol” dai, nuljuq ge nail tsaq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neema eeq eeq-ail yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq tsiqeeq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alhai neema eeq nail phaq iqsanl mail haqeiv nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqmeeq phaq nl dai, heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq neq, maq nl nail tsaol-aq aivq nail haqbhoil oeqbal ngaol.
Hulmeeq hulbhao juq-ol, naldaiq yaoq dei-eiq. Haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai kev lee nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq gul gul-ail, nioil deedee yaoq.
Nuljuq nail ildaoq maoqgaiq pheq-ail gil nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail aqgaq aqdoi iqsanl bhoiq jaq gil nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail phul heel iqsanl, haol jaq gil nail ngaol. Haol jaq gil lai nail al neq, nuljuq-i mail nl-a nail oeqbal bhai, cavq naq bhiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, miqjaq poiv nail khe-ai nuljuq nail haqjoil bhai keivq jaq gil nail ngaol. Haoqnao naosaq nail aqn aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq ildaoq maoqgaiq halpov jil nail ngaol.

Naldaiq yaoq. Nuljuq nail daiyal bha gov gaiq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, nuljuq goiqbhaoq bhaoq khi aqphoiq maq bivq-a nail ngel-i mail, aqphoiq al gul thailthaiq nail ngaol. Gov gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail bhai gul gaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq miltsaq kovtavq bhai hulmeeq hulbhao bhao deedee khi, lavqkhiq teevq tsail, neekhaol teevq sil, aqdoevq doevq-a nail ngaol. Bhi heivq nail aqn al n nail haqbhoil nuljuq yovqgavq nail neema bhai yovqgavq tsu tsul-ai thaq nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.
Nuljuq tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal khi heivq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, daoq pov maq pov dai, daq-a nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul lee-u kev dai, ol ol-ail jaol yaoq. Daiyal nl nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq aqphoiq kav deedee nail gov juq kev lee-u phao kev dai, aivq daiyal bhai khalhai daonq nail ganl bhai saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Maoq-aol iqmoeq ilmoeq khe bhoeq aol lee-u nee mail, haoqnao naosaq khe bhoeq aol lee-u kev dai, ol ol-ail daonq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq iqsanl alhai ya ol nail ngaol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul yavq kha lee nail aqn aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngel-i mail, neema ivqdao dai, bhi jiav yaoq.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq Miqyail yalkhaq dal nail bhai maq ya daq nail haqbhoil, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal thaq nail daoq thaq ge. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, yalkhaq dal lee-a nail gaq lolgov aqjail bhai lee kev khi thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail, aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq juq bhai saol oil yaoq. Aqyu juq, haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq ya daq-u phao, aqyu juq oltsaol nail neema aol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq daq jel ol jel nia nail ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq eeq nail tsaol-aq dai, ngadao khul nail ngaol. Yaolbav khalhai ol-a nail ganl khi mail, haoqnao naosaq Miqyail aivq bhai geeqlaoq khalhai bivq-a nail ganl nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail neq, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, teevq peivq-ail thaq khanq. Daoq niil daoq neq, eeq deedee nail daoq ngaol. Nqtavq bhai juq khi thaq khanq, miltsaq bhai juq khi thaq khanq, yaoq phaq yaoq bhai juq khi iqsanl thaq khanq. Nuljuq yalkhaq dal nail phaq bhai maq ya daq dai, nuljuq nail daoq neq, ngel haq neq, ngel naol. Maq ngel haq neq, maq ngel dai taivq-ail, ge yaoq.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq ya daq thailthaiq nail laiq. Geeqlaoq hal dei-eiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav lavqkhiq tsail nail laiq. Miqyail bhai gul gul-ail tsiqeeq dei-eiq.

Nuljuq nail lavqkhoel tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav nal thail goel thailthaiq nail laiq. Aivq neq, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai khul nail tsaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhai juq juq-ail nal nail goel nail al gaq bhai aqtseel leivq bhiq khi mail, aivq nail haqbhoil geeqlaoq hal bhiq nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail lavqkhoel geeqlaoq hal nail phaq neq, nal nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi meeq lai nail ngaol. Yeiqsul aivq bhai jaol hal bhi dov lal khi, aivq oeqbal nl thaq nail jiav haq neq, oeqbal phaiq bhiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq meeq lai nia dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq oeqbal ge dov khi, teevq ga teevq gaq nail haqbhoil, geeqlaoq hal yaoq. Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq-i mail geeqlaoq hal nail daoq neq, aqmeeq phaq bhi dov lal nail bhaqaoq aol nail ngaol.

Eillilya neq, ngadao kheel tsaol-aq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, maoq-aol thaq bhi aol lee-oq dai, geeqlaoq hal deedee-u phao, hail kovq ovqtavq teevq pav bhee dai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai maoq-aol maq aol lee dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Aivq geeqlaoq teevq pov gaoq hal-u phao, nqtavq nee mail maoq-aol gaoq aol lee khi, miltsaq bhai heeqlaoq gaoqjal doevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel teevq gaq ganav, maldil tsaq nail phaq nee mail gail bheeq bheeq ail-u phao, yaoq gaq yaoq-i mail aivq bhai gaoq hevq kol lavq haq neq,

gail bheeq bheeq thailthaiq nail oeqbal yaq al gaq bhai hevq kol lavq-a nail al gaq neq, sil nail lavqkhoel khe aqhaqlal teevq gaq bhai hevqkovq khi, mao-ail eeq nail oeqbal bhai doeqkhaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail Gaqkhoel Bheiqtuvluv ngaol. Gaoq ail gail ail khi, Bhaoqthul milkhaoq, Gaqlaqtil milkhaoq, Gaqbhaqdaolciv milkhaoq, Aqsil-aq milkhaoq khi Bheiqthulnil milkhaoq bhai daq-i jiovq khi jaol ail-a nail Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali nail daoq bhai naldaiq dai maqkhaiq, aivq nail aqsivq nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai hoeldav dai maqkhaiq, iqmoeq-u nee mail Aqbhu Miqyail heeq nia khi noeqceiv-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aivq nail Aqhaqlal-i mail nuljuq bhai bhi meeq bhi haol lal-a nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi mao lal dei-eiq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail Aqbhu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, aivq gaoqhaq gaiq-a nia deedee nail bhaqda nee, Yeiqsul Khali sil khi doevq kovq lal nail ngel-i mail, ngadao bhai doevq yeel aqsivq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngadao aqdoevq doevq nail noeqthunq nail phaq ya-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ngadao Miqyail nail jaiqbhoil ovq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Maq cov-ail nia nail, maq jiiv maq cavq-ail nia nail, maq khuq-ail nia nail jaiqbhoil al bhai Miqyail nuljuq nail haqbhoil nqtavq kovtavq bhai lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, haoqnao naosaq n-gaol phaodaiq lavq nail hevqkovq nail phaq bhai ya nail aqyanq bhai kev dai, Miqyail aivq nail bhaqaoq lavqkhoel nee heldaiq phail lavq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq niil aq-il teevq yanq nail lavqkhoel haq nail aoq nail khi laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.

Heel bhai miqjaq nee tsaotsel daiq nail khe-ai, haq nail aoq nail niil juq, nuljuq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai laonqdaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq-i mail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq neq, peivq-ail boev-ail nia nail heel nee maqtsil aqphoiq phoiq jaiq nail ngaol. Nuljuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, ivqdao dai jiav haq neq, Yeiqsul Khali dov lee-u phao, aivq-i mail tsiqeeq lavq nail bhai maqkhaiq, seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq lavq nail bhai maqkhaiq, thaqeeq thaqheel lavq nail bhai maqkhaiq, ya nail ngaol.

Nuljuq aivq bhai maq moel daiq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq niil aq-il aivq bhai maq ya moel khi ngaol-aoq, aivq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngel-i mail, maq ge gil tsaol nail seiqleiq khaoqsail nee bhee nail lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal neq, nuljuq Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail bhaqda nee, hevqkovq nail phaq ya gaq-ao nail ngaol.

Hevqkovq nail niilniai Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq aqmeeq-ai halpov khi tsaotsel daiq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail nuljuq bhai geeqlaoq eeljaol bivq-a nail ganl, milnee uqnee nee aqyu juq daoq cavq cavq-a nail ngaol.

Khali ya haq ya aoq khi, yaqhao aivq seiqleiq khaoqsail ya nail ngaol dai, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail Khali nail Aqhaqlal aqyu juq bhai bhi heeq nia-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, khul yanq bhai khalhai pevq lal nail bhai heeq nia dai, tsaotsel-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq ganl al gedan-u phao, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil yovqgavq ganl nl nail maq ngel-ail. Nuljuq nail haqbhoil nl nail ngaol dai, Miqyail aqyu juq bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq-i mail gedan-a nail ganl al, niil aq-il, nqtavq nee mail bhi lee-a nail Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee, gaqkhoel juq nuljuq bhai cavq lavq-a nail ngaol. Cavq lavq-a nail al neq, lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl, al juq bhai moel movq deedee nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, neema lavqkhoel bhai aqmeeq-ai lainq khi, neema bhai gaq lai dai doevq yaoq. Yeiqsul Khali dov lee-u phao, aivq-i mail nuljuq bhai bivq lavq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai aqmeeq-ai noeqthunq yaoq.

Aq-u phao, nuljuq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, yovqgavq nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol nee doevq-a nail ngaol. Niil aq-il alhai thaq gaoq doevq. Daoq naldaiq nail yaq khe-ai doevq yaoq.
Nuljuq bhai khul-a nail Miqyail meeq nail haol nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl aqmeeq aqhaol haol dai doevq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal neq,
“Ngal aqmeeq aqhaol ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl ya meeq ya haol nail ngaol” dai,
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq geeqlaoq hal-u phao, Miqyail bhai “Aqbhu-ol” dai, khul nail ngaol. Aivq neq, maivphaoq eeq nil maq tsel-ail, teevq gaq khai-aq teevq gaq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail bhai heldaiq khi dal bhiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq miltsaq kovtavq bhai daq-i jiovq-u phao, aivq bhai ev ev-ail doevq yaoq.

Aqphiq aqbhal juq-i mail thaoq khal leevq-a nail aol juq bhai ya jel-ail dai, aivq nuljuq bhai ul kovq lavq-a nail ngaol. Peivq-ail boev-ail nia nail phul heel bhai juq khi ul kovq lavq-a nail maq ngel-ail dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail Khali nail aqsivq-i mail ul kovq lavq-a nail ngaol. Khali neq, malbavq maq daol nail nee ovqtavq, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol nail yaolyaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aivq alhai pevq lal dai, miltsaq maq teivq-u nee mail Miqyail aivq bhai tsel dov-ai thaq nail ngaol. Haoqnao naosaq khe aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel-ai, Miqyail aivq bhai nuljuq nail haqbhoil bhi dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Khali bhaqda nee nuljuq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol. Miqyail aivq bhai bhi doevq kovq lal khi, seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq Miqyail bhai neema thaqtsaol khi noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai naldaiq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai maldil gaiq-a kivq dai, nuljuq nail neema meeq lal haol lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neema lavqkhoel bhai kev dai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq.

Nuljuq neq, aqsivq doevq phal lal-aoq nail ngaol. Luq-ail seil-ail nia nail tsaol-aq bhaqda nee doevq phal lal-a nail maq ngel-ail. Maq luq maq seil-ail nia nail Miqyail nail daoq bhaqda nee doevq phal lal-a nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq, doevq khi ivq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
“Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail
moeqgaq khe-ai
dul nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail
khaoqsail iqsanl
moeqgaq aqeiv khe-ai
dul nail ngaol.
Moeqgaq neq,
khuq-ail kov-ail khi,
aqeiv iqsanl
ga kha ail nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
Miqyail nail
daoq neq,
nqmaq maqluv
halyeel ivq nail ngaol” dai,
ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Daoq al daoq neq, nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq-a nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq al daoq ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, yu bhai khoeq lai dai nl movq nail, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail, maq ngel nail bhai ngel nail khe-ai jiovq nail, yu bhai maivjeel jeel nail khi, haoqnao phao nee khal ge movq-ail ge nail, niil juq iqsanl bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq yaoq.

Yaqbeiv aqtsil cuvq movq nail neema aol nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl aqhaqlal phao khe maljiaov deel aqtsil cuvq movq nail neema aol yaoq. Nuljuq aqtsil al cuvq haq neq, hevqkovq nail lavqkhoel eeq lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq neq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail aqmeeq phaq bhai ya mevqdaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul jaol nail bha lal yaoq. Aivq neq, aqdoevq doevq nail lovmav ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq aivq bhai bavq ha khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aivq bhai tsel dov khi, aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail lovmav ngaol dai, saol-nvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl, aqdoevq doevq nail lovmav ngaol. Miqyail nuljuq bhai oil khi, aqhaqlal phao khe uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol cov nia dai, yovqgavq nail aqmaol Miqyail bhai av bhiq yaoq. Al ovqtavq, aqhaqlal phao laol bhiq nail phaq laol bhiq nia dai, nuljuq meeq nail haol nail Philyaq juq pevq lal nail ngaol. Nuljuq Yeiqsul Khali bhai juq khi laol bhiq haq neq, laol bhiq-a nail al juq bhai Miqyail hav bhoel nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“Heldaiq dei-eiq.
Ngaq-i mail
tsel dov-ai thaq nail,
aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail
ilkhaol nail jioivqloiv bhai
kaovq-ai thaq nail
lovmav heeq ma
Yeel-ovq gaoqjaoq bhai
ngal kaovq-ao nail ngaol.
Lovmav al bhai neema
khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq,
maq ya haqsil-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil, lovmav al heeq neq, aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil, Jalliq lavqkhoel-ai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Ilkhaol cov nail
tsaol-aq-i mail
bavq ha-a nail
lovmav al heeq,
jioivqloiv bhai
kaovq-ai thaq nail
aqphoiq phoiq
deedee nail lovmav
pevq lal-a nail ngaol”.
Al ovqtavq,
“Tsaol-aq phaqthiq
bhi thiq khi,
bhi bavq tsuq-ail nail
lovmav iqsanl
ngel nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Miqyail nail daoq maq naldaiq nail ngel-i mail, phaqthiq thiq khi bavq tsuq ail-a nail ngaol. Niailhai pevq lal nail ngaol dai, milnee uqnee nee Miqyail ge-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq neq, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-a nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol. Heeqphaq Miqyail nail Philyaq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol. Meeq nail haol nail milkhaoq yaq pevq khi, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq maldil pevq nail ngaol. Miqyail-i mail nl-a nail mao-ail meeq nail ganl yu bhai cavq bhiq nail haqbhoil, nuljuq alhai pevq nail ngaol. Aivq nuljuq bhai, aqnav nail lavqkhoel nee noeq-u maq dov nail aivq nail aqbhaq lavqkhoel bhai khul bhoel-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, aq-u phao aqmil maq jiav nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq neq, aq-u phao gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail geeqlaoq bhai maq ya haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, ya-aoq nail ngaol.

Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai daq-i jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq nail aqhaqlal bhai genl dev nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol khaonq ha-ail ceevq yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai gaq bhiq movq-ail nial.

Nuljuq laolkivq yaq nail sivtavq bhai aqmeeq phaq nl nl-ail doevq yaoq. Alhai doevq haq neq, aqyu juq nuljuq bhai, haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq niil dai, oeqbal thaq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq aqmeeq phaq nl nl-ail doevq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail dov lee-u n-gaol, aqyu juq aivq bhai tsiqeeq nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhaqda nee, heeqphaq juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Milkhaoq iqsanl bhai uvthaiq nail heeqphaq Gailsaq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq.

Gailsaq nail kov-uvq bhai ganl nl nail yovkav juq nail kov-uvq bhai iqsanl aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq bhai dal bhiq khi, aqmeeq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq juq bhai bhi tsiqeeq nail haqbhoil, Gailsaq-i mail aqyu juq bhai khoel-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq aqmeeq phaq bhaqda nee, khul maq heeq nail yaqjaoq khaqlal miqthoi nail moeqthaoq bhai pheethaiq nail haqbhoil, Miqyail neema tsaq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, jel ail-a nail al bhai juq khi, haqeiv nail phaq thaq gaoq nl. Jel ail-a nail al neq, Miqyail nail yaqkav jiovq nail haqbhoil jel ail-a nail ngaol.
Tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai ev yaoq. Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq bhai gaiq-a yaoq. Miqyail bhai geesil yaoq. Gailsaq bhai ev yaoq.

Yaqkav juq-ol, nuljuq nail ilheel bhai ev khi aqyu juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Neema meeq khi neenuq neebeiv aol nail ilheel juq nail kov-uvq bhai taivq-ail maq ngel nail. Haqeiv nail ilheel juq nail kov-uvq bhai iqsanl, aqmeeq-ai ev khi jaol yaoq.

Nuljuq Miqyail nail neema tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia nail lavqkhoel, maq ngel nail bhai kev dai, khoeq lavq jiovq lavq-u phao, daq jel ol jel haq neq, al nail haqbhoil Miqyail nuljuq bhai geeqlaoq bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq laiq nail tsa nail phaq nl nail bhaqda nee, yu deeq lal kov lal-u phao, ol khi ngaol-aoq, khul tsiqeeq nail phaq jiav nail-aiq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqmeeq phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, ya daq-u phao, ol haq neq, Miqyail nuljuq bhai geeqlaoq bivq lavq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq alhai ya daq dai, Miqyail khul-a nail ngaol. Khali iqsanl, nuljuq nail haqbhoil daq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq aivq bhai bhi saol oil khi, aivq nail aqkhil phaqyal nail haoqnao bhi tsaothe nail dai khi, aivq alhai nl-a nail ngaol.
“Aivq neq,
oeqbal maq nl daiq-al.
Aivq nail moeqthaoq
lavqkhoel-ai
goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail daoq
maq dov lal daiq-al” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yu aivq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge khi ngaol-aoq, aivq yu bhai khal ge movq-ail maq ge kovq bhiq daiq-al. Aivq ya khanq ya daq-u phao, yu bhai maq lav geesil-al. Aqtsaq aqdaol daol dai yalkhaq dal nail Miqyail nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nail aqmaol av bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq lavqyavq kovtavq bhai khanqsil-u phao, aivq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel-ai ngadao nail oeqbal phi-nq thaq nail ngaol. Ngadao yovqgavq nail oeqbal bhai yovqgavq sil ceiv khi, tsaq nail daol nail haqbhoil ya doevq dai, aivq khanqsil-a nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nal-a nail malkhoeq bhaqda nee, nuljuq meeq lai-a nail ngaol.

Nuljuq neq, aq-u phao gail bheeq bheeq khi peivq ail-a nail yaol khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail aqhaqlal bhai heldaiq phail nail yaol bhai lovqphail nail gaq jaol nail bha niil aq-il nuljuq kovq lal-aoq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, khaqma juq-ol. Yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai jaol yaoq. Alhai nl nail bhaqda nee, yaqyov-aq teevq pav ganav juq Miqyail nail daoq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq Miqyail bhai ev khi aqsee aqdaol daol dai doevq nail bhai aqyu juq ya moel haq neq, nuljuq khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq cavq khi ngaol-aoq, nuljuq alhai doevq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq neema thaqtsaol lal nia nail ngaol.
Tsailkheel al jaiq jel dai lav sav nail, phul heel al jaiq jel dai goe nail, aqgaq aqdoi doi nail, alhai aqmaol nail lavqniil phao heldaiq meeq lal dai, thaq lav sav.

Nuljuq nail aqmaol heldaiq meeq lal dai, neema lavqkhoel phao niailhai lav sav yaoq. Neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, neema aqmeeq phaq aol yaoq. Alhai heldaiq meeq lal dai lav sav nail phaq neq, maq cov-ail nia nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee nee Miqyail bhai ev nail yaqmai-aq juq iqsanl, aivq bhai noeqthunq khi yovqgavq nail aqmaol heldaiq meeq lal dai, alhai lav sav-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yovqgavq nail yovjil nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol-a nail ngaol.

Saqlal neq, Aqbhaqlaqhaq nail kov-u bhai jaol khi, aivq bhai heeqphaq dai, khul-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq aqmeeq phaq nl nail nee ovqtavq, geesil nail neema maq aol haq neq, Saqlal nail yaqmiq khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, yaqyov-aq juq-ol, yovqgavq nail khaqma nee mail jaol-u phao, aivq nail haqbhoil saol-nvq bhiq nail neema aol yaoq. Aivq naoq-ai nee maqtsil gaq bhaq khi ngaol-aoq, naoq-ai nee mail aqdoevq bhi doevq nail kovpavq ya-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai ev bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nuljuq geeqlaoq hal nail bhai lav tsoiq nail phaq maq jiav-ail.

Haoqnao naosaq niailhai ge movq-ail nial. Nuljuq iqsanl neema teevq heeq bhai tavq yaoq. Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaoqhaq yaoq. Aqivq jaqbheq nail gaiqlaq bhai gaiq-a nail khe-ai gaiq-a yaoq. Neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi, aqmeeq phaq nl movq nail neema bhi aol yaoq.

Yu haqeiv nail phaq nl lal khi ngaol-aoq, haqeiv nail phaq thaq nl kovq bhiq. Yu khal ge movq-ail ge lal khi ngaol-aoq, khal ge movq-ail thaq ge kovq bhiq. Aqyu juq bhai geeqlaoq bivq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nuljuq geeqlaoq ya dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul-a nail ngaol.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Aqdoevq doevq movq nail
neema aol khi
aqn aqmeeq bhai
moel movq nail tsaol-aq,
yovqgavq nail moeqlal
haqeiv nail daoq thaq ge,
yovqgavq nail
moeqthaoq iqsanl,
goiqbhaoq thaq bhaoq.
Haqeiv nail phaq bhai
gail jao jao khi,
aqmeeq phaq nl yaoq.
Tsaq lai jil lai nail
phaq bhai halpov khi,
al nail haoqnao tsaothe yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
Heeqphaq Miqyail neq,
tsaq nail daol nail
tsaol-aq bhai
heldaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Aivq aqyu juq nail
hal daoq bhai
gaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
haqeiv nail phaq
khal nl nail tsaol-aq bhai
Miqyail maq heldaiq
tsaoq-ail” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq laijai laijai-ail aqmeeq phaq nl haq neq, khaq sil gaq nuljuq bhai lav tsoiq lal nia nail-aiq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqtsaq aqdaol daol dai nl-a nail bhaqda nee, nuljuq yaq daq haq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai khoeq lal jiovq lal nail tsaol-aq juq bhai thaq geesil. Thaq tsaoq deel-nq-ail.

Khali neq, Heeqphaq ngaol dai, yovqgavq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai yovqgavq saol-nvq khi, aivq bhai ev yaoq. Nuljuq-i mail noeqthunq-ai thaq nail ganl bhai yu naldaiq lal haq neq, khalhai ya ge kovq bhiq nail dai, khaq mao iqsanl aqmeeq-ai lainq-ai thaq yaoq.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neema neenuq neebeiv aol khi ev nail lavqkhoel nee ge kovq bhiq yaoq. Nuljuq nail heeq nia nail neema aqhaol haol dai, bhi jiav yaoq. Alhai bhi jiav haq neq, Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq aqmeeq phaq nl nail bhai ge doil nail tsaol-aq juq, yovqgavq nail daoq bhai yovqgavq ya haqsil nail ngaol.
Miqyail neema tsaq haq neq, aqmeeq phaq nl nail ngel-i mail, ya daq-a nail neq, haqeiv nail phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail ya daq-a nail nee maqtsil, meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil Khali teevq pov khanq sil-a nail ngaol. Ngadao bhai Miqyail jaol nail bha hevq kol laivq kivq dai, tsaq nail daol nail al gaq, maq tsaq maq daol nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil khanqsil-a nail ngaol. Aivq sil khi ngaol-aoq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail bhaqda nee doevq kovq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee ail khi, thaonq bhai laol-ai thaq nail aqhaqlal juq bhai daoq cavq daoq cov cov ail-a nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal al juq neq, Nol-avq nail yeel bhai Miqyail nail daoq bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq nail aqhaqlal ngaol. Nol-avq laovq laovq ma lav sav thailthaiq-u phao, aqyu juq Miqyail nail daoq bhai neema thaqtsaol lal dai, Miqyail ol ol-ail daonq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol lal-al. Tsaol-aq eivq gaq taivq-ail ulcuvq lavqkhoel nee ya jel ail-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, niil aq-il, ulcuvq saol nail phaq nuljuq bhai bhi jel-ail lavq nail ngaol. Ulcuvq saol nail dai ge nail neq, aqmaol bhai leivq nail aqjiivq aqcavq phaq bhai tsiqhaol nail bhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Yeiqsul Khali doevq kovq lal-a nail ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai heeq nia nail neema haol lal nail bhai ge nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai dav lai khi, Miqyail nail lavqmal phao jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel maqkhaiq, uvthaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq eeq nail juq maqkhaiq, aivq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Khali aivq nail aqmaol lavqkhoel bhai haq nail aoq nail phaq ya daq-u phao, aivq neema thaq nia-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl thaq yaoq. Yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai haq nail aoq nail phaq ya daq-a nail tsaol-aq, oeqbal bhai gaoqceiv ceiv-a nail ngaol.
Alhai gaoqceiv ceiv-a nail tsaol-aq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqdoevq doevq-u phao, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol haoqnao maq doevq mail, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, doevq nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee nuljuq iqsanl laol kivq yaq nl nail khe-ai, nl-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nuljuq iqsanl maq nl maq hal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq nl-a hal-a nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol lavqkhoel nee, khaqmiq sev nail phaq nl khi, jilpheeq daol bov nail, maq meeq maq haol nail lavqkhoel nee bhaoqaiq lav sav nail, al jaiq jaq jel daol jel nail, al juq nl daiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, maq heldaiq nul nail thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq daiq-a nail ngaol. Al juq thaq gaoq nl.
Aqyu juq alhai haqeiv nail mee nia phaq nl nail haoqnao niil aq-il nuljuq maq tsaothe-aoq nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, nuljuq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yalkhaq dal nail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai aqyu juq yovqgavq nail ganl yovqgavq ya ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol. Yalkhaq dal nail al gaq, aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, yalkhaq dal nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqsivq haqjoil phi khi, aqdoevq doevq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai, aqyu juq yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq khi ngaol-aoq, Miqyail doevq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq aqhaqlal phao ya doevq dai, cavq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee haoqnao naosaq nail aqjail jail lal-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, geeqlaoq aqmeeq-ai hal kivq dai, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai khi, aqgeel geel dai ya bhi jiav nail ngaol.

Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a deedee yaoq. Daoq niil daoq neq, eeq deedee nail daoq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, mao-ail mao nail oeqbal bhai doeqkhaiq-ai thaq nia nail ngaol.
Teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, daoq govq maq daoq dai, daq-i bhai aqmeeq-ai hav yaoq.

Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqhaqlal phao khe kovpavq ya-a nail khe-ai, teevq ga nee teevq gaq nail haqbhoil yuq yaoq. Alhai yuq haq neq, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol mee nia phaq bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail nail tsaol-aq pevq nail ngaol.

Yu bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail-i mail bhi cavq bhi cov lavq nail khe-ai cavq yaoq. Yu bhai tsaojao-ai nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail gaq bivq lavq nail khe-ai, tsaojao-ai bhiq yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel, yu Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq lal nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali nail kovtavq-ai seiqleiq khaoqsail khi bhaqaoq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.
Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq laonqdaiq lal-u phao, noeq maq dov dai, thaq pevq-ail. Al neq, noeq-u maq dov heeq phaq-ail pevq nail phaq maq ngel-ail.

Khali ya daq-a nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl ya daq-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Alhai lavqkhiq tsail haq neq, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaq dol leevq-u phao, nuljuq a dai nee maqtsil lavqkhiq ya tsail nail ngaol.

Khali nail aqmil bhaqda nee yu nuljuq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge lal haq neq, nuljuq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail Miqyail nail Aqhaqlal nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Yu bhai lav heivq nail, yu nail nlmaoq khoiq nail, haqeiv nail phaq nl nail, yu bhai suqsaq nail, niil juq bhaqda nee nuljuq teevq gaq-ail ya daq nail phaq, thaq bhi pevq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq teevq gaq ganav Khali yaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, ya daq-a nail phal-iq neq, thaq haqsil. Khali nail aqmil bhaqda nee Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq yaoq.

Miqyail iqmoeq ilmoeq yalkhaq dal nail aqyanq kev lee-aiq nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail yaq juq bhai iqmoeq yalkhaq dal nail ngaol. Aivq ngadao bhai iqmoeq yalkhaq dal haq neq, Miqyail nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq bhai maq naldaiq nail tsaol-aq nail haqbhoil, haoqnao naosaq-u phao khalhai pevq lal nail-aiq.
Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khe-ai,
“Tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq
hevqkovq nail phaq
ya nail haq-a neq,
Miqyail bhai maq ev nail
oeqbal yaq juq khalhai khi
jel-ail nia nail-aiq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai ya daq nail tsaol-aq, nuljuq bhai teivq khi saljial ivq nail gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai yovqgavq nail aqmaol av bhiq khi, aqmeeq phaq nl dal laivq yaoq.

Ngal nuljuq Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq aqtsu juq bhai hal movq-ail nial. Ngal iqsanl, nuljuq khe-ai Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq teevq gaq ngaol. Khali ya daq deedee-a nail bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao khe dov lee nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai ngal iqsanl ya nail ngaol.

Nuljuq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail Miqyail nail yaol mavqmav bhai aqmeeq-ai heldaiq phail yaoq. Maq heldaiq phail mail khul maq khi kivq nail ngel-i mail, heldaiq phail nail phaq thaq bhi pevq. Miqyail nail ganl nl nail khe-ai, lavqkhiq teevq tsail heldaiq phail yaoq. Phul heel ya lal nail gal duq taivq-ail maq ngel-ail dai, noeq khi neema lavqkhoel nee nl nail phaq bhi pevq yaoq.
Naoq nail yaol mavqmav nail kovtavq bhai naoq nail alyaq yuq khi thaq uvthaiq. Yaol mavqmav saol oil duq jiav dai, nl daiq hal daiq bhiq yaoq.

Alhai nl haq neq, yaol lovq juq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai heldaiq phail nail gaq dov lee-u phao, seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav nail heel uqtsaoq nuljuq ya nail ngaol. Heel uqtsaoq al tsaoq neq, maq khuq maq kov-ail nia-ail.

Alhai dul dai, yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq-ol, joiqmaoq mavmaoq juq nail kov-uvq bhai aqmeeq-ai jaol yaoq. Nuljuq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee teevq gaq nail kov-uvq bhai teevq gaq yaqkav khe-ai, thaqtheq nail neema aol yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq,
“Miqyail neema eeq nail
heel nail tsaol-aq bhai
lav tsoiq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
neema thaqtheq nail
juq bhai neq,
geeqlaoq eeljaol
bivq nail ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyanq tsaq lal-u phao, Miqyail nuljuq bhai thaqeeq thaqheel lavq nail haqbhoil, aivq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail aqlavq kov-uvq bhai neema thaqtheq khi jaol yaoq.
Miqyail nuljuq nail haqbhoil saol-nvq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq-i khaoqlaol nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aivq bhai av bhiq yaoq.
Yaolphaol khi aqgeel geel dai jaol yaoq. Nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail neivq heeqphaq neq, geeq nail allaqjaqsil khe-ai, nuljuq bhai keivq heivq jaq nail dai khi, jaoq jaoq-ai halpov nail ngaol.

Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ivq nail lavqkhoel nee, aivq bhai lav tsoiq yaoq. Miltsaq kovtavq-ai jaol nail nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq iqsanl niailhai ya daq thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Geeqlaoq eeljaol teevq bhee aol nail Miqyail Khali bhai juq khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai aol lai kivq dai, nuljuq bhai khul-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq teevq yanq taivq-ail ya daq gaq haq neq, aivq nuljuq bhai bhi bhee lal, bhi ivq lal khi, gaq bivq kovq lavq nail ngaol.
Miqyail neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel bhaqaoq jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Saljial ivq nail ngaol dai, ngaq-i mail saol-nvq-ai thaq nail aqivq jaqbheq Siqlav bhai juq khi, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq davqnil nil dai, gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq bhai gaq bivq khi, nuljuq-i mail hav bhoel gaq-a nail geeqlaoq eeljaol al, maldil Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol ngaol dai, salkhil khanq nail dai khi, haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq eeljaol al nail lavqkhoel bhai ivqdao dai, jaol yaoq.

Miqyail nuljuq bhai tsel dov-a nail khe-ai, tsel dov-ai thaq nail Bhaqbhulloq meenq bhai jaol nail munl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq nail yaqyov Maqkul iqsanl, nuljuq bhai noeq moel naol dai, daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel nee, aqlavq he yaoq. Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai neesal-ovq nail phaq jiav dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav khi mail gaqkhoel pevq nail Silmoq Bheiqtuvluv ngaol. Miqyail khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail, Yeiqsul Khali nail tsaq nail daol nail phaq bhaqda nee, nvjuq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq khe-ai dul nail aqphoiq kav deedee nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq ya-ai thaq nail nuljuq jaol nail bha haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail khi mail ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul bhai nuljuq heeq nia nail phaq bhaqda nee, geeqlaoq eeljaol khi mail neesal-ovq nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai mao lal dei-eiq.

Aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi meeq dee bhee deedee nail phaq bhai juq khi ngadao bhai khul-a nail Miqyail bhai ngadao heeq kivq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai ev khi doevq kivq nail haqbhoil, ngadao loq nail phaq iqsanl mail, aivq nail eeq deedee nail bhaqaoq ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, aqphoiq kav khi eeq deedee nail aivq nail saljial juq ngadao bhai bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol bhaqda nee miltsaq kovtavq bhai luq-ail seil-ail nail phaq jiav lal-a nail ngaol. Saljial al juq bhaqda nee, luq-ail seil-ail nail phaq bhai nuljuq ya jel-ail khi, Miqyail neema thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq iqsanl mail thaq nia lal nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai, aqmeeq phaq nl nail bhi mao lal yaoq. Aqmeeq phaq nl nail bhai neenoeq neekha bhi mao lal yaoq.

Neenoeq neekha bhai, yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nia nail phaq bhi mao lal yaoq. Yovqgavq nail neema bhai gaq lai nail phaq bhai, oltsaol nail phaq bhi maol lal yaoq. Oltsaol nail phaq bhai, Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq bhi mao lal yaoq.

Miqyail bhai ev nail phaq bhai, aqivq jaqbheq bhai gaiq-a nail phaq bhi mao lal yaoq. Aqivq jaqbheq bhai gaiq-a nail phaq bhai, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhi mao lal yaoq. Al juq nail haqbhoil, laijai deedee yaoq.

Niil juq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail nee ovqtavq, mao lal thailthaiq haq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhai heeq nia nail lavqkhoel, nuljuq ganl tsoiq nail tsaol-aq pevq lal khi, aqheeq maodai heeq lee nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil juq maq aol nail tsaol-aq neq, maivneev maq moel haol nia nail tsaol-aq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Jel lal-u phao, aqyu juq-i mail nl-a nail oeqbal juq bhai tsiqhaol bhiq-a nail phaq bhai iqsanl, nioil peivq gil-a nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, Miqyail nuljuq bhai khul khi tsel dov-a nail phaq bhai ivq lal dai, laijai deedee yaoq. Alhai nl haq neq, nuljuq teevq thal-iq maq gaq tsuq-ail.

Alhai dul dai, ngadao nail Heeqphaq khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail aivq nail Milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai, aivq nuljuq bhai lavqkhiq teevq tsail hav bhoel lavq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ganl niil juq bhai nuljuq heeq nia gil khi, yovqgavq-i mail ya-ai thaq nail maldil tsaq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nuljuq ivqdao dai jaol khi ngaol-aoq, ganl niil juq nuljuq bhai khaq mao iqsanl ge noeq bhiq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq ganl al juq bhai maq ya nioil peivq-ail dai, ngal khal doevq-u kev dai, nuljuq bhai ge noeq bhiq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol dai, noeq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali ngaq bhai bhaqlaoq kheq dai phaodaiq lavq-a nail khe-ai, maq maoq lal mail, ngaq nail aqmaol niilniai ya khaonq ha-ail ceevq nail ngaol dai, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Ngal miltsaq kovtavq bhai maq jaol dai, pevq ail-u phao, nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl ganl al juq bhai noeq kev nia dai, niil aq-il, ngal laijai thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail bhaqaoq nail ganl khi mail aivq yavq kha lee nail ganl, nvjuq nuljuq bhai ge daiq bhiq-u phao, yu nail neenoeq neekha bhai juq khi ge dov-a nail ganqje maq ngel-ail. Nvjuq neq, aivq nail eeq dee heel deedee nail bhaqaoq bhai maivneev nee mail ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel bhiq khi seiqleiq khaoqsail bivq-a nail bhai nvjuq ya moel-a nail ngaol. “Tsaol-aq niil gaq neq, ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail ngaq nail Yaqyov ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai neekhaol sil deedee naol” dai, aivq bhai ge bhiq-a nail seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee aol nail eeq nail heel nail gaq nail aqthel bhai, nvjuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Nvjuq aivq nee mail meeq nail haol nail gaoqjaoq kovtavq bhai jaol-u phao, nqtavq nee mail daoq al daoq alhai meel dov-ai leevq-a nail bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nvjuq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nail daoq bhai, neema thaqtsaol jaiq lal-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq iqsanl, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel nqbhaq bhaq lal khi, nqhao khe aqbhaq bhaq deedee nail aqgil maq dov lal-u phao kev dai, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhaq nail phalmanq bhai juq nail khe-ai, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al juq nail daoq bhai aqmeeq-ail naldaiq yaoq.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-i mail Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq khul daoq maqkhaiq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq noeq dov nia nail maq ngel-ail dai, iqmoeq heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq noeq dov khi ge nail maq ngel-ail. Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal aqyu juq bhai bhi noeq dov-a nail khe-ai, aqyu juq Miqyail nail daoq ge nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee khe, Yuldav tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail juq dov lal daiq-a nail ngaol. Alhai dul dai, niil aq-il, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl, maldil maq ngel nail saqlaq juq dov lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yu bhai luq-ail seil-ail nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq oil bhoel khoiq lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqyu juq bhai ul kovq bhiq-a nail Heeqphaq bhai khaonq ha-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqtsail mail luq-ail seil-ail dai, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq nl nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq haqeiv nail phaq nl nail haoqnao tsaol-aq maodai tsaothel-aivq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai nl nail bhaqda nee, maldil tsaq nail gailkhaol bhai yu ge doil nail ngaol.

Maq ngel nail saqlaq al juq, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai maivjeel jeel nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil jail jeq aol dai, nuljuq bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq lal nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aq-u nee mail Miqyail aqyu juq bhai dalceiv-ai thaq nail al neq, aqnieivq-ail maq pevq-ail nia-ail. Aqyu juq maldil ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, oeqbal nl-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai iqsanl Miqyail maq phaiq-ail. Aqyu juq bhai daqovq laoma bhai bavq bhoel khi, yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol kev dai, navtsee deel aqduq bhai hailcav-i mail pheethaiq khi laol-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee khe tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl, Miqyail maq phaiq-ail. Aivq bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq bhai ulcuvq-i mail bhi deq pheeq heivq gil-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaq nail daol nail ganl daoq cavq daoq cov cov-a nail Nol-avq khi mail tsaol-aq sivq gaq bhai Miqyail bhi jel ail-a nail ngaol.

Saoldoq meenq khi mail Gaolmaollav meenq iqsanl, Miqyail miqjaq-i mail bhi poiv heivq gil-a nail ngaol. Yaqhao aivq bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq juq bhi saol oil nail dai khi, aivq alhai yalkhaq dal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol meeq tsaol haol Laoltavq bhai aivq bhi jel ail-a nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail tsaol-aq al juq aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nail aol thaoq nail ngel-i mail, Laoltavq noeqhaq deedee nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol meeq tsaol haol al gaq, aqyu juq nee mail jaol-u phao, aqyu juq nl thail hal thailthaiq nail haqeiv nail phaq bhai ya gaiq ya moel nail ngel-i mail, yaoq n yaoq n nee aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai maq khanqtsaol-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq laonqdaiq nail phaq bhai ya daq-u phao, aqyu juq bhai khalhai ya bhi jel-ail nail dai, Miqyail heeq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol kev dai, aivq haqeiv nail tsaol-aq bhai bhi jaol khi khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqjiivq aqcavq cavq nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neenoeq haoqnao tsaothe khi, Miqyail uvthaiq nail phaq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail juq bhai neq, yu nee maqtsil khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Maq ngel nail saqlaq al juq neq, geesil nail neema maq aol dai, yovqgavq nail neema khal noeq nail khe-ai, nl nail ngaol. Nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail bhaqaoq eeq nail juq bhai iqsanl, khal ge movq-ail ge tseq nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel juq neq, aqyu juq nee maqtsil gaq bhee jaiq khi, bhaqaoq eeq jaiq nail juq pevq khi ngaol-aoq, Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai, nqtavq khi miltsaq nail gaiqlaq bhai jaol nail juq bhai khal ge movq-ail maq ge nail nee ovqtavq, oeqbal maq thaq-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, maq ngel nail saqlaq al juq neq, maq heeq nia nail phaq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge doil nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, nieivq khi bhi deeq heivq jaq nail haqbhoil doevq lee-a nail khul maq saol-nvq nia dai, nl nail hal nail jaiqyaq khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Haqtsoiq jaiqyaq bhai lav cov nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl, ya daq nail ngaol.

Maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq nl nail bhaqda nee, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq ya daq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, n-gaol phao iqsanl aljaiq jaq bov daol bov nail bhai lavqkhiq tsail deedee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nuljuq nee mail jaq tavq daol tavq-u phao, haqeiv nail phaq bhai neekhaol teevq sil nl nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, nuljuq bhai bhi niaoq lal nail malyal khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail maivneev neq, yu nee mail bheeq movq nail neema aol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, teevq thal-iq oeqbal nl bov nail maq bhao-ail. Aqyu juq neq, neema maq ivq nail tsaol-aq bhai jalmul mul nail nee ovqtavq, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhai maivjeel jeel deedee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail-i mail iqkhail yavq nail bhai ya daq nail juq ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, gailkhaol aqdaol khaol bhai khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, gail bheeq bheeq ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Bhaolsaoq nail yaqyov Bhaqlaq nail aqkhil phaqyal haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ngaol. Bhaqlaq neq, maq tsaq maq daol nail yalgaq aqphoiq ya movq deedee-ai bhiq nail ngaol.

Aivq nail oeqbal bhaqda nee, khaq khaq-ail cavq nail cov nail bhai ya daq-a nail ngaol. Daoq maq ge nia nail aivq nail moeqphaq laljieiv tsaol-aq khe-ai, daoq ge dol lavq khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq pevq nail Bhaqlaq-i mail naiquq khe-ai, nl nail phaq bhai lav naq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, tsil lai-a nail ulcuvq laolbev khi mail, lilmoel lil ma-i mail bhi oil jal-aivq-a nail nqdil khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail haqbhoil navtsee deel jaol duq Miqyail lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq neq, khul teevq phaq-ail ganl maq tsoiq nail khaoqsail he nail daoq ge nail ngaol. Aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol teevq sil aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl nail bhai juq khi, gail bheeq bheeq nail tsaol-aq lavqkhoel nee dov lal nail dai khi, laijai thailthaiq nail juq bhai jalmul mul nail ngaol.

“Nuljuq yu nail yaqkav maq ya jiovq-ail” dai, ge bhiq khi ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq neq, oeqbal nail kov-uvq bhai yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, tsaol-aq bhai gaq lai nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq neq, al phaq nail yaqkav jiovq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq neq, ngadao nail Heeqphaq khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq Yeiqsul Khali bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq khe aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nee, ya jel ail-a nail ngaol. Ya jel-ail khi ngaol-aoq, aqjiivq aqcavq nail lavqkhoel bhai gaoq aol-ail khi, gaoq bhi gaq lai haq neq, iqmoeq-u nee maqtsil haoqnao naosaq neq, doil jaiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, tsaq nail daol nail gailkhaol bhai heeq nia khi ngaol-aoq, khaonq ha-ail ceevq khi, aqyu juq bhai bivq-ai thaq nail meeq nail haol nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai iqsanl khaonq ha-ail ceevq haq neq, tsaq nail daol nail gailkhaol bhai heeq nia-a nail nee maqtsil, maq heeq nia nail neq, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil meeq jaiq nail ngaol.

“Kheeq neq, aivq nail aoqpeivq bhai aivq gaoq jaq kovq nail ngaol” dai, daoq daq daq nail daoq khi mail, “Wavq bhai aqmaol bhi jiivq khi ngaol-aoq, niaoq lao gaoq lao ail nail ngaol” dai, ge nail daoq daq daq nail daoq al daoq neq, aqyu juq nail haqbhoil tsaq deedee nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail haoqgavq niil keiv neq, nvq keiv teevq keiv ngaol. Nuljuq aqmeeq-ai saol-nvq nia dai, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil nvq keiv gevq bhoel-ai leevq khi, ge noeq bhiq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail meeq nail haol nail juq-i mail aq-u nee, gedan-ai thaq nail daoq bhai thaq nioil peivq dei-eiq. Heeqphaq khi mail Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul neq, nuljuq bhai cavq nail gaqkhoel juq bhai juq khi, bivq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai iqsanl thaq nioil peivq dei-eiq.

Haoqnao naosaq khe aqn aqyanq niil nail lavqkhoel, yovqgavq nail aqsivq haqjoil neekhaol nail haoqnao tsaothe khi khal ge movq-ail ge nail tsaol-aq juq dov lal nail ngaol dai, nuljuq iqmoeq heeq kivq nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq niailhai naldaiq lal nail ngaol: “ ‘Ngal yavq kha lee naol’ dai, Yeiqsul-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail al khaq bha peivq gil ail-aoq thaq nail-aiq. Ngadao nail aqphiq aqbhal juq iqsanl sil gil-aoq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq teivq-u n-gaol nee mail yanqgaol kev dai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee maq phal lal-a nail maq ngel-ail laiq” dai, ge lal nail ngaol.

Milnee uqnee nee mail Miqyail nail daoq bhaqda nee nqtavq jiav lal-a nail bhai, aqyu juq nioil peivq movq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nail daoq bhaqda nee, ulcuvq nee mail miltsaq dov lal khi, ulcuvq bhaqda nee miltsaq pevq lal-a nail ganl iqsanl, aqyu juq nioil peivq movq nail ngaol.
Milnee uqnee nee miltsaq bhai ulcuvq bhi deq pheeq lal khi, tsaol-aq bhai lav luq lav seil-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail daoq al neq, niil aq-il jiav thailthaiq nail nqtavq khi miltsaq bhai, miqjaq kheq ha nail haqbhoil lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq bhai yalkhaq dal khi lav luq lav seil-u n-gaol kev dai, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, daoq niil daoq bhai thaq nioil peivq dei-eiq. Heeqphaq Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai, teevq n khi teevq hinl kovq neq, khul maq bheeq-n-ail.

Miqyail-i mail jaq-ai thaq nail saljial bhai aivq lavqtsail mail maq bhi bhee lal-il dai, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq noeq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq lavqtsail mail maq bhi bhee lal nail maq ngel-ail. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq luq maq seil-ail dai, tsaol-aq iqsanl mail oeqbal noeqpov lal nail bhai, aivq oil movq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq bhai aivq ol lavq nail ngaol.

Khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lal nail aqyanq maq heeq kivq nail khe-ai, Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail aqn kev lee nail ngaol. Aq-u n-gaol, nqtavq aqthel mailma-ail meel meel-ail peivq-ail nail ngaol. Aqlaol laol deedee nail ngel-i mail, nlma bhala aqgil iqsanl mail, phaq gil lai nail ngaol. Miltsaq khi miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jiav nail iqsanl mail poiv ha gil nail ngaol.

Al juq iqsanl mail phaq gil-ail nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq Miqyail nail aqn bhai noeqthunq khi daonq thailthaiq-u phao, aqmeeq aqhaol haol dai, taivq-ail doevq khi, Miqyail bhai ev nail tsaol-aq pevq heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail maq ngel ail laiq. Aqn al n kev lee haq neq, nqtavq bha miqjaq-i mail poiv ha khi, aqlaol laol deedee nail ngel-i mail, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee phaq gil lai nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail saljial jaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nqtavq aqsivq miltsaq aqsivq jiav lal nail ngaol dai, ngadao noeqthunq khi daonq nail ngaol. Al bhai neq, tsaq nail daol nail phaq taivq-ail jiav nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq al juq bhai noeqthunq khi daonq nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq aqjiivq aqcavq phaq maq leivq mail, oeqbal thaq duq iqsanl maq jiav nail lavqkhoel nee, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neesal-ovq nail lavqkhoel bhai ya jaol dai, laijai yaoq.

Ngadao hevqkovq nail phaq ya dai, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Miqyail ol thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq thaq-ai yaoq. Ngadao mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqivq jaqbheq Paolluv iqsanl, Miqyail aivq bhai neenoeq neekha bivq-a nail khe-ai, ganl niil juq nuljuq bhai haoqgavq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq-i mail gevq-a nail haoqgavq iqsanl nail lavqkhoel-ai, ganl niil juq aivq gevq-a nail ngaol. Haoqgavq al juq nail lavqkhoel-ai ganl teevq pav ganav juq neq, gov heeq lal nail haq nail ngaol. Maq heeq nia-ail neema maq ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, gov heeq lal nail haq nail daoq al juq bhai maqkhaiq, Jalliq yaoq juq yaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai maqkhaiq, daoqceevq lav phal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq alhai nl nail ngel-i mail, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal mao-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq iqmoeq-u nee mail ganl niil juq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, haqeiv nail tsaol-aq nl bheeq nail haoqnao aqyu juq nuljuq bhai maq ya hevq bheel-aivq mail, yovqgavq ivqdao dai, thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai maq ya tsu-ail dai, yaolphaol yaoq.

Ngadao nail Heeqphaq khi Hevqkovq nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nail lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, aivq bhai heeq nia nail lavqkhoel nee mail maqkhaiq, nuljuq eeq lal moe lal yaoq. Niil aq-il nee, nqmaq maqluv halyeel aivq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel bhel. Aqmiq.

Iqmoeq-u nee mail doevq nail jaol nail daoq nail ganl nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail daoq al daoq bhai nvjuq ya gaiq khi, maivneev-i mail ya moel-a nail ngaol. Nvjuq daoq al daoq bhai hel iqsanl ya heldaiq moel khi, thoiq nail iqsanl ya thoiqtsi daiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqdoevq doevq nail phaq bhaqlaoq kheq dai dov lal nail bhai nvjuq ya moel khi, al nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, nvjuq bhai bhaqlaoq khe dai bhi moel lavq-a nail, Aqbhu Miqyail nee mail jaol-a nail nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq nail ganl, nuljuq bhai ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol.

Nuljuq iqsanl nvjuq nee mail aqtsaoq ya tsaoq dai, nvjuq-i mail ya gaiq ya moel-a nail juq nuljuq bhai ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol. Ngadao aqtsaoq tsaoq nail neq, Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail aivq nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali nee mail aqtsaoq tsaoq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Ngadao lavqkhiq tsail deedee lal nia dai, ganl niil juq nvjuq nuljuq jaol nail bha gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Nvjuq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail cavq lavq-a cov lavq-a nail daoq bhai ya gaiq khi, nuljuq bhai ge daiq bhiq nail ngaol. Aivq nail daoq al neq, niailhai ngaol. Miqyail neq, aqbhaq pevq nail ngaol. Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai aqnav teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail.

Ngadao aivq nee mail aqtsaoq tsaoq thailthaiq naol dai ge khi ngaol-aoq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq haq neq, ngadao goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, maldil tsaq nail lavqkhoel bhai, aqdoevq maq doevq-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai tsao haq neq, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq aqtsaoq tsaoq tavq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aivq nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul nail aqsivq ngadao nail oeqbal iqsanl bhai tsiqhaol lavq nail ngaol.
Ngadao oeqbal maq aol-ail dai ge haq neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq pevq khi, maldil tsaq nail phaq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai maq aol-ail.

Ngadao yovqgavq nail oeqbal yovqgavq Miqyail bhai ge dov haq neq, Miqyail saljial ivq khi tsaq nail daol nail gaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, ngadao nail oeqbal bhai aivq phaiq lavq khi, maq tsaq maq daol nail phaq iqsanl bhai tsiqhaol lavq nail ngaol.

Oeqbal maq nl daiq haq-al dai, ngadao ge haq neq, Miqyail bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail gaq niil dai, ngadao ge nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aivq nail daoq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai maq aol-ail.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail yaq juq-ol, nuljuq oeqbal maq ya nl dai, ganl niil juq ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, teevq gaq ganav oeqbal nl laiq lao haq neq, ngadao nail haqbhoil thaoq hal nail gaq Aqbhu Miqyail nee mail jaol nail ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaq nail daol nail gaq pevq nail Yeiqsul Khali ngaol.
Aivq neq, ngadao nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq-a nail gaq ngaol. Ngadao nail oeqbal taivq-ail maq ngel nail, tsaol-aq yaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee nail oeqbal bhai iqsanl laol bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq haq neq, ngadao aivq bhai heeq kivq nail ngaol dai, aqduq bhao nail ngaol.

“Ngal aivq bhai heeq kivq naol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav ge khi ngaol-aoq, aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai maq naldaiq haq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai maldil tsaq nail phaq maq aol-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul Khali nail daoq khal naldaiq nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai maldil bhee lal nail ngaol. Ngadao aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol dai, niailhai ya heeq kivq nail ngaol.
“Ngal aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol” dai, khal ge nail tsaol-aq Yeiqsul Khali doevq-a nail khe-ai, ya doevq nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail niil neq, daoq aqsivq bivq nail maq ngel-ail. Iqmoeq-u nee mail nuljuq bhai bivq thaq-ail ceevq khi, nuljuq iqsanl heeq nia nail daoq aqlil al daoq gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail daoq aqlil al daoq neq, nuljuq gaiq daiq-a nail daoq al daoq ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il neq, ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail daoq aqlil al daoq neq, aqsivq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol. Daoq al daoq neq, Yeiqsul bhaqda nee bhee lal khi, nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl bhee lal thailthaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqnav peivq ail khi, maldil aqbhaq niil aq-il iqsanl, bhaq dol lavq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, “Ngal aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol naol” dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai neejiav jiav haq neq, aivq neq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.
Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, aqbhaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aivq bhaqda nee yu phaqthiq thiq lai duq maq jiav-ail.

Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, aqnav nail lavqkhoel bhai tsao nail ngaol. Aqnav al neq, aivq bhai maivpeivq bhi peivq ail-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq khaq bha ail thailthaiq nail bhai maq heeq nia-ail.
Yaq juq-ol, Yeiqsul nail aqmil bhaqda nee nuljuq nail oeqbal phaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhu juq-ol, iqmoeq-u nee mail doevq nail jaol nail gaq bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq-ol, haqeiv nail gaq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Yaq juq-ol, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Aqbhu juq-ol, iqmoeq-u nee mail doevq nail jaol nail gaq bhai heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Nuljuq yaqyov-aq yaqnoil juq-ol, aqhaqlal phao gaq kav nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail nail daoq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khi, nuljuq haqeiv nail gaq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Miltsaq nail aol bhai maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jiav nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, thaq gaiq-a. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav miltsaq nail aol bhai gaiq-a haq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai maq aol-ail.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, aqsivq haqjoil phao oil movq nail phaq maqkhaiq, maivneev moel khi oil movq nail phaq maqkhaiq, phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq bhaqda nee neema eeq nail phaq maqkhaiq, Aqbhu Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Miltsaq yaq nee mail dov lal-a nail ngaol.

Miltsaq nail aol khi mail miltsaq bhai tavq nail neekhaol jiav nail juq neq, peivq-ail thailthaiq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail neema tsaq dai, nl nail tsaol-aq nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya doevq nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, aqyanq niil neq, haoqnao naosaq khe yanq ngaol. Khali bhai genl dev nail gaq dov lee nail ngaol dai, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, niil aq-il iqsanl Khali bhai genl dev nail maodai gaq dov lee-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, yanq niil yanq neq, haoqnao naosaq khe yanq nial dai, ngadao heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq ngadao nail munl nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq ngadao nail munl lavqkhoel bhai jaol-u phao iqsanl, ngadao nee mail maq tavq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq ngadao nee mail tavq lao-aol kheel nul, ngadao juq nee mail jaol-ai haq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee ngadao juq nee mail maq tavq-ail dai, bhaqlaoq kheq dai bhi dov lal nail dai khi, ngadao juq nail munl nee mail dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal hoeldav bhiq gaq-ao nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl mail, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.

Nuljuq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail maq ngel. Nuljuq maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai heeq nia khi, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail khul phaq maqkhaiq, maldil tsaq nail phaq nee mail maq tavq-ail dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai phal-iq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail neq, khaq sil gaq. Yeiqsul neq, Khali maq ngel-ail dai, jil nail gaq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail gaq ngaol. Alhai jil nail tsaol-aq al gaq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai maqkhaiq, Yaqyov bhai maqkhaiq, jil ha khi, Khali bhai genl dev nail gaq ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yaqyov bhai khal jil ha nail tsaol-aq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai iqsanl jil ha nail khe-ai dul khi, Yaqyov bhai khal hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai iqsanl hav bhoel nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, iqmoeq-u nee nuljuq-i mail ya gaiq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai neema lavqkhoel bhai ivqdao dai, nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq. Daoq al bhai nuljuq nieivq thaiq-ai thaq haq neq, Yaqyov khi mail Aqbhu Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai nuljuq khaq mao iqsanl jaol nail ngaol.
“Ngal nuljuq bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bivq naol” dai, Yeiqsul-i mail saljial jaq ceiv-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Nuljuq bhai hevq bheel-aivq movq-ai bhiq nail juq nail ganl, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul-i mail hoel dav lavq-a nail Aqhaqlal Miqyail nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngel-i mail, aqyu juq nuljuq bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail maq loq-ail. Aqhaqlal Miqyail nuljuq bhai ganl al iqsanl mail cavq lavq cov lavq nail ngaol. Hoeldav lavq-a nail al phaq neq, aqduq maq bhao nail phaq maq ngel-ail. Maldil tsaq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, aivq nuljuq bhai cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail khe-ai, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol yaoq.
Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, Yeiqsul yavq kha lee-u phao, neema ivqdao dai aol khi, aivq nail sivtavq bhai maq ya haqsil dai, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol yaoq.

Khali neq, tsaq nail daol nail gaq ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, tsaq nail daol nail phaq khal nl nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol dai, nuljuq heeq kivq nail neq, tsaq nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail neq, ngadao bhai khadai gaiq-a nail dai, saol-nvq daiq yaoq. Ngadao bhai Miqyail nail yaq dai, mil lavq-a nail ngaol. Ngadao neq, maldil aivq nail yaq ngaol. Miltsaq yaq juq aivq bhai maq heeq nia nail ngel-i mail, ngadao juq bhai iqsanl maq heeq nia-ail.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol. Niil aq-il ngadao Miqyail nail yaq ngaol. Yaqhao ngadao khalhai pevq lal nail bhai maq phaodaiq lavq haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Yeiqsul dov lee-u phao, ngadao aivq khe-ai pevq lal nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq khalhai pevq nail bhai ngadao bhaqlaoq kheq dai, ya moel nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul bhai alhai khal noeqthunq nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, Yeiqsul haol nail khe-ai, tsaol-aq al juq iqsanl yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq ya bhi haol lal nail ngaol.
Oeqbal khal nl nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, Miqyail nail aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq-a nail ngaol. Oeqbal neq, aoldaoq kovqdaoq bhai nl bheeq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nuljuq heeq nia nail khe-ai, ngadao nail oeqbal bhai oil ha nail dai khi, Yeiqsul lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, oeqbal teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail.
Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, oeqbal maq nl-ail

Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl nuljuq bhai maq ya hevq bheel-aivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq. Yeiqsul neq, tsaq nail daol nail gaq pevq nail khe-ai, aqtsaq aqdaol daol dai, khal nl nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, tsaq nail daol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Oeqbal khal nl nail tsaol-aq neivq heeqphaq nail yaq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, neivq heeqphaq neq, iqmoeq-u nee mail oeqbal nl-a nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, neivq heeqphaq nl nail hal nail phaq bhai lav cov nail dai khi, Miqyail nail Yaqyov dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal-a nail juq neq, oeqbal maq nl-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nail aqiq aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Miqyail nail yaq pevq nail ngel-i mail, oeqbal maq nl-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail nail yaq khi mail neivq heeqphaq nail yaq bhai, aqmeeq-ai tselpav kivq nail ngaol. Aqtsaq aqdaol daol dai maq khal nl nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail nail yaq maq ngel-ail. Alhai dul dai, Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai maq gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq iqsanl, Miqyail nail yaq maq ngel-ail.
“Nuljuq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a yaoq” dai, ge-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq bhai, iqmoeq-u nee mail nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Haqeiv nail gaq nail yaq khe-ai dul nail Gaqilnav
Aqivq jaqbheq juq-ol, miltsaq yaq nuljuq bhai neejiav jiav nail bhai, noeq-u maq dov dai, thaq pevq-ail.

Ngadao neq, sil nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee dov ail khi, aqdoevq doevq nail phaq nail lavqkhoel aol lai-a nail ngaol. Khalhai khi heeq lal nail dai ge haq neq, aqivq jaqbheq juq bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maq nl dol leevq nail gaq neq, sil nail phaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee tsaol-aq bhai heivq gaq-ao nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq bhai heivq nail khul gaq maqkhaiq, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq maq aol-ail dai, nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol.

Khali neq, ngadao nail haqbhoil yeeldan-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhai heeq kivq lal-a nail ngaol. Ngadao iqsanl aqivq jaqbheq juq nail haqbhoil yeeldan heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq khe phul heel ildaoq maoqgaiq jiav khi, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq haq nail aoq nail bhai moel-u phao, gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail neema maq aol haq neq, Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nia naol laiq.
Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, moeqthaoq-i mail ge khi taivq-ail thaq gaiq-a, nl nail hal nail lavqkhoel nee, maldil goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq bhi dov lal yaoq.

Ngadao alhai gaiq-a haq neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai tavq nail ngaol dai, ya heeq kivq nail ngaol. Ngadao alhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao nail neema ngadao nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal teevq phaq ganav thaq haq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai ngadao neema sal lal nia nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq Miqyail neq, ngadao nail neema nee maqtsil eeq khi, iqsanl bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngadao nail neema ngadao nail kovtavq bhai oeqbal maq thaq haq neq, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neema ivqdao dai, jiav nail ngaol.
Aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai ngadao naldaiq khi, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai, nl haq neq, aivq bhai hal nail khe-ai, ngadao ya nail ngaol.

Aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq neq, niailhai ngaol. Aivq nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali bhai ngadao neema thaqtsaol khi, Yaqyov-i mail daoq bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail khe-ai, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Miqyail-i mail bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, aivq iqsanl tsaol-aq al gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aivq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol dai, ngadao niailhai heeq kivq nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal Miqyail ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol lee-a nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, khal ngel nail aqhaqlal bhai nuljuq neema thaq thaqtsaol. Aqhaqlal al, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee thaq nail ngel-ail laiq dai, iqmoeq laonqdaiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail tsaol-aq juq miltsaq doi dai, ail bhee-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Maldil Miqyail nail aqhaqlal ngel nail maq ngel nail, nuljuq niailhai heeq kivq duq kivq nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali neq, maldil tsaol-aq yaq nail aqsivq haqjoil phi khi lee-a nail ngaol dai, khal ge nail aqhaqlal neq, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, alhai maq ngel-ail dai, ge nail aqhaqlal neq, Miqyail jaol nail nee lee-a nail aqhaqlal maq ngel-ail. Aqhaqlal al neq, Khali bhai genl dev nail gaq nail aqhaqlal pevq nail ngaol. Niil heel nail aqhaqlal lee nail ngaol dai, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail khe-ai, niil aq-il iqsanl miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, nuljuq Miqyail bhai tavq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Al ovqtavq nuljuq aqyu juq bhai gaq lai-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, nuljuq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail gaq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail neivq heeqphaq nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail al juq neq, miltsaq bhai tavq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, miltsaq bhai tavq nail juq taivq-ail aqyu juq cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq juq iqsanl, aqyu juq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol.

Ngadao neq, Miqyail bhai tavq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai heeq nia nail tsaol-aq, nvjuq nail daoq naldaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai maq tavq nail tsaol-aq nvjuq nail daoq maq naldaiq-ail. Alheel ngel-i mail, maldil tsaq nail phaq bhai tavq nail aqhaqlal bhai maqkhaiq, maq tsaq nail phaq bhai tavq nail aqhaqlal bhai maqkhaiq, ngadao tsel pav kivq nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a bhel. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail ngaol. Goil nia gaiq-a nia nail tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee, Miqyail nail yaq pevq khi, Miqyail bhai heeq nia nail ngaol.
Maq goil maq gaiq-a nia nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail bhai maq heeq nia ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Miqyail ngadao bhai goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq, niailhai phaodaiq lavq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov bhaqda nee ngadao doevq nail phaq ya dai, Miqyail neq, aivq nail Yaqyov teevq gaq taivq-ail jaol khi ngaol-aoq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai bhi lee kha-a nail ngaol.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq neq, niailhai ngaol. Ngadao Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail bhai ge nail maq ngel-ail. Aivq ngadao bhai gaiq-a khi, ngadao nail oeqbal nail haqbhoil laol bhiq nail dai khi, aivq nail Yaqyov bhi lee-a nail bhai, ge nail ngaol.
Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol. Miqyail ngadao bhai niidai dai-ail gaiq-a lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao iqsanl teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a nail tsaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, Miqyail bhai maq moel daiq haq-al. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngadao teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a haq neq, Miqyail ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, aivq nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai bhee lal nail ngaol.

Ngadao Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, Miqyail ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol dai, ngadao niailhai heeq kivq nail ngaol. Aivq aivq nail Aqhaqlal ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai bhi jaol lee-a nail ngaol.
Miltsaq yaq bhai Hevqkovq nail gaq bhi jiovq nail dai khi, Aqbhu Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov bhi lee-a nail bhai, ngadao moel khi salkhil khanq nail ngaol.
“Yeiqsul neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol” dai, khal ge dov nail tsaol-aq, Miqyail aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, aqyu juq iqsanl Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Miqyail ngadao bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol dai, ngadao heeq kivq khi, neema thaqtsaol nail ngaol.

Miqyail neq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol khi, Miqyail iqsanl aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol.

Ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq alhai bhee lal-a nail ngel-i mail, yalkhaq dal-u n-gaol ngadao nail neema ivqdao dai, jiav nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Yeiqsul pevq nail khe-ai, ngadao iqsanl miltsaq kovtavq bhai pevq thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail lavqkhoel, geesil nail phaq maq jiav ail. Goil nail gaiq-a nail neema teevq bhee aol haq neq, geesil nail neema peivq-ail nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, geesil nail phaq neq, yalkhaq dal lavq nail bhai geesil nail ngel-i mail, geesil nia nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq maq bhee lal haq-al.
Miqyail ngadao bhai iqmoeq gaiq-a lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngadao iqsanl aivq bhai gaiq-a khi, teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngal Miqyail bhai gaiq-a naol” dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav ge khi ngaol-aoq, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai neejiav jiav haq neq, aivq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq moel thailthaiq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai maq gaiq-a nia haq neq, aivq maq moel daiq-a nail Miqyail bhai khalhai khi gaiq-a nia nail-aiq.
Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq yovqgavq nail aqivq jaqbheq bhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol dai, bivq thaq-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq neq, Yeiqsul-i mail ngadao juq bhai bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul neq, Khali ngaol dai, neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq Miqyail nail yaq pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail bhai khal gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq, aivq nail yaq bhai iqsanl gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao Miqyail bhai gaiq-a khi, aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq haq neq, aivq nail yaq juq bhai gaiq-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail bhai gaiq-a nail dai, ge nail neq, aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail bhai, ge nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail bivq-ai thaq nail daoq neq, haq nail maq ngel-ail.
Miqyail nail yaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, miltsaq bhai gaq lai nail ngaol. Miltsaq bhai gaq lai nail phaq neq, ngadao nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq bhai gaq lai nail tsaol-aq neq, kha sil gaq jaol nail-aiq. Yeiqsul neq, Miqyail nail Yaqyov ngaol dai, neema khal thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail, gaq lai nail ngaol.

Ulcuvq khi mail aqsivq nee mail lee-a nail gaq neq, Yeiqsul Khali ngaol. Ulcuvq nee mail taivq-ail aivq lee-a nail maq ngel-ail. Ulcuvq khi mail aqsivq niil nvq phaq nee mail lee-a nail ngaol. Alhai lee-a nail neq, maldil ngel nail ngaol dai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq Aqhaqlal Miqyail neq, maldil tsaq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
