Alheel ngel-i mail, ganl niil bhai salkhil khanq nail hail phaq jiav nail ngaol.
Al neq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail, ulcuvq, aqsivq niil hail phaq ngaol. Niil hail phaq salkhil khanq nail neq, teevq gaq kheel ngaol.

Tsaol-aq yaq salkhil khanq nail daoq bhai ngadao naldaiq nail ngaol. Miqyail salkhil khanq nail neq, a dai nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail aivq-i mail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail ngaol. Al neq, aivq nail Yaqyov nail ganl salkhil khanq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail Yaqyov bhai neema thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai Miqyail-i mail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail phaq aol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail bhai neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail bhai goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail gaq niil dai ge nail khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, Miqyail aivq nail Yaqyov nail ganl salkhil khanq nail bhai aqyu juq neema maq thaqtsaol-ail.

Miqyail salkhil khanq nail al neq, ngadao bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq bivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail al neq, aivq nail Yaqyov nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.
Yaqyov bhai hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq, doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol. Yaqyov bhai maq hav bhoel nail tsaol-aq, doevq nail phaq maq ya-ail.

Miqyail nail Yaqyov nail aqmil bhai neema thaqtsaol nail nuljuq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya nail ngaol dai, nuljuq ya heeq kivq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai neema ivqdao dai, hal lai kivq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq neema tsaq nail khe-ai ngadao teevq phaq ganav hal haq neq, aivq naldaiq lavq nail ngaol.
Ngadao khal hal-u phao, aivq naldaiq lavq nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq duq-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail, aivq bhai khal hal-a nail khe-ai, ngadao ya naol dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, aivq nail aqivq jaqbheq sil heeq phaq-ail maq tsaq nail oeqbal nl thailthaiq nail bhai ya moel haq neq, tsaol-aq al gaq nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq hal heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail ngaol. Alhai hal haq neq, aqivq jaqbheq al gaq bhai Miqyail aqdoevq doevq nail phaq bivq nail ngaol. Sil heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail oeqbal iqsanl jiav nail ngaol. Al nail haqbhoil Miqyail bhai geeqlaoq ya hal nail ngaol dai, ngal ge nail maq ngel-ail.
Nl bheeq-a nail phaq iqsanl mail, oeqbal ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, sil heeq phaq-ail maq tsaq nail oeqbal iqsanl jiav nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail yaq khul gaq maqkhaiq, oeqbal maq nl-ail
Ngadao neq, Miqyail nail yaq ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq iqsanl mail haqeiv nail gaq nail bhaqaoq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol thailthaiq nail ngaol dai iqsanl, heeq kivq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, ngadao maldil tsaq nail Miqyail bhai heeq nia lal dai, Miqyail nail Yaqyov lee khi, neenoeq neekha bivq lavq-a nail ngaol dai, heeq kivq nail ngaol. Ngadao neq, maldil tsaq nail Miqyail nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aivq nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali nail lavqkhoel bhai ngadao jaol nail ngaol. Yaqyov niil gaq neq, maldil tsaq nail Miqyail pevq nail nee ovqtavq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol.
Ngaq nail yaq juq-ol, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai gail jao jao yaoq.
Ngal neq, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq teevq gaq ngaol. Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail yaqmai-aq teevq gaq
Ngadao nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail maldil tsaq nail phaq bhaqda nee ngal nuljuq bhai gaiq-a nail ngaol. Maldil tsaq nail phaq al neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ngadao nee jaol nail ngaol.

Aqbhu Miqyail khi mail Aqbhu Miqyail nail Yaqyov Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol maqkhaiq, gaoqhaq gaiq-a lavq nail phaq maqkhaiq, neesal-ovq nail phaq maqkhaiq, al hail phaq iqsanl, maldil tsaq nail phaq khi mail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nail lavqkhoel nee ngadao nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Aqbhu Miqyail-i mail ngadao bhai daoq khal bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, nuljuq nail yaq teevq pav ganav juq maldil tsaq nail phaq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail deedee-ail nial.

Yaqmai-aq ol, ngadao juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq gaiq-a bhel dai, niil aq-il ngal naoq bhai hal nail ngaol. Gaiq-a nail niil neq, bivq thaq-ail ceevq-a nail daoq aqsivq daoq, ngal naoq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail maq ngel. Iqmoeq-u nee ngadao-i mail ya-ai thaq nail daoq al daoq ngal naoq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq dai, ge nail neq, Miqyail-i mail daoq bivq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, naldaiq khi nl tsao hal tsao nail bhai ge nail ngaol. Goil nail gaiq-a nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq yaoq dai, bivq-ai thaq nail daoq niil daoq bhai, iqmoeq-u nee mail, nuljuq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul Khali neq, tsaol-aq yaq nail aqsivq haqjoil phi khi yavq kha lee-a nail maq ngel-ail dai, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq maodai miltsaq kovtavq bhai cavq doi ail-a nail ngaol. Alhai ge nail tsaol-aq juq neq, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, Khali bhai genl dev nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, nuljuq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail phaq aqnieivq-ail maq bhi peivq-ail dai, Miqyail-i mail nuljuq bhai bivq nail dai lainq-ai thaq nail aqphoiq bhai, teevq bhee teevq lovq ya kivq dai, yaolphaol yaoq.

Khali-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail khe-ai maq doevq dai, maq ngel nail phao al jaiq ail jel nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai maq tavq-ail. Khali-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail khe-ai doevq nail tsaol-aq neq, Aqbhu Miqyail bhai iqsanl, Yaqyov bhai iqsanl ya-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav Khali-i mail cavq lavq cov lavq-a nail daoq maq cavq maq cov dai, nuljuq jaol nail bha lal haq neq, ilkhaol lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl thaq hav bhoel. Aivq bhai thaoqphuq-u phao daoq iqsanl thaq ge tsaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, alheel nail tsaol-aq bhai thaoqphuq-u phao, daoq ge tsaoq nail gaq neq, aivq haqeiv nail phaq nl nail bhai, nl tsao bhiq nail khe-ai, dul lai nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq heeq phaq-ail maodai jiav khi ngaol-aoq, haoqgavq aqpavq khi mail haoqgavq dailkheq-i maq gevq movq-il. Ngadao juq lavqkhiq tsail nail phaq bhee lal dai, ngal nuljuq jaol nail bha lee khi, nuljuq nee daoq ge tsaoq movq-ail nial.
Naoq bhai noeq moel naol dai, Miqyail-i mail tsel dov-ai thaq nail naoq nail nailma nail yaq juq naoq bhai daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal neq, Khali yaq munl bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq teevq gaq ngaol. Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail Gaqyul jaol nail bha haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq-ol, aqhaqlal phao loq nail phaq naol teevq bhee aol nail khe-ai, yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee teevq bhee aol lal khi, jaol hal dov dai, ngal geeqlaoq hal nail ngaol.

Aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq teevq pav ganav juq ngal jaol nail bha lal khi, naol saljial ivq nail ganl maqkhaiq, maldil tsaq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ganl maqkhaiq, ge dai lavq-a nail ngel-i mail, ngaq bhai lavqkhiq tsail deedee ail nial.
Ngaq nail yaq juq tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel bhai aqdoevq doevq thailthaiq nail ngaol dai, ya gaiq-a nail nee maqtsil, ngal lavqkhiq tsail nail yaoq phaq yaoq maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq-ol, naol neq, Khali yaq juq bhai aqmeeq-ai hav bhiq-a nail lavqkhoel saljial ivq deedee khi, maq moel daiq-a nail Khali yaq juq bhai kev dai, alhai hav bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Naol goil nia gaiq-a nia nail ganl, niilniai jaol nail Khali yaq juq bhai aqyu juq ge bhiq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai, naol aqyu juq bhai hevq ha-ail bhiq haq neq, meeq deedee nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq aqyu juq neq, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil daoq cavq daoq cov cov ail nail dai khi, ail nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq aqyu juq neq, laolkivq yaq juq-i mail tsaojao-ai bhiq nail bhai maq hav bhoel-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, maldil tsaq nail phaq nail haqbhoil, niilheel nail tsaol-aq juq nee mail ngadao ganl teevq gaq khe-ai, nl kivq hal kivq dai, ngadao juq aqyu juq bhai aqmeeq-ai hav bhiq nail, tsaq nail ngaol.

Ngal nuljuq nail Khali yaq munl bhai haoqgavq davqnil nil dai, gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Khali yaq munl nail kovtavq bhai aqivq jiovq movq nail Daqyaoldaqlal neq, nvjuq nail daoq bhai maq hav bhoel-ail.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal lee haq neq, aivq-i mail khal nl khal hal-a nail phaq ge dov naol. Aivq nvjuq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge doil deedee nail ngaol. A dai taivq-ail maq ngel-ail haq-al, aqivq jaqbheq Khali yaq juq lee-u phao, aivq maq hav bhoel nail nee ovqtavq, khal hav bhoel movq nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl lav tsoiq khi, Khali yaq nail munl lavqkhoel nee the dov nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq-ol, haqeiv nail phaq nail haoqnao thaq tsaothe. Aqmeeq phaq nail haoqnao tsaothe yaoq. Aqmeeq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq neq, Miqyail bhai maq phuq maq moel daiq-a nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, Deiqmeiqdeiqlil aqmeeq ngaol dai, salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Maldil tsaq nail phaq iqsanl aivq nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Aivq aqmeeq ngaol dai, nvjuq iqsanl salkhil khanq nail ngaol. Nvjuq-i mail salkhil khanq nail niil maldil tsaq nail ngaol dai, naol iqsanl heeq nia nail ngaol.
Ngal naoq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq heeq phaq-ail maodai jiav khi ngaol-aoq, haoqgavq aqpavq khi mail haoqgavq dailkheq-i mail, maq gevq movq-il.
Maq maoq lal mail, naoq-ai nee ya moel khi, naoq bhai daoq ya ge tsaoq naol dai, ngal noeqthunq nail ngaol.

Naol neesal-ovq dei-eiq. Naoq bhai noeq moel naol dai, naoq nail aqtsaoq juq naoq bhai daoq cavq cavq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq nail aqtsaoq juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai iqsanl ngal noeq moel naol geiq dai, naol daoq cavq cavq bhiq ail dei-eiq.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul Khali nail yaqkav khi mail Yaqkov nail jaqbheq Yuldav ngaol. Miqyail-i mail khul-ai thaq nail nuljuq bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aqbhu Miqyail nuljuq bhai gaiq-a khi, Yeiqsul Khali nuljuq bhai heldaiq phail nail ngaol.
Gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq, neesal-ovq nail phaq khi mail, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel teevq pov nee teevq pov maol lal dei-eiq.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, Miqyail ngadao juq bhai hevqkovq lavq-a nail ganl ngal nuljuq bhai gevq bhoel-ai leevq movq deedee-ail nial. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, Miqyail-i mail teevq pov taivq-ail aivq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai av bhiq-ai thaq nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq nail haqbhoil laijai deedee yaoq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai gaq bivq nail lavqkhoel haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq nuljuq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol khoiq lal-a nail ngaol. Miqyail bhai maq ev nail tsaol-aq al juq neq, haqeiv nail phaq khi mail, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq ya nl dai, Miqyail nail geeqlaoq eeljaol bhai lav phal-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul Khali taivq-ail ngadao bhai uvthaiq nail gaq khi mail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq pevq nail bhai, aqyu juq khaonq ha-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yalkhaq dal nail bhai ya daq naol dai, aq-u nee mail Jalliq lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ilsaqleiqlal tsaol-aq juq bhai Iljiltuv milkhaoq lavqkhoel nee Heeqphaq Miqyail khalhai hevqkovq bhiq khi, haoqnao aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel khe neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai lav luq lav seil bhiq-a nail bhai ya daq-a nail ganl al nuljuq heeq nia nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal nuljuq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge noeq movq nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, yovqgavq nail alyaq bhai khaonq ha khi yovqgavq nail jaol duq nee mail tsaol-aq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail hailcav-i mail pheethaiq khi, navtsee deel jaol duq bhai laol thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Yalkhaq dal nail aqn n ma kev lal-u kev dai, aivq aqyu juq bhai alhai laol thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alhai dul dai, Saoldoq meenq, Gaolmaollav meenq khi mail, aqjail bhai jiav nail meenq juq iqsanl, ngadao juq nail haqbhoil saol oil duq pevq nail ngaol. Meenq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, khaqmiq sev deedee khi, aqsivq haqjoil phao khe maq nl khaoq nail mee nia phaq nl-a nail ngel-i mail, nqmaq maqluv halyeel tovq thailthaiq nail miqjaq nail lavqkhoel, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Maldil maq ngel nail saqlaq juq iqsanl alhai dul dai, nvmav mav moel-a nail phaq bhai juq juq-ail, yovqgavq nail aqmaol bhai yovqgavq oeqbal nl-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq bhai khal nl movq-ail nl khi, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail seiqleiq khaoqsail eeq nail juq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel juq nail lavqkhoel yu nee maqtsil eeq jaiq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel Milkheiqlal neq, sil thaq nail Molseiq nail aqmaol nail ganl nee tavq lai khi, neivq heeqphaq nee jil pheeljaq-u phao, aivq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge ge-ail yalkhaq maq dal tseq-ail. “Heeqphaq Miqyail naoq bhai khaq dei-eiq” dai, neivq heeqphaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, tsaol-aq niil juq neq, aqyu juq maq heeq nia nail phaq nail ganl bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq saol-nvq nia nail haqtsoiq jaiqyaq khe-ai, yovqgavq-i mail heeq nia nail phaq nail haoqnao taivq-ail tsaothe nail ngel-i mail, luq-ail seil-ail nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, aqyu juq Gaqilnav nail haoqnao tsaothe nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq phul heel bhai neekhaol jiav nail lavqkhoel, Bhaqlaq nl bheeq-a nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail nl-a nail ngaol. Gaollav Miqyail bhai pheeq-a nail khe-ai, aqyu juq iqsanl pheeq-a nail ngel-i mail, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Nuljuq goil nail gaiq-a nail bhaoqaiq lav sav khi, jaq thailthaiq-u phao, Khali yaq juq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhai lav jiivq lav cavq nail phaq pevq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq jaq tavq daol tavq-u phao, yu bhai maq haqsil nail nee ovqtavq, yu bhai maq ev dai, yovqgavq nail yaol yaq bhai maq heldaiq mail, yovqgavq nail haqbhoil taivq-ail saol-nvq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, lilmoel-i mail, bhoel-aivq thailthaiq nail maoq-aol maq aol nail nqdil khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqheeq heeq nail yanq bhai aqheeq maq heeq lee nail ngel-i mail, daoqthaoq nee mail bhi ngaoq bov khi nvq pov sil-a nail aqheeq aqbhaol khe-ai iqsanl, dul nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq neq, iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel eelkhaol thaoq deedee-u phao, bheelmevq dov lal nail khe-ai, aqyu juq yovqgavq-i mail haqsil nail phaq bhai, yovqgavq bhi dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yovqgavq nail gailkhaol bhai yovqgavq maq tsaiq nail aqgil khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail haqbhoil navtsee deel jaol duq bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqdaq nee mail aqceevq ge khal leevq-u phao, sivq yeel teevq yeel nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol-a nail Eilnaov iqsanl aqyu juq nail ganl niailhai gedan-ai thaq nail jiav nail ngaol: “Heldaiq dei-eiq, Heeqphaq Miqyail neq, aivq nail meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq aqmeel-nvq aqsainv gaq nee mail yavq kha lee nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai yalkhaq dal lee nail dai khi, aivq lee nail ngaol. Aqyu juq Miqyail bhai maq ev dai nl-ai hal-ai thaq nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, Miqyail bhai maq ev nail oeqbal yaq juq-i mail aivq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge doil-a nail ngel-i mail maqkhaiq, aqyu juq khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol” dai, gedan-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, khaq mao iqsanl meel nul khi, yu bhai oeqbal thaq nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol sil nail haoqnao tsao the nail ngaol. Yovqgavq nail ganl bhai khaoqsail he khi, yovqgavq phao meeq lal dai, yu bhai ge meeq nia nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, jel lal-u phao, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail gaqkhoel juq-i mail ge thaq-ail ceevq-a nail daoq bhai nuljuq thaq nioil peivq dei-eiq.

Aqyu juq ge nail: “Haoqnao naosaq nail yanq lavqkhoel Miqyail bhai maq ev dai, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol sil dai, nl nail nee ovqtavq, uqhuq thaoq nail aol bhai khal meelnaq movq-ail meelnaq nail tsaol-aq juq dov lal nail ngaol” dai, nuljuq bhai ge bhiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, nuljuq nail munl bhai lav pav nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail maq jaol nail ngel-i mail, aqsivq haqjoil phao taivq-ail tavq lai nail phaq nl nail ngaol.

Ngal mailma-ail gaiq-a nail aqtsaoq juq-ol, nuljuq meeq dee haol deedee nail neema thaqtsaol nail phaq nail lavqkhoel eeq lal heel lal khi, Meeqnail Haolnail Aqhaqlal nail lavqkhoel geeqlaoq hal hal-ail jaol yaoq.

Miqyail nail goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol ivq yaoq. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail phaq ya dai, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali nail gaoqhaq gaiq-a nail phaq bhai daonq daonq-ail jaol yaoq.
Neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai maq ivq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, gaoqhaq bhiq yaoq.

Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq ya jel-ail dai, miqjaq lavqkhoel nee he dov bhiq yaoq. Al ovqtavq, tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq bhai, geesil nail neema aol khi, gaoqhaq bhiq yaoq. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqsivq haqjoil nail neekhaol nl nail aqjiivq aqcavq phaq leivq nail aqyu juq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai bhe yaoq.

Nuljuq maq ya laiq-ail dai, Miqyail nuljuq bhai heldaiq phail nia nail ngaol. Nuljuq oeqbal thaq duq maq jiav dai, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee jiav nail jaol duq bhai, lavqkhiq teevq tsail ya jaol lai dai iqsanl, aivq lav sav nia nail ngaol.

Ngadao bhai hevqkovq lavq-a nail teevq gaq teevq-eel pevq nail Miqyail, ngadao nail Heeqphaq Yeiqsul Khali bhaqda nee, seiqleiq khaoqsail maqkhaiq, eeq nail heel nail phaq maqkhaiq, bhaqaoq maqkhaiq, uvthaiq nail phaq maqkhaiq, iqmoeq ilmoeq-u nee maqkhaiq, niil aq-il maqkhaiq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel maqkhaiq, aivq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.

Miqyail-i mail Yeiqsul Khali bhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail, Yeiqsul aivq nail ganl juq haoqgavq niil keiv nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Mao-ail maq mao lal mail, pevq lal nail ganl juq aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail dai khi, Yeiqsul Yaolhaq bhai alhai phaodaiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Ngal neq, Miqyail nail yaqkav Yaolhaq ngaol. Yeiqsul aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai khoel-ai leevq khi, ngaq bhai ganl niil juq bhi heeq bhi moel lavq-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail daoq khi Yeiqsul Khali-i mail salkhil khanq-ai thaq nail ganl juq bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail khe-ai, salkhil khanq khi gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Miqyail nail daoq niil ge daiq bhiq nail juq maqkhaiq, gevq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai ya gaiq khi naldaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Khul mail dai ngal-aq neq, khal gevq-ai thaq nail ganl iqsanl, pevq lal nail yanq kev lee-aiq nail ngaol.

Ngaq neq, Yaolhaq ngaol. Aqsil-aq milkhaoq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl sivq munl bhai haoqgavq niil gevq bhoel-ai lavq-a nail ngaol. Milnee uqnee iqsanl, niil aq-il iqsanl, doevq khi yaqhao iqsanl, yavq kha lee nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq maqkhaiq, aivq nail doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai jaol nail aqhaqlal sivq gaq nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq.

Saljial ivq nail lavqkhoel nee salkhil khanq nail Yeiqsul Khali nail geeqlaoq eeljaol khi neesal-ovq nail phaq maqkhaiq, nuljuq nail kovtavq bhai jiav dei-eiq. Yeiqsul Khali neq, sil-a nail tsaol-aq nail lavqkhoel bhai iqmoeq ilmoeq doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq pevq nail ngaol. Miltsaq juq khe heeqphaq bhai uvthaiq nail gaq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol. Aivq ngadao bhai gaiq-a nail ngel-i mail, aivq nail aqsivq-i mail, ngadao nail oeqbal phaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngadao aivq nail milkhaoq lavqkhoel bhai heeqphaq pevq lal dai maqkhaiq, aivq nail Aqbhu Miqyail nail Philma jiovq dai maqkhaiq, aivq nl lavq-a nail ngaol. Nqmaq maqluv halyeel aivq nail kovtavq bhai seiqleiq khaoqsail khi uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq jiav dei-eiq. Aqmiq.
Heldaiq dei-eiq,
aivq nqdil lavqkhoel nee
yavq kha lee nail ngaol.
Maivneev yaoq neev
yaoq-ao nee khi
aivq bhai geeqkhaoq-i mail
coev-a nail juq,
aivq bhai ya moel nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq bhai
jaol nail jeq-e jaq-a
iqsanl mail,
aivq bhaqda nee
nioilkhaoq ya khaoq nail ngaol.
Niailhai pevq lal nail ngaol.
Aqmiq.
“Ngal neq, Aqlaqphal khi Aolmeiqgal

Ngal neq, nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq Yaolhaq ngaol. Khoeq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail Milkhaoq bhai maqkhaiq, ol nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel ngal nuljuq nee mail daq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngal Miqyail nail daoq cavq cavq-ail, Yeiqsul nail ganl salkhil khanq nail bhaqda nee, Bhaqmol dai khul nail eeljaollaol-n bhai bhi nieil-aivq-a nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Miqyail nail aqn n-gaol

“Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail juq, haoqgavq lavqkhoel bhai gevq bhoel khi, Eilpheilsu meenq, Saqmullaqnav meenq, Bheiqlaqgaq meenq, Thilyathilla meenq, Saqdil meenq, Phillaqdeiqphil meenq, Laoqdiqciv meenq, meenq juq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl sivq munl bhai oil bhoel gai-aivq bhiq yaoq” dai, aqthel al ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Ngaq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lavq-a nail gaq bhai ya moel dai, ngal haoqnaol naolkovq kovq daiq-u phao, heel nail phalmanq sivq heeq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Phalmanq al juq nail gaoltsi bhai, Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov khe-ai dul nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq, cilmeiv phuqlul bhai kev dai phailkhaoq heelma doi khi, aivq nail neema bhai heel nail jiovqpavq pavq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail uqhuq khi aivq nail tsailkheel neq, phulleq deel yaol nail aqmevq khi niail khe-ai phul deedee nail ngaol. Aivq nail maivneev neq, miqjaq miqlail khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Aivq nail aqkhil neq, poiv haol-ai thaq nail giqheel khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq daoq ge nail neq, aqthel mao-ail meel nail laoljaol nail aqthel khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aivq nail lavqmal lavq bhai aqgil sivq heeq nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee, nvq phao nvq phao-ail, tav deedee nail thaoma teevq keiv dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq nail maivphaoq neq, nlma khe-ai nl jeel coev nail ngaol.

Ngal aivq bhai ya moel-u phao, sil thaq nail tsaol-aq khe-ai aivq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai ga tsuq ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq nail lavqmal lavq ngaq nail kovtavq bhai bavq dav khi ge lavq-a nail: “Thaq geesil. Ngal neq, iqmoeq khi, haoqnao naosaq khe gaq ngaol.

Doevq thailthaiq nail gaq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol. Ngal sil khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq nail taovq taovqphoil khi sil nail milkhaoq nail taovq taovqphoil ngaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail, moel-a nail juq maqkhaiq, niil aq-il pevq thailthaiq nail juq maqkhaiq, yaqhao pevq lal nail juq maqkhaiq, gevq thaq-ai yaoq.

Ngaq nail lavqmal lavq bhai naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail aqgil sivq heeq nail daoqceevq khi, heel phalmanq sivq manq nail daoqceevq neq, niailhai ngaol. Aqgil sivq heeq neq, Khali yaq munl sivq munl nail nqtavq gaqkhoel ngaol. Phalmanq sivq heeq neq, Khali yaq munl sivq munl ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Eilpheilsu meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:
Lavqmal lavq bhai aqgil sivq heeq nieivq thaiq-ai thaq khi, heel phalmanq sivq heeq nail gaoltsi bhai tsao thailthaiq nail gaq, niailhai ge nail ngaol:

‘Naol nl thail hal thailthaiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, nl doil hal doil-a nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, oltsaol nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal heeq kivq naol. Naol haqeiv nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maq khanq tsaol nail bhai iqsanl, ngal heeq kivq naol. Gaqkhoel ngaol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail juq bhai, naol laonqdaiq khi, aqyu juq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq ngel lao thaq-il dai, naol ya heeq kivq-a nail ngaol.
Naol oltsaol khi ngaq bhai juq nail bhaqda nee khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq-u phao, naol neema maq cov nail bhai iqsanl, ngal heeq kivq nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai oeqbal thaq duq niailhai jiav nail ngaol. Naol iqmoeq-u goil nail gaiq-a nail neema aol khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il maq aol-aoq thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i nail, naol khadai ga kha lee-a nail bhai saol-nvq khi, oeqbal noeq pov noeq pov-ail, iqmoeq-u nl-a nail khe-ai, nl yaoq. Naol naoq nail oeqbal maq noeq pov haq neq, ngal naoq nail phalmanq bhai tsiq dov lee naol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol aqmeeq niil phaq nl thailthaiq-ai haq nail ngaol: Naol Nilgaolla tsaol-aq

Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq nail daoq aqmeeq-ail naldaiq yaoq. Gaq lai nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail aqbhaol nail aqheeq, ngal aqyu juq bhai bhi jaq naol. Aqbhaol al bhaol neq, Miqyail nail Bhaqlaqdilsuv dai khul nail gaoqkhail lavqkhoel bhai doevq nail ngaol’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Saqmullaqnav meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:
Iqmoeq ilmoeq khe gaq pevq khi, haoqnao naosaq khe gaq pevq nail nee ovqtavq, sil khi ngaol-aoq, gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail gaq, niailhai ge nail ngaol:

‘Naol ya daq thailthaiq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi haq nail aoq nail bhai, ngal heeq kivq naol. (Maldil dai, ge haq neq, naol neq hulmeeq hulbhao ngaol.) Tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq naoq bhai khal ge movq-ail ge doil nail bhai iqsanl, ngal heeq kivq naol. Aqyu juq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil Yuldav nail tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Neivq Saqdaq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai aol nail tsaol-aq ngaol.

Maq maoq lal mail, naol ya daq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai thaq geesil. Naoq bhai laonqdaiq nail dai khi, neivq heeqphaq nuljuq teevq pav ganav juq bhai thaonq bhai laol khi, tsel n bhee dai khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai, nuljuq ya daq nail ngaol. Sil-u kev dai, neema ivq yaoq. Ivq haq neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail heel uqtsaoq kovpavq, ngal nuljuq bhai bivq naol.

Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Nvq pov teevq pov sil nail phaq neq, gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, khul teevq phaq-ail maq khi nia-ail’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Bheiqlaqgaq meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:
Nvq phao nvq phao-ail tav deedee nail thaoma jiav nail niil gaq niailhai ge nail ngaol:

‘Naol khaq bhai jaol nail dai, ngal heeq kivq naol. Neivq Saqdaq nail joiqjaq doiqbev jiav nail bhai naol jaol nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naol ngaq bhai saljial ivq nail ngaol. Saljial ivq nail ngaq nail ganl salkhil khanq nail gaq pevq nail Aqdilpav bhai, neivq Saqdaq jaol nail naoq nail meenq nee heivq khi ngaol-aoq, ngaq bhai neema thaqtsaol nail phaq bhai naol maq khaonq ha-al.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai oeqbal thaq duq niailhai jiav nail ngaol. Naoq nail jaol duq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, Bhaqlaq dai mil-ai thaq nail gaq-i mail cavq nail cov nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ilsaqleiqlal nail tsaol-aq laiq-ail tsa-ail dai, Bhaqlaq neq, Bhaqlail bhai cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol. Cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail al neq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq-a nail jaqjaq daoldaol jaq yaoq dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail nee ovqtavq, khaqmiq iqsanl sev yaoq dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Alhai dul dai, naoq nail lavqkhoel khe tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq neq, Nilgaolla tsaol-aq juq-i mail cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail haoqnao tsaothe thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, oeqbal noeq pov yaoq. Maq noeq pov haq neq, ngal naol jaol nail bha lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee khi, ngaq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee dov lee nail thaoma-i mail tsaol-aq al juq bhai genl dev naol.

Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali munl juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq bhai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq. Gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq bhai neq, oil-uvq-ai thaq nail maqnav khaqmul khi mail lovmav aqphul teevq heeq ngal bivq naol. Lovmav aqphul al heeq bhai aqmil aqsivq gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol, lovmav al heeq bhai ya-a nail gaq maq ngel haq neq, aqmil al mil bhai teevq gaq-ail maq heeq nia-ail’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Thilyathilla meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:
‘Miqyail nail Yaqyov nail maivneev neq, miqjaq miqlail khe-ai dul khi, aivq nail aqkhil neq, poiv haol-ai thaq nail giqheel khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq niailhai ge nail ngaol:

Naol nl thail hal thailthaiq nail juq bhai maqkhaiq, goil nail gaiq-a nail phaq aol nail bhai maqkhaiq, neema thaqtsaol nail phaq aol nail bhai maqkhaiq, yu bhai tsaojao-ai nia nail bhai maqkhaiq, oltsaol nail bhai maqkhaiq, ngal heeq kivq naol. Al ovqtavq, niil aq-il naol nl thail hal thailthaiq nail phaq neq, aq-u nl-a hal-a nail nee maqtsil mao jaiq nail bhai iqsanl, ngal heeq kivq naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngal naoq bhai niailhai oeqbal thaq duq jiav nail ngaol: Yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ge nail Yeiqsaqbheiqlal dai khul nail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai naol khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq nl bhiq dai, alhai phaiq ha-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq cavq nail cov nail al neq, ngaq nail yaqkav juq maq tsaq maq daol nail lavqkhoel khaqmiq sev khi, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai laol bhiq-a nail jaqjaq daoldaol jaq yaoq daol yaoq dai iqsanl, hevq bheeq-a nail ngaol.
Naol oeqbal noeq pov yaoq dai, ngal aivq bhai yanq bivq khi ngaol-aoq, aivq khaqmiq sev thailthaiq nail al bhai maq noeq pov-ail.

Heldaiq dei-eiq, ngal aivq bhai nal nail goel nail jaol duq bhai bavq bhoel naol. Yeiqsaqbheiqlal nee mail khaqmiq sev thailthaiq nail tsaol-aq, aivq nl nail khe-ai nl nail phaq bhai maq noeq pov haq neq, ngal aqyu juq bhai iqsanl, kav deedee nail khoeq nail jiovq nail lavqkhoel bhai bavq bhoel naol.

Ngal yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaq juq bhai lav heivq naol. Ngal neq, neema khi mail neenoeq needul bhai tseldaiq nail gaq ngel lao thaq nial dai, Khali yaq munl iqsanl mail ya heeq nia naol. Nuljuq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail juq bhai geel-nvq dai, ngal nuljuq bhai teevq gaq khai-aq teevq gaq bhai bivq naol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, neivq Saqdaq-i mail oil-uvq-ai thaq nail daoqceevq navq deedee nail dai, yu ge nail juq bhai maq heeq nia dai, cavq bhiq cov bhiq-a nail al phaq bhai maq naldaiq dai, Thilyathilla meenq bhai jaol nail yaoq juq yaoq bhai ngal niailhai ge bhiq naol: Ngal nuljuq bhai yalkav yaoq kav yaoq, maq tsiq phi.
Ngal yavq kha lee-u kev dai, nuljuq jiav nail phaq bhai, ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.
Daoq loi loi lai-u kev dai, ngaq nail ganl nl khi gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq, ngal bivq naol.
Ngaq nail Aqbhu ngaq bhai bhaqaoq bivq lavq-a nail khe-ai, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai hail nail joiqniovq-i mail aqyu juq uvthaiq khi meldel bhai deeq pav nail khe-ai, deeq pav bhiq nail ngaol.
Ngal tsaol-aq al juq bhai, nqhao khe aqbhaq bhaq deedee nail aqgil teevq heeq bivq naol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq bhai aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Saqdil meenq bhai jaol nail Khail yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai ge bhiq yaoq:
Miqyail nail aqhaqlal sivq gaq jaol khi, aqgil sivq heeq nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail gaq, niailhai ge nail ngaol:
‘Naoq-i mail nl nail hal nail juq bhai ngal heeq kivq naol. Naol aqdoevq doevq nail ngaol dai, yu ge khi ngaol-aoq, naol sil-aoq nail ngaol.

Noeq lal yaoq. Naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai khal jail nail aqmeeq phaq maq bhi sil ceiv dai, gaq bivq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq, naoq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail phaq neq, ngaq nail Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai maq bhee maq lovq-ai haq-al dai, ngal heldaiq moel-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, naoq-i mail ya gaiq khi ya hav bhoel-a nail daoq juq bhai, thaq nioilpeivq dei-eiq. Al juq bhai naldaiq khi oeqbal noeq pov yaoq. Naol aqgeel geel dai maq jaol haq neq, khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lee nail khe-ai, ngal lee naol. Ngal khul yanq bhai kev lee nail dai, naol maq heeq nia-ail.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai aqjiivq aqcavq maq lav cavq nail tsaol-aq teevq pav ganav juq, Saqdil meenq bhai jaol-ai haq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, geel-nvq nail ngel-i mail, aqgaq aqdoi aqphul doi khi, ngaq-ai nee ya tsao nail ngaol.

Gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq, alheel nail aqgaq aqdoi aqphul ya doi nail ngaol. Aqdoevq bhiq doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel ngal aqyu juq nail aqmil bhai maq siv peiv-ail. Ngaq nail Aqbhu nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, thoil gaq ngaq nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, ngal ge dov naol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq nail daoq bhai, aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Phillaqdeiqphil meenq bhai jaol nil Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:

‘Daqbhil nail ilkhaol khe taovq taovqphoil nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail gaq neq, meeq nail haol nail tsaq nail gaq ngaol. Aivq-i mail phao-ai thaq haq neq, teevq gaq-ail, maq pheeqthaiq nia-ail. Aivq-i mail pheeqthaiq haq neq, teevq gaq-ail maq phao nia-ail. Aivq niailhai ge nail ngaol:

Naoq-i mail nl nail hal nail juq bhai ngal heeq kivq naol. Heldaiq. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq-ail maq pheeqthaiq nia nail lolgov teevq gov ngal naoq nail sivtavq bhai phao-ai thaq nail ngaol. Naol gaq micil taivq-ail aol khi ngaol-aoq, naol ngaq nail daoq naldaiq nail nee ovqtavq, ngaq nail aqmil bhai maq khaonq ha-al.

Neivq Saqdaq nail munl lavqkhoel bhai aol nail tsaol-aq juq, ngal naoq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq naol. Nvjuq neq, Yuldav nail tsaol-aq ngaol dai, aqyu juq ge khi ngaol-aoq, yuldav tsaol-aq maq ngel-ail. Aqyu juq goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail ngaol. Ngal aqyu juq bhai naoq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai uqhuq bhi thaoq naol. Aq-u phao, ngal naoq bhai gaiq-a ail nial dai, aqyu juq heeq nia lal nail ngaol.

Ol ol-ail jaol yaoq dai, ngaq-i mail naoq bhai ge bhiq-a nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq yaq bhai laonqdaiq nail dai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai yaoq dao yaoq-ao nee laonq nail aqyanq kev lee-u phao, ngal naoq bhai bhi jel-ail naol.

Ngal lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee naol dei-eiq. Naoq-i mail yaqhao khe ya nail heel uqtsaoq bhai teevq gaq-ail maq ya luv dov dai, naol khal jaol khal jiav nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, ivqdao dai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq yaoq.

Gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq, ngaq nail Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel khe ilkhel pevq lal dai, ngal nl naol. Aqyu juq khaq mao iqsanl a bhai jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai ngaq nail Miqyail nail aqmil, ngaq nail Miqyail nail meenq nail aqmil khi, ngaq nail aqmil aqsivq, ngal gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Miqyail nail meenq al meenq neq, ngaq nail Miqyail jaol nail nqtavq nee yavq kha lee-a nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq aqsivq ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq nail daoq bhai, aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yeiqsul gaoq ge nail: “Laoqdiqciv meenq bhai jaol nail Khali yaq munl nail gaqkhoel bhai niailhai gevq bhiq yaoq:

Saljial ivq khi tsaq nail phaq aol nail lavqkhoel salkhil khanq nail gaq pevq nail, Miqyail-i mail teivq-ai thaq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail, ‘Aqmiq’ dai, khul nail gaq niailhai ge nail ngaol.
‘Naoq-i mail nl nail hal nail phaq bhai ngal heeq kivq naol. Naol neq, aqcoevq iqsanl maq ngel, aqlaol iqsanl maq ngel. Naol aqcoevq maq ngel haq neq, aqlaol pevq nail bhai ngal oil movq-ail nial.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aqlaol iqsanl maq ngel, aqcoevq iqsanl naq ngel dai, aqloil loil dai taivq-ail pevq nail ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai peivq ha naol.

Naol neq, yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq, Ngal neq, hulmeeq hulbhao ngaol. Nlmaoq yalkav maodai halpov jil-ai thaq naol. Ngal khul teevq phaq iqsanl maq loq yaoq-aol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, naol khadai haq aoq nl heeq phaq-ail jiav nail bhai maqkhaiq, khadai gaoqhaq lal heeq phaq-ail pevq nail bhai maqkhaiq, khaq dai haq nail bhai maqkhaiq, naol maq heeq nia-ail. Naol maivpeivq peivq nail nee ovqtavq, naoq nail aqmaol neq, maoldeq lavqnel dai jaol nail bhai iqsanl, naol maq heeq nia-il laq.

Alheel ngel-i mail, ngal naoq bhai niailhai tsiqtsoe lavq bhel. Naol hulmeeq hulbhao bhao lal dai, poiv haol-ai thaq nail heel ngal jaol nail bha ul lal yaoq. Naol maoldeq lavqnel-ail jaol nail bhai yu maq ya moel dai, naol maq ya haqsil nail khe-ai, aqgaq aqdoi aqphul ul doi lal yaoq. Naol maivneev moel lal dai, maivneev moel lal nail jagaq ul lal yaoq.
Ngal khal gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq bhai, ngal khaq khaq-ail khi aqmeeq-ai cavq bhiq cov bhiq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, oeqbal noeq pov nail lavqkhoel nee laijai dal laivq yaoq.

Heldaiq dei-eiq, ngal lolgov bhai thulphaol khi kov thailthaiq nail ngaol. Ngaq nail daoq gaiq khi lolgov phao lavq nail khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq, ngal aivq jaol nail bha aol lai khi, aivq nee mail jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol. Aivq iqsanl, ngaq-ai nee jaq tavq daol tavq nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, gaq lai-a nail gaq pevq khi, ngaq nail Aqbhu nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai ngaq nail Aqbhu nee jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail khe-ai, gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq bhai iqsanl, ngaq nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai ngaq-ai nee mail bhi jaoldeel nail ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, Aqhaqlal Miqyail Khali yaq munl juq bhai ge bhiq nail daoq bhai, aqmeeq-ai naldaiq yaoq’ ” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, nqtavq kovtavq nail lolgov phao-ai thaq nail bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Iqmoeq-u phao, ngaq bhai daoq ge lavq khi ngal ya gaiq-a nail nqbho aqthel khe-ai kav nail aqthel al, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Niilniai dav lal yaoq. Yaqhao pevq lal nail juq nail ganl naoq bhai ge bhiq naol” dai, ngaq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, teevq pov taivq-ail, Aqhaqlal Miqyail ngaq bhai uvthaiq lee-a nail ngaol. Heldaiq dei-eiq. Nqtavq kovtavq bhai doiqbev bev ma jiav nail bhai maqkhaiq, doiqbev bev ma al bhai teevq gaq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail bhai maqkhaiq, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

A bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail al gaq, sainl aqnel nail lovmav khi mail aqbhaq mee nia phaq aol nail neltsaiq deel sainl lovmav khe-ai, dul nail ngaol. Aqniul niul nav nav nail sainl lovmav khe-ai dul nail haildallalkov, doiqbev bev ma al nail teevq jaoq jiav nail ngaol.

Doiqbev bev ma al nail teevq jaoq, doiqbev nvq tsel liq bev jiav nail ngaol. Doiqbev al nvq tsel liq bev bhai joiqmaoq mavmaoq nvq tsel liq gaq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqgaq aqdoi aqphul doi-nq khi, heel uqtsaoq tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Doiqbev bev ma a bhai nee mail, nqmeivq meivq khi nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel mee nia phaq meel dol leevq-a nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma al nail sivtavq bhai, phalmanq sivq heeq tovq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Phalmanq al sivq heeq neq, Miqyail nail aqhaqlal sivq gaq ngaol.

Doiqbev bev ma al nail sivtavq bhai sainl khe-ai dul nail phaoqdaiq ngaqkha teevq kha jiav nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma al nail gaoltsi bhai maqkhaiq, jaoq jaoq dai maqkhaiq, aqdoevq phaq liq maol jaol nail ngaol. Al juq neq, sivtavq phao maqkhaiq, haoqnaol phao maqkhaiq, maivneev teevq bhee covq nail ngaol.

Iqmoeq khe maol neq, allaqjaqsil khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Nvq maol teevq maol neq, niaoqnel niaoqkhal khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Hail maol teevq maol neq, tsaol-aq nail maivphaoq covq nail ngaol. Liq maol teevq maol neq, bhail nail joelma maol ma khe-ai dul mail ngaol.

Aqdoevq phaq al liq maol neq, yaoq maol yaoq-ao nee aqdaol kovq daol covq nail ngaol. Lavqkhoel phao maqkhaiq, lavqniil phao maqkhaiq, maivneev teevq bhee covq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, gaqnaq maq naq dai, niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail neq,
meeq dee haol deedee nail ngaol.
Meeq dee haol deedee nail ngaol.
Meeq dee haol deedee nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, milnee uqnee iqsanl,
niil aq-il iqsanl doevq khi,
yaqhao iqsanl yavq kha lee nail
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
doevq nail Miqyail ngaol” dai,
khaq mao iqsanl gul nail ngaol.

Aqdoevq phaq al liq maol neq, doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail gaq bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel nail nee ovqtavq, aivq bhai ev ev-ail, “Seiqleiq khaoqsail jiav dei-eiq” dai, gul-u phao,

joiqmaoq mavmaoq al nvq tsel liq gaq iqsanl, doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail al gaq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail al gaq bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma al nail sivtavq bhai aqyu juq nail heel uqtsaoq loev thaq khi ge nail:
“Nvjuq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail-ol,
yu naoq bhai tsiqeeq
tsiqheel nail maqkhaiq,
ev nail maqkhaiq,
naol bhaqaoq
ya dai maqkhaiq,
geel-nvq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee,
naoq-i mail
teivq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Naoq nail neenoeq
needul bhaqda nee,
naol al juq bhai
teivq-ai thaq khi,
al juq pevq lal-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq nail lavqmal lavq phao pavqyov yov-ai thaq nail haoqgavq teevq yov aol nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Haoqgavq al yov nail kovtavq phao maqkhaiq, lavqkhoel phao maqkhaiq, haoqgavq gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Haoqgavq al yov nail kovtavq bhai junq sivq dao deeq khi pheethaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, gaq mao-ail kav nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq aqthel aqkav kav dai gul nail: “Haoqgavq niil yov bhai phao khi, junq deeq-ai thaq nail juq bhai oil ha nail, khaq sil gaq geel-nvq nail-aiq” dai, gul nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Haoqgavq al yov bhai neq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, miltsaq nail kov-uvq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, teevq gaq-ail maq phao nia-ail, maq heldaiq nia-ail.
Haoqgavq al yov bhai phao nail maqkhaiq, ge nail maqkhaiq, geel-nvq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq bhai iqsanl maq halpov moel-a nail ngel-i mail, ngal nioil deedee-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, joiqmaoq mavmaoq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq ngaq bhai niailhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol: “Thaq nioil. Yuldav nail tsaol-aq nail jeq-e jaq-a lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail, allaqjaqsil dai khul nail, Daqbhil nail daoqtsail pevq nail gaq, gaq lai-aoq nail ngaol. Alheel ngel-i mail, haoqgavq al yov bhai iqsanl, junq deeq-ai thaq nail sivq laiq bhai iqsanl, aivq phao nia nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, doiqbev bev ma khi mail aqdoevq phaq al liq maol nail gaoltsi bhai maqkhaiq, joiqmaoq mavmaoq al juq nail gaoltsi bhai maqkhaiq, thulphaol-nvq thaq nail yaol yaq bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yaol yaq al maol neq, deeq heivq nail bhai ya daq daiq-a nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq neq, uqkheel sivq kheel covq khi, maivneev sivq neev covq nail ngaol. Maivneev al sivq neev neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai doi dai, Miqyail-i mail khoel-ai leevq-a nail, aqhaqlal sivq gaq bhai ge nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, Yaolyaq al gaq lai khi, doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq nail lavqmal lavq bhai aol nail yov-ai thaq nail haoqgavq al yov oil lai-a nail ngaol.

Aivq laiqyov-ai thaq nail haoqgavq al yov oil-u phao, aqdoevq phaq al liq maol khi mail joiqmaoq mavmaoq al nvq tsel liq gaq Yaolyaq nail sivtavq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail dil-nvq aol khi, tovq khi danq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail heel maiqgaoq iqsanl, tsinq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Huqbhiq nil nail al phaq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq nail geeqlaoq hal daoq ngaol.
Aqyu juq tsiqeeq nail daoqsel aqsivq niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Haoqgavq pavqyov
al yov oil khi
junq deeq-ai thaq nail
juq bhai phao nail neq,
naol geel-nvq nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
naol deeq heivq nail bhai
ya daq-a nail ngaol.
Khul phaq nail
jeq-e bhai maqkhaiq,
khul phaq nail daoq ge nail
tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq,
jeq-e jaq-a
iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq,
milkhaoq yaoq khaoq
yaoq-ao nee maqkhaiq,
naol naoq nail aqsivq-i mail
Miqyail nail haqbhoil
tsaol-aq yaq bhai
ul kovq-a nail ngaol.
Naol aqyu juq bhai
Miqyail Milkhaoq
lavqkhoel bhai
heeqphaq
pevq lal dai maqkhaiq,
aivq nail Philma
pevq lal dai maqkhaiq,
nl bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq
miltsaq kovtavq bhai
ya uvthaiq nail ngaol” dai,
gul nail ngaol.

Ngal gaoq heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, mao deedee nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail aqthel ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqdoevq phaq liq maol khi mail joiqmaoq mavmaoq al nvq tsel liq gaq bhai maqkhaiq, doiqbev bev ma al bhai maqkhaiq, teevq jaoq jaoljaoq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqsainv aqlanv gaq bhee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aqthel aqkav kav dai, niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Deeq heivq nail bhai
ya daq-a nail Yaolyaq neq,
bhaqaoq maqkhaiq,
phul heel ildaoq
maoqgaiq maqkhaiq,
neenoeq neekha maqkhaiq,
gaq kav nail phaq maqkhaiq,
ev nail phaq maqkhaiq,
seiqleiq khaoqsail maqkhaiq,
tsiqeeq nail phaq maqkhaiq,
ya nail geel-nvq nail ngaol” dai,
gul nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, miltsaq kov-uvq bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, iqyaq iqma bhai jaol nail juq maqkhaiq, al juq iqsanl mail niailhai ge nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol:
“Joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai
jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail
gaq bhai maqkhaiq,
Yaolyaq bhai maqkhaiq,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
tsiqeeq nail phaq,
ev nail phaq,
seiqleiq khaoqsail
khi mail uvthaiq nail
bhaqaoq jiav dei-eiq” dai,
aqyu juq gul nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, aqdoevq phaq al liq maol, “Aqmiq” dai, ge-a nail ngaol. Joiqmaoq mavmaoq al juq neq, peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, Yaolyaq neq, junq deeq-ai thaq nail al sivq laiq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq laiq bhai phao nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqdoevq phaq al liq maol nail lavqkhoel khe teevq maol nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel khe-ai, “Lal yaoq” dai, mailma-ail khul nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, moeqphaq aqphul teevq maol bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Moeqphaq al maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq, heeqnav teevq khaoq bavq-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq bhai heel uqtsaoq bhi tsaoq khi, aivq neq, gaq lai-a nail gaq bhi pevq-a nail khe-ai, neejiav jiav nail juq bhai gaq lai dai, dov ail-a nail ngaol.
Yaolyaq neq, junq deeq-ai thaq nail nvq laiq teevq laiq bhai phao-u phao, aqdoevq phaq nvq maol teevq maol, “Lal yaoq” dai, khul nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, moeqphaq aqnel teevq maol dov lee-a nail ngaol. Moeqphaq al maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai tsaol-aq yaq nail gaiqlaq bhai, tsaq lai jil lai nail phaq bhai oil dov khi, aqyu juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq bhi deeq heivq nia nail aqkhaoqanq bivq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aivq bhai thaoma keiv ma teevq keiv bivq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolyaq junq deeq-ai thaq nail hail laiq teevq laiq bhai phao-u phao, aqdoevq phaq hail maol teevq maol, “Lal yaoq” dai, khul nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, moeqphaq aqnav teevq maol bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Moeqphaq al maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq, jaluq teevq laiq oil-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Aqdoevq phaq al liq maol nail gaoltsi bhai, daoq ge nail khe-ai dul nail aqthel bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq, niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Moevq nail sivq nail phaq kev lee khi, gov teevq bhanq bhai teevq bavq ngaol. Laoqloil hail bhanq bhai teevq bavq ngaol. Aqtseel khi aqheeq tsilju nail ullul thaq bhi cov-ail” dai, ge nail gaol.
Yaolyaq neq, junq deeq-ai thaq nail liq laiq teevq laiq bhai phao-u phao, aqdoevq phaq liq maol teevq maol, “Lal yaoq” dai, khul nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, aqheel heel nav nav nail moeqphaq teevq maol bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Moeqphaq al maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq bhai, sil nail heeqphaq dai khul nail ngaol. Sil nail milkhaoq nail heeqphaq aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq bhai miltsaq niil liq bhoil teevq bhoil bhai uvthaiq nail aqkhaoqanq bivq-a nail ngaol. Thaoma, moevq nail sivq nail, nal nail goel nail khi, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq juq, niil juq bhai juq juq-ail yu bhai lav heivq dai iqsanl, aqyu nvq gaq aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol.

Yaolyaq neq, junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaq laiq teevq laiq bhai phao-u phao, laol duq nail kov-uvq bhai aqhaqlal juq jaol nail bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqhaqlal al juq neq, Miqyail nail daoq cavq-a nail bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, salkhil khanq-a nail bhaqda nee maqkhaiq, deeq heivq nail bhai ya daq-a nail tsaol-aq nail aqhaqlal ngaol.

Aqyu juq aqthel aqkav kav dai, gul nail: “Tsaq nail phaq aol khi meeq nail haol nail, bhaqaoq eeq nail Heeqphaq-ol, nvjuq nail aqsivq bhai bhi il dov gil lavq-a nail miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq bhai, yalkhaq dal khi khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail, khaq mao kev dai, jiav-ai haq nail-aiq” dai, gul nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqyu juq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai phulleq deel phailkhaoq heelma teevq gaq bhai teevq keiv bivq-a nail ngaol. “Nuljuq khe-ai deeq heivq-a nail bhai ya daq-a nail, nuljuq khe-ai Khali nail yaqkav jiovq khi nuljuq nail aqivq jaqbheq pevq nail, nuljuq iqsanl nail munl bhee lal dai neq, teevq yanq daonq haq lao” dai, aqyu juq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Yaolyaq junq deeq-ai thaq nail kovq laiq teevq laiq bhai phao nail bhai ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, milluv luv deedee nail bhai ya gaiq, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Nlma navtsee deel jinq daqiq khe-ai pevq-ail khi, bhala iqsanl aqsivq khe-ai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Lilmoel lil ma bhoe lal khi, heeqguq aqheeq aqjiq ga nail khe-ai, nqtavq bha jiav nail aqgil juq miltsaq kovtavq bhai ga lee-a nail ngaol.
Haoqgavq aqpavq laiqyov nail khe-ai, nqtavq peivq ail-a nail ngaol. Gaoqjaoq iqsanl khi, eeljaol laol-n iqsanl yovqgavq nail jaol duq nee jiiv dov ail-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, milkhaoq khe heeqphaq juq maqkhaiq, eeq nail heel nail juq maqkhaiq, genl dev nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail aqivq juq maqkhaiq, hulmeeq meeq khi bhaqaoq jiav nail juq maqkhaiq, yaoq juq yaoq maqkhaiq, yaqkav juq khi yaqkav maq ngel nail juq maqkhaiq, lovphail khaoqbhaoq lavqkhoel khi gaoqjaoq bhai jiav nail lovmav juq nail gaiqlaq bhai tsaoq uvq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq gaoqjaoq juq khi lovmav juq bhai khul khul-ail khi, “Doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq, nvjuq bhai maq ya moel dai maqkhaiq, Yaolyaq neema phail nail bhai, nvjuq ya jel-ail dai maqkhaiq, nvjuq bhai uvthaiq lee lavq yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, geesil deedee lal heeq phaq-ail pevq nail aqyu nvq gaq neema phail nail aqn kev lee-aoq thaq nail bhai, khaq sil gaq khanq tsaol heeq” dai, gul nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, milma liq phaoq liq khoel bhai nqtavq gaqkhoel liq gaq thulphaol nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, iqyaq iqma bhai maqkhaiq, aqbhaol iqsanl juq bhai maqkhaiq, lilmoel maq bhi bhoe dai, milma liq phaoq liq khoel nail lilmoel bhai nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel yaoq gaq yaoq, nlma dovkhoeq phao nee dav lal nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, doevq nail Miqyail nail junq aol nail ngaol. Aivq miltsaq khi mail iqyaq iqma bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail bhaqaoq ya-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al liq gaq bhai, niailhai gul bhiq-a nail ngaol:

“Ngadao nail Miqyail nail yaqkav juq nail neeqthel bhai aivq nail junq maq deeq gaq-u neq, miltsaq bhai maqkhaiq, iqyaq iqma bhai maqkhaiq, aqbhaol juq bhai maqkhaiq, thaq khoeq thaq jiovq bhiq haq lao” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, junq deeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq khadai gaq jaol nail-aiq dai, ngal yaq gaiq-a nail ngaol. Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail lavqkhoel, junq deeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq sainv liq meel-nvq liq hinl gaq jaol nail ngaol.
Yuldav nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Lulbheiq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Gav nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Aqsaqnail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Naqtaqlil nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Maqnaqseiq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Silmiqoq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Leiqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Ilsaqkhaq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Seiqbhulloq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Yaolsai nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Bheiqyaqmiq nail jeq-e jaq-a
lavqkhoel khe
teevq meel-nvq nvq hinl gaq.
Tsaol-aq niidai gaq bhai junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, khul phaq nail jeq-e bhai maqkhaiq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, khul phaq nail daoq ge nail tsaol-aq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, teevq gaq iqsanl maq ge gil tsaol nail tsaol-aq munl munl ma bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, phulleq deel phailkhaoq heelma doi khi, aqyu juq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai neq, dal-aol lavqmeiv bavq-nvq thaq khi, doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai khi, Yaolyaq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aqthel aqkav kav dai gul nail:
“Joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai
jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail
ngadao nail Miqyail khi mail,
Yaolyaq bhaqda nee,
hevqkovq nail phaq
ya-a nail ngaol” dai,
gul nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl mail, doiqbev bev ma bhai maqkhaiq, joiqmaoq mavmaoq juq bhai maqkhaiq, aqdoevq phaq liq maol bhai maqkhaiq, teevq jaoq thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaq khoel al juq, doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq phao peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq ge nail:
“Aqmiq!
Geeqlaoq eeq nail
phaq maqkhaiq,
seiqleiq khaoqsail maqkhaiq,
neenoeq neekha maqkhaiq,
tsiqeeq nail phaq maqkhaiq,
ev nail phaq maqkhaiq,
bhaqaoq khi mail
gaq kav nail phaq maqkhaiq,
ngadao nail Miqyail nail
kovtavq bhai nqmaq maqluv
halyeel jiav dei-eiq.
Aqmiq” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, joiqmaoq mavmaoq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail teevq gaq ngaq bhai, “Phulleq dai phailkhaoq heelma doi-nq thaq nail tsaol-aq niil juq, khaq sil gaq. Aqyu juq khaq bha nee mail lal-a nail-aiq” dai, naldaiq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, aivq bhai, “Heeqphaq-ol, naol heeq nia nail ngaol” dai, ge kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, aivq ge nail: “Tsaol-aq niil juq neq, kav deedee nail khoeq nail jiovq nail lavqkhoel nee dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, yovqgavq nail phailkhaoq heelma bhai, Yaolyaq nail aqsivq-i mail phulleq dai, tsiq haol-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, aqyu juq Miqyail nail doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq phao jaol khi, aivq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, aivq nail ganl nl thailthaiq nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq, aqyu juq nee mail jaol khi, aqyu juq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq, aoq iqsanl, ulcuvq iqsanl, maq moevq lal yaoq-aol. Nltsal covq nail bhai maqkhaiq, aqlaol haquvq nail khul phaq bhai maqkhaiq, maq ya daq yaoq-aol.

Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, doiqbev bev ma nail gaoltsi bhai jaol nail Yaolyaq neq, yaol bhai lovq phail bhiq nail khe-ai, aqyu juq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq nail ngaol. Aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail ulcuvq eelbev jiav nail bhai, aqyu juq bhai hel-aivq nail ngaol. Miqyail aqyu juq nail maivbhil iqsanl bhai siv bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Yaolyaq junq deeq-ai thaq nail sivq laiq teevq laiq bhai phao-u phao, naqli teevq khaoqaiq niidai, nqtavq kovtavq bhai aqtsi tsu dai pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel al sivq gaq bhai, teevq gaq bhai nqbho teevq bhao bivq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, heel iqlaoq tsiq-nq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel yaoq gaq yaoq dov lee khi, laol duq aqjail bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai jiav nail heel-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail laol duq nail kovtavq bhai, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq iqsanl nail geeqlaoq nee mail laol bhai nail dai khi, tovq khi danq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq maodai, aivq bhai bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai aol nail tovq khi danq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq nail miqkhoiq neq, aivq nail tsaol-aq nail geeqlaoq hal daoq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai dav lai-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, iqlaoq al heeq bhai tsiq khi, laol duq bhai tovq thailthaiq nail miqjaq teevq bhoi tsiq bhoel khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai liv kha gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqjaiq jaiq nail mee nia phaq nail aqthel meel dol leevq-a nail ngaol. Nqmeivq iqsanl meivq, milluv iqsanl luv lal-a nail ngaol.
Nqbho sivq laiq oil-nq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al sivq gaq, nqbho jiiv nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel iqmoeq khe gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, aqsivq kheq nail ollov khi miqjaq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai ga lee-a nail ngaol. Miqjaq al-i mail miltsaq hail bhoil teevq bhoil bhai maqkhaiq, aqbhaol hail bhoil teevq bhoil bhai maqkhaiq, niul jiaovq deel moeqgaq iqsanl maqkhaiq, poiv jaq gil-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel nvq gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, miqjaq tovq nail gaoqjaoq jaoq ma khe-ai dul nail teevq phaq, iqyaq iqma bhai liv puvq-a nail ngaol. Iqyaq iqma hail bhoil teevq bhoil aqsivq pevq ail-a nail ngaol.
Iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel khe aqdoevq juq, hail bhoil teevq bhoil sil-a nail ngaol. Laovq hail bhoil teevq bhoil iqsanl, cov ail-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel hail gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, miqjaq jaibhoil khe-ai tovq nail aqgil gil ma teevq heeq nqtavq nee ga lee khi, ulcuvq laol jaol hail bhoil teevq bhoil nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ulcuvq eelbev juq nail kovtavq bhai maqkhaiq, ga dav-a nail ngaol.
Aqgil al heeq bhai, aqkhaq khaq deedee nail aqbhaol dai khul nail ngaol. Ulcuvq hail bhoil teevq bhoil bhai neq, aqkhaq pevq-ail khi dov lal-a nail ngel-i mail, tsaol-aq maodai gaq sil-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel liq gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, nlma hail bhoil teevq bhoil, bhala hail bhoil teevq bhoil khi aqgil hail bhoil teevq bhoil cov ail-a nail ngel-i mail, al juq nail aqbhaq hail bhoil teevq bhoil navtsee dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol. N-gaol hail bhoil teevq bhoil aqbhaq maq bhaq mail, nqkiv hail bhoil teevq bhoil iqsanl alhai dul dai, aqbhaq maq bhaq-ail.

Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, nqtavq nail gaoltsi bhai joelma maol ma teevq maol bhail nail ngaol. Joelma al maol mailma-ail kav nail aqthel nee ge nail: “Allol-oq, nqbho maq ya jiiv-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al hail gaq, nqbho jiiv lal-a nail aqthel bhaqda nee, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq yaq geeqlaoq aqdoil, geeqlaoq aqdoil, geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol” dai, gul nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel ngaq gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, nqtavq nee mail miltsaq kovtavq bhai ga lee thaq nail aqgil teevq heeq bhai ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqgil al heeq bhai mao-ail navq nail khaqduq nail taovq taovqphoil bivq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aqgil al heeq mao-ail navq nail khaqduq al duq bhai phao-a nail ngaol. Miqjaq jaibhoil bhoil ma nail miqkhoiq khe-ai, khaqduq al duq nee miqkhoiq dov lal-a nail ngaol. Miqkhoiq al bhaqda nee, nlma navtsee dai pevq-ail khi, lilmoel lavqkhoel bhai iqsanl navtsee dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Miqkhoiq al nail lavqkhoel nee, noelbhoel maodai dov lal khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai ga lee-a nail ngaol. Noelbhoel al juq bhai miltsaq kovtavq khe bhoiqkeiv lavqmav nail bhaqaoq khe-ai dul nail bhaqaoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

“Miltsaq kovtavq bhai doevq nail moeqgaq bhai maqkhaiq, aqpavq aqniul khal niul nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee bhai maqkhaiq, aqbhaol iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, thaq lav cov dei-eiq, neeqthel bhai Miqyail nail junq maq deeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq bhai taivq-ail lav cov yaoq” dai, noelbhoel al juq bhai ge bhiq-a ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, noelbhoel al juq, tsaol-aq bhai lav heivq nail aqkhaoqanq maq ya-al. Bhala ngaq heeq bhee dai, khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail aqkhaoqanq taivq-ail ya-a nail ngaol. Noelbhoel-i mail keivq nail bhai ya daq nail gaq neq, bhoiqkeiv lavqmav-i mail keivq-a nail khe-ai, nal nail ngaol.

Aqyanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel neq, tsaol-aq yaq juq sil nail phaq bhai halpov khi ngaol-aoq, maq halpov moel nia-ail. Aqyu juq sil movq deedee khi ngaol-aoq, sil nail phaq aqyu juq nee mail tsaoq dol-aivq nail ngaol.

Noelbhoel al juq neq, genl dev nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail moeqphaq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Heel uqtsaoq khe-ai dul nail phaq noelbhoel al juq nail uqhuq bhai tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail maivphaoq neq, tsaol-aq nail maivphaoq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail tsailkheel neq, yaqmai-aq nail tsailkheel khe-ai dul khi, aqyu juq nail aqhaoq neq, allaqjaqsil nail aqhaoq khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail neema bhai doeqdaq nail phaq neq, hail-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail aqdaol daol deedee nail aqthel neq, genl dev nail bhai tsaol-aivq nail moeqphaq lalaoq maodai nail aqthel khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail daoqmiq neq, bhoiqkeiv lavqmav nail daoqmiq khe-ai dul khi, daoqmiq bhai bhaiqnieivq covq khi dovq aol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail daoqmiq lavqkhoel bhai, bhala ngaq heeq bhee dai, tsaol-aq yaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail bhaqaoq aol nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nail heeqphaq neq, mao-ail navq nail khaqduq nail gaqkhoel ngaol. Aivq nail aqmil neq, Heiqbhail daoq Aqbhaqdoq dai, khul khi, Heiqlaqsal daoq neq, Aqphaollil-oq dai, mil-ai thaq nail ngaol. Daoqceevq neq, lav luq lav seil nail gaq dai, ge nail ngaol.
Geeqlaoq aqdoil iqmoeq khe phaq gil-aoq nail ngaol. Geeqlaoq aqdoil nvq phaq gaoq kev lee-ai haq nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel kovq gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai jiav nail heel-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail laol duq nail uqkheel liq kheel nee mail aqthel meel dol leevq-a nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqthel al neq “Ulbhaqlal laoljaol jaol ma nail jail-nq bhai pheethaiq-ai thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel liq gaq bhai phaiq bhiq yaoq” dai, nqbho oil-nq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel kovq gaq teevq gaq bhai ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, miltsaq tsaol-aq yaq juq bhai hail bhoil teevq bhoil heivq nail dai khi, lainq-ai thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al liq gaq bhai Miqyail-i mail phaiq bhiq khi, aqyanq al yanq nail haqbhoil, aqkovq al kovq nail haqbhoil, bhala al heeq nail haqbhoil, aqn al n nail haqbhoil, bhi jaol-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail genl dev nail juq khadai gaq bhee nail dai, ngal ya gaiq-a ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, nvq yal lanv gaq bhee nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal lavqkhoel nee ngaq-i mail ya moel-a nail moeqphaq khi mail, moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail juq neq, niailhai ngaol. Moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail al juq neq, neema bhai doeqdaq duq doi-nq thaq nail ngaol. Doeqdaq duq al neq, miqjaq khe-ai neltsaiq dai nel khi, lenl lenl nav khi mail miqjal jalheel khe-ai heel tsaiq deel ngaol. Moeqphaq al juq nail uqhuq neq, allaqjaqsil nail uqhuq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, moeqthaoq lavqkhoel bhai miqjaq miqlail, miqjaq nail miqkhoiq khi mail miqjal jalheel dov lal thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee dov lal thailthaiq nail miqjaq miqlail, miqjaq miqkhoiq khi mail, miqjal jalheel kheq nail, khoeq nail jiovq nail niil hail phaq bhaqda nee, miltsaq tsaol-aq hail bhoil teevq bhoil sil-a nail ngaol.

Moeqphaq al juq nail bhaqaoq neq, aqyu juq nail moeqthaoq khi mail daoqmiq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail daoqmiq neq, eellel khe-ai dul khi, uqhuq iqsanl covq nail ngaol. Uqhuq al nee mail yu bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khoeq nail jiovq nail al hail phaq nail kov-uvq bhai maq sil dai jel ail-a nail tsaol-aq, yovqgavq nail aqlavq-i mail nl-ai thaq nail juq bhai maq noeq pov-ail, aqyu juq neq, neivq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail maqkhaiq, phul, heel, giqheel, lovmav khi mail aqbhaol-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail maq moel nia, maq gaiq nia, gailkhaol iqsanl maq tsao nia nail thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail maqkhaiq, aqyu juq maq khaonq ha-al.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, yu bhai heivq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, neivq bhai laol nail sail nail phaq maqkhaiq, khaqmiq sev nail phaq maqkhaiq, yu nail nlmaoq bhai khoiq nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, maq noeq pov-ail.

Aq-u phao, gaq mao-ail kav nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq nqdil doi khi, nqtavq nee mail yavq kha lee thailthaiq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, haildallalkov uqjeeq jeeq-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nail maivphaoq neq, nlma khe-ai dul khi, aivq nail aqkhil neq, miqjaq nail ilkhel khe-ai, dul nail ngaol.

Aivq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai phao-ai thaq nail haoqgavq pavqyov yov yaq teevq yov aol nail ngaol. Aivq nail lavqmal phao khe aqkhil neq, iqyaq iqma bhai naoq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Lavqtsel phao khe aqkhil neq, miltsaq bhai naoqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Allaqjaqsil geeq nail khe-ai, aivq aqthel mailma-ail gul nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel sivq thel meel dol leevq-a nail ngaol.

Nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel meel dov-ai leevq gaq-u phao, ngal aqthel al bhai gevq thaq-ai nail khi ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq nee mail aqthel meel dov-ai leevq khi, “Nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel sivq thel meel dov-ai leevq nail bhai junq deeq yaoq. Al bhai thaq gevq” dai, ge lavq nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, iqyaq iqma khi miltsaq bhai naoqthaiq-ai khi thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai ngaq-i mail ya moel-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, aivq nail lavqmal lavq nqtavq phao bhaqdil-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail gaq pevq nail, nqtavq, miltsaq, iqyaq iqma khi al juq nail lavqkhoel khe khal doevq khal jaol nail phaq iqsanl bhai teivq-a nail Miqyail nail aqmil kov-uvq nee niailhai ge nail ngaol: “Aqyanq maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq teevq gaq, aivq nail nqbho jiiv nail aqthel meel dol leevq nail aqyanq kev lee-u phao, Miqyail-i mail oil tsail-ai thaq nail phaq bhee lal nail ngaol. Oil tsail-ai thaq nail al phaq neq, Miqyail nail yaqkav pevq nail aivq nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai ge-ai thaq nail khe-ai pevq lal naol” dai, khanq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq nee mail meel dov-ai leevq nail bhai, ngaq-i mail ya gaiq-a nail aqthel al, ngaq bhai niailhai gaoq ge lavq-a nail ngaol: “Iqyaq iqma khi miltsaq nail kovtavq bhai naoqthaiq khi thulphaol-nvq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai aol nail, phao-ai thaq nail haoqgavq al yov oil lai yaoq” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, “Ngaq bhai haoqgavq yov yaq thoil yov bivq lavq yaoq” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq bhai ge bhiq lai-a nail ngaol. Aivq ge nail: “Oil khi jaq yaoq. Naoq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai aqkhaq ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, naoq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel bhai neq, bhaiqtsil bhaiqeel khe-ai tsilju gaoq deel ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ngal nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai aol nail haoqgavq yov yaq al yov bhai oil jaq-a nail ngaol. Ngaq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel bhai neq, bhaiqtsil bhaiqeel khe-ai tsilju gaoq dai, pevq-ail nial. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haoqgavq al yov jaq gaq-u phao, ngaq nail ovqmav lavqkhoel bhai neq, aqkhaq khaq lal-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, aivq ngaq bhai gaoq ge lavq-a nail: “Tsaol jeq-e maodai jeq-e nail ganl maqkhaiq, milkhaoq maodai khaoq nail ganl maqkhaiq, daoq mee nia phaq nail ganl maqkhaiq, heeqphaq maodai gaq nail ganl maqkhaiq, Miqyail naoq bhai bhi ge lavq nail khe-ai, naol ya ge bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, tsa daiq nail phaq khe-ai dul nail lunl aqkhaoq teevq khaoq ngaq bhai bivq lavq khi ge lavq-a nail: “Thul yaoq. Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma bhai maqkhaiq, laol duq bhai maqkhaiq, tsa daiq khi, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail lavqkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq lal-a nail juq bhai, ge daiq yaoq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nail khainl lavqkhoel jaoq jaoq dai jiav nail jaol duq

Ngaq nail salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq nvq gaq bhai ngal bhaqaoq bivq khi bhi lee naol. Aqyu nvq gaq daqiq doi-nq thaq khi, teevq hinl nvq yal kovq tsel n bhee dai, Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu nvq gaq neq, miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail iqsanl nail Heeqphaq pevq nail gaq nail sivtavq bhai doevq nail saqloq aqbhaol nvq bhaol pevq nail nee ovqtavq, phalmanq nvq heeq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav, aqyu nvq gaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail khi-u phao, aqyu nvq gaq nail moeqthaoq nee mail miqjaq dov lal khi, aqyu nvq gaq bhai neejiav jiav nail juq bhai poiv ha nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav aqyu nvq gaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail dai, laijai haq neq, alhai ya sil nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq Miqyail nail daoq cavq bhiq thailthaiq-u phao, maoq-aol maq bhi aol lee dai, nqtavq bha lav tsoiq nia nail bhaqaoq, aqyu nvq gaq aol nail ngaol. Ulcuvq bhai aqsivq bhi pevq lal nia nail bhaqaoq iqsanl, aol nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq khadai pov nl movq khi ngaol-aoq, khoeq nail jiovq nail yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, miltsaq kovtavq bhai kev lee dai, nl nia nail bhaqaoq aol nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq salkhil khanq gaq haq neq, mao-ail navq nail khaqduq nee dov lal-a nail haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol, aqyu nvq gaq bhai genl dev nail ngaol. Aivq aqyu nvq gaq bhai genl dev nail gaq lai khi heivq nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq nail aqmaol bhai, meenq meenq ma nail gailkhaol bhai he ha-ai thaq nail ngaol. Meenq al meenq neq, aqyu nvq gaq nail Heeqphaq lavqyavq kovtavq bhai tavq heivq-a nail meenq ngaol. Aqhaqlal phao nee tsiqceiv dai haq neq, Saoldoq meenq khi mail Iljiltuv milkhaoq ngaol.

Aq-u phao, khul phaq nail jeq-e lavqkhoel bhai aol nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maqkhaiq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail lavqkhoel bhai aol nail tsaol-aq juq maqkhaiq, daoq khul phaq ge nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, milkhaoq juq nail lavqkhoel bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq maqkhaiq, tsaol-aq niil juq neq, hail n ovqtavq, teevq pav aqyu nvq gaq nail aqmaol bhai heldaiq lal-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq bhai maq bhi duqpheeq dai, lav tsoiq-a nail ngaol.

Aqyu nvq gaq sil-a nail ngel-i mail, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq juq lavqkhiq tsail deedee khi bhaoqaiq lav sav-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq teevq gaq nee teevq gaq, kovpavq bivq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail al nvq gaq neq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq yaq juq bhai haq dee aoq deedee nail phaq bhi kev lee-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, hail n ovqtavq teevq pav bhee lal-u phao, Miqyail nee mail dov lee-a nail bhi doevq lal nia nail aqhaq aqyu nvq gaq nail lavqkhoel bhai aol lee khi, aqyu nvq gaq thul lal-a nail ngaol. A bhai ya moel-a nail juq geesil deedee lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq nee mail aqthel meel dov-ai leevq khi, “Niilniai dav lal yaoq” dai, aqyu nvq gaq bhai khul nail bhai, aqyu nvq gaq ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq, aqyu nvq gaq bhai neejiav jiav nail tsaol-aq nail sivtavq nee nqdil bhai jeeq khi nqtavq kovtavq bha dav lai-a nail bhai iqsanl aqyu juq ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Yanq al yanq nail lavqkhoel milluv luv deedee lal-a nail bhaqda nee meenq al meenq tsel bhoil nee teevq bhoil cov-ail khi, tsaol-aq sivq hinl gaq sil-a nail ngaol. Jail-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq, geesil deedee lal bhiq khi, nqtavq kovtavq khe jaol nail Miqyail bhai tsiqeeq tsiqheel-a nail ngaol.
Geeqlaoq aqdoil nvq phaq teevq phaq gil-aoq nail ngaol. Heldaiq dei-eiq. Geeqlaoq aqdoil hail phaq teevq phaq lavqtsail mail kev lee nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq teevq gaq nqbho jiiv-u phao, nqtavq nee mail kav deedee nail aqthel niailhai meel dol leevq-a nail ngaol:
“Miltsaq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq neq,
ngadao nail Heeqphaq Miqyail
khi mail aivq nail Khali nail
pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aivq neq, nqmaq maqluv
halyeel uvthaiq nail ngaol” dai,
meel dol leevq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail sivtavq-ai yovqgavq nail doiqbev bev ma bhai yovqgavq jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail joiqmaoq mavmaoq nvq tsel liq gaq peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail ge nail:
“Aq-u iqsanl,
niil aq-il iqsanl doevq khi,
iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail-ol,
eeq deedee nail
naoq nail bhaqaoq oil khi
niil aq-il uvthaiq lee-aoq nail
ngel-i mail,
naoq bhai tsiq eeq naol.
Milkhaoq yaq juq
neema phail lal khi,
naol iqsanl neema phail
deedee lal-a nail ngaol.
Sil-a nail tsaol-aq bhai
yalkhaq dal nail aqyanq
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Naoq nail haqbhoil
gedan nail yaqkav
juq bhai maqkhaiq,
naoq nail tsaol-aq
juq bhai maqkhaiq,
naoq nail aqmil bhai ev nail
eeq yaq nil yaq
iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq,
geeqlaoq bivq nail aqyanq
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Miltsaq bhai
lav cov-a nail juq bhai
lav cov nail aqyanq iqsanl
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq bha jiav nail Miqyail nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma phao lal khi, al nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail daoqma saljial nail thunq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nqmeivq meivq nail phaq khi, nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel gaiq lee-a nail nee ovqtavq, milluv luv deedee khi, ollov aqheeq ga deedee nail niil juq pevq lal-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail eeq deedee nail phaq nqtavq bha, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yaqmai-aq teevq gaq nlma doi khi, bhala bhai naoqthaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, aqgil tsel-nvq heel covq nail uqtsaoq tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq yaqbeiv uvq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aivq yaq tsiq nail dai khi, nal deedee nail ngel-i mail, gul thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Bhi heeq bhi moel nail yaoq phaq yaoq nqtavq bha, ngal gaoq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Neltsaiq deel baivyaovq maol ma teevq maol dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, uqhuq sivq huq covq khi, uqkheel tsel kheel covq nail ngaol. Aivq nail uqhuq bhai heel uqtsaoq sivq tsaoq tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq nail daoqmiq-i mail nqtavq bha jiav nail aqgil hail bhoil teevq bhoil bhai jiivq jil khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai liv bhoel-ai leevq-a ngaol. Yaq tsiq nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq nail yaq doevq lee-u phao, yaq al gaq bhai ya jaq dai, baivyaovq al maol yaqmai-aq al gaq nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq yaqyov tsiq-a nail ngaol. Yaqyov niil gaq neq, yaqhao hail nail joiqniovq nee milkhaoq iqsanl bhai, uvthaiq nail gaq ngaol. Yaqyov al gaq bhai Miqyail jaol nail bha khi Miqyail nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai teevq pov taivq-ail tsiq dal laivq-a nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq haqtsoiq haqyal bha tsaol-aivq-a nail ngaol. A bhai, teevq hinl nvq yal kovq tsel n bhee dai, aivq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq nail dai, Miqyail aivq nail haqbhoil jaol duq lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq kovtavq bhai genl genl ma dev nail thaiq lal-a nail ngaol. Milgeiqlal khi aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq baivyaovq al maol bhai dev pheeljaq-a nail ngaol. Baivyaovq al maol khi aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel iqsanl, aqyu juq bhai genl dev lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, baivyaovq al maol khi aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel juq maq gaq lai-ail khi, aqyu juq nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol duq maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Aq-u phao, neivq heeqphaq maq ngel haq neq, Saqdaq dai mil-ai thaq nail baivyaovq maol ma al maol bhai, miltsaq kovtavq bhai bavq ha-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, milnee uqnee khe haqeiv nail eellel al maol iqsanl, ngel nail ngaol. Aivq bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai bavq ha-ai leevq-u phao, aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai iqsanl, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai, bavq ha-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq kovtavq bhai aqthel meel deedee nail bhai, ngal niailhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol:
“Niil aq-il ngadao nail Miqyail
hevqkovq nail yanq
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il aivq bhaqaoq
kav deedee nail lavqkhoel nee
uvthaiq nail yanq
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Niil aq-il aivq nail Khali
uvthaiq nail yanq
kev lee-aoq naol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
Miqyail nail sivtavq bhai
ngadao nail aqivq jaqbheq
Khali yaq juq bhai
nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq
oeqbal thaq nail gaq bhai,
gaq lai-aoq nail ngaol.
Yaolyaq nail aqsivq
bhaqda nee maqkhaiq,
aqyu juq-i mail
salkhil khanq nail
bhaqda nee maqkhaiq,
aqyu juq oeqbal thaq nail
al gaq bhai
gaq lai-a nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
aqyu juq neq,
al nail haqbhoil sil iqsanl,
sil tseq nail ngaol.
Alheel ngel-i mail,
nqtavq khi mail
nqtavq kovtavq bhai
jaol nail juq-ol,
lavqkhiq tsail yaoq.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
miltsaq khi iqyaq iqma neq,
geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
neivq heeqphaq neq,
nuljuq nee mail
jaol nail ngaol.
Aivq nail haqbhoil aqyanq
micil maq ngel nail neq,
maq jiav yaoq-aol dai,
heeq nia nail ngel-i mail,
neema phail
deedee nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngaq bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai bavq ha-ai leevq thaq nail niil” dai, baivyaovq al maol heeq nia-u phao, yaqyov tsiq-a nail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail khi the thailthaiq nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq, baivyaovq al maol nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai ya jel-ail dai, joelma maol ma nail aqdaol nvq daol ya-a nail ngaol. Aqdaol al-i mail haqtsoiq haqyal bha bhail-aivq khi, a bhai hail kovq ovqtavq teevq pav, Miqyail aivq bhai heldaiq phail bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai bhi daq jal-aiq nail dai khi, baivyaovq al maol aivq nail moeqthaoq nee mail ulcuvq laoljaol jaol ma khe-ai yaqmai-aq al gaq nail haoqnaol phao peivq ha gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq, miltsaq neq, yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai tsaojao-ai bhiq-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq pav lal khi, baivyaovq-i mail peivq ha-ai leevq-a nail ulcuvq al bhai suv gee gil-a nail ngaol.

Baivyaovq al maol, yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai neema phail deedee lal bhiq khi, jaol-ail ceevq-a nail aivq nail yaq juq bhai genl dev ail-a nail ngaol. Yaq al juq neq, Miqyail-i mail bivq-a nail daoq bhai naldaiq khi, Yeiqsul nail ganl salkhil khanq nail tsaol-aq ngaol.
Baivyaovq al maol, iqyaq iqma nail daolbhaq haqaiq mildai daikhaoq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel nee mail haqeiv nail jaiqyaq teevq maol dov lal nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Jaiqyaq al maol neq, uqkheel tsel kheel covq khi, uqhuq sivq huq covq nail ngaol. Uqkheel al juq bhai heel uqtsaoq tsel tsaoq tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail aqmil juq aivq nail uqhuq juq bhai, gevq thaq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngaq-i mail ya moel-a nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, jaqlaq aqgevq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqkhil neq, aqoel nail aqkhil khe-ai dul khi, aivq nail moeqthaoq neq, allaqjaqsil nail moeqthaoq khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Baivyaovq al maol, jaiqyaq al maol bhai bhaqaoq bivq khi, aivq nail doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel nail aqkhaoqanq iqsanl bivq-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail uqhuq bhai neq, sil heeq phaq-ail deeq pav-ai thaq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, malbavq al meeq lai-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq iqsanl mail jaiqyaq al maol bhai, noeq-u maq dov dai pevq-ail khi, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothe-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai bhaqaoq bivq-a nail baivyaovq bhai, aqyu juq uqhuq thaoq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai iqsanl uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail khi ge nail: “Jaiqyaq niil maol khe-ai khaq sil gaq dul nail-aiq. Khaq sil gaq aivq bhai genl dev tseq nail-aiq” dai, ge nail ngaol.
Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, neema eeq nail heel nail daoq ge khi, Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail ngaol. Aivq bhai bhala liq tsel-nvq heeq bhee dai, bhi uvthaiq-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol Miqyail bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail aqmil bhai maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail jaol duq bhai maqkhaiq, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, khal ge movq-ail ge-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq bhai genl dev gaq nia dai, aivq aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol. Khul phaq nail jeq-e bhai maqkhaiq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, khul phaq nail daoq ge nail tsaol-aq juq bhai maqkhaiq, milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee bhai maqkhaiq, uvthaiq nail aqkhaoqanq iqsanl, ya-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq khi mail miltsaq maq teivq-u nee mail, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel bhai aqmil maq gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol. Haoqgavq phaldoiq al doiq neq, deeq heivq nail bhai ya daq-a nail Yaolyaq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq ngaol.
Naqkhaol khal covq nail tsaol-aq, aqmeeq-ail naldaiq yaoq.
Yu bhai bhi
pheel-aivq nail dai khi,
doevq lee-a nail gaq neq,
ya bhi pheel-aivq nail ngaol.
Yu bhai thaoma-i mail
bhi heivq nail dai khi,
