doevq lee-a nail gaq neq,
thaoma-i mail heivq nail
bhai ya daq nail ngaol.
Ganl niil bhaqda nee,
Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq
oltsaol khi
neema thaqtsaol lal nail
loq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, miltsaq nee mail haqeiv nail jaiqyaq yaoq maol yaoq dov lal nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Jaiqyaq al maol neq, yaol yaq nail uqkheel khe-ai dul nail uqkheel covq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, baivyaovq khe-ai daoq ge nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq niil maol neq, iqmoeq-u khe pov dov lal-a nail jaiqyaq al maol nail bhaqaoq aqsanl oil khi, aivq nail sivtavq bhai yuq-a nail ngaol. Jaiqyaq niil maol neq, sil nail bhai kev dai bhi deeq khi meeq lai-a nail jaiqyaq iqmoeq khe maol bhai, miltsaq yaq iqsanl mail uqhuq thaoq dai, nl-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq nvq maol teevq maol neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail eeq nail phaq nl daiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail sivtavq bhai iqsanl nqtavq nee nail miltsaq bhai kev dai, miqjaq bhi ga lee-a nail ngaol.

Jaiqyaq iqmoeq khe maol nail sivtavq bhai bhi heeq bhi moel nail mee nia phaq nl daiq bhiq nail bhaqaoq ya-ai thaq nail bhai juq khi, miltsaq kovtavq bhai khal jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai hevq bheel-aivq a nail ngaol. “Thaoma-i mail bhi heivq khi ngaol-aoq, maq sil dai doevq nail jaiqyaq iqmoeq khe al maol bhai, thaqeeq thaqheel nail lavqkhoel, jaiqyaq al maol nail maolkhoel lav sav yaoq” dai, miltsaq yaq bhai jaiqyaq nvq maol teevq maol daoq bivq-a nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq iqmoeq khe maol nail maolkhoel al daoq ge nia lal dai, bhi doevq lal nail bhaqaoq, jaiqyaq nvq maol teevq maol aivq ya-a nail ngaol. Maolkhoel al khoel bhai uqhuq maq thaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai, aivq heivq nail bhaqaoq iqsanl ya-a nail ngaol.

Eeq yaq nil yaq juq maqkhaiq, hulmeeq hulbhao juq maqkhaiq, haq nail aoq nail juq maqkhaiq, yaqkav juq maqkhaiq, yaqkav maq ngel nail juq maqkhaiq, lavqmal lavq bhai maq ngel haq neq, neeqthel bhai haqeiv nail jaiqyaq niil maol-i mail junq ya deeq naol dai, ge nail khe-ai, maq deeq dai, teevq gaq-ail maq jel-ail nia-ail.

Junq maq deeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, yalkav maq ya gaoq maq ya ul dai, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq niil maol lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol. Junq deeq-ai thaq nail al neq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq niil maol nail aqmil maq ngel haq neq, aivq nail nanqpav ngaol.

Ganl niil heeq kivq dai, neenoeq neekha ya aol nail ngaol. Noeq heeq noeq dov nia nail tsaol-aq neq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq niil maol nail nanqpav bhai saol-nvq nia nail ngaol. Aivq nail nanqpav neq, tsaol-aq nail nanqpav ngaol. Nanqpav al neq, kovq yal kovq tsel kovq ngaol.

Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, Yaolyaq Yeel-ovq gaoqjaoq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Yaolyaq nee mail tsaol-aq teevq sainv liq meel-nvq liq hinl gaq thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail neeqthel bhai Yaolyaq nail aqmil khi aivq nail Aqbhu nail aqmil gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqthel mao-ail meel nail laoljaol khe-ai meel nail aqthel khi, kav deedee nail nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel khe-ai, nqtavq kovtavq nee aqthel meel dol leevq nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq, dil-nvq deeq nail tsaol-aq dil-nvq deeq nail aqthel khe-ai dul nail ngaol.

Aqyu neq, doiqbev bev ma nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, aqdoevq phaq liq maol khi joiqmaoq mavmaoq al juq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, daoq aqsivq phaq nee daoqsel gul thailthaiq nail ngaol. Miltsaq kovtavq nail lavqkhoel khe ul kovq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq al teevq sainv liq meel-nvq liq hinl gaq maq ngel nail neq, daoq aqsivq phaq nee daoqsel gul nail al, teevq gaq-ail maq gul nia-ail.

Tsaol-aq al juq neq, yaqmai-aq juq nee mail maq bheeq maq leel daiq-al. Aqyu juq neq, aqhaol haol dai doevq nail yaqyov-aq juq ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Yaolyaq khal tsao nail bhai tsaothe jaol nail ngaol. Miqyail khi Yaolyaq nail haqbhoil iqmoeq heeq lee-a nail aqheeq pevq lal dai, aqyu juq bhai tsaol-aq yaq nail lavqkhoel nee ul kovq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel-ai goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail phaq teevq peivq-ail maq aol-ail, oeqbal thaq duq iqsanl maq jiav-ail.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq nail gaoltsi bhai nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq bhail nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee bhai maqkhaiq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai maqkhaiq, khul phaq nail daoq ge nail tsaol-aq bhai maqkhaiq, miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai cavq bhiq nail dai khi, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ivq nail lavqkhiq tsail nail geeqlaoq daoq phi-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Aivq mailma-ail aqthel gul kav khi ge nail: “Miqyail bhai geesil khi, aivq bhai ev yaoq. Aivq yalkhaq dal nail aqyanq kev lee-aoq nail ngaol. Nqtavq kovtavq khi miltsaq bhai maqkhaiq, iqyaq iqma khi ulcuvq eelbev dov duq bhai maqkhaiq, al juq bhai teivq-a nail gaq bhai uqhuq thaoq yaoq” dai, gul-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel nvq gaq teevq gaq, iqmoeq khe gaq nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail khi ge nail: “Aqmil dov nail Bhaqbhulloq meenq ga peiv gil-ail nail ngaol. Ga peiv gil-ail nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, meenq al meenq khaqmiq sev dai, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl bhai jilpheeq bhi daol-a nail ngaol” dai, gul-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel hail gaq teevq gaq, al nvq gaq nail haoqnao tsaothe tsaothe-ail, aqthel gul kav khi ge nail: “Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol khi aivq nail maol khoel bhai uqhuq thaoq khi, yovqgavq nail neeqthel bhai maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqlavq bhai maqkhaiq, jaiqyaq al maol nail junq deeq-ai thaq nail khul gaq bhai maqkhaiq,

khaoqanq bhai hoel bhoel-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail neema phail nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul ya daol nail ngaol. Meeq nail haol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, Yaolyaq nail sivtavq bhai maqkhaiq, miqjaq khi miqjal jalheel-i mail, tsaol-aq al juq bhai khoeq dee jiovq deedee bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq bhai khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-u phao, dov lal-a nail miqkhoiq al neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel dav lai nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol khi aivq nail maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq khi, aivq nail aqmil-i mail, junq deeq-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, gaqnaq maq ya naq-ail.
Alheel ngel-i mail, Miqyail-i mail bivq-a nail daoq naldaiq khi Yeiqsul bhai neema thaqtsaol nail Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq, oltsaol nail phaq loq nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq nee mail aqthel meel dov-ai leevq nail bhai, ngal niailhai ya gaiq-a nail ngaol: “Niailhai gevq yaoq. Niai nee pultavq, Yeiqsul nail lavqkhoel bhai sil-a tsaol-aq geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol.” Aqhaqlal Miqyail iqsanl ge nail: “Ngel naol. Aqyu juq ganl nl doil hal doil khi gaqnaq ya naq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail phaq bhai, Miqyail maq nioilpeivq-ail” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, phulleq deel nqdil bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail Yaqyov khe-ai dul nail teevq gaq, nqdil al bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, heel uqtsaoq tsaoq khi, gaiqaoq aqtav teevq keiv nieivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel yaoq gaq yaoq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nee dov lee khi, nqdil bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail al gaq bhai gul gul-ail khi ge bhiq nail: “Miltsaq kovtavq-ai gov mi lal-aoq thaq nial. Gov gaiq mao lal-aoq thaq nail ngel-i mail, gaiqaoq oil khi gaiq ail yaoq” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, nqdil bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail al gaq, aivq nail gaiqaoq-i mail miltsaq kovtavq khe gov iqsanl bhai, lav leel khi gaiq gil-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel yaoq gaq yaoq, nqtavq kovtavq khe uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nee dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aivq iqsanl, gaiqaoq aqtav teevq keiv aol nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, miqjaq nail kovtavq-ai bhaqaoq jiav nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq laol duq nee dov lee khi, gaiqaoq aqtav aol nail al gaq bhai gul gul-ail khi ge bhiq nail: “Gaiqaoq aqtav oil khi, miltsaq kovtavq khe aqheeq tsil juq nail dailphul bhai gaiq yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqheeq tsil juq aqheeq mi lal-aoq thaq nial” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, aivq nail gaiqaoq-i mail miltsaq kovtavq khe aqheeq tsilju aqheeq iqsanl bhai, gaiq gil gaq-al ngal-aq neq, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq bhai hoel bhoel-a nail ngaol. Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq al neq, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.

Aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq al bhai, meenq meenq jail bhai naoq naoq-ail naoq dol-aivq-u phao, aqsivq dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aqsivq al neq, nvq yal lal kev dai deq khi, moeqphaq nail moeqkeivq bhai kev dai, navq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, noeq-u maq dov nail bhi heeq bhi moel nail eeq nail phaq nqtavq bha, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Bhi heeq bhi moel nail al phaq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail sivq phaq aol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq ngaol. Khoeq nail jiovq nail al juq neq, haoqnao naosaq khe juq ngaol. Al juq gil haq neq, Miqyail neema phail nail phaq gil-aoq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, miqjaq khi ulcuvq lav kheq-ai thaq nail phaoqdaiq nail ngaqkha khe-ai dul lai nail teevq phaq bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai maqkhaiq, aivq nail maolkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, aivq nail nanqpav bhai maqkhaiq, gaq lai nail tsaol-aq juq Miqyail nail dil-nvq bavq khi, ngaqkha al kha nail jail-nq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq Miqyail nail yaqkav Molseiq nail daoqsel khi mail Yaolyaq nail daoqsel gul gul-ail khi ge nail:
“Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail-ol,
naoq-i mail nl-a
hal-a nail phaq neq,
eeq dee heel
deedee nail ngaol.
Jeq-e jaq-a
iqsanl nail Heeqphaq-ol,
naoq nail gailkhaol neq,
tsaq dee daol deedee nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq Miqyail-ol,
naoq bhai maq geesil dai,
naoq nail aqmil bhai
maq tsiqeeq nail
khaq sil gaq jaol nail-aiq.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
naol teevq gaq taivq-ail
meeq nail haol nail ngaol.
Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail
naol jaol nail bha lal khi,
naoq bhai uqhuq
thaoq lal nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
naoq-i mail aqtsaq aqdaol dai
nl-a hal-a nail juq,
bhaqlaoq kheq dai,
dov lal-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, ngal heldaiq gai-aivq-u phao, salkhil pevq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma nqtavq kovtavq bhai phao-ai thaq nail bhai, ya moel-a nail ngaol. Uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma al neq, haqphal saiqgov gov ma ngaol.

Khoeq nail jiovq nail sivq phaq aol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma al il nee dov lee-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, haoltaiv deel haqphal aqphul doi-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nail neema bhai heel nail jiovqpavq pavq-nvq thaq nail ngaol.

Aqdoevq phaq al liq maol nail lavqkhoel khe teevq maol neq, nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq bhai teevq gaq-ai, heel nail iqlaoq teevq heeq tsiq bhiq-a nail ngaol. Heel iqlaoq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai nqmaq maqluv halyeel doevq nail Miqyail nail neema phail nail phaq, teevq bhee aol nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi mail aivq nail bhaqaoq bhaqda nee, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma al il nail lavqkhoel, miqkhoiq teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel al sivq gaq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail sivq phaq maq gil-u kev dai, tsaol-aq teevq gaq iqsanl, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma al il bhai maq aol lai nia-ail.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma al il nail lavqkhoel nee kav deedee nail aqthel niailhai gul dov-ai leevq-a nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. “Miqyail neema phail nail phaq aol nail iqlaoq sivq heeq bhai miltsaq kovtavq bhai hoeldav ail bhiq yaoq” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel al sivq gaq bhai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel iqmoeq khe gaq aivq nail iqlaoq miltsaq kovtavq bhai hoeldav ail-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol-i mail junq deeq-ai thaq nail juq khi mail, aivq nail maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, doil deedee nail malyal daol lal bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel nvq gaq teevq gaq iqsanl, aivq nail iqlaoq iqyaq iqma bhai hoel puvq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, iqyaq iqma neq, sil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq nail aqsivq khe-ai pevq lal khi, iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel khe khal doevq nail phaq iqsanl mail, sil gil-a nail ngaol.
Nqtavq gaqkhoel hail gaq teevq gaq, aivq nail iqlaoq laoljaol juq khi mail ulcuvq eelbev juq bhai hoel bhoel gai-aivq-u phao, ulcuvq al juq aqsivq pevq-ail gil-a nail ngaol.
Aq-u phao, ulcuvq bhai heldaiq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq niailhai ge nail ngaol:
“Aq-u iqsanl,
niil aq-il iqsanl,
doevq nail
meeq nail haol nail gaq-ol,
naol tsaol-aq al juq bhai
niailhai yalkhaq dal nail neq,
tsaq nail daol nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq neq,
Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq nail
aqsivq khi mail,
naoq nail haqbhoil gedan nail
juq nail aqsivq
bhi dov lee-a nail ngel-i mail,
naol aqyu juq bhai aqsivq
bhi daol-a nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq alhai
ya daq nail neq,
tsaq nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq, laol duq nee mail aqthel meel dol leevq khi ge nail:
“Ngel naol.
Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail-ol,
naol yalkhaq dal nail neq,
maldil tsaq nail
daol nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail bhai ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel liq gaq teevq gaq, aivq nail iqlaoq nlma bhai hoel dav-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nlma nail miqjaq al, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi laol lal nail aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol.

Aqlaol haquvq khi laol deedee nail al, tsaol-aq yaq bhai bhi poiv khul laivq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, khoeq nail jiovq nail niil juq nail kovtavq bhai bhaqaoq jiav nail Miqyail bhai, aqyu juq iqkhail yavq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq oeqbal maq noeq pov nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail bhai maq tsiqeeq maq tsiqheel-ail.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel ngaq gaq teevq gaq aivq nail iqlaoq haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail doiqbev bev ma bhai, hoel dav-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol-i mail uvthaiq-ai thaq nail milkhaoq navtsee dai, pevq-ail khi, a bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq juq nal deedee nail ngel-i mail, moeqlal bhai keivq thaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq nal dee goel deedee nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, malyal daol nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq, ya daq-a nail ngel-i mail, nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail Miqyail bhai aqyu juq iqkhail yavq-a nail ngaol. Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq-i mail nl laiq hal laiq-a nail phaq bhai neq, maq noeq pov maq noeqphal-al.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel kovq gaq teevq gaq, aivq nail heel iqlaoq Ulbhaqlal nail laoljaol jaol ma bhai hoel puvq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, nlma dovkhoeq phao jaol nail heeqphaq juq nail haqbhoil gailkhaol daol lal dai, laoljaol al jaol sivq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, baivyaovq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail gaq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee maqkhaiq, neivq aqcavq hail maol dov lee nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Neivq al hail maol neq, phaqyaq khe-ai dul lai nail ngaol.

Neivq al hail maol neq, bhi heeq bhi moel nail phaq nl daiq bhiq nail neivq al juq nail aqheel ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail Miqyail nail aqn n-gaol, genl dev nail haqbhoil, miltsaq doi dai jaol nail, heeqphaq juq bhai bhi jil lal nail dai khi, neivq al juq dov lee-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Naldaiq yaoq. Khoiqbhaoq bhaoq lee nail khe-ai, ngal lee naol dei-eiq. Aqgeel geel dai jaol khi, yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai heldaiq phail khi doi-nq thaq nail tsaol-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq maoldeq laqnel-ail maq jaol nail ngel-i mail, yu nail sivtavq bhai maq ya haqsil-ail” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Neivq al hail maol neq, heeqphaq juq bhai, Aqmaqgeiqdoq dai khul nail dao bhai bhi jil lal-a nail ngaol. Aqmil al neq, Heiqbhail daoq ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq teevq gaq, aivq nail iqlaoq lilmoel nail lavqkhoel bhai thaoq ha gai-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma nee mail kav deedee nail aqthel, “Gil-aoq naol” dai, gul dol-ai leevq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqmeivq meivq lal khi nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel mee nia phaq khi mail milluv luv deedee nail niil juq, pevq lal-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq bhai teivq-u n-gaol nee yanqgaol kev dai, niidai dai-ail milluv teevq pov iqsanl, maq luv lal daiq haq-al.

Meenq meenq ma al meenq hail pav pav ail-a nail ngaol. Milkhaoq yaoq khaoq yaoq-ao nee nail lavqkhoel bhai jiav nail meenq juq iqsanl, cov-ail gil-a nail ngaol. Miqyail neq, aivq neema phail deedee nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul deq nail khaoqanq, aqmil dov nail Bhaqbhulloq meenq bhai bhi peivq gil-ail khi, teevq thal-iq maq nioilpeivq-ail.
Eeljaol laol-n iqsanl mail peivq-ail gil khi, gaoqjaoq iqsanl teevq thal-iq maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Hail tsel jao-ai jaiq dai bhee nail ollov aqheeq nee mail tsaol-aq yaq nail kovtavq bhai ga lee-a nail ngaol. Miqyail aqyu juq bhai ollov aqheeq bhi ga bav bhi ga bav-ail, khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq-a nail ngel-i nail, aqyu juq Miqyail bhai iqkhail yavq-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, khoeq nail jiovq nail al phaq neq, haq deedee nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, heel iqlaoq sivq heeq aol nail nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq lee khi, “Lal yaoq. Ulcuvq maodai nail kovtavq-ai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail mao-ail eeq nail maimaqlal gaq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq thailthaiq nail, ngal naoq bhai cavq naq lavq bhel.

Miltsaq kovtavq khe jaol nail heeqphaq juq aivq nee mail bheeq-a nail ngaol. Miltsaq yaq juq iqsanl mail khaqmiq sev dai, aivq nail jilpheeq daol bol laivq thaq nail ngaol” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq ngaq bhai, Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee tsaol-aq maq jaol nail haqtsoiq haqyal bhai hel-aivq lavq-a nail ngaol. A bhai yaqmai-aq teevq gaq haqeiv nail jaiqyaq neltsaiq deel teevq maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail bhai, ngal yaq moel-a nail ngaol. Haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, uqhuq sivq huq khi uqkheel tsel kheel covq nail ngaol. Aqmaol maol lao-ail Miqyail bhai khal ge movq-ail ge nail aqmil juq, gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq neq, nel nav nav nail khi neltsaiq deel aqgaq aqdoi doi-nq khi, heel sainl khi laoqpav laolpav nail sainl goe-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq neq, yu nee mail bheeq nail leel nail bhai tavq lai nail aqjiivq aqcavq phaq khi maq heldaiq nul nail phaq teevq bhee aol nail heel maiqgaoq tsiq-nq thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail neeqthel bhai oil-uvq-ai thaq nail daoqceevq bhao nail aqmil niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol:
“aqmil dov nail
Bhaqbhulloq meenq neq,
maimaqlal juq nail
aqma pevq khi
miltsaq kovtavq khe
aqjiivq aqcavq juq nail
aqma ngaol” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Yaqmai-aq al gaq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq nail aqsivq maqkhaiq, Yeiqsul nail haqbhoil salkhil khanq nail juq nail aqsivq maqkhaiq daol bov-a nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Ngal aivq bhai ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail: “Naol khul khi noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq ail nail-aiq. Yaqmai-aq al gaq nail ganl maqkhaiq, uqhuq sivq huq khi uqkheel tsel kheel nail ganl maqkhaiq, aivq-i mail jeeq-nq thaq nail haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail ganl maqkhaiq, oil tsail-ai thaq nail al, ngal naoq bhai ge daiq lavq bhel dei-eiq.

Naoq-i mail moel thailthaiq nail haqeiv nail jaiq yaq al maol neq, milnee uqnee jaol khi ngaol-aoq niil aq-il maq jaol yaoq-aol. Aivq neq, mao-ail maq maoq lal mail, mao-ail navq nail khaqduq nee dov lal khi ngaol-aoq, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol. Nqtavq khi miltsaq teivq-u nee mail, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel-ai aqmil maq gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol nail tsaol-aq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai ya moel-u phao, noeq-u maq dov dai, pevq-ail nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, milnee uqnee jaol khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il maq jaol mail, yaqhao gaoq jaol lal nail ngel-i mail ngaol.
Ganl niil heeq kivq dai, neenoeq neekha ya aol nail ngaol. Uqhuq al sivq huq neq, yaqmai-aq al gaq-i mail jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaoqjaoq sivq jaoq ngaol. Heeqphaq sivq gaq iqsanl ngel nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, ngaq gaq neq, sil-aoq nail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, niil aq-il uvthaiq thailthaiq nail ngaol. Teevq gaq neq, maq dov lal haq-al. Aivq dov lal-u phao, teevq yanq taivq-ail ya jaol-ail teevq-eel ngaol.

Milnee uqnee jaol khi ngaol-aoq, niil aq-il maq jaol nail, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, eivq gaq teevq gaq ngaol. Aivq neq, al sivq gaq bhai tavq nail ngaol. Aivq iqsanl, ya luq ya seil-ail nail ngaol.

Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail uqkheel al tsel kheel neq, milkhaoq bhai maq ya uvthaiq haq nail heeqphaq tsel gaq ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nee mail naqli teevq lavq bhee dai, heeqphaq nail alyaq ya nail ngaol.
Heeqphaq al juq, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq khi, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail aqlavq lavqkhoel-ai yovqgavq nail bhaqaoq khi yovqgavq nail alyaq av bhiq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq Yaolyaq bhai genl dev nail ngaol. Dev-u phao, Yaolyaq aqyu juq bhai dev gaq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq neq, uvthaiq nail juq nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail gaq pevq khi, heeqphaq nail kovtavq bhai heeqphaq iqsanl, pevq nail ngaol. Aivq nee mail jaol nail tsaol-aq juq neq, khul-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq, tsel dov-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq khi, saljial ivq nail tsaol-aq neq, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai gaq lai nail ngaol” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq ngaq bhai teevq pov gaoq ge lavq-a nail: “Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail maimaqlal al gaq-i mail jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ulcuvq al neq, jeq-e jaq-a juq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma juq, milkhaoq juq khi daoq mee nia phaq ge nail tsaol-aq juq ngaol.

Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail uqkheel al tsel kheel khi haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, maimaqlal al gaq bhai neejiav jiav lal nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq khe khal jiav nail iqsanl bhai oil gil bhiq khi, maoldeq lavqnel-ail bhi jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq aivq nail haqjoil jaq khi, aivq bhai miqjaq-i mail kheqpoiv nail ngaol.

Khul khi mail ngal-aq neq, aqyu juq Miqyail neema tsaq nail khe-ai nl lal dai, Miqyail aqyu juq nail neema bhai bhi noeq dov-a nail ngaol. Bhi noeq dov-a nail al neq, aivq nail daoq bhee lal-u phao kev dai, neema teevq heeq taivq-ail tavq tavq-ail, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail aqlavq lavqkhoel-ai yovqgavq nail aqyaq yovqgavq av bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Naoq-i mail ya moel-a nail yaqmai-aq al gaq neq, miltsaq kovtavq khe heeqphaq juq bhai uvthaiq nail meenq meenq ma ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel yaoq gaq yaoq nqtavq nee mail yavq kha lee thailthaiq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, eeq deedee nail bhaqaoq aol khi, aivq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail bhaqda nee miltsaq kovtavq bhai aqbhaq bhaq nail ngaol.
Aivq aqthel aqkav kav dai gul nail:
“Aqmil dov nail
Bhaqbhulloq meenq,
ga peiv gil-ail naol,
ga peiv gil-ail naol.
Meenq al meenq neq,
haqeiv nail neivq nail
jaol duq khi,
aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nail
aqheel yaoq phaq
yaoq-ao nee nail
tsaoq uvq duq
pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Aqjiivq aqcavq
cavq deedee khi
yu maq heldaiq nul nail
keivq-avq iqsanl mail,
a bhai jaol nail ngaol.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
tsaol-aq iqsanl mail
aivq nee mail
khaqmiq sev nail dai
jilpheeq daol bol
laivq-a nail ngaol.
Miltsaq khe heeqphaq juq
aivq nee mail bheeq khi,
miltsaq kovtavq-ai
jaiqgaiq gaiq nail juq neq,
meenq al meenq nail
hulmeeq hulbhao bhao nail
phaq bhai juq khi,
hulmeeq hulbhao
bhao lal-a nail ngaol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq kovtavq nee mail daoq yaoq daoq yaoq niailhai ge dov-ai leevq-a nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. “Ngaq nail tsaol-aq juq-ol, aivq nail oeqbal nail haoqnao maq ya tsaothel-aivq dai maqkhaiq, aivq-i mail ya daq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail juq bhai maq ya daq dai maqkhaiq, meenq al meenq nee dov lal yaoq.
Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq nail oeqbal neq, nqtavq kovtavq bha kev dai, jiav tuv-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aivq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail laiq nail tsa nail juq bhai, Miqyail maq nioilpeivq-ail.

Aivq yu bhai nl bhiq-a nail khe-ai, aivq bhai nl kovq bhiq yaoq. Aivq-i mail nl thaq hal thaq-ai thaq nail khe-ai, aivq bhai nvq bhoil nl kovq bhiq yaoq. Aivq-i mail kheq-ai thaq nail khaoqanq bhai, a bhai nee maqtsil nvq bhoil kheq khi aivq bhai bhi daol yaoq.

Aivq neq, aivq bhai aivq thaqeeq thaqheel khi, hulmeeq hulbhao bhao nail lavqkhoel nee neekhaol sil nail ngaol. A dai nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq khi noeqhaq noeqaoq nail phaq aivq nail kovtavq bhai bhi kev lee yaoq. Aivq nail neema lavqkhoel bhai niailhai ge thailthaiq nail ngaol: ‘Ngal neq, heeqphaqma jiovq khi jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail ngaol. Ngal miqtsiq miqma maq ngel. Ngal haq nail aoq nail phaq bhai teevq thal-iq maq ya thaoqphuq-ail’ dai, ge nail ngaol.

Alheel ngel-i mail, sil nail phaq, nioilkhaoq khaoq nail phaq, moevq nail sivq nail phaq, khoeq bhiq jiovq bhiq nail niil juq, teevq n nail lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail aivq nail lavqkhoel bhai kev lee khi, miqjaq poiv ha nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aivq bhai yalkhaq dal nail Heeqphaq Miqyail neq, bhaqaoq eeq deedee nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nee mail bheeq khi, hulmeeq hulbhao bhao nail lavqkhoel nee neekhaol sil nail miltsaq kovtavq khe heeqphaq juq neq, meenq al meenq bhai miqjaq poiv nail miqkhoiq bhai ya moel-u phao, meenq al meenq nail haqbhoil nioilkhaoq khaoq nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq meenq al meenq-i mail ya daq thailthaiq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail phaq bhai, geesil deedee nail ngel-i mail, eqyal bha thulphaol khi niailhai ge nail ngaol: ‘Aqmil dov khi bhaqaoq mao-ail eeq nail Bhaqbhulloq meenq-ol, naol geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol. Naqli teevq lavq lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail naoq bhai yalkhaq dal nail phaq kev lee-aoq nial’ dai, ge nail ngaol.
Miltsaq kovtavq-ai jaiqgaiq gaiq nail juq iqsanl, meenq al meenq nail haqbhoil nioilkhaoq khaoq nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, teevq gaq-ail aqyu juq nail yalkav maq ul yaoq-aol.

Yalkav al juq neq, phul, heel, sainl, laoqpav laolpav nail sainl, mao-ail meeq nail haqphal phal phul, nel nav nav nail haqphal, bhoiqkheel nail haqphal, neltsaiq deel haqphal, huqbhiq nil nail aqbhaol yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee, yavmav nail aqjeel khi aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail aqbhaol-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail yalkav, giqheel, hail khi lovmav-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail nlmaoq iqsanl aol nail ngaol.

Tsaoqgaoq laqphil, jaltsoiq bhai goe jaq nail phaq, thaoq nuv-ai thaq nail huqbhiq nil nail phaq, huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq, huqbhiq nil nail ulcuvq aqheel, aqheeq tsilju nail ullul, aqtseel, khaqmul aqthail, gov, niaoqnel, yaol, moeqphaq lalaoq, yaqkav khi tsaol-aq nail yeel, niil juq ngaol.

Naol maivjeel jeel deedee lai nail aqheeq allu peivq gil-aoq nail ngaol. Naoq-i mail kheel deedee nail phaq khi meeq deedee nail yalkav juq iqsanl, luq-ail seil-ail khi, naol yaqhao teevq thal-iq maq ya moel yaoq-aol.

Yalkav al juq gaoq khi ul khi, meenq al meenq bhaqda nee hulmeeq hulbhao bhao lal-a nail jaiqgaiq gaiq nail juq neq, meenq al meenq ya daq thailthaiq nail phaq bhai geesil deedee nail ngel-i mail, eqyal bha thulphaol thailthaiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq nioilkhaoq khaoq khaoq-ail niailhai ge nail ngaol:
‘Mao-ail meeq nail
haqphal phal phul,
nel nav nav nail haqphal khi,
neltsaiq deel haqphal dai khi,
heel, sainl khi,
laoqpav laolpav nail sainl
goe-nq thaq nail
aqmil dov nail meenq neq,
geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol.
A dai mao nail
yalkav iqsanl mail,
naqli teevq lavq nail
lavqkhoel bhai taivq-ail
peiv gil ail-aoq nial laq’ dai,
ge nail ngaol.

Laovq nail aqheel juq iqsanl, laovq bhai heldaiq phail nail aqivq juq iqsanl, laovq lavqkhoel bhai ganl nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl khi, iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel bhai jaiqgaiq gaiq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, eqyal bha thulphaol-nvq thaq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq meenq al meenq poiv thailthaiq nail miqkhoiq bhai ya moel-u phao, ‘Aqmil dov nail meenq thoil meenq khe-ai dul nail meenq khul meenq jiav nail-aiq’ dai, gul deedee nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq yovqgavq bhai yovqgavq khaqlail hoel dav hoel dav-ail nioilkhaoq khaoq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq gul deedee nail:
‘Aqmil dov nail meenq neq,
geeqlaoq aqdoil ya nail ngaol.
Meenq al meenq nail
lavqkhoel bhai
yalkav jiav
deedee nail ngel-i mail,
iqyaq iqma lavqkhoel bhai
tsao nail laovq juq nail
aqheel iqsanl mail
hulmeeq hulbhao
bhao lal-a nail ngaol.
Thailhai ngaol-aoq,
naqli teevq lavq nail
lavqkhoel taivq-ail,
meenq al meenq
peiv ail-a nail ngaol’ dai,
gul nail ngaol.

Nqtavq kovtavq bhai jaol nail juq-ol, meenq al meenq peiv ail-a nail ngel-i mail, lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq, gaqkhoel juq khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq-ol, meenq al meenq peiv ail-a nail ngel-i mail, nuljuq iqsanl lavqkhiq tsail yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Nuljuq nail haqbhoil nl kovq bhiq nail dai khi, Miqyail meenq al meenq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, gaq mao-ail kav nail nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq, lovmav heeq ma teevq heeq bavq khi, iqyaq iqma bhai bav puvq gai-aivq khi ge nail:
“Niailhai dul dai,
aqmil dov nail
Bhaqbhulloq meenq bhai
maq ya moel yaoq-aol.
Dil-nvq deeq nail aqthel,
daoqsel gul nail aqthel,
bhaoqlao jiiv nail aqthel,
nqbho jiiv nail aqthel,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
maq ya gaiq yaoq-aol.
Lavqmaoq nl nail tsaol-aq
teevq gaq iqsanl,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
maq jaol yaoq-aol.
Gov thaoq nail aqthel iqsanl,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
maq ya gaiq yaoq-aol.
Phalmanq nail aqbhaq iqsanl,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
maq bhaq yaoq-aol.
Khaqma hevq nail,
maol ail nail aqthel iqsanl,
naoq nail lavqkhoel-ai
maq ya gaiq yaoq-aol.
Milnee uqnee
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
jaiqgaiq gaiq-a nail juq,
miltsaq niil
teevq heeq heeq lao bhai,
eeq nail heel nail juq
pevq nail ngaol.
Naol neivq bhai
laol bhiq sail bhiq-a nail
bhaqda nee,
jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail
laiq ail-a nail ngaol.
Miqyail nail haqbhoil
gedan nail juq nail aqsivq,
Miqyail nail
tsaol-aq nail aqsivq dai khi,
miltsaq kovtavq-ai
heivq nail bhai ya daq-a nail
tsaol-aq iqsanl nail aqsivq,
naoq nail lavqkhoel bhai
ya moel-a nail ngaol” dai,
nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq ge lavq-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq nee mail tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail aqthel khe-ai kav deedee nail aqthel bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq, niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Haqleiqlulyaq!
Hevqkovq nail phaq,
seiqleiq khaoqsail
khi mail bhaqaoq,
ngadao nail Miqyail
taivq-ail jiav nail ngaol.
Aivq yalkhaq dal nail neq,
maldil tsaq nail daol nail ngaol.
Eeq nail maimaqlal al gaq
yu nee mail khaqmiq sev khi
miltsaq yaq luq-ail
seil ail-a nail ngel-i mail,
Miqyail aivq bhai
yalkhaq dal bhiq-a nail ngaol.
Al ovqtavq,
sil-a nail aivq nail
yaqkav juq nail haqbhoil
Miqyail yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai
nl kovq bhiq-a nail ngaol” dai,
gul nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq gaoq gul nail:
“Haqleiqlulyaq!
Meenq al meenq bhai
miqjaq tovq thailthaiq nail
miqkhoiq neq,
nqmaq maqluv halyeel
dav lai nail ngaol” dai,
gul nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, joiqmaoq mavmaoq nvq tsel liq gaq khi mail aqdoevq phaq al liq maol peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq nail lavqkhoel nee gaolbeiv khi, joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq thaoq-ail:
“Aqmiq.
Haqleiqlulyaq” dai,
gul-a nail ngaol.
A bhai nee ngal-aq, doiqbev bev ma nee aqthel meel dov-ai leevq nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq,
“Miqyail nail yaqkav pevq khi,
Miqyail bhai ev nail
eeq yaq nil yaq juq iqsanl-ol,
ngadao nail Miqyail bhai
tsiqeeq bhel” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, tsaol-aq munl munl ma nail aqthel khe-ai maqkhaiq, ulcuvq laoljaol nail aqthel khe-ai maqkhaiq, kav deedee nail nqjaiq jaiq nail aqthel khe-ai maqkhaiq, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq, niailhai gul nail ngaol:
“Haqleiqlulyaq!
Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail
ngadao nail
Heeqphaq Miqyail neq,
joiqjaq nail heeqphaq
pevq lal-a nail ngaol.
Ngadao lavqkhiq
tsail deedee bhel.
Ngadao aivq bhai
tsiqeeq tsiqheel bhel.
Khul khi mail dai
ngal-aq neq,
Yaolyaq khaqma
hevq nail yanq
kev lee-aoq nail ngaol.
Aivq bhai maol ail nail dai khi,
yaqmai-aq yaqnoil
aivq nail aqmaol aqmeeq-ai
lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Yaqmai-aq al gaq bhai,
haoltaiv deel
haqphal phal phul
doi nail aqkhaoqanq
bivq-a nail ngaol.
Haqphal phal phul al neq,
Miqyail nail
tsaol-aq juq-i mail
nl-a hal-a nail
tsaq nail daol nail
phaq ngaol” dai,
ge nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, “Yaolyaq khaqma hevq nail bhai lal yaoq dai, bhi khul-a nail tsaol-aq neq, geeqlaoq eeq naol dai, gevq yaoq” dai, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol. “Daoq niil daoq neq, maldil tsaq nail Miqyail nee dov lee-a nail daoq ngaol” dai iqsanl, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ngal aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail dai khi, aivq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq-a nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail: “Thailhai thaq khi. Naol khi naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq Yeiqsul nail salkhil khanq nail juq nee ngal iqsanl nuljuq khe-ai, Miqyail nail yaqkav ngaol. Miqyail bhai uqhuq thaoq yaoq. Khul khi nail dai ngal-aq neq, Yeiqsul nail ganl salkhil khanq nail phaq neq, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail-i mail bhi ge-a nail phaq pevq nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq phao-ai thaq nail bhai, ngal yaq moel-a nail ngaol. A bhai moeqphaq aqphul teevq maol jaol khi, al maol bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq neq, saljial ivq khi tsaq nail gaq dai, khul nail ngaol. Aivq neq, tsaq nail daol nail lavqkhoel nee yalkhaq dal khi genl dev nail gaq ngaol.

Aivq nail maivneev neq, miqjaq miqlail khe-ai dul nail ngaol. Aivq nail uqhuq bhai heel uqtsaoq maodai tsaoq tsaoq-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq teevq gaq taivq-ail heeq nia nail aqmil aivq nail kovtavq bhai teevq mil gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Aivq aqsivq bhai he deev-a nail phailkhaoq heelma teevq keiv doi-nq thaq nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqmil neq, Miqyail nail Daoq dai, mil-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nqtavq kovtavq khe genl dev nail munl munl ma juq moeqphaq aqphul jeeq khi, aivq nail haoqnao tsaothel-aivq-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, haoltaiv deel haqphal phal phul doi-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Milkhaoq juq nee genl dev nail dai khi, aivq nail moeqthaoq lavqkhoel nee, tav deedee nail thaoma teevq keiv dov lal-a nail ngaol. Aivq aqyu juq bhai hail nail joiqniovq-i mail uvthaiq nail ngaol. Iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail Miqyail nail neema phail deedee nail aqheeq tsilju nail ullul naoq dov duq bhai, aivq naoq nail ngaol.
Aivq nail phailkhaoq heelma bhai maqkhaiq, aqbhaq bhai maqkhaiq, aqmil niailhai gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
“Heeqphaq nail
kovtavq bhai heeqphaq,
uvthaiq nail
juq nail kovtavq bhai
uvthaiq nail gaq” dai,
gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, nlma bhai nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq bhai bhail nail keivq-avq juq bhai aivq mailma-ail gul bhiq-a nail: “Lal yaoq. Jaq tavq daol tavq nail haqbhoil Miqyail-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail aqduq bhai jil lal yaoq.

Heeqphaq juq nail haqjoil, genl dev nail munl munl ma bhai heldaiq nail aqivq juq nail haqjoil, gaq mao-ail kav nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqjoil, moeqphaq khi mail al nail kovtavq bhai jeeq-nq thaq nail tsaol-aq juq nail haqjoil, yaqkav khi yaqkav maq ngel nail juq nail haqjoil, eeq yaq nil yaq juq iqsanl nail haqjoil jaq lal yaoq” dai, gul bhiq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol neq, miltsaq bhai uvthaiq nail heeqphaq juq khi mail aivq nail genl dev nail munl munl ma juq nee mail moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq khi mail aivq nail genl dev nail munl munl ma juq bhai genl dev nail dai khi, jil lai nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai nieivq khi, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail gaq bhai iqsanl, aivq nee mail teevq gaq khe-ai nieivq-a nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq al gaq neq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail junq deeq-ai thaq khi, al maol nail maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq bhai hevq bheel-aivq dai, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail aqmil bhai juq khi bhi heeq bhiq moel nail juq nl daiq bhiq-a nail al gaq ngaol. Aqyu nvq gaq bhai miqjaq tovq nail miqjal jalheel nail ngaqkha bhai bavq puvq bhiq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, moeqphaq jeeq-nq thaq nail gaq nail moeqthaoq nee dov lee-a nail thaoma-i mail jail-ail ceevq-a nail tsaol-aq juq bhai iqsanl, heivq gil-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, keivq-avq iqsanl mail, aqyu juq nail haqjoil teevq bov ya jaq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq gaq nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aivq neq, mao-ail navq nail khaqduq nail taovq taovqphoil khi mail hailcav deeq ma, oil-nq thaq nail ngaol.

Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, neivq heeqphaq khi mail neivq Saqdaq dai khul nail baivyaovq al maol bhai nieivq khi, teevq hinl kovq bhee dai khil cuvq lavq cuvq cuvq khi, pheethaiq-ai thaq nail ngaol. (Baivyaovq al maol neq, aq-u khe haqeiv nail eellel al maol ngaol.)

Teevq hinl kovq maq bhee lal-a nail gaiqlaq bhai, aivq jeq-e jaq-a juq bhai jalmul maq ya mul ya nia-ail dai, mao-ail navq nail khaqduq al duq nail lavqkhoel nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq aivq bhai bavq bhoel khi, taovq taovq thaiq khi mail, al nail kovtavq bhai junq deeq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Teevq hinl kovq bhee lal haq neq, teevq yanq taivq-ail aivq bhai phaiq dov bhiq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ngal doiqbev bev ma juq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Doiqbev bev ma al juq bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail tsaol-aq juq neq, yalkhaq dal nail aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol. Yeiqsul nail ganl salkhil khanq nail nee ovqtavq, Miqyail nail daoq cavq nail bhaqda nee, uqhuq bhi tsilceiv nail bhai ya daq-a nail tsaol-aq juq nail aqhaqlal bhai iqsanl, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol bhai maqkhaiq, maolkhoel bhai maqkhaiq, uqhuq maq thaoq-al. Al ovqtavq, yovqgavq nail neeqthel bhai maqkhaiq, yovqgavq nail aqlavq bhai maqkhaiq, haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol nail junq maq deeq-ai thaq-al. Aqyu juq gaoq doevq kovq lal khi, Khali nee mail teevq hinl kovq bhee dai, uvthaiq-a nail ngaol.
Jail nail sil-a nail tsaol-aq yaoq juq yaoq neq, teevq hinl kovq maq bhee lal-u neq, maq doevq kovq lal-ail. Niil neq, iqmoeq ilmoeq khe gaoq doevq kovq lal-a nail pov ngaol.

Iqmoeq ilmoeq khe pov doevq kovq lal-a nail bhai aol lai-a nail tsaol-aq juq neq, geeqlaoq eeq deedee khi, meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq ngaol. Nvq pov teevq pov sil nail phaq, aqyu juq nail kovtavq bhai bhaqaoq maq jiav yaoq-aol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail khi mail Khali nail Philma pevq khi, Khali nee mail teevq hinl kovq bhee dai, ya uvthaiq nail ngaol.
Teevq hinl kovq bhee lal haq neq, thaonq nee mail neivq Saqdaq bhai phaiq dov bhiq nail ngaol.

Aivq dov ail khi milma liq phaoq liq khoel bhai jaol nail jeq-e jaq-a juq bhai hevq bheel-aivq khi genl dev nail haqbhoil bhi jil lal nail ngaol. Jeq-e jaq-a al juq bhai, Gaolgav khi mail Maqgaolgav dai khul nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, iqyaq iqma khe tsalhail khe-ai mao nail ngaol.

Aqyu juq miltsaq kovtavq bhai jaol bhee gil khi, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq juq nail naq duq khi mail Miqyail mailma-ail gaiq-a nail meenq bhai ga jaoq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Thailhai ngaol-aoq, nqtavq nee miqjaq ga lee khi, aqyu juq bhai poiv jaq gil-a nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, aqyu juq bhai hevq bheel-aivq-a nail neivq Heeqphaq bhai iqsanl miqjaq khi mail miqjal jalheel nail ngaqkha bhai bavq puvq nail ngaol. Ngaqkha al nail lavqkhoel haqeiv nail jaiqyaq al maol khi mail Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan naol dai, ge khi ngaol-aoq, maldil maq ngel nail al gaq aol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel, nqkiv n-gaol maqkhaiq, khoeq nail jiovq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, phulleq deel joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma khi a bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Nqtavq khi miltsaq aivq nail sivtavq nee peivq-ail khi, teevq thal-iq maq ya moel dai, peiv ail-a nail ngaol.

Sil-a nail eeq yaq nil yaq iqsanl mail, doiqbev bev ma al nail sivtavq bhai thulphaol-nvq thaq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, haoqgavq juq phao-ai thaq nail ngaol. Aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq iqsanl phao-ai thaq nail ngaol. Sil-a nail tsaol-aq juq-i mail nl-a hal-a nail juq, haoqgavq al juq nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail khe-ai, gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail al juq bhai heldaiq heldaiq-ail, aqyu juq bhai yalkhaq dal bhiq nail ngaol.

Iqyaq iqma neq, aivq nail lavqkhoel sil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai Miqyail nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq khi mail sil nail milkhaoq iqsanl, aqyu juq nail lavqkhoel bhai sil-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq juq bhai Miqyail nail aqlavq lavqkhoel bhai av bhiq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq yaq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee mail, yovqgavq-i mail khal nl khal hal-a nail khe-ai, yalkhaq dal lavq nail bhai ya daq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, Miqyail sil nail phaq bhai maqkhaiq sil nail milkhaoq bhai maqkhaiq, miqjaq nail ngaqkha bhai bavq puvq nail ngaol. Miqjaq nail ngaqkha al kha neq, nvq pov teevq pov sil nail phaq pevq nail ngaol.
Aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel bhai aqmil gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl bhai, miqjaq nail ngaqkha bhai, bavq puvq nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, ngal nqtavq aqsivq khi miltsaq aqsivq bhai ya moel-a nail ngaol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, nqtavq aqlil khi miltsaq aqlil neq, peiv ail-aoq nail ngaol. Iqyaq iqma iqsanl, maq jiav yaoq-aol.

Aq-u phao, meeq nail haol nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq aqsivq Miqyail jaol nail nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee thailthaiq nail bhai, ngal ya moel-a nail ngaol. Meenq al meenq neq, maol ail nail yaqmai-aq yaqnoil khe-ai, aqmeeq-ai lainq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Doiqbev bev ma nee mail, kav deedee nail aqthel gul dov-ai leevq nail bhai, ngal ya gaiq-a nail ngaol. Aqthel al neq, niailhai gul nail ngaol: “Heldaiq dei-eiq. Miqyail nail jaol duq tsaol-aq jaol nail bha jiav lee khi, aivq tsaol-aq yaq nee mail jaol nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, Miqyail nail tsaol-aq pevq khi, Miqyail iqsanl, aqyu juq nee mail jaol nail ngaol.

Aivq aqyu juq nail maivbhil iqsanl mail siv bhiq nail ngaol. Sil nail phaq maq jiav yaoq-aol. Noeqhaq nail phaq, nioilkhaoq khaoq nail phaq, nal nail goel nail phaq, niil juq iqsanl maq jiav yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, iqmoeq-u phao jiav-a nail juq peivq gil ail-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Doiqbev bev ma bhai jaoldeel-nvq thaq nail gaq ge nail: “Heldaiq. Ngal yaoq phaq yaoq-ao nee aqsivq lav phal-aoq nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol. Aivq teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Niil juq gevq thaq-ai yaoq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, daoq niil juq neq, maldil tsaq khi saljial ivq nail daoq pevq nail ngaol” dai, ge nail ngaol.

Al ovqtavq, aivq teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Gil-aoq naol. Ngal neq, Aqlaqphal khi Aolmeiqgal ngaol. Iqmoeq ilmoeq khi haoqnao naosaq khe gaq iqsanl pevq nail ngaol. Ulcuvq khal moevq nail tsaol-aq bhai, aqdoevq bhi doevq lal nail ulcuvq eelbev nee dov lee-a nail ulcuvq ngal aqnieivq-ail bhi daol naol.
Gaq lai-a nail tsaol-aq jaiqbhoil niil juq ya nail ngaol. Ngal aivq nail Miqyail pevq khi, aivq ngaq nail yaq pevq nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, geesil nail neema aol nail tsaol-aq, neema maq thaqtsaol nail tsaol-aq, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq, tsaol-aq bhai heivq-a nail tsaol-aq, khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq, neivq bhai laol nail sail nail tsaol-aq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq nail tsaol-aq khi, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq iqsanl mail, miqjaq khi miqjal jalheel tovq nail ngaqkha bhai ya daq nail ngaol. Al neq, nvq pov teevq pov sil nail phaq pevq nail ngaol” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aq-u phao, haoqnao naosaq khe khoeq nail jiovq nail sivq phaq teevq bhee aol nail, iqlaoq sivq heeq tsiq-nq thaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel sivq gaq nail lavqkhoel khe teevq gaq lee khi: “Lal yaoq. Yaolyaq nail khaqma pevq nail yaqmai-aq yaqnoil ngal naoq bhai cavq naq lavq bhel” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aivq ngaq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail nail lavqkhoel nee eeq dee moe deedee nail gaoqjaoq bhai hel-aivq lavq-a nail ngaol. Aq-u phao, Miqyail jaol nail nqtavq kovtavq nee yavq kha lee thailthaiq nail meeq nail haol nail Yeiqlulsaqlaiq meenq, ngaq bhai cavq naq lavq-a nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq neq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail teevq bhee aol nail ngaol. Meenq al meenq nail aqbhaq bhaq nail neq, aqphoiq phoiq deedee nail sainl khe-ai pevq khi, phaoq daiq khe-ai aqbhaq mee nia phaq aol nail neltsaiq deel sainl khe-ai iqsanl, dul nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq neq, eeq dee moe deedee nail khainl jiav khi, govkhoiq tsel-nvq khoiq daol nail ngaol. Govkhoiq al tsel-nvq khoiq bhai, nqtavq gaqkhoel teevq khoiq bhai teevq gaq lovq nail ngaol. Lolgov bhai neq, Ilsaqleiqlal nail jeq-e tsel-nvq jeq-e nail aqmil gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.
Govkhoiq al juq neq, nlma dovkhoeq phao hail khoeq, pultavq phao hail khoeq, pul-nvq phao hail khoeq khi, nlma ga khoeq phao hail khoeq daol nail ngaol.
Khainl al bhai, iqmoeq ilmoeq kaovq-a nail lovmav tsel-nvq heeq jiav nail ngaol. Lovmav al juq bhai Yaolyaq nail gaqkhoel tsel-nvq gaq nail aqmil gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Ngaq bhai daoq ge tsaoq lavq-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, meenq bhai maqkhaiq, khainl bhai maqkhaiq, khainl nail lolgov juq bhai maqkhaiq, tsa daiq nail haqbhoil heel nail lunl aqkhaoq aol nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq neq, liq phaoq liq khoel ngaol. Nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, heel nail lunl aqkhaoq al-i mail meenq al meenq bhai tsa daiq-u phao, teevq hinl liq yal lal bhee nail ngaol. Heelma phao, laiqma phao, daqmoe phao iqsanl teevq gaq kheel ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq khainl bhai tsa daiq-u phao, tsaol-aq nail lavqcav nee saol-nvq haq neq, teevq yal liq tsel liq cav moe nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq nail lavqcav khi nqtavq gaqkhoel nail lavqcav neq, teevq gaq kheel ngaol.
Meenq al meenq nail khainl neq, neltsaiq deel sainl-i mail kaovq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Meenq neq, haoltaiv deel heel-i mail kaovq-ai thaq khi, phaoqdaiq khe-ai haoltaiv deel ngaol.

Meenq nail khainl daoqthaoq bhai kaovq-ai thaq nail lovmav al juq neq, aqphoiq mao-ail phoiq nail sainl mee nia phaq-i mail kaovq-ai thaq nail ngaol. Iqmoeq ilmoeq khe heeq neq, neltsaiq deel sainl ngaol. Nvq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqpheel pheel nail sainl ngaol. Hail heeq teevq heeq neq, phulleq deel sainl ngaol. Liq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqniul niul nav nav nail sainl ngaol.

Ngaq heeq teevq heeq neq, gevq lavq yaovq deel nail sainl ngaol. Kovq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqnel nel deel sainl ngaol. Sivq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqheel heel nel nel nail sainl ngaol. Eivq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqniul niul heel heel nail sainl ngaol. Goiq heeq teevq heeq neq, heel tsaiq deel nail sainl ngaol. Tsel heeq teevq heeq neq, aqheel heel niul niul nail sainl ngaol. Tsel teevq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqnel bhai boivq boivq kheq nail sainl ngaol. Tsel-nvq heeq teevq heeq neq, aqnel bhai aqpheel kheq nail sainl ngaol.

Khainl lolgov tsel-nvq gov neq, laoq pav laol pav nail sainl tsel-nvq heeq-i mail lav sav-ai thaq nail ngaol. Lolgov teevq gov bhai neq, laoqpav laolpav nail sainl teevq heeq ngaol. Meenq al meenq nail gaoltsi bhai daol nail gailkhaol neq, haoltaiv deel heel-i mail lav sav-ai thaq khi phaoqdaiq khe-ai haol nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel-ai uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma jiav nail bhai, ngal maq moel-al. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai uvthaiq nail bhaqaoq eeq nail Heeqphaq Miqyail khi Yaolyaq neq, meenq al meenq nail uqhuq thaoq nail ilkhaol il ma pevq nail ngaol.

Meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai nlma nail aqbhaq khi bhala nail aqbhaq maq loq-ail. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Miqyail nail seiqleiq khaoqsail meenq al meenq bhai aqbhaq bhaq khi, Yaolyaq neq, meenq al meenq nail phalmanq pevq nail ngaol.
Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl mail aqbhaq al nail lavqkhoel bhai tsao nail ngaol. Miltsaq khe heeqphaq juq, meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai yovqgavq nail seiqleiq khaoqsail yovqgavq oil lavq nail ngaol.
Meenq al meenq nail khainl lolgov juq neq, teevq n n lao-ail maq pheethaiq-ail. Al ovqtavq, a bhai neq, nqkivq maq kivq lai-ail.
Jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail seiqleiq khaoqsail khi aqyu juq nail aqphoiq kav nail phaq, aqyu juq meenq al meenq nail lavqkhoel bhai oil lavq nail ngaol.

Aqjiivq aqcavq khul phaq maqkhaiq, meenq al meenq bhai maq ya oil bhoel laivq-ail. Aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl-a nail tsaol-aq khi goiqbhaoq bhaoq-a nail tsaol-aq khul gaq maqkhaiq, meenq al meenq bhai maq ya aol lai-ail. Yaolyaq nail aqdoevq bhi doevq nail haoqgavq phaldoiq lavqkhoel bhai aqmil gevq bhoel-ai thaq nail tsaol-aq taivq-ail, ya aol lai nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail laoljaol ngaq bhai cavq naq lavq-a nail ngaol. Miqyail khi Yaolyaq nail joiqjaq doiqbev nee il dov lee khi, sainl khe-ai dul nail haoltaiv deel laoljaol pevq nail ngaol.

Laoljaol al jaol neq, meenq nail gailkhaol gaoltsi nvq pav-ail il khal leevq thaq nail ngaol. Laoljaol al jaol nail nvq phao bal-nvq, nvq phao bal-nvq-ail, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail aqbhaol doevq nail ngaol. Aqheeq aqbhaol al bhaol neq, aqheeq tsel-nvq phaq heeq khi, bhala yaoq heeq yaoq-ao nee aqheeq heeq lee nail ngaol. Aivq nail aqpavq juq neq, jeq-e jaq-a iqsanl nail nalgoel bhai meeq lai nail haqbhoil ngaol.

Niai nee pultavq neq, khul phaq maqkhaiq iqkhail yavq nail bhai maq ya daq yaoq-aol. Meenq al meenq bhai Miqyail khi Yaolyaq nail joiqjaq doiqbev bev ma jiav khi, aivq nail yaqkav juq aivq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail ngaol.
Aqyu juq aivq nail maivphaoq bhai ya moel khi, aqyu juq nail neeqthel bhai aivq nail aqmil gevq-ai thaq nail ngaol.

Niai nee pultavq neq, nqkivq maq kivq-ail yaoq-aol. Phalmanq nail aqbhaq maqkhaiq, nlma nail aqbhaq maqkhaiq, aqyu juq maq loq yaoq-aol. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, Heeqphaq Miqyail aqyu juq bhai aqbhaq bhaq bhiq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, nqmaq maqluv halyeel ya uvthaiq nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq teevq pov gaoq ge nail: “Daoq niil juq neq, maldil tsaq khi saljial ivq nail daoq ngaol. Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq bhai Aqhaqlal Miqyail bivq-a nail Heeqphaq Miqyail neq, mao-ail maq maoq lal mail pevq lal nail juq aivq nail yaqkav juq bhai phaodaiq bhiq nail dai khi, aivq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol” dai, ge bhiq-a nail ngaol.

“Ngal lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee naol dei-eiq. Haoqgavq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol” dai, Yeiqsul ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, Yaolhaq ngaol. Ngal ganl niil juq iqsanl bhai ya gaiq ya moel-a nail ngaol. Ganl niil juq bhai ya gaiq ya moel gaq-u phao, ngaq bhai cavq naq lavq-a nail nqtavq gaqkhoel al gaq bhai uqhuq thaoq nail dai khi, aivq nail aqkhil daoqthaoq bhai peevqceevq kovdoiq doiq-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, aivq ge nail: “Thailhai thaq khi. Ngal iqsanl, naoq-ai kheel Miqyail nail yaqkav ngaol. Naoq nail aqivq jaqbheq pevq nail, Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan nail juq nee maqkhaiq, haoqgavq niil keiv nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail daoq juq bhai naldaiq nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl nee maqkhaiq, ngal iqsanl aqyu juq kheel yaqkav ngaol. Miqyail bhai taivq-ail uqhuq thaoq yaoq” dai, ngaq bhai ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

A bhai nee ngal-aq, aivq ngaq bhai gaoq ge lavq-a nail: “Haoqgavq nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail Miqyail nail daoq bhai junq thaq deeq. Khul khi mail dai ngal-aq neq, aqyanq kev lee-aiq nail ngaol.

Haqeiv nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq haqeiv nail phaq nl dal laivq khi, aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl nail tsaol-aq iqsanl aqjiivq aqcavq phaq nl dal laivq naol. Tsaq nail daol nail phaq nl nail tsaol-aq tsaq nail daol nail phaq nl dal laivq khi, meeq nail haol nail tsaol-aq juq iqmoeq phao aqmeeq aqhaol haol dai doevq dal laivq nail ngaol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Yeiqsul ge nail: “Ngal lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee naol dei-eiq. Tsaol-aq yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, yovqgavq-i mail khal nl khal hal-a nail khe-ai geel-nvq dai bivq nail dai khi, ngal kovpavq oil leevq naol.
Ngal neq, Aqlaqphal khi Aolmeiqgal ngaol. Iqmoeq ilmoeq khe khi haoqnao naosaq khe gaq iqsanl ngel naol. Iqmoeq ilmoeq iqsanl, haoqnao naosaq khe iqsanl pevq nail ngaol.

Yovqgavq nail aqgaq aqdoi bhai tsiq haol-a nail tsaol-aq, geeqlaoq eeq nail ngaol. Aqyu juq neq, aqdoevq bhi doevq nail aqbhaol al nail aqheeq ya jaq dai maqkhaiq, meenq nail lolgov lavqkhoel nee aol lal nail aqkhaoqanq ya-a nail ngaol.

Thailhai ngaol-aoq, meenq nail lavqniil phao neq, kheeq khe-ai dul nail tsaol-aq, neivq bhai laol nail sail nail tsaol-aq, khaqmiq sev nail tsaol-aq, tsaol-aq bhai lav heivq-a nail tsaol-aq, thaoqphaoq aqma maolkhoel bhai uqhuq thaoq-a nail tsaol-aq khi, goiqbhaoq bhaoq nail tsaol-aq juq jaol nail ngaol.

Ngal neq, Yeiqsul ngaol. Khali yaq munl juq bhai, ganl niil salkhil bhi khanq bhiq nail dai khi, ngal ngaq nail nqtavq gaqkhoel bhai khoel-ai leevq-a nail ngaol. Ngal neq, Daqbhil nail jeq-e jaq-a ngaol. Nqhao khe aqbhaq bhaq deedee nail aqgil iqsanl ngel naol” dai, ge lavq-a nail ngaol.

Aqhaqlal Miqyail khi, maol ail nail dai, lainq-ai thaq nail yaqmai-aq al gaq, “Lal yaoq” dai, khul nail ngaol. Khal ya gaiq-a nail tsaol-aq juq iqsanl mail “Lal yaoq” dai, khul nail ngaol. Ulcuvq khal moevq nail tsaol-aq lal yaoq. Khal daol movq nail tsaol-aq juq aqdoevq bhi doevq nail ulcuvq aqnieivq-ail daol lal yaoq.

Haoqgavq niil keiv nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan-ai thaq nail daoq niil juq bhai ya gaiq-a nail yaoq gaq yaoq-ao nee bhai, ngal daoq niailhai bivq nail ngaol. Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav haoqgavq niil nail lavqkhoel khe gevq-ai thaq nail juq bhai gaoq gevq laoq haq neq, haoqgavq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail khoeq nail jiovq nail niil juq Miqyail aivq bhai bhi daq nail ngaol.

Tsaol-aq teevq gaq ganav haoqgavq niil keiv nail lavqkhoel Miqyail nail haqbhoil gedan-ai thaq nail daoq niil juq bhai oil ha haq neq, haoqgavq niil nail lavqkhoel bhai gevq-ai thaq nail aqdoevq bhi doevq nail aqbhaol nail aqheeq khi meeq nail haol nail meenq lavqkhoel khe aivq ya heeq phaq-ail tsaq nail juq bhai, Miqyail oil ha nail ngaol.
“Ngal maldil lavqtsail mail yavq kha lee naol” dai, ganl niil salkhil khanq nail gaq ge nail ngaol. Ngel naol. Heeqphaq Yeiqsul-ol, yavq kha lee yaoq.
Heeqphaq Yeiqsul nail geeqlaoq eeljaol nuljuq iqsanl nail kovtavq bhai bhi jiav dei-eiq.
